"Today we are carrying out the second phase of the process, namely handing over evidence and the suspect with the initials AS alias Bota (43), a resident of Jalan Moh. Hatta, Maahas Village, LuwukSelatan District, from the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit investigator to the public prosecutor," said IPDA Tamaka. Based on the Banggai District Attorney's investigation letter number: B-2035/P.2.11/Eoh.1/11/2023 dated 9 November 2023 regarding P21, the Satreskrim TPPO Task Force The Banggai Police took and handed over the suspect and evidence in the form of a black Redmi model 220233L2G cellphone and Rp. 300 thousand in cash. Then, Head of Unit IV PPA added that this was the second case in Banggai Regency which was handled by the Banggai Police. "This case has been processed and "It has been rolling since July 2023 and the case we are handling has been declared complete for the second time and today we have handed it over to the Prosecutor's Office," he said. Furthermore, the Head of the PPA Unit said that this TTPO took place on Wednesday (26/7/2023) at the Celebes Luwuk Inn. , a series of investigative activities have been carried out and information has been obtained from the public about people acting as pimps. He emphasized that the Banggai Police continues to be committed to eradicating human trafficking within the jurisdiction of the Banggai Police. "We continue to enforce the law against TPPO perpetrators," emphasized IPDA Tamaka. "We will apply article 2, sub-article 12 of the Republic of Indonesia Law Number 21 of 2007 concerning the eradication of criminal acts of human trafficking or article 296 of the Criminal Code, sub-article 506 of the Criminal Code, with the threat of a minimum sentence. "three years and a maximum of 15 years in prison, a minimum fine of IDR 120 million and a maximum of 600 million," he concluded

title: Unit PPA Satreskrim Polres Banggai Jadi Narasumber Sosialisasi Pencegahan KTPA dan TPPO
text: Polresbanggai.com –Dalam rangka pencegahan Kekerasan Terhadap Perempuan dan Anak (KTPA) serta Tindak Pidana Perdagangan Orang (TPPO), Dinas Kesehatankabupaten banggaimenggandengpolres banggai, melaksanakan sosialisasi.Hadir sebagai narasumber dalam kegiatan tersebut, Unit PPA Satreskrim Polres Banggai Brigpol Widyawati Pratiwi, SH, dengan materi ‘Aspek Hukum & Etika KTP/A Termasuk TPPO'. Bertempat di Hotel Santikaluwuk, Jumat (17/11/2023).Brigpol Widyawati Pratiwi dalam pemaparan materinya menjelaskan, aspek hokum mengenai kekerasan terhadap perempuan, kekerasan terhadap anak, tindak pidana perdagangan orang, serta etika pemberian informasi dan perlindungan saksi kasus KTP/A termasuk TPPO.Menurutnya, para nakes menjadi pertolongan pertama bila menemukan korban kekerasan yang mengalami luka maupun kesakitan.“Kami penyidik Polres Banggai juga harus berkordinasi dengan instansi terkait seperti P2TP2A, Dinsos, UPTD PPA dan RSUD maupun Puskesmas untuk memaksimalkan proses lidik dan sidik, dalam hal visum dan rekam medik korban,” ujarnya.Lanjutnya, TPPO seringkali terjadi akibat calon tenaga kerja termakan bujuk rayu dari para sindikat pelaku TPPO untuk mempengaruhi para korban dengan iming-iming penghasilan besar dan serba enak.“Dalam kondisi ekonomi keluarga yang tertekan, biasanya langsung disetujui para korban tanpa mencari tahu terlebih dahulu keabsahan dan legalitas perusahaan pengerah jasa TKI maupun para perekrut,” ungkapnya.Sebut Polwan Cantik ini, peran Satgas TPPO Polri dalam menangani tindak Pidana Perdagangan Orang adalah Undang-Undang Nomor 21 Tahun 2007 tentang Pemberantasan TPPO.“Sementara untuk Kekerasan terhadap Perempuan dan Anak, proses penyidikan dilakukan sesuai ketentuan Undang-Undang Nomor 23 Tahun 2004 tentang Penghapusan KDRT,” pungkasnya.*HumasPolresBanggai Next:Polres Banggai Ungkap TPPO, Tersangka dan Barang Bukti Diserahkan ke Kejaksaan
text_en: Polresbanggai.com – In the context of preventing violence against women and children (KTPA) and the crime of human trafficking (TPPO), the Pride Regency Health Service collaborates with the Pride Police, carrying out outreach. Present as a resource person in this activity, the PPA Unit of the Banggai Police Satreskrim, Brigadier Widyawati Pratiwi, SH, with material 'Legal & Ethical Aspects of KTP/A Including TPPO'. Taking place at the Santikaluwuk Hotel, Friday (17/11/2023). Brigadier Widyawati Pratiwi in her material presentation explained the legal aspects regarding violence against women, violence against children, criminal acts of human trafficking, as well as the ethics of providing information and protecting witnesses in KTP/A cases including TPPO. According to him, health workers are the first aid when they find victims of violence who are injured or in pain. "We Banggai Police investigators also have to coordinate with related agencies such as P2TP2A, Social Services, UPTD PPA and RSUD and Puskesmas to maximize the investigation and fingerprinting process, in terms of post-mortem and medical records of the victims," ​​he said. He continued, TPPO often occurs as a result of prospective workers being persuaded by syndicates of TPPO perpetrators to influence the victims with the promise of large incomes and delicious things. "In the family's economically depressed condition, they usually immediately "It was agreed by the victims without first finding out about the validity and legality of the companies providing migrant workers and recruiting services," he said. Calling this Beautiful Policewoman, the role of the National Police's TIP Task Force in dealing with the Crime of Human Trafficking is Law Number 21 of 2007 concerning Eradication of TIP." "Meanwhile, for violence against women and children, the investigation process is carried out in accordance with the provisions of Law Number 23 of 2004 concerning the Elimination of Domestic Violence," he concluded.

title: Kapolres Banggai Imbau Rayakan Tahun Baru 2021 di Rumah Saja
text: Polresbanggai.com– Masyarakatkabupaten banggaidiimbau merayakan malam pergantian tahun 2021 di rumah saja. Itu disampaikankapolres banggaiAKBP Satria Adrie Vibrianto SIK kepada awak media saat konferensi pers akhir tahun 2020 di Aula Rupatama Mapolres Banggai, Kamis (31/12).Imbauan itu kata AKBP Satria, berdasarkan perintah atau Maklumat Kapolri nomor: MAK/4/XII/2020 tanggal 23 Desember 2020, tentang kepatuhan protokol kesehatan dalam pelaksanaan libur Natal 2020 dan Tahun Baru 2021.Dijelaskan, bahwa dalam perayaan malam tahun baru 2021 tidak dibolehkan menggelar pesta kembang api, konvoi maupun arak-arakan dan kegiatan lainnya yang berpotensi mengundang kerumunan massa.“Ini untuk mencegah terjadinya klaster barucovid-19di Kabupaten Banggai. Prioritas kita adalan keselamatan masyarakat,” tutur AKBP Satria.Untuk mengantisipasi terjadinya pelanggaran tersebut, lanjut AKBP Satria, pihaknya menerjunkan 446 personel dibantu TNI, Brimob dan intansi terkait.“Bila ada yang kedapatan membuat kegiatan berkerumun pasti dibubarkan,” tandas Satria.Selain pengamanan, aparat gabungan akan melaksanakan patroli berskala besar, dengan target tempat-tempat yang dinilai berpotensi didatangi masyarakat dengan jumlah banyak. Seperti di Teluk Lalong, wisata Kilo 5 dan lainnya.“Sudah menjadi komitmen bersama agar di malam tahun baru ini, kondisinya yang pertama harus sehat dan tentunya aman. Saya mohon dukungan dari semua elemen masyarakat,” pungkas AKBP Satria  Next:Pilkada dan Malam Tahun Baru Aman, Kapolsek Balantak Apresiasi Peran Aktif Masyarakat
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– The people of Pride Regency are advised to celebrate New Year's Eve 2021 at home. This was conveyed by the Head of the Banggai Police, AKBP Satria Adrie Vibrianto SIK to the media crew during the end of 2020 press conference in the Rupatama Hall of the Banggai Police Headquarters, Thursday (31/12). 23 December 2020, regarding compliance with health protocols in the implementation of the 2020 Christmas and 2021 New Year holidays. It was explained that during the 2021 New Year's Eve celebration it is not permissible to hold fireworks parties, convoys or processions and other activities that have the potential to attract large crowds. "This is to prevent the occurrence of a new Covid-19 cluster in Banggai Regency. "Our priority is public safety," said AKBP Satria. To anticipate the occurrence of these violations, continued AKBP Satria, his party deployed 446 personnel assisted by the TNI, Brimob and related agencies. , joint forces will carry out large-scale patrols, targeting places that are considered to have the potential to be visited by large numbers of people. Such as in Lalong Bay, Kilo 5 tourism and others. "It has become a joint commitment that on New Year's Eve, conditions must first be healthy and of course safe. "I ask for support from all elements of society," concluded AKBP Satria Next: Pilkada and New Year's Eve are Safe, Balantak Police Chief Appreciates Community's Active Role

title: Pesan Kapolres Banggai Pada Apel Gabungan Pengamanan Malam Tahun Baru 2021
text: Polresbanggai.com –kapolres banggaiAKBP Satria Adrie Vibrianto SIK, MH, menekankan kepada seluruh personel gabungan TNI-Polri dan Satpol – PP yang melaksanakan pengamanan dan patroli dalam rangka menyambut tahun baru 2021 untuk melaksanakan tugas dengam ikhlas dan penuh tanggung jawab.Itu disampaikan AKBP Satria saat memberikan arahan pada kegiatan apel kesiapan pengamanan dan patroli malam tahun baru di lapangan Mapolsekluwuk, Kamis malam (31/12.“Kita sebagai perwakilan negara punya tanggung jawab untuk memastikan masyarakat  tetap dalam keadaan sehat dan selamat terhindar dari potensi tertularnya Covid 19,” terang AKBP Satria.Pada penyambutan malam tahun baru ini, kata AKBP Satria, tidak seperti tahun-tahun sebelumnya karena tahun ini dihadapkan dengan pandemicovid-19.“Tahun baru ini mungkin masih ada masyarakat kita merasa mau nonton, rame-rame dan sebagainya,” kata AKBP Satri.Tetapi, lanjut AKBP Satria, di tengah situasi virus corona saat ini harus berbuat sesuai perintah Maklumat Kapolri terkait pelaksanaan libur Natal 2020 dan Tahun Baru 2021. Ini semua demi keselamatan masyarakat.“Apabila ditemukan kerumunan ataupun keramaian dan sebagainya langsung dihentikan dan bubarkan,” sebut AKBP Satria.Namun lanjut AKBP Satria, penghentian dan pembubaran itu dilakukan dengan cara yang simpatik, persuasif dan humanis sampai kegiatan itu benar-benar berhenti, bubar dan bersih.“Kita targetkan kegiatan seperti di hotel, wisata Kilo 5, Teluk Lalong, Keles dan tempat lainnya pukul 22.00 Wita sudah tidak ada aktivitas dan kegiatan,” tutur orang pertama dipolres banggaiini.Sampaikan kepada masyarakat, tambah perwira dua melati ini, untuk kembali ke rumah masing-masing dan beristrahat serta bersama-sama berdoa agar pandemi ini cepat berlalu.“Jika ada yang ditemukan main petasan atau pun sejenisnya segera disita dan diamankan. Karena itu bisa menimbulkan gaangguan kamtibmas,” jelas AKBP Satria.Dikatakan, dalam menyambut malam tahun baru 2021 Polres Banggai mengerahkan 446 personel dibantu TNI, Brimob dan instansi terkait untuk melakukan pengamanan dan patroli skala besar.* Next:Sinergitas TNI-Polri, Kapolres Banggai dan Dandim Patroli Bersama di Malam Tahun Baru 2021
text_en: Polresbanggai.com –Kapolres Pride AKBP Satria Adrie Vibrianto SIK, MH, emphasized to all joint TNI-Polri and Satpol-PP personnel who carry out security and patrols in order to welcome the new year 2021 to carry out their duties sincerely and with full responsibility. This was conveyed by AKBP Satria when giving directions to the New Year's Eve security and patrol readiness rally at the Luwuk Police Headquarters field, Thursday evening (31/12. "We as state representatives have a responsibility to ensure that the community remains healthy and safe and avoids the potential for contracting Covid 19," explained AKBP Satria. At this New Year's Eve reception, said AKBP Satria, it was not like previous years because this year was faced with the Covid-19 pandemic. "This New Year, maybe our people will still feel like watching, in large groups and so on," said AKBP Satri. However, continued AKBP Satria, in the midst of the current corona virus situation, you must act according to the orders of the Chief of Police regarding the implementation of the 2020 Christmas and 2021 New Year holidays. This is all for the safety of the community. "said AKBP Satria. However, AKBP Satria continued, the termination and disbandment was carried out in a sympathetic, persuasive and humane manner until the activities were completely stopped, dispersed and clean. "We are targeting activities such as hotels, Kilo 5 tourism, Lalong Bay. , Keles and other places at 22.00 WITA there are no activities and activities," said the first person at the Banganiini police station. Tell the public, added the two jasmine officers, to return to their respective homes and rest and pray together so that this pandemic will speed up. passed. "If anyone is found playing with firecrackers or anything similar, they will immediately be confiscated and taken into custody. "Because it could cause disruption to security and social security," explained AKBP Satria. He said, in welcoming New Year's Eve 2021 the Banggai Police deployed 446 personnel assisted by the TNI, Brimob and related agencies to carry out large-scale security and patrols.* Next: TNI-Polri Synergy, Banggai Police Chief and Dandim Patrol Together on New Year's Eve 2021

title: Kanit Pidum Satreskrim Hadiri Rakor Sentra Gakkumdu Kabupaten Banggai
text: luwuk–polres banggaiyang diwakili Kanit Pidum IPDA Tommy Kawilarang, SH, hadiri Rapat Koordinasi Sentra Penegakkan Hukum Terpadu (Gakkumdu) Pemilu Tahun 2024 di Ruang Gakkumdukabupaten banggai, Selasa (14/11/2023) jam 13.30 Wita.Terkait tahapan kampanye yang akan dimulai tanggal 28 November 2023 sehingga berpotensi terjadinya pelanggaran pidana Pemilu serta dukungan dan pengelolaan anggaran Sentra Gakumdu.Adapun yang hadir dalam rapat koordinasi tersebut adalah perwakilan dari Polres Banggai, Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai, Ketua Bawaslu Sulteng dan Ketua Bawaslu Banggai.Menurutnya, Rakor Sentra Gakkumdu Pemilu Tahun 2024 Kabupaten Banggai ini adalah merupakan sarana untuk meningkatkan sinergitas antara Bawaslu, Polri dan Kejaksaan dalam penegakkan hukum terpadu terkait pelanggaran tindak pidana pemilu.“Kami selaku coordinator penyidik sentra Gakumdu Banggai mengapresiasi kegiatan Rakor ini, dimana melalui kegiatan ini, dapat meningkatkan koordinasi terkait Sentra Gakkumdu pada Pemilu Tahun 2024 di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai,” ucap IPDA Tommy.“Polres Banggai mengharapkan para anggota Gakkumdu selalu kompak, karena akses dan hubungan dalam pelaksanaannya pasti luas tapi diharapkan tetap dapat satu suara dalam memprosesnya” lanjutnya.Kanit Isat reskrimini juga menambahkan bahwa Polres Banggai telah menyiapkan personel terbaiknya yang nantinya mengawaki di Sentra Gakkumdu  Next:Wakapolres Banggai Lepas 30 Atlet Inkanas Ikuti Kejuaraan Karate Kapolda Sulteng Cup
text_en: Luwuk–Bangangan Police, represented by IPDA Criminal Investigation Unit Head Tommy Kawilarang, SH, attended the 2024 Election Integrated Law Enforcement Center Coordination Meeting (Gakkumdu) in the Gakkumduk Room, Banggai Regency, Tuesday (14/11/2023) at 13.30 WITA. Regarding the campaign stages which will start on 28 November 2023, so there is the potential for criminal election violations as well as the support and management of the Gakumdu Center's budget. Those present at the coordination meeting were representatives from the Banggai Police, the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office, the Chair of the Central Sulawesi Bawaslu and the Chair of the Banggai Bawaslu. According to him, the Coordination Meeting of the 2024 Election Gakkumdu Center Banggai Regency is a means to increase synergy between Bawaslu, Polri and the Prosecutor's Office in integrated law enforcement related to election crime violations. "We, as coordinators of the Banggai Gakumdu Center investigators, appreciate this Coordination Meeting activity, where through this activity, we can improve coordination related to the Gakkumdu Center in "2024 General Election in the Banggai Regency area," said IPDA Tommy. "The Banggai Police hopes that the Gakkumdu members will always be united, because access and relationships in its implementation will definitely be broad but it is hoped that they will still have one voice in the process," he continued. The Head of Isat Reskrimini also added that the Banggai Police has prepared the best personnel who will later man the Gakkumdu Center Next: Banggai Deputy Chief of Police Releases 30 Inkanas Athletes to Participate in Central Sulawesi Police Chief's Karate Championship Cup

title: Polisi Olah TKP Penemuan Mayat Pria di Salah Satu Penginapan Kota Luwuk
text: luwuk–Personilpolres banggaimelakukan Olah Tempat Kejadian Perkara (TKP) lokasi penemuan pria gantung diri di dalam kamar salah satu Penginapan di Kota Luwuk, Senin siang (6/11/2023).Personel Identifikasi dan Piketsat reskrimserta Sidokkes diback up Personelpolsek luwukjuga melakukan evakuasi korban sesaat setelah mendapatkan laporan dari masyarakat.kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM melalui PlhkapolsekLuwuk mengatakan tim unit identifikasi melakukan olah TKP terhadap kasus gantung diri pria bernama Faisal Pinios (28) asal Desa Uwedikan, Kecamatan Luwuk Timur yang ditemukan tewas gantung diri.“Korban profesi sebagai wiraswatsa ditemukan tergantung di balik pintu kamar S9 lantai 2,” katanya.Korban diketahui ke Penginapan pada Minggu siang (5/11/2023). Ia menginap di penginapan bersama seorang perempuan yang adalah istrinya.“Minggu pukul 11.00 Wita Chek In. Tetapi Senin paginya istrinya pamit kerja di Toko Buah Cacah Pasar Simpong ,” ujarnya.Suci Maharani (19) sendiri adalah orang yang pertama kali menemukan korban tergantung. Sekembalinya ke penginapan korban sudah ditemukan tidak bernyawa dalam kondisi tergantung di pintu kamar penginapan.Menurut Sang Istri, bahwa malam sebelumnya saksi sempat terlibat perselisihan dengan suaminya tersebut. Ada permasalahan keluarga.Lanjut Plh. Kapolsek Luwuk bahwa pengakuan Saksi Suci bahwa diduga korban mengalami depresi karena semenjak tiga bulan yang lalu, saksi telah meminta cerai kepada sang suami.Setelah melakukan identifikasi diTKP, selanjutnya polisi melakukan pemotongan tali nilon warna biru guna korban dibawa ke Rumah Sakit Umum Daerah Luwuk.Berbagai proses dilakukan di rumah sakit, pihak keluarga korban setelah melakukan koordinasi mengambil kesimpulan untuk korban tidak dilakukan otopsi dengan menanda tangani surat pernyataan.Selanjutnya pukul 15.45 Wita, jenazah dibawah pulang dari RSUD Luwuk menuju Desa Uwedikan dengan menggunakan Mobil Ambulance RSUD Luwuk  Next:Polisi Olah TKP Awal Penemuan Mayat Pria Gantung Diri di Luwuk Timur
text_en: Luwuk–Police personnel were proud to carry out crime scene investigation (TKP) at the location where a man was found hanging himself in the room of one of the accommodations in Luwuk City, Monday afternoon (6/11/2023). Identification and Criminal Investigation and Sidokkes personnel were backed up. Luwuk police personnel also carried out a temporary evacuation of the victim. "After receiving reports from the public, the Head of the Banggai Police, AKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM, through Plhkapolsek Luwuk, said that the identification unit team carried out a crime scene investigation into the hanging case of a man named Faisal Pinios (28) from Uwedikan Village, East Luwuk District who was found dead by hanging himself." "The victim who works as an entrepreneur was found hanging behind the door of room S9 on the 2nd floor," he said. The victim was discovered at the accommodation on Sunday afternoon (5/11/2023). He stayed at the inn with a woman who was his wife. "Sunday at 11.00 WITA Check In. "But on Monday morning his wife said goodbye to work at the Simpong Market Chopped Fruit Shop," he said. Suci Maharani (19) himself was the first person to find the victim hanging. Upon returning to the accommodation, the victim was found dead, hanging from the door of the accommodation room. According to the wife, the previous night the witness had been involved in an argument with her husband. There are family problems. Continue Plh. Luwuk Police Chief stated that the Holy Witness admitted that it was suspected that the victim was experiencing depression because three months ago, the witness had asked her husband for a divorce. After carrying out identification at the crime scene, the police then cut the blue nylon rope so that the victim was taken to the Luwuk Regional General Hospital. Various the process was carried out at the hospital, the victim's family, after coordinating, came to the conclusion that an autopsy was not carried out for the victim by signing a statement letter. Next, at 15.45 WITA, the body was returned from the Luwuk Regional Hospital to Uwedikan Village using the Luwuk Regional Hospital Ambulance Next: Police Process the Crime Scene The Beginning of the Discovery of the Body of a Hanged Man in East Luwuk

title: Polres Banggai Rilis Pencapaian Kinerja Selama Tahun 2020
text: Polresbanggai.com–polres banggaimerilis hasil penanganan kasus selama tahun 2020. kepada awak media, di Aula Rupatama Mapolres Banggai, Kamis (31/12).Kabag Ops Polres Banggai AKP Noperto Gilbert Nainggolan SIK mengungkapkan terjadi penurunan pelanggar serta kecelakaan lalu lintas dan peningkatan kasus kriminalitas selama tahun 2020.AKP Noperto membeberkan, tercatat ada 1191 kasus kriminalitas pada tahun 2019, sedangkan tahun 2020 meningkat menjadi 1355 kasus. “Naik 164 kasus atau 12 persen,” papar AKP Noperto.Dari 1355 kasus kriminalitas di tahun 2020, kata AKP Noperto ada lima kasus menonjol. Diantaranya; kasus penganiayaan biasa sebanyak 219 dengan penyelesaian 202 laporan, kasus penipuan 150 dengan penyelesaian 79 laporan, kasus pencurian biasa 110 dengan penyelesaian 58 laporan, pencurian dengan pemberatan (curat) 109 dengan penyelesaian 38 laporan, serta kasus penggelapan sebanyak 93 dengan penyelesaian 61 laporan.AKP Noperto menjelaskan, kasus pencurian lebih dominan dilakukan dinihari. Saat jam tidur warga, dengan cara membobol pintu rumah maupun jendela. Olehnya itu, warga diimbau selalu waspada.“Jadilah polisi bagi diri sendiri,” cetus perwira tiga balak ini.Selain itu, kasus narkoba juga menjadi atensi kepolisian. Selama 2020, tercatat ada 52 tersangka dari 51 kasus. “Barang bukti sabu seberat 130,05 gram, obat terlarang jenis THD 3032 butir dan 3 butir ekstasi,” beber AKP Noperto.Untuk kasus pelanggaran lalu lintas berupa tilang dan teguran terjadi penurunan. Tahun 2019 sebanyak 6413 kasus, sedangkan tahun 2020 turun menjadi 4890 kasus atau 24 persen.Lalu kecelakaan lalu lintas sebanyak 191 kasus dengan jumlah korban meninggal dunia 58 orang di tahun 2019, serta 86 kasus dengan jumlah korban meninggal sebanyak 32 orang di tahun 2020.“Kasus laka lantas ini dominan terjadi karena human error, seperti dalam keadaan mabuk, mengantuk, dan melanggar aturan lalu lintas,” tandas AKP Noperto  Next:Kapolres Banggai Imbau Rayakan Tahun Baru 2021 di Rumah Saja
text_en: Polresbanggai.com–Banggai Police released the results of case handling during 2020 to the media crew, in the Rupatama Hall of the Banggai Police Headquarters, Thursday (31/12). Head of Operations for the Banggai Police, AKP Noperto Gilbert Nainggolan SIK, revealed that there had been a decrease in violators and traffic accidents and an increase in cases. crime during 2020. AKP Noperto revealed that there were 1191 criminal cases recorded in 2019, while in 2020 this increased to 1355 cases. "An increase of 164 cases or 12 percent," said AKP Noperto. Of the 1355 criminal cases in 2020, said AKP Noperto there were five cases that stood out. Among them; There were 219 cases of ordinary abuse with 202 reports resolved, 150 fraud cases with 79 reports resolved, 110 cases of ordinary theft with 58 reports resolved, 109 aggravated theft with 38 reports resolved, and 93 embezzlement cases with 61 reports resolved. AKP Noperto explained that theft cases were more dominant in the early hours of the morning. During residents' sleeping hours, by breaking into house doors and windows. Therefore, residents are advised to always be alert. "Be your own policeman," said this three-barak officer. Apart from that, drug cases are also of concern to the police. During 2020, there were 52 suspects recorded in 51 cases. "The evidence was methamphetamine weighing 130.05 grams, 3032 THD drugs and 3 ecstasy pills," explained AKP Noperto. In cases of traffic violations in the form of tickets and warnings, there was a decrease. "In 2019 there were 6,413 cases, while in 2020 it fell to 4,890 cases or 24 percent. Then there were 191 traffic accidents with a death toll of 58 people in 2019, and 86 cases with a death toll of 32 people in 2020." "These traffic accident cases predominantly occur due to human error, such as being drunk, sleepy and violating traffic rules," said AKP Noperto Next: Banggai Police Chief Urges to Celebrate New Year 2021 at Home

title: Upacara Peringatan HUT ke-11 Kabupaten Banggai Laut
text: KABAR LUWUK –Upacara Peringatan HUT ke-11 Kabupaten Banggai Laut.Peringatan Hari Jadi Kabupaten Banggai Laut ke-11 tahun diselenggarakan dengan khidmat. Bupati Banggai Laut,Sofyan Kaepa, SHbertindak sebagaiInspektur upacara peringatan HUT Kabupaten Banggai Laut, bertempat di Alun-alunTaman Kota Banggai, Kamis (14/12/2023).Dalam amanatnya, melalui momentum peringatan hari jadi Kabupaten Banggai Laut yang ke-11 tahun ini, Bupati mengajak seluruh pihak baik itu dari ASN hingga masyarakat untuk bisa menggali potensi yang ada demi memajukan Kabupaten Banggai Laut.“Potensi yang dimiliki Kabupaten Banggai Laut harus dimanfaatkan secara optimal dan dikelola secara bijaksana agar dapat berkontribusi dalam membangun Banggai Laut yang lebih maju sehingga bisa menjadikan Kabupaten Banggai Laut mampu berdaya saing yang tinggi dilingkup regional maupun nasional,” katanya.Ditambahkan Bupati, Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai Laut dalam kurun 3 tahun masa kepemimpinan Bupati dan Wakil Bupati Banggai Laut, sampai saat ini telah memperoleh banyak penghargaan sebagai prestasi dari Pemerintah Pusat, Provinsi maupun lembaga-lembaga lainnya.“Atas prestasi ini saya mengucapkan terima kasih yang setulus-tulusnya kepada ASN, stakeholder, eksekutif dan seluruh elemen masyarakat. Semua prestasi ini bisa didapatkan bukan hanya karena pemimpinnya tetapi juga karena ada kerjasama dan partisipasi seluruh pihak,” ungkapnya.“Terimakasih sudah berjuang, 1 langkah untuk membawa banggai laut lebih maju dari hari ini,” tegas Bupati. (RS) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Laut Regency's 11th Anniversary Commemoration Ceremony. The 11th Anniversary of Banggai Laut Regency was held solemnly. The Regent of Banggai Laut, Sofyan Kaepa, S.H. acted as Inspector of the Banggai Laut Regency Anniversary commemoration ceremony, taking place at Banggai City Park Square, Thursday (14/12/2023). In his mandate, through the momentum of commemorating the 11th anniversary of Banggai Laut Regency this year , the Regent invited all parties, from ASN to the community, to be able to explore the potential that exists in order to advance Banggai Laut Regency. "The potential that Banggai Laut Regency has must be utilized optimally and managed wisely so that it can contribute to building a more advanced Banggai Laut Regency so that it can "making Banggai Laut Regency capable of high competitiveness regionally and nationally," he said. Added by the Regent, the Banggai Laut Regency Government, in the 3 years of leadership of the Regent and Deputy Regent of Banggai Laut, to date has received many awards for achievements from the Central Government, Provinces and other institutions. "For this achievement I would like to express my sincere thanks to ASN, stakeholders, executives and all elements of society. "All of these achievements were achieved not only because of the leader but also because of the cooperation and participation of all parties," he said. "Thank you for fighting, this is one step to bring the pride of the sea more advanced than today," stressed the Regent. (RS) **

title: JATAM Desak Evaluasi Keselamatan Kerja Tambang PT KFM di Kabupaten Banggai
text: KABAR LUWUK –Desakan JATAM,evaluasi keselamatan kerja tambang di Kabupaten Banggai.Jaringan Advokasi Tambang(JATAM)Sulawesi Tengah (Sulteng)mendesak pemerintah untuk melakukan evaluasi menyeluruh terhadapSistem Manajemen Keselamatan Kerja Pertambangan (SMK3P)seluruh perusahaan tambang di Kabupaten Banggai.Desakan ini muncul menyusul dugaan kecelakaan kerja di wilayah penambanganPT. Koninis Fajar Mineral (PT. KFM). Sabtu, 17 Desember 2023.Kecelakaan tersebut, yang disinyalir menimbulkan korban jiwa dan cedera serius, menggugah kebutuhan akan evaluasi khusus terhadap kepatuhan perusahaan terhadap SMK3P.JATAM Sulteng menekankan pentingnya memastikan implementasi Prosedur K3 pertambangan sesuai dengan regulasi yang berlaku, termasuk Peraturan Menteri Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral Republik Indonesia Nomor 38 Tahun 2014 dan Permen ESDM Nomor 26 Tahun 2018.Selain fokus pada keselamatan kerja, JATAM Sulteng mendesak pemerintah untuk:Melakukan pemantauan dan pengukuran kinerja perusahaan tambang.Melakukan inspeksi pelaksanaan keselamatan pertambangan.Melakukan evaluasi kepatuhan terhadap peraturan perundang-undangan.Melakukan penyelidikan kecelakaan, kejadian, dan penyakit akibat kerja.KAIT (Kepala Inspektur Tambang) juga dipanggil untuk meminta PT. KFM melakukan audit eksternal penerapan SMKP Minerba sesuai dengan Pasal 14 Ayat (2) PERMEN ESDM Nomor 38 Tahun 2014.Kecelakaan serius yang mengakibatkan pekerja mengalami cedera parah, dengan putus di kaki kanan dan kerusakan pada kaki kiri, menjadi pemicu pentingnya audit tersebut.JATAM Sulteng menegaskan bahwa evaluasi dan langkah-langkah ini penting untuk mencegah terulangnya insiden serupa di masa depan dan menjaga keselamatan pekerja di sektor pertambangan.Pemerintah diharapkan segera merespons serius atas desakan ini demi keamanan dan kesejahteraan pekerja tambang di Kabupaten Banggai.**Kemenkumham Kembali Raih Kualitas Tinggi dalam Penilaian Kepatuhan Penyelenggaraan Pelayanan Publik
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – JATAM's pressure to evaluate mining work safety in Banggai Regency. The Mining Advocacy Network (JATAM) of Central Sulawesi (Sulteng) urges the government to carry out a comprehensive evaluation of the Mining Work Safety Management System (SMK3P) of all mining companies in Banggai Regency. This pressure emerged following suspected work accident in the PT mining area. Koninis Fajar Mineral (PT. KFM). Saturday, 17 December 2023. This accident, which allegedly resulted in fatalities and serious injuries, aroused the need for a special evaluation of the company's compliance with SMK3P. JATAM Central Sulawesi stressed the importance of ensuring the implementation of mining K3 procedures in accordance with applicable regulations, including the Regulation of the Minister of Energy and Resources Daya Mineral Republic of Indonesia Number 38 of 2014 and Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources Regulation Number 26 of 2018. Apart from focusing on work safety, JATAM Central Sulawesi urges the government to: Monitor and measure the performance of mining companies. .Conduct investigations into accidents, incidents and work-related illnesses. KAIT (Chief Inspector of Mines) was also summoned to ask PT. KFM conducted an external audit of the implementation of the Minerba SMKP in accordance with Article 14 Paragraph (2) of the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources Regulation Number 38 of 2014. A serious accident which resulted in the worker suffering serious injuries, with a broken right leg and damage to the left leg, was the trigger for the importance of this audit. JATAM Sulteng emphasizes that these evaluations and steps are important to prevent the recurrence of similar incidents in the future and maintain the safety of workers in the mining sector. The government is expected to immediately respond seriously to this call for the safety and welfare of mining workers in Banggai Regency. **The Ministry of Law and Human Rights Achieves High Quality Again in Compliance Assessment of Public Service Delivery

title: Satgas OMB Polres Banggai Ingatkan STTP Wajib Sebelum Pelaksanaan Kampanye
text: luwuk–Kasatgas Humas OMB Tinombalapolres banggaiIPTU Al Amin S. Muda menjelaskan bahwa Surat Tanda Terima Pemberitahuan (STTP) sebelum melakukan kampanye wajib diberitahukan kepada pihak kepolisian.Adapun proses pengurusan STTP dimulai dari pengajuan surat pemberitahuan oleh peserta kampanye. Hal tersebut disampaikan IPTU Amin saat ditemui awak media pada Senin (18/12/2023) pagi diruangan kerjanya.“Untuk surat pemberitahuan kepada pihak kepolisian, H-7 sudah diajukan, paling lambat H-3. Selanjutnya kami proses dan kita keluarkan STTP untuk penyelenggaraan kampanye sesuai surat pemberitahuan yang diajukan,” jelasnya.Dalam surat pemberitahuan lanjut Amin, ada beberapa point yang meliputi ketua tim kampanye, parpol peserta pemilu maupun calegnya. Begitu juga dengan bentuk kampanye, lokasi, waktu pelaksanaan dan juru kampanye.Selain itu juga harus diketahui perkiraan jumlah peserta kampanye yang hadir, perkiraan jumlah dan jenis kendaraan angkutan peserta kampanye, serta alat peraga yang digunakan.“Surat pemberitahuan itu nantinya akan dijadikan acuan bagi kami dalam memperhitungkan personil keamanan yang akan bertugas saat kampanye,” lanjutnya.Ia menyatakan bahwa perihal PKPU Nomor 15 tahun 2023 menyatakan bahwqa tim kampanye dan pelaksana kampanye wajib menyampaikan pemberitahuan tertulis ke KPU dan Bawaslu sesuai tingkatan.“Kami harap ini dipatuhi untuk menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban masyarakat tetap kondusif,” pungkasnya
text_en: Luwuk–Head of the Public Relations Task Force for OMB Tinombalapolres BanggaiIPTU Al Amin S. Muda explained that the Notification Receipt Letter (STTP) before carrying out a campaign must be notified to the police. The STTP processing process starts from submitting a notification letter by campaign participants. This was conveyed by IPTU Amin when met by media crew on Monday (18/12/2023) morning in his office. "For the notification letter to the police, H-7 has been submitted, no later than H-3. "Then we process it and issue an STTP for organizing the campaign according to the notification letter submitted," he explained. In Amin's further notification letter, there are several points which include the campaign team leader, political parties participating in the election and legislative candidates. Likewise with the form of the campaign, location, time of implementation and campaigners. Apart from that, you must also know the estimated number of campaign participants attending, the estimated number and type of vehicles transporting campaign participants, as well as the props used. "The notification letter will later be used as a reference for "We are taking into account the security personnel who will be on duty during the campaign," he continued. He stated that regarding PKPU Number 15 of 2023, it states that the campaign team and campaign implementers are obliged to submit written notifications to the KPU and Bawaslu according to level. "We hope that this is complied with to maintain security and "public order remains conducive," he concluded

title: Perlengkapan Rumah Tangga Terbaik MODENA Kini Telah Hadir di Kota Luwuk
text: BERITABANGGAI.COM, LUWUK –Ini adalah kabar gembira bagi masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai. Telah hadir di kota Luwuk, MODENA, merek penyedia peralatan rumah tangga yang telah dipercaya selama lebih dari empat dekade oleh masyarakat Indonesia.MODENA Secara resmi membuka Modena Home Center (MHC) pertama di kota Luwuk, pada Sabtu, (16/12/2023). Ini merupakan Modena Home Center pertama yang dibuka di kota Luwuk yang berlokasi di Jalan Samratulangi Kelurahan Soho, tepatnya di depan SDN 1 Luwuk.Pembukaan MHC ini merupakan langkah ekspansi bagi MODENA untuk konsumen di kawasan Indonesia Tengah dalam menyediakan produk-produk solusi rumah tangga pintar dan inovatif di seluruh Indonesia.MODENA secara resmi membuka Modena Home Center Pertama di LuwukYunanto Sirin, selaku Franchise Acquisition Manager MODENA, menjelaskan “MODENA Home Center Luwuk adalah MODENA Home Center pertama kami yang hadir di Luwuk.“Alasan kami untuk melakukan ekspansi melalui dibukanya MHC di kota Luwuk, tentunya kami melihat perkembangan dari sektor ekonomi dan pariwisata yang signifikan. Dengan pertumbuhan tersebut, tentunya kebutuhan akan produk-produk home appliances pun pasti meningkat,” katanya.Oleh karena itu, hari ini secara resmi hadir MHC hadir di kota Luwuk untuk menawarkan produk-produk solusi rumah tangga pintar dan inovatif sehingga dapat membantu memberikan kemudahan bagi masyarakat dalam menjalani aktivitas setiap hari.Dalam perjalanannya sepanjang tahun 2023, MODENA telah membuka lebih banyak Home Center di sejumlah kota besar di Indonesia. Hal ini merupayakan upaya MODENA untuk membawa solusi rumah tangga inovatifnya semakin dekat dengan masyarakat.Selain itu, hadirnya MODENA Home Center juga memberi kesempatan bagi pelanggan untuk merasakan pengalaman langsung menggunakan produk MODENA. Hingga Desember 2023, MODENA telah hadir di 51 titik yang tersebar di seluruh Indonesia, dan masih akan terus bertambah hingga akhir tahun 2023 ini.Khairul Fahmi Lubis selaku Regional Branches Business Development Senior Manager MODENA bagian Timur menambahkan, MHC bukan hanya sekedar showroom untuk menampilkan berbagai koleksi produk kami yang berkualitas.“Disini, kami juga menghadirkan pengalaman terbaik bagi para customer ketika mereka berkunjung mencari produk, dimulai dari proses memilih, mencoba, hingga akhirnya membeli produk,” katanya.Tak hanya itu pengalaman after sales yang kami berikan pun begitu mudah dan nyaman, hanya dengan menghubungi atau mengunjungi kami untuk bantuan lebih lanjut.MODENA Home Center memiliki moto 3S, Sales, Service Point, & Spare Part. Konsistensi MODENA dalam memberikan pengalaman terbaiknya bagi para costumer juga diperlihatkan dengan hadirnya MODENA Expert, sales representative dengan pengetahuan menyeluruh seputar produk di setiap MODENA Home Center untuk membantu pelanggan dengan segala kebutuhan dan pertanyaan terkait produk.Jika membutuhkan aksesoris atau spare parts produk, pelanggan bisa mendapatkannya disini. Begitu pun jika produk membutuhkan maintenance dari teknisi ahli, pelanggan dapat mengantarkan produknya ke MODENA Home Center untuk diteruskan ke service center terdekat.Pembukaan MODENA Home Center Luwuk juga diramaikan dengan sejumlah promo eksklusif yang berlaku selama periode Grand Opening berlangsung. Untuk informasi terkini seputar produk, penawaran menarik, serta tips dan trik sehari-hari dari MODENA bisa dilihat melalui akun Instagram @modenaindonesia dan website modena.com.Modena Home Center secara resmi telah hadir di Kota LuwukSekedar diketahui, MODENA adalah merek global consumer electronics ternama yang didirikan sejak tahun 1960-an di Italia Utara. Sejak tahun 1980-an, MODENA telah melakukan pergeseran strategis operasionalnya ke benua Asia.Jajaran produk MODENA meliputi Home, Professional, Tech, Health, Mobility, dan Energy didukung oleh studio desain yang inovatif di Italia dan pusat R&D yang terdapat di berbagai belahan dunia.Produk-produk MODENA diproduksi di berbagai negara antara lain Italia, China, Belarus, Mesir, Uzbekistan, Vietnam, dan Indonesia di bawah sertifikasi dan sistem manajemen kualitas bertaraf internasional.Visi MODENA saat ini adalah untuk menjadi penggerak menuju sebuah dunia yang terinterkoneksi. Lini produk MODENA yang terus berkembang diciptakan dengan semangat untuk mempertegas pengalaman manusia.Diciptakan dengan desain modern dan teknologi terkini seperti Internet of Things (IoT), merupakan bentuk komitmen MODENA untuk terus berjuang menghadirkan inovasi produk yang terinterkoneksi secara cerdas kepada para konsumen. (*)(bb/05)
text_en: BERITABANGGAI.COM, LUWUK – This is good news for the people of Banggai Regency. Now present in the city of Luwuk, MODENA, a brand providing household appliances that has been trusted for more than four decades by the Indonesian people. MODENA Officially opened the first Modena Home Center (MHC) in the city of Luwuk, on Saturday, (16/12/2023) . This is the first Modena Home Center to be opened in the city of Luwuk which is located on Jalan Samratulangi, Soho Village, precisely in front of SDN 1 Luwuk. The opening of this MHC is an expansion step for MODENA for consumers in the Central Indonesia region in providing smart household solution products and innovative throughout Indonesia. MODENA officially opens the first Modena Home Center in Luwuk. Yunanto Sirin, as MODENA's Franchise Acquisition Manager, explained "MODENA Home Center Luwuk is our first MODENA Home Center to be present in Luwuk. "Our reason for expanding is through the opening of MHC in Luwuk city, of course we see significant developments in the economic and tourism sectors. "With this growth, of course the need for home appliance products will definitely increase," he said. Therefore, today MHC is officially present in the city of Luwuk to offer smart and innovative household solution products so that they can help provide convenience for community in carrying out daily activities. In its journey throughout 2023, MODENA has opened more Home Centers in a number of big cities in Indonesia. This is MODENA's effort to bring its innovative household solutions closer to the community. Apart from that, the presence of the MODENA Home Center also provides an opportunity for customers to have direct experience using MODENA products. Until December 2023, MODENA has been present in 51 points spread throughout Indonesia, and will continue to increase until the end of 2023. Khairul Fahmi Lubis as Regional Branches Business Development Senior Manager of MODENA for the East added, MHC is not just a showroom to display various Our collection of quality products. "Here, we also provide the best experience for customers when they visit looking for products, starting from the process of choosing, trying, and finally buying the product," he said. Not only that, the after sales experience that we provide is also very easy and comfortable, just call or visit us for further assistance. MODENA Home Center has the motto 3S, Sales, Service Point, & Spare Parts. MODENA's consistency in providing the best experience for customers is also demonstrated by the presence of MODENA Experts, sales representatives with comprehensive knowledge about products at every MODENA Home Center to help customers with all needs and questions related to products. If you need product accessories or spare parts, customers can get them. here. Likewise, if the product requires maintenance from an expert technician, customers can deliver the product to the MODENA Home Center to be forwarded to the nearest service center. The opening of the MODENA Home Center Luwuk was also enlivened with a number of exclusive promotions that were valid during the Grand Opening period. For the latest information about products, attractive offers, as well as daily tips and tricks from MODENA, you can see the Instagram account @modenaindonesia and the modena.com website. Modena Home Center is officially present in Luwuk City. As you know, MODENA is a well-known global consumer electronics brand which was founded in the 1960s in Northern Italy. Since the 1980s, MODENA has made a strategic shift in its operations to the Asian continent. MODENA's product range includes Home, Professional, Tech, Health, Mobility and Energy, supported by an innovative design studio in Italy and R&D centers located in various parts of the world. MODENA products are produced in various countries including Italy, China,Belarus, Egypt, Uzbekistan, Vietnam and Indonesia under international standard certification and quality management systems. MODENA's current vision is to be a driver towards an interconnected world. MODENA's ever-expanding product line was created with a passion to enhance the human experience. Created with modern design and the latest technology such as the Internet of Things (IoT), it is a form of MODENA's commitment to continue striving to bring innovative, intelligently connected products to consumers. (*)(bb/05)

title: Peringatan Hari AIDS Sedunia di Kabupaten Banggai, Sebar Pamflet dan Malam Renungan
text: BERITABANGGAI.COM,Luwuk—Hari AIDS Sedunia di Kabupaten Banggai diperingati dengan sejumlah kegiatan.Salah satunya kampanye Hari AIDS dengan melakukan penyebarluasan informasi melalui pembagian pamflet kepada pengendara kendaraan dan pemasangan spanduk di lampu merah Karaton, Kecamatan Luwuk.Aksi kampanye juga dilakukan dengan pemasangan spanduk Hari AIDS di Puskesmas.Spanduk tersebut berupa imbauan agar masyarakat lebih mengetahui HIV/AIDS, yang mencakup penyebaran dan pencegahannya.Selanjutnya malam renungan yang dilaksanakan Kelompok Dukungan Sebaya (KDS) Mosa’angu, Jumat malam, 1 Desember 2023.Tenaga Fungsional Epidemiologi Dinas Kesehatan Kabupaten Banggai, Oktavianus, mengatakan, kegiatan tersebut dilaksanakan di Lapangan GOR Kilongan, Kecamatan Luwuk Utara. Malam renungan ini diikuti oleh sekitar 30 orang.Dalam kegiatan malam renungan ini, sesama penderita saling memotivasi untuk tetap semangat menjalani hidup dengan status HIV/AIDS positif.“Saling memberikan dukungan dan semangat,” kata Buang, sapaan akrab pengelola program HIV/AIDS Dinkes Banggai ini.(BB/007)
text_en: BERITABANGGAI.COM, Luwuk—World AIDS Day in Banggai Regency is celebrated with a number of activities. One of them is the AIDS Day campaign by disseminating information through distributing pamphlets to vehicle drivers and placing banners at the Karaton red light, Luwuk District. Campaign actions are also carried out by placing banners AIDS Day at the Community Health Center. The banner is in the form of an appeal for the public to be more aware of HIV/AIDS, which includes its spread and prevention. Next, a night of reflection held by the Mosa'angu Peer Support Group (KDS), Friday evening, December 1 2023. Health Service Epidemiology Functional Personnel Banggai Regency, Oktavianus, said that this activity was carried out at the Kilongan GOR Field, North Luwuk District. This devotional evening was attended by around 30 people. In this devotional evening activity, fellow sufferers motivated each other to remain enthusiastic about living life with a positive HIV/AIDS status. "Provide each other with support and encouragement," said Buang, the nickname of the HIV/AIDS program manager at the Health Office. Proud of this. (BB/007)

title: Polres Banggai Lantik Dewan dan Anggota Muda Saka Bhayangkara
text: luwuk–Sebagai salah satu pembina Saka Bhayangkarapolres banggaiBripka Ikhsan Wahidayat melantik Dewan dan anggota muda Saka Bhayangkara, Minggu (17/12/23).Pelantikan ini dilaksanakan di Bumi Perkemahan Sandakan, Desa Biak, Kecamatan Luwuk Utara,kabupaten banggai.“Dewan Saka Bhayangkara yang dilantik sebanyak 4 orang untuk angkatan 2024-2025. Sedangkan anggota yang baru sebanyak 80 orang untuk Angkatan 2023,” ungkapnya.Ia pun mengucapkan selamat kepada anggota Dewan Saka Bhayangkara Polres Banggai yang baru saja dilantik dan dapat menjalankan tugas dengan amanah serta bertanggung jawab.“Kami harap Saka Bhayangkara dapat memberikan tauladan baik di lingkungan sekolah maupun masyarakat,” harapnya.Bamin Siekum Polres Banggai ini menjelaskan, Saka Bhayangkara merupakan satuan karya dalam gerakan pramuka yang menjadi wadah pendidikan dan pelatihan di bidang keamanan serta ketertiban masyarakat atau kambtimas.“Harapan kami juga adik-adik dapat mempedomani Dasa Darma dan Trisatya dalam kehidupan sehari-hari,” tutupnya
text_en: Luwuk–As one of the supervisors of the Saka Bhayangkara Police, Brigadier Ikhsan Wahidayat inaugurated the Council and young members of Saka Bhayangkara, Sunday (17/12/23). 4 people were appointed for the class of 2024-2025. "Meanwhile there are 80 new members for the Class of 2023," he said. He also congratulated the members of the Saka Bhayangkara Council of the Banggai Police who had just been appointed and were able to carry out their duties with trust and responsibility. "We hope that Saka Bhayangkara can provide a good role model in the community. schools and the community," he hoped. Bamin Siekum Polres Banggai explained, Saka Bhayangkara is a work unit in the scout movement which is a forum for education and training in the field of security and public order or community order. "We also hope that the younger brothers can guide Dasa Darma and Trisatya in everyday life," he concluded

title: JATAM Sulteng Mendorong Polres Banggai Lakukan Penegakan Hukum pada Kasus Kecelakaan Kerja di PT. KFM
text: KABAR LUWUK – Jaringan Advokasi Tambang (JATAM) Regional Sulawesi Tengah (Sulteng) menyoroti kecelakaan kerja yang diduga terjadi di Wilayah Penambangan PT. Koninis Fajar Mineral (PT. KFM) di Kabupaten Banggai.JATAM mendesak aparat penegak hukum untuk tidak bermain mata dalam penanganan kasus ini. JATAM Sulteng menekankan urgensi evaluasi Sistem Manajemen Keselamatan Kerja Pertambangan (SMK3P) di seluruh perusahaan tambang di wilayah tersebut.Pemerintah pusat dan daerah diminta untuk memberikan perhatian serius terhadap kasus ini dan melakukan evaluasi menyeluruh terhadap implementasi SMK3P di Kabupaten Banggai.Tujuannya adalah untuk memastikan bahwa perusahaan-perusahaan tambang telah benar-benar menetapkan dan menerapkan Prosedur Keselamatan dan Kesehatan Kerja (K3) pertambangan sesuai dengan regulasi yang berlaku, seperti Peraturan Menteri Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral Republik Indonesia Nomor 38 Tahun 2014 dan Permen ESDM Nomor 26 Tahun 2018.Selain evaluasi SMK3P, JATAM Sulteng juga mendesak pemerintah untuk:Melakukan pemantauan dan pengukuran kinerja keselamatan pertambangan.Melakukan inspeksi pelaksanaan keselamatan pertambangan.Melakukan evaluasi kepatuhan terhadap ketentuan peraturan perundang-undangan dan persyaratan lainnya.Melakukan penyelidikan kecelakaan, kejadian, dan penyakit akibat kerja di seluruh kegiatan pertambangan di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai hingga saat ini.JATAM Sulteng juga mendesak Kepala Inspektur Tambang (KAIT) untuk meminta PT. KFM melakukan audit eksternal terkait penerapan Sistem Manajemen Keselamatan Pertambangan Mineral dan Batubara (SMKP Minerba).Hal ini sejalan dengan Pasal 14 Ayat (2) PERMEN ESDM Nomor 38 Tahun 2014, yang memberikan kewenangan kepada KAIT untuk meminta audit eksternal dalam situasi kecelakaan serius atau penilaian kinerja keselamatan pertambangan.JATAM Sulteng menegaskan bahwa penegakan hukum yang tegas perlu diutamakan untuk memastikan keadilan bagi korban dan mencegah terulangnya kasus serupa di masa depan. text_en: LUWUK KABAR – Central Sulawesi (Sulteng) Regional Mining Advocacy Network (JATAM) highlighted a work accident that allegedly occurred in the PT Mining Area. Koninis Fajar Mineral (PT. KFM) in Banggai Regency. JATAM urges law enforcement officials not to play around in handling this case. JATAM Sulteng emphasizes the urgency of evaluating the Mining Work Safety Management System (SMK3P) in all mining companies in the region. The central and regional governments are asked to pay serious attention to this case and carry out a comprehensive evaluation of the implementation of SMK3P in Banggai Regency. The aim is to ensure that companies -mining companies have actually established and implemented mining Occupational Health and Safety (K3) Procedures in accordance with applicable regulations, such as Regulation of the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources of the Republic of Indonesia Number 38 of 2014 and Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources Regulation Number 26 of 2018. In addition to evaluating SMK3P , JATAM Sulteng also urges the government to: Monitor and measure mining safety performance. Conduct inspections of mining safety implementation. Evaluate compliance with statutory provisions and other requirements. Conduct investigations of accidents, incidents and occupational diseases in all mining activities in Banggai Regency area until now. JATAM Central Sulawesi also urged the Chief Inspector of Mines (KAIT) to ask PT. KFM carries out external audits related to the implementation of the Mineral and Coal Mining Safety Management System (SMKP Minerba). This is in line with Article 14 Paragraph (2) ESDM Ministerial Regulation Number 38 of 2014, which gives KAIT the authority to request external audits in serious accident situations or assessments. mining safety performance.JATAM Central Sulawesi emphasized that strict law enforcement needs to be prioritized to ensure justice for victims and prevent the recurrence of similar cases in the future. title: Sempat Dilaporkan Hilang, Nelayan di Nuhon Banggai Ditemukan
text: BERITABANGGAI.COM, LUWUK –Seorang nelayan di Desa Obo Balingara, Kecamatan Nuhon, Kabupaten Banggai, Jasri Akase (46) yang sempat dilaporkan hilang saat melaut berhasil ditemukan, Senin (25/9/2023) sore.Kapolsek Nuhon Iptu Budi Susanto Putra Lubis, mengungkapkan, pada Minggu 24 September 2023 sekitar pukul 18.30 Wita, korban pergi memancing ikan di sekitar perairan Desa Obo Balingara.“Namun hingga Senin 25 September 2023 siang, korban belum juga Kembali ke rumah,” ungkap Kapolsek Nuhon.Usai menerima laporan, aparat Polsek Nuhon Bersama Babinnsa dan warga berupaya melakukan pencarian tetapi tidak membuahkan hasil.“Saat itu pihak keluarga memohon bantuan pemerintah kecamatan dalam hal ini Basarnas serta TNI/Polri untuk bersama-sama Kembali mencari korban,” tuturnya.Lebih lanjut, perwira pangkat dua balak ini menyebutkan, sekitar pukul 15.05 Wita berhasil ditemukan wargadi sekitar perairan Desa Obo Balingara dalam keadaan selamat.“Perahu yang digunakan ditemukam dalam keadaan terbalik. Korban langsung dievakuasi ke darat,” sebut Budi.Setibanya di darat, tambah Budi, pihaknya bersama warga langsung membawa korban kepada tenaga medis guna dilakukan pemeriksaan kesehatan. (*)(bb/03)
text_en: BERITABANGGAI.COM, LUWUK – A fisherman in Obo Balingara Village, Nuhon District, Banggai Regency, Jasri Akase (46) who was reported missing while fishing was found, Monday (25/9/2023) afternoon. Nuhon Police Chief Iptu Budi Susanto Putra Lubis , revealed that on Sunday 24 September 2023 at around 18.30 WITA, the victim went fishing in the waters around Obo Balingara Village. "However, as of Monday 25 September 2023 afternoon, the victim had not yet returned home," said the Nuhon Police Chief. After receiving the report, the authorities The Nuhon Police together with Babinnsa and residents tried to carry out a search but to no avail. "At that time the family asked for help from the sub-district government, in this case Basarnas and the TNI/Polri to work together to look for the victim again," he said. Furthermore, this second rank Balak officer said, at around 15.05 WITA, residents around the waters of Obo Balingara Village were found safe. "The boat used was found upside down. "The victim was immediately evacuated to land," said Budi. Upon arrival on land, added Budi, his party and residents immediately took the victim to medical personnel for a medical examination. (*)(bb/03)

title: Banggai Bebas Kasus Cacar Monyet, Kadinkes: Tetap Diwaspadai!
text: BERITABANGGAI.COM,Luwuk—Kasus cacar monyet atau monkeypox (Mpox) belum terdeteksi di Kabupaten Banggai, namun tetap harus diwaspadai.Kadis Kesehatan, dr I Wayan Suartika, mengatakan, bahwa pihaknya melakukan antisipasi untuk cacar monyet ini.Ia mengatakan, Puskemas melakukan surveilans mingguan maupun harian.Dari surveilans diketahui, penyakit mana yang meningkat kasusnya.  Hasil surveilans berupa laporan mingguan, yang nanti akan terpantau jelas sebaran atau peningkatan penyakit di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai.Olehnya, kata dia, terkait kasus cacar monyet, jika terdapat satu kasus maka akan dipantau setiap hari.“Untuk KLB akan dipantau setiap hari,” jelasnya.Ia memastikan, per minggu ke 48 di tahun 2023 belum muncul kasus cacar monyet.Diketahui, cacar monyet adalan penyakit yang disebabkan oleh virus orthopoxvirus.Ini bisa menular ke manusia, jika terjadi adanya kontak dengan orang atau hewan yang membawa virus.Agar menjadi kewaspadaan bersama, virus yang awalnya menular dari hewan ke manusia; maka sebaiknya menghindari gigitan hewan seperti tupai, monyet, dan tikus yang terinfeksi.Kadinkes Banggai, mengatakan, berdasar hasil surveilans, diare masih menjadi masalah di masyarakat. Namun, kata dia, meski kasus cacar monyet belum mencuat tapi tetap diwaspadai.Ia menjelaskan, sistem surveilans sudah baku, yaitu laporan mingguan yang dilaporkan langsung dari puskesmas ke server Kemenkes. Laporan input puskesmas dan Kemenkes dapat langsung dipantau.Misalnya, jika kasus difteri muncul lagi dan aktif, dan ketahuan, maka Pemprov akan turun turun.“Kalau muncul kasus yang semula tidak ada, ini adalah potensi KLB, sehingga langsung ditangani,” katanya.Kasus rabies, misalnya, sebelumnya tidak ada dan tiba-tiba mencuat, sehingga menjadi KLB.Kasus rabies tersebut menyebabkan dua orang meninggal, di Bunta dan Nuhon.(BB/007)
text_en: BERITABANGGAI.COM, Luwuk—Cases of monkey pox or monkeypox (Mpox) have not been detected in Banggai Regency, but we still need to be alert. Head of the Health Department, Dr. I Wayan Suartika, said that his party is anticipating this monkey pox. He said that the Community Health Center carries out surveillance. weekly or daily. From surveillance it is known which diseases are increasing in cases. The results of the surveillance are in the form of weekly reports, which will then clearly monitor the spread or increase of the disease in the Banggai Regency area. Therefore, he said, regarding the monkey pox case, if there is one case it will be monitored every day. "For the KLB it will be monitored every day," he explained. He confirmed that as of the 48th week of 2023, no cases of monkey pox have appeared. It is known that monkey pox is a disease caused by the orthopox virus. This can be transmitted to humans if there is contact with people or animals that carry the virus. So be careful. together, viruses that originally spread from animals to humans; so it is best to avoid bites from infected animals such as squirrels, monkeys and rats. Kadinkes Banggai, said, based on surveillance results, diarrhea is still a problem in the community. However, he said, even though cases of monkey pox have not yet emerged, they are still being watched out for. He explained that the surveillance system is standard, namely weekly reports that are reported directly from the community health center to the Ministry of Health's server. Reports input from health centers and the Ministry of Health can be directly monitored. For example, if a diphtheria case appears again and is active, and is discovered, then the provincial government will step down. Rabies, for example, previously did not exist and suddenly emerged, resulting in an outbreak. This rabies case caused two people to die, in Bunta and Nuhon. (BB/007)

title: Covid-19 Mencuat di Jakarta, Kadinkes Banggai: Sudah Endemi, Kalau Muncul Tak Lagi Ditangani Khusus
text: BERITABANGGAI.COM,Luwuk—Per Oktober 2023, kasus Covid-19 secara global mengalami lonjakan.  Di beberapa negara terjadi peningkatan kasus. Tak terkecuali peningkatan Covid-19 di Indonesia.Dilansir dari laman Sehat Negeriku, menyikapi hal ini, Kemenkes melalui Direktur Jenderal Pencegahan dan Pengendalian Penyakit Maxi Rein Rondonuwu, mengingatkan kepada seluruh masyarakat untuk disiplin menerapkan Prokes.Imbauan ini, menyusul peningkatan kembali kasus Covid-19 dalam beberapa pekan terakhir. Meskipun Covid-19 per Agustus berubah status dari pandemi ke endemi, lonjakan kasus yang terjadi harus diantisipasi dengan menerapkan Prokes.Sementara itu, Kepala Dinas Kesehatan Kabupaten Banggai, dr I Wayan Suartika, mengatakan, kasus Covid-19 sejak Agustus 2023, sudah berubah status penanganan dari  pandemi ke endemi.Di masa pandemi, Covid-19 ditangani secara khusus, pada masa endemi akan ditangani biasa seperti penanganan terhadap penyakit lainnya, seperti diare dan TBC.Ia menjelaskan, pemerintah menerbitkan Permenkes tahun 2023 ini yang mengubah status dari pandemi ke endemi.  Permenkes 23 tahun 2023 tersebut mengatur mengenai masa peralihan dari Pandemi menjadi Endemi dalam pelayanan bagi pasien Covid-19. “Penanganan Covid-19 mengikuti Permenkes tersebut. Di mana penanganannya sudah disamakan dengan penanganan penyakit lainnya,” katanya.“Kalau ada kasus akan ditangani, tapi tidak lagi ada perlakuan khusus karena sudah masa endemi,” tambahnya.  (BB/007)
text_en: BERITABANGGAI.COM, Luwuk—As of October 2023, Covid-19 cases globally have experienced a spike. In several countries there has been an increase in cases. The increase in Covid-19 in Indonesia is no exception. Reporting from the Sehat My Country page, in response to this, the Ministry of Health, through the Director General of Disease Prevention and Control, Maxi Rein Rondonuwu, reminded the entire community to be disciplined in implementing Prokes. This appeal follows the re-increase in Covid-19 cases in recent weeks. Even though Covid-19 changed its status as of August from pandemic to endemic, the spike in cases that occurred must be anticipated by implementing Prokes. Meanwhile, the Head of the Banggai District Health Service, Dr. I Wayan Suartika, said that Covid-19 cases since August 2023, have changed status. handling from pandemic to endemic. During the pandemic, Covid-19 was handled specifically, during the endemic period it will be handled normally like other diseases, such as diarrhea and tuberculosis. He explained that the government issued the 2023 Minister of Health Regulation which changed the status from pandemic to endemic . Minister of Health Regulation 23 of 2023 regulates the transition period from Pandemic to Endemic in services for Covid-19 patients. “The handling of Covid-19 follows the Minister of Health Regulation. "Where the treatment has been equated with the treatment of other diseases," he said. "If there is a case it will be treated, but there is no longer any special treatment because it is the endemic period," he added. (BB/007)

title: Bupati Banggai Teken Program Jaga Desa Bersama Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai
text: BERITABANGGAI.COM, LUWUK –Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO dan Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai melakukan Penandatanganan Kesepahaman Bersama Tentang Optimalisasi Dalam Membangun Kesadaran Hukum Penyelenggara Pemerintah Desa dan Masyarakat Melalui Program Jaksa Garda Desa (Jaga Desa) pada Senin (9/10/2023), di Aula Kantor Dinas TPHP Banggai.Kesepahaman ini mencerminkan komitmen bersama yang tentunya sangat sejalan dengan visi misi Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai, sebagaimana visi Pemda Banggai yaitu “Terwujudnya Banggai Maju, Mandiri dan Sejahtera Berbasis Kearifan Lokal”.“Program ini tentunya sangat sejalan dengan misi Pemda Banggai yang tertuang pada point ke-satu dan point ke-enam, yaitu membangun sumber daya manusia berkualitas, produktif dan sejahtera dan mewujudkan tata kelola pemerintahan yang bersih, transparan dan akuntabel,“ Ujar Bupati Banggai.Kesepahaman Bersama ini merupakan implementasi dari Instruksi Jaksa Agung Nomor 5 Tahun 2023 tentang Optimalisasi Peran Kejaksaan Republik Indonesia Dalam membangain Kesadaran Hukum Masyarakat Desa Melalui Program Jaksa Garda Desa (Jaga Desa).Dengan adanya Kesepahaman ini, Kejaksaan Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai bersama Pemda Banggai berkomitmen bersama untuk melakukan tiga aspek penting yaitu Pencegahan Penyimpangan Keuangan Desa, Penegakan Hukum, dan Optimalisasi Rumah Restorative Justice di setiap desa.Dalam sambutan yang disampaikan oleh Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai, R. Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono, S.H., M.Hum bahwa Jumlah Dugaan penyalahgunaan Dana Desa (DD) dan Alokasi Dana Desa (ADD) se-Sulawesi Tengah semester 1 Tahun 2023 yaitu sebanyak 19 Perkara.“Sekarang sudah semester 2 dan angka ini bisa bertambah atau berkurang, tapi harapan kami setelah melalui penandatanganan ini, angka menjadi menurun” Jelas Kejari Banggai.Berdasarkan laporan Kepala Dinas Pemberdayaan Masyarakat dan Desa (DPMD) Kabupaten Banggai, Drs. Amin Jumail menjelaskan bahwa Indeks Desa Membangun Kabupaten Banggai pada Periode 2022 hingga 2023 mengalami transformasi yang signifikan.Laporan data mengungkapkan pencapaian yaitu meningkatnya jumlah Desa Mandiri dari 7 menjadi 21, kemudian Desa Maju dari 118 bertambah menjadi 160, Desa-desa yang berkembang juga mengalami perubahan dari 163 menjadi 108, sementara desa-desa yang tertinggal berkurang dari 3 menjadi hanya 2 desa.Dengan Penandatanganan Kesepahaman, Program ini akan mempercepat transformasi positif dalam pembangunan desa-desa di Kabupaten Banggai, menciptakan masyarakat yang lebih sadar hukum, dan meraih kemajuan yang berkelanjutan. (*)(bb/03)
text_en: BERITABANGGAI.COM, LUWUK –The Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO and the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office signed a Joint Understanding on Optimization in Building Legal Awareness of Village Government Administrators and the Community through the Village Guard Attorney Program (Jaga Desa) on Monday (9/10/2023), in the Hall of the TPHP Service Office Banggai. This understanding reflects a shared commitment which is of course very much in line with the vision and mission of the Regional Government of Banggai Regency, as is the vision of the Banggai Regional Government, namely "Realizing an Advanced, Independent and Prosperous Banggai Based on Local Wisdom." "This program is of course very much in line with the mission of the Banggai Regional Government as stated in "point one and point six, namely building quality, productive and prosperous human resources and realizing clean, transparent and accountable government governance," said the Regent of Banggai. This Joint Agreement is an implementation of the Attorney General's Instruction Number 5 of 2023 concerning Optimizing the Role of the Prosecutor's Office of the Republic of Indonesia in developing Legal Awareness of Village Communities through the Garda Desa Prosecutor Program (Jaga Desa). With this understanding, the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office together with the Banggai Regional Government are jointly committed to carrying out three important aspects, namely Prevention of Village Financial Deviations, Law Enforcement, and Optimizing Restorative Justice Houses in each village. In a speech delivered by the Head of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office, R. Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono, S.H., M.Hum, the number of alleged misuse of Village Funds (DD) and Village Fund Allocation (ADD) throughout Central Sulawesi semester 1 of 2023, namely 19 cases. "Now it is semester 2 and this number may increase or decrease, but our hope is that after this signing, the number will decrease," explained Kejari Banggai. Based on a report from the Head of the Regency Community and Village Empowerment Service (DPMD) Banggai, Drs. Amin Jumail explained that the Developing Village Index for Banggai Regency in the 2022 to 2023 period experienced a significant transformation. The data report revealed achievements, namely increasing the number of Independent Villages from 7 to 21, then Advanced Villages from 118 increasing to 160, developing villages also experienced changes. from 163 to 108, while the villages left behind were reduced from 3 to only 2 villages. With the Signing of the Understanding, this Program will accelerate positive transformation in the development of villages in Banggai Regency, create a society that is more aware of the law, and achieve sustainable progress . (*)(bb/03)

title: Program Nasional Stop BABS, Kabupaten Banggai Belum 50 Persen ODF
text: BERITABANGGAI.COM,Luwuk—Belum seluruh desa dan kelurahan di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai mencapai Open Defecation Free (ODF) 100 persen.Sejauh ini kecamatan yang mendeklarasikan Bebas Buang Air Besar Sembarangan (BABS) baru dua kecamatan yakni Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan dan Kecamatan Luwuk.Kecamatan Luwuk dinyatakan ODF 100 persen, setelah Puskesmas Kampung Baru mendeklarasikan seluruh warga di lima kelurahan memiliki dan mengakses jamban sehat. Ini ditandai deklarasi Stop BABS, pada Kamis 16 November 2023.Kepala Dinas Kesehatan Kabupaten Banggai, I Wayan Suartika, mengatakan, deklarasi Stop BABS merupakan program nasional yang dilaksanakan di seluruh wilayah Indonesia.Ia mengatakan, program tersebut dilakukan agar masyarakat Indonesia memiliki akses terhadap kepemilikan dan penggunaan jamban sehat.Ia mengatakan, jika sudah 100 persen desa dan kelurahan mengakses jamban, diharapkan penyakit-penyakit yang terkait dengan kesehatan lingkungan, seperti diare, malaria dan demam berdarah bisa berkurang.Ia mengatakan, Kabupaten Banggai bahkan belum 50 persen dari seluruh desa dan kelurahan memiliki dan mengakses jamban sehat. Dari 337 desa di Kabupaten Banggai, baru 141 desa dan kelurahan yang memiliki dan mengakses jamban sehat.“Sejauh ini Luwuk Selatan dan Kecamatan Luwuk, yang desa dan kelurahannya 100 persen sudah mengakses jamban sehat,” katanya.Ia mengapresiasi upaya puskesmas –puskesmas dalam deklarasi Stop BABS.Ia melihat hal itu tidak lepas dari dukungan lintas sektor di lingkungan kecamatan, baik pemerintah kecamatan, Polsek, dan Koram maupun Lurah dan kepala desa serta unit pelaksana teknis lainnya.“Kami apresiasi atas dicapainya ODF 100 persen untuk seluruh desa dan kelurahan di Kecamatan Luwuk dan wilayah puskesmas Kampung Baru ini,” katanya.(BB/007)
text_en: BERITABANGGAI.COM, Luwuk—Not all villages and sub-districts in the Banggai Regency area have achieved 100 percent Open Defecation Free (ODF). So far, only two sub-districts have declared Open Defecation Free (BABS), namely South Luwuk District and Luwuk District. Luwuk was declared 100 percent ODF, after the Kampung Baru Community Health Center declared that all residents in five sub-districts had and accessed healthy latrines. This was marked by the declaration of Stop Defecation, on Thursday 16 November 2023. Head of the Banggai District Health Service, I Wayan Suartika, said that the Stop Defecation declaration was a national program implemented throughout Indonesia. He said the program was carried out so that the Indonesian people had access to ownership. and the use of healthy latrines. He said, if 100 percent of villages and sub-districts have access to latrines, it is hoped that diseases related to environmental health, such as diarrhea, malaria and dengue fever can be reduced. He said, Banggai Regency has not even reached 50 percent of all villages. and sub-districts have and access healthy latrines. Of the 337 villages in Banggai Regency, only 141 villages and sub-districts have and access healthy latrines. "So far, South Luwuk and Luwuk District, 100 percent of whose villages and sub-districts have access to healthy latrines," he said. He appreciated the efforts of the community health centers in the declaration Stop BABS. He sees that this cannot be separated from cross-sectoral support in the sub-district environment, both the sub-district government, Sector Police and Koram as well as the Village Head and village heads and other technical implementing units. "We appreciate the achievement of 100 percent ODF for all villages and sub-districts in "Luwuk sub-district and the Kampung Baru health center area," he said. (BB/007)

title: Satnarkoba Polres Banggai Ungkap Peredaran Ribuan Obat Jenis THD
text: BERITABANGGAI.COM, LUWUK –Personel Satnarkona Polres Banggai mengungkap tindak pidana peredaran obat-obatan sediaan farmasi tanpa izin edar di Kota Luwuk, Jumat (16/6/2023) sekitar pukul 08.27 Wita.Dari pengungkapan yamg dipimpin langsung Kasat Narkoba Iptu Muhammad Kasi. berhasil menangkap seorang pemuda berinisial RC alias R (23) warga Kelurahan Karaton Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai.Iptu Muhammad Kasim mengungkapkan, pengungkapan ini berawal dari informasi masyarakat yang langasung ditindak lanjuti dengan melakukan serangkaian penyidikan.“Paket ini dijemput oleh rekan pelaku di kantor JNE Jalan Yos Sudarso, Kelurahan Karaton, Kecamatan Luwuk,” ungkapnya.Dari hasil interogasi, tlrekan pelaku ini mengaku jika dirinya disuruh oleh pelaku untuk menjemput paket tersebut.“Kita langsung mengembangkan kasus ini dan berhasil menangkap pelaku tanpa perlawanan dan mengakui bahwa barang bukti tersebut miliknya,” jelasnya.Dari penangkapan ini, Ia menerangkan, pihaknya berhasil menyita barang bukti 5047 butir obat jenis Trihexypenidyl (THD).“Saat ini pelaku sudah diamankan di Mapolres Banggai guna pengembangan lebih lanjut,” pungkasnya.(*)(bb/03)
text_en: BERITABANGGAI.COM, LUWUK – Banggai Police Narcotics Unit personnel revealed a criminal act of distributing pharmaceutical drugs without a distribution permit in Luwuk City, Friday (16/6/2023) at around 08.27 WITA. From the disclosure which was led directly by the Head of the Narcotics Unit, Inspector Muhammad Kasi. succeeded in arresting a young man with the initials RC alias R (23), a resident of Karaton Village, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency. Inspector Muhammad Kasim revealed that this disclosure began with information from the public which was immediately followed up by carrying out a series of investigations. "This package was picked up by a fellow perpetrator at the JNE office. Jalan Yos Sudarso, Karaton Village, Luwuk District," he said. From the results of the interrogation, the perpetrator's partner admitted that he was ordered by the perpetrator to pick up the package. "We immediately developed this case and succeeded in arresting the perpetrator without resistance and admitted that the evidence belonged to him. ," he explained. From this arrest, he explained, his party succeeded in confiscating evidence of 5047 Trihexypenidyl (THD) type drugs. "Currently the perpetrator has been detained at the Banggai Police Headquarters for further development," he concluded. (*)(bb/03)

title: Tim Resmob Polres Banggai Bubarkan Aksi Tawuran Antar Remaja
text: luwuk–Tim Reserse Mobile (Resmob) Tompotikasat reskrimpolres banggai, berhasil membubarkan aksi tawuran antar remaja yang terjadi di kompleks Kelurahan Karaton, Luwuk, Senin (18/12/2023) pukul 01.30 Wita.Para remaja tersebut langsung berhamburan dan melarikan diri saat petugas Resmob Sat Reskrim Polres Banggai tiba dilokasi.kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani melalui Kasat Reskrim AKP Tio Tondy, menjelaskan, pembubaran aksi tawuran antar pemuda tersebut berhasil dilakukan Tim Resmob atas adanya informasi dari informasi masyarakat.“Saat itu, Tim mendapatkan informasi dari masyarakat tentang adanya aksi tawaran antar remaja yang terjadi di kompleks Kelurahan Karaton. Dari informasi itu, Tim yang saat itu sedang melaksanakan kring serse langsung bergerak menuju ke TKP,” ungkap Tio.Kasat Reskrim menuturkan, setibanya tim dilokasi, tampak para pemuda pelaku tawuran langsung berhamburan dan melarikan diri saat melihat kedatangan petugas.Setelah berhasil menguasai situasi, lanjut Tio, pihaknya juga mengimbau kepada masyarakat di lokasi tawuran agar tidak mudah terpancing dengan informasi negatif yang akan berdampak pada terganggunya situasi kamtibmas di lingkungan tinggal masing-masing.Kasat menjelaskan, untuk mengantisipasi adanya aksi tawuran susulan, hingga saat ini pihaknya masih melakukan penyelidikan lebih lanjut tentang penyebab terjadinya aksi tawaran antar remaja tersebut.
text_en: Luwuk–The Mobile Investigation Team (Resmob) Tompotikasat reskrimpolres is proud to have succeeded in dispersing a brawl between teenagers that occurred at the Karaton Village complex, Luwuk, Monday (18/12/2023) at 01.30 WITA. The teenagers immediately scattered and ran away when the Resmob officers The Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit arrived at the location. The Head of the Banggai Police, AKBP Ade Nuramdani, through the Head of Criminal Investigation Unit, AKP Tio Tondy, explained that the Resmob Team had succeeded in dispersing the brawl between youths based on information from public information. "At that time, the Team received information from the public about the existence of an offer to between teenagers that occurred in the Karaton Village complex. "Based on this information, the team that was carrying out kring serse immediately moved to the crime scene," said Tio. The Head of Criminal Investigation Unit said that when the team arrived at the location, it was seen that the young people involved in the brawl immediately scattered and ran away when they saw the arrival of the officers. After successfully controlling the situation, Tio continued, his party also appealed to the public at the location of the brawl not to be easily provoked by negative information which would have an impact on disrupting the security and social security situation in their respective neighborhoods. further about the causes of the offer between teenagers.

title: Jelang Nataru, Polsek Luwuk Awasi Mobilisasi Penumpang dan Barang di Pelabuhan Rakyat
text: luwuk–Bentuk antisipasi dan pengawasan terhadap mobilisasi penumpang dan barang keluar masuk di Pelabuhan Rakyat Luwuk menjelang Natal dan Tahun Baru, personilpolsek luwukmelaksanakan patroli rutin guna mengawasi lonjakan arus penumpang maupun penumpukan barang, Minggu (17/12/2023) malam.Jumlah personil yang melakukan pengawasan dan pengontrolan masyarakat dan barang keluar masuk Kawasan Pelabuhan yakni ada empat orang.“Tujuannya untuk mewaspadai penumpukan penumpang, kelebihan julmah penumpang di kapal dan barang-barang berbahaya lainnya,” KatakapolsekLuwuk Kompol Z. Ginoga.Menurut Kapolsek bahwa kegiatan yang dilakukan Polsek Luwuk ini merupakan bentuk pencegahan dini. Menginggat Kota Luwuk merupakan Kota paling banyak di kunjungi masyarakat dari Banggai Kepulauan dan Banggai Laut, maupun Taliabo untuk sekedar liburan dan berbelanja.“Kami menghimbau kepada seluruh masyarakat untuk menjaga kewaspadaan terhadap diri dan barang bawaannya serta himbauan kamtibmas sehingga dapat meminimalisir kejadian yang tidak diinginkan,” pungkas Ginoga
text_en: Luwuk–As a form of anticipation and supervision of the mobilization of passengers and goods in and out of Luwuk People's Harbor ahead of Christmas and New Year, Luwuk police personnel carried out routine patrols to monitor the surge in passenger flow and accumulation of goods, Sunday (17/12/2023) evening. There are four people supervising and controlling the public and goods going in and out of the Port Area. "The aim is to be wary of accumulation of passengers, excess numbers of passengers on ships and other dangerous goods," said Luwuk Police Chief Commissioner Z. Ginoga. According to the Sector Police Chief, this activity was carried out by the Luwuk Police. is a form of early prevention. Bearing in mind that Luwuk City is the city most visited by people from the Banggai Islands and Banggai Laut, as well as Taliabo for just holidays and shopping. "We urge all people to maintain vigilance regarding themselves and their belongings as well as the social security and order advice so that unwanted incidents can be minimized, ” concluded Ginoga

title: Subsatgas Pam Objek Penting, Amankan Kedatangan Ketua KPU Banggai Cek Logistik Pemilu
