text: luwuk–Ops Mantap Brata Tinombala Satgas Preventif Subsatgas Pam Obyek Penting Pemilupolres banggaimelaksanakan kegiatan Pengamanan dan pemantauan pengecekan logistik di kantor Gudang KPU Kompleks Halimun Kelurahan Tanjung Tuwis, Luwuk Selatan.Pengecekan logistik pemilu ini oleh Ketua KPUkabupaten banggaiSanto Gotia bersama komisioner Bawaslu Banggai, Pada Minggu, (17/12/2023) pukul 19.30 Wita.Kedatangan Ketua KPU Banggai bersama rombongan secara langsung di pantau dan dimonitor oleh Satgas Preventif Subsatgas Pam Obyek Penting yang melaksanakan penjagaan dan pengamanan pada Gudang Logistik KPU Banggai.Kepala pengamanan Gudang Logistik KPU Banggai IPTU S. Panggabean mengatakan kedatangan Ketua KPU Banggai langsung disaksikan oleh Personel yang melaksanakan kegiatan pengamanan dan juga anggota Bawaslu yang bertugas di Gudang Logsitik KPU.Kapam IPTU Panggabean menambahkan bahwa tujuannya ke gudang logistik KPU ini untuk melihat secara langsung tempat penyimpanan Logistik Pemilu 2024 serta mengecek Logistik dan juga melihat keadaan Gudang sebagai penyimpanan, Imbuhnya
text_en: Luwuk–Ops Mantap Brata Tinombala Preventive Task Force, Pam Sub-task Force, Important Election Objects, Police are proud to carry out security activities and monitor logistics checks at the KPU Warehouse office, Halimun Complex, Tanjung Tuwis Subdistrict, South Luwuk. (17/12/2023) at 19.30 WITA. The arrival of the Chairman of the Banggai KPU and his entourage was directly monitored and monitored by the Preventive Task Force, the Important Object Pam Sub-task Force which carried out guarding and security at the Banggai KPU Logistics Warehouse. Head of security for the Banggai KPU Logistics Warehouse, IPTU S. Panggabean said that the arrival of the Banggai KPU Chairman was immediately witnessed by personnel carrying out security activities and also members of Bawaslu who were on duty at the KPU Logistics Warehouse. Kapam IPTU Panggabean added that the aim of going to the KPU logistics warehouse was to see directly the 2024 Election Logistics storage area and check the Logistics and also looking at the condition of the warehouse as storage, he added

title: Ini Wisuwadan Terbaik Unismuh Luwuk Dari 3 Fakultas, Dapat Bonus Rp500 Ribu!
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk melangsungkan wisuda Angkatan 21 pada Senin 18 Desember 2023, Hotel Estrella Luwuk.Tahun ini, kampus hijau di bawah pimpinan Rektor Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa mewisuda sebanyak 768 lulusan sarjana strata satu.Ratusan lulusan itu diwisuda dalam dua sesi, di mana sesi pertama yang berlangsung dari pagi diikuti tiga fakultas dan sesi kedua yang dilaksanakan siang hari sampai sore diikuti lima fakultas.Dalam prosesi wisuda, kampus hijau mengumumkan nama-nama lulusan sarjana terbaik yang dibacakan oleh Wakil Rektor I Mustafa Abd Rahim.Berikut nama-nama lulusan terbaik dari tiga fakultas di Wisuda Angkatan 21 sesi pertama.Lulusan terbaik Fakultas Ilmu Sosial dan Ilmu Politik, dari Prodi Ilmu Pemerintahan berhasil diraih Amaludin S.IP., dengan raihan IPK 3,95.Kemudian, dari Prodi Ilmu Komunikasi dengan raihan IPK 3,88 sukses diraih atas nama Mujamin S.I.Kom.Fakultas Ekonomi dan Bisnis, lulusan sarjana terbaik dari Prodi Manajemen sukses diraih Firjin Firna Kasegar S.M., dengan raihan IPK 3,70.Kemudian, lulusan terbaik dari Prodi Akuntansi sukses diraih Rahmat Dalim, S.Ak. dengan IPK 3,85.Untuk lulusan sarjana terbaik Fakultas Perikanan, dari Prodi Budidaya Perairan berhasil diraih Siti Israwati S.Pi., dengan IPK 3,96.Atas prestasi yang membanggakan ini, lima lulusan terbaik dari tiga fakultas lima program studi berhak mendapatkan piagam penghargaan yang diserahkan langsung oleh Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr Sutrisno K Djawa dan didampingi Wakil-wakil rektornya.Tidak hanya piagam, lulusan terbaik juga mendapat bonus atau reward berupa uang tunai dari Bank Syariah Indonesia (BSI) Cabang Luwuk. Ini sebagai bentuk dukungan BSI terhadap dunia pendidikan, khususnya kepada kampus hijau Unismuh Luwuk. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk held its Class 21 graduation on Monday 18 December 2023, Hotel Estrella Luwuk. This year, the green campus is under the leadership of Chancellor Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa graduated 768 undergraduate graduates. Hundreds of graduates graduated in two sessions, where the first session which took place from the morning was attended by three faculties and the second session which was held from midday to evening was attended by five faculties. In the graduation procession, the green campus announced The names of the best undergraduate graduates were read out by Deputy Chancellor I Mustafa Abd Rahim. The following are the names of the best graduates from the three faculties in the first session of Graduation Class 21. The best graduates from the Faculty of Social and Political Sciences, from the Government Science Study Program were achieved by Amaludin S. IP., with a GPA of 3.95. Then, from the Communication Science Study Program with a GPA of 3.88 successfully achieved on behalf of Mujamin S.I.Kom.Faculty of Economics and Business, the best undergraduate graduate from the Management Study Program was successfully achieved by Firjin Firna Kasegar S.M., with the achievement GPA 3.70. Then, the best graduate from the Accounting Study Program was successfully achieved by Rahmat Dalim, S.Ak. with a GPA of 3.85. For the best undergraduate graduate from the Faculty of Fisheries, from the Aquaculture Study Program, Siti Israwati S.Pi., with a GPA of 3.96. For this proud achievement, the five best graduates from three faculties and five study programs are entitled to receive certificates The award was handed over directly by the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr Sutrisno K Djawa and accompanied by his Deputy Chancellors. Not only certificates, the best graduates also received bonuses or rewards in the form of cash from Bank Syariah Indonesia (BSI) Luwuk Branch. This is a form of BSI's support for the world of education, especially for the Unismuh Luwuk green campus. (*)

title: Tahun Depan, Unismuh Luwuk Terima Hibah Rp2 Miliar
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Kontribusi Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk dalam menyiapkan sumber daya manusia (SDM) yang unggul dan mumpuni untuk daerah tak perlu diragukan.Terbaru, kampus hijau berhasil melahirkan 768 lulusan sarjana baru yang dikukuhkan dalam prosesi wisuda, Senin 18 Desember 2023 di Hotel Estrella Luwuk.Atas kontribusi itu, Unismuh Luwuk mendapat apresiasi yang tinggi dari Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin.Sebagai bentuk apresiasi dan dukungan, Pemda Banggai menyiapkan dana hibah untuk Unismuh Luwuk.Tidak tanggung-tanggung, dana hibah yang dijanjikan Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin sebesar Rp2 Miliar.“Tahun 2022, dana hibah kita berikan kurang lebih Rp1 M. Karena tidak bisa diberikan setiap tahun, maka Insya Allah tahun 2024 kita kembali kasih hibah Rp2 Miliar,” ungkap Bupati yang disambut tepuk tangan tamu undangan.Ia berharap, dana hibah Rp2 M ini nantinya dapat bermanfaat bagi Unismuh Luwuk dalam pengembangan kampus dan melahirkan SDM-SDM yang berkualitas.Sebelumnya, orang nomor satu di Banggai itu juga menyampaikan selamat dan apresiasi kepada Unismuh Luwuk yang telah menelurkan sarjana yang cukup siginifikan.“Tahun ini Kabupaten Banggai telah melahirkan 1000 lebih sarjana, dari 2 universitas. Sebelumnya Untika melahirkan 400 sarjana, dan saat ini Unismuh Luwuk menelurkan 700 lebih sarjana,” terangnya.Capaian ini kata Bupati, cukup luar biasa dan patut diapresiasi. “Insya Allah tahun depan Unismuh Luwuk mewisuda lulusan sarjana strata dua,” kata Bupati.Pemberian hibah Rp2 Miliar itu, mendapat apresiasi dari Pimpinan Pusat Muhammadiyah, Ketua Bidang Pendidikan kebudayaan dan olah raga, Prof Dr Irwan Akib, M.Pd.“Terima kasih Pak Bupati, tadi disampaikan ada dana hibah untuk Unismuh Luwuk Rp2 M. Semoga hibah itu dapat dimanfaatkan sebaik-baiknya,” kata Irwan Akib.Ia meyakini, ketika Perguruan Tinggi Muhammadiyah (PTM) mendapat hibah Rp2 M, maka bangunan yang dibangun lebih dari itu bahkan bisa bernilai Rp3 M. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- The contribution of Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk in preparing superior and capable human resources (HR) for the region cannot be doubted. Most recently, the green campus succeeded in producing 768 new undergraduate graduates who were inaugurated in the graduation procession, Monday 18 December 2023 at the Hotel Estrella Luwuk. For this contribution, Unismuh Luwuk received high appreciation from the Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin. As a form of appreciation and support, the Banggai Regional Government has prepared grant funds for Unismuh Luwuk. Not half-heartedly, the grant funds promised by the Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin amounting to IDR 2 billion. "In 2022, we will give approximately IDR 1 billion in grant funds. Because it cannot be given every year, God willing, in 2024 we will again give a grant of IDR 2 billion," said the Regent, who was greeted by applause from invited guests. He hopes that this Rp. 2 billion grant will be useful for Unismuh Luwuk in developing the campus and producing quality human resources. Previously, the number one person in Banggai also expressed congratulations and appreciation to Unismuh Luwuk for producing quite significant graduates. "Year Banggai Regency has produced more than 1000 graduates from 2 universities. "Previously, Untika produced 400 graduates, and currently Unismuh Luwuk produces more than 700 graduates," he explained. This achievement, said the Regent, is quite extraordinary and deserves to be appreciated. "God willing, next year Unismuh Luwuk will graduate with second degree graduates," said the Regent. The grant of IDR 2 billion received appreciation from the Muhammadiyah Central Leadership, Head of the Culture and Sports Education Division, Prof. Dr. Irwan Akib, M.Pd. "Thank you "Mr. Regent, you were told that there is a grant for Unismuh Luwuk of IDR 2 billion. Hopefully the grant can be utilized as well as possible," said Irwan Akib. He believes that when the Muhammadiyah College (PTM) received a grant of IDR 2 billion, the buildings built would be more than that. it could even be worth IDR 3 billion. (*)

title: Unismuh Luwuk Resmi Mewisuda 768 Lulusan Sarjana
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk tengah melangsungkan prosesi wisuda bagi 768 lulusan sarjana strata satu, Senin 18 Desember 2023.Prosesi wisuda yang dibuat dua tahap atau sesi dan dihadiri langsung Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin itu dilaksanakan di Hotel Estrella Luwuk.Untuk sesi pertama, yang dilangsungkan pagi hari sampai selesai diikuti 375 lulusan dari tiga fakultas yakni Fakultas Ilmu Sosial dan Ilmu Politik, Fakultas Ekonomi dan Bisnis, dan Fakultas Perikanan.Sementara untuk sesi dua, diikuti 393 lulusan dari lima fakultas yakni Fakultas Keguruan dan Ilmu Pendidikan, Fakultas Agama Islam, Fakultas Hukum, Fakultas Teknik dan Fakultas Pertanian.Berikut susunan prosesi wisuda Unismuh Luwuk, acara diawali dengan menyanyikan Indonesia Raya, menyanyikan Mars Muhammadiyah, menyanyikan Mars UMLB (Pengarang Daniel),  dan menyanyikan Himne UMLB (Pengarang Daniel)/launcing.Berikutnya, prosesi wisuda adalah Pembacaan Kalam Ilahi, Pembukaan Sidang Senat Luar Biasa, Orasi Ilmiah dan sambutan-sambutan.Untuk sambutan, pertama disampaikan Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, yang menyampaikan laporan akademik, Sambutan Bupati Banggai,  sambutan Kepala Lembaga Layanan Pendidikan Tinggi (LLDIKTI) Wil 16, dan sambutan KOPERTAIS Wilayah VIII.Setelah sambutan-sambutan, acara selanjutnya memasuki prosesi wisuda, dan Pembacaan Ikrar Setia Sarjana.Dalam laporan akademik, Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., mengatakan, hari ini kampus hijau yang dipimpinnya itu mewisuda 768 lulusan.“Hari ini Unismuh Luwuk mewisuda 768 wisudawan dari 8 Fakultas dan 15 program studi. Wisuda ini, kami buat dua tahap, tahap satu digelar pagi hari, dan tahap dua sore hari,” ucap Rektor Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., di hadapan tamu undangan wisuda.Dengan diwisuda, maka 768 lulusan Unismuh Luwuk itu resmi menyandang gelar sarjana, berdasarkan jurusan masing-masing.“Selamat berbahagia kepada wisuwadan dan wisudawati yang telah menyelesaikan proses perkuliahan selama empat tahun, dan hari ini bisa diwisuda,” kata Rektor.Empat tahun yang penuh tantangan, berhasil dilewati dengan baik para lulusan. Hal itu tentunya dengan kerja keras dan pengorbanan yang luar biasa.“Keberhasilan ini juga tentu tidak lepas berkat dukungan dari keluarga, dan orangtua. Jika bukan karena dukungan keluarga, mungkin capaian tidak akan segemilang hari ini,” katanya.Olehnya, Rektor tak luput menyampaikan terima kasih kepada keluarga yang telah menitipkan atau mempercayakan kampus hijau sebagai tempat kuliah.“Semoga para lulusan atau alumni bisa menjadi kader-kades islami, bisa menjadi kader-kader pembangunan bangsa,” harapnya.Sementara itu, Bupati Banggai, Ir. Amirudin menyampaikan apresiasi dan penghargaan setinggi-tingginya kepada Unismuh Luwuk telah menelurkan 768 sarjana baru.“Tahun ini, berarti Kabupaten Banggai telah menelorkan seribuan dari 2 universitas. Untika belum lama ini mewisuda 400-an, hari ini Unismuh Luwuk mewisuda 700 lebih,” kata Bupati.Banyaknya, sarjana yang diluluskan kampus hijau Unismuh Luwuk tentunya membantu Pemda Banggai dalam meningkatkan sumber dan manusia.“Lulusan sarjana yang dilahirkan hari ini, akan meningkatkan IPM Banggai. Kalau IPM naik, DAU akan naik. Semua ini didukung semua faktor,” tutur Bupati.Ucapan selamat dan apresiasi juga disampaikan Anggota Majelis Dikti Litbang, Erwin Awin, dalam orasinya.Hal senada juga disampaikan Kepala LLDIKTI Wilayah XVI Gosulutteng, dan Kepala Kopertais, Irwan Akib. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk is holding a graduation procession for 768 undergraduate graduates, Monday 18 December 2023. The graduation procession was held in two stages or sessions and was attended directly by the Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin was held at the Estrella Hotel Luwuk. For the first session, which took place in the morning until the end, 375 graduates from three faculties, namely the Faculty of Social and Political Sciences, the Faculty of Economics and Business, and the Faculty of Fisheries, attended. Meanwhile, for the second session, 393 attended graduates from five faculties, namely the Faculty of Teacher Training and Education, Faculty of Islamic Religion, Faculty of Law, Faculty of Engineering and Faculty of Agriculture. The following is the structure of the Unismuh Luwuk graduation procession, the event begins with singing Indonesia Raya, singing Mars Muhammadiyah, singing Mars UMLB (Author Daniel), and singing the UMLB Hymn (Author Daniel)/launcing. Next, the graduation procession was the Reading of the Divine Word, the Opening of the Extraordinary Senate Session, the Scientific Oration and remarks. ,  remarks from the Head of the Higher Education Service Institution (LLDIKTI) Wil 16, and remarks from KOPERTAIS Region VIII. After the speeches, the next event was the graduation procession, and the reading of the Pledge of Allegiance to Scholars. In the academic report, the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., said that today the green campus he leads graduated 768 graduates. "Today Unismuh Luwuk graduated 768 graduates from 8 faculties and 15 study programs. "We made this graduation in two stages, stage one was held in the morning, and stage two was held in the afternoon," said Chancellor Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., in front of the invited guests for the graduation ceremony. With their graduation, the 768 graduates of Unismuh Luwuk officially held bachelor's degrees, based on their respective majors. "Congratulations to the graduates and female graduates who have completed the four-year study process , and today we can graduate," said the Rector. Four years full of challenges were successfully passed by the graduates. This of course comes with extraordinary hard work and sacrifice. "This success is also due to the support of the family and parents. "If it weren't for family support, perhaps the achievements would not be as brilliant as today," he said. Therefore, the Chancellor did not fail to express his gratitude to the families who have entrusted or entrusted the green campus as a place to study. "Hopefully the graduates or alumni can become Islamic village heads , can become cadres for nation development," he hoped. Meanwhile, the Regent of Banggai, Ir. Amirudin expressed his highest appreciation and appreciation to Unismuh Luwuk for producing 768 new graduates. "This year, it means that Banggai Regency has produced thousands from 2 universities. "Unlike recently graduating 400, today Unismuh Luwuk graduated more than 700," said the Regent. The large number of graduates graduated from Unismuh Luwuk's green campus will certainly help the Banggai Regional Government in increasing its resources and people. "The undergraduate graduates who are born today will increase IPM Banggai. If HDI rises, DAU will rise. "All of this is supported by all factors," said the Regent. Congratulations and appreciation were also conveyed by Member of the Dikti Research and Development Council, Erwin Awin, in his speech. Similar things were also conveyed by the Head of LLDIKTI Region XVI Gosulutteng, and the Head of Kopertais, Irwan Akib. (*)

title: Besok, Unismuh Luwuk Gelar Wisuda
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk akan menggelar wisuda bagi lulusan sarjana strata satu, Senin besok (18/12/2023).Sebanyak 768 lulusan, bakal diwisuda di acara sakral tersebut yang berlangsung di Hotel Estrella Luwuk.Ratusan lulusan itu tersebar dari delapan fakultas yang ada di kampus hijau.Ketua Panitia Wisuda Unismuh Luwuk, Maria Ulfa mengatakan, untuk pelaksanaan wisuda ini dilakukan menjadi dua sesi atau dua tahap.Sesi pertama dimulai dari Pukul 07.00 WITA sampai selesai dan Sesi 2 Pukul 12.30 WITA sampai selesai.“Untuk sesi pertama diikuti 3 fakultas yakni Fakultas Ilmu Sosial dan Ilmu Politik, Fakultas Ekonomi dan Bisnis, dan Fakultas Perikanan. Sementara di sesi dua, lima fakultas yakni Fakultas Keguruan dan Ilmu Pendidikan, Fakultas Agama Islam, Fakultas Hukum, Fakultas Teknik dan Fakultas Pertanian,” ungkap Maria Ulfa kepada Banggai Raya, baru-baru ini.Adapun jumlah peserta wisudawan berdasarkan sesi, utuk sesi satu, jumlah wisudawan sebanyak 375 orang dan sesi 2 diikuti 393 lulusan.RAMAH TAMAHUsai prosesi wisuda, Unismuh Luwuk mengandekankan acara ramah tamah yang akan dilangsungkan pada malam harinya, yakni Senin malam 18 Desember 2023, di Hotel Estrella Luwuk.Ramah tamah ini nantinya akan dihadiri semua civitas akademika di kampus hijau Unismuh Luwuk.“Yang hadir, Pak Rektor, internal, dosen, BPH, dan panitia wisuda. Jadi khusus civitas,” ucap Wakil Rektor II Unismuh Luwuk, Nirwan Moh Nur.Kegiatan ramah tamah ini kata Nirwan, untuk membangun keakraban dan menjalin silaturahmi antar civitas akademika. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk will hold a graduation for bachelor's degree graduates, Monday (18/12/2023). A total of 768 graduates will graduate at this sacred event which will take place at the Estrella Hotel Luwuk. Hundreds of graduates are spread from eight faculties on the green campus. Chair of the Unismuh Luwuk Graduation Committee, Maria Ulfa, said that the graduation ceremony was held in two sessions or two stages. The first session started at 07.00 WITA until finished and Session 2 at 12.30 WITA until finished. "For The first session was attended by 3 faculties, namely the Faculty of Social and Political Sciences, the Faculty of Economics and Business, and the Faculty of Fisheries. "Meanwhile in session two, there are five faculties, namely the Faculty of Teacher Training and Education, Faculty of Islamic Religion, Faculty of Law, Faculty of Engineering and Faculty of Agriculture," said Maria Ulfa to Banggai Raya, recently. As for the number of graduates based on session, for session one , the number of graduates was 375 people and session 2 was attended by 393 graduates. FRIENDLY TAMA After the graduation procession, Unismuh Luwuk emphasized a friendly event which will be held in the evening, namely Monday evening 18 December 2023, at the Estrella Hotel Luwuk. This friendly event will be attended by all academic community at the Unismuh Luwuk green campus. "Those present were the Chancellor, internal affairs, lecturers, BPH, and the graduation committee. "So it's specifically for the community," said Deputy Chancellor II Unismuh Luwuk, Nirwan Moh Nur. This friendly activity, said Nirwan, is to build familiarity and establish friendship between the academic community. (*)

title: Hari Ini, Wardani Murad Kampanye di Luwuk Selatan dan Nambo
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Calon anggota legislatif (Caleg) DPRD Kabupaten Banggai, daerah pemilihan (Dapil) 1 dari Partai Gerindra Banggai nomor urut 1, Wardani Murad Husain, mulai Senin (18/12/2023) siang, melaksanakan kampanye di wilayah Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan dan Nambo.Sekira pukul 13.30-14.30 Wita, putri ke-4 almarhum Murad Husain ini memulai dari Kelurahan Jole.Kemudian sekira pukul 16.00-17.00 di Kelurahan Simpong. Dilanjutkan pada malam hari di Lempek Baru, Kecamatan Nambo pada jam 19.30-20.30 Wita.Selasa (19/12/2023), Wardani Murad Husain melaksanakan kampanye tatap muka di Kelurahan Hanga-hanga. Sore harinya, di Kelurahan Hanga-Hanga Permai. Pada malamnya, di Nambo Padang.Rabu (20/12/2023), kakak kandung Hj. Sulianti Murad dan Hj. Amalya Murad ini akan melakukan kampanye di Kelurahan Kompo, Kelurahan Bukit Mambual, dan Kelurahan Bosa.Kamis (21/12/2023), Wardani Murad Husain melaksanakan kampanye tatap muka di Kelurahan Maahas, Kelurahan Tombang Permai, dan Lontio pada malam hari.Pada Jumat (22/12/2023), mulai pukul 10.00-11.00 Wita di Kelurahan Tanjung Tuwis, jam 13.30-14.30 Wita di Desa Bubung, dan pukul 19.30-20.30 Wita di Padungyo.Kemudian pada Senin (8/1/2024) pekan depan, di Kecamatan Luwuk, yakni Kelurahan Bungin, Bungin Timur, dan Desa Lumpoknyo.Selanjutnya, di Kelurahan Soho, Keleke, Luwuk, Mangkio Baru, Kelurahan Baru, dan Keraton. Kampanye tatap muka Wardani Murad Husain ditutup di Desa Tontoan. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Candidate for legislative member (Caleg) DPRD Banggai Regency, electoral district (Dapil) 1 from the Gerindra Banggai Party number 1, Wardani Murad Husain, starting Monday (18/12/2023) afternoon, will carry out a campaign in the South Luwuk District and Nambo. At around 13.30-14.30 WITA, the 4th daughter of the late Murad Husain started from Jole Village. Then around 16.00-17.00 in Simpong Village. Continuing in the evening in Lempek Baru, Nambo District at 19.30-20.30 WITA. Tuesday (19/12/2023), Wardani Murad Husain carried out a face-to-face campaign in Hanga-hanga Village. In the afternoon, in Hanga-Hanga Permai Village. That evening, at Nambo Padang. Wednesday (20/12/2023), Hj. Sulianti Murad and Hj. Amalya Murad will carry out a campaign in Kompo Village, Bukit Mambual Village, and Bosa Village. Thursday (21/12/2023), Wardani Murad Husain carried out a face-to-face campaign in Maahas Village, Tombang Permai Village, and Lontio in the evening. On Friday (22/12/2023), starting at 10.00-11.00 WIT in Tanjung Tuwis Village, 13.30-14.30 WIT in Bubung Village, and 19.30-20.30 WIT in Padungyo. Then on Monday (8/1/2024) next week, in Luwuk District, namely Bungin Village, East Bungin, and Lumpoknyo Village. Next, in Soho, Keleke, Luwuk, Mangkio Baru Village, Baru Village, and Keraton Village. Wardani Murad Husain's face-to-face campaign closed in Tontoan Village. RUM

title: Unismuh Luwuk Peringkat Tiga Terbaik di Sulawesi Tengah, dan Nomor 1 di Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk saat ini masih kokoh di posisi tiga perguruan tinggi terbaik di Sulawesi Tengah (Sulteng) dan nomor 1 di Kabupaten Banggai.Posisi tiga terbaik di Sulteng itu, berdasarkan versi UniRanking. Dan kampus hijau bertengger di urutan 18 Perguruan Tinggi Muhammadiyah.Hal itu diungkapkan Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., dalam sambutan akademiknya di acara wisuda Angkatan 21, Senin 18 Desember 2023 di Hotel Estrella Luwuk.“Performa Universitas Muhammadiyah Luwuk terus meningkat. Pada Tahun 2023 Universitas Muhammadiyah Luwuk menduduki peringkat nasional ke 271 versi Webometrik, Rangking ke 323 versi UniRangking,” ungkapnya.Kemudian, Unismuh Luwuk peringkat ke 3 Perguruan Tinggi Se-Sulawesi Tengah versi UniRangking, dan peringkat ke 78 Kampus Islami versi Webometrik.“Serta peringkat ke 19 Perguruan Tinggi Muhammadiyah versi Webometrik,” tambahnya.Sebelumnya, Rektor menyampaikan bahwa Universitas Muhammadiyah Luwuk hingga hari ini memiliki jumlah mahasiswa aktif sebanyak 4.967 mahasiswa.Ribuan mahasiswa itu tersebar di 8 Fakultas dengan 17 Program Studi, di mana 9 program studi telah terakreditasi Baik dan 8 program studi terakreditasi Baik Sekali.“Alhamdulilah tahun ini Universitas Muhammadiyah Luwuk telah membuka Program Pascasarjana Program Studi Magister Manajemen,” kata Rektor, yang disambut tepuk tangan. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk is currently still firmly in the position of the three best universities in Central Sulawesi (Sulteng) and number 1 in Banggai Regency. The position of the three best in Central Sulawesi, based on the UniRanking version. And the green campus is ranked 18th in Muhammadiyah Universities. This was stated by the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., in his academic speech at the Class 21 graduation ceremony, Monday 18 December 2023 at the Estrella Hotel Luwuk. "The performance of Muhammadiyah University Luwuk continues to improve. "In 2023, Luwuk Muhammadiyah University will be ranked 271st nationally by Webometrics, 323rd by UniRangking," he said. Then, Unismuh Luwuk is ranked 3rd in Central Sulawesi Universities by UniRangking, and 78th in Islamic Campus according to Webometrics. "And ranked 19th in Muhammadiyah Universities according to Webometrics," he added. Previously, the Chancellor said that Muhammadiyah Luwuk University to date has a total of 4,967 active students. Thousands of students are spread across 8 Faculties with 17 Study Programs, of which 9 study programs have been accredited Good and 8 study programs accredited Very Good. "Thank God, this year Muhammadiyah Luwuk University has opened a Postgraduate Program for the Master of Management Study Program," said the Chancellor, who was greeted with applause. (*)

title: Bukti Keseriusan Rektor, 43 Dosen Unismuh Luwuk Tengah Kuliah Doktor
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Sumber Daya Insani merupakan faktor yang sangat berpengaruh dalam pengembangan perguruan tinggi.Oleh karena itu, Universitas Muhammadiyah Luwuk di bawah pimpinan Rektor Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa terus memberikan perhatian dalam peningkatan kuantitas dan kualitas Dosen.Hal ini ditunjukkan dengan upaya peningkatan kualitas dosen dari tahun ke tahun. Bahkan, saat ini sedikitnya 43 dosen di kampus hijau itu tengah kuliah doktor.“Sebagai informasi bahwa Universitas Muhammadiyah Luwuk saat ini memiliki 152 Dosen tetap yang terdiri atas dosen bergelar Magister sebanyak 130 orang dan bergelar Doktor sebanyak 22 orang,” kata Rektor dalam sambutan akademiknya di acara wisuda, Senin 18 Desember 2023.Dari 130 dosen, 43 orang diantaranya tengah melanjutkan Strata Tiga (S3) di beberapa perguruan tinggi negeri dan swasta ternama di Indonesia.Banyaknya dosen yang tengah kuliah doktor, bukti keseriusan Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa dalam meningkatkan SDM dosen di kampus hijau tersebut.Selain mengirim dosen untuk lanjut S3, Unismuh Luwuk juga berupaya untuk mengakselerasi kenaikan jabatan akademik, dan Pelatihan-pelatihan yang bersertifikasi untuk pengembangan kapasitas dosen dan tenaga kependidikan. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Human Resources are a very influential factor in the development of higher education. Therefore, Luwuk Muhammadiyah University under the leadership of Chancellor Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa continues to pay attention to increasing the quantity and quality of lecturers. This is demonstrated by efforts to improve the quality of lecturers from year to year. In fact, currently at least 43 lecturers on the green campus are studying doctorates. "For information, Muhammadiyah Luwuk University currently has 152 permanent lecturers consisting of 130 lecturers with Master's degrees and 22 with Doctoral degrees," said the Chancellor in his academic speech. at the graduation ceremony, Monday 18 December 2023. Of the 130 lecturers, 43 of them are currently pursuing their third degree (S3) at several well-known state and private universities in Indonesia. The large number of lecturers who are studying doctorates is proof of the seriousness of the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa in improving human resources for lecturers at the green campus. Apart from sending lecturers to continue their PhD, Unismuh Luwuk is also trying to accelerate promotions in academic positions, and provide certified training to develop the capacity of lecturers and education staff. (*)

title: Final Piala Askab PSSI Banggai Cup Pertemukan Inpres Mangkio Versus King Peace Kintom
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Duo finalis piala Askab PSSI Banggai Cup 2023 kesebelasan Inpres Mangkio Luwuk Fc dan King Peace Kintom bertemu di partai final. Pertemuan kedua tim tersebut usai memenangkan laga semifinal.Sekretaris Umum Askab PSSI Banggai, Adhi Lambesia Senin (18/12/2023) mengatakan, Inpres Mangkio Luwuk Fc berhasil melaju ke babak final setelah mengalahkan Dirgantara Bubung Luwuk Selatan Fc dengan skor 2-1, pada Minggu (17/12/2023).Sementara itu, King Peace Kintom Fc yang berlaga pada hari sebelumnya, Sabtu (16/12/2023) berhasil menang adu pinalti 3-2 (1-1) atas Mutiara Nambo.Adhy memprediksi final piala Askab PSSI Banggai Cup 2023 akan berjalan menarik.Apalagi, kedua tim yang merupakan perwakilan dari Kecamatan Kintom dan Kecamatan Luwuk dipastikan menampilkan strategi masing-masing untuk babak final Askab PSSI Banggai Cup 2023.Adhy menambahkan, pelaksanaan final piala Askab PSSI Banggai Cup 2023 direncanakan digelar pada Kamis (21/12/ 2023) mempertemukan King Peace Kintom versus Inpres Mangkio Luwuk Fc.Sementara itu perebutan tempat ketiga piala Askab PSSI Banggai Cup 2023 yang akan mempertemukan tim Mutiara Nambo versus Dirgantara Bubung Luwuk Selatan Fc akan berlangsung pada Rabu 20 Desember 2023 bertempat di stadion GOR Kilongan Luwuk Utara. AGK
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The duo of finalists for the 2023 Askab PSSI Banggai Cup trophy, Inpres Mangkio Luwuk FC and King Peace Kintom met in the final. The meeting between the two teams after winning the semifinal match. General Secretary of Askab PSSI Banggai, Adhi Lambesia Monday (18/12/2023) said that Inpres Mangkio Luwuk Fc managed to advance to the final round after beating Dirgantara Bubung South Luwuk Fc with a score of 2-1, on Sunday (17/12/2023). Meanwhile, King Peace Kintom Fc, who competed on the previous day, Saturday (16/12/2023), managed to win on penalties 3-2 (1-1) over Mutiara Nambo. Adhy predicts the cup final The Askab PSSI Banggai Cup 2023 will be interesting. Moreover, the two teams representing Kintom District and Luwuk District will certainly display their respective strategies for the final round of the Askab PSSI Banggai Cup 2023. Adhy added that the final of the Askab PSSI Banggai Cup 2023 is planned to be held on Thursday (21/12/2023) bringing together King Peace Kintom versus Inpres Mangkio Luwuk Fc. Meanwhile, the fight for third place in the Askab PSSI Banggai Cup 2023 which will bring together the Mutiara Nambo team versus Dirgantara Bubung South Luwuk Fc will take place on Wednesday 20 December 2023 at at the GOR Kilongan Stadium, North Luwuk. AGK

title: Goes To Customer, BPJS Kesehatan Sambangi Untika Luwuk Berikan Sosialisasi
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Dalam rangka meningkatkan pemahaman kepada peserta Program JKN, BPJS Kesehatan cabang luwuk menggelar kegiatan pemberian informasi langsung kepada peserta bertajuk Goes to Customer.Kegiatan seperti ini dilaksanakan di Kampus Tompotika Luwuk, kabupaten Banggai pada Jumat (15/12/2023) yang diikuti civitas akademika di kampus biru tersebut.Dekan Fakultas Kesehatan Masyarakat Universitas Tompotika Luwuk, Ramli A. Bidullah memberikan apresiasi kepada BPJS Kesehatan yang telah menyampaikan materi terkait Program JKN.Menurutnya, materi yang dipaparkan sangat penting bagi mahasiswa, khususnya yang ada di Fakultas Kesehatan Masyarakat untuk mengetahui bagimana Perasn Program JKN dan BPJS Kesehatan di masyarakat.Olehnya, Dekan mengharapkan agar seluruh mahasiswa dapat mengambil input baru terkait Program JKN.“Hari in kita patut bersyukur kita mendapatkan kunjungan dari BPJS Kesehatan Cabang Luwuk, dalam kegiatan Goes to Customer, yang mana kegiatan ini sangat penting kita dengarkan Bersama bagiaman peran peran BPJS dan program JKN kedepannya, “ ungkapnya.Sementara itu, Pejabat Pengganti Sementara (PPS) Kepala BPJS Kesehatan Cabang Luwuk, Riskha B Husain, mengungkapkan kegiatan ini bertujuan untuk memberikan pemahaman kepada peserta terkait dengan alur pelayanan, hak dan kewajiban, serta kanal – kanal pelayanan informasi terbaru yang dapat diakses oleh peserta Program JKN.“Dengan adanya kegiatan ini diharapkan peserta semakin paham terkait dengan program JKN di antaranya terdiri dari alur layanan di fasilitas kesehatan, hak dan kewajiban peserta dan utamanya kanal – kanal informasi layanan BPJS Kesehatan, “ ungkap Riskha.Riskha menambahkan, saat ini telah tersedia berbagai kanal layanan yang dapat dimanfaatkan oleh peserta program JKN untuk mendapatkan informasi dan melakukan proses administrasi tanpa harus datang ke kantor BPJS Kesehatan.Fitur kanal layanan terbaru yang dimaksdkan adalah pelayanan informasi dan administrasi mellaui Mobile JKN, Cika dan Vika yang dapat diakses oleh peserta melalui smartphone.“Transformasi mutu layanan menjadi fokus kami dalam memberikan kemudahan akses layanan bagi peserta. Pelayanan yang cepat, mudah dan setara menjadi tujuan kami untuk meningkatkan kepuasan dan kenyamanan peserta JKN di fasilitas kesehatan, ketersediaan kanal layanan administrasi non tatap muka juga menjadi  konsern kami sehingga peserta lebih meudah mendapatkan infomrasi tentang program JKN karna tersedia banyak pilihan untuk mengaksesnya, salah satunya melalui Chika atau Chat Assistant JKN yang dapat diaskes melalui whatsapp ”  terang Riskha, memaparkan secara detail kepada peserta sosialisasi.Salah satu peserta sekaligus perwakilan mahasiwa Universitas Tompotika Luwuk Rika Ferbianti, turut mengapresiasi kegiatan ini.Menurutnya melalui kegiatan ini semakin banyak informasi yang didapatkan mengenai Program JKN, apalagi bagi mahasiswa yang ada di Fakultas Kesehatan Masyarakat merasa perlu untuk mengetahui bagimana proses layanan, regulasi serta hak dan kewajiban peserta JKN itu.“Sangat luar biasa, ini juga bisa menambah wawasan kami khususnya kami yang ada Fakultas Kesehatan Masyarakat. Karena kami sebagian belum mengetahui tentang program ini, tapi inisiatif dari BPJS Kesehatan sangat luar biasa.  Saya sendiri saja baru mengetahui ternyata ada kanal kanal layanan infomrasi yang bis akita akses tanpa harus datang ke Kantor BPJS, misanya melalui Chika ini, “ ungkapnyaIa berharap program JKN di Kabupaten Banggai dapat terlaksana dengan baik dan masyarakat dapat mengakses kanal kanal layanan yang tersedia dengan lebih optimal. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- In order to increase understanding of JKN Program participants, BPJS Health Luwuk branch held an activity providing direct information to participants entitled Goes to Customer. Activities like this were held at the Tompotika Luwuk Campus, Banggai district on Friday (15/12/2023) which was attended academic community on the blue campus. The Dean of the Faculty of Public Health, Tompotika Luwuk University, Ramli A. Bidullah expressed his appreciation to BPJS Health for presenting material related to the JKN Program. According to him, the material presented was very important for students, especially those at the Faculty of Public Health for know how the JKN and BPJS Health Programs are perceived in the community. Therefore, the Dean hopes that all students can take new input regarding the JKN Program. "Today we should be grateful that we had a visit from BPJS Health Luwuk Branch, in the Goes to Customer activity, which is an activity "It's very important that we listen together about the role of BPJS and the JKN program in the future," he said. Meanwhile, the Temporary Substitute Officer (PPS) Head of BPJS Health Luwuk Branch, Riskha B Husain, revealed that this activity aims to provide participants with an understanding regarding the flow of services. , rights and obligations, as well as the latest information service channels that can be accessed by JKN Program participants. "With this activity, it is hoped that participants will understand more about the JKN program, including the flow of services in health facilities, the rights and obligations of participants and especially channels - BPJS Health service information channel," said Riskha. Riskha added, currently there are various service channels available that JKN program participants can use to get information and carry out administrative processes without having to come to the BPJS Health office. The newest service channel features in question are Information and administration services via Mobile JKN, Cika and Vika which can be accessed by participants via smartphone. "Transforming service quality is our focus in providing easy access to services for participants. Fast, easy and equal service is our goal to increase the satisfaction and comfort of JKN participants in health facilities, the availability of non-face-to-face administrative service channels is also our concern so that participants can more easily get information about the JKN program because there are many options available to access it, one of which is via Chika or the JKN Chat Assistant which can be accessed via WhatsApp," explained Riskha, explaining in detail to the socialization participants. One of the participants and a student representative from Tompotika University, Luwuk, Rika Ferbianti, also appreciated this activity. According to her, through this activity, more information was obtained about the Program JKN, especially for students at the Faculty of Public Health, feels the need to know the service process, regulations and rights and obligations of JKN participants. "It's extraordinary, this can also broaden our insight, especially those of us at the Faculty of Public Health. Because some of us don't know about this program, but the initiative from BPJS Health is extraordinary. "I just found out that there are information service channels that we can access without having to come to the BPJS office, for example through Chika," he said. He hopes that the JKN program in Banggai Regency can be implemented well and that people can access the available service channels better. optimal. (*)

title: Jelang Pileg 2024, Sahraen Sibay Ditunjuk PLT Ketua PMI Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Menjelang pemilihan anggota legislarif (Pileg) tahun 2024, sejumlah pengurus Palang Merah Indonesia (PMI) Kabupaten Banggai dinonaktifkan, termasuk Ketua PMI Banggai, Drs. H. Fuad Muid.PMI Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah menunjuk Sekretaris PMI Banggai, Sahraen Sibay, S. Sos, M. Si menjadi pelaksana tugas (PLT) Ketua PMI Kabupaten Banggai.Hal itu disampaikan oleh Sekretaris PMI Sulteng, Sukri, S.KM saat memberikan sambutan pada acara Apel Relawan dan pembukaan musyawarah kerja kabupaten (Muskerkab) PMI Banggai tahun 2023, di Wisata Sandakan, Desa Biak, Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, Senin (18/12/2023).Menurut dia bahwa kehadiran pemerintah daerah (Pemda) untuk PMI itu tidak terlepas dari UU PMI nomor 1 tahun 2018, PMI itu didirilkan secara independen. Dibentuk oleh pemerintah dan dijamu oleh pemerintah.“Jadi saya harapkan bapak pengurus. Perlu saya sampaikan bahwa pak Sekretaris PMI Banggai, sekarang ini sudah menjadi PLT ketua, dengan surat yang baru kami dapat, dan kami kirimkan ke pusat. Nanti, SK PLT akan dikeluarkan oleh pak Yusuf Kalla. Kenapa demikian, bahwa PLT PMI, mengangkat dan membeehentikan itu adalah PMI provinsi,” ungkapnya.Tapi, sambung dia, khusus Pemilu, baik dewan kehormatan, pengurus dan relawan hingga kecamatan akan dinonaktifkan langsung oleh Yusuf Kalla.Sehingga kata dia, PMI Sulteng mendapatkan surat dari Banggai, untuk PLT adalah Sekretaris. Karena, kalau tidak ditindaklanjuti, maka PMI Provinsi Sulteng akan membekukan dua, kalau tidak ketua, pasti PMI-nya.“Tapi, alhamdulillah sudah disikapi dengan berkoordinasi dengan pelindung. Kegiatan apapun, kami harapkan dilibatkan, beberapa pelajaran buruk dan baik kabupaten/kota,tidak melibatkan Pemda. Salah satu contoh, satu periode nol anggaran. Apa yang dilanggar, tentu dianggap pemerintah tidak membantu, tapi, intropeksi bahwa pengurus yang tidak melakukan. Ini mudah-mudahan tidak terjadi di Banggai,” tekannya.“Tapi di provinsi hal yang sama, siapa pak gubernur, siapa pak Hidayat. Setelah selesai, pada hari ini, kami mendukung pak gubernur. Tentu pengaruh pemerintah di PMI cukup bagus, dan kita tak bisa pungkiri itu,” tutup Sukri.Sementara itu, Wakil Bupati Banggai, H. Furqanuddin Masulili mengapresiasi, apa yang telah diputuskan oleh Ketua PMI Republik Indonesia, H. Yusuf Kalla, dimana PMI telah menampakkan jati dirinya sebagai lembaga independen.“Dan itu bisa kita lihat bahwa dengan keputusan beliau yang menonaktifkan seluruh anggota yang ikut didalam pemilihan umum ataupun pemilihan legislatif,” kata Wabup Furqanuddin saat membuka Muskerkab PMI Banggai.Hal ini kata dia, dalam rangka menjaga netralitas, karena PMI adalah untuk masyarakat Indonesia, khususnya di Kabupaten Banggai. PMI bukan milik suku, agama, apalagi milim partai.Oleh karena itu kata Wabup, mengharapkan pada seluruh pengurus PMI, baik tingkat kabupaten, kecamatan, maupun desa, agar betul-betul dijaga. Sehingga, marwah PMI betul-betul terpelihara dengan baik.“Dan Insya Allah, masyarakat akan memberikan kepercayaan penuh kepada PMI dalam rangka urusan-urusan kemanusiaan,” harap Wabup Furqanuddin Masulili. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Ahead of the 2024 legislative election (Pileg), a number of Banggai Regency Indonesian Red Cross (PMI) administrators have been suspended, including the Chairman of Banggai PMI, Drs. H. Fuad Muid. PMI Central Sulawesi Province appointed the Secretary of PMI Banggai, Sahraen Sibay, S. Sos, M. Si to be the acting chairman (PLT) of PMI Chairman Banggai Regency. This was conveyed by the Secretary of PMI Central Sulawesi, Sukri, S.KM when giving speech at the Volunteer Call event and the opening of the 2023 PMI Banggai district work meeting (Muskerkab), at Sandakan Tourism, Biak Village, North Luwuk District, Monday (18/12/2023). According to him, the presence of the regional government (Pemda) for PMI Inseparable from PMI Law number 1 of 2018, PMI was established independently. Formed by the government and hosted by the government. "So I hope that you will be the administrator. I need to convey that PMI Banggai Secretary, now the PLT chairman, with the letter we just got, we sent it to the center. Later, the PLT SK will be issued by Mr. Yusuf Kalla. "Why is that, that the PLT PMI, appointing and dismissing is the provincial PMI," he said. But, he continued, specifically for the election, both the honorary council, administrators and volunteers up to the sub-district will be deactivated directly by Yusuf Kalla. So he said, PMI Central Sulawesi received a letter from Banggai, for PLT is Secretary. Because, if it is not followed up, the Central Sulawesi Province PMI will suspend the two, if not the chairman, definitely the PMI. "But, thank God, it has been addressed in coordination with the protectors. We hope that we will be involved in any activity, some bad and good lessons from districts/cities do not involve the local government. One example, a period of zero budget. What was violated, of course, is considered by the government to be unhelpful, but, introspection, it is the management who did not do it. "Hopefully this doesn't happen in Banggai," he stressed. "But in the province it's the same, who is the governor, who is Mr Hidayat. After completion, today, we support the governor. "Of course the government's influence on PMI is quite good, and we cannot deny that," concluded Sukri. Meanwhile, the Deputy Regent of Banggai, H. Furqanuddin Masulili appreciated what the Chairman of PMI of the Republic of Indonesia, H. Yusuf Kalla, had decided to do, where PMI had showing its identity as an independent institution. "And we can see that with his decision to deactivate all members who took part in general elections or legislative elections," said Deputy Regent Furqanuddin when opening the Banggai PMI District Musker. This, he said, was in order to maintain neutrality, because PMI is for the Indonesian people, especially in Banggai Regency. PMI does not belong to an ethnic group, religion, let alone a political party. Therefore, said the Deputy Regent, he hopes that all PMI administrators, both district, sub-district and village levels, will be truly protected. So, PMI's dignity is truly well preserved. "And God willing, the public will give full trust to PMI in the context of humanitarian affairs," hoped Deputy Regent Furqanuddin Masulili. RUM

title: Empat Pemuda di Banggai Ditahan Terkait Kasus Pengeroyokan Usai Pencurian Tenda Camping
text: KABAR LUWUK  -Empat Pemuda di Banggai Ditahan Terkait Kasus Pengeroyokan Usai Pencurian Tenda Camping. Satreskrim Polres Banggai secara resmi menahan empat pemuda sebagai tersangka dalam kasus pengeroyokan terhadap seorang pemuda di Kelurahan Kintom, Kabupaten Banggai, pada Jumat (15/12/2023) malam.Keempat tersangka tersebut memiliki inisial FJ alias U (35), RM alias A (26), MY alias U (24), dan DK alias D (25), yang berasal dari berbagai kecamatan di Kabupaten Banggai.Kepala Bagian Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S Muda, menjelaskan bahwa insiden ini bermula dari kasus pencurian tenda camping yang dilakukan oleh korban, yang kemudian barang tersebut dikembalikan kepada rekan-rekan tersangka.Tersangka U kemudian meminta agar keluarga korban membawa korban ke Luwuk, dengan maksud agar korban meminta maaf langsung kepada tersangka.Pada Senin (11 Desember 2023) malam, orang tua korban mengantarkan korban untuk bertemu dengan tersangka di salah satu Ruko di Luwuk, dengan harapan meminta maaf atas perbuatan anaknya.Namun, di dalam Ruko tersebut, korban justru dibawa ke sebuah ruangan dan dikeroyok secara bersama-sama oleh para tersangka.Kejadian tersebut dilaporkan oleh orang tua korban ke SPKT Polres Banggai, dan sekarang para tersangka telah ditahan di sel tahanan Mapolres Banggai untuk proses pemeriksaan dan hukum lebih lanjut.Meskipun kasus pencurian tenda camping dilaporkan oleh korban ke SPKT Polres Banggai, SH sebagai korban pengeroyokan hanya diwajibkan lapor, namun proses hukum terus berlanjut.Peristiwa ini menunjukkan kompleksitas kasus yang melibatkan pencurian dan tindakan kekerasan, dengan penyelidikan dan proses hukum yang akan menentukan nasib para tersangka. **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS - Four youths in Banggai were detained in connection with a case of beatings following the theft of camping tents. The Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit officially detained four young men as suspects in the case of beating a young man in Kintom Village, Banggai Regency, on Friday (15/12/2023) evening. The four suspects have the initials FJ alias U (35), RM alias A ( 26), MY alias U (24), and DK alias D (25), who come from various sub-districts in Banggai Regency. Head of the Banggai Police Public Relations Section, Inspector Al Amin S Muda, explained that this incident started with a case of theft of a camping tent which was carried out by the victim, who then returned the item to the suspect's colleagues. Suspect U then asked the victim's family to take the victim to Luwuk, with the intention of the victim apologizing directly to the suspect. On Monday (11 December 2023) evening, the victim's parents took him to Luwuk. the victim went to meet the suspect in one of the shophouses in Luwuk, in the hope of apologizing for his son's actions. However, in the shophouse, the victim was actually taken to a room and beaten together by the suspects. This incident was reported by the victim's parents to the Banggai Police Headquarters SPKT, and now the suspects have been detained in the Banggai Police Headquarters holding cell for further investigation and legal proceedings. Even though the case of camping tent theft was reported by the victim to the Banggai Police Headquarters SPKT, SH as a victim of a beating is only required to report it, the legal process continues. .This incident shows the complexity of cases involving theft and acts of violence, with investigations and legal processes that will determine the fate of the suspects. **

title: Menemani Pengobatan Stroke-nya, Warga Luwuk Ini Puji Manfaat Program JKN
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Perjalanan panjang Program JKN menyediakan Jaminan Kesehatan bagi Masyarakat Indonesia, peningkatan pelayananpun terus dilakukan demi kepuasan peserta. Berbagai inovasi dibuat demi terlaksanannya pelayanan Program JKN yang mudah, cepat dan setara.Progress positif ini dirasakan oleh salah satu pesrte Program JKN, Marcekapo (66), warga Kelurahan Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk kabupaten Banggai.Marce yang merupakan pensiunan PNS, telah lama menjadi peserta JKN. dirinya tau betul bagaimana perubahan pelayanan yang semakin baik diberikan oleh fasilitas kesehatan dan BPJS Kesehatan.Bagaimana tidak, dirinya yang pernah mengalami stroke ringan mengaku mendapatkan pelayanan yang sangat baik di fasilitas kesehatan.“Untuk program JKN sendiri, manfaatnya sangat banyak sekali yang saya rasakan, karena saya beberapa waktu yang lalu pernah stroke dan mendapatkan perawatan, saya rasa pelayanan yang saya terima sudah bagus sekali,” ujar Marce.Dirinya yang bahkan harus dirujuk keluar daerah mengakui kemudahan dalam prosesnya. Walaupun sebagai peserta Program JKN dirinya mengaku tetap mendapatkan pelayanan yang maksimal dari tenaga kesehatan yang ada.“Bahkan saat itu pengobatan saya sampai harus di rujuk keluar daerah dan semuanya lancar sampai penyakit saya bisa pulih kembali, bagus semua pelayanannya. Walaupun kita sebagai peserta BPJS, mereka tidak mebeda-bedaakn pelayanan. “ ungkapnya.Selain pengobatan stroke tersebut, Ia juga mengaku sering menggunakan kepesertaan program JKN untuk memeriksakan diri atau berobat.Marce mengaku cukup salut dengan pelayanan yang diberikan oleh pihak puskesmas.Menurutnya pelayanan di fasilitas kesehatan sudah berada ditaraf yang seharusnya. Dirinya tidak henti-henti memuji pelayanan difasilitas kesehatan.Ditambah lagi selama menjadi peserta JKN dirinya tidak pernah membayar sepeser pun untuk biaya perawatannya. Obat pun selalu tersedia ketika dirinya membutuhkan, hal ini menambah kekaguman dan rasa percayanya akan program JKN.“Saya selama berobat menggunakan JKN tidak pernah ada pungutan biaya di rumah sakit atau puskesmas, palingan biaya yang keluar itu untuk kebutuhan pribadi dan transport, hebat sekali program JKN ini, manfaatnya sangat nyata dapat dirasakan oleh pasien,” ungkapnya.“Pelayanan obat juga sangat bagus, kalau yang saya rasakan selama ini,  saya tidak pernah diminta untuk mencari obat sendiri, semua obat yang diresepkan oleh dokter selalu disediakan oleh pihak puskesmas, “ tambahnya.Marce menyampaikan bahwa yang paling penting dari Program JKN adalah pelayanannya kepada peserta, karena itulah yang membuat peserta nyaman dan bahagia. BPJS Kesehatan dan fasilitas kesehatan sellau berkomitmen untuk memenuhi ekspektasi peserta Program JKN. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- The JKN Program has had a long journey to provide health insurance for the Indonesian people, and service improvements continue to be made for participant satisfaction. Various innovations were made to ensure the implementation of JKN Program services easily, quickly and equally. This positive progress was felt by one of the JKN Program participants, Marcekapo (66), a resident of Baru Village, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency. Marce, who is a retired civil servant, has been a participant for a long time. JKN. He knows very well how the services provided by health facilities and BPJS Health have changed to become better. How could it not be, he, who once experienced a mild stroke, admitted that he received very good service at health facilities. "For the JKN program itself, I have felt a lot of benefits, "Because some time ago I had a stroke and received treatment, I think the service I received was very good," said Marce. He, who even had to be referred from abroad, acknowledged the ease of the process. Even though he was a participant in the JKN program, he admitted that he still received maximum service from the available health workers. "Even at that time, my treatment required me to be referred out of the area and everything went smoothly until my illness was able to recover, all the services were good. Even though we are BPJS participants, they do not differentiate between services. " he said. Apart from the stroke treatment, he also admitted that he often uses JKN program membership to check himself or get treatment. Marce admitted that he was quite impressed with the services provided by the puskesmas. According to him, the services at the health facilities were at the level they should be. He never ceases to praise the services at health facilities. Plus, while he was a JKN participant, he never paid a penny for his treatment costs. Medicine was always available when he needed it, this added to his admiration and trust in the JKN program. "During my treatment using JKN there were never any fees charged at the hospital or health center, most of the costs were for personal needs and transportation, what a great program "The benefits of this JKN can be felt by patients very clearly," he said. "Medicine services are also very good, from what I have experienced so far, I have never been asked to look for my own medicine, all the medicines prescribed by doctors are always provided by the community health center," he added. Marce said that the most important thing about the JKN Program is its service to participants, because that is what makes participants comfortable and happy. BPJS Health and health facilities are always committed to meeting the expectations of JKN Program participants. (*)

title: Peringati Hari Relawan 2023, PMI Banggai Gelar Apel di Sandakan
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Dalam rangka memperingati Hari Relawan Palang Merah Indonesia (PMI) Tahun 2023, PMI Kabupaten Banggai menggelar Apel Relawan, sekira pukul 08.30 Wita, di Lokasi Wisata Permandian Sandakan, Desa Biak, Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, Senin (18/12/2023).Hari Relawan PMI 2023 dengan tema Bersatu dalam Kerelawanan, selain melaksanakan apel relawan, juga melaksanakan musyawarah kerja kabupaten (Muskerkab) tahun 2023, pelatihan KSR dasar se Kabupaten Banggai, latihan gabungan PMR se Kabupaten Banggai, serta donor darah dan kegiatan bakti sosial lainnya.Kegiatan tersebut, dihadiri oleh Wakil Bupati Banggai, H. Furqanuddin Masulili sebagai Pembina Apel. Juga hadir, Sekretaris PMI Provinsi Sulteng,Sukri, S.KM, mewakili Dandim 1308 Luwuk/Banggai, mewakili Kapolres Banggai, mewakili Kajari Luwuk, Kepala OPD, Kepala Badan, Camat selaku pelindung PMI kecamatan, Ketua PMI Kecamatan se Kabupaten Banggai, Kepala Desa Biak, dan tamu undangan lainnya.Serta Kepala UTD PMI Luwuk/Banggai, dr. Gunawan, Sekretaris dan Pengurus PMI Kabupaten Banggai, relawan dan anggota PMR se Kabupaten Banggai.“Pelaksanaan Murkerkab dan Hari Relawan PMI 2023, dasar pelaksanaan, yakni pertama keputusan PMI Kabupaten Banggai Nomor 124/KEP/PK/PMI-BGI/ORG/11/2023, tentang pembentukan panitia pelaksana musyawarah kerja PMI Kabupaten Banggai tahun 2023. Kedua, keputusan Pengurus PMI Kabupaten Banggai Nomor 124/KEP/PK/PMI-BGI/ORG/11/2023, tentang pembentukan panitia pelaksana hari relawan PMI Kabupaten Banggai tahun 2023,” kata Ketua Panitia Pelaksana Apel Relawan.Tujuan pelaksanaan kegiatan ini kata dia, adalah mengevaluasi pekerjaan PMI Banggai tahun 2023, dan merencanakan program kerja tahun2024. Menjalin koordinasi, komunikasi, kebersamaan dan rasa kesetiakawanan sosial antar sesama relawan.Kegiatan ini sambungnya, dilaksanakan selama 3 hari, mulai 18-20 Desember 2023, bertempat di Lokasi Wisata Sandakan, Desa Biak, Kecamatan Luwuk Utara.“Peserta Muskerkab 2023 adalah pengurus PMI Banggai, dan pengurus PMI se kecamatan di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai. Pesertanya yakni dari relawan, KSR Unismuh Luwuk sejumlah 19 orang, KSR Untika Luwuk sebanyak 10 orang, PMR se Kabupaten Banggai sebanyak 80 orang. Jadi total keseluruhan peserta sebanyak 109 orang,” jelasnya.Lebih lanjut, Ia mengatakan, narasumber atau pemateri pada Muskerkab PMI berasal dari Pengurus PMI Provinsi Sulteng, Ketua PMI Kabupaten Banggai, Direktur UDD PMI Banggai, Kepala BPKAD Banggai, dan Kadis Kesehatan Banggai.Narasumber pada Hari Relawan PMI, yakni Dandim 1308 Luwuk Banggai, Kapolres Banggai, Kajari Luwuk, Kepala Basarnas, Kepala Dinas Pemadam Kebakaran Kabupaten Banggai, dan Kepala Badan Kesbangpol Banggai.“Sumber dana berasal dari APBD Kabupaten Banggai tahun 2023, dan sumber sumbangan lainnya yang tidak mengikat,” tutupnya. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-In commemoration of Indonesian Red Cross (PMI) Volunteer Day 2023, PMI Banggai Regency held a Volunteer Call, at approximately 08.30 WITA, at the Sandakan Bathing Tourist Location, Biak Village, North Luwuk District, Monday (18/12/2023) .PMI Volunteer Day 2023 with the theme United in Volunteering, apart from holding volunteer roll call, also carrying out district work meetings (Muskerkab) in 2023, basic KSR training throughout Banggai Regency, joint PMR training throughout Banggai Regency, as well as blood donation and other social service activities. This activity was attended by the Deputy Regent of Banggai, H. Furqanuddin Masulili as the Apple Supervisor. Also present, the Secretary of PMI for Central Sulawesi Province, Sukri, S.KM, representing Dandim 1308 Luwuk/Banggai, representing the Head of Banggai Police, representing Kajari Luwuk, Head of OPD, Head of Agency, Head of Subdistrict as protector of sub-district PMI, Chair of PMI Subdistricts throughout Banggai Regency, Head of Village Biak, and other invited guests. As well as the Head of UTD PMI Luwuk/Banggai, dr. Gunawan, Secretary and Management of PMI Banggai Regency, volunteers and members of PMR throughout Banggai Regency. "The implementation of Murkerkab and PMI Volunteer Day 2023, the basis for implementation, namely the first decision of PMI Banggai Regency Number 124/KEP/PK/PMI-BGI/ORG/11/ 2023, regarding the formation of the PMI Banggai Regency working deliberation committee in 2023. Second, decision of the Banggai Regency PMI Management Number 124/KEP/PK/PMI-BGI/ORG/11/2023, regarding the formation of the Banggai Regency PMI volunteer day implementation committee in 2023, " said the Chairman of the Volunteer Apple Organizing Committee. The aim of carrying out this activity, he said, was to evaluate the work of PMI Banggai in 2023, and plan a work program for 2024. Establishing coordination, communication, togetherness and a sense of social solidarity between fellow volunteers. This activity, he continued, was carried out for 3 days, from 18-20 December 2023, at the Sandakan Tourist Location, Biak Village, North Luwuk District. "The 2023 Muskerkab participants are PMI administrators Banggai, and PMI administrators in all sub-districts in the Banggai Regency area. The participants were volunteers, 19 people from KSR Unismuh Luwuk, 10 people from KSR Untika Luwuk, 80 people from PMR throughout Banggai Regency. "So the total number of participants is 109 people," he explained. Furthermore, he said, the resource persons or presenters at the PMI Muskerkab came from the Central Sulawesi Province PMI Management, the Chair of the Banggai Regency PMI, the Director of the Banggai PMI UDD, the Head of the Banggai BPKAD, and the Head of the Banggai Health Office. Resource Persons on PMI Volunteer Day, namely Dandim 1308 Luwuk Banggai, Banggai Police Chief, Kajari Luwuk, Head of Basarnas, Head of the Banggai Regency Fire Department, and Head of the Banggai Kesbangpol Agency. "The source of funds comes from the 2023 Banggai Regency APBD, and other sources of donations that are not binding," he concluded. RUM

title: Kasus Pengeroyokan di Salah Satu Ruko Luwuk, Polres Banggai Tetapkan Empat Tersangka
text: luwuk–Satreskrimpolres banggairesmi menahan empat orang pemuda sebagai tersangka atas kasus pengeroyokan terhadap seorang pemuda di Kelurahan Kintom,kabupaten banggai, Jumat (15/12/2023) malam.Keempat pemuda yang ditahan tersebut yakni berinisial FJ alias U (35) warga Kecamatan Luwuk, RM alias A (26) warga Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, MY alias U (24) dan DK alias D (25) warga Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, Kabupaten Banggai.Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S Muda, mengungkapkan, kasus ini berawal dari kasus pencurian barang berupa tenda camping yang dilakukan korban berinisial SH, namun barang tersebut sudah dikembalikan korban kepada rekan tersangka.“Tersangka U ini meminta kepada keluarga korban agar korban diantar ke Luwuk dengan maksud agar korban meminta maaf kepada tersangka,” ungkap Amin kepada wartawan di Kawasan Bukit Halimun, Senin (18/12/2023) siang.Atas dasar tersebut, Amin menerangkan, pada Senin 11 Desember 2023 malam orang tua korban mengantarkan korban untuk bertemu tersangka di salah satu Ruko di Luwuk dengan maksud meminta maaf atas perbuatan anaknya.“Setelah orang tua korban dan korban bertemu tersangka di dalam Ruko, selanjutnya korban dibawah ke salah satu ruangan dan dipukuli secara bersama-sama oleh para tersangka,” terangnya.Mengetahui kejadian itu, kata perwira pangkat dua balak ini orang tua korban melaporkan peristiwa tersebut ke SPKT Polres Banggai dengan nomor polisi : LP/B/716/XII/2023/SPKT/Polres Banggai/Polda Sulawesi Tengah.“Sekarang para tersangka sudah ditahan di sel tahanan Mapolres Banggai guna pemeriksaan dan proses hukum lebih lanjut.Ia menambahkan, kasus pencurian tenda Camping yang dilakukan korban SH pun dilaporkan ke SPKT Polres Banggai.“Untuk kasus pencurian, SH yang menjadi korban pengeroyokan ini tidak dilakukan penahanan hanya wajib lapor tetapi proses hukum tetap berlanjut,” pungkas Amin
text_en: Luwuk–Bangangan Police Criminal Investigation Unit officially detained four young men as suspects in the case of beating a young man in Kintom Village, Banggai Regency, Friday (15/12/2023) evening. The four young men detained had the initials FJ alias U (35), a resident of Luwuk District, RM alias A (26) is a resident of North Luwuk District, MY alias U (24) and DK alias D (25) are residents of South Luwuk District, Banggai Regency. Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S Muda, revealed that this case started with a case of theft The item in the form of a camping tent was carried by the victim with the initials SH, but the victim has returned the item to his fellow suspect. "Suspect U asked the victim's family to take the victim to Luwuk with the intention of making the victim apologize to the suspect," said Amin to journalists in the Bukit area. Halimun, Monday (18/12/2023) afternoon. On this basis, Amin explained, on Monday 11 December 2023 evening the victim's parents took the victim to meet the suspect at one of the shophouses in Luwuk with the intention of apologizing for their son's actions. "The victim's parents and the victim met the suspect in the shophouse, then the victim was taken to one of the rooms and beaten together by the suspects," he explained. Knowing about the incident, said the second-ranking Balak officer, the victim's parents reported the incident to the Banggai Police SPKT. with the police number: LP/B/716/XII/2023/SPKT/Polres Banggai/Polda Central Sulawesi. "Now the suspects have been detained in the Banggai Police Headquarters detention cell for further investigation and legal proceedings. He added that the case of theft of a camping tent was The victim SH was reported to the Banggai Police SPKT. "For the case of theft, SH, who was the victim of this beating, was not detained, only had to report it but the legal process continues," concluded Amin.

title: Lengkap! Ini 15 Wisudawan Terbaik Unismuh Luwuk, Tertinggi Raih IPK 3,97
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk sukses melangsungkan wisuda Angkatan 21 pada Senin 18 Desember 2023, di Hotel Estrella Luwuk.Tahun ini, kampus hijau di bawah pimpinan Rektor Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa mewisuda sebanyak 768 lulusan sarjana strata satu.Ratusan lulusan itu diwisuda dalam dua sesi, di mana sesi pertama yang berlangsung dari pagi diikuti tiga fakultas dan sesi kedua yang dilaksanakan siang hari sampai sore diikuti lima fakultas.Dalam prosesi wisuda, kampus hijau mengumumkan 15 nama-nama lulusan sarjana terbaik dari 15 Prodi 8 Fakultas yang dibacakan oleh Wakil Rektor I Mustafa Abd Rahim.Pertama, lulusan terbaik Fakultas Ilmu Sosial dan Ilmu Politik, dari Prodi Ilmu Pemerintahan berhasil diraih Amaludin S.IP., dengan raihan IPK 3,95.Kedua, dari Prodi Ilmu Komunikasi dengan raihan IPK 3,88 sukses diraih atas nama Mujamin S.I.Kom.Ketiga, Fakultas Ekonomi dan Bisnis, lulusan sarjana terbaik dari Prodi Manajemen sukses diraih Firjin Firna Kasegar S.M., dengan raihan IPK 3,70.Keempat, lulusan terbaik dari Prodi Akuntansi sukses diraih Rahmat Dalim, S.Ak. dengan IPK 3,85.Kelima, ulusan sarjana terbaik Fakultas Perikanan, dari Prodi Budidaya Perairan berhasil diraih Siti Israwati S.Pi., dengan IPK 3,96.Keenam, Sandi Kasang. S. Pd, beliau dari Fakultas Ilmu Keguruan dan Ilmu Pendidikan (FKIP) dengan prodi Pendidikan Jasmani Kesehatan dan Rekreasi, dengan raihan IPK IPK 3,97.Ketujuh, Bintang Amanah Setiawan. S. Pd. Fakultas FKIP, Prodi Bahasa Inggris ini, dengan raihan IPK 3,95.Kedelapan, Dewi Kartika Koida. S. Pd. Fakultas FKIP dari Prodi Pendidikan Biologi, dengan raihan IPK 3,81.Sembilan, Syafira F Panggato, SH. alumni Fakultas Hukum ini, sukses meraih IPK 3,80.Sepuluh, Nova Hidayah. S.Pd, Alumni Fakultas Agama Islam dari Prodi Pendidikan Agama Islam, dengan raihan IPK 3,91.Sebelas, Fahria Hensokan. Fakultas Agama Islam, Prodi Pendidikan Islam Anak Usia Dini ini meraih IPK 3,84.Dua belas, ditempati wisudawati atas namaNovi Yanti, S.P. lulusan Fakultas Pertanian dari Prodi Agribisnis, dengan raihan IPK 3,66.Tiga belas, diraih Yurita, S. P., dari Fakultas Pertanian, Prodi Agroteknologi, dengan raihan IPK 3,75.Empat belas, Rahmawati Hilipito, S.T, Fakultas Tehnik Prodi Tehnik Sipil, dengan raihan IPK 3,79.Terakhir, diraih Nurwahida, S.T, alumni Fakultas Tehnik, Prodi Tehnik Industri, dengan raihan IPK 3,54.Dari 15 lulusan terbaik, Sandi Kasang. S. Pd, menjadi lulusan dengan raihan IPK tertinggi se Unismuh Luwuk. Ia meraih IPK 3,97.Atas prestasi yang membanggakan ini para lulusan terbaik dari masing-masing program studi berhak mendapatkan piagam penghargaan yang diserahkan langsung oleh Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr Sutrisno K Djawa dan didampingi Wakil-wakil rektornya.Tidak hanya piagam, lulusan terbaik juga mendapat bonus atau reward berupa uang tunai dari Bank Syariah Indonesia (BSI) Cabang Luwuk. Ini sebagai bentuk dukungan BSI terhadap dunia pendidikan, khususnya kepada kampus hijau Unismuh Luwuk. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk successfully held its Class 21 graduation on Monday 18 December 2023, at the Estrella Hotel Luwuk. This year, the green campus is under the leadership of Chancellor Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa graduated 768 undergraduate graduates. Hundreds of graduates graduated in two sessions, where the first session which took place from the morning was attended by three faculties and the second session which was held from midday to evening was attended by five faculties. In the graduation procession, the green campus announced 15 names of the best undergraduate graduates from 15 Study Programs in 8 Faculties were read by Deputy Chancellor I Mustafa Abd Rahim. Firstly, the best graduate of the Faculty of Social and Political Sciences, from the Government Science Study Program was successfully achieved by Amaludin S.IP., with a GPA of 3, 95. Second, from the Communication Science Study Program with a GPA of 3.88 successfully achieved by Mujamin S.I.Kom. Third, Faculty of Economics and Business, the best undergraduate graduate from the Management Study Program was successfully achieved by Firjin Firna Kasegar S.M., with a GPA of 3.70. Fourth , the best graduate from the Accounting Study Program was successfully achieved by Rahmat Dalim, S.Ak. with a GPA of 3.85. Fifth, the best undergraduate graduate from the Faculty of Fisheries, from the Aquaculture Study Program was Siti Israwati S.Pi., with a GPA of 3.96. Sixth, Sandi Kasang. S. Pd, he is from the Faculty of Teacher Training and Education (FKIP) with the Physical Education, Health and Recreation study program, with a GPA of 3.97. Seventh, Bintang Amanah Setiawan. S. Pd. FKIP Faculty, English Language Study Program, with a GPA of 3.95. Eighth, Dewi Kartika Koida. S. Pd. Faculty of FKIP from the Biology Education Study Program, with a GPA of 3.81. Sembilan, Syafira F Panggato, SH. This alumni of the Faculty of Law, successfully achieved a GPA of 3.80. Ten, Nova Hidayah. S.Pd, Alumni of the Faculty of Islamic Religion from the Islamic Religious Education Study Program, with a GPA of 3.91. Eleven, Fahria Hensokan. The Faculty of Islamic Religion, Early Childhood Islamic Education Study Program achieved a GPA of 3.84. Twelve, occupied by graduates in the name of Novi Yanti, S.P. graduated from the Faculty of Agriculture from the Agribusiness Study Program, with a GPA of 3.66. Thirteen, achieved by Yurita, S. P., from the Faculty of Agriculture, Agrotechnology Study Program, with a GPA of 3.75. Fourteen, Rahmawati Hilipito, S.T, Faculty of Engineering, Civil Engineering Study Program, with a GPA of 3.79. Lastly, Nurwahida, S.T, an alumnus of the Faculty of Engineering, Industrial Engineering Study Program, achieved a GPA of 3.54. Of the 15 best graduates, Sandi Kasang. S. Pd, became the graduate with the highest GPA in Unismuh Luwuk. He achieved a GPA of 3.97. For this proud achievement, the best graduates from each study program are entitled to receive a certificate of appreciation which was handed over directly by the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr Sutrisno K Djawa and accompanied by his Deputy Chancellors. Not only certificates, the best graduates also received a bonus or reward in the form of cash from Bank Syariah Indonesia (BSI) Luwuk Branch. This is a form of BSI's support for the world of education, especially for the Unismuh Luwuk green campus. (*)

title: Sekda Kabupaten Banggai dan Ketua Dharma Wanita Persatuan Hadiri Upacara HUT ke-20 Kabupaten Tojo Una-Una
text: KABAR LUWUK –Sekda Kabupaten BanggaidanKetua Dharma Wanita PersatuanHadiri UpacaraHUT ke-20 Kabupaten Tojo Una-Una. Bupati Banggai, Ir, H. Amiruddin, MM diwakili oleh Sekretaris Daerah Kabupaten Banggai,Ir. Abdullah Ali, M.Si,beserta Ketua Dharma Wanita Persatuan Kabupaten Banggai, turut menghadiri upacara peringatanHari Ulang Tahun (HUT) ke-20 Kabupaten Tojo Una-Una.Acara berlangsung meriah dan penuh makna di Lapangan Eks STQH Jalan Merdeka, Kota Bumi Mas Ampana.Senin,18 Desember 2023.Gubernur Sulawesi Tengah, H. Rusdi Mastura, hadir sebagai Pembina Upacara, memberikan sambutan yang menginspirasi tentang pentingnya mengembangkan potensi daerah untuk meningkatkan kesejahteraan masyarakat.Dalam sambutannya, Gubernur Mastura menekankan bahwa Tojo Una-Una memiliki 138 daya tarik pariwisata yang luar biasa, di antaranya Pulau Papan, Desa Una-Una, dan Desa Banano yang menjadi destinasi unggulan bagi wisatawan mancanegara.Keberadaan Pulau Togean dengan keunikan alamnya memberikan nilai tambah sebagai destinasi wisata minat khusus, terkait dengan teori seleksi alam oleh Charles Darwin.Para peserta upacara, termasuk anggota DPR-RI, DPD-RI, dan tokoh-tokoh penting dari berbagai instansi di tingkat provinsi dan kabupaten, turut menyimak dengan antusias.Acara ini dihadiri pula oleh para pemangku kepentingan seperti Ketua TP-PKK Provinsi Sulteng, Bupati dan Wakil Bupati beserta Ketua dan Wakil Ketua TP-PKK Kabupaten Touna, serta perwakilan legislatif, TNI/Polri, dan pimpinan BUMN/BUMD. Kehadiran semua pihak menandai komitmen bersama untuk mewujudkan Kabupaten Tojo Una-Una yang tangguh, maju, dan sejahtera.Melalui tema “Bergerak Bersama Menuju Kabupaten Tojo Una-Una yang Tangguh, Maju Dan Sejahtera,” diharapkan bahwa kerjasama dan sinergi antarinstansi dapat mengakselerasi pembangunan daerah, terutama dalam sektor pariwisata yang menjadi tulang punggung kemajuan ekonomi dan kesejahteraan masyarakat.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Regional Secretary of Banggai Regency and Chair of the Dharma Wanita PBB Attended the 20th Anniversary Ceremony of Tojo Una-Una Regency. The Regent of Banggai, Ir, H. Amiruddin, MM was represented by the Regional Secretary of Banggai Regency, Ir. Abdullah Ali, M.Si, along with the Chairperson of the Banggai Regency Dharma Wanita Association, also attended the commemoration ceremony for the 20th Anniversary of Tojo Una-Una Regency. The event was lively and full of meaning at the Ex-STQH Field, Jalan Merdeka, Bumi Mas Ampana City .Monday, 18 December 2023. The Governor of Central Sulawesi, H. Rusdi Mastura, was present as Master of Ceremonies, giving an inspiring speech about the importance of developing regional potential to improve community welfare. In his speech, Governor Mastura emphasized that Tojo Una-Una has 138 attractions extraordinary tourism, including Papan Island, Una-Una Village, and Banano Village which are leading destinations for foreign tourists. The existence of Togean Island with its unique nature provides added value as a special interest tourist destination, related to the theory of natural selection by Charles Darwin. The ceremony participants, including members of the DPR-RI, DPD-RI, and important figures from various agencies at the provincial and district levels, also listened enthusiastically. This event was also attended by stakeholders such as the Chair of the TP-PKK of Central Sulawesi Province, the Regent and the Deputy Regent along with the Chair and Deputy Chair of the Touna Regency TP-PKK, as well as representatives of the legislature, TNI/Polri, and leaders of BUMN/BUMD. The presence of all parties marks a joint commitment to create a strong, advanced and prosperous Tojo Una-Una Regency. Through the theme "Moving Together Towards a Resilient, Advanced and Prosperous Tojo Una-Una Regency," it is hoped that cooperation and synergy between agencies can accelerate regional development , especially in the tourism sector which is the backbone of economic progress and community welfare.**

title: Kasatgas Humas OMB Tinombala Polres Banggai, Peserta Kampanye Wajib Ajukan Surat Pemberitahuan H-7
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Kasatgas Humas OMB Tinombala Polres Banggai, Peserta Kampanye Wajib Ajukan Surat Pemberitahuan H-7.Kasatgas Humas OMB Tinombala Polres Banggai,IPTU Al Amin S. Muda, menegaskan bahwa peserta kampanye diharuskan untuk mengajukanSurat Tanda Terima Pemberitahuan (STTP)kepada pihak kepolisian.IPTU Amin menjelaskan proses pengurusan STTP dimulai dari pengajuan surat pemberitahuan oleh peserta kampanye, yang harus diajukan paling lambat H-3 sebelum acara kampanye berlangsung.Menurutnya, surat pemberitahuan yang diajukan mencakup informasi penting seperti ketua tim kampanye, parpol peserta pemilu, calegnya, bentuk kampanye, lokasi, waktu pelaksanaan, juru kampanye, perkiraan jumlah peserta kampanye, jumlah dan jenis kendaraan angkutan peserta kampanye, serta alat peraga yang digunakan.Dokumen ini menjadi acuan bagi kepolisian dalam memperhitungkan personil keamanan yang diperlukan selama kampanye.Amin menekankan bahwa kewajiban ini sesuai dengan Peraturan Komisi Pemilihan Umum (PKPU) Nomor 15 tahun 2023, yang mengamanatkan agar tim kampanye dan pelaksana kampanye memberikan pemberitahuan tertulis ke Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU) dan Badan Pengawas Pemilu (Bawaslu) sesuai tingkatan.Hal ini diharapkan dapat menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban masyarakat agar tetap kondusif selama periode kampanye.Pentingnya kerjasama antara peserta kampanye, kepolisian, dan lembaga terkait lainnya dalam menjalankan prosedur ini diharapkan dapat menciptakan lingkungan yang aman dan tertib selama proses kampanye pemilu.Kasatgas Humas OMB Tinombala mengingatkan agar aturan ini diikuti dengan baik demi kepentingan bersama dalam menjaga kondusifitas dan suksesnya proses demokrasi di Banggai.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Head of the Public Relations Task Force for OMB Tinombala Banggai Police, Campaign Participants are Required to Submit Notification Letter H-7. Head of Public Relations Task Force for OMB Tinombala Banggai Police, IPTU Al Amin S. Muda, emphasized that campaign participants are required to submit a Notification Receipt (STTP) to the police .IPTU Amin explained that the STTP processing process starts from submitting a notification letter by campaign participants, which must be submitted no later than 3 days before the campaign event takes place. According to him, the notification letter submitted includes important information such as the campaign team leader, political parties participating in the election, legislative candidates, form campaign, location, implementation time, campaigner, estimated number of campaign participants, number and type of vehicles transporting campaign participants, as well as props used. This document is a reference for the police in calculating the security personnel needed during the campaign. Amin emphasized that this obligation is in accordance with General Election Commission Regulation (PKPU) Number 15 of 2023, which mandates that campaign teams and campaign implementers provide written notification to the General Election Commission (KPU) and the Election Supervisory Body (Bawaslu) according to level. This is expected to maintain public security and order so that it remains conducive during the campaign period. The importance of cooperation between campaign participants, the police and other related institutions in carrying out this procedure is expected to create a safe and orderly environment during the election campaign process. Head of the Tinombala OMB Public Relations Task Force reminded that these rules should be followed properly for the common good. in maintaining the conduciveness and success of the democratic process in Banggai.**

title: Pemkab Banggai Umumkan Hasil Seleksi PPPK 2023
text: BANGGAI RAYA– Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai mengumumkan hasil seleksi kompetensi Pegawai Pemerintah dengan Perjanjian Kerja (PPPK) tahun 2023 untuk jabatan Fungsional dan jabatan Fungsional tenaga Kesehatan, Senin (18/12/2023).Kepala BKPSDM Kabupaten Banggai Soffian Datu Adam mengatakan sebanyak drbanyak 767 perserta dinyatakan lulus seleksi kompetensi PPPK formasi umum dan khusus.Dengan rincian untuk tenaga teknis umum sebanyak 3 peserta, dan tenaga teknis khusus peserta. Sementara untuk kelompok jabatan tenaga kesehatan umum berjumlah 142 peserta, dan tenaga khusus drbsnysk 591 peserta.Soffian menjelaskan dari 165 jumlah formasi umum dan 657 formasi khusus untuk tenaga kesehatan, terdapat sejumlah formasi yang tidak terisi, demikian halnya dengan jabatan fungsional tenaga teknis.“Kelompok jabatan teknis dari jumlah formasi umum 8, sebanyak 5 formasi tidak terisi. untuk formasi khusus sebanyak 31 formasi seluruhnya terisi.
