Untuk tenaga kesehatan jumlah formasi umum 165, 23 formasi tidak terisi, adapun formasi khusus dari 657 yang tersedia, 66 tidak terisi. Total ada 94 formasi tidak terisi,” kata Soffian.Adapun Pengumuman hasil seleksi kompetensi PPPK Guru tahun formasi 2023 menunggu proses pemetaan PPPK Guru selesai. NAL
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA– The Banggai Regency Government announced the results of the 2023 competency selection for Government Employees with Work Agreements (PPPK) for Functional positions and Functional Health Worker positions, Monday (18/12/2023). Head of BKPSDM Banggai Regency Soffian Datu Adam said that there were 767 participants. declared to have passed the general and special formation PPPK competency selection. With details for general technical personnel as many as 3 participants, and special technical personnel for participants. Meanwhile, there are 142 participants for the group of general health personnel positions, and 591 participants for special drbsnysk personnel. Soffian explained that of the 165 general formations and 657 special formations for health personnel, there are a number of formations that are not filled, as is the case with the functional positions of technical personnel. "Group Technical positions out of a total of 8 general formations, 5 formations were not filled. For special formations, all 31 formations were filled. For health workers, the number of general formations is 165, 23 formations are not filled, as for special formations out of the 657 available, 66 are not filled. "A total of 94 formations have not been filled," said Soffian. As for the announcement of the results of the Teacher PPPK competency selection for the 2023 formation year, we are waiting for the Teacher PPPK mapping process to be completed. NAL

title: Unismuh Luwuk Diharap Hadirkan Lulusan Berkualitas
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk diharap dapat menghadirkan lulusan yang handal dan berkualitas. Harapan itu disampaikan Bupati Banggai Amirudin Tamoreka saat memberikan sambutan pada Wisuda Unismuh Luwuk Angkatan XXI di Luwuk, Senin (18/12/2023).Prosesi wisuda dilakukan melalui Rapat Senat Terbuka Luar Biasa dalam rangka Wisuda Sarjana Strata Satu (S1) Angkatan XXI Tahun akademik 2022-2023 yang berlangsung di Maleo Ballroom Estrella Hotel & Conference. Wisuda inj menjadi momen bersejarah bagi para sarjana yang telah menyelesaikan perjalanan akademisnya.Bupati Banggai Amirudin dalam sambutannya menyampaikan terima kasih dan selamat datang kepada Pimpinan Pusat Muhamadiyah, LL-DIKTI Wilayah Gosulutteng, Serta Kopertais Wilayah VIII, yang telah hadir di Kota Luwuk Kabupaten Banggai.“Saya berharap agar pergurun tinggi ini dapat terus menghadirkan alumni – alumni yang handal, berkualitas, kreatif dan inovatif,” ucap Amirudin.Wisuda ini kata bupati, merupakan refleksi keberhasilan penyelenggaraan pendidikan, hendaknya tidak hanya dipandang sebagai acara seremonial rutin saja, tetapi lebih dari itu harus disikapi secara arif dan bijak untuk melakukan koreksi terhadap proses manajerial penyelenggaraan pendidikan.Olehnya itu melalui momentum tersebut, Bupati Banggai selaku pribadi dan kapasitas sebagai pimpinan di daerah Kabupaten Banggai dan atas nama masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai mengucapkan selamat kepada para wisudawan dan wisudawati yang telah sarjana.“Semoga keberhasilan yang telah diraih ini dapat dijadikan motivasi untuk terus berusaha meraih cita-cita sekaligus mengukir prestasi yang lebih baik di masa mendatang,”kata Bupati Amirudin.Ia mengajak semua pihak merubah paradigma, bukan lagi kita mencari pekerjaan tapi kita yang harus menciptakan lapangan pekerjaan.Dengan adanya acara wisuda ini, diharapkan para sarjana baru dapat membawa semangat belajar dan dedikasi mereka ke berbagai sektor kehidupan dan berkontribusi positif bagi pembangunan Kabupaten Banggai.Adapun jumlah wisudawan juga wisudawati pada angkatan Ke- XXI Tahun 2023 ini berjumlah 768 peserta yang terdiri dari 8 fakultas dan 15 prodi.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk is expected to be able to produce reliable and high-quality graduates. This hope was conveyed by Banggai Regent Amirudin Tamoreka when giving a speech at the Graduation Ceremony of Unismuh Luwuk Class XXI in Luwuk, Monday (18/12/2023). 2022-2023 which will take place at the Maleo Ballroom Estrella Hotel & Conference. This graduation is a historic moment for scholars who have completed their academic journey. Banggai Regent Amirudin in his speech expressed his thanks and welcome to the Muhamadiyah Central Leadership, LL-DIKTI Gosulutteng Region, and Kopertais Region VIII, who were present in Luwuk City, Banggai Regency. "I hope that this university can continue to present alumni who are reliable, qualified, creative and innovative," said Amirudin. This graduation, said the regent, is a reflection of the success of the implementation of education, it should not only be seen as a routine ceremonial event, but more than This must be addressed wisely and wisely to make corrections to the managerial process of providing education. Therefore, through this momentum, the Regent of Banggai, as a person and in his capacity as a leader in the Banggai Regency area and on behalf of the people of Banggai Regency, congratulates the graduates and female graduates who have graduated. "Hopefully the success that has been achieved can be used as motivation to continue trying to achieve your goals and achieve better achievements in the future," said Regent Amirudin. He invited all parties to change the paradigm, we are no longer looking for work but we are the ones who have to create employment opportunities. With this graduation event, it is hoped that new graduates will be able to bring their enthusiasm for learning and dedication to various sectors of life and contribute positively to the development of Banggai Regency. The number of graduates and female graduates in the XXI class of 2023 is 768 participants consisting of from 8 faculties and 15 study programs.**

title: Satgas Kamseltibcarlantas Polres Banggai Kawal 555 Koli Surat Suara DPD RI
text: Polresbanggai.com– Satuan Lalu Lintas melalui Satgas Kamseltibcarlantaspolres banggaimengawal ketat pendistribusian Logistik Pemilu menuju Gudang Logistik KPU Banggai yang terletak di kompleks Halimun KecamatanluwukSelatan, Selasa (19/12/2023) pukul 01.30 Wita.Kegiatan pengawalan Satgas Kamseltibcarlantas bersama Personel Satgas Preventif dan Satgas Preemtif Operasi Mantap Brata Tinombala 2023-2024 Polres Banggai.Adapun logistik yang dikawal berupa surat suara DPD RI dengan jumlah sebanyak 555 koli yang diangkut menggunakan satu unit jasa angkutan Truk dutro warna hijau DN 8528 BA.Kasatgas Kamseltibcarlantas OMB Polres Banggai AKP I Made Bagus Aditya mengatakan bahwa tujuan utama dari Pengawalan dan pengamanan Logistik Pemilu ini dilaksanakan untuk Mencegah kejahatan seperti pencurian, sabotase, atau pemalsuan Logistik Pemilu yang dapat mengganggu integritas Pemilihan pada Pemilu 2024 mendatang.“Kami lakukan Pengawalan ini sebagai upaya untuk Memastikan Kelancaran proses Pemilu 2024 mendatang dapat berjalan dengan aman dan lancar” sambungnya.Satgas Kamseltibcarlantas melakukan Pengawalan Logistik Pemilu dari Desa Bunga Kecamatan Luwuk Utara dan tiba di Gudang Logistik KPU Banggai pukul 02.40 Wita.“Seluruh rangkaian pelaksanaan Pembongkaran, pengawalan, pengaturan arus lalu lintas dan Pengamanan Logistik Pemilu yang dilaksanakan oleh Satgas Kamseltibcarlantas berlangsung dengan aman, baik dan lancar,” pungkas AKP Aditya
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– The Traffic Unit through the Kamseltibcarlantas Task Force of the Banggai Police is closely monitoring the distribution of Election Logistics to the Banggai KPU Logistics Warehouse which is located in the Halimun complex, South Luwuk District, Tuesday (19/12/2023) at 01.30 WITA. Escort activities of the Traffic Security and Traffic Security Task Force together with Preventive Task Force and Preemptive Task Force personnel Operation Mantap Brata Tinombala 2023-2024 Banggai Police. Meanwhile, the logistics that were being guarded were DPD RI ballot papers with a total of 555 koli which were transported using one unit of the green Dutro Truck transport service DN 8528 BA. Head of the OMB Traffic Security and Traffic Security Task Force, Banggai Police, AKP I Made Bagus Aditya said that the main objective of escorting and securing election logistics is to prevent crimes such as theft, sabotage or falsification of election logistics which could disrupt the integrity of the election in the upcoming 2024 elections. "We are carrying out this escort as an effort to ensure that the upcoming 2024 election process can run smoothly. safe and smooth," he continued. The Traffic Security and Traffic Security Task Force carried out Election Logistics Escort from Bunga Village, North Luwuk District and arrived at the Banggai KPU Logistics Warehouse at 02.40 WITA. "The entire series of implementation of dismantling, escorting, regulating traffic flow and securing Election Logistics was carried out by the Traffic Security and Traffic Security Task Force. took place safely, well and smoothly," concluded AKP Aditya

title: Turunkan Stunting di Banggai, Intervensi Harus Sasar Keluarga Berisiko
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Guna mempercepat penurunan stunting di Kabupaten Banggai, Intervensi program harus menyasar langsung keluarga berisiko stunting.Hal itu disampaikan Wabup Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili dalam sambutan pada pembukaan rapat penguatan ayah/ibu stunting tahun 2023, Selasa (19/12/2023) di Luwuk.Pada kegiatan yang dilaksanakan oleh Dinas P2KBP3A Kabupaten Banggai, di Ruang Rapat Umum Setda, Wabup menyampaikan, isu penting dalam percepatan penurunan stunting dalam RAN PASTI (Rencana Aksi Nasional Percepatan Penurunan Stunting) adalah bagaimana intervensi program menyasar langsung keluarga berisiko stunting, mulai dari calon pengantin, ibu hamil, ibu paska bersalin, dan anak di bawah lima tahun.Percepatan penurunan stunting adalah adalah setiap upaya yang mencakup intervensi spesifik dan intervensi sensitif yang dilaksanakan secara konvergen, holistik, integratif, dan berkualitas melalui kerjasama multisektor dipusat, daerah dan desa.Untuk itu demi mencapai hasil yang optimal tentunya dibutuhkan dukungan dan bantuan dari semua pihak untuk menyukseskan percepatan penurunan stunting di Indonesia khususnya di Kabupaten Banggai.Wabup sangat mengharapkan semoga ayah dan ibu asuh stunting dapat menyelesaikan masalah-masalah yang ditemukan dalam prosesnya di lapangan, dan semoga pelaksanaan percepatan penurunan stunting berjalan lancar sesuai yang kita harapkan dan menurunkan prevalensi kasus stunting di Kabupaten Banggai.Dan dalam pelaksanaan penguatan ayah/ibu asuh stunting Kabupaten Banggai diharapkan dengan adanya satu komitmen dari kita semua dan stakeholders terkait, mampu memenuhi goal’s penurunan angka stunting di Kabupaten Banggai, serta menghasilkan satu data yang dapat menjadi acuan bagi pemerintah di tingkat daerah maupun pusat dalam penentuan intervensi jangka panjang yang tepat guna dan sasaran terciptanya Indonesia bebas stunting.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-In order to accelerate the reduction of stunting in Banggai Regency, program interventions must directly target families at risk of stunting. This was conveyed by Banggai Deputy Regent Furqanuddin Masulili in his speech at the opening of the 2023 stunting father/mother strengthening meeting, Tuesday (19/12/2023) in Luwuk .In activities carried out by the Banggai Regency P2KBP3A Service, in the General Meeting Room of the Regional Secretariat, the Deputy Regent conveyed that an important issue in accelerating stunting reduction in RAN PASTI (National Action Plan for the Acceleration of Stunting Reduction) is how program interventions directly target families at risk of stunting, starting from prospective brides, pregnant women, post-natal mothers, and children under five years old. Accelerating stunting reduction is every effort that includes specific interventions and sensitive interventions that are implemented convergently, holistically, integratively, and with quality through multi-sector collaboration at the center, regions and villages. For this reason, in order to achieve optimal results, of course support and assistance from all parties is needed to succeed in accelerating the reduction of stunting in Indonesia, especially in Banggai Regency. The Deputy Regent really hopes that fathers and mothers who foster stunting can solve the problems found in the process in the field, and hopefully The implementation of accelerating stunting reduction is running smoothly as we expected and reducing the prevalence of stunting cases in Banggai Regency. And in the implementation of strengthening stunting foster fathers/mothers in Banggai Regency, it is hoped that with a commitment from all of us and related stakeholders, we will be able to fulfill the goal of reducing stunting rates in the Regency. Banggai, and produce data that can be a reference for the government at regional and central levels in determining appropriate long-term interventions and targets for creating a stunting-free Indonesia.**

title: Kampanye Wardani di Luwuk Utara dan Luwuk Timur, Dapatkan Hati Masyarakat
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Sejak Senin-Kamis (4-7/12/2023) melaksanakan kampanye tatap muka di wilayah Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, dan di Kecamatan Luwuk Timur mulai Senin-Kamis (11-14/12/2023), calon anggota legislatif (Caleg) DPRD Kabupaten Banggai dari Partai Gerindra nomor urut 1, Wardani Murad Husain mendapatkan tempat dihati masyarakat dua kecamatan tersebut.Di Luwuk Utara, yang terdiri dari 9 desa dan 2 kelurahan itu, menerima dengan senang hati kedatangan putri dari almarhum Murad Husain ini.Begitu juga di wilayah Kecamatan Luwuk Timur, masyarakat desa dengan antusias ingin bertemu dan ingin mendengarkan orasi politik dari kakak kandung Hj. Sulianti Murad dan Hj. Amalya Murad ini.Seperti di Dusun 3, Matanyo, Desa Baya, Kecamatan LuwukTimur, kampanye tatap muka yang dilaksanakan ba’dah Isya, sekira pukul 19.30 Wita, terlihat masyarakat berbondong-bondong datang lokasi kegiatan.Diakhir acara, salah seorang tokoh masyarakat Dusun Matanyo, Desa Baya, Kecamatan Luwuk Timur, Yunias menyempatkan diri untuk menyampaikan sambutan mewakili masyarakat Dusun Matanyo, Desa Baya.Dalam sambutannya, Ia mengatakan, Wardani Murad Husain memberanikan diri untuk turun ke dusun-dusun di Desa Baya, sebab pengalaman beberapa Caleg tidak mau datang ke dusun. Selama memilih, kampanye selalu dilaksanakan di desa induk.Tapi kali ini kata dia, Wardani Murad Husain memberanikan diri datang ke dusun Matanyo. Untuk itu atasnama masyarakat Dusun 3 Matanyo Mandiri, Desa Baya mengucapkan terima kasih banyak.“Kami ucapkan terima kasih kepada Ibu Wardani bersama tim. Begitu juga terima kasih kepada bapak Bhabinkamtibmas, Babinsa, Panwascam dari kabupaten maupun kecamatan, terima kasih banyak bisa datang di tempat kami. Dan kami mohon maaaf yang sebesar-besarnya, kalau kami melayani ibu Wardani hanya seperti itu. Kami tidak mengada-ada, tapi itulah kehidupan kami disini, mudah-mudahan ibu bisa berkenan dan bisa menerima apa adanya,” kata Yunias.Ia menitip pesan kepada Wardani Murad Husain, sebagai perempuan, saat mendengar cerita tentang saudara bersaudara Wardani Murad, hanya satu laki-laki, dan terbanyak adalah wanita. Ia ingin berpesan, sebagai wanita, silahkan ibu berdandan, karena itu adalah kodrat Wardani Murad sebagai wanita.Tetapi kalau bekerja tekan Yunias, harus sama dengan laki-laki. Pakai jilbab dan lain sebagainya, silahkan, karena itu adalah kodrat seorang wanita. Tapi, dalam memperjuangkan aspirasi masyarakat, Wardani Murad Husain harus sama dengan laki-laki.“Itu pesan saya. Yang kedua, kalau ibu berkata bijak, izinkan saya memberikan pantun, burung cendrawasi, burung madina, terbang tinggi keangkasa, selamat berjuang ibu Wardani, semoga kita semua akan mencoblos di 14 Februari 2024,” tutupnya. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-From Monday-Thursday (4-7/12/2023) carrying out face-to-face campaigns in the North Luwuk District area, and in East Luwuk District from Monday-Thursday (11-14/12/2023), legislative candidate candidates ) Banggai Regency DPRD from the Gerindra Party number 1, Wardani Murad Husain has a place in the hearts of the people of the two sub-districts. In North Luwuk, which consists of 9 villages and 2 sub-districts, they happily welcomed the arrival of the daughter of the late Murad Husain. in the East Luwuk District area, the village community enthusiastically wanted to meet and listen to political speeches from Hj's older brother. Sulianti Murad and Hj. This is Amalya Murad. Like in Hamlet 3, Matanyo, Baya Village, LuwukTimur District, the face-to-face campaign was carried out at Isha prayer, at around 19.30 WITA, people were seen flocking to the location of the activity. At the end of the event, one of the community leaders of Matanyo Hamlet , Baya Village, East Luwuk District, Yunias took the time to deliver a speech representing the people of Matanyo Hamlet, Baya Village. In his speech, he said that Wardani Murad Husain had the courage to go down to the hamlets in Baya Village, because of the experience that several legislative candidates did not want to come to the village. During voting, the campaign was always carried out in the main village. But this time, he said, Wardani Murad Husain dared to come to Matanyo hamlet. For this reason, on behalf of the people of Hamlet 3 Matanyo Mandiri, Baya Village, we would like to say thank you very much. "We would like to thank Mrs. Wardani and the team. Likewise, thank you to Bhabinkamtibmas, Babinsa, Panwascam from the district and sub-district, thank you very much for coming to our place. And we apologize profusely, if we only served Mrs. Wardani like that. "We're not making it up, but that's our life here, hopefully mother will be pleased and can accept it as it is," said Yunias. She left a message to Wardani Murad Husain, as a woman, when she heard the story about Wardani Murad's brothers, only one men, and the majority are women. She wanted to say, as a woman, please dress up, because that is Wardani Murad's nature as a woman. But if you work, Yunias said, you have to be the same as a man. Wear the hijab and so on, please, because that is the nature of a woman. But, in fighting for people's aspirations, Wardani Murad Husain must be the same as men. "That's my message. "Secondly, if you speak wisely, let me give you a rhyme, bird of paradise, bird of paradise, fly high in the sky, good luck, Mrs. Wardani, hopefully we will all vote on February 14 2024," he concluded. RUM

title: Wakapolres Banggai Ikuti Lat Pra Ops Lilin Tinombala 2023 Secara Virtual Dengan Polda Sulteng
text: Polresbanggai.com– Wakapolres Banggai Kompol Pino Ary, SH, SIK, MH, mengikuti Latihan Pra Operasi (Lat Pra Ops) Lilin Tinombala 2023 melalui virtual dengan Polda Sulteng di Aula Rupatama Mapolres Banggai, Selasa (19/12/2023) pagi.Lat Pra Ops yang dipimpin langsung Wakapolda Sulteng Brigjen Pol Soeseno Noerhandoko, SIK dan jajaran ini mengambil tema “Kita Tingkatkan Kemampuan dan Profesionalisme Polri Dalam Pengamanan Natal 2023 Dan Tahun Baru 2024 Guna Memelihara Keamanan Dalam Negeri”.Dalam arahan sekaligus membuka Lat Pra Ops Lilin Tinombala 2023 ini, Wakapolda Sulteng mengatakan, anggota yang terlibat dalam pengamanan operasi ini baik jajaran polda maupun polres hingga polsek agar mempersiapkan diri dengan baik.“Kita harus memberikan fokus yang lebih walaupun dinamika situasi operasi lilin tahun lalu mengalami penurunan. Operasi tahun ini semakin kompleks dikarenakan bertepatan dengan pesta demokrasi Pemilu yang saat ini memasuki tahap kampanye,” ucap Wakapolda.Jenderal bintang satu ini menjelaskan, operasi tahun ini kita tetap kedepankan pos pengamanan, pos pelayanan, pengamanan kegiatan masyarakat selama Nataru dan pengamanan objek wisata.Selain itu, kata Wakapolda, laksanakan pemetaan dan pendataan lokasi yang berpotensi rawan macet, kecelakaan, longsor dan kriminalitas.“Operasi lilin tinombala 2023 akan berlangsung selama 12 hari mulai tanggal 22 Desember 2023 sampai 2 Januari 2024,” jelasnya.Dikatakan, bahwa Lat Pra Ops Lilin Tinombala 2023 yang dilaksanakan secara serentak di jajaran Polda Sulawesi Tengah secara virtual sebagai bentuk kesiapan personel sebelum pelaksanaan operasi
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– Banggai Deputy Chief of Police, Police Commissioner Pino Ary, SH, SIK, MH, took part in the 2023 Tinombala Candle Pre-Operational Training (Lat Pre Ops) virtually with the Central Sulawesi Regional Police in the Rupatama Hall of the Banggai Police Headquarters, Tuesday (19/12/2023) morning.Lat The Pre-Ops, which was led directly by the Deputy Chief of Regional Police for Central Sulawesi, Brigadier General Soeseno Noerhandoko, SIK and his staff took the theme "We Increase the Capability and Professionalism of the National Police in Security for Christmas 2023 and New Year 2024 to Maintain Internal Security". Currently, the Deputy Chief of Regional Police for Central Sulawesi said that the members involved in securing this operation, both from the regional police and from the police to the police, must prepare themselves well. "We must provide more focus even though the dynamics of the candle operation situation last year experienced a decline. "This year's operations are increasingly complex because they coincide with the democratic election celebrations which are currently entering the campaign stage," said the Deputy Chief of Regional Police. This one-star general explained that this year's operations will continue to prioritize security posts, service posts, security of community activities during Christmas and security of tourist attractions. Apart from that, said the Deputy Chief of Regional Police, carry out mapping and data collection on locations that are potentially prone to traffic jams, accidents, landslides and crime. "The 2023 tinombala candle operation will last for 12 days from December 22 2023 to January 2 2024," he explained. It was said that Lat Pra Ops Lilin Tinombala 2023 which was carried out simultaneously in the ranks of the Central Sulawesi Regional Police virtually as a form of personnel readiness before carrying out the operation

title: IPDA Joice Asman Berikan Materi di Muskerkab PMI Banggai
text: Polresbanggai.com– IPDA Joice Asman selaku Kanit Bintibsos Sat Binmaspolres banggaimemberikan materi di Musyawarah Kerja PMIkabupaten banggaidalam rangka Hari Relawan Palang Merah Indonesia, Selasa (19/12/2023).Edukasi tentang Netralitas Polri dalam dalam perhelatan pesta demokrasi Pemilu 2024 agar berjalan aman, damai, sejuk dan kondusif, yang sampaikan kepada 109 relawan bertempat di Objek Wisata Sandakan Desa Biak KecamatanluwukUtara.Menurutnya netralitas Polri merupakan harga mati dalam konteks pemilihan umum merupakan hal yang sangat krusial, sebab Polri harus memastikan bahwa tidak berpihak kepada salah satu kandidat, partai politik, atau kelompok tertentu selama proses pemilu.“Maka dari itu, seluruh anggota Polri tidak boleh memberikan dukungan kepada kandidat atau partai politik tertentu demi mewujudkan Pemilu tahun 2024 yang aman damai sejuk dan kondusif di Kabupaten Banggai,” tuturnya.IPDA Joice juga menyampaikan anggota Polri untuk meningkatan soliditas dan sinergitas dengan stakeholder, tokoh masyarakat dan seluruh elemen masyarakat dalam rangka pemeliharaan Kamtibmas yang aman damai kondusif mulai pentahapan Pemilu sampai berakhirnya Pemilu tahun 2024.“Kami selalu menghindari perbuatan yang dapat menurunkan citra Kepolisian serta tetap memperhatikan etika norma yang berlaku di lingkungannya,” ucapnya
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– IPDA Joice Asman as Head of Bintibsos Sat Binmaspolres is proud to provide material at the PMI Working Conference of Banggai Regency in the context of Indonesian Red Cross Volunteer Day, Tuesday (19/12/2023). peaceful, cool and conducive, which was conveyed to 109 volunteers located at the Sandakan Tourist Attraction, Biak Village, North Luwuk District. According to him, the neutrality of the National Police is a fixed price in the context of general elections, which is very crucial, because the National Police must ensure that it does not side with any of the candidates, political parties , or certain groups during the election process. "Therefore, all members of the National Police must not provide support to certain candidates or political parties in order to realize the 2024 General Election which will be safe, peaceful, cool and conducive in Banggai Regency," he said. IPDA Joice also conveyed that members of the National Police to increase solidity and synergy with stakeholders, community leaders and all elements of society in the context of maintaining safe, peaceful and conducive security and social security from the election stages until the end of the 2024 elections. "We always avoid actions that can reduce the image of the police and continue to pay attention to the ethical norms that apply in the environment ," he said

title: Satgas Gakkum OMB Tinombala Sambangi Bawaslu dan KPU Banggai
text: Polresbanggai.com– Personil Satgas Gakkum OMB Tinombalapolres banggaimenyambangi Kantor Bawaslu dan KPUkabupaten banggai, Selasa (19/12/2023).Kegiatan tersebut rutin dilakukan untuk meningkatkan Koordinasi dan memonitor perkembangan terkini dalam masa Kampanye Pemilu 2023-2024.Hal tersebut sebagai implementasi personil Satreskrim terhadap commander Wish pimpinan yang mengharapkan Polisi dapat hadir di tengah masyarakat dan selalu mengikuti perkembangan situasi di lapangan, ujar Kasatgas Gakkum Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy.Selanjutnya AKP Tio menyampaikan bahwa sampai saat ini dalam masa tahapan Kampanye belum ada laporan maupun temuan berkaitan dengan pelanggaran pemilu di Kabupaten Banggai.Namun tidak membuat under estimate terhadap kemungkinan perkembangan situasi dan dinamika di lapangan kedepan mengingat semakin dinamisnya suhu politik.Begitu pula dengan hasil koordinasi dengan KPU Banggai bahwa telah tiba di Gudang Logistik berupa surat suara Calon Anggota DPD RI yang sebelumnya dilakukan pengawalan dari Kota Palu. Serta dalam waktu dekat akan tiba pula perlengkapan logistic lainnya.Kegiatan tersebut akan terus dilakukan guna memastikan situasi Kamtibmas Banggai yang aman dan kondusif
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– Tinombalapolres OMB Gakkum Task Force personnel visited the Bawaslu and KPU offices in Banggai Regency, Tuesday (19/12/2023). This activity is routinely carried out to improve coordination and monitor the latest developments during the 2023-2024 Election Campaign. "To Commander Wish, the leader who hopes that the police can be present in the community and always follow developments in the situation in the field," said the Head of the Banggai Police Gakkum Task Force, AKP Tio Tondy. Furthermore, AKP Tio said that up to now during the campaign phase there have been no reports or findings related to election violations. in Banggai Regency. However, do not under estimate the possible development of the situation and dynamics in the field in the future considering the increasingly dynamic political temperature. Likewise, the results of coordination with the Banggai KPU show that ballot papers for DPD RI Candidate Members have arrived at the Logistics Warehouse which were previously escorted by Palu City. And in the near future other logistical equipment will also arrive. These activities will continue to be carried out to ensure a safe and conducive Banggai Public Security and Order situation.

title: Wakapolres Banggai Terlibat Aktif Dalam Latihan Pra Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023 Secara Virtual
text: KABAR LUWUK–Wakapolres BanggaiTerlibat Aktif DalamLatihan Pra Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023Secara Virtual. Wakapolres Banggai,Kompol Pino Ary, SH, SIK, MH, turut serta dalam Latihan Pra Operasi (Lat Pra Ops) Lilin Tinombala 2023 melalui sesi virtual denganPolda Sulawesi Tengah.Acara yang berlangsung di Aula RupatamaMapolres Banggaipada Selasa pagi ini dipimpin langsung oleh Wakapolda Sulteng, Brigjen Pol Soeseno Noerhandoko, SIK, dengan tema “Kita Tingkatkan Kemampuan danProfesionalisme Polri Dalam Pengamanan Natal 2023Dan Tahun Baru 2024 Guna Memelihara Keamanan Dalam Negeri. Selasa 19/12/2023.Dalam arahannya, Wakapolda Sulteng menekankan pentingnya persiapan yang matang bagi anggota yang terlibat dalam operasi ini, baik dari jajaran Polda, Polres, hingga Polsek.Meskipun dinamika situasi operasi lilin tahun sebelumnya mengalami penurunan, Wakapolda menyoroti kompleksitas operasi tahun ini yang dipengaruhi oleh tahap kampanye Pemilu.“Kita harus memberikan fokus yang lebih, walaupun dinamika situasi operasi lilin tahun lalu mengalami penurunan.Operasi tahun ini semakin kompleks dikarenakan bertepatan dengan pesta demokrasi Pemilu yang saat ini memasuki tahap kampanye,” ucap Wakapolda.Brigjen Pol Soeseno Noerhandoko juga menegaskan bahwa pos pengamanan, pos pelayanan, pengamanan kegiatan masyarakat selama Nataru, dan pengamanan objek wisata tetap menjadi prioritas utama dalam pelaksanaan operasi.Selain itu, ia menyarankan untuk melakukan pemetaan dan pendataan lokasi yang berpotensi rawan macet, kecelakaan, longsor, dan kriminalitas.Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023 dijadwalkan akan berlangsung selama 12 hari, dimulai dari tanggal 22 Desember 2023 hingga 2 Januari 2024.Latihan Pra Ops secara virtual di Polda Sulawesi Tengah menjadi langkah strategis dalam memastikan kesiapan personel sebelum pelaksanaan operasi sesungguhnya.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS–Deputy Chief of Police Banggai Actively Involved in Virtual 2023 Tinombala Candle Pre-Operation Training. Banggai Police Deputy Chief, Commissioner Pino Ary, SH, SIK, MH, participated in the 2023 Lilin Tinombala Pre-Operational Training (Lat Pra Ops) through a virtual session with the Central Sulawesi Regional Police. Brigadier General Pol Soeseno Noerhandoko, SIK, with the theme "We Increase the Capabilities and Professionalism of the National Police in Security for Christmas 2023 and New Year 2024 to Maintain Internal Security. Tuesday 19/12/2023. In his direction, the Deputy Chief of Regional Police of Central Sulawesi emphasized the importance of thorough preparation for members involved in this operation, both from the ranks of the Regional Police, Polres, to Polsek. Even though the dynamics of the candle operation situation in the previous year had decreased, the Deputy Chief of Police highlighted the complexity of last year's operations. This is influenced by the election campaign stage. "We have to give more focus, even though the dynamics of last year's candle operation situation experienced a decline. This year's operation is increasingly complex because it coincides with the democratic election party which is currently entering the campaign stage," said the Deputy Chief of Regional Police, Brigadier General Pol. Soeseno Noerhandoko also emphasized that security posts, service posts, security of community activities during Christmas, and security of tourist attractions remain the main priority in carrying out operations. Apart from that, he suggested mapping and collecting data on locations that are potentially prone to traffic jams, accidents, landslides, and crime.Operation Lilin Tinombala 2023 is scheduled to last for 12 days, starting from 22 December 2023 to 2 January 2024. Virtual Pre-Ops training at the Central Sulawesi Regional Police is a strategic step in ensuring personnel readiness before carrying out the actual operation.**

title: Furqanuddin Pimpin Apel Relawan PMI Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Wakil Bupati Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili, memimpin apel relawan PMI Kabupaten Banggai, Senin (18/12/2023) di lokasi Wisata Sandakan Desa Biak Kecamatan Luwuk Utara Kabupaten Banggai.Wakil Bupati Furqanuddin dalam sambutannya menyampaikan bahwa Hari Relawan PMI ini adalah bentuk penghormatan dan apresiasi kepada para relawan PMI yang secara sukarela memberikan waktu, tenaga, dan keterampilan mereka untuk membantu mereka yang membutuhkan, baik dalam situasi darurat maupun kegiatan kemanusiaan lainnya. Atas nama Pemerintah Daerah, Wabup memberikan apresiasi yang setinggi-tingginya kepada relawan PMI atas dedikasinya selama ini, dan berharap PMI kedepannya menjadu lebih baik, maju, dan bersinergitas.Sekretaris PMI Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah Sukri saat dimintai keterangan menyebutkan, secara umum pengurus PMI Sulawesi Tengah mengapresiasi setinggi-tingginya kepada pengurus PMI Kabupaten Banggai yang telah mengambil bagian pada Hari Relawan PMI, dan telah melakukan kegiatan-kegiatan sesuai juknis edaran PMI Pusat, diantaranya penanaman pohon, pengembangan kapasitas, pelatihan KSR dan PMR, melakukan musyawarah kerja dengan mengevaluasi kinerja tahun 2023 dan menyusun Program Kerja Tahun 2024.“Masih dalam rangkaian Hari Relawan PMI, kami menyambut baik, karena di Sulawesi Tengah yang terdiri 12 kabupaten dan 1 kota, baru Kabupaten Banggai yang melaksanakan pertama-kali, sebelum tanggal 26 Desember,” kata Sukri. Provinsi saja menurut Sekretaris PMI ini, baru akan melakukan ini nanti sehari sebelum Hari Relawan PMI.Ini artinya lanjutnya, pengurus PMI Kabupaten Banggai sangat siap, termasuk melakukan koordinasi dengan pemerintah kabupaten. “Apalagi tadi dibuka oleh wakil bupati,” ujarnya. Tentu ini membawa suasana warna yang baru untuk PMI. Semoga ke depannya, PMI Kabupaten Banggai menjadi lebih baik.Seperti diketahui, Apel Relawan PMI Tahun 2023 adalah apel yang juga dilaksanakan oleh relawan PMI di seluruh Indonesia.Plt Ketua PMI Kabupaten Banggai Sahraen Sibay, menyebutkan bahwa kegiatan yang dilakukan saat ini, juga dirangkaikan dengan nusyawarah kerja PMI Tahun 2023. Sahraen berharap, ke depannya PMI Kabupaten banggai harus mempunyai peranan yang lebih besar dan dignifikan di dalam melaksanakan program kemanusiaan dan sosial kemasyarakatanPasca Apel Relawan PMI Kabupaten Banggai Tahun 2023, kegiatan dilanjutkan dengan Musyawarah Kerja PMI. Seluruh rangkaian kegiatan berlangsung mulai Senin (18/12), dan selesai tanggal 20 Desember 2023.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Deputy Regent of Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili, led the PMI volunteer rally for Banggai Regency, Monday (18/12/2023) at the Sandakan Tourism location, Biak Village, North Luwuk District, Banggai Regency. In his speech, Deputy Regent Furqanuddin said that PMI Volunteer Day was a form of respect and appreciation to PMI volunteers who voluntarily give their time, energy and skills to help those in need, both in emergency situations and other humanitarian activities. On behalf of the Regional Government, the Deputy Regent expressed his highest appreciation to PMI volunteers for their dedication so far, and hopes that PMI will become better, more advanced and synergistic in the future. PMI Central Sulawesi Province Secretary Sukri, when asked for information, said that in general the PMI Central Sulawesi management Highest appreciation to the Banggai Regency PMI management who have taken part in PMI Volunteer Day, and have carried out activities in accordance with the Central PMI circular technical guidelines, including tree planting, capacity development, KSR and PMR training, holding work deliberations by evaluating performance in 2023 and preparing the 2024 Work Program. "Still in the series of PMI Volunteer Days, we welcome it, because in Central Sulawesi, which consists of 12 districts and 1 city, only Banggai Regency has implemented it for the first time, before December 26," said Sukri. According to the PMI Secretary, the province will only do this the day before PMI Volunteer Day. This means, he continued, that the Banggai Regency PMI management is very ready, including coordinating with the district government. "Moreover, it was opened by the deputy regent," he said. Of course this brings a new colorful atmosphere for PMI. Hopefully in the future, PMI Banggai Regency will be better. As is known, the 2023 PMI Volunteer Call is a rally which is also carried out by PMI volunteers throughout Indonesia. PMI Work Conference in 2023. Sahraen hopes that in the future PMI Banggai Regency will have a bigger and more significant role in implementing humanitarian and social programs. After the 2023 PMI Banggai Regency Volunteer Call, activities will continue with the PMI Work Conference. The entire series of activities will take place starting Monday (18/12), and will finish on December 20 2023.**

title: Pelaku Kasus Pencurian Tenda Camping Tak Ditahan, Ini Penjelasan Polres Banggai !
text: Polresbanggai.com– Kasus dugaan pencurian berupa tenda camping yang dilakukan seorang pemuda berinisial SH asal Kecamatan Kintom,kabupaten banggaiberujung pada pengeroyokan terus berlanjut.Kasi Humaspolres banggaiIptu Al Ami S Muda, mengungkapkan, kasus pencurian dengan pelaku SH tetap dilakukan proses hukum meski tak dilakukan penahanan.“Pelaku hanya wajib lapor tetapi proses hukum tetap berlanjut,” ungkap Amin kepada wartawan di Kawasan Perkantoran Bukit Halimun, Selasa (19/12/2023) pagi.Amin menjelaskan, pelaku SH tidak dilakukan penahanan karena barang yang dicuri tersebut dengan kerugian di bawah Rp 2,5 juta.“Pelaku maksimal dihukum 3 bulan penjara dan masuk sebagai tindak pidana ringan (Tipiring),” jelasnya.Menurutnya, kasus pencurian dengan kerugian di bawah Rp 2,5 juta dan tidak dilakukan penahanan sesuai dengan Peraturan Mahkamah Agung (Perma) Nomor 2 Tahun 2012“Perma ini ditujukan untuk menyelesaikan penafsiran tentang nilai uang pada Tipiring dalam KUHP,” bebernya.Perwira pangkat dua balak ini menyebutkan, dalam Perma Nomor 2 Tahun 2012 tidak hanya memberikan keringanan, namun juga menjadikan pencurian dibawah Rp 2,5 Juta tidak dapat ditahan.“Aturan Pasal 364 KUHP sudah tidak sesuai dengan perkembangan sosial masyarakat. Di situ disebut minimal kerugian Rp 250. Itu batasan pada tahun 1960,” pungkasnya.Sebelumnya, Satreskrim Polres Banggai resmi menahan empat orang pemuda sebagai tersangka atas kasus pengeroyokan terhadap seorang pemuda asal Kecamatan Kintom, Kabupaten Banggai padaJumat (15/12/2023) malam.Keempat pemuda yang ditahan tersebut yakni berinisial FJ alias U (35) warga Kecamatanluwuk, RM alias A (26) warga Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, MY alias U (24) dan DK alias D (25) warga Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, Kabupaten Banggai.Kasus pengeroyokan ini berawal dari kasus dugaan pencurian barang berupa tenda camping yang dilakukan korban berinisial SH, namun barang tersebut sudah dikembalikan seutuhnya secara sukarela atas kemauan SH melalui rekan tersangka FJ alias U.“Tersangka FJ ini meminta kepada keluarga agar SH diantar ke Luwuk dengan maksud agar meminta maaf kepada FJ,” imbuhnya.Pada Selasa 12 Desember 2023, sekitar pukul 14.00 Wita orang tua SH bersama SH bertemu FJ di dalam Ruko, selanjutnya SH di bawah ke salah satu ruangan dan dipukuli secara bersama-sama oleh tersangka FJ dan rekannya.“Orang tua SH melaporkan kasus pengeroyokan tersebut untuk diproses hukum lebih lanjut,” tutup Amin
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– The alleged theft of a camping tent by a young man with the initials SH from Kintom District, Banggai Regency, has resulted in continued beatings. The Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Ami S Muda, revealed that the theft case involving the perpetrator SH is still undergoing legal proceedings even though no arrest has been made. "The perpetrator is only obliged to report but the legal process continues," said Amin to journalists in the Bukit Halimun office area, Tuesday (19/12/2023) morning. Amin explained that the perpetrator SH was not detained because the stolen goods had losses below Rp. 2.5 million. "The perpetrator is sentenced to a maximum of 3 months in prison and is considered a minor crime (Tipiring)," he explained. According to him, the theft case involved a loss of under Rp. 2.5 million and no detention was carried out in accordance with the Supreme Court Regulations (Perma ) Number 2 of 2012 "This regulation is intended to complete the interpretation of the value of money in Tipiring in the Criminal Code," he explained. This second rank officer said that Perma Number 2 of 2012 not only provides relief, but also makes theft below IDR 2.5 Million cannot be detained. "The provisions of Article 364 of the Criminal Code are no longer in accordance with the social development of society. "It says the minimum loss is IDR 250. That was the limit in 1960," he concluded. Previously, the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit officially detained four young people as suspects in the case of beating a young man from Kintom District, Banggai Regency on Friday (15/12/2023) evening. The four youths who were detained had the initials FJ alias U (35), a resident of Luwuk District, RM alias A (26), a resident of North Luwuk District, MY alias U (24) and DK alias D (25), a resident of South Luwuk District, Banggai Regency. Case This beating started with a case of alleged theft of goods in the form of a camping tent which was carried out by the victim with the initials SH, but the goods were completely returned voluntarily at SH's will through fellow suspect FJ alias U. "The suspect FJ asked the family to take SH to Luwuk with the intention of apologized to FJ," he added. On Tuesday 12 December 2023, at around 14.00 WITA, SH's parents and SH met FJ in the shophouse, then SH was taken downstairs to one of the rooms and beaten together by the suspect FJ and his partner." "SH's parents reported the beating case for further legal processing," concluded Amin

title: Percepatan Penurunan Stunting,Wakil Bupati Banggai Pimpin Rapat Strategis
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Percepatan Penurunan Stunting,Wakil Bupati Banggai Pimpin Rapat Strategis. Dalam upaya serius untuk mengatasi masalah stunting diKabupaten Banggai,Wakil Bupati Banggai,Drs. H. Furqanuddin, M.M,memimpin dan membuka secara resmi acara RapatPenguatan Ayah/Ibu Asuh StuntingTahun 2023.Kegiatan ini digelar di Ruang Rapat Umum SetdaKabupaten BanggaiolehDinas P2KBP3AKabupaten Banggai.Rapat yang dihadiri oleh berbagai pihak strategis ini turut dihadiri oleh Danramil Kota yang mewakili Dandim 1308 LB, Kepala Bappedalitbang Kabupaten Banggai, Kadis P2KBP3A beserta jajarannya, Ketua TP-PKK Kabupaten Banggai sebagai perwakilan Ibu Asuh Stunting, Kepala BPS Kabupaten Banggai, pimpinan perangkat daerah, camat, Kabag Prokopim Setda Banggai, pimpinan perbankan, pimpinan perusahaan.Wakil Bupati Banggai, H. Furqanuddin, dalam sambutan tertulis yang dibacakan, menyampaikan bahwa isu penting dalam percepatan penurunan stunting di Rencana Aksi Nasional Percepatan Penurunan Stunting (RAN PASTI) adalah intervensi program yang menyasar keluarga berisiko stunting, mulai dari calon pengantin, ibu hamil, ibu pasca bersalin, hingga anak di bawah lima tahun.Beliau menekankan bahwa percepatan penurunan stunting memerlukan upaya konkret melalui intervensi spesifik dan sensitif yang diimplementasikan secara konvergen, holistik, integratif, dan berkualitas.Dalam konteks ini, kerjasama multisektor antara pemerintah pusat, pemerintah daerah, dan desa sangatlah penting.Wakil Bupati juga mengajak semua pihak, termasuk perusahaan, perbankan, dan masyarakat umum, untuk memberikan dukungan dan bantuan guna mensukseskan program percepatan penurunan stunting di Indonesia, khususnya di Kabupaten Banggai.Dengan kolaborasi yang kuat, diharapkan hasil optimal dapat dicapai, menjadikan Kabupaten Banggai sebagai contoh keberhasilan dalam menanggulangi stunting.Beliau menyoroti pentingnya intervensi program yang menyeluruh, mencakup aspek spesifik dan sensitif, yang diimplementasikan secara konvergen, holistik, integratif, dan berkualitas.Kerjasama multisektor, baik tingkat pusat, daerah, maupun desa, menjadi kunci sukses dalam mencapai hasil optimal.“Percepatan penurunan stunting bukanlah tanggung jawab satu pihak saja. Kita membutuhkan dukungan dan bantuan dari semua lapisan masyarakat, termasuk perusahaan, perbankan, dan komponen masyarakat lainnya,” tegas Wakil Bupati.Dengan semangat bersama, Wakil Bupati Banggai berharap agar Kabupaten Banggai dapat menjadi contoh keberhasilan dalam mencapai tujuan percepatan penurunan stunting.Upaya bersama ini diharapkan dapat menciptakan generasi yang lebih sehat, cerdas, dan berdaya saing untuk membangun masa depan yang lebih baik**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Accelerating Stunting Reduction, Deputy Regent of Banggai Chairs Strategic Meeting. In a serious effort to overcome the stunting problem in Banggai Regency, the Deputy Regent of Banggai, Drs. H. Furqanuddin, M.M, chaired and officially opened the 2023 Stunting Foster Fathers/Mothers Strengthening Meeting. This activity was held in the General Meeting Room of the Regional Secretariat of Banggai Regency by the Banggai Regency P2KBP3AK Service. The meeting which was attended by various strategic parties was also attended by the City Danramil representing Dandim 1308 LB , Head of Bappedalitbang Banggai Regency, Head of P2KBP3A and his staff, Chair of TP-PKK Banggai Regency as representative of the Stunting Foster Mother, Head of BPS Banggai Regency, regional apparatus leaders, sub-district head, Head of Prokopim Section of Banggai Regional Secretariat, banking leaders, company leaders. Deputy Regent of Banggai, H Furqanuddin, in his written speech which was read out, said that an important issue in accelerating stunting reduction in the National Action Plan for the Acceleration of Stunting Reduction (RAN PASTI) is program intervention that targets families at risk of stunting, starting from prospective brides, pregnant women, postpartum mothers, to children under five years old. He emphasized that accelerating the reduction of stunting requires concrete efforts through specific and sensitive interventions that are implemented convergently, holistically, integratively and with quality. In this context, multisectoral cooperation between the central government, regional governments and villages is very important. The Deputy Regent also invited all parties, including companies, banks and the general public, to provide support and assistance to make the stunting reduction acceleration program a success in Indonesia, especially in Banggai Regency. With strong collaboration, it is hoped that optimal results can be achieved, making Banggai Regency a examples of success in overcoming stunting. He highlighted the importance of comprehensive program interventions, including specific and sensitive aspects, which are implemented convergently, holistically, integratively and with quality. Multisectoral cooperation, both at the central, regional and village levels, is the key to success in achieving results optimal."Accelerating the reduction of stunting is not the responsibility of just one party. "We need support and assistance from all levels of society, including companies, banks and other components of society," stressed the Deputy Regent. With shared enthusiasm, the Deputy Regent of Banggai hopes that Banggai Regency can become an example of success in achieving the goal of accelerating stunting reduction. This joint effort is expected to create a generation that is healthier, smarter and more competitive to build a better future**

title: Penuhi Layanan Satuan Pendidikan, Disdikbud Banggai Hadirkan Aplikasi Jendela Kordik
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Untuk memenuhi pelayanan terhadap seluruh satuan pendidikan mulai TK,SD dan SMP di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai, Dinas Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (Disdikbud) Kabupaten Banggai menghadirkan aplikasi Jendela Koordinator Pendidikan (Kordik).Sejak 2 bulan lalu, Disdikbud Banggai di bawa pimpinan Syafrudin Hinelo, S.STP, M.Si, melaunching Aplikasi Bonua Data dan Laporan Bulanan (Rudal) yang didalamnya terdapat Jendela Kordik.Aplikasi Rudal ini merupakan media monitoring data satuan pendidikan di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai, disesuaikaan dengan jumlah kecamatan.Hadirnya aplikasi Jendela Kordik ini diharapkan dapat mempercepat pelayanan adminsitrasi dan pendataan satuan pendidikan di Kabupaten Banggai.Demikian disampaikan Kepala Bidang Pembinaan SD, Dinas Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Kabupaten Banggai, Ichwan Amatahir kepada Banggai Raya, Selasa (19/12/2023).“Iya betul ada aplikasi Jendela Kordik. Maksud dan tujuan adalah untuk segala informasi perpanjangan tangan Dinas Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Kabupaten Banggai melalui Aplikasi ini. Aplikasi ini baru ada 2 bulan, karena data kita ada di Rudal yang isi tambahannya adalah Jendela Kordik. Iya, Jendela Kordik diperuntukan bagi guru ASN dan Honorer serta tenaga kependidikan. Iya sesuai dengan sekolah binaan di tingkat kecamatan,” kata Ichwan Amatahir.Sebelumnya, sejumlah guru ASN dan honorer serta tenaga kependidikan tingkat SMP di Luwuk belum memahami akan Aplikasi Jendela Kordik itu. Belum lama ini, para tenaga pendidik di masing-masing satuan pendidikan dimintakan untuk menyetor fotocopi KTP warna.Karena sepengetahuan mereka, kalau untuk guru ASN untuk pemutahiran data hanya menyerahkan Karpet dengan SK.“Kitorang disuruh ba kumpul KTP foto copy warna di Kordik, katanya untuk jendela data. Hanya torang macam ragu, karena selama jadi PNS tidak pernah kalau ada pemutahiran data KTP diminta, hanya Karpet dengan SK. Baru juga, kalo memang untuk itu, kan boleh biar tidak ba foto copy KTP, bikin saja daftar nama PNS, no KTP dan lain2,” kata salah seorang guru yang meminta namanya dirahasiakan.Untuk diketahui, sempat terkirimkan pesan kepada kepala-kepala sekolah untuk mengumpulkan KTP para guru untuk dimasukan ke Jendela Kordik.Seperti ini pesannya, “Disampaikan kepada bapak/ibu kepsek untk segera mengirimkan KTP baik yg ASN maupun yg masih honor dan TENDIK di satuan pendidikan .masing” se lambat” nya hari rabu sdh masuk semua dan kirim dlm bentuk PDF dan nama sekolah krn KORDIK akan segera mengisi data di jendela KORDIK atas kerja sm yg baik di ucapkan terima kasih,”. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-To fulfill services for all educational units starting from Kindergarten, Elementary and Middle School in the Banggai Regency area, the Banggai Regency Education and Culture Service (Disdikbud) has presented the Education Coordinator Window (Kordik) application. Since 2 months ago, the Banggai Disdikbud has been led by Syafrudin Hinelo, S.STP, M.Si, launched the Bonua Data and Monthly Report (Rudal) Application which includes Kordik Window. This Rudal application is a data monitoring medium for educational units in the Banggai Regency area, adjusted to the number of sub-districts. It is hoped that it can speed up administrative services and data collection for educational units in Banggai Regency. This was conveyed by the Head of the Elementary School Development Division, Banggai Regency Education and Culture Service, Ichwan Amatahir to Banggai Raya, Tuesday (19/12/2023). "Yes, it is true that there is a Window Kordik application. The aim and objective is to provide all information as an extension of the Banggai Regency Education and Culture Service through this application. This application has only been around for 2 months, because our data is in Rudal, the additional content of which is Kordik Window. Yes, the Kordik Window is intended for ASN and Honorary teachers as well as education staff. "Yes, it is in accordance with target schools at the sub-district level," said Ichwan Amatahir. Previously, a number of ASN and honorary teachers as well as junior high school level education staff in Luwuk did not understand the Kordik Window Application. Not long ago, teaching staff in each educational unit were asked to deposit a color photocopy of their KTP. Because as far as they know, for ASN teachers to update data, they only hand over carpets with a decree. "We were told to collect color photocopies of our KTP at Kordik, he said. for the data window. Only people are doubtful, because during their time as civil servants they have never been asked to update their KTP data, only Carpet with a Decree. "It's also new, if that's what it's for, it's okay to not take a photocopy of your KTP, just make a list of civil servant names, KTP numbers and so on," said one teacher who asked to remain anonymous. For your information, a message was sent to school principals to collect the KTPs of the teachers to be entered into the Kordik Window. This is the message, "Delivered to the principal to immediately send the KTPs for both ASN and honorary students and TENDIK in their respective educational units" no later than Wednesday, all of them will be received and "Send in PDF form and the name of the school because KORDIK will immediately fill in the data in the KORDIK window. Thank you for your good work." RUM

title: Good Job!! Polisi Ungkap Peredaran Ribuan Pil Koplo di Batui Banggai
text: Batui –Personelpolsek batuipolres banggaiberhasil mengungkap tindak pidana peredaran obat-obatan sediaan farmasi tanpa izin edar di Kecamatan Batui, Selasa (19/12/2023) sekitar pukul 21.30 Wita.Dari pengungkapan yang dipimpin langsungkapolsekBatui AKP Sudirman berhasil mengamankan dua orang perempuan berinisial DA (18) seorang pelajar warga Kelurahan Sisipan dan AR (28), IRT warga Kelurahan Tolando,kabupaten banggai.AKP Sudirman mengungkapkan, pengungkapan ini berawal dari informasi masyarakat yang langasung ditindak lanjuti dengan melakukan serangkaian penyelidikan.“DA dan AR memiliki hubungan pertemanan. Kami mendatangi rumah DA dan melakukan penggeledahan, yang kemudian menemukan tiga botol obat warna putih jenis THD yang tersimpan di tas sekolahnya,” ungkapnya.Dari hasil interogasi, DA ini mengaku jika barang tersebut adalah milik temannya inisial AR yang dititipkan kepadanya.“Kita langsung mengembangkan kasus ini dan berhasil mengamankan kedua pelaku tanpa perlawanan dan mengakui bahwa barang bukti tersebut miliknya,” jelasnya.Dari penangkapan ini, Ia menerangkan, pihaknya berhasil menyita barang bukti 2173 butir obat jenis Trihexypenidyl (THD), tas sekolah warna hitam, dan 1 pack plastic bening.“Saat ini pelaku sudah diamankan di Mapolsek Batui guna pengembangan lebih lanjut,” pungkas Kapolsek
text_en: Batui – Batui police personnel are proud to have succeeded in uncovering a criminal act of distributing pharmaceutical drugs without a distribution permit in Batui District, Tuesday (19/12/2023) at around 21.30 WITA. ) a student resident of Sisipan Village and AR (28), a housewife from Tolando Village, Banggai Regency. AKP Sudirman revealed that this disclosure began with information from the public which was immediately followed up by carrying out a series of investigations. "DA and AR have a friendly relationship. "We went to DA's house and conducted a search, which then found three bottles of white THD medicine stored in his school bag," he said. From the results of the interrogation, DA admitted that the items belonged to his friend with the initials AR who had entrusted them to him. "We immediately developed "he explained. From this arrest, he explained, his party succeeded in confiscating evidence of 2173 Trihexypenidyl (THD) drugs, a black school bag and 1 pack of plastic. clear."Currently the perpetrator has been detained at the Batui Police Headquarters for further development," concluded the Police Chief

title: Satgas Humas OMB Polres Banggai Intensifkan Patroli Cyber Selama Kampanye Pemilu
text: luwuk–Satgas Humas OMB Tinombalapolres banggaiterus melakukan pemantauan terhadap segala aktivitas di media sosial di masa kampanye Pemilu 2024. Hal ini disampaikan oleh Kasatgas Humas IPTU Al Amin S. Muda.“Kami masih dilakukan pemantauan, sejauh ini belum ada pihak yang melaporkan berkaitan UU ITE berkaitan dengan pemilu,” ujarnya, Rabu (20/12/2023).Ia menyampaikan kegiatan ini bertujuan untuk memperkuat langkah-langkah preventif dalam menanggulangi kejahatan pidana di ranah cyber selama masa kampanye Pemilu 2023-2024.“Jadi patroli cyber juga semakin ditingkatkan,” jelasnya.Upaya penyelidikan dan pemantauan media sosial melalui platform-platform seperti Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok, YouTube, Telegram, dan lainnya menjadi fokus utama patroli Cyber.Amin mengatakan, terkadang penelusuran pelanggaran dalam dunia maya tidak hanya berdasarkan patroli semata. Misalnya ada ujaran kebencian, hoaks, atau hal-hal berbau SARA, sering didapat dari aduan masyarakat.Hal ini dilakukan guna mencegah penyebaran berita palsu (hoax) yang berpotensi menimbulkan kerawanan selama masa kampanye Pemilu 2023-2024.Diharapkan langkah-langkah yang diambil Satgas Humas Polres Banggai dapat mencegah dan menekan penyebaran informasi yang tidak benar demi terciptanya pemilu yang damai dan demokratis
text_en: Luwuk–The Tinombalapolres OMB Public Relations Task Force is proud to continue monitoring all activities on social media during the 2024 Election campaign. This was conveyed by the Head of the IPTU Public Relations Task Force Al Amin S. Muda. "We are still monitoring, so far no party has reported anything related to the ITE Law related to the election," he said, Wednesday (20/12/2023). He said that this activity aims to strengthen preventive measures in dealing with criminal crimes in the cyber realm during the 2023-2024 election campaign period. "So cyber patrols are also being increased, " he explained. Efforts to investigate and monitor social media through platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok, YouTube, Telegram and others are the main focus of cyber patrols. Amin said, sometimes tracing violations in cyberspace is not just based on patrols alone. For example, there is hate speech, hoaxes, or things related to SARA, often obtained from complaints from the public. This is done to prevent the spread of fake news (hoaxes) which have the potential to cause insecurity during the 2023-2024 election campaign. It is hoped that the steps taken by the Task Force Banggai Police Public Relations can prevent and suppress the spread of incorrect information in order to create peaceful and democratic elections

title: Tingkatkan Sinergitas, Polres Banggai Hadiri Pemusnahan Barang Bukti di Kejari
text: luwuk–Kaur Bin Ops (KBO)sat reskrimpolres banggaiIPTU Teddy Polii, SH menghadiri pemusnahan barang bukti perkara berbagai tindak pidana di halaman Kantor Kejaksaan Negeri (Kejari) Banggai, Selasa (19/12/2023) sore.Pemusnahan barang bukti tindak kejahatan dipimpin langsung Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai (Kajari) Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono dan dihadiri, unsur Forkopimda, instansi terkait dan para awak media.Adapun barang bukti yang dimusnahkan sebanyak 9 kasus tindak pidana narkotika dengan jenis sabu-sabu total seberat 332,3566 gram dan bong/alat hisab.Dua perkara tindak pidana kesehatan terdiri dari 6177 butir THD dan 15 kosmetika tanpa izin edar. Dan 2 perkara tindak pidana kekerasan terhadap orang dan harta benda berupa parang dan pisau serta 1 kasus tindak pidana umum berupa pakaian dan celana.“Telah dinyatakan berkekuatan hukum tetap (Inkracht) selama kurun waktu bulan September hingga Desember 2023,” ujar KBO Sat Reskrim IPTU Teddy.Ia menjelaskan bahwa pemusnahan barang bukti merupakan salah satu tugas jaksa dalam melaksanakan putusan pengadilan dan juga guna penyelesaian penanganan perkara tindak pidana.“Bahwa Polres Banggai dengan pihak Kejaksaan selalu bersinergi dan saling mendukung. Kekompakan ini akan terus dipertahankan demi terciptanya kamtibmas yang kondusif,” tutupnya
text_en: Luwuk–Kaur Bin Ops (KBO)Sat Reskrimpolres BanggaiIPTU Teddy Polii, SH attended the destruction of evidence in various criminal cases in the yard of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office (Kejari), Tuesday (19/12/2023) afternoon. The destruction of evidence of crimes was led directly Head of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office (Kajari) Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono and attended by elements of Forkopimda, related agencies and media crew. The evidence destroyed was 9 cases of narcotics crimes with a total of 332.3566 grams of crystal methamphetamine and bongs/tools hisab.Two health crime cases consisting of 6177 THD items and 15 cosmetics without distribution permits. And 2 cases of criminal acts of violence against people and property in the form of machetes and knives and 1 case of general crimes in the form of clothes and pants. "They have been declared to have permanent legal force (Inkracht) for the period from September to December 2023," said the IPTU Criminal Investigation Unit KBO Teddy. He explained that the destruction of evidence is one of the prosecutor's duties in implementing court decisions and also in order to resolve the handling of criminal cases. "That the Banggai Police and the Prosecutor's Office always work in synergy and support each other. "This solidarity will continue to be maintained in order to create conducive security and social security," he concluded

title: Akhir Tahun, Kejari Banggai Musnahkan 332,3 Gram Sabu dan Ribuan Pil THD
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Menjelang akhir tahun 2023, Kejaksaan Negeri (Kejari) Banggai kembali melakukan pemusnahan sejumlah barang bukti hasil kejahatan yang perkaranya telah berkekuatan hukum tetap.Pada prosesi pemusnahan yang dilakukan Selasa, 19 Desember 2023, pukul 15.30 WITA bertempat di Kantor Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai, terdapat 332,3 Gram Sabu dan ribuan pil THD serta babuk lain yang dimusnahkan.Berdasarkan siaran pers Kasi Intel Kejari Banggai SarmanSantosa Tandisau, SH, barang bukti yang dimusnahkan terkait tindak pidana umum yang telah berkekuatan hukum tetap (inkracht), yang amar putusannya dirampas untuk dimusnahkan.Kegiatan tersebut dipimpin Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai dan dihadiri Forkopimda Kabupaten Banggai, Ketua Pengadilan Negeri Luwuk dan berbagai lembaga terkait lainnya.Barang bukti yang dimusnahkan berasal dari 15 (lima belas) perkara sebagai berikut, 9 (sembilan) perkara tindak pidana narkotika jenis sabu-sabu seberat 332,3566 dan bong/alat hisap sabu-sabu. Kemudian 2 (dua) perkara tindak pidana kesehatan terdiri dari 6.177 (enam ribu seratus tujuh puluh tujuh) butir Trihexyphenidyl (THD) dan 15 (lima belas ) botol kosmetik tanpa izin edar,2 (dua) perkara tindak pidana kekerasan terhadap orang dan harta benda berupa parang, pisau dan sebagainya, serta 1 (satu) perkara tindak pidana umum lainnya berupa pakaian dan celana.Barang bukti tersebut dimusnahkan dengan cara dibakar, diblender, dilarutkan dengan cairan pembersih lantai dan digerinda hingga tidak dapat digunakan/dimanfaatkan lagi.Kegiatan di akhiri dengan penandatangan berita acara pemusnahan barang bukti oleh pejabat yang hadir. Barang bukti yang dimusnahkan tersebut juga merupakan tindaklanjut arahan pimpinan sebagai upaya mitigasi risiko penyalahgunaan barang bukti utamanya narkotika dan obat-obatan berbahaya di internal Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Towards the end of 2023, the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office (Kejari) will again destroy a number of pieces of evidence resulting from crimes whose cases have permanent legal force. In the destruction process which was carried out on Tuesday, 19 December 2023, at 15.30 WITA at the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office, There were 332.3 grams of crystal methamphetamine and thousands of THD pills and other drugs that were destroyed. Based on a press release from the Head of Intelligence at the Banggai Prosecutor's Office, Sarman Santosa Tandisau, SH, the evidence that was destroyed was related to a general crime that had permanent legal force (inkracht), whose decision was confiscated for destroyed. This activity was led by the Head of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office and attended by the Banggai Regency Forkopimda, the Head of the Luwuk District Court and various other related institutions. The evidence destroyed came from 15 (fifteen) cases as follows, 9 (nine) cases of narcotics crimes such as methamphetamine -shabu weighing 332.3566 and a bong/shabu-sucking device. Then 2 (two) cases of health crimes consisting of 6,177 (six thousand one hundred and seventy seven) Trihexyphenidyl (THD) items and 15 (fifteen) bottles of cosmetics without distribution permits, 2 (two) cases of crimes of violence against people and property in the form of machetes, knives and so on, as well as 1 (one) other general crime case in the form of clothes and trousers. The evidence was destroyed by burning, blending, dissolving it with floor cleaning fluid and grinding it until it could no longer be used/utilized. The activity ended. with the signing of the minutes of destruction of evidence by the officials present. The destroyed evidence was also a follow-up to the leadership's direction as an effort to mitigate the risk of misuse of evidence, especially narcotics and dangerous drugs, within the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office.**

title: Kejari Banggai  Gelar  Pemusnahan Barang Bukti Dan Sosialisasi Mitigasi Risiko Kejahatan
text: KABAR LUWUK  – Kejari Banggai  Gelar  Pemusnahan Barang Bukti dan Sosialisasi Mitigasi Risiko Kejahatan. Kantor Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai menjadi saksi pelaksanaan pemusnahan Barang Bukti Tindak Pidana Umum yang telah memperoleh kekuatan hukum tetap (inkracht) periode September 2023 sampai Desember 2023.Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai, Raden Bagus Wicaksono, SH. M.Hum, memimpin kegiatan ini yang dihadiri oleh berbagai pihak, termasuk Forkopimda Kabupaten Banggai, Ketua Pengadilan Negeri Luwuk, Komandan Pos TNI AL Luwuk, Badan Pengawas Obat dan Makanan (BPOM) Kabupaten Banggai, dan sejumlah pejabat tinggi lainnya. Selasa, 19 Desember 2023, pukul 15.30 WITA.Barang bukti yang menjadi fokus pemusnahan ini berasal dari 15 kasus tindak pidana umum yang berhasil ditangani.Salah satunya adalah 9 kasus Tindak Pidana Narkotika jenis sabu-sabu dengan total seberat 332,3566 gram, dilengkapi dengan bong/alat hisap sabu-sabu.Selain itu, terdapat 2 kasus Tindak Pidana Kesehatan yang melibatkan 6.177 butir Trihexyphenidyl (THD) dan 15 botol kosmetik tanpa izin edar.Selanjutnya, 2 kasus Tindak Pidana Kekerasan Terhadap Orang dan harta benda seperti parang dan pisau, serta 1 kasus Tindak Pidana Umum lainnya yang melibatkan pakaian dan celana.Selanjutnya Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai menyampaikan apresiasinya kepada semua pihak yang turut serta dalam pemusnahan barang bukti ini.Ia menggarisbawahi kolaborasi yang baik antara Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai dengan lembaga dan instansi terkait, termasuk kepolisian, pengadilan, TNI AL, BPOM, lembaga pemasyarakatan, Imigrasi, dan Bea dan Cukai. Kolaborasi ini menjadi bukti konkret bahwa penanganan tindak pidana memerlukan sinergi lintas sektor untuk mencapai keberhasilan yang maksimal.Selain sebagai langkah penegakan hukum yang tegas, pemusnahan barang bukti ini juga merupakan tindaklanjut arahan pimpinan dalam upaya mitigasi risiko penyalahgunaan barang bukti, terutama Narkotika dan obat-obatan berbahaya di internal Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai.Langkah ini menunjukkan komitmen penuh Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai dalam menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban masyarakat serta mencegah potensi penyalahgunaan barang bukti yang dapat merugikan banyak pihak.Proses pemusnahan barang bukti dilakukan secara tuntas dan profesional oleh Kepala Kejaksanaan Negeri Banggai dan timnya.Raden Bagus Wicaksono, SH. M.Hum, menjelaskan bahwa barang bukti tersebut dimusnahkan dengan metode yang sesuai dengan prosedur hukum, seperti dibakar, diblender, dilarutkan dengan cairan pembersih lantai, dan digerinda hingga tidak dapat digunakan atau dimanfaatkan lagi.Tindakan pemusnahan barang bukti ini bukan hanya sekadar prosedur formalitas, melainkan juga sebuah langkah strategis dalam memastikan bahwa barang bukti yang telah memperoleh kekuatan hukum tetap tidak akan kembali beredar di masyarakat atau disalahgunakan.Penting juga dicatat bahwa pemusnahan barang bukti ini merupakan cerminan dari upaya preventif dan penindakan yang bersifat holistik dalam menjaga keamanan masyarakat. Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai tidak hanya fokus pada penuntutan, tetapi juga berkomitmen untuk mencegah munculnya kejahatan baru dengan menghilangkan barang bukti yang berpotensi menciptakan risiko.Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai berharap bahwa tindakan ini tidak hanya menjadi momen sekadar peristiwa, tetapi juga menjadi pembelajaran bagi masyarakat agar semakin sadar akan bahaya tindak pidana dan konsekuensinya. Melalui pemusnahan barang bukti ini, Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai berupaya menciptakan lingkungan yang lebih aman dan berdaya guna bagi masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai.Seiring dengan komitmen Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai dalam memberantas tindak pidana, pemusnahan barang bukti ini diharapkan dapat memberikan dampak positif bagi pemberantasan kejahatan di wilayah tersebut. Tindakan tegas ini juga menjadi momentum untuk merayakan keberhasilan aparat penegak hukum dalam melindungi masyarakat dan menjaga ketertiban sosial.Proses ini diakhiri dengan penandatanganan berita acara pemusnahan barang bukti oleh pejabat yang hadir. ***
text_en: LUWUK KABAR – Proud Prosecutor's Office Holds Evidence Destruction and Crime Risk Mitigation Socialization. The Banggai District Prosecutor's Office witnessed the destruction of General Crime Evidence which had obtained permanent legal force (inkracht) for the period September 2023 to December 2023. Head of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office, Raden Bagus Wicaksono, SH. M.Hum, led this activity which was attended by various parties, including the Banggai Regency Forkopimda, the Head of the Luwuk District Court, the Luwuk Navy Post Commander, the Banggai Regency Food and Drug Monitoring Agency (BPOM), and a number of other high-ranking officials. Tuesday, 19 December 2023, at 15.30 WITA. The evidence that is the focus of this destruction comes from 15 general criminal cases that have been successfully handled. One of them is 9 cases of narcotics crime of the type methamphetamine with a total weight of 332.3566 grams, equipped with bong/shabu-shabu suction device. Apart from that, there were 2 cases of Health Crimes involving 6,177 Trihexyphenidyl (THD) pills and 15 bottles of cosmetics without distribution permits. Furthermore, 2 cases of Crimes of Violence Against People and property such as machetes and knives, as well as 1 other general crime case involving clothes and trousers. Furthermore, the Head of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office expressed his appreciation to all parties who took part in the destruction of this evidence. He underlined the good collaboration between the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office and related institutions and agencies, including the police, courts, TNI AL, BPOM, correctional institutions, Immigration, and Customs and Excise. This collaboration is concrete evidence that handling criminal acts requires cross-sector synergy to achieve maximum success. Apart from being a firm law enforcement step, the destruction of evidence is also a follow-up to the leadership's direction in an effort to mitigate the risk of misuse of evidence, especially narcotics and drugs. dangerous within the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office. This step shows the full commitment of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office in maintaining security and public order and preventing potential misuse of evidence which could harm many parties. The process of destroying evidence was carried out thoroughly and professionally by the Head of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office and his team. Raden Bagus Wicaksono, SH. M.Hum, explained that the evidence was destroyed using methods in accordance with legal procedures, such as burning, blending, dissolving with floor cleaning fluid, and grinding it until it could no longer be used or used. The act of destroying this evidence is not just a formality procedure, but also a strategic step in ensuring that evidence that has obtained legal force will not continue to circulate in the community or be misused. It is also important to note that the destruction of this evidence is a reflection of holistic preventive and enforcement efforts in maintaining public security. The Banggai District Prosecutor's Office is not only focused on prosecution, but is also committed to preventing the emergence of new crimes by eliminating evidence that has the potential to create risk. The Head of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office hopes that this action will not only be a moment of mere incident, but will also be a lesson for the public to become more aware about the dangers of criminal acts and their consequences. Through the destruction of this evidence, the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office is trying to create a safer and more efficient environment for the people of Banggai Regency. In line with the Banggai District Prosecutor's commitment to eradicating criminal acts, it is hoped that the destruction of this evidence will have a positive impact on eradicating crime in the area. This firm action is also a momentum to celebrate the success of law enforcement officers in protecting the community and maintaining social order. This process ends with the signing of the memorandum ofwithholding evidence by officials present. ***

title: Ini Sosok Sandi Kasang Peraih IPK Tertinggi 3,97 di Wisuda Unismuh Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Sandi Kasang S.Pd., menjadi salah satu lulusan terbaik di Wisuda Angkatan 21 Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk, Senin 18 Desember 2023.Meraih IPK 3,97, menempatkan Sandi Kasang di posisi pertama di Prodinya yakni Prodi Pendidikan Jasmani Kesehatan dan Rekreasi.Tidak hanya di Prodinya, Sandi Kasang juga sukses menjadi peraih IPK tertinggi se Unismuh Luwuk. Ia berhasil mengalahkan 14 lulusan terbaik lainnya dari masing-masing prodi.Meraih IPK 3, 97, ini sosok dan profil lengkap Sandi Kasang S.Pd., lulusan Prodi Penjaskesrek Fakultas Keguruan dan Ilmu Pendidikan.Sandi Kasang, lahir di Tataba, Kabupaten Banggai Kepulauan, 3 Agustus 1999.Ia anak kedua dari dua bersaudara dari pasangan Ayah Tajudin Kasang Ibu Haena Ente.Motto yang dipegang dalam menjalani kuliah selama 4 tahun di kampus hijau, Sandi Kasang mengusung ‘Kejarlah mimpimu dengan usaha dan doa, karena doa tanpa usaha hanyalah sia-sia sedangkan usaha tanpa doa adalah suatu kesombongan’.Meraih IPK 3, 97 dan menjadi yang paling tertinggi di Unismuh Luwuk, Sandi Kasang mengaku tak menduga atas capaian yang diraihnya.“Tentunya sangat bersyukur dengan hasil yang dicapai ini,” ucapnya.Adapun tips hingga sukses meraih IPK 3, 97 dengan predikat Cumlaude, ini tips dari Sandi Kasang untuk mahasiswa.“Untuk tips mungkin harus tetap berjuang dan berusaha sekuat mungkin meskipun banyak rintangan yang harus dilalui. Intinya harus terus berjuang dan berdoa,” katanya.Berhasil menjadi lulusan terbaik, Sandi Kasang bersama 14 lulusan terbaik lainnya menerima piagam penghargaan dan reward.“Setelah lulus ini, rencana mau langsung kerja,” tandasnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Sandi Kasang S.Pd., became one of the best graduates at Graduation Class 21 of Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk, Monday 18 December 2023. Achieving a GPA of 3.97, placing Sandi Kasang in first position in his study program, namely the Health and Physical Education Study Program and Recreation. Not only in his study program, Sandi Kasang was also successful in becoming the highest GPA achiever in Unismuh Luwuk. He managed to beat 14 other best graduates from each study program. Achieving a GPA of 3.97, this is the complete figure and profile of Sandi Kasang S.Pd., a graduate of the Physical Education and Physical Education Study Program, Faculty of Teacher Training and Education. Sandi Kasang, was born in Tataba, Banggai Islands Regency , August 3 1999. He is the second of two children of Father Tajudin Kasang, Mrs Haena Ente. The motto he adhered to while studying for 4 years at the green campus, Sandi Kasang carried 'Chase your dreams with effort and prayer, because prayer without effort is just in vain "It's futile while effort without prayer is arrogance." Achieving a GPA of 3.97 and being the highest at Unismuh Luwuk, Sandi Kasang admitted that he did not expect the achievements he achieved. "Of course he is very grateful for the results achieved," he said. As for the tips to successfully achieve a GPA of 3.97 with Cumlaude predicate, here are tips from Sandi Kasang for students. "For tips, maybe you have to keep fighting and try as hard as possible even though there are many obstacles that you have to overcome. "The point is, you have to keep fighting and praying," he said. Having succeeded in becoming the best graduate, Sandi Kasang and 14 other best graduates received certificates of appreciation and rewards. "After graduating, the plan is to go straight to work," he said. (*)

title: Jadi Mitra JOB Tomori, Unismuh Luwuk Kelola Rp7,7 Miliar Program Pemberdayaan Masyarakat
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk terus konsisten dalam kegiatan penelitian dan pengabdian serta pemberdayaan masyarakat.Upaya konsisten itu pun membuahkan hasil, di mana kampus hijau memperoleh hibah dari Dikti mapun non Dikti.Antara lain Riset Muhammadiyah yang mana sejak 2022 sampai 2023, menghasilkan 6 hibah penelitian dan 7 hibah pengabdian.Tidak hanya itu, melalui mitra kerja Perusahaan JOB Tomori Pertamina Medco E&P Sulawesi, Unismuh Luwuk mendapatkan kepercayaan untuk mengelolah kegiatan Program Pemberdayaan Masyarakat dengan pendanaan sebesar Rp7,7 Miliar.Hal itu diungkapkan Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., dalam sambutan akademiknya di momen wisuda Angkatan 21, Senin 18 Desember 2023.Di samping itu, Rektor mengemukakan beberapa mahasiswanya juga berhasil menerima hibah Program Kreativitas Mahasiswa (PKM). (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk continues to be consistent in research and service activities as well as community empowerment. These consistent efforts have also yielded results, where the green campus received grants from Dikti and non-Dikti. Among other things, Muhammadiyah Research, which from 2022 to 2023, resulting in 6 research grants and 7 service grants. Not only that, through the company's partner JOB Tomori Pertamina Medco E&P Sulawesi, Unismuh Luwuk received the trust to manage Community Empowerment Program activities with funding of IDR 7.7 billion. This was stated by the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. . Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., in his academic speech at the Graduation Moment for Class 21, Monday 18 December 2023. Apart from that, the Chancellor stated that several of his students had also succeeded in receiving Student Creativity Program (PKM) grants. (*)
