title: Dinas Sosial Banggai Gelar Program BANTU Tahap Kedua 2023
text: “Bupati Amirudin Serahkan Bantuan Tunai Untuk Pengentasan Kemiskinan“KABAR LUWUK  –Dinas Sosial BanggaiGelarProgram BANTUTahap Kedua 2023.Dinas Sosial Kabupaten Banggaikembali menggerakkan Program BANTU tahap kedua tahun 2023, menyentuh 1.181keluarga penerima manfaat (KPM)di wilayah tersebut. Bupati Banggai, Amirudin, secara simbolis menyerahkan bantuan tunai pada Senin (18/12/2023) diKantor Bank Sulteng Cabang Luwuk.Program BANTU,yang merupakan inisiatifPemerintah Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah,bertujuan untuk mengurangi beban pengeluaran keluarga miskin dalam memenuhi kebutuhan sehari-hari.Dalam serah terima bantuan tersebut, Bupati Amirudin berharap agar dana yang diberikan dapat dimanfaatkan sebaik mungkin untuk mendukung kehidupan sehari-hari keluarga penerima manfaat.Selain memberikan bantuan tunai, Bupati Amirudin juga memberikan penghargaan kepada para penerima manfaat yang telah berhasil mengembangkan usaha melalui Program Bantuan Kelompok Usaha Bersama (KUBE) dan Usaha Ekonomi Produktif (UEP).Keberhasilan ini menjadi bukti nyata bahwa bantuan yang diberikan tidak hanya bersifat sekadar jangka pendek, tetapi juga mendorong pemberdayaan ekonomi masyarakat.Dalam sambutannya, Bupati Amirudin menekankan pentingnya kolaborasi antara pemerintah dan masyarakat dalam upaya mengentaskan kemiskinan.Ia berharap agar program-program bantuan tersebut dapat menjadi motivasi bagi masyarakat penerima manfaat untuk meningkatkan keterampilan dan mengembangkan potensi ekonomi yang dimiliki.Ungkapnya.Menurut Kepala Bidang Penanganan Fakir Miskin Dinsos Banggai, Ronal Putje, setiap KPM dari program BANTU menerima bantuan sebesar Rp1 juta.Ronal Putje, menambahkan bahwa seleksi penerima bantuan dilakukan secara cermat berdasarkan Data Terpadu Kesejahteraan Sosial (DTKS). Hal ini bertujuan untuk memastikan bahwa bantuan yang disalurkan tepat sasaran dan memberikan manfaat maksimal bagi keluarga penerima manfaatSementara itu, dari KUBE UEP, bantuan yang disalurkan mencapai Rp10 juta. Penerima bantuan ini adalah masyarakat yang terdata di Data Terpadu Kesejahteraan Sosial (DTKS) dan tidak menerima bantuan dari program pemerintah lainnya.Dua program bantuan pengentasan kemiskinan dari Pemerintah Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah ini diluncurkan serentak di 13 kabupaten/kota se-Sulawesi Tengah pada Senin (18/12/2023), melalui Bank Sulteng di wilayah masing-masing.Pada hari pertama penyaluran, BANTU diserahkan kepada 306 KPM di Kecamatan Luwuk, dengan rencana penyaluran ke kecamatan lainnya dalam beberapa hari ke depan.Program ini diharapkan dapat memberikan dampak positif dalam meningkatkan kesejahteraan masyarakat penerima manfaat di Kabupaten Banggai.Bukan hanya BANTU, namun Dinas Sosial Banggai juga menyalurkan bantuan melalui Program Bantuan Kelompok Usaha Bersama (KUBE) dan Usaha Ekonomi Produktif (UEP) kepada 6 KPM di 3 kecamatan, yaitu Nambo, Luwuk Selatan, dan Pagimana.Program BANTU dan bantuan melalui KUBE dan UEP tidak hanya berfokus pada pemberian dana, tetapi juga memberikan pendampingan dan pelatihan kepada para penerima manfaat.Dengan pendekatan ini, diharapkan masyarakat dapat mengoptimalkan penggunaan bantuan untuk meningkatkan kesejahteraan jangka panjang.Selain itu, kegiatan serah terima bantuan yang dilakukan di Kantor Bank Sulteng Cabang Luwuk juga menunjukkan transparansi dalam proses penyaluran bantuan.Hal ini menjadi langkah positif dalam membangun kepercayaan masyarakat terhadap program-program bantuan yang dilaksanakan oleh pemerintah.Dengan adanya Program BANTU tahap kedua tahun 2023 dan bantuan melalui KUBE dan UEP, diharapkan Kabupaten Banggai dapat mencapai progres signifikan dalam mengurangi angka kemiskinan dan meningkatkan kesejahteraan masyarakat secara keseluruhan.Program ini menjadi contoh nyata upaya pemerintah daerah dalam menjawab tantangan sosial dan ekonomi guna menciptakan masyarakat yang lebih sejahtera. **
text_en: "Regent Amirudin Hands Over Cash Assistance for Poverty Alleviation" LUWUK KABAR – Banggai Social Service Holds Second Phase of BANTUT Program 2023. Banggai Regency Social Service is again running the second phase of BANTU Program in 2023, touching 1,181 beneficiary families (KPM) in the area. The Regent of Banggai, Amirudin, symbolically handed over cash assistance on Monday (18/12/2023) at the Bank Sulteng Luwuk Branch Office. The BANTU program, which is an initiative of the Central Sulawesi Provincial Government, aims to reduce the burden of spending on poor families in meeting their daily needs. In handing over the aid, Regent Amirudin hopes that the funds provided can be used as well as possible to support the daily lives of the beneficiary families. Apart from providing cash assistance, Regent Amirudin also gave awards to the beneficiaries who have succeeded in developing businesses through the Business Group Assistance Program Together (KUBE) and Productive Economic Enterprises (UEP). This success is clear evidence that the assistance provided is not only short-term, but also encourages community economic empowerment. In his speech, Regent Amirudin emphasized the importance of collaboration between the government and the community in efforts to alleviate poverty. He hopes that these aid programs can be a motivation for the beneficiary communities to improve their skills and develop their economic potential. He said. According to the Head of the Poverty Handling Division of the Banggai Social Service, Ronal Putje, each KPM from the BANTU program receives assistance of IDR 1 million.Ronal Putje, added that the selection of aid recipients was carried out carefully based on Integrated Social Welfare Data (DTKS). This aims to ensure that the aid distributed is right on target and provides maximum benefits for the beneficiary families. Meanwhile, from KUBE UEP, the aid distributed reached IDR 10 million. The recipients of this assistance are people who are recorded in the Integrated Social Welfare Data (DTKS) and do not receive assistance from other government programs. Two poverty alleviation assistance programs from the Central Sulawesi Provincial Government were launched simultaneously in 13 districts/cities throughout Central Sulawesi on Monday (18 /12/2023), through Bank Sulteng in their respective regions. On the first day of distribution, BANTU was handed over to 306 KPM in Luwuk District, with plans for distribution to other sub-districts in the next few days. This program is expected to have a positive impact in improving welfare of the beneficiary communities in Banggai Regency. Not only BANTU, but the Banggai Social Service also distributed aid through the Joint Business Group Assistance Program (KUBE) and Productive Economic Enterprises (UEP) to 6 KPM in 3 sub-districts, namely Nambo, South Luwuk, and Pagimana .The BANTU and assistance programs through KUBE and UEP do not only focus on providing funds, but also provide assistance and training to the beneficiaries. With this approach, it is hoped that the community can optimize the use of aid to improve long-term welfare. In addition, aid handover activities which was carried out at the Bank Sulteng Luwuk Branch Office also showed transparency in the process of distributing aid. This is a positive step in building public trust in aid programs implemented by the government. With the second phase of the BANTU Program in 2023 and aid through KUBE and UEP, It is hoped that Banggai Regency can achieve significant progress in reducing poverty rates and improving the welfare of society as a whole. This program is a concrete example of regional government efforts in responding to social and economic challenges to create a more prosperous society. **

title: Stok BBM Nataru di Banggai Aman
text: BANGGAI RAYA-PT Pertamina Patra Niaga Fuel Terminal Luwuk memastikan stok bahan bakar minyak (BBM) di Kabupaten Banggai menyambut natal dan tahun baru (Nataru) dalam keadaan aman.Manager Fuel Terminal Luwuk Hirohim kepada wartawan, Kamis (28/12/2023) mengatakan, Pertamina telah memastikan ketersediaan bahan bakar minyak guna memenuhi kebutuhan warga saat perayaan natal hingga tahun baru.Sejauh ini kata dia, tidak ada laporan kelangkaan BBM, sebab Pertamina telah melakukan antisipasi terkait momen hari besar keagamaan dan liburan. “Intinya ketersediaan BBM terjamin hingga tahun baru nanti,” tegasnya. DAR
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-PT Pertamina Patra Niaga Fuel Terminal Luwuk ensures that fuel oil (BBM) stocks in Banggai Regency welcome Christmas and New Year (Nataru) in a safe condition. Luwuk Fuel Terminal Manager Hirohim told reporters, Thursday (28/12/2023) said , Pertamina has ensured the availability of fuel oil to meet the needs of residents during Christmas and New Year celebrations. So far, he said, there have been no reports of fuel shortages, because Pertamina has anticipated religious holidays and holidays. "The point is that fuel availability is guaranteed until the new year," he stressed. DAR

title: Wujudkan Kampanye Damai, Satgas OMB Polres Banggai Amankan 30 Lokasi Kampanye
text: luwuk–Dalam rangka menjaga kondusifitas keamanan dan ketertiban masyarakat masa Kampanye Pemilu 2023-2024, Satuan Tugas Operasi Mantap Brata Tinombala 2023-2024polres banggaimelaksanakan pengamanan di 30 titik lokasi kampanye di wilayah hukumnya.Sebanyak 144 personel Satgas OMB dilibatkan untuk pengamanan kampanye pada 30 lokasi kampanye seperti di Kecamatan Lobu yakni di Desa Balean, Desa Niubulan, Desa Kadodi, Desa Bolobungkang serta di Kecamatan Toili Barat bertempat di Desa Kamiwangi.Kemudian di Luwuk Timur bertempat di Dusun I dan Dusun III Desa Louk. Kecamatan Lamala di Desa Nipa, Desa Bonebobakal, Desa Bahari Makmur, Kecamatan Mantoh di Desa Sobol dan Kecamatan Pagimana di Desa Jayabakti.Selanjutnya di Kecamatan Balantak Selatan yakni Desa Tombos dan Desa Sepe, Kecamatan Bunta yakni Kelurahan Bunta I dan Desa Bohotokong, Kecamatan Luwuk di Kelurahan Bungin, Bungin Timur, dan Desa Lumpoknyo, Kecamatan Toili di Desa Rusa Kencana, serta Kecamatan Nambo di Desa Koyoan dan Kelurahan Lontio.Untuk Luwuk Selatan di Kelurahan Tombang Permai kemudian di Kecamatan Bualemo di Desa Trans Mayayap, Desa Mayayap, Desa Toiba, dan Dusun I dan II Desa Lembah Tompotika .Kasatgas Humas OMB Tinombala 2023-2024 Polres Banggai IPTU Al Amin S. Muda mengatakan bahwa setiap harinya rutin kesiapsiagaan personel OMB untuk mengamankan sehingga tidak ada potensi gangguan yang tidak diinginkan. Rabu, (27/12/2023).“Ada 30 lokasi Kampanye Legislatif ini seluruhnya tatap muka dari berbagai Partai Politik maupun dapil”, ucapnya.“Satgas baik Intelkam, Preventif, Gakkum, Kamseltibcar, Banops dan Satgas wilayah Polsek Jajaran turun mengamankan sesuai tugas pokok masing-masing”, tukas IPTU Amin
text_en: Luwuk–In order to maintain conducive security and public order during the 2023-2024 Election Campaign, the 2023-2024 Mantap Brata Tinombala Police Operation Task Force is proud to carry out security at 30 campaign locations in its jurisdiction. A total of 144 OMB Task Force personnel were involved in campaign security at 30 campaign locations. such as in Lobu District, namely in Balean Village, Niubulan Village, Kadodi Village, Bolobungkang Village and in West Toili District it is located in Kamiwangi Village. Then in East Luwuk it is located in Hamlet I and Hamlet III, Louk Village. Lamala District in Nipa Village, Bonebobakal Village, Bahari Makmur Village, Mantoh District in Sobol Village and Pagimana District in Jayabakti Village. Next in South Balantak District namely Tombos Village and Sepe Village, Bunta District namely Bunta I Village and Bohotokong Village, Luwuk District in Bungin Subdistrict, East Bungin, and Lumpoknyo Village, Toili Subdistrict in Rusa Kencana Village, as well as Nambo Subdistrict in Koyoan Village and Lontio Subdistrict. For South Luwuk in Tombang Permai Subdistrict then in Bualemo Subdistrict in Trans Mayayap Village, Mayayap Village, Toiba Village, and Hamlet I and II Lembah Tompotika Village. Head of the Tinombala OMB Public Relations Task Force 2023-2024 Banggai IPTU Police Al Amin S. Muda said that every day OMB personnel are routinely prepared to provide security so that there is no potential for unwanted disturbances. Wednesday, (27/12/2023). "There are 30 locations for this Legislative Campaign, all of which are face to face from various political parties and electoral districts," he said. their respective main tasks," said IPTU Amin

title: Kapolres Banggai Tinjau Pos Pam Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023, Kesiapan dan Tali Asih untuk Personil Gabungan
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Kapolres BanggaiTinjau Pos PamOperasi Lilin Tinombala 2023,Kesiapan dan Tali Asih untuk Personil Gabungan.Kapolres Banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MMmelakukan peninjauan di beberapaPos Pengamanan (Pos Pam)guna memastikan kesiapan personil gabungan menjelang pelaksanaan Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023.Peninjauan dilakukan pada H+3 perayaan Natal di titik-titik strategis, termasuk Pos Pengamanan Polsek Kintom di Desa Solan, Pos Pengamanan Polsek Toili di Unit II Desa Tirta Kencana, dan Pos Pengamanan Polsek Batui di depan Terminal.Kamis (28/12/2023),Dalam peninjauannya, Kapolres Banggai menegaskan bahwa pendirian pos-pos tersebut bertujuan untuk melayani masyarakat dalam menghadapi arus mudik atau arus balik liburan Natal dan kegiatan masyarakat lainnya.Kapolres juga memberikan instruksi kepada personil di setiap pos untuk melengkapi kekurangan, terutama sarana yang digunakan dalam memberikan pelayanan kepada masyarakat.AKBP Ade, didampingi Kasat Lantas AKP I Made Bagus Aditya, tak hanya memeriksa kesiapan pos-pos pengamanan, namun juga memberikan tali asih berupa minuman kesehatan kepada personil gabungan di setiap pos.“Semoga bingkisan ini dapat menunjang tugas anggota yang berjaga di pos selama pelaksanaan Operasi Lilin ini,” ungkap Kapolres.Selain itu, Kapolres Banggai menghimbau para petugas gabungan untuk terus bersinergi dalam melaksanakan tugas pengamanan demi terciptanya situasi aman dan kondusif di Kabupaten Banggai, khususnya selama pelaksanaan Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023.Himbauan ini sejalan dengan upaya pihak kepolisian dalam menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban masyarakat selama periode liburan Natal dan Tahun Baru.Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023 sendiri merupakan bagian dari upaya kepolisian untuk meningkatkan keamanan selama musim liburan, terutama mengantisipasi potensi gangguan keamanan seperti tindak kriminal dan kecelakaan lalu lintas.Dengan peninjauan langsung dan tali asih yang diberikan kepada personil, diharapkan operasi ini dapat berjalan dengan lancar dan memberikan rasa aman kepada masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai. **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Police Chief Reviews Pam Posts for the 2023 Tinombala Lilin Operation, Readiness and Compassion for Joint Personnel. Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM conducted an inspection at several Security Posts (Pos Pam) to ensure the readiness of joint personnel ahead of the 2023 Tinombala Lilin Operation. The inspection was carried out on H+3 of the Christmas celebration at strategic points, including the Kintom Police Security Post in Solan Village, the Toili Police Security Post in Unit II Tirta Kencana Village, and the Batui Police Security Post in front of the Terminal. Thursday (28/12/2023 ),In his review, the Banggai Police Chief emphasized that the establishment of these posts aims to serve the community in facing homecoming or backflow during the Christmas holidays and other community activities. The Police Chief also gave instructions to personnel at each post to make up for deficiencies, especially the facilities used in providing services to the community. AKBP Ade, accompanied by Head of Traffic Unit AKP I Made Bagus Aditya, not only checked the readiness of the security posts, but also provided compassion in the form of health drinks to joint personnel at each post. "Hopefully this gift can support the duties of the members who stand guard at the post during the implementation of Operation Lilin," said the Police Chief. Apart from that, the Banggai Police Chief appealed to joint officers to continue to work together in carrying out security duties in order to create a safe and conducive situation in Banggai Regency, especially during the implementation of Operation Lilin Tinombala 2023. This appeal is in line with with the police's efforts to maintain security and public order during the Christmas and New Year holidays. Operation Candle Tinombala 2023 itself is part of the police's efforts to improve security during the holiday season, especially anticipating potential security disturbances such as criminal acts and traffic accidents. With a review directly and the compassion given to personnel, it is hoped that this operation can run smoothly and provide a sense of security to the people of Banggai Regency. **

title: Antrian Panjang di Polres Banggai untuk Urus SKCK dan Sidik Jari
text: KABAR LUWUK  -Antrian Panjang diPolres Banggaiuntuk UrusSKCKdanSidik Jari.  Sejak dua hari terakhir, ruangan pelayanan SKCK dan Sidik Jari di Polres Banggai menjadi pusat perhatian masyarakat.Antusiasme ini terutama berasal dari para tenaga kesehatan yang baru saja dinyatakan lulus sebagai pegawai pemerintah dengan perjanjian kerja (P3K) setelahperayaan Natal 2023.MenurutKasi Humas Polres Banggai, IPTU Al Amin S. Muda,kantor polisi tersebut telah menjadi destinasi rutin bagi warga setempat.“Kemarin hingga hari ini Polres Banggai ramai dikunjungi, sekitar seratusan orang perharinya, untuk mengurus SKCK maupun Sidik Jari,” ujar Al Amin.Dokumen yang dibutuhkan untuk proses pembuatan SKCK pun dijelaskan oleh Al Amin. Calon pemohon diharuskan menyediakan fotokopi KTP, fotokopi akta kelahiran atau surat kenal lahir atau ijazah atau surat nikah (pilih salah satu), fotokopi Kartu Keluarga (KK), dan sidik jari.Selain itu, pas foto 4×6 sebanyak 6 lembar dengan latar belakang merah, menggunakan pakaian sopan dan berkerah, menjadi syarat wajib. Bagi yang menggunakan hijab, wajah harus tampak secara utuh.Adapun jam operasional pelayanan di Polres Banggai adalah pada hari kerja, Senin-Jumat, mulai pukul 08.00 WITA hingga 15.00 WITA.Meskipun demikian, jumlah masyarakat yang berduyun-duyun untuk mendapatkan layanan kepolisian tidak membuat pelayanan menjadi terhambat. Al Amin menegaskan,“Perintah Pimpinan untuk tetap memberikan pelayanan prima kepada masyarakat, meskipun membludaknya minat masyarakat untuk mendapatkan pelayanan kepolisian.”Untuk memperoleh SKCK, masyarakat juga perlu mempersiapkan biaya sebesar Rp. 30.000 untuk penerimaan negara bukan pajak (PNBP).Meski ada biaya terkait, hal ini tidak mengurangi semangat masyarakat, terutama para tenaga kesehatan, untuk memenuhi persyaratan administratif yang dibutuhkan.Antusiasme ini mencerminkan pentingnya SKCK dalam kehidupan sehari-hari masyarakat, terutama bagi para pekerja yang baru saja memasuki dunia kerja.Dengan penuh semangat, masyarakat terus mendatangi Polres Banggai guna memastikan dokumen-dokumen mereka lengkap, sehingga mereka dapat melanjutkan perjalanan karier mereka dengan aman dan terpercaya.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS - Long queue at the Banggai Police to take care of SKCK and Fingerprints. Since the last two days, the SKCK and Fingerprint service room at the Banggai Police has become the center of public attention. This enthusiasm mainly comes from health workers who have just been declared graduates as government employees with work agreements (P3K) after the Christmas 2023 celebration. According to the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, IPTU Al Amin S. Muda, the police station has become a routine destination for local residents. "Yesterday until today the Banggai Police Station was busy with visitors, around hundreds of people per day, to take care of SKCK and Fingerprints," said Al Amin. Documents needed for the process Al Amin also explained the making of SKCK. Prospective applicants are required to provide a photocopy of KTP, photocopy of birth certificate or birth certificate or diploma or marriage certificate (choose one), photocopy of Family Card (KK), and fingerprints. Apart from that, 6 4×6 passport photos with background red, wearing polite and collared clothes, are mandatory requirements. For those who wear the hijab, the face must be fully visible. The operational hours of service at the Banggai Police are on weekdays, Monday-Friday, from 08.00 WITA to 15.00 WITA. However, the number of people who flock to get police services does not make service is hampered. Al Amin emphasized, "The leadership's order is to continue to provide excellent service to the community, despite the increasing public interest in obtaining police services." To obtain SKCK, the community also needs to prepare a fee of Rp. 30,000 for non-tax state revenue (PNBP). Even though there are associated costs, this does not reduce the enthusiasm of the community, especially health workers, to fulfill the necessary administrative requirements. This enthusiasm reflects the importance of SKCK in people's daily lives, especially for workers who have just entered the world of work. With enthusiasm, people continue to come to the Banggai Police to ensure that their documents are complete, so that they can continue their career journey safely and reliably.**

title: Lulus PPPK, Pemohon SKCK dan Sidik Jari di Polres Banggai Membludak
text: luwuk–Sejak dua hari ini ruangan pelayanan SKCK dan Sidik Jaripolres banggaidari mulai pukul 08.00 Wita terpantau ramai di kunjungi oleh masyarakat, Kamis (28/12/2023).Selepas perayaan Natal 2023, warga yang ramai mengunjungi Polres Banggai tersebut merupakan tenaga kesehatan yang dinyatakan lulus pegawai pemerintah dengan perjanjian kerja (P3K).“Kemarin hingga hari ini Polres Banggai ramai dikunjungi, sekitar seratusan orang perharinya, untuk mengurus SKCK maupun Sidik Jari” Kata Kasi Humas Polres Banggai IPTU Al Amin S. Muda.Ia menjelaskan dokumen yang perlu disiapkan untuk pembuatan SKCK yakni Foto copy KTP, Foto copy akta kelahiran atau surat kenal lahir atau ijazah atau surat nikah (Pilih salah satu), Foto copy Kartu Keluarga (KK), Sidik Jari.Selanjutnya Pas foto 4×6 sebanyak 6 lembar dengan latar belakang merah dengan menggunakan pakaian sopan dan berkerah, muka harus tampak dan jika menggunakan hijab, wajah harus tampak secara utuh.Jam operasional pelayanan di Polres Banggai, yaitu hari kerja Senin-Jumat pukul 08.00 WITA sampai dengan 15.00 WITA. Serta biaya penerbitan SKCK di Polres Banggai yakni sebesar Rp. 30.000 untuk penerimaan negara bukan pajak (PNBP).“Perintah Pimpinan untuk tetap memberikan pelayanan prima kepada masyarakat, meskipun membludaknya minat masyarakat untuk mendapatkan pelayanan kepolisian,” pungkas Kasi Humas
text_en: Luwuk–For the past two days, the SKCK and Fingerprint Service Room at the Banggai Police Station has been observed to be busy with visits from the public, Thursday (28/12/2023). Graduated as a government employee with a work agreement (P3K). "Yesterday and today the Banggai Police were busy with visitors, around a hundred people per day, to take care of SKCK and Fingerprints," said the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, IPTU Al Amin S. Muda. He explained the documents that needed to be prepared for making SKCK, namely photocopy of KTP, photocopy of birth certificate or birth certificate or diploma or marriage certificate (choose one), photocopy of family card (KK), fingerprints. Next, 6 pieces of 4×6 photo with background. red, wearing polite and collared clothing, the face must be visible and if wearing a hijab, the face must be fully visible. Operational hours for services at the Banggai Police Station are working days Monday-Friday, 08.00 WITA to 15.00 WITA. And the cost of issuing SKCK at the Banggai Police is IDR. 30,000 for non-tax state revenue (PNBP). "Leadership orders to continue to provide excellent service to the community, despite the increasing public interest in obtaining police services," concluded the Head of Public Relations

title: Bupati Banggai Laut Ikuti Uji Kompetensi Pimpinan Tinggi Pratama untuk Peningkatan Kinerja
text: KABAR LUWUK –Bupati Banggai LautIkuti Uji Kompetensi Pimpinan Tinggi Pratama untuk Peningkatan Kinerja.Bupati Banggai Laut, Sofyan Kaepa, SH, hadir dalam kegiatanUji Kesesuaian (Job Fit)dan Uji Kompetensi JabatanPimpinan Tinggi PratamadiKantor BKPSDMDpada Rabu hingga Kamis (27-28/12/2023).Kehadiran Bupati Kaepa menandai komitmen Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai Laut untuk memastikan perencanaan, pendapatan, dan pengelolaan SDM di lingkungan pemerintah setempat dilakukan secara terukur dan sistematis.Kamis, 28 Desember 2023.Uji Kompetensi Jabatan Tinggi Pratama merupakan langkah strategis untuk memastikan bahwa pejabat pimpinan tinggi pratama (Eselon II) memiliki kemampuan dan kompetensi yang sesuai dengan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya.Melalui kegiatan ini, diharapkan pejabat yang menempati posisi tersebut dapat menjalankan tugas dengan profesional, penuh dedikasi, amanah, dan akuntabel terhadap masyarakat, bangsa, dan negara.Hasil dari Uji Kesesuaian menunjukkan bahwa inovasi dan perubahan diperlukan dalam struktur kepemimpinan.Dengan demikian, penempatan pejabat yang memiliki kompetensi dan disiplin ilmu yang sesuai dengan jabatannya menjadi krusial.Hal ini diharapkan dapat menghasilkan pemikiran dan inovasi-inovasi yang berkontribusi positif untuk pembangunan Kabupaten Banggai Laut.Bupati Sofyan Kaepa menyampaikan harapannya bahwa setelah terselenggaranya uji kompetensi jabatan pimpinan tinggi pratama, para pejabat akan mampu memberikan kontribusi maksimal.Mereka diharapkan dapat menunjukkan peran strategis sebagai inisiator dan pengambil keputusan di lingkungan kerja masing-masing, serta memberikan kontribusi signifikan untuk pembangunan di Pemerintahan Banggai Laut.“Peningkatan kualitas SDM di tingkat pimpinan sangat penting untuk mencapai tujuan pembangunan yang berkelanjutan.Dengan adanya uji kompetensi ini, kita ingin memastikan bahwa para pejabat pimpinan tinggi pratama memiliki kemampuan dan kompetensi yang diperlukan untuk membawa perubahan positif bagi Kabupaten Banggai Laut,” kata Bupati Kaepa.Uji Kesesuaian dan Uji Kompetensi ini tidak hanya menjadi langkah evaluasi internal, tetapi juga sebagai upaya transparan dan akuntabel dalam pengelolaan sumber daya manusia di lingkungan pemerintah.Semoga hasil dari kegiatan ini dapat memberikan dorongan positif untuk pengembangan potensi para pejabat dan menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang dinamis dan inovatif di Kabupaten Banggai Laut. (RSM) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – The Regent of Banggai Laut took the Pratama High Leadership Competency Test to Improve Performance. The Regent of Banggai Laut, Sofyan Kaepa, SH, attended the Job Fit Test and Competency Test for Pratama High Leadership Positions at the BKPSDMD Office on Wednesday to Thursday (27-28/12/2023 ).The presence of Regent Kaepa marks the commitment of the Banggai Laut Regency Government to ensure that planning, revenue and human resource management within the local government is carried out in a measurable and systematic manner. Thursday, December 28 2023. The Pratama High Position Competency Test is a strategic step to ensure that high leadership officials pratama (Echelon II) has the abilities and competencies in accordance with their duties and responsibilities. Through this activity, it is hoped that officials who occupy these positions can carry out their duties professionally, with dedication, trustworthiness and accountability towards the community, nation and state. Results from The Conformity Test shows that innovation and change are needed in the leadership structure. Thus, the placement of officials who have the competence and scientific discipline appropriate to their position is crucial. This is expected to produce ideas and innovations that contribute positively to the development of Banggai Laut Regency. Regent Sofyan Kaepa expressed his hope that after holding the pratama high leadership competency test, officials will be able to make maximum contributions. They are expected to be able to demonstrate their strategic role as initiators and decision makers in their respective work environments, as well as make significant contributions to development in the Banggai Laut Government "Improving the quality of human resources at the leadership level is very important to achieve sustainable development goals. With this competency test, we want to ensure that high level pratama leadership officials have the abilities and competencies needed to bring positive change to Banggai Laut Regency," said the Regent. Kaepa. This Conformity Test and Competency Test is not only an internal evaluation step, but also a transparent and accountable effort in managing human resources within the government. Hopefully the results of this activity can provide positive encouragement for developing the potential of officials and creating a work environment that is dynamic and innovative in Banggai Laut Regency. (RSM) **

title: Peduli Penanganan Stunting, FT Pertamina Luwuk Bantu Peralatan Posyandu di Lumpoknyo dan Bungin Timur
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Sebagai wujud kepedulian pada wilayah di sekitar, Fuel Terminal (Terminal Bahan Bakar) Pertamina Luwuk menyalurkan bantuan berupa perlengkapan Posyandu Balita dan Lansia di Desa Lumpoknyo dan Kelurahan Bungin Timur, Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, Kamis (28/12/2023).Pada kegiatan yang dipusatkan di Kantor Desa Lumpoknyo itu, Fuel Terminal (FT) Manager Pertamina Luwuk Hirohim mengatakan, masalah posyandu adalah hal yang penting sebab menjadi sarana membantu masyarakat sekitar, terutama untuk balita, ibu hamil dan lansia. Karena bila ada posyandu, maka berarti ada kader dan perlengkapan yang memadai.Melalui posyandu kata dia, balita dan ibu hamil bisa melakukan pengecekkan termasuk dalam upaya mencegah terjadinya stunting. Posyandu bisa memberikan saran tentang makanan yang sehat. Untuk lansia, maka bisa ada pengecekan rutin agar bisa menjaga kesehatan masing-masing.Mewakili managemen PT Pertamina Fuel Terminal Luwuk, Manager FT Luwuk Hirohim memberikan bantuan berupa alat kesehatan untuk posyandu.Program ini merupakan bentuk tanggung jawab sosial PT Pertamina Patra Niaga Fuel Terminal Luwuk.Pada kesempatan itu, muncul saran dari pendamping desa Lumpoknyo, agar ada bantuan sarana berupa gedung untuk posyandu khusus, agar terpisah dari kantor pemdes.Manager FT Luwuk mengatakan, untuk saran itu akan diteruskan ke Pertamina Region, sebab anggarannya besar. “Nanti kami teruskan ke region, karena anggarannya besar,” kata Hirohim.Program CSR ini kata Hirohim kepada wartawan usai kegiatan, adalah agenda rutin Pertamina, termasuk FT Luwuk. DAR
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-As a form of concern for the surrounding area, the Pertamina Luwuk Fuel Terminal distributed aid in the form of Posyandu equipment for toddlers and the elderly in Lumpoknyo Village and Bungin Timur Village, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, Thursday (28/12/2023) .In the activity which was centered at the Lumpoknyo Village Office, Pertamina Fuel Terminal (FT) Manager Luwuk Hirohim said that the posyandu issue was important because it was a means of helping the local community, especially for toddlers, pregnant women and the elderly. Because if there is a posyandu, it means there are adequate cadres and equipment. Through posyandu, he said, toddlers and pregnant women can carry out checks, including in an effort to prevent stunting. Posyandu can provide advice on healthy food. For the elderly, there can be routine checks so that they can maintain their own health. Representing the management of PT Pertamina Fuel Terminal Luwuk, FT Luwuk Manager Hirohim provided assistance in the form of medical equipment for posyandu. This program is a form of social responsibility of PT Pertamina Patra Niaga Fuel Terminal Luwuk .On that occasion, a suggestion came from the Lumpoknyo village assistant, that there be assistance with facilities in the form of a building for a special posyandu, so that it is separate from the village government office. The Luwuk FT Manager said that this suggestion would be forwarded to Pertamina Region, because the budget was large. "Later we will continue to the regions, because the budget is large," said Hirohim. Hirohim said this CSR program to journalists after the activity is a routine agenda for Pertamina, including FT Luwuk. DAR

title: Wujud Kepedulian, Kapolres Banggai Berikan Bingkisan di Pos PAM Lilin 2023
text: Banggai –kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM meninjau pos pos pengamanan (Pos Pam), guna memastikan kesiapan personil gabungan melaksanakan Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023.Peninjauan pada H+3 perayaan Natal, Kamis (28/12/2023) dilakukan dibeberapa titik yakni Pos Pengamananpolsek kintomdi Desa Solan, Pos Pengamananpolsek toilibertempat di Unit II Desa Tirta Kencana dan Pos Pengamananpolsek batuididepan Terminal.Dalam peninjauannya, Kapolres Banggai mengatakan bahwa pos yang didirikan ini untuk melayani masyarakat melakukan arus mudik atau arus balik liburan Nataru dan kegiatan masyarakat lainnya.AKBP Ade juga menginstruksikan ke masing – masing personil agar melengkapi kekurangan khusunya sarana yang digunakan untuk memberikan pelayanan ke masyarakat.Didampingi Kasat Lantas AKP I Made Bagus Aditya, Kapolres sekaligus memberikan tali asih berupa minuman kesehatan kepada personil gabungan di tiap pos pengamanan.“Semogga bingkisan ini diperuntukan untuk menunjang tugas anggota yang berjaga di pos selama pelaksanaan Operasi Lilin ini,” kata Kapolres.Ia pun menghimbau para petugas gabungan terus bersinergi melaksanakan pengamanan demi terciptanya situasi aman yang kondusif dikabupaten banggaikhusunya
text_en: Banggai – Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM inspected the security post (Pos Pam), to ensure the readiness of joint personnel to carry out the 2023 Tinombala Candle Operation. The inspection on D+3 of the Christmas celebration, Thursday (28/12/2023) was carried out in several The points are the Kintom Police Security Post in Solan Village, the Toiliber Police Security Post located in Unit II Tirta Kencana Village and the Batuid Police Security Post in front of the Terminal. In his review, the Banggai Police Chief said that this post was established to serve the community during the homecoming or return flow for the Nataru holiday and other community activities. AKBP Ade also instructed each personnel to make up for the shortcomings, especially the facilities used to provide services to the community. Accompanied by Head of Traffic Unit AKP I Made Bagus Aditya, the Police Chief at the same time gave compassion in the form of health drinks to joint personnel at each security post. "Hopefully the gifts "This is intended to support the duties of the members who are guarding the post during the implementation of Operation Lilin," said the Police Chief. He also appealed to the joint officers to continue to work together to carry out security in order to create a conducive safe situation in Bangga Regency, especially

title: Pemda Banggai Cairkan Rp1,3 Miliar untuk Honor 293 Tenaga Pendidik dan Tenaga Kependidikan PAUD
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai memberikan honorarium guru atau Tenaga Pendidik dan Tenaga Kependidikan PAUD Non PNS, Jumat (29/12/2023) di Ruang Rapat Umum Kantor Bupati Banggai.Total dana yang dibayarkan kepada 293 tenaga pendidik dan tenaga kependidikan mencapai Rp1,3 Miliar.Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO dalam sambutannya mengatakan bahwa Pemberian honorarium bukan hanya sebagai bentuk penghargaan finansial semata, tetapi juga sebagai pengakuan terhadap upaya dan dedikasi para pendidik di PAUD.Inilah kata dia, bentuk apresiasi yang diberikan kepada guru guru PAUD. “Karena kita ketahui bersama guru PAUD memberikan landasan awal kepada anak-anak kita,” ujar Bupati Amirudin, seperti dilansir dari liputan Dinas Kominfo Banggai.Bupati Banggai mengatakan bahwa pemberian honorarium ini diharapkan dapat menjadi pendorong bagi para guru untuk meningkatkan disiplin dan kinerja mereka.Sebagaimana tujuan utama dari pemberian honorarium ini adalah pertama meningkatkan motivasi, disiplin dan kinerja para guru dan tenaga kependidikan.Kedua, memberikan kemaslahatan guru dan tenaga kependidikan untuk menghasilkan peserta didik yang berkualitas dan berdaya saing.Ketig, meningkatkan mutu pendidikan di daerah dan meningkatkan kesejahteraan guru dan tenaga kependidikan.Bupati Banggai juga menekankan pentingnya memberikan kesempatan kepada tenaga pendidik untuk melanjutkan pendidikan ke tingkat yang lebih tinggi.Hal tersebut mencerminkan visi Pemerintah Daerah dalam memberikan dukungan konkret bagi pengembangan SDM pada peningkatan kualifikasi pendidikan para tenaga pendidik, khususnya guru PAUD. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- The Regional Government of Banggai Regency provided honorariums for teachers or Non-PNS PAUD Teachers and Education Personnel, Friday (29/12/2023) in the General Meeting Room of the Banggai Regent's Office. The total funds paid to 293 educators and education personnel reached IDR 1, 3 billion. Banggai Regent, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO in his speech said that giving honorariums is not only a form of financial appreciation, but also as recognition of the efforts and dedication of PAUD educators. This, he said, is a form of appreciation given to PAUD teachers. "Because we all know that PAUD teachers provide an initial foundation for our children," said Regent Amirudin, as reported by the Banggai Communication and Information Service coverage. The Banggai Regent said that it is hoped that this honorarium will be an incentive for teachers to improve their discipline and performance. As the main objective of providing this honorarium is firstly to increase motivation, discipline and performance of teachers and education staff. Second, to provide benefits for teachers and education staff to produce quality and competitive students. Third, to improve the quality of education in the region and improve teacher welfare. and education staff. The Regent of Banggai also emphasized the importance of providing opportunities for teaching staff to continue their education to a higher level. This reflects the Regional Government's vision in providing concrete support for human resource development in improving the educational qualifications of teaching staff, especially PAUD teachers. (*)

title: Tidak Sekadar Mewisuda, AMIK Luwuk Gelar Job Fair Bantu Alumni Dapat Pekerjaan
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Tidak sekadar meluluskan para ahli madya komputer, Akademi Manajemen Informatika dan Komputer (AMIK) Luwuk juga membantu alumninya dalam mendapatkan pekerjaan.Untuk membantu alumninya mendapatkan pekerjaan, kampus di bawah naungan Yayasan Pendidikan Nurmal menggelar Job Fair atau bursa kerja yang dirangkaikan dengan acara Wisuda, Sabtu 30 Desember 2023.Job Fair atau bursa kerja itu dibuka secara resmi oleh perwakilan Dinas Tenaga Kerja dan Transmigrasi Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah, Zein.Hadir dalam pembukaan,Kepala LLDIKTI Wilayah XVI Gosulutteng, Munawir Razak Sekretaris Kabupaten Banggai, Ir. Abdullah Ali, Kadisnakertrans Banggai, Ernaini Mustatim, Kaban Kesbangpol Banggai, Syaifudin Muid, WR 3  Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Agung K Djibran, Ketua Yayasan Pendidikan Nurmal Dr. Marwan Londol, dan Direktur AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu serta jajarannya.Dalam sambutannya, Direktur AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom, MM., mengatakan,  Job Fair ini kali kedua dilaksanakan kampus AMIK Luwuk.“Kegiatan Job Fair ini dibuka khusus untuk alumni dan mahasiswa aktif AMIK Luwuk. Untuk buka umum, kita belum bisa,” ungkap Heri, sapaan akrab Direktur berdarah Saluan Nambo ituIa mengaku, kegiatan Job Fair ini dibuka secara legal dan telah mendapat izin langsung dari Dinas Tenaga Kerja dan Transmigrasi Kabupaten Banggai. Hanya saja, dikhususkan bagi alumni dan mahasiswa aktif.“AMIK Luwuk tidak hanya sekadar mewisuda, tapi kita juga berupaya bagaimana membantu alumni untuk mendapatkan perkejaan. Jadi begitu wisuda, dibantu untuk dicarikan perkejaan,” kata Heri.Olehnya, dalam job fair ini momentum yang sangat tepat bagi para alumni untuk melamar pekerjaan sesuai skill uang dimiliki.ApresiasiBursa kerja atau job fair ini mendapat apresiasi yang setinggi-tingginya dari Dinas Tenaga Kerja dan Transmigrasi baik kabupaten maupun provinsi.Seperti yang diungkapkan Kadisnakertrans Banggai, Ernaini Mustatim.“Saya sangat mengapresiasi kegiatan ini, di mana wisuda dibarengi job fair. Ini luar biasa,” kata Kadis Emi, sapaan akrabnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Not just graduating intermediate computer experts, the Luwuk Informatics and Computer Management Academy (AMIK) also helps its alumni in getting jobs. To help its alumni get jobs, the campus under the auspices of the Nurmal Education Foundation holds a Job Fair or job fair which is coupled with the event Graduation, Saturday 30 December 2023. The Job Fair or job fair was officially opened by the representative of the Central Sulawesi Provincial Manpower and Transmigration Service, Zein. Present at the opening, Head of LLDIKTI Region XVI Gosulutteng, Munawir Razak Secretary of Banggai Regency, Ir. Abdullah Ali, Kadisnakertrans Banggai, Ernaini Mustatim, Kaban Kesbangpol Banggai, Syaifudin Muid, WR 3 Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Agung K Djibran, Chairman of the Nurmal Dr. Education Foundation. Marwan Londol, and the Director of AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu and his staff. In his speech, the Director of AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom, MM., said, this is the second time the Job Fair has been held on the AMIK Luwuk campus. "Job Fair activities This is opened specifically for alumni and active students of AMIK Luwuk. "We can't open it to the public yet," said Heri, the nickname of Director Saluan Nambo. He admitted that this Job Fair activity was opened legally and had received direct permission from the Banggai Regency Manpower and Transmigration Service. However, it is specifically for alumni and active students. "AMIK Luwuk is not just about graduating, but we are also trying to help alumni to get jobs. "So as soon as you graduate, you will be helped to find a job," said Heri. Therefore, this job fair is the right moment for alumni to apply for jobs according to their financial skills. Appreciation This job fair or job fair received the highest appreciation from the Manpower Department. and Transmigration, both district and province. As stated by the Head of the Banggai Manpower and Transmigration Office, Ernaini Mustatim, "I really appreciate this activity, where graduation is accompanied by a job fair. "This is extraordinary," said Kadis Emi, his nickname. (*)

title: Satgas Preventif OMB Polres Banggai Cooling Sistem Pemilu di Pelabuhan
text: luwuk–Satgas OMB Tinombala 2023-2024polres banggai, melalui Satgas Preventif, melaksanakan cooling system di wilayah Kota Luwuk, Sabtu (30/12/2023).Kegiatan ini dilakukan dalam rangka menangkal hal – hal negatif selama masa kampanye Pemilu 2024. Sistem preventif ini dilaksanakan di Pelabuhan Rakyat Luwuk.Personel Satgas Preventif melakukan sosialisasi dari pagi hingga sore. Mereka melakukan menghimbau kepada masyarakat agar tidak terpengaruh oleh isu-isu negatif yang dapat memecah belah persatuan dan kesatuan.Kasatgas Preventif OMB Polres Banggai AKP Jolly Lengkong mengatakan bahwa kegiatan cooling system ini bertujuan untuk mencegah terjadinya konflik selama masa kampanye hingga Pemilu 2024 mendatang.“Karena ini berlokasi di pelabuhan, kami meminta para buruh dan masyarakat di Pelabuhan Rakyat untuk tetap bersatu meskipun memiliki pilihan yang berbeda selama masa kampanye berlangsung,” katanya.Ia berharap, dengan kehadiran pihak kepolisian di tengah masyarakat, dapat menjalin kemitraan dan menciptakan suasana yang tenang, tentram, dan penuh kekeluargaan selama masa Pemilu.“Masyarakat ataupun buruh, meskipun mereka memiliki pilihan yang berbeda pada pemilu yang akan datang, diharapkan dapat menjaga kondusivitas,” harap Jolly
text_en: Luwuk–Tinombala OMB Task Force 2023-2024 Police are proud, through the Preventive Task Force, to implement a cooling system in the Luwuk City area, Saturday (30/12/2023). This activity was carried out in order to ward off negative things during the 2024 Election campaign period. This preventive system held at Luwuk People's Harbor. Preventive Task Force personnel carried out outreach from morning to evening. They appealed to the public not to be influenced by negative issues that could divide unity and integrity. Head of the Banggai Police OMB Preventive Task Force, AKP Jolly Lengkong, said that this cooling system activity was aimed at preventing conflict from occurring during the campaign period until the upcoming 2024 election. "Because "This is located at the port, we ask the workers and the community at the People's Harbor to remain united even though they have different choices during the campaign period," he said. He hopes that, with the presence of the police in the community, we can build partnerships and create a calm atmosphere, peaceful and full of family during the election period. "The community and workers, even though they have different choices in the upcoming election, are expected to maintain conduciveness," hoped Jolly

title: AMIK Luwuk Wisuda 143 Lulusan Ahli Madya Komputer, 80 Persen Sudah Bekerja!
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Akademi Manajemen Informatika dan Komputer (AMIK) Luwuk Banggai menggelar kegiatan Wisuda bagi lulusan Ahli Madya Komputer, Sabtu 30 Desember 2023.Kegiatan wisuda dalam rapat senat terbuka luar biasa yang berlangsung di Hotel Estrella Luwuk itu, AMIK Luwuk di bawah pimpinan Direktur Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom, MM., sukses mewisuda 143 lulusan.Dalam sambutan akademiknya, Direktur AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom., MM., menyampaikan selamat kepada seluruh wisudawan atas keberhasilan dalam menyelesaikan studi.“Kepada orangtua dan keluarga wisudawan, kami turut bersyukur dan berbahagia serta sekali lagi mengucapkan selamat atas keberhasilan anggota keluarga Bapak/Ibu dan saudara sekalian,” ucap Direktur Heriyanto Sahidu.Di wisuda ke XVI ini kata Direktur AMIK Luwuk, jumlah mahasiswa yang diwisuda berjumlah 143 orang.“Rinciannya dari 143 orang, 28 % telah bekerja sebelum  wisuda, 24 % telah interview dan akan bekerja setelah wisuda di perusahaan mitra, 40 % sebagai reseller, online shop, konten creator digital serta kegiatan-kegiatan lain yang digemari generasi milenial, 6 % tekhnopreneur dan lanjut studi 2%,” papar Heri sapaan akrabnya.Olehnya, pada kesempatan itu, Direktur Heri memberikan penghargaan setinggi-tingginya kepada seluruh rekan dosen, tenaga kependidikan, dan seluruh karyawan AMIK Luwuk Banggai atas segala kerjasama, keikhlasan serta kesungguhannya dalam melaksanakan tugas mendidik dan melayani kebutuhan akademik mahasiswa.“Sehingga hari ini mereka (mahasiswa) berhasil menyelesaikan studinya tepat waktu dan diwisuda pada hari ini,” katanya.Dengan bekal ilmu yang diperoleh mahasiswa selama tiga tahun, Direktur berharap lulusan mampu bersaing di pasar kerja dan berkarya di masyarakat.Tantangan yang dihadapi alumni di tengah masyarakat kata dia, sudah barang tentu lebih berat apabila dibandingkan dengan di kampus, sebab persoalan yang dihadapi sangat beraneka ragam.“Namun Allah SWT telah menganugerahkan kepada manusia, akal, ilmu, kecerdasan dan pengetahuan untuk dapat dimanfaatkan menghadapi tantangan yang ada di masyarakat, yang selanjutnya dapat digunakan sebesar besarnya bagi kesejahteraan umat manusia itu sendiri,” katanya.Keberhasilan yang dicapai mahasiswa dalam meraih gelar ahli madya komputer kata dia Direktur, bukanlah semata-mata milik Saudara karena di balik keberhasilan tersebut, alumni dituntut untuk berbagi ilmu pengetahuan yang diperoleh agar dapat dimanfaatkan oleh orang lain.“Semangat dan motivasi diri menjadi sangat penting untuk menjadikan seseorang mampu mandiri dan menghasilkan sesuatu yang bermanfaat bagi lingkungan sekitarnya, khoirunnas Anfauhum linnas  sebaik-baiknya manusia adalah yang paling bermanfaat bagi manusia lain,” pesannya.Sementara itu, Kepala LLDIKTI Wilayah XVI Gosulutteng, Munawir Razak memberikan apresiasi baik kepada Direktur AMIK Luwuk dan jajaran maupun Ketua Yayasan Pendidikan Nurmal Luwuk yang berhasil menyelenggarakan pendidikan.“Apresiasi kepada civitas akademika, yang telah menyiapkan tenaga-tenaga kerja atau lulusan unggul yang siap kerja,” kata Munawir.Apalagi kata Kalem Munawir, dari 142 lulusan Ahli Madya Komputer yang diwisuda hari ini, 80 persen diantaranya sudah bekerja.“Saya sangat salut, karena dari ratusan yang diwisuda, 80 persen sudah bekerja. Ini luar biasa, dan patut diapresiasi. Selama ini, banyak perguruan tinggi yang hanya sibuk mencari mahasiswa baru, tapi mengabaikan lulusannya,” ucap Munawir yang bangga dengan kerja-kerja kampus vokasi AMIK Luwuk Banggai.Sebelumnya, Ketua Yayasan Pendidikan Nurmal Luwuk, Dr. Marwan Londol juga memberikan sambutan, dan menjelaskan kiprah AMIK Luwuk Banggai yang 18 tahun beroperasi.Ucapan terima kasih disampaikan Ketua Yayasan,baik kepada civitas akademika maupun semua pihak, sehingga AMIK Luwuk bisa terus eksis melahirkan SDM yang unggul dan berkualitas.Diketahui, acara wisuda ini dihadiri oleh Sekretaris Kabupaten Banggai, Ir. Abdullah Ali,  Perwakilan Dinas Tenaga Kerja dan Transmigrasi Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah, Kadisnakertrans Banggai, Ernaini Mustatim, Perwakilan Perusahaan Mitra, dan lainnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Luwuk Banggai Academy of Information and Computer Management (AMIK) held a graduation activity for Associate Computer Expert graduates, Saturday 30 December 2023. The graduation activity took place at an extraordinary open senate meeting which took place at the Estrella Luwuk Hotel, AMIK Luwuk under the leadership of Director Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom, MM., successfully graduated 143 graduates. In his academic speech, the Director of AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom., MM., congratulated all graduates on their success in completing studies. "To the parents and families of graduates, we are also grateful and happy and once again congratulate you on the success of your family members and brothers and sisters," said Director Heriyanto Sahidu. At this XVI graduation, said the Director of AMIK Luwuk, the number of students who graduated totaling 143 people. "The details of the 143 people, 28% have worked before graduation, 24% have had interviews and will work after graduation in partner companies, 40% as resellers, online shops, digital content creators and other activities that are popular with the millennial generation ", 6% technopreneurs and 2% continuing studies," explained Heri, his nickname. On that occasion, Director Heri gave the highest appreciation to all fellow lecturers, educational staff and all employees of AMIK Luwuk Banggai for all their cooperation, sincerity and sincerity. in carrying out educational tasks and serving students' academic needs. "So today they (students) have successfully completed their studies on time and graduated today," he said. With the knowledge gained by students over three years, the Director hopes that graduates will be able to compete in the job market and work in society. The challenges faced by alumni in society, he said, are of course more difficult when compared to those on campus, because the problems they face are very diverse. "However, Allah SWT has given humans reason, knowledge, intelligence and knowledge. "to be utilized to face the challenges that exist in society, which can then be used as much as possible for the welfare of humanity itself," he said. The success achieved by students in achieving the title of intermediate computer expert, he said, the Director, is not solely yours because behind the success In this context, alumni are required to share the knowledge they have gained so that it can be utilized by others. "Enthusiasm and self-motivation are very important to make someone able to be independent and produce something that is beneficial to the surrounding environment, khoirunnas Anfauhum linnas  the best human beings are the most useful for other humans," he said. Meanwhile, the Head of LLDIKTI Region work or superior graduates who are ready to work," said Munawir. Moreover, Kalem Munawir said, of the 142 Associate Computer Expert graduates who graduated today, 80 percent of them are already working. "I really salute you, because of the hundreds who graduated, 80 percent are already working. This is extraordinary, and worthy of appreciation. "So far, many universities have only been busy looking for new students, but have neglected their graduates," said Munawir, who was proud of the work of the AMIK Luwuk Banggai vocational campus. Previously, the Chair of the Nurmal Luwuk Education Foundation, Dr. Marwan Londol also gave a speech, and explained the progress of AMIK Luwuk Banggai, which has been operating for 18 years. The Chairman of the Foundation expressed his thanks, both to the academic community and all parties, so that AMIK Luwuk can continue to exist, producing superior and quality human resources. It is known that this graduation ceremony attended by the Secretary of Banggai Regency, Ir. Abdullah Ali,  Representative of the Provincial Manpower and Transmigration Serviceinsi Central Sulawesi, Kadisnakertrans Banggai, Ernaini Mustatim, Representatives of Partner Companies, and others. (*)

title: 64 Madyasiswa LKP NET Center Luwuk Diwisuda
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Sebanyak 64 madyasiswa Lembaga Kursus dan Pelatihan (LKP) Net Center Luwuk resmi diwisuda pada Sabtu 30 Desember 2023.Puluhan madyasiswa itu diwisuda oleh Pimpinan LKP Net center Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom, MM , dalam rangkaian wisuda Diploma Tiga AMIK Luwuk.Kegiatan wisuda dilangsungkan di Hotel Estrella Luwuk ini turut dihadiri Sekretaris Kabupaten Banggai, Ir. H. Abdullah Ali, Kepala LLDIKTI Wilayah XVI Gosulutteng, Munawir Razak, Ketua Yayasan Pendidikan Nurmal Dr Marwan Londol di tamu undangan lainnya.Selain wisudawan, orangtua atau wali juga turut hadir menyaksikan prosesi sakral tersebut.Dalam sambutan akademiknya, Pimpinan LKP NET Center Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu menyampaikan selamat kepada para lulusan atas keberhasilan dalam menyelesaikan studinya.“Kepada orangtua dan keluarga wisudawan, kami turut bersyukur dan berbahagia serta sekali lagi mengucapkan selamat atas keberhasilan anggota keluarga Bapak/Ibu dan saudara sekalian,” ucap Direktur Heriyanto Sahidu. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- A total of 64 students from the Luwuk Net Center Course and Training Institute (LKP) officially graduated on Saturday 30 December 2023. The tens of students were graduated by the Head of the Luwuk Net Center LKP, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom, MM, in a series AMIK Luwuk Diploma Three graduation. The graduation activity was held at the Estrella Hotel Luwuk and was also attended by the Secretary of Banggai Regency, Ir. H. Abdullah Ali, Head of LLDIKTI Region Heriyanto Sahidu congratulated the graduates on their success in completing their studies. "To the parents and families of the graduates, we are also grateful and happy and once again congratulate the success of your family members and brothers and sisters," said Director Heriyanto Sahidu. (*)

title: Gerindra Target 7 Kursi DPRD Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Menjadi pemenang dalam pemilu, adalah keinginan setiap partai politik.Partai Gerindra Kabupaten Banggai salah satunya. Partai yang dipimpin Suliyanti Murad ini bertekad bisa meraup suara signifikan dalam pemilu 2024 nanti.Pada pemilu 2019 lalu, Gerindra Kabupaten Banggai hanya bisa menempatkan empat perwakilan di DPRD Banggai. Di pemilu tahun 2024 khususnya pemilihan legislatif, Gerindra menargetkan 7 kursi di DPRD Banggai.Ketua DPC Gerindra Banggai, Suliyanti Murad optimis target tersebut bisa tercapai. “Target kami 7 kursi di DPRD Banggai. Kami optimis bisa meraihnya,” kata Suliyanti.Putri ke lima almarhum Murad Husain ini mengatakan bahwa target 7 kursi memang butuh perjuangan dan kerja keras. Karena kerja keras dan semangat semua elemen tidak akan menghianati hasil.“Karena setiap kesulitan akan ada jalan kemudahan,” tuturnya.Ia meyakini dengan komposisi caleg di masing-masing dapil, ditambah semangat relawan dan mesin partai yang terus bergerak maju, serta simpati masyarakat terhadap Gerindra yang juga meningkat, Gerindra Kabupaten Banggai akan berhasil mencapai tujuan yang direncanakan. NAL
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Becoming a winner in the election is the desire of every political party. The Gerindra Party of Banggai Regency is one of them. The party led by Suliyanti Murad is determined to gain significant votes in the 2024 elections. In the 2019 elections, Gerindra Banggai Regency was only able to place four representatives in the Banggai DPRD. In the 2024 elections, especially the legislative elections, Gerindra is targeting 7 seats in the Banggai DPRD. Chairman of the Gerindra Banggai DPC, Suliyanti Murad is optimistic that this target can be achieved. “Our target is 7 seats in the Banggai DPRD. "We are optimistic that we can achieve it," said Suliyanti. The fifth daughter of the late Murad Husain said that the target of 7 seats requires struggle and hard work. Because the hard work and enthusiasm of all elements will not betray the results. "Because for every difficulty there will be a way of ease," he said. He believes in the composition of legislative candidates in each electoral district, plus the spirit of volunteers and the party machine that continues to move forward, as well as public sympathy for Gerindra is also increasing, Gerindra Banggai Regency will be successful in achieving its planned goals. NAL

title: Datangkan Lima Lembaga Penyelenggara Akreditasi, Seluruh Puskesmas di Kabupaten Banggai Tuntas Lakukan Survei Akreditasi
text: BERITABANGGAI.COM,Luwuk—Dinas Kesehatan Kabupaten Banggai menuntaskan pengawalan proses reakreditasi 27 Puskesmas di Kabupaten Banggai.Seluruh Puskesmas, kecuali Poh di Kecamatan Pagimana yang akreditasi perdana. Sementara 26 puskesmas lainnya melakukan reakreditasi.Kepala Dinas Kesehatan Kabupaten Banggai, dr I Wayan Suartika, mengatakan, tim surveyor yang melakukan penilaian akreditasi berasal dari lembaga penyelenggara akreditasi yang telah mendapatkan sertifikasi dari Kementerian Kesehatan.Penilaian dilakukan oleh tim surveyor dari beberapa Lembaga Penyelenggara  Akreditasi (LPA), yakni Lembaga Akreditasi Fasyankes Seluruh Indonesia (Laskesi), Lembaga Akreditasi Fasilitas Kesehatan Primer (Lafkespri), Komite Mutu Kesehatan Primer (KMKP) Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah, Lembaga Akreditasi Prima Husada (Laprida) dan Lembaga Akreditasi Fasilitas Kesehatan Indonesia (Lafki) Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah.Akreditasi perdana 1 Puskesmas dan reakreditasi 26 Puskesmas ini ditandai dengan penilaian akreditasi dan reakreditasi.Penilaian reakreditasi ini dilakukan dengan verifikasi lapangan langsung ke lokasi Puskesmas.Proses penilaian reakreditasi dilakukan sejak bulan 25 November 2023 hingga 23 Desember 2023, dan menyasar 17 Puskesmas, yakni; Puskesmas Kampung Baru, Batui, Biak, Sinorang, Simpong, Pagimana, Lobu, Toima, Tangeban, Toili III, Bualemo, Simpang Raya, Nambo, Saiti, Hunduhon, Bonebakal, dan Puskesmas Balantak Selatan.Sementara minggu terakhir bulan Desember 2023, tepatnya tanggal 26 sampai 29 Desember 2023, proses reakreditasi dilakukan untuk 10 Puskesmas, yakni Puskesmas Nuhon, Puskesmas Bunta, Puskesmas Poh (akreditasi perdana-red), Puskesmas Tikupon, Puskesmas Teku, Balantak, Mantok, Kintom, Toili II dan Puskesmas Toili III.Diketahui, penilaian re-akreditasi dilakukan dengan verifikasi lapangan langsung ke lokasi Puskesmas.Komponen penilaian melibatkan penilaian dokumen, regulasi, kebijakan, hingga melihat langsung pelayanan di puskesmas untuk memeriksa kesesuaian dengan dokumen yang diajukan.Tim penilai juga melakukan wawancara dengan lintas sektor terkait keberadaan Puskesmas.Sebelumnya, Kabid Yankes Dinas Kesehatan Kabupaten Banggai, Haris Sibadu, mengatakan, akreditasi perdana 1 pukesmas dan reakreditasi 26 Puskesmas dimulakan dengan proses pendaftaran dan pengiriman dokumen akreditasi dan kemudian ditindaklanjuti dengan kunjungan tim surveyor akreditasi.Ia mengatakan, akreditasi ulang Puskesmas se-Kabupaten Banggai dilakukan, sebagai respons terhadap edaran BPJS.Edaran BPJS menyebutkan bahwa tanggal 31 Desember 2023, semua faskes harus terakreditasi.Akreditasi faskes, kata dia, sekali dalam tiga tahun; sehingga saat ini semua puskesmas dilakukan reakreditasi.Kecuali, Puskesmas Poh, sebagai Puskesmas baru, melakukan akreditasi perdana.Ia mengakui, seluruh puskesmas harus terakreditasi pada tahun 2023.“Ini syarat kerja sama dengan BPJS, syarat kerja sama harus ada sertifikat akreditasi,” terangnya.Jika Januari 2024, puskesmas belum terakreditasi, maka otomatis faskes tersebut tidak bisa kerja sama dengan BPJS.Olehnya, persiapan akreditasi dilakukan dengan sepenuhnya, sesuai dengan tujuan akreditasi yaitu peningkatan mutu puskesmas, mulai dari perencanaan sampai SDM.(BB/007)
text_en: BERITABANGGAI.COM, Luwuk—The Banggai District Health Service has completed monitoring the reaccreditation process for 27 Community Health Centers in Banggai Regency. All Community Health Centers, except Poh in Pagimana District, were the first to receive accreditation. Meanwhile, 26 other community health centers carried out reaccreditation. Head of the Banggai District Health Service, Dr. I Wayan Suartika, said that the team of surveyors who carried out the accreditation assessment came from an accreditation administering institution that had received certification from the Ministry of Health. The assessment was carried out by a team of surveyors from several Accreditation Organizing Institutions ( LPA), namely the Indonesian Health Facilities Accreditation Institute (Laskesi), the Primary Health Facilities Accreditation Institute (Lafkespri), the Central Sulawesi Province Primary Health Quality Committee (KMKP), the Prima Husada Accreditation Institute (Laprida) and the Indonesian Provincial Health Facilities Accreditation Institute (Lafki) Central Sulawesi. The initial accreditation of 1 Community Health Center and the reaccreditation of 26 Community Health Centers was marked by an accreditation and reaccreditation assessment. This reaccreditation assessment was carried out by direct field verification at the location of the Community Health Center. The reaccreditation assessment process was carried out from 25 November 2023 to 23 December 2023, and targeted 17 Community Health Centers, namely; Kampung Baru, Batui, Biak, Sinorang, Simpong, Pagimana, Lobu, Toima, Tangeban, Toili III, Bualemo, Simpang Raya, Nambo, Saiti, Hunduhon, Bonebakal and South Balantak Community Health Centers. Meanwhile, the last week of December 2023, the exact date 26 to 29 December 2023, the reaccreditation process will be carried out for 10 Community Health Centers, namely Nuhon Community Health Center, Bunta Community Health Center, Poh Community Health Center (initial accreditation), Tikupon Community Health Center, Teku Community Health Center, Balantak, Mantok, Kintom, Toili II and Toili III III Community Health Center. The re-accreditation assessment is carried out by field verification directly at the Puskesmas location. The assessment component involves assessing documents, regulations, policies, and directly observing the services at the Puskesmas to check conformity with the documents submitted. The assessment team also conducts interviews with cross-sectors regarding the existence of the Puskesmas. Previously , Head of Health Services for the Banggai District Health Service, Haris Sibadu, said that the initial accreditation of 1 community health center and reaccreditation of 26 community health centers began with the registration process and sending of accreditation documents and then followed up with a visit from the accreditation surveyor team. He said that the re-accreditation of community health centers throughout Banggai Regency was carried out, in response to the BPJS circular. The BPJS circular states that by December 31 2023, all health facilities must be accredited. Accreditation of health facilities, he said, is once every three years; so that currently all community health centers are being reaccredited. Except for Poh Community Health Center, as a new community health center, it is carrying out its first accreditation. He admitted that all community health centers must be accredited by 2023. "This is a condition of cooperation with BPJS, conditions for cooperation must have an accreditation certificate," he explained. .If in January 2024, the health center has not been accredited, then automatically the health facility will not be able to collaborate with BPJS. Therefore, preparations for accreditation are carried out fully, in accordance with the aim of accreditation, namely improving the quality of the health center, starting from planning to human resources. (BB/007)

title: Luar Biasa, Unismuh Luwuk Loloskan 46 Mahasiswa Program Kampus Mengajar
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Luar biasa, prestasi membanggakan ditorehkan kampus hijau Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk di penghujung tahun 2023.Kali ini, prestasi itu datang dari 46 mahasiswa di berbagai fakultas Unismuh Luwuk. Di mana mereka berhasil lolos dalam seleksi program Kampus Mengajar Angkatan 7.Wakil Rektor III Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Agung K Djibran mengaku bangga atas prestasi yang diraih mahasiswanya.Menurutnya, ini suatu bukti bahwa mahasiswa Unismuh Luwuk mampu bersaing dengan berbagai universitas dalam seleksi program Kampus Mengajar.“Yang mendaftar ikut seleksi 80-an mahasiswa, dan yang lolos Alhamdulillah 46 mahasiswa. Ini capaian luar biasa,” kata Agung K Djibran kepada Banggai Raya, Sabtu 30 Desember 2023.Ia berharap, capaian ini bisa menjadi motivasi bagi mahasiswa lainnya, dan bagi yang belum lolos agar tidak berkecil hati.“Masih banyak kesempatan kedepannya, semoga yang belum lolos hari ini bisa lolos di gelombang berikutnya,” harapnya.Berikut nama-nama mahasiswa dan asal Program Studi serta NPM:1- text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Extraordinary, proud achievements were made by the green campus of Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk at the end of 2023. This time, the achievements came from 46 students in various Unismuh Luwuk faculties. Where they succeeded in passing the selection for the Class 7 Teaching Campus program. Deputy Chancellor III Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Agung K Djibran said he was proud of the achievements achieved by his students. According to him, this was proof that Unismuh Luwuk students were able to compete with various universities in the Teaching Campus program selection. "There were 80 students who registered for the selection, and thank God 46 students passed. "This is an extraordinary achievement," said Agung K Djibran to Banggai Raya, Saturday 30 December 2023. He hopes that this achievement can be a motivation for other students, and for those who haven't passed not to be discouraged. "There are still many opportunities in the future, hopefully those who haven't yet "If you pass today you can qualify for the next wave," he hoped.
