title: Waka dan Kabagops Polres Banggai Ikuti Was Ops Lilin Oleh Itwasum Polri
text: luwuk–Tim Itwasum Mabes Polri melaksanakan Pengawasan Operasi (WasOps), pada Kamis (28/12/23) pagi, dalam rangka Pengamanan Natal 2023 dan Tahun Baru 2024, yang bertempat di Aula Torabelo Polresta Palu.Kegiatan Was Ops jajaran Polda Sulteng yang dipimpin oleh WairWasum Mabes Polri Irjen Pol. Drr. Yan Sultra, SH ini juga turut dihadir oleh Kabag Ops Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi dan Wakapolres banggaiKompol Pino Ary.Pelaksanaan juga diikuti oleh Irwasda Polda Sulteng, PJU Itwasda Polda Sulteng, Kapolrees Palu Sigi dan Donggala, Wakapolres, Kabagops, Kasat Intel dan kaposko Ops Lilin Tinombala Jajaran.Kegiatan Was Ops Lilin 2023 berlangsung dan dibuka langsung oleh Irwasda Polda Sulteng yang dilanjutkan dengan pedalaman materi oleh Irwil V Itwasum Polri Brigjen Pol. Dr. Drs. Gator Tri Suryana, M.Si, C.S.F.A.Dalam arahan Irwil V Itwasum Polri disampaikan kepada Kabag dan Kasat yang menjabat sebagai Karendalops maupun Kasatgas dalam Operasi Lilin 2023 untuk melaksanakan tugas dengan sebaik-baiknya serta tetap waspada terhadap ancaman gangguan keamanan yang mungkin bisa timbul sewaktu-waktu.Selesai arahan dilanjutkan dengan pemeriksaan dan pendalaman terhadap administrasi / produk operasi lilin Tinombala 2023 jajaran Polres Polda Sulteng oleh Tim Wasops Itwasum Polri.Setelah melakukan berbagai pengecekan dan pembekalan, pada pukul 12.00 Wita, kegiatan berakhir dalam keadaan aman kondusif
text_en: Luwuk–The National Police Headquarters Itwasum Team carried out Operations Supervision (WasOps), on Thursday (28/12/23) morning, in the context of Security for Christmas 2023 and New Year 2024, which took place in the Torabelo Hall of the Palu Police. Was Ops activities led by the Central Sulawesi Regional Police by WairWasum National Police Headquarters Inspector General Pol. Drr. Yan Sultra, SH was also attended by the Head of Ops, Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi and Deputy Chief of Police, Banggai, Kompol Pino Ary. The implementation was also attended by the Inspector General of Central Sulawesi Regional Police, PJU Itwasda of Central Sulawesi Regional Police, the Head of Police for Palu Sigi and Donggala, the Deputy Chief of Police, Kabagops, Head of Intelligence Unit and Kaposko Ops Lilin Tinombala Jajaran.The Was Ops Lilin 2023 activity took place and was opened directly by the Inspector General of Central Sulawesi Regional Police, which was followed by in-depth material by Irwil V Itwasum Polri Brigadier General Pol. Dr. Drs. Gator Tri Suryana, M.Si, C.S.F.A. In the direction of Irwil V Itwasum Polri, it was conveyed to the Head of Division and Kasat who served as Karendalops and Kasatgas in Operation Lilin 2023 to carry out their duties as well as possible and remain alert to the threat of security disturbances that might arise at any time. time. After the briefing was continued with an examination and in-depth study of the administration/products of the 2023 Tinombala candle operations at the Central Sulawesi Regional Police by the Police Wasops Itwasum Team. After carrying out various checks and briefings, at 12.00 WITA, the activity ended in a safe and conducive condition.

title: Polres Banggai, Terima Tim Supervisi Polda Sulteng Terkait Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023
text: luwuk–polres banggaimenerima kunjungan Tim Supervisi Lilin Tinombala 2023 dari Biro Ops Polda Sulteng di ruang Posko Terpadu Polres Banggai, Jumat (29/12/2023).Adapun Tim Supervisi dipimpin oleh AKP Rusdi Marzuki, SIK, MH, dan disambut langsung oleh para perangkat posko ops Lilin Tinombala Polres BanggaiAdapun kegiatan ini dalam rangka pengecekan seluruh administrasi serta data pendukung terkait pelaksanaan Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023 di Polres Banggai.“Kepada Tim Supervisi, kami tentunya masukan, petunjuk dan saran sangat diperlukan, demi kegiatan kedepannya dapat berjalan dengan baik,” ujar Karendalops Lilin Polres Banggai Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi.Kegiatan pun dilanjutkan arahan dari Ketua Tim, sekaligus melakukan pendalaman terkait admistrasi dan data pendukung Operasi meliputi administrasi posko, pengisian aplikasi EWS Sops Polri dan SOT, peta pos pengamanan dan pos pelayanan serta laporan anev.Setelah itu, tim supervise melanjutkannya dengan pengecekan pos pengamanan dan pos pelayanan diwilayah hukum Polres Banggai.“Hal ini dilakukan untuk memastikan bahwa kegiatan dilaksanakan dengan tepat dan baik,” tukas Kompol Esti  Next:Waka dan Kabagops Polres Banggai Ikuti Was Ops Lilin Oleh Itwasum Polri
text_en: Luwuk–Banggai Police received a visit from the 2023 Tinombala Candle Supervision Team from the Central Sulawesi Police Ops Bureau in the Banggai Police Integrated Command Post room, Friday (29/12/2023). The Supervision Team was led by AKP Rusdi Marzuki, SIK, MH, and was welcomed directly by the officers Banggai Police Station Tinombala Candle Operation Post. This activity is in the context of checking all administration and supporting data related to the implementation of the 2023 Tinombala Candle Operation at the Banggai Police Station. "To the Supervision Team, we certainly need input, guidance and suggestions, so that future activities can run well," said Karendalops Lilin Banggai Police Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi. The activity was continued with directions from the Team Leader, as well as conducting in-depth research regarding administration and operational supporting data including post administration, filling in the EWS Sops Polri and SOT applications, maps of security posts and service posts as well as anev reports. After The supervision team continued by checking security posts and service posts in the jurisdiction of the Banggai Police. "This was done to ensure that activities were carried out appropriately and well," said Kompol Esti.

title: Polres Banggai Perluas Layanan SKCK Hingga Larut Malam, Masyarakat Dapat Manfaatkan Kemudahan Pengurusan bagi Para Lulus PPPK
text: “Kasat Intelkam Memberikan Apresiasi Kepada Seluruh Anggotanya atas Kinerja Yang Luar biasa”KABAR LUWUK  –Polres BanggaiPerluasLayanan SKCKHingga Larut Malam, Masyarakat Dapat Manfaatkan Kemudahan Pengurusan bagi ParaLulus PPPK. Polres Banggai,Sulawesi Tengah,telah meningkatkan pelayanan publiknya dengan memperluas jam operasional pembuatan Surat Keterangan Catatan Kepolisian (SKCK) melaluiSatuan Intelijen dan Keamanan (Intelkam).Langkah ini diambil sebagai upaya untuk memberikan kemudahan kepada masyarakat yang telah lulus seleksi Pegawai Pemerintah dengan Perjanjian Kerja (PPPK). Kasat Intel Kam, AKP Usman SH, secara langsung memberikan pengumuman ini melalui konferensi telepon kepada awak media. Sabtu, 30/12/2023.MenurutAKP Usman SH, Polres Banggai telah menyesuaikan jam operasional pelayanan SKCK hingga pukul 23.00 WITA malam. Keputusan ini diambil dengan tujuan agar masyarakat yang tengah mengurus kelengkapan SKCK dapat terlayani tanpa kendala, terlebih bagi para lulusan PPPK yang membutuhkan dokumen tersebut.Usman memberikan apresiasi kepada seluruh anggota dan jajaran di Satuan Intelkam yang bersedia bekerja lembur hingga tengah malam demi membantu masyarakat dalam pengurusan SKCK di Polres Banggai.Keputusan ini merupakan bentuk komitmen Polres Banggai untuk memberikan pelayanan publik yang prima dan responsif terhadap kebutuhan masyarakat.Dalam harapannya, AKP Usman menginginkan agar pelayanan yang diberikan oleh Polres Banggai menjadi contoh layanan publik yang luar biasa.Ia menekankan pentingnya memberikan pelayanan yang optimal hingga dini hari, menunjukkan dedikasi pihak kepolisian dalam mendukung pelayanan masyarakat.Langkah proaktif Polres Banggai ini diharapkan dapat menciptakan lingkungan yang lebih kondusif dan memberikan dampak positif terhadap kepercayaan masyarakat terhadap institusi kepolisian.Dengan peningkatan pelayanan seperti ini, diharapkan proses pengurusan SKCK akan menjadi lebih efisien dan efektif bagi masyarakat yang membutuhkan dokumen tersebut untuk keperluan administratif maupun profesional mereka.Dalam upaya meningkatkan kualitas pelayanan, Polres Banggai tidak hanya memperluas jam operasional, tetapi juga menekankan pentingnya kesigapan dan tanggung jawab anggota Intelkam. Usman menegaskan bahwa pelayanan hingga larut malam bukan hanya sekadar perpanjangan jam kerja, melainkan komitmen untuk memberikan kepastian dan kemudahan kepada masyarakat.Sebagai bagian dari strategi ini, Polres Banggai juga memastikan ketersediaan personel yang berkualitas dan terlatih di bidang pelayanan publik. Pelatihan intensif diberikan kepada anggota Intelkam agar mereka dapat memberikan informasi yang akurat, menjawab pertanyaan dengan tepat, dan memberikan bantuan yang diperlukan oleh masyarakat.Keputusan Polres Banggai untuk memperluas layanan SKCK hingga malam hari juga sejalan dengan semangat pemerintah untuk mendorong reformasi birokrasi dan memberikan pelayanan yang lebih efisien kepada masyarakat. Dengan adanya perubahan ini, diharapkan waktu tunggu untuk mendapatkan SKCK dapat diminimalisir, sehingga proses administratif tidak menjadi beban berat bagi masyarakat.Tak hanya itu, kebijakan ini diharapkan dapat menciptakan iklim yang lebih harmonis antara kepolisian dan masyarakat. Dengan adanya pelayanan yang lebih fleksibel, diharapkan masyarakat dapat merasakan bahwa institusi kepolisian tidak hanya berperan sebagai penegak hukum, tetapi juga sebagai mitra yang mendukung dan memahami kebutuhan mereka.Peningkatan pelayanan SKCK hingga larut malam ini menjadi contoh nyata bahwa Polres Banggai tidak hanya fokus pada aspek penegakan hukum, tetapi juga memperhatikan kebutuhan dan kesejahteraan masyarakat.Langkah-langkah proaktif ini diharapkan dapat menjadi inspirasi bagi instansi pemerintah lainnya untuk terus berinovasi dalam memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik kepada masyarakat. ( MAM ) **
text_en: "Chief of Intelligence and Security Appreciates All Its Members for Their Extraordinary Performance" LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Police Expand SKCK Services Until Late at Night, the Community Can Take Advantage of the Ease of Management for PPPK Graduates. Banggai Police, Central Sulawesi, has improved its public services by expanding the operational hours for making Police Record Certificates (SKCK) through the Intelligence and Security Unit (Intelkam). This step was taken as an effort to provide convenience to people who have passed the selection for Government Employees with a Work Agreement ( PPPK). Kasat Intel Kam, AKP Usman SH, directly made this announcement via telephone conference to media crew. Saturday, 12/30/2023. According to AKP Usman SH, the Banggai Police have adjusted the operational hours of the SKCK service to 23.00 WITA at night. This decision was taken with the aim that people who are processing SKCK documents can be served without problems, especially PPPK graduates who need these documents. Usman expressed his appreciation to all members and ranks in the Intelligence and Security Unit who were willing to work overtime until midnight to help the community with the processing. SKCK at the Banggai Police. This decision is a form of Banggai Police's commitment to providing excellent public services that are responsive to the needs of the community. In his hopes, AKP Usman wants the services provided by the Banggai Police to be an example of extraordinary public service. He emphasized the importance of providing services which is optimal until early morning, shows the dedication of the police in supporting community services. This proactive step by the Banggai Police is expected to create a more conducive environment and have a positive impact on public trust in the police institution. With this kind of service improvement, it is hoped that the SKCK management process will be more efficient and effective for people who need these documents for their administrative and professional needs. In an effort to improve the quality of service, the Banggai Police not only expanded operational hours, but also emphasized the importance of alertness and responsibility of Intelkam members. Usman emphasized that service until late at night is not just an extension of working hours, but rather a commitment to provide certainty and convenience to the community. As part of this strategy, Banggai Police also ensures the availability of qualified and trained personnel in the field of public services. Intensive training is provided to Intelkam members so that they can provide accurate information, answer questions correctly, and provide assistance needed by the community. The Banggai Police's decision to expand SKCK services to nighttime is also in line with the government's enthusiasm to encourage bureaucratic reform and provide quality services. more efficient for society. With this change, it is hoped that the waiting time to obtain an SKCK can be minimized, so that the administrative process does not become a heavy burden for the community. Not only that, this policy is expected to create a more harmonious climate between the police and the community. With more flexible services, it is hoped that the public will feel that the police institution does not only act as a law enforcer, but also as a partner who supports and understands their needs. The increase in SKCK services until late at night is a clear example that the Banggai Police does not only focus on aspects law enforcement, but also paying attention to the needs and welfare of the community. It is hoped that these proactive steps can be an inspiration for other government agencies to continue to innovate in providing the best service to the community. (MAM) **

title: Gelar Job Fair, AMIK Luwuk Diapresiasi Kadisnakertrans: Ini Luar Biasa!
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Gelar bursa kerja atau job fair untuk alumni dan mahasiswa, Akademi Manajemen Informatika dan Komputer (AMIK) Luwuk Banggai diapresiasi.Apresiasi itu disampaikan oleh Kadisnakertrans Banggai, Ernaini Mustatim dan juga perwakilan Dinas Kertrans Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah, Zein, di acara Pembukaan Job Fair yang digelar AMIK Luwuk, Sabtu 30 Desember 2023, Hotel Estrella Luwuk.Hadir dalam kegiatan Job Fair yang dirangkaikan dengan acara wisuda itu yakni, Sekretaris Kabupaten Banggai, Ir. H. Abdullah Ali, Kepala LLDIKTI Wilayah XVI Gosulutteng, Munawir Razak, Ketua Yayasan Pendidikan Nurmal Luwuk, Dr. Marwan Londol, Direktur AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu, dan Wakil Rektor III Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Agung K Djibran.“Saya sangat mengapresiasi kegiatan wisuda yang dibarengi job fair ini. Ini luar biasa,” ucap kadisnakertrans Banggai, Ernaini Mustatim.Potensi pengangguran dari tahun ke tahun cukup banyak, mengingat tingginya luaran atau lulusan dari perguruan tinggi. Dan untuk mengetaskan kemiskinan merupakan tanggung jawab bersama.“Hari ini, AMIK Luwuk membuktikan itu. Membantu alumninya mendapatkan pekerjaan dengan membuka job fair yang bekerjasama dengan sejumlah perusahaan. Silakan adek-adek langsung mendaftar,” kata Kadis Emi, sapaan akrabnya.Dalam kesempatan itu, Kadisnakertrans Banggai juga mengingatkan kepada alumni AMIK Luwuk untuk segera membua AK1 atau kartu pencari kerja.“Jangan nanti saat mau melamar baru babuat, tapi buat memang dari sekarang” pesan Kadisnakertrans.Apresiasi juga disampaikan Kadisnakertrans Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah yang diwakili Zein.“Kegiatan bursa kerja ini sangat penting untuk membantu alumni mendapat informasi lowongan kerja. Memberikan kesempatan bagi pencari kerja, sesuai bakat dan keahlian,” katanya.Ia memberikan apresiasi yang setinggi-tingginya kepada AMIK Luwuk Banggai yang telah menggelar job fair.“Terima kasih kepada perusahaan mitra-mitra AMIK Luwuk yang telah bersedia membuka job fair,” tandasnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Holding a job fair or job fair for alumni and students, the Luwuk Banggai Academy of Information and Computer Management (AMIK) was appreciated. This appreciation was conveyed by the Kadisnakertrans Banggai, Ernaini Mustatim and also the representative of the Kertrans Department of Central Sulawesi Province, Zein, at the Job Opening event Fair held by AMIK Luwuk, Saturday 30 December 2023, Hotel Estrella Luwuk. Present at the Job Fair activities which were coupled with the graduation ceremony were the Secretary of Banggai Regency, Ir. H. Abdullah Ali, Head of LLDIKTI Region XVI Gosulutteng, Munawir Razak, Chair of the Nurmal Luwuk Education Foundation, Dr. Marwan Londol, Director of AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu, and Deputy Chancellor III Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Agung K Djibran. "I really appreciate the graduation activities which are accompanied by this job fair. "This is extraordinary," said the head of the Banggai Manpower and Transmigration Department, Ernaini Mustatim. The potential for unemployment from year to year is quite large, considering the high number of graduates from universities. And eradicating poverty is a shared responsibility." Today, AMIK Luwuk proves that. Helping alumni get jobs by opening job fairs in collaboration with a number of companies. Please register immediately," said Kadis Emi, his nickname. On that occasion, Kadisnakertrans Banggai also reminded AMIK Luwuk alumni to immediately make an AK1 or job seeker card. "Don't make it later when you want to apply, but do it from now "said Kadisnakertrans. Appreciation was also conveyed by Kadisnakertrans, Central Sulawesi Province, represented by Zein. "This job fair activity is very important to help alumni get information about job vacancies. "Providing opportunities for job seekers, according to their talents and skills," he said. He gave his highest appreciation to AMIK Luwuk Banggai for holding a job fair. "Thank you to AMIK Luwuk's partner companies for being willing to open a job fair," he said. . (*)

title: Alumni AMIK Luwuk Harus Kompetitif dan Mampu Ciptakan Lapangan Kerja
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Lulusan atau alumni Perguruan Tinggi atau Akademi, harus mampu berkompetitif untuk menciptakan lapangan kerja baru sesuai dengan latar belakang disiplin ilmu yang dimiliki. Untuk itu paradigma harus diubah, bukan lagi lulusan mencari pekerjaan, akan tetapi harus menciptakan lapangan kerja baru.Hal itu disampaikan oleh Sekretaris Kabupaten Banggai, Ir. H. Abdullah, M.Si. yang membacakan sambutan tertulis Bupati Banggai di acara Wisuda AMIK Luwuk ke-XVI Angkatan ke-XVIII Tahun Akademik 2022/2023 di Ballroom Maleo Hotel Estrella Luwuk.Pemerintah daerah kata dia, berharap agar para wisudawan dan wisudawati sebagai masyarakat intelektual mampu menjadi motivator dan dinamisator dalam membangun Kabupaten Banggai.Para alumni AMIK Luwuk Banggai kata Sekab Banggai, telah berhasil mengkaryakan dirinya di instansi pemerintah maupun swasta, dimana hal ini merupakan suatu kebanggaan atas keberhasilan penyelenggaraan pendidikan.Hal ini hendaknya tidak dipandang sebagai acara seremonial rutin saja, tetapi lebih dari itu harus disikapi secara arif dan bijak untuk melakukan koreksi terhadap proses manajerial penyelenggaraan pendidikan mulai dari perencanaan, pelaksanaan, pemantauan dan penilaian hasil yang telah dicapai.Seperti diketahui, wisuda AMIK Luwuk Banggai kali ini merupakan wisuda ke-XVI Angkatan ke-XVIII, dengan jumlah mahasiswa Diploma III yang diwisuda berjumlah 143 wisudawan/wisudawati.Ke 143 peserta wisuda itu terdiri dari dua program studi yakni Program Studi Manajemen Informatika dan Komputer 100 orang dan Program Studi Komputerisasi Akuntansi 43 orang.Direktur AMIK Luwuk Banggai Heriyanto Sahidu, S.Sos., S.Kom., M.M. diawal menyebutkan, bahwa AMIK Luwuk Banggai tidak hanya sekedar meluluskan mahasiswa tapi mereka juga punya tanggung jawab moral untuk  mencarikan mereka peluang pekerjaan.Olehnya, AMIK Luwuk Banggai melaksanakan Job Fair yang dikhususkan bagi mahasiswa aktif dan alumni. Puluhan lowongan kerja (loker) tersedia dalam job fair tersebut.Sementara itu, Ketua Yayasan Pendidikan Nurmal Dr. Marwan Londol mengingatkan keberhasilan ini merupakan langkah awal bagi para wisudawan dan wisudawati untuk terus dapat mengembangkan diri sekalipun tidak lagi berada di dalam lingkungan kampus.Hadir dalam wisuda kali ini Kepala LLDIKTI Wilayah XVI GOSULUTTENG, Munawir Sadzali Razak, S.Ip. M.A., Korwil Pengawasan Ketenagakerjaan Wilayah II Zein Akumo, S.H., M.H., sejumlah perwakilan Unsur Forkopimda, Kadis Nakertrans Kabupaten Banggai Hj. Ernaeni Mustatim, S.H., M.H., Kaban Kesbangpol Kabupaten Banggai Syaifuddin Muid, S.H., WR III Bidang Kemahasiswaan Unismuh Luwuk Dr. Agung Kurniawan Djibran, para orang-tua/wali wisudawan dan beberapa undangan lainnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Graduates or alumni of universities or academies must be able to compete to create new jobs according to their scientific disciplinary background. For this reason, the paradigm must be changed, graduates are no longer looking for work, but must create new jobs. This was conveyed by the Secretary of Banggai Regency, Ir. H. Abdullah, M.Si. who read the Banggai Regent's written speech at the XVIth AMIK Luwuk Graduation Ceremony for the XVIIIth Academic Year 2022/2023 in the Maleo Ballroom of the Estrella Hotel Luwuk. building Banggai Regency. The alumni of AMIK Luwuk Banggai, said the Banggai District Secretary, have succeeded in working for themselves in government and private agencies, which is a matter of pride for the success of providing education. This should not be seen as just a routine ceremonial event, but more than that it should be responded wisely and wisely to make corrections to the managerial process of providing education starting from planning, implementation, monitoring and evaluating the results that have been achieved. As is known, the graduation of AMIK Luwuk Banggai this time is the XVII graduation of the XVIIIth Class, with the number of Diploma students III who graduated totaled 143 graduates. The 143 graduation participants consisted of two study programs, namely the Informatics and Computer Management Study Program with 100 people and the Computerized Accounting Study Program with 43 people. Director of AMIK Luwuk Banggai Heriyanto Sahidu, S.Sos., S. Kom., M.M. At the beginning, it was stated that AMIK Luwuk Banggai not only graduates students but they also have a moral responsibility to find them job opportunities. Therefore, AMIK Luwuk Banggai carries out a Job Fair specifically for active students and alumni. Dozens of job vacancies (lockers) were available at the job fair. Meanwhile, Chairman of the Nurmal Education Foundation, Dr. Marwan Londol reminded that this success was the first step for graduates and female graduates to continue to develop themselves even though they were no longer on campus. Present at this graduation was the Head of LLDIKTI Region XVI GOSULUTTENG, Munawir Sadzali Razak, S.Ip. M.A., Regional Coordinator for Labor Inspection Region II Zein Akumo, S.H., M.H., a number of representatives of Forkopimda elements, Head of Nakertrans Banggai Regency Hj. Ernaeni Mustatim, S.H., M.H., Kaban Kesbangpol Banggai Regency Syaifuddin Muid, S.H., WR III Student Affairs Unismuh Luwuk Dr. Agung Kurniawan Djibran, parents/guardians of graduates and several other guests. (*)

title: Klinik Polres Banggai Sambut Hangat Kunjungan Tim Surveyor Akreditasi LAFKESPRI
text: Polresbanggai.com–polres banggaisecara resmi menyambut kedatangan tim surveyor akreditasi FKTP Klinik Pratama Polres Banggai oleh lembaga akreditasi LAFKESPRI, Sabtu (30/12/2023) pagi.Kedatangan Tim surveyor akreditasi di klinik Polres Banggai turut dihadiri ketua tim dr. Andi Patriani Patsyar, M. Kes dan Bertin Ayu Wandira, S.KM, M. Kes, Plh Kasi Dokkes Polres Banggai Aipda Yulius Tomiling, IPDA Zainuddin, SH serta dokter dan perawat klinik pratama Polres Banggai.Kedatangan tim ini dalam rangka melakukan peninjauan menyeluruh terhadap fasilitas dan prosedur medis yang ada di klinik Pratama Bhayangkara Polres Banggai.Dalam peninjauan tim surveyor, mereka melakukan penelusuran menyeluruh terhadap berbagai aspek yang berkaitan dengan operasional klinik, termasuk pemeriksaan ruang perawatan, perlengkapan medis, ketersediaan obat-obatan, kebersihan, serta dokumentasi medis.kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM, berharap bahwa Klinik Pratama Polres Banggai dapat meraih akreditasi yang baik.“Peninjauan akreditasi klinik ini diharapkan dapat memberikan rekomendasi dan saran yang berharga bagi Klinik kami dalam memperbaiki layanan yang ada,”ucap Kapolres.Sementara Plh Kasidokkes Aipda Yulius Tomiling, berharap bahwa klinik yang dipimpinnya dapat memenuhi semua persyaratan akreditasi dan terus meningkatkan pelayanan yang diberikan kepada personel Polres Banggai dan masyarakat.“Kami berkomitmen untuk memberikan pelayanan kesehatan yang berkualitas, kedatangan tim surveyor ini adalah kesempatan bagi kami untuk mengevaluasi dan meningkatkan kualitas pelayanan kami,” kata Yulius
text_en: Polresbanggai.com–Banggai Police officially welcomed the arrival of the Banggai Police Pratama Clinic FKTP accreditation surveyor team by the LAFKESPRI accreditation agency, Saturday (30/12/2023) morning. The arrival of the accreditation surveyor team at the Banggai Police Clinic was also attended by the team leader, Dr. Andi Patriani Patsyar, M. Kes and Bertin Ayu Wandira, S.KM, M. Kes, Plh Kasi Dokkes Banggai Police Aipda Yulius Tomiling, IPDA Zainuddin, SH as well as doctors and nurses at the Banggai Police Pratama Clinic. The arrival of this team was in order to carry out a comprehensive review regarding the medical facilities and procedures at the Pratama Bhayangkara clinic, Banggai Police. During the surveyor team's review, they carried out a thorough search of various aspects related to clinic operations, including inspection of treatment rooms, medical equipment, availability of medicines, cleanliness, and medical documentation. Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM, hopes that the Banggai Police Primary Clinic can achieve good accreditation. "It is hoped that this clinic's accreditation review can provide valuable recommendations and suggestions for our clinic in improving existing services," said the Police Chief. Meanwhile, Plh Kasidokkes Aipda, Yulius Tomiling, hopes that the clinic he leads can fulfill all accreditation requirements and continue to improve the services provided to Banggai Police personnel and the community. "We are committed to providing quality health services, the arrival of this surveyor team is an opportunity for us to evaluate and improve the quality of our services," said Yulius

title: Lomba Anyam Atap dan Engrang Meriahkan Pagelaran Seni Budaya Andio Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Pagelaran Seni dan Budaya Andio tahun 2023 sejak 28-31 Desember ini terbilang meriah.Berbagai lomba tradisional digelar dan menarik perhatian warga. Lomba tradisional yang digelar antara lain lomba menganyam atap atau dalam bahasa Andio disebut memaur atop, ada juga engrang atau patengkang dan lomba cukur kelapa atau mongkolis niu.Lomba tradisional itu cukup menghibur. Seperti lomba momaur atop, pesertanya justru kebanyakan ibu-ibu. Dengan terampilnya, mereka merajut lembar demi lembar daun sagu dan kemudian dijahit dengan rotan, hingga jadilah lembaran atap siap pakai. Keterampilan menganyam atap ini sudah mulai pudar, seiring munculnya atap buatan pabrik seperti seng dan multiroof. Karenanya, kegiatan membuat atap tradisional seperti itu diupayakan untuk dilestarikan melalui kegiatan pagelaran seni dan budaya Andio.Ada juga olahraga tradisional seperti engrang atau pateengkang yang diminati berbagai kalangan.Untuk bidang seni, panitia menggelar pidato bahasa Andio, bercerita dalam bahasa Andio hingga peragaan busana lokal, di samping tarian dan lagu Andio. DAR
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The 2023 Andio Arts and Culture Show from 28-31 December was quite lively. Various traditional competitions were held and attracted the attention of residents. Traditional competitions held include roof weaving competitions or in Andio language called memaur atop, there are also engrang or patengkang and coconut shaving competitions or mongkolis niu. These traditional competitions are quite entertaining. Like the momaur atop competition, the participants are mostly mothers. Skillfully, they knit sago leaves sheet by sheet and then sew them with rattan, until they become ready-to-use roofing sheets. The skill of weaving roofs has begun to fade, along with the emergence of factory-made roofs such as zinc and multiroof. Therefore, efforts are made to preserve traditional roof-making activities like this through Andio arts and cultural performances. There are also traditional sports such as engrang or pateengkang which are of interest to various groups. For the arts sector, the committee holds Andio language speeches, telling stories in Andio and even local fashion shows. , alongside Andio's dances and songs. DAR

title: Pisah Tahun 2023, Panwascam Luwuk Utara Memantau STTP
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Badan Pengawas Pemilu (Bawaslu) Kabupaten Banggai melalui Panitia Pengawas Kecamatan (Panwascam) Luwuk Utara melakukan koordinasi dengan Polsek Banggai untuk menyikapi surat tanda terima pemberitahuan (STTP) kampanye calon anggota legiatif (Caleg) di akhir tahun 2023.Sabtu (30/12/2023) kemarin, sekira pukul 09.30 Wita, Panwascam Luwuk Utara menemui Kapolsek Luwuk.Ketua Panwascam Luwuk Utara, Makatul Alkap menjelaskan, Panwascam Luwuk Utara melakukan koordinasi dengan Kapolsek Kota Luwuk, terkait patroli pengawasan di malam tahun baru, dan koordinasi terkait STTP yang disebarkan oleh Polsek Luwuk.“Agar lebih diperhatikan, dikarenakan sebagian besar Caleg saat kampanye memperlihatkan STTP, sehingga membuat kewalahan Panwascam. Beruntung ada PKD yang Standby di wilayahnya masing-masing, ” kata Makatul Alkap kepada Banggai Raya, Minggu (31/12/2023).Ia mengakui bahwa PKD di Luwuk Utara memiliki insting pengawasan yang tidak diragukan lagi.Bahkan kata dia, ada beberapa Caleg yang tidak ada surat pemberitahuan dan STTP, mereka dapat dan bisa melakukan pengawasan melekat.“Selain koordinasi, juga dalam waktu dekat, kami akan melakukan koordinasi tentang perekrutan pengawas TPS, agar bisa diketahui oleh Kapolsek Luwuk. Bukan hanya di Polsek, tapi di Koramil juga, kami akan berkunjung, agar tetap terjaga sinergitas antar penyelenggara dan pihak TNI/Polri tentunya,” Pungkasnya. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The Banggai Regency Election Supervisory Agency (Bawaslu) through the North Luwuk Subdistrict Supervisory Committee (Panwascam) is coordinating with the Banggai Police to respond to the notification receipt letter (STTP) of the legislative candidate (Caleg) campaign at the end of 2023. Saturday (30/ 12/2023) yesterday, at around 09.30 WITA, the North Luwuk Panwascam met with the Luwuk Police Chief. The Chair of the North Luwuk Panwascam, Makatul Alkap explained, the North Luwuk Panwascam coordinated with the Luwuk City Police Chief, regarding surveillance patrols on New Year's Eve, and coordination regarding the STTP which distributed by the Luwuk Police. "To get more attention, because most of the legislative candidates during the campaign showed STTP, which overwhelmed the Panwascam. "Luckily, there are PKDs that are on standby in their respective areas," said Makatul Alkap to Banggai Raya, Sunday (31/12/2023). for those who do not have a notification letter or STTP, they can and will carry out inherent supervision. "Apart from coordination, in the near future, we will also coordinate the recruitment of TPS supervisors, so that the Luwuk Police Chief can find out. "Not only at the Sector Police, but at the Koramil too, we will visit, so that synergy between the organizers and the TNI/Polri is maintained, of course," he concluded. RUM

title: Direktur AMIK Luwuk Ingatkan Alumni, Jaga Kredibilitas dan Nama Baik Almamater!
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Mewisuda 143 lulusan Ahli Madya Komputer pada Sabtu 30 Desember 2023 di Hotel Estrella Luwuk, ini pesan Direktur AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom, MM., kepada alumninya.Diketahui, sebanyak 143 lulusan yang diwisuda tahun ini terdiri dari dua program studi yaitu 100 orang Prodi Manajemen Informatika dan 43 orang Prodi Komputerisasi Akuntansi.Berikut sederet pesan Direktur Heri kepada ratusan alumninya di acara wisuda yang berlangsung di Hotel Estrella Luwuk.“Wisudawan sekalian yang berbahagia. Mulai hari ini, di pundak kalian masing-masing telah ada beban dan tanggung jawab Almamater yang cukup berat tetapi mulia. Perlu kalian sadari, bahwa keberhasilan kalian dalam menyandang gelar Ahli Madya Komputer, belumlah merupakan akhir dari pada upaya perjuangan saudara – saudara selama ini,” ucapnya.Sebagai seorang yang memiliki kompetensi di bidang tekhnologi informasi kata Direktur, hendaknya alumni mampu menjaga kredibilitas dan sikap intelektual serta menjaga citra dan nama baik Almamater di manapun berada.“Khusus kepada orang tua dan anggota keluarga wisudawan, pada kesempatan yang berbahagia ini, sekali lagi saya  turut berbahagia atas keberhasilan Bapak Ibu dalam mengasuh putra putrinya karena telah mendukung dan memotivasi perjuangan mereka sehingga dapat menyelesaikan studi  di AMIK Luwuk Banggai tepat waktu sehingga meraih gelar Ahli Madya Komputer,” ucapnya.Pada kesempatan itu, Ia tak luput menyampaikan terima kasih atas kerja sama yang baik selama ini dan kepercayaan yang diberikan kepada AMIK Luwuk Banggai. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Graduating 143 Associate Computer Expert graduates on Saturday 30 December 2023 at the Estrella Hotel Luwuk, this is the message from the Director of AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom, MM., to the alumni. It is known that as many as 143 graduates graduated this year This consists of two study programs, namely 100 people from the Informatics Management Study Program and 43 people from the Computerized Accounting Study Program. The following is a series of messages from Director Heri to hundreds of alumni at the graduation ceremony which took place at the Estrella Hotel Luwuk. "All happy graduates. Starting today, on each of your shoulders is the burden and responsibility of the Alma Mater which is quite heavy but noble. "You need to realize that your success in holding the title of Associate Computer Expert is not the end of your efforts so far," he said. As someone who has competence in the field of information technology, said the Director, alumni should be able to maintain credibility and intellectual attitude. as well as maintaining the image and good name of the Alma Mater wherever it is. "Especially to the parents and family members of graduates, on this happy occasion, once again I am happy for your success in raising your sons and daughters because you have supported and motivated their struggle so that they can complete "I studied at AMIK Luwuk Banggai on time and achieved the title of Associate Computer Expert," he said. On that occasion, he did not fail to express his gratitude for the good cooperation so far and the trust given to AMIK Luwuk Banggai. (*)

title: Gua Wira di Banggai, Lokasi Persembunyian Pejuang Andio di Tanah Masama
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Kegiatan Pagelaran Seni dan Budaya Andio tahun 2023 yang digelar masyarakat Kecamatan Masama, Kabupaten Banggai, juga diisi napak tilas dengan mengunjungi dua lokasi yang menjadi bagian dari sejarah perjuangan warga asli lembah Tompotika itu.Dua lokasi yang dikunjungi pada Minggu (31/12/2023), adalah Gua Wira di sisi barat Desa Ranga-Ranga serta Bukit Talubang yang kini berlokasi di Desa Kembang Merta (eks UPT Bali 1).Untuk menjangkau Gua Wira, bisa dilakukan dengan kendaraan bermotor dari arah Luwuk menuju Masama atau sebaliknya. Sampai di ujung Barat Desa Ranga-Ranga atau sekira 200 meter dari tugu batas Kecamatan Luwuk Timur dan Masama, perjalanan selanjutnya dilakukan dengan berjalan kaki mendaki gunung. Menurut Babinsa setempat Arwin Dahlan, jarak gua dari arah jalan provinsi itu sekira 300 meter, namun medannya cukup terjal.“Jaraknya hanya sekitar 300 meter ke arah gunung, namun kemiringan jalurnya mencapai 75 derajat,” kata Babinsa di hadapan peserta napak tilas.Dan benar, walaupun jaraknya terbilang dekat, namun untuk menjangkau gua, harus ditopang kondisi tubuh yang fit, sebab harus mendaki di kemiringan terjal. Jarak 300 meter dari jalan itu butuh waktu 30 menit untuk menjangkaunya dengan berjalan kaki. Karena kondisi jalan yang mendaki dengan kemiringan terjal, harus dilakukan dengan pelan dan sangat hati-hati, agar tidak terpeleset.Rasa letih dan tarikan napas yang ngos-ngosan akhirnya terbayar, setelah tiba di depan gua. Pemandangan menakjubkan karena gua yang dikelilingi batu cadas di bawah rindangnya pepohonan, seketika menghapus peluh dan rasa letih setelah mendaki. Sesekali terlihat ratusan burung walet bercampur kelelawar yang berhamburan keluar setelah tempat tinggal mereka didatangi manusia.Gua Wira sejatinya sudah cukup dikenal oleh banyak pencinta alam dan pendaki. Namun sayang, pemerintah daerah belum memberikan perhatian apapun terhadap gua yang oleh warga Andio, diyakini memiliki keterkaitan langsung dengan sejarah perjalanan dan perjuangan warga Andio dalam mempertahankan tanah Masama dari serangan Tobelo dan berlanjut dengan Belanda. Gua itu diyakini menjadi salah satu tempat persembunyian pejuang Andio saat tanah Masama diserbu Tobelo dan kemudian dijajah Belanda dan Jepang.Karena, pegiat pendidikan Masama seperti Istanto Bidja, sangat berharap kepedulian pemerintah daerah, baik itu Dinas Pariwisata maupun Dinas Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan, untuk memberi perhatian pada situs alam tersebut. “Paling kurang, ada program pembuatan jalur dalam bentuk tangga beton dengan tiang pengaman serta gazebo di beberapa titik untuk peristirahatan para pengunjung,” kata dia.Lokasi ini sejatinya memiliki nilai eksotis karena ada gua alam dan memiliki nilai sejarah. Tinggal pemerintah daerah, apakah mau memberi perhatian atau tidak.Napak tilas dalam rangka pagelaran Seni Budaya Andio ini, banyak diikuti kalangan pelajar, selain warga dan pemerhati pendidikan. Hal ini dimaksudkan guna memberi pemahaman dan mengenalkan kehidupan leluhur Andio, saat berjuang dan mempertahankan diri. DAR/**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The 2023 Andio Arts and Culture Performance held by the people of Masama District, Banggai Regency, also included a walkthrough by visiting two locations that are part of the history of the struggle of the native people of the Tompotika valley. The two locations were visited on Sunday (31/12 /2023), is the Wira Cave on the west side of Ranga-Ranga Village and Ta Lubang Hill which is now located in Kembang Merta Village (former UPT Bali 1). To reach Wira Cave, you can do this by motor vehicle from Luwuk to Masama or vice versa. Arriving at the western end of Ranga-Ranga Village or approximately 200 meters from the boundary monument of East Luwuk and Masama Districts, the next journey is done by walking up the mountain. According to local Babinsa Arwin Dahlan, the distance of the cave from the provincial road is approximately 300 meters, but the terrain is quite steep. "The distance is only about 300 meters to the mountain, but the slope of the path reaches 75 degrees," said Babinsa in front of the trail participants. And it's true , even though the distance is relatively short, to reach the cave, you must be supported by a fit body condition, because you have to climb on a steep slope. The distance is 300 meters from the road and it takes 30 minutes to reach it on foot. Due to the condition of the road which climbs with a steep slope, you have to do it slowly and very carefully, so as not to slip. The feeling of tiredness and gasping for breath finally paid off after arriving in front of the cave. The view is amazing because the cave is surrounded by rock under the shade of trees, instantly wiping away the sweat and fatigue after climbing. Occasionally hundreds of swallows and bats are seen scattering out after humans visit their homes. Wira Cave is actually quite well known to many nature lovers and climbers. However, unfortunately, the local government has not paid any attention to the cave which the Andio residents believe has a direct connection with the history of the journey and struggle of the Andio residents in defending Masama land from Tobelo attacks and continuing with the Dutch. The cave is believed to be one of the hiding places for Andio fighters when Masama land was invaded by Tobelo and then colonized by the Dutch and Japanese. Because, Masama education activists such as Istanto Bidja, really hope that the local government, both the Tourism Office and the Education and Culture Service, will pay attention at this natural site. "At the very least, there is a program for making paths in the form of concrete stairs with safety posts and gazebos at several points for visitors to rest," he said. This location actually has exotic value because there are natural caves and have historical value. It's up to the local government to decide whether they want to pay attention or not. Many students, apart from residents and education observers, took part in the Andio Cultural Arts performance. This is intended to provide understanding and introduce the life of Andio's ancestors, when they were fighting and defending themselves. DAR/**

title: Risdayanti dan I Kadek Raka Mahendra Jadi Wisudawan Terbaik AMIK Luwuk Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Akademi Manajemen Informatika dan Komputer (AMIK) Luwuk Banggai di bawah pimpinan Direktur Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom., MM., sukses mewisuda 143 lulusan Ahli Madya Komputer, Sabtu 30 Desember 2023.Prosesi sakral itu berlangsung di Hotel Estrella Luwuk, dan dihadiri Sekretaris Kabupaten Banggai, Ir. Abdullah Ali, Kepala LLDIKTI Wilayah XVI Gosulutteng, Munawir Razak, hingga Ketua Yayasan Pendidikan Nurmal Luwuk, Dr. Marwan Londol.Dari ratusan lulusan yang diwisuda, ada dua lulusan dari masing-masing program studi yang dinobatkan sebagai wisudawan terbaik tahun akademik 2022/2023.Pertama, untuk Prodi Manajemen Informatika, lulusan terbaik sukses diraih Risdayanti A.Md.Kom. Ia berhasil meraih IPK 3,68 predikat dengan pujian.Risdayanti, gadis cantik kelahiran  5 November 2002 ini merupakan pasangan dari Yori Aminullah dan Ibu Adawia Masir. Saat ini, ia tengah berwirausaha.Sementara untuk Prodi Komputerisasi Akuntansi, lulusan terbaik berhasil diraih I Kadek Raka Mahendra A.Md.Kom., dengan IPK 3,60. Saat ini, Ia telah bekerja di perusahaan.Lahir di Uwelolu, tanggal 17 Oktober 2002, I Kadek Raka Mahendra merupakan putra pasangan dari Bapak I Made Sukanada dan Ibu Ni Wayan Sudandri.Atas keberhasilan itu, kedua lulusan mendapatkan apresiasi berupa piagam penghargaan dan cendera mata uang diserahkan langsung oleh Direktur AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu dan Kaprodi di masing-masing prodi. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Luwuk Banggai Academy of Information and Computer Management (AMIK) under the leadership of Director Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom., MM., successfully graduated 143 Associate Computer Expert graduates, Saturday 30 December 2023. The sacred procession took place at Hotel Estrella Luwuk, and attended by the Secretary of Banggai Regency, Ir. Abdullah Ali, Head of LLDIKTI Region XVI Gosulutteng, Munawir Razak, and Chair of the Nurmal Luwuk Education Foundation, Dr. Marwan Londol. Of the hundreds of graduates who graduated, there were two graduates from each study program who were named the best graduates for the 2022/2023 academic year. Firstly, for the Informatics Management Study Program, the best graduate was successfully achieved by Risdayanti A.Md.Kom. She managed to achieve a GPA of 3.68 with honors. Risdayanti, this beautiful girl born on November 5 2002, is the partner of Yori Aminullah and Mrs. Adawia Masir. Currently, he is an entrepreneur. Meanwhile, for the Computerized Accounting Study Program, the best graduate was I Kadek Raka Mahendra A.Md.Kom., with a GPA of 3.60. Currently, he is working at a company. Born in Uwelolu, 17 October 2002, I Kadek Raka Mahendra is the son of Mr. I Made Sukanada and Mrs. Ni Wayan Sudandri. For this success, the two graduates received appreciation in the form of certificates of appreciation and souvenirs. The money was handed over directly by the Director of AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu and the Head of Study Program in each study program. (*)

title: Anti Murad Beri Sinyal Maju Bupati Banggai 2024
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Pemilihan Kepala Daerah (Pilkada) serentak akan berlangsung 2024 nanti, salah satunya daerah Kabupaten Banggai.Suliyanti Murad atau yang akrab disapa Anti Murad memberikan sinyal maju di Pemilihan Bupati Banggai nanti.” Insya Allah saya akan maju kembali di pemilihan Bupati Banggai,” kata Suliyanti.Meski demikian, anak ke lima almarhum Murad Husain mengatakan langkah menuju pencalonan Bupati Banggai, harus sejalan dengan target dalam pemilu 14 April 2024 dengan menempatkan 7 anggota legislatif DPRD Banggai.“Jika target 7 kursi terpenuhi, maka Gerindra bisa mengusung calon meski tanpa koalisi,” tuturnya.Selain target 7 kursi DPRD Banggai, memperjuangkan Amalya Murad untuk lolos sebagai anggota DPR RI dan Kemenangan Prabowo-Gibran juga sebagai prioritas Gerindra Kabupaten Banggai. “Terpenting lagi adalah terpilihnya Ibu Amalya dan kemenangan Capres dan Cawapres Prabowo-Gibran,” ungkapnya.Untuk diketahui bahwa Suliyanti Murad adalah Ketua DPC Gerindra Kabupaten Banggai. Ia pernah maju sebagai calon Bupati Banggai pada pemilihan 2020 lalu.Suliyanti saat itu berjuang bersama Zainal Alihamu, namun keberuntungan belum berpihak kepada keduanya.Saat ini, dorongan masyarakat agar Suliyanti Murad bertarung kembali di Pilkada Banggai terus meningkat, seiring dengan banyaknya masyarakat yang kecewa dengan pemerintahan saat ini. NAL
text_en: "BANGGAI RAYA-Simultaneous Regional Head Elections (Pilkada) will take place in 2024, one of which is the Banggai Regency area. Suliyanti Murad or who is familiarly known as Anti Murad has given a signal to move forward in the Banggai Regent Election later." "God willing, I will run again in the election for Regent of Banggai," said Suliyanti. However, the fifth child of the late Murad Husain said that the steps towards running for Regent of Banggai must be in line with the target in the April 14 2024 election by placing 7 legislative members in the Banggai DPRD. "If "The target of 7 seats is met, so Gerindra can nominate candidates even without a coalition," he said. Apart from the target of 7 seats in the Banggai DPRD, fighting for Amalya Murad to qualify as a member of the DPR RI and winning Prabowo-Gibran is also a priority for Gerindra, Banggai Regency. "The most important thing is the election of Mrs. Amalya and the victory of the presidential and vice presidential candidates Prabowo-Gibran," he said. Please note that Suliyanti Murad is the Chair of the Gerindra DPC, Banggai Regency. He once ran as a candidate for Regent of Banggai in the 2020 election. At that time, Suliyanti was fighting alongside Zainal Ratheramu, but luck was not on their side. Currently, the public's push for Suliyanti Murad to fight again in the Banggai Regional Election continues to increase, along with many people who are disappointed with current government. NAL

title: Penanganan Kasus Korupsi di Kejari Banggai, Kasus Talud Balantak Selatan dan Penyertaan Modal BUMDes Uso Masih Penyidikan
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Hingga akhir tahun 2023, Kejaksaan Negeri (Kejari) Banggai masih melakukan penyidikan terhadap dua perkara korupsi di Kabupaten Banggai.Kajari Banggai Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono dalam siaran pers akhir tahun yang disampaikan Kasi Intel Sarman Tandisau, menyebutkan bahwa dua perkara yang masih dalam penyidikan yakni dugaan tindak pidana korupsi Pekerjaan Rekonstruksi Talud Pengaman Pantai Desa Gorontalo Kecamatan Balantak Selatan Tahun Anggaran 2020/2021, serta dugaan tindak pidana korupsi penyalahgunaan keuangan penyertaan modal Badan Usaha Milik Desa (BUMDes) Berkah Uso Desa Uso Kecamatan Batui Kabupaten Banggai tahun 2017-2021.Selain kasus yang masih dalam tahap penyidikan, Kejari Banggai juga dugaan tindak pidana korupsi penyalahgunaan APBDesa Lobu tahun anggaran 2019 dan 2020 dengan terdakwa Lusiana Udopo, yang tengah dalam upaya hukum Kasasi ke Mahkamah Agung.Di tahun 2023, Kejari Banggai juga telah melakukan eksekusi terhadap tiga perkara korupsi, yakni tindak pidana korupsi penyimpangan jabatan yang dilakukan oknum Pemerintah Desa Tuntung terhadap masyarakat yang menerima pembayaran atas penggunaan lahan oleh perusahaan nikel PT Koninis Fajar Mineral, dengan terdakwa Tarif Tamagola.Kemudian perkara tindak pidana korupsi memberi suap atau hadiah kepada Dean Granovic selaku Kepala KUPP Kelas III Bunta tahun 2020 s/d 2022 dengan terdakwa Soehartono alias Hery, serta perkara tindak pidana korupsi pemerasan atau pungutan liar di kantor KUPP Kelas III Bunta tahun 2020 s/d 2022 dan tindak pidana pencucian uang menempatkan hasil kejahatan yang diperoleh dari tindak pidana korupsi, dengan terdakwa Dean Granovic. DAR/**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Until the end of 2023, the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office (Kejari) is still investigating two corruption cases in Banggai Regency. Kajari Banggai Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono in a year-end press release delivered by the Head of Intel, Sarman Tandisau, stated that the two cases were still in progress. The investigation is an alleged criminal act of corruption in the work on the reconstruction of coastal safety taluds in Gorontalo Village, South Balantak District, 2020/2021 Fiscal Year, as well as an alleged criminal act of corruption, financial misuse of capital participation in Berkah Uso Village-Owned Enterprises (BUMDes), Uso Village, Batui District, Banggai Regency, 2017-2021. .In addition to the case which is still in the investigation stage, the Banggai Prosecutor's Office is also suspected of a criminal act of corruption in the misuse of the Lobu Village APBD for the 2019 and 2020 fiscal years with the defendant Lusiana Udopo, who is currently in the process of cassation to the Supreme Court. In 2023, the Banggai Prosecutor's Office will also carry out the execution of three corruption cases, namely the criminal act of malfeasance in office committed by members of the Tuntung Village Government against people who received payments for land use by the nickel company PT Koninis Fajar Mineral, with the defendant Tarif Tamagola. Then there is the criminal act of corruption in giving bribes or gifts to Dean Granovic as Head of the KUPP Class III Bunta from 2020 to 2022 with the defendant Soehartono alias Hery, as well as cases of corruption, extortion or illegal levies at the KUPP Class III Bunta office from 2020 to 2022 and the crime of money laundering placing the proceeds of crime obtained from the crime. corruption crime, with the defendant Dean Granovic. DAR/**

title: 19 Mahasiswa Unismuh Luwuk Lolos Pertukaran Mahasiswa, Berikut Nama dan Kampus Tujuannya!
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Luar biasa, 19 mahasiswa Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk dari berbagai fakultas lolos dalam program pertukaran mahasiswa merderka angkatan 4 tahun 2023.Prestasi membanggakan ini menjadi kado spesial untuk kampus hijau di akhir tahun 2023, dan menyambut tahun baru 2024.“Alhamdulillah, 19 mahasiswa kami lolos dalam pertukaran mahasiswa merderka angkatan 4. Ini sangat luar biasa,” ungkap Wakil Rektor III Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Agung K Djibran kepada Banggai Raya, Sabtu 30 Desember 2023.Ia mengaku bangga, atas prestasi yang ditorehkan mahasiswanya karena mampu berkompetisi di tingkat nasional dalam program pertukaran mahasiswa merderka.“Pendaftar 66 mahasiswa, dan Alhamdulillah yang lolos 19 orang. Untuk yang lolos selamat dan yang belum lolos, terus berusaha agar ke depannya bisa lolos,” pesannya.Berikut daftar nama-nama mahasiswa dan kampus tujuan.1.  Nama: Muh. text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Extraordinarily, 19 Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk students from various faculties passed the 2023 independent student exchange program class 4. This proud achievement is a special gift for the green campus at the end of 2023, and welcoming the new year 2024. "Alhamdulillah ", 19 of our students passed the 4th batch of Independent Student Exchange. This is very extraordinary," said Deputy Chancellor III Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Agung K Djibran to Banggai Raya, Saturday 30 December 2023. He admitted that he was proud of the achievements made by his students because they were able to compete at the national level in the independent student exchange program. "66 students were registered, and thank God 19 people passed. "For those who passed safely and those who haven't yet, keep trying so that in the future you can pass," he said. title: Keren, AMIK Luwuk Raih 2 Penghargaan di Bidang Penelitian
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Berbagai prestasi mampu ditorehkan Akademi Manajemen Informatika dan Komputer (AMIK) Luwuk sepanjang tahun 2023.Di antaranya di bidang penelitian dan pengabdian kepada masyarakat. Bahkan kampus vokasi itu, sukses meraih dua penghargaan dari LLDIKTI Wilayah XVI.Keberhasil dalam bidang penelitian ini diungkapkan Direktur AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom, MM., dalam laporan akademiknya di acara Wisuda ke XVI, Sabtu 30 Desember 2023.Dua penghargaan Anugerah LLDIKTI WILAYAH 16 tahun 2023 itu yakni dinobatkansebagai silver winer kategori perguruan tinggi vokasi dengan kualitas kepatuhan pelaporan IKU 5 terbaik.Kemudian, dinobatkan sebagai silver winer kategori perguruan tinggi vokasi dengan kinerja penelitian terbaik.Sebelumnya, Direktur Heri, sapaan akrabnya menjelaskan, bahwa dalam Bidang Penelitian dan Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat, AMIK Nurmal Luwuk Bangai telah bekerja sama dengan beberapa SKPD khususnya pada Badan Kesatuan Bangsa  dan Politik (Kesbangpol Kabupaten Banggai  untuk membangun aplikasi system penunjang keputusan deteksi dini konflik.Hasil penelitian ini kolaborasi antara dosen dan mahasiswa, dan Alhamdulillah hasil penelitian  tersebut digunakan pada badan lingkungan hidup kab. Banggai kemudian hasil project penelitian antara dosen dan mahasiswa yang sekarang digunakan pada DUDI yaitu system informasi hotel  pada penginapan azari Luwuk Banggai.“Alhamdulillah hasil project tersebut telah digunaka. Untuk dapat mempublikasisikan hasil penelitian dosen LP2M AMIK Nurmal Luwuk Banggai telah memiliki jurnal ilmiah  yang diberi nama jurnal ilmiah system manajemen informatika dan komputerisasi akuntansi (JISIMKA) dengan ISSN 2623-1956 dan jurnal ini dapat diakses secara online pada website : jurnal.amik-nurmal.ac.id,” jelasnya.Kemudian, di bidang pengabdian masyarakat LP2M AMIK Luwuk Banggai mempunyai program yaitu kuliah kerja mandiri kelompok.  Kegiatan ini dkhususkan sebagai sarana untuk berbagi ilmu kepada masyarakat kaitan dengan masalah tekhnologi informasi, misalnya pelatihan tekhnisi computer, design grafis, networking dan programmer kegiatan ini melibatkan mahasiswa dan dosen. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Luwuk Academy of Informatics and Computer Management (AMIK) was able to make various achievements throughout 2023, including in the fields of research and community service. In fact, the vocational campus successfully won two awards from LLDIKTI Region 2023. The two LLDIKTI WILAYAH 16 2023 Anugerah awards were crowned as silver winner in the vocational college category with the best IKU 5 reporting compliance quality. Then, he was crowned as silver winner in the vocational college category with the best research performance. , that in the field of Research and Community Service, AMIK Nurmal Luwuk Bangai has collaborated with several SKPD, especially at the National Unity and Political Agency (Kesbangpol Banggai Regency) to build a decision support system application for early conflict detection. The results of this research are collaboration between lecturers and students, and Alhamdulillah, the results of the research were used by the district environmental agency. Banggai was then the result of a research project between lecturers and students which is now being used at DUDI, namely the hotel information system at the Luwuk Banggai Azari Inn. "Thank God the results of the project have been used. To be able to publish research results, LP2M AMIK lecturer Nurmal Luwuk Banggai has a scientific journal called the scientific journal of information management systems and computerized accounting (JISIMKA) with ISSN 2623-1956 and this journal can be accessed online on the website: Jurnal.amik-nurmal. ac.id," he explained. Then, in the field of community service, LP2M AMIK Luwuk Banggai has a program, namely group independent work lectures. This activity is dedicated as a means to share knowledge with the public regarding information technology issues, for example training in computer technicians, graphic design, networking and programming. This activity involves students and lecturers. (*)

title: Heboh! Seorang Ibu Melahirkan di Dalam Mobil Driver Maxim Perjalanan ke RSUD Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Subhanallah, seorang pelanggan driver mobil Maxim Luwuk yang tengah hamil tua melahirkan bayinya dengan selamat.Uniknya, seorang ibu yang diduga berinisial N itu melahirkan di dalam mobil sang driver Mobil Maxim perjalanan Tontouan ke RSUD Luwuk, Kamis malam 28 Desember 2023.Melahirkan di dalam mobil, merupakan kejadian langkah. Kejadian itu pun membuat heboh rekan-rekan driver online lainnya.Berikut kronologis seorang ibu melahirkan anak perempuannya di dalam mobil Avanza, milik driver Rijal yang merupakan anggota atau driver Maxim Luwuk.Diceritakan admin lapangan Maxim Kota Luwuk, Dhani, saat itu driver Rijal tengah berada di wilayah Kelurahan Karaton, Kecamatan Luwuk.Saat berada di Karaton, orderan otomatis yakni pelanggan atas nama Iin masuk ke akun Rijal sekitar Pukul 20.24 WITA.“Masuk otomatis, saya lihat keterangan katanya darurat (imargency). Jadi saya cepat-cepat ke Tontouan,” kata Rijal, melalui pesan suara yang diteruskan admin via pesan WhatsApp.Setelah ditelepon atau dihubungi akhirnya tiba di lokasi pejemputan. Kemudian pelanggan naik di mobil, driver Rijal pun memacu kendaraannya agar segera tiba di RSUD Luwuk.“Ini ibu di dalam mobil, posisi so baring memang. Saya memacu kendaraan, klakson-klakson untuk memberi peringatan bahwa lagi emergency. Soalnya tidak ada pengawalan,” katanya.Saat memacu kendaraan, dan ketika melintasi Jalan Kelurahan Soho, sang ibu melahirkan normal. Suara tangis sang bayi pun terdengar oleh driver.“Pas di Soho, kedengaran suara bayi nangis. Di situlah melahirkan ini ibu. Saya spontan, langsung semakin cepat untuk segera sampai di RSUD Luwuk,” jelasnya.Puji syukur, ibu dan bayi kata Rijal, dalam kondisi selamat.“Alhamdulillah selamat semuanya, bayi dan ibunya,” kata Rijal, yang terharu bisa membantu mengantarkan seorang ibu ke RSUD Luwuk dan melahirkan di dalam mobilnya.Haru dan bangga pun dirasa driver Rijal, bahkan Ia menggratiskan biaya perjalanan pelanggannya yang melahirkan di dalam mobil saat menuju RSUD Luwuk.“Saya gratiskan, kapan lagi saya bisa batolong begini. Melahirkan di dalam mobil, ini langkah sekali, semoga ibu dan bayinya diberikan kesehatan,” ucapnya.Aksi yang dilakukan Rijal pun mendapat apresiasi setinggi-tingginya dari Owner Maxim Kota Luwuk. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Subhanallah, a customer of the Maxim Luwuk car driver who was heavily pregnant gave birth to her baby safely. Uniquely, a mother who allegedly had the initials N gave birth in the Maxim Car driver's car on her way to the Luwuk Regional Hospital, Thursday evening 28 December 2023. Giving birth in a car, is a step event. This incident also caused a stir among other online drivers. The following is the chronology of a mother giving birth to her daughter in an Avanza car, owned by driver Rijal who is a member or driver of Maxim Luwuk. As told by Maxim Luwuk City field admin, Dhani, at that time driver Rijal was there. in the Karaton Village area, Luwuk District. While in Karaton, an automatic order, namely a customer in the name of Iin, entered Rijal's account at around 20.24 WITA. "It entered automatically, I saw a statement saying emergency (immargency). "So I quickly went to Tontouan," said Rijal, via a voice message that was forwarded by the admin via WhatsApp message. After being called or contacted, he finally arrived at the pick-up location. Then the customer got into the car, driver Rijal accelerated his vehicle to quickly arrive at the Luwuk District Hospital. "This is mother in the car, really lying down. I drove the vehicle, honking the horn to warn me that there was an emergency. "The problem is there was no escort," he said. While driving the vehicle and crossing Soho Village Road, the mother gave birth normally. The driver could hear the sound of the baby crying. "Just in Soho, I heard the sound of a baby crying. That's where this mother gave birth. "I spontaneously, immediately got faster and faster to arrive at Luwuk Regional Hospital," he explained. Praise be to God, the mother and baby, said Rijal, were safe. "Thank God, everyone is safe, the baby and mother," said Rijal, who was moved to help take a mother to Luwuk Regional Hospital and gave birth in his car. Driver Rijal felt emotion and pride, he even waived the travel costs for his customers who gave birth in the car on their way to Luwuk Regional Hospital. "I'm free, when else can I help like this. "Giving birth in a car, this is one step, hopefully the mother and baby will be given health," he said. Rijal's action also received the highest appreciation from the owner of Maxim, Luwuk City. (*)

title: Problem Solving Masalah Limbah Rumah Tangga, Polsek Luwuk Mediasi Kedua Belah Pihak
text: Polresbanggai.com– Personil Polsekluwukmelaksanakan problem solving masalah kendang ayam yang limbahnya tersebut menggangu pemukiman warga sekitar sehingga menyebabkan selisih paham, Kamis (28/12/2023) pukul 09.00 Wita.Permasalahan ini bermula, dimana pembuangan limbah rumah tangga milik Abang Yusli mengalir sampai ke depan rumah milik Suarni Djalumang di Jalan Maramis Kelurahan Luwuk. Sehingga meresahkan dengan adanya bau busuk dan lalat.Mendengar keluhan tersebut, Bhabinkamtibmas bersama Lurah dan Babinsa memediasi kedua belah pihak, dan setelah diberi pengertian, mereka sepakat untuk saling memaafkan.“Bahwa perlunya persamaan persepsi dari kedua belah pihak, dalam hidup bertetangga selalu mengedepankan sanitasi bersih lingkungan dan utamakan hubungan baik antar sesama,” ujarkapolsekLuwuk Z. Ginoga.“Agar diselesaikan secara kekeluargaan dan perlu adanya komunikasi yang baik antar keduanya,” sebut Kapolsek.Hasil mediasi disepakati bahwa terlapor bersedia akan segera memperbaiki pipa pembuangan air limbah rumah tangga yang bocor dan rusak.Humaspolres banggai
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– Polsekluwuk personnel carried out problem solving regarding chicken drums whose waste disturbed local residents' settlements, causing disagreements, Thursday (28/12/2023) at 09.00 WITA. This problem started, where Abang Yusli's household waste flowed to the in front of Suarni Djalumang's house on Jalan Maramis, Luwuk Village. So it was disturbing because of the rotten smell and flies. Hearing these complaints, Bhabinkamtibmas together with the Village Head and Babinsa mediated between both parties, and after being given an understanding, they agreed to forgive each other. "clean the environment and prioritize good relations between people," said Luwuk Police Chief Z. Ginoga. "So that it is resolved amicably and there needs to be good communication between the two," said the Police Chief. As a result of the mediation, it was agreed that the reported party was willing to immediately repair the leaking household wastewater pipe. and damaged. Humaspolres is proud of it

title: Tim Inafis Polres Banggai Selidiki Kasus Pencurian di Desa Bubung, Kerugian Rp 12 Juta
text: KABAR LUWUK –Tim Inafis Polres BanggaiSelidiki Kasus Pencurian di Desa Bubung, Kerugian Rp 12 Juta. Tim IndonesianAutomatic Fingerprints Identification System (Inafis)SatreskrimPolres Banggaitengah intensif melakukan penyelidikan terkait kasus pencurian yang terjadi diDesa Bubung,Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan.Kejadian tersebut diketahui pada Kamis (28/12/2023) sekitar pukul 10.30 Wita dan dilaporkan melalui Nomor Laporan Polisi LP/B/754/XII/2023/SPKT/Res Banggai/Polda Sulteng. Kamis, 29 Desember 2023Menurut keteranganKasat Reskrim Polres Banggai, AKP Tio Tondy,tim Inafis telah melakukan olah Tempat Kejadian Perkara (TKP) untuk mengumpulkan bukti dan petunjuk terkait kejadian tersebut.Korban atas nama Arifin Morintoh (53) melaporkan kejadian tersebut pada pukul 08.00 Wita setelah menemukan keadaan rumahnya yang telah dirusak oleh pencuri.Saksi-saksi yang terlibat dalam kejadian ini, seperti Indah Permata Sari Morintoh (23), memberikan keterangan bahwa saat tiba di rumahnya di Desa Bubung, ia menemukan rumah dalam keadaan berantakan.“Ditemukannya jendela rumah bagian samping sudah dirusak dengan cara dicungkil,” ujar AKP Tio.Anjas Suyono, penjaga rumah tersebut, menjelaskan bahwa pada Rabu (27/12/2023) sekitar pukul 20.00 Wita, ia meninggalkan rumah tersebut dalam keadaan terkunci.Namun, ia terkejut ketika Indah memberitahu bahwa rumah tersebut telah menjadi sasaran pencurian.“Akibat dari kejadian tersebut, hilang 1 unit Keyboard merk Yamaha dan 20 Kg Kemiri dengan total kerugian kurang lebih Rp 12 Juta,” jelas Kasat Tio.Pihak kepolisian masih terus melakukan penyelidikan untuk mengidentifikasi pelaku dan memulihkan barang-barang yang hilang.Masyarakat diminta untuk memberikan informasi apapun yang dapat membantu penyelesaian kasus ini kepada pihak berwajib.Kasus pencurian ini menjadi perhatian serius tim Inafis untuk mengungkap keberadaan pelaku dengan memanfaatkan teknologi canggih dan analisis forensik. **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Police Inafis Team Investigates Theft Case in Bubung Village, Losses IDR 12 Million. The Indonesian Automatic Fingerprints Identification System (Inafis) team at the Banggaitengah Police Criminal Investigation Unit is intensively carrying out investigations related to the theft case that occurred in Bubung Village, South Luwuk District. The incident was discovered on Thursday (28/12/2023) at around 10.30 WITA and was reported via Police Report Number LP/B /754/XII/2023/SPKT/Res Banggai/Central Sulawesi Regional Police. Thursday, 29 December 2023 According to the Head of Criminal Investigation Unit of the Banggai Police, AKP Tio Tondy, the Inafis team has carried out a crime scene investigation (TKP) to collect evidence and clues regarding the incident. The victim, Arifin Morintoh (53), reported the incident at 08.00 WITA after found that her house had been damaged by thieves. Witnesses involved in this incident, such as Indah Permata Sari Morintoh (23), stated that when she arrived at her house in Bubung Village, she found the house in a messy condition. "The side has been damaged by gouging," said AKP Tio. Anjas Suyono, the house guard, explained that on Wednesday (27/12/2023) at around 20.00 WITA, he left the house locked. However, he was surprised when Indah told him that the house had been the target of theft. "As a result of this incident, 1 unit of Yamaha brand keyboard and 20 kg of Candlenut were lost with a total loss of approximately Rp. 12 million," explained Head of Sat Tio. The police are still continuing to carry out investigations to identify the perpetrator and recover the goods. - missing items. The public is asked to provide any information that can help resolve this case to the authorities. This theft case is of serious concern to the Inafis team to reveal the whereabouts of the perpetrator by utilizing advanced technology and forensic analysis. **

title: Jelang Tahun Baru, Warga Luwuk Serbu Pusat Perbelanjaan, Serba Rp10 Ribu Hingga Rp35 Ribu Paling Dicari
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Jelang akhir tahun 2023 dan menyambut tahun baru 2024, warga Kota Luwuk dan sekitarnya menyerbu pusat perbelanjaan Shopping Mall Luwuk, Jumat malam 29 Desember 2023.Tampak ratusan warga silih berganti memadati pusat perbelanjaan tersebut.Tidak hanya warga Kota Luwuk, ada juga dari luar kota hingga kabupaten tetangga. Mereka begitu antusias memadati pusat perbelanjaan yang dibilang sangat murah itu.Berdasarkan amatan media ini, ratusan warga lebih banyak menyerbu toko serba Rp35 Ribu. Ada juga yang lagi viral beberapa hari ini, serba Rp10 Ribu.Berbagai pakaian yang dibeli dan dicari konsumen, mulai dari baju anak-anak hingga dewasa.“Ya ya silakan dipilih-pilih, harga murah, ada yang Rp35 Ribu, Rp25 ribu. Harga sangat terjangkau, ya mari-mari ibu,” kata penjual di toko Raisya.Di tokoh serba Rp35 ribu, tampak para pembeli berdesak-desakan untuk berebut memilih baju yang akan dibelinya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Approaching the end of 2023 and welcoming the new year 2024, residents of Luwuk City and its surroundings invaded the Shopping Mall Luwuk shopping center, Friday evening 29 December 2023. Hundreds of residents were seen taking turns filling the shopping center. Not only residents of Luwuk City, there were also people from outside the city to neighboring districts. They were very enthusiastic about filling the shopping center which was said to be very cheap. Based on media observations, hundreds of more residents rushed to the IDR 35 thousand convenience store. There is also something that has gone viral in recent days, all Rp. 10 thousand. Consumers are buying and looking for various clothes, ranging from children's clothes to adults. "Yes, please take your pick, the prices are cheap, some are Rp. 35 thousand, Rp. 25 thousand. "The price is very affordable, come on, ma'am," said the seller at the Raisya shop. At Rp. 35 thousand, buyers were seen jostling to choose the clothes they wanted to buy. (*)

title: Perayaan Natal Oikumene di Kabupaten Banggai, Bupati Amirudin Ajak Jaga Persatuan dan Damai
text: KABAR LUWUK –Perayaan Natal Oikumenedi Kabupaten Banggai,Bupati AmirudinAjak Jaga Persatuan dan Damai.Bupati Banggai Ir. H. Amirudin, M.M. menghadiri Perayaan Natal Oikumene yang diselenggarakan bersama Gereja-Gereja, Korpri, TNI, Polri, BUMN, BUMD,Dharma Wanita Persatuan, dan TP-PKKKabupaten BanggaiTahun 2023 pada Kamis malam (28/12/2023).Acara ini juga dihadiri oleh Unsur Forkopimda, para Pimpinan OPD, serta jemaat Kristiani lainnya.Kamis Malam, 29 Desember 2023.Dalam sambutannya,Bupati H. Amirudinmenyampaikan pesan damai, menekankan bahwa keberagaman suku dan agama di Indonesia dapat hidup harmonis.“Kegiatan seperti ini memperlihatkan kepada semua orang bahwa sesungguhnya Damai Itu Indah.Saya berharap kebersamaan ini terus terjalin,” ujarnya, sambil menegaskan bahwa kegiatan semacam ini adalah bentuk persatuan yang harus dijaga.Bupati Amirudin percaya bahwa keberagaman akan terus menjadi kekuatan jika dijaga dengan baik.“Kedamaian akan terus bersama bila ini terus dipertahankan,” tambahnya, mengajak seluruh masyarakat untuk terus memelihara kerukunan dan persatuan.Sebelumnya, Pdt. Niel Parinsi, Ketua Badan Musyawarah Antar Gereja (BAMAG) Kabupaten Banggai dan Ketua Jemaat GKI Luwuk, menyampaikan bahwa perayaan Natal adalah wujud kasih Allah yang harus ditunjukkan kepada dunia. Dalam hal ini, ia juga mengajak masyarakat Banggai untuk menunjukkan kasih kepada kabupaten mereka.Ketua BAMAG menyampaikan terima kasih atas dukungan dari Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai, menggarisbawahi pentingnya kerjasama antara pemerintah dan gereja dalam menciptakan suasana damai dan penuh kasih di tengah masyarakat.Dalam kesempatan yang sama, Kepala Kantor Kementerian Agama Kabupaten Banggai, Drs. H. Ma’sum Rumi, M.M., menyatakan bahwa Kementerian Agama memiliki tanggung jawab untuk mengurus agama, termasuk di Kabupaten Banggai.Ia menekankan pentingnya moderasi beragama dan menyambut baik peningkatan signifikan moderasi beragama di kabupaten tersebut.Rencananya, di tahun 2024, Kakan Kemenag Ma’sum menargetkan peningkatan lebih lanjut dalam program moderasi beragama.“Ini harus dipertahankan, bahkan ditingkatkan,” katanya, menandaskan komitmen untuk menjaga kerukunan antar umat beragama di Banggai.Perayaan Natal Oikumene tahun ini tidak hanya menjadi momen keagamaan, tetapi juga momentum untuk memperkuat persatuan dan kerukunan di tengah keberagaman masyarakat Banggai.Semangat damai dan toleransi yang diperlihatkan dalam perayaan ini diharapkan dapat menjadi inspirasi untuk kehidupan sehari-hari yang lebih harmonis di masa depan.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Ecumenical Christmas Celebration in Banggai Regency, Regent Amirudin Invites to Maintain Unity and Peace. Banggai Regent Ir. H. Amirudin, M.M. attended the Ecumenical Christmas Celebration which was held jointly with the Churches, Korpri, TNI, Polri, BUMN, BUMD, Dharma Wanita Perempuan, and TP-PKKK Banggai Regency in 2023 on Thursday evening (28/12/2023). This event was also attended by elements of Forkopimda, OPD Leaders, as well as other Christian congregations. Thursday Evening, 29 December 2023. In his speech, Regent H. Amirudin conveyed a message of peace, emphasizing that the diversity of ethnicities and religions in Indonesia can live in harmony. "Activities like this show everyone that Peace really is "Beautiful. I hope that this togetherness will continue to exist," he said, while emphasizing that activities like this are a form of unity that must be maintained. Regent Amirudin believes that diversity will continue to be a strength if maintained well. "Peace will continue to be together if this continues to be maintained," he added, inviting the entire community to continue maintaining harmony and unity. Previously, Pdt. Niel Parinsi, Chair of the Banggai Regency Inter-Church Deliberative Body (BAMAG) and Chair of the GKI Luwuk Congregation, said that the Christmas celebration is a manifestation of God's love that must be shown to the world. In this case, he also invited the people of Banggai to show love for their district. The Chairman of BAMAG expressed his gratitude for the support from the Banggai District Government, underlining the importance of cooperation between the government and the church in creating a peaceful and loving atmosphere in the community. On the same occasion , Head of the Banggai Regency Ministry of Religion Office, Drs. H. Ma'sum Rumi, M.M., stated that the Ministry of Religion has the responsibility to manage religion, including in Banggai Regency. He emphasized the importance of religious moderation and welcomed the significant increase in religious moderation in the district. The plan is that in 2024, Head of the Ministry of Religion Ma 'sum targets further improvement in the religious moderation program. "This must be maintained, even improved," he said, emphasizing his commitment to maintaining harmony between religious communities in Banggai. This year's Ecumenical Christmas celebration is not only a religious moment, but also a momentum to strengthen unity and harmony amidst the diversity of the Banggai people. It is hoped that the spirit of peace and tolerance shown in this celebration can be an inspiration for a more harmonious daily life in the future.**

title: Pemilu Damai 2024, Satintelkam Polres Banggai Aktif Gelar Pembinaan Dengan Kelompok Mahasiswa
text: Polresbanggai.com–polres banggaimelalui Satintelkam aktif melakukan pembinaan dengan melakukan dialog interaktif kebangsaan dengan para akademisi ataupun kelompok mahasiswa dikabupaten banggai.Kasat Intelkam Polres Banggai AKP Usman, mengatakan, dialog kebangsaan tersebut guna mewujudkan Pemilu 2024 aman dan damai serta memperkokoh persatuan dan kesatuan bangsa.“Kegiatan ini bertujuan untuk menjalin silaturahmi dengan para kelompok mahasiswa ataupun akademisi di Kabupaten Banggai,” ungkapnya saat ditemui awak media, Jumat (28/12/2023) di Kawasan Bukit Halimun.Dalam dialog tersebut, kata Usman, pihaknya selalu mengajak agar para pemuda sebagai agen perubahan (Agent Of Change) terus memperkokoh persatuan dan kesatuan bangsa terlebih selama pesta demokrasi.“Kami mengajak para pemuda dapat selektif dalam menentukan pilihannya saat Pemilu nanti, tapi tetap menjaga persatuan demi kamtibmas yang kondusif,” bebernya.Ia menambahkan, perbedaan pilihan selama proses pesta demokrasi merupakan hal yang wajar namun tidak memutuskan silaturahmi.“Harapan kami perhelatan Pemilu 2024 di Kabupaten Banggai berjalan aman, damai, tertib dan tentunya kondusif,” harapnya
text_en: Polresbanggai.com–Banggai Police, through Satintelkam, is actively providing guidance by conducting interactive national dialogue with academics or student groups in Banggai Regency. Head of Intelligence and Security at Banggai Police, AKP Usman, said that the national dialogue is aimed at making the 2024 elections safe and peaceful and strengthening national unity. "This activity aims to establish friendship with student groups or academics in Banggai Regency," he said when met by media crew, Friday (28/12/2023) in the Bukit Halimun area. In this dialogue, said Usman, his party always invites young people to as an agent of change (Agent of Change) continues to strengthen national unity and unity, especially during the democratic party. "We invite young people to be selective in making their choices during the next election, but still maintain unity for the sake of conducive social security and order," he explained. He added that there are differences in choices. during the democratic party process, this is a normal thing but does not break ties. "We hope that the 2024 election event in Banggai Regency will be safe, peaceful, orderly and of course conducive," he hoped.

title: Antisipasi Kemacetan, Personel Pos Pam Ops Lilin Polsek Luwuk Lakukan Pengaturan Arus Lalu Lintas
text: Polresbanggai.com– Dalam rangka peningkatan pelayanan Polri selama Natal dan Tahun Baru (Nataru) personel Polsekluwuk, melaksanakan pengaturan arus lalu lintas di depan Pos Pengamanan Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023, Kamis (28/12/2023).Pengaturan arus lalu lintas dilakukan di depan Pos Pengamanan yang berada di Jalan Trans Sulawesi, Kelurahan Bungin, Kecamatan Luwuk,kabupaten banggaiini dilakukan guna mencegah terjadinya kepadatan dan kemacetan.“Pengaturan arus lalu lintas ini sebagai kewajiban memberikan pelayanan kepada masyarakat dan merupakan tugas serta tanggung jawab demi tercipta arus lalin yang aman, tertib dan lancar,” ungkapkapolsekLuwuk Kompol Z. Ginoga.Ginoga menjelaskan, selain TNI-Polri di Pos Pengamanan itu juga ditempatkan petugas tenaga Kesehatan dengan tujuan apabila terdapat masyarakat yang membutuhkan bantuan dengan cepat ditindak lanjuti.“Seperti biasanya dari Dinas Kesehatan berintegrasi dengan kepolisian di posko pengamanan untuk memberikan pelayanan dan pertolongan kepada masyarakat,” jelasnya.Terpisah, Kasi Humaspolres banggaiIptu Al Amin S. Muda memastikan kesiapan anggota dan Pos pelayanan / pengamanan dapat memberikan rasa aman dan nyaman kepada masyarakat.“Harapannya Pos pengamanan dan pelayanan Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023 ini diharapkan dapat memberikan rasa aman dan nyaman kepada masyarakat selama Nataru,” harap Kasi Humas
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– In order to improve Polri services during Christmas and New Year (Nataru), Polsekluwuk personnel carried out traffic flow arrangements in front of the 2023 Tinombala Candle Operation Security Post, Thursday (28/12/2023). Traffic flow arrangements were carried out in front This security post which is located on the Trans Sulawesi Road, Bungin Village, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency is carried out to prevent congestion and traffic jams. "Regulating traffic flow is an obligation to provide services to the community and is a duty and responsibility to create safe traffic flow. orderly and smoothly," said Luwuk Police Chief Commissioner Z. Ginoga. Ginoga explained that apart from the TNI-Polri at the Security Post there were also Health officers stationed with the aim that if there were people who needed help, they would quickly follow up. "As usual, the Health Service integrates with the police in "The security post is to provide services and assistance to the community," he explained.
