text: luwuk–Beragam upaya dilakukansat lantaspolres banggaidalam menjaga keamanan, keselamatan, ketertiban dan kelancaran lalu lintas atau kamseltibcarlantas, salah satunya melalui penerangan keliling (Penling), Kamis (4/1/2024).Kepada pengguna kendaraan roda dua dan empat disampaikan pentingnya penggunaan helm standar SNI, sabuk pengaman serta kelengkapan kendaraan baik SIM maupun STNKkapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM melalui Kasat Lantas AKP I Made Bagus Aditya menjelaskan, kegiatan ini rutin digelar sebagai upaya pendisiplinan bagi pengguna jalan agar tetap mematuhi peraturan berlalu lintas, salah satunya untuk menekan angka kecelakaan atau zero accident.Melalui penling, jelas Kasat Lantas, diharapkan disiplin dalam berkendara menjadi prioritas yang paling diutamakan, sebagai upaya kamseltibcarlantas  Next:Polres Banggai Edukasi Keselamatan Lalu Lintas Klik Helm Saat Berkendara
text_en: Luwuk–Various efforts have been made by the proud traffic police unit to maintain security, safety, order and smooth traffic or traffic security, one of which is through mobile lighting (Penling), Thursday (4/1/2024). The importance of using standard helmets was conveyed to users of two-wheeled and four-wheeled vehicles. SNI, seat belts and vehicle equipment, both SIM and STNK, are proud of AKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM through Kasat Traffic AKP I Made Bagus Aditya, explaining that this activity is routinely held as a disciplinary effort for road users to comply with traffic regulations, one of which is to reducing the number of accidents or zero accidents. Through the importance, explained the Head of Traffic, it is hoped that discipline in driving will become the highest priority, as an effort by the traffic security and traffic police Next: Police are Proud of Traffic Safety Education Click Helmet When Driving

title: Polsek Toili Dampingi Pemda Banggai Dalam Pemasangan Patok Tapal Batas Desa
text: Toili –Personilpolsek toiliAipda hadi Wibowo mendampingi kegiatan penegasan tapal batas antara Desa Uemea dan Desa Singkoyo Kecamatan Toili, Banggai, Rabu (3/1/2024) pukul 09.00 Wita.Dalam kegiatan tersebut dihadiri oleh Kabag dan Kasubag Tapem Pemda Banggai, Kasipem Kecamatan Toili, Babinsa, Bhabinkamtibmas, Kades Uemea, dan masyarakat sekitar.MenurutkapolsekToili AKP Nanang Afrioko bahwa penegasan tapal batas yang terletak di puncak gunung Desa Uemea, sempat mengalami kendala karena hujan lebat dan kondisi yang terjal. Sehingga tim mengalami kesulitan dalam mencari jalan pulang/kembali.“Pukul 02.30 Wita dini hari, akhirnya tim bisa tiba di Desa Uemea dalam keadaan selamat setelah menyusuri aliran sungai,” ujar Kapolsek.Ia menegaskan akan selalu berusaha dalam tercipta situasi kamtibmas yang kondusif terlebih menghadapi pemasangan penentuan patok tapal batas antar wilayah saat ini yang sedang berlangsung.“Sebagai pelayan masyarakat kami siap mengawal dan mendampingi kegiatan Penegasan Batas Desa tersebut,” katanya.Pelaksanaan Kegiatan yang dampingi oleh Polsek Toili diapresiasi oleh pemerintah setempat dan mengucapkan terimakasih atas kehadirannya sehingga kegiatan berlangsung dengan aman
text_en: Toili – ToiliAipda police personnel Hadi Wibowo accompanied the boundary confirmation activity between Uemea Village and Singkoyo Village, Toili District, Banggai, Wednesday (3/1/2024) at 09.00 WITA. This activity was attended by the Head of the Tapem Subdivision and Head of the Banggai Regional Government, the Head of the Toili District Government Head, Babinsa, Bhabinkamtibmas, Head of Uemea Village, and the surrounding community. According to Toili Police Chief AKP Nanang Afrioko, the confirmation of the boundaries located at the top of the mountain in Uemea Village experienced problems due to heavy rain and steep conditions. So the team experienced difficulties in finding their way home/returning. "At 02.30 WITA in the morning, the team finally arrived at Uemea Village in a safe condition after following the river," said the Police Chief. the installation of boundary markers between regions is currently underway. "As community servants, we are ready to oversee and accompany the Village Boundary Determination activities," he said. with safe

title: Kapolres Banggai Ajak Anggotanya Bersyukur dan Tingkatkan Dedikasi Pasca Kenaikan Pangkat
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Kapolres BanggaiAjak Anggotanya Bersyukur dan TingkatkanDedikasi Pasca Kenaikan Pangkat. Kapolres Banggai,AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM,memberikan dorongan semangat kepada seluruh anggotanya dalam upacara kenaikan pangkat reguler dan akselerasi pada Rabu (3/1/2023) pagi di halaman Mapolres Banggai.Dalam sambutannya, Kapolres mengajak anggotanya untuk selalu bersyukur atas kenaikan pangkat setingkat lebih tinggi yang diberikan oleh institusi Polri.“Pangkat itu merupakan suatu tanggung jawab, jadi kita harus lebih semangat dalam mengabdi kepada nusa dan bangsa,” ungkapKapolres Ade Nuramdani.Dia menekankan bahwa kenaikan pangkat juga merupakan penghargaan terhadap dedikasi dan kinerja anggota Polri yang telah melaksanakan tugas dengan baik melalui proses panjang.Kapolres Banggai menjelaskan bahwa tugas Polri ke depan akan semakin berat dan penuh tantangan.Menurutnya, Polri tidak hanya ingin dicintai oleh masyarakat, tetapi juga ingin dipercayai sebagai pelindung, pengayom, dan pelayan masyarakat. “Sehingga peran Polri langsung dapat dirasakan oleh masyarakat,” tambahnya.Dalam amanatnya, AKBP Ade Nuramdani menyampaikan terima kasih kepada seluruh personel Polres Banggai dan jajaran atas kerja keras, dedikasi, dan pengabdian dalam menjalankan tugas.Ia juga memberikan pesan agar semua anggota tetap waspada dan memonitor setiap perkembangan situasi yang terjadi di tengah masyarakat.Sebanyak 87 personel Polres Banggai dan Brimob Subden II Den B Pelopor Luwuk Polda Sulteng mendapatkan kenaikan pangkat setingkat lebih tinggi sesuai Surat Telegram Kapolda Sulteng.Dengan rincian, 73 personel berasal dari Polres Banggai dan 14 personel berasal dari Brimob Subden II Den B Pelopor Luwuk Polda Sulteng. Adapun anggota Polres Banggai  yang naik pangkat diantaranya  :1.Kabag Ren Maikun yang sebelumnya berpangkat AKP naik satu tingkat menjadi Kompol.2. Kasat Binmas  Deki Wahyudi yang sebelumnya berpangkat Iptu naik satu tingkat Menjadi AKP.3. Kasi Propam Raden Hermawan yang sebelumnya berpangkat Iptu  naik satu tingkat menjadi AKP.4. Kapolsek Toili  Nanang Afriko yang sebelumnya berpangkat Iptu naik satu tingkat menjadi AKP.5. Joice  Asman yang sebelumnya berpangkat Ipda naik satu tingkat menjadi Iptu.Kenaikan pangkat ini diharapkan dapat menjadi motivasi tambahan bagi anggota Polri untuk terus memberikan pelayanan terbaik kepada masyarakat.**Ledakan Tungku Smelter PT. ITSS, Polda Sulteng Naikkan ke tahap Penyidikan
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Police Chief Invites Members to Be Grateful and Increase Their Dedication Post Promotion. Banggai Police Chief, AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, gave encouragement to all his members in the regular promotion and acceleration ceremony on Wednesday (3/1/2023) morning at the Banggai Police Headquarters yard. In his speech, the Police Chief invited his members to always be grateful for a promotion to a higher level given by the National Police institution. "The rank is a responsibility, so we must be more enthusiastic in serving the homeland and the nation," said Police Chief Ade Nuramdani. He emphasized that the promotion was also an appreciation for the dedication and performance of the National Police members. who have carried out their duties well through a long process. The Banggai Police Chief explained that the National Police's duties in the future will be even more difficult and full of challenges. According to him, the National Police not only want to be loved by the community, but also want to be trusted as protectors, guardians and servants of the community. "So that the role of the National Police can be directly felt by the community," he added. In his address, AKBP Ade Nuramdani expressed his thanks to all Banggai Police personnel and ranks for their hard work, dedication and devotion in carrying out their duties. He also gave a message for all members to remain alert. and monitor every development of the situation that occurs in the community. A total of 87 personnel from the Banggai Police and Brimob Subden II Den B Pioneer Luwuk Regional Police of Central Sulawesi received a promotion to a higher level according to the Telegram Letter from the Chief of the Central Sulawesi Regional Police. In detail, 73 personnel came from the Banggai Police and 14 personnel came from Brimob Subden II Den B Pioneer Luwuk Regional Police, Central Sulawesi. The members of the Banggai Police who were promoted include: 1. Head of Division Ren Maikun, who previously held the rank of AKP, was promoted one level to Commissioner of Police. 2. Head of Binmas Unit Deki Wahyudi, who previously held the rank of Inspector General, was promoted one level to AKP.3. Head of Propam Section Raden Hermawan, who previously held the rank of Inspector General, was promoted one level to AKP.4. Toili Police Chief Nanang Afriko, who previously held the rank of Inspector General, was promoted one level to AKP.5. Joice Asman, who previously held the rank of Ipda, was promoted one level to become Iptu. It is hoped that this increase in rank will be additional motivation for members of the National Police to continue providing the best service to the community.** PT Smelter Furnace Explosion. ITSS, Central Sulawesi Regional Police Raise it to Investigation Stage

title: Urus Administrasi, Lulusan PPPK Guru Padati RSUD Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Ratusan lulusan guru pegawai pemerintah dengan perjanjian kerja (PPPK) tahun 2023 memadati ruang Kantor Rumah Sakit Umum Daerah (RSUD) Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, Rabu (3/1/2024).Kehadiran ratusan guru PPPK di RSUD Luwuk tersebut dalam rangka mengurus syarat administrasi sebagai pegawai Pemda Banggai.Seperti amatan Banggai Raya, Rabu pagi itu, sebanyak ratusan guru memadati setiap sudut kantor, termasuk halaman RSUD Luwuk.Informasi yang didapatkan bahwa setiap hari RSUD Luwuk melayani pengurusan persyaratan Medical Check Up (MCU) sebanyak 150 orang.Lulusan guru PPPK itu, mengurus persyaratan MCU, yakni pemeriksaan Narkoba, pemeriksaan fisik, dan pemeriksaan kejiwaan (rohani).Dalam pengurusan MCU tersebut, para guru harus merogoh kocek sebesar Rp1.092.000, terdiri dari biaya pemeriksaan Narkoba sebesar Rp392.000, biaya pemeriksaan kesehatan fisik sebesar Rp150.000, dan pemeriksaan kejiwaan sebesar Rp550.000.“Saya mau mengurus surat keterangan kesehatan. Saya baru kase masuk berkas, masih menunggu nomor antrean untuk mendapatkan surat keterangannya,” kata seorang lulusan guru PPPK kepada Banggai Raya, di RSUD Luwuk.Untuk diketahui, Medical Check Up adalah sebuah prosedur yang ditujukan untuk mengetahui kondisi kesehatan secara menyeluruh.Tujuan MCU, biasanya untuk evaluasi kesehatan, agar bisa mencegah penyakit sedari dini sebelum bertambah para.MCU dimanfaatkan untuk keperluan tertentu, misalnya melamar kerja, agar dapat dinilai kesehatan fisik dan organ dalam yang dikaitkan dengan aktivitas kerja nantinya. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Hundreds of government employee teacher graduates with employment agreements (PPPK) in 2023 filled the Luwuk Regional General Hospital (RSUD), Banggai Regency, Wednesday (3/1/2024). The presence of hundreds of PPPK teachers at Luwuk Regional Hospital was in the context of taking care of administrative requirements as an employee of the Banggai Regional Government. As Banggai Raya observed, Wednesday morning, hundreds of teachers crowded every corner of the office, including the courtyard of the Luwuk Regional Hospital. Information obtained is that every day the Luwuk Regional Hospital handles the Medical Check Up (MCU) requirements for 150 people. .The PPPK teacher graduate, takes care of the MCU requirements, namely drug examination, physical examination, and psychological (spiritual) examination. In arranging the MCU, the teachers have to spend IDR 1,092,000, consisting of a drug examination fee of IDR 392,000, fees physical health examination amounting to IDR 150,000, and psychological examination amounting to IDR 550,000. "I want to take care of a health certificate. "I've just entered the file, I'm still waiting for the queue number to get the certificate," said a PPPK teacher graduate to Banggai Raya, at Luwuk Regional Hospital. For your information, Medical Check Up is a procedure aimed at finding out overall health conditions. The purpose of MCU, usually for health evaluation, in order to prevent disease early on before it increases. MCU is used for certain purposes, for example applying for work, so that physical health and internal organs can be assessed which are associated with future work activities. RUM

title: Satgas Kamseltibcarlantas OMB Polres Banggai Kawal Tiga Kontainer Angkut Logistik Pemilu
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Satgas OMB Tinombala Polres Banggai mengawal ketat pendistribusian logistik Pemilihan Umum Tahun 2024 yang dijemput dari Depo Pelabuhan Tangkiang Kecamatan Kintom menuju Gudang KPU Kabupaten Banggai, Selasa (2/1/2024) sore.Adapun nomor konteiner logistik pemilu 2024 adalah Tegu 70022922G1, Tegu 70426122G1, dan Tegu 70255022G1.Kasatgas Kamseltibcarlantas Operasi Mantap Brata Tinombala 2023 Polres Banggai AKP I Made Bagus Aditya mengatakan terkait proses pengiriman logistic Pemilihan Umum ini menggunakan tiga jasa angkutan truck peti kemas.“Satgas OMB Polres Banggai akan mengamankan logistic Pemilu dari segala bentuk ancaman gangguan kamtibmas mulai dari penjemputan logistic sampai tiba dilokasi penyimpanan logistic,” ujar AKP I Made Aditya.Kasat Lantas Polres Banggai ini juga mengatakan bahwa proses pergeseran sedikit mengalami keterlambatan karena menunggu kedatangan pihak penyedia barang logistic pemilu dari Jakarta untuk melaksanakan serah terima dengan KPU Banggai, KPU Banggai Kepulauan dan KPU Banggai Laut.“Tiga truck peti kemas tersebut telah tiba dengan selamat di gudang penyimpanan KPU Banggai yang berada di Kompleks Bukit Halimun, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan”, katanya.Selanjutnya logistic Pemilu 2024 tersebut akan dijaga oleh pengamanan internal dari KPU Banggai dan Satgas OMB Polres Banggai serta Satgas Kodim 1308 LB.(*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The Banggai Police Tinombala OMB Task Force is closely monitoring the distribution of 2024 General Election logistics which were picked up from the Tangkiang Port Depot, Kintom District to the Banggai Regency KPU Warehouse, Tuesday (2/1/2024) afternoon. The 2024 election logistics container number is Tegu 70022922G1, Tegu 70426122G1, and Tegu 70255022G1. Kasatgas Kamseltibcarlantas Mantap Brata Tinombala Operation 2023 Banggai Police AKP I Made Bagus Aditya said that regarding the logistics delivery process for this General Election, three container truck transportation services were used. "The Banggai Police OMB Task Force will secure the Election logistics from all forms of threats. "We disrupted security and social security starting from the logistics pick-up until arriving at the logistics storage location," said AKP I Made Aditya. Head of the Banggai Police Traffic Unit also said that the shift process experienced a slight delay because he was waiting for the arrival of the election logistics goods provider from Jakarta to carry out the handover with the Banggai KPU. Banggai Islands KPU and Banggai Laut KPU. "The three container trucks have arrived safely at the Banggai KPU storage warehouse in the Bukit Halimun Complex, South Luwuk District," he said. Furthermore, the 2024 election logistics will be guarded by internal security from the Banggai KPU and the Banggai Police OMB Task Force and Kodim 1308 LB Task Force.(*)

title: Polisi Amankan Proses Pelipatan Kertas Surat Suara DPRD Kabupaten di KPU Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Personel Polres Banggai yang terlibat dalam Operasi Mantap Brata Tinombala 2023-2024 melaksanakan pengamanan proses pelipatan surat suara Pemilu 2024, di gudang Logistik KPU Kabupaten Banggai, Kamis (4/1/2024).Kapolres Banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani, melalui Kabagops Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi selaku Karendalops OMB menjelaskan bahwa proses pelipatan surat suara dimulai pada pukul 10.00 WITA sampai dengan pukul 21.30 WITA.“Hari ini kita mengerahkan personel yang terlibat OMB untuk melakukan pengamanan dan monitoring pelipatan surat suara untuk DPRD Kabupaten Banggai,”ujar Kompol Esti.Ia menambahkan, pengamanan dan monitoring dilakukan demi menjaga agar kegiatan pelipatan surat suara berjalan dengan aman dan lancar.“Hal ini sejalan dengan tujuan dari pelaksanaan Operasi Mantap Brata Tinombala, yaitu untuk menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban menjelang Pemilu 2024,” terangnya.Selain gudang Logistik KPU kabupaten Banggai, kata Karendalops, Satgas OMB Polres Banggai juga menempatkan personel pengamanan di Kantor Bawaslu dan Kantor KPU untuk mengamankan kantor penyelenggara pemilu.“Dengan pengamanan di kantor penyelenggara Pemilu ini, diharapkan tahapan Pemilu 2024 di Kabupaten Banggai dapat berjalan dengan aman, lancar dan kondusif,” tuturnya.Untuk diketahui, selama proses pelipatan surat suara, sebanyak 160 petugas pelipatan surat suara telah kerahkan oleh KPU Banggai dengan pengamanan ketat dari petugas gabungan TNI–Polri dan pihak terkait lainnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Banggai Police personnel involved in the 2023-2024 Mantap Brata Tinombala Operation carried out security for the 2024 Election ballot paper folding process, at the Banggai Regency KPU Logistics warehouse, Thursday (4/1/2024). Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani, through the Head of Police Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi as Karendalops OMB explained that the ballot paper folding process started at 10.00 WITA until 21.30 WITA. "Today we are deploying personnel involved with OMB to provide security and monitoring of the folding of ballot papers for the Banggai Regency DPRD," said Police Commissioner Esti. He added that security and monitoring were carried out to ensure that the ballot paper folding activity ran safely and smoothly. "This is in line with the aim of implementing Operation Mantap Brata Tinombala, namely to maintain security and order ahead of the 2024 Election," he explained. Apart from the KPU Logistics Warehouse Banggai district, said Karendalops, the Banggai Police OMB Task Force also deployed security personnel at the Bawaslu Office and KPU Office to secure the election organizer's office. "With security at the Election organizer's office, it is hoped that the 2024 Election stages in Banggai Regency can run safely, smoothly and conducively " he said. For your information, during the ballot paper folding process, 160 ballot paper folding officers were deployed by the Banggai KPU with tight security from joint TNI-Polri officers and other related parties. (*)

title: Diduga Curi HP, Seorang Pemuda di Luwuk Dibekuk Polisi
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Tim Resmob Satreskrim Polres Banggai berhasil mengamankan seorang pemuda inisial MA (28) warga Kelurahan Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk, Banggai, Kamis (4/1/2024) sore.MA diduga pelaku pencurian sebuah Handphone itu diamankan di Pelabuhan Rakyat, Luwuk.Menurut Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy, berawal dari laporan polisi dari Rifai H. Malang (38) warga Jalan Danau Toba kelurahan Kaleke, Luwuk yang kehilangan satu unit Handphone merk Realmi 7.Kronologis kejadiannya pada Minggu 12 November 2023, saat itu pelapor sedang menonton balap motor di depan Gedung Graha Pemda Luwuk. Di mana Handphone tersebut diletakan didashboard motornya.Tak lama kemudian setelah ia kembali ke sepeda motornya, pelapor terkejut karena HP miliknya sudah tidak ada lagi.Lalu pelapor melaporkan kejadian itu ke Mapolres Banggai guna proses lebih lanjut.Selanjutnya, Tim Resmob Tompotika melakukan penyelidikan terhadap pelaku. Berdasarkan keterangan terduga pelaku MA mengakui perbuatannya.“Selanjutnya MA beserta barang bukti diamankan dan dibawa ke Polres Banggai guna diproses lebih lanjut,” terang AKP Tio.Pasal yang disangkakan sementara tentang tindak pidana pencurian sebagaimana dimaksud dalam pasal 362 KUHP. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit Resmob Team succeeded in arresting a young man with the initials MA (28), a resident of Baru Village, Luwuk District, Banggai, Thursday (4/1/2024) afternoon. According to the Head of Criminal Investigation Unit, Banggai Police, AKP Tio Tondy, it started with a police report from Rifai H. Malang (38), a resident of Jalan Danau Toba, Kaleke sub-district, Luwuk, who lost a Realmi 7 brand cellphone. Chronology of the incident was on Sunday 12 November 2023, at that time the complainant was watching motorbike racing in front of the Luwuk Regional Government Graha Building. Where the cellphone was placed on the dashboard of his motorbike. Not long after he returned to his motorbike, the reporter was surprised because his cellphone was no longer there. Then the reporter reported the incident to the Banggai Police Headquarters for further processing. Furthermore, the Tompotika Resmob Team carried out an investigation into the perpetrator . Based on the alleged perpetrator's statement, MA admitted his actions. "Furthermore, MA and the evidence were secured and taken to the Banggai Police for further processing," explained AKP Tio. (*)

title: Satgas OMB Polres Banggai Amankan Kedatangan Logistik Sampul Pemilu 2024
text: Polresbanggai.com– Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU)kabupaten banggaikembali kedatangan logistik Pemilu Serentak 2024 berupa sampul, Kamis (4/1/2024).Logistik tiba di gudang logistik KPU sekitar pukul 20.40 Wita dengan menggunakan satu unit mobil pick up warna silver DD 8216 DG melalui jalur darat tersebut mendapatkan pengawalan ketat dari personel Satgas Operasi Mantap Brata (OMB)polres banggai.“Kedatangan Logistik disakasikan langsung oleh Komisioner KPU Kabupaten Banggai dan mendapat pengamanan dari aparat TNI-Polri yang bertugas ditempat tersebut,” ungkap Kasatgas Humas OMB Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S Muda.Amin yang juga selaku Kasi Humas ini, menerangkan, sejauh ini pendistribusian logistik Pemilu di Kabupaten Banggai berjalan lancar belum adanya hambatan sedikitpun.“Kami pastikan bahwa setiap pendistribusian dan penyimpanan logistik Pemilu berjalan aman dan lancar karena selalu dalam pengawasan dan pengamanan ketat aparat TNI-Polri,” terangnya.Menurut perwira pangkat dua balak ini, pihaknya berkomitmen untuk memberikan pengamanan maksimal kepada seluruh tahapan Pemilu dan menjaga netralitas.“Dan tentunya kami TNI-Polri berkomitmen mencegah adanya potensi gangguan keamanan yang dapat mengganggu proses demokrasi di Kabupaten Banggai,” tandasnya
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– The Regency General Election Commission (KPU) is proud of the arrival of the 2024 Simultaneous Election logistics in the form of covers, Thursday (4/1/2024). The logistics arrived at the KPU logistics warehouse at around 20.40 WITA using a silver DD 8216 pick-up truck. DG via the land route received tight guard from personnel from the Mantap Brata Operation Task Force (OMB) Banggai Police. "The Logistics arrival was witnessed directly by the KPU Commissioner of Banggai Regency and received security from the TNI-Polri officers on duty at the location," said the Head of the Banggai Police OMB Public Relations Task Force. Inspector Al Amin S Muda. Amin, who is also the Head of Public Relations, explained that so far the distribution of election logistics in Banggai Regency has run smoothly without the slightest obstacle. "We ensure that every distribution and storage of election logistics runs safely and smoothly because it is always under supervision and TNI-Polri security is tight," he explained. According to this second-ranking Balak officer, his party is committed to providing maximum security at all stages of the election and maintaining neutrality. "And of course we TNI-Polri are committed to preventing potential security disturbances that could disrupt the democratic process in Banggai Regency," he stressed

title: Kepolisian Resor Banggai Ingatkan Masyarakat, Waspada Penipuan Belanja Beras Online, Ratusan Juta Rupiah Sudah Jadi Korban
text: KABAR LUWUK –Kepolisian Resor BanggaiIngatkan Masyarakat, waspadapenipuan belanja beras Online, ratusan juta rupiah sudah jadi korban.Kepolisian Resor Banggaimemberikan peringatan serius kepada masyarakat terkait maraknya penipuan belanja daring atau online, yang kini semakin sering terjadi dan telah menyebabkan kerugian signifikan bagi banyak korban.Khususnya, polisi mengingatkan akan modus penipuan jual beli beras melalui media sosial, seperti Facebook, yang telah merugikan ratusan juta rupiah.Jum,at 5/1/2024.Kepala Satuan Reskrim Polres Banggai, AKP Tio Tondy, mengungkapkan bahwa penipuan tersebut biasanya dimulai dengan postingan di media sosial yang menawarkan penjualan beras dalam grup jual beli.Selanjutnya, pelaku dan korban berkomunikasi melalui aplikasi Messenger dan WhatsApp, hingga akhirnya setuju untuk melakukan transaksi.“Hingga keduanya bersepakat untuk melakukan transaksi,” ujar Tio Tondy, menjelaskan modus operandi penipuan tersebut. Kasat Reskrim menekankan pentingnya kewaspadaan masyarakat dan memberikan beberapa tips untuk menghindari penipuan online.Tio Tondy menyarankan agar masyarakat tidak mudah tergiur dengan penawaran apapun, dan sebelum melakukan transaksi, sebaiknya memeriksa dan memastikan kembali keaslian penjual dan barang yang ditawarkan.Disarankan pula untuk berbelanja hanya di situs yang terpercaya serta melakukan pengecekan akun media sosial penjual barang online.“Dalam menggunakan media sosial, pastikan untuk lebih bijaksana. Kesalahan dalam menggunakan media sosial bisa berujung pada masalah hukum dan penjara, khususnya jika terlibat dalam penipuan online sesuai dengan Pasal 28 ayat (1) UU ITE, yang dapat dikenakan hukuman maksimal 6 tahun penjara,” tambahnya.Peringatan ini diharapkan dapat meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap risiko penipuan online, khususnya terkait jual beli beras.Kepolisian mengajak seluruh lapisan masyarakat untuk lebih berhati-hati dan bijak dalam bertransaksi online demi melindungi diri dari potensi kerugian finansial akibat tindakan penipuan.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Resort Police remind the public, beware of online rice shopping fraud, hundreds of millions of rupiah have been victims. , the police warned of the fraudulent mode of buying and selling rice via social media, such as Facebook, which has lost hundreds of millions of rupiah. Friday, 5/1/2024. Head of the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit, AKP Tio Tondy, revealed that the fraud usually starts with a post on social media offering rice sales in buying and selling groups. Next, the perpetrator and victim communicated via the Messenger and WhatsApp applications, until finally agreeing to carry out the transaction. "Until both of them agreed to carry out the transaction," said Tio Tondy, explaining the modus operandi of the fraud. The Head of Criminal Investigation Unit emphasized the importance of public vigilance and provided several tips to avoid online fraud. Tio Tondy advised the public not to be easily tempted by any offers, and before making a transaction, it would be best to check and confirm the authenticity of the seller and the goods being offered. It is also recommended that you shop only at trusted sites and checking the social media accounts of online goods sellers. "When using social media, make sure to be wiser. "Mistakes in using social media can result in legal problems and imprisonment, especially if involved in online fraud in accordance with Article 28 paragraph (1) of the ITE Law, which can be subject to a maximum sentence of 6 years in prison," he added. "This warning is hoped to increase public awareness of the risk of online fraud, especially related to buying and selling rice. The police invite all levels of society to be more careful and wise in online transactions in order to protect themselves from potential financial losses due to fraudulent acts.**

title: Polres Banggai Imbau Masyarakat Waspada Terhadap Jual Beli Beras Online
text: Polresbanggai.com– Kepolisian Resor Banggai mengingatkan masyarakat untuk mewaspadai penipuan belanja daring atau online yang kini sering terjadi dan sudah banyak memakan korban.Kepala Satuan Reskrimpolres banggaiAKP Tio Tondy mengatakan kewaspadaan tersebut penting agar tidak menjadi korban penipuan online khususnya bermodus jual beli beras.“Untuk dikabupaten banggai, marak penipuan online khususnya jual beli beras melalui media social seperti Facebook. Telah merugikan banyak korban, bahkan hingga ratusan juta rupiah,” katanya, Jumat (5/1/2024).Perwira pangkat tiga balak itu menyebutkan hal tersebut biasanya bermula dengan postingan dimedia social bahwa ada yang menjual beras dalam grup jual beli. Selanjutnya antara pelaku dan korban berkomunikasi melalui aplikasi Messenger dan WhatsApp.“Hingga keduanya bersepakat untuk melakukan transaksi,” ungkapnya.Kasat Reskrim menghimbau jangan mudah tergiur dengan penawaran apapun, cek dan pastikan kembali sebelum transaksi.Selain itu, pastikan berbelanja disitus yang terpercaya, cek akun media social penjual barang online dan pastikan keaslian foto barang yang akan dijual.“Jangan begitu saja menerima jika ada harga murah, maupun lainnya. Pastikan kebenaran penawaran tersebut agar tidak tertipu,” ucapnya.Selain itu, Tio juga mengingatkan masyarakat untuk lebih bijaksana dalam menggunakan media sosial. Kesalahan dalam menggunakan media sosial bisa bermasalah dengan hukum yang ujung-ujungnya berakhir di penjara.“Apabila terbukti melakukan penipuan online sesuai pasal 28 ayat (1) UU ITE dapat dipenjara (maksimal) 6 tahun,” pungkasnya
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– The Banggai Police reminded the public to be aware of online shopping fraud which is now frequently occurring and has claimed many victims. Head of the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit, AKP Tio Tondy, said that this vigilance is important so as not to become victims of online fraud, especially in the form of buying and selling rice. "To In Banggai Regency, online fraud is rampant, especially buying and selling rice via social media such as Facebook. "It has caused losses to many victims, even up to hundreds of millions of rupiah," he said, Friday (5/1/2024). The three-rank Balak officer said that this usually starts with a post on social media that someone is selling rice in a buying and selling group. Next, the perpetrator and the victim communicated via the Messenger and WhatsApp applications. "Until both of them agreed to carry out a transaction," he said. The Head of Criminal Investigation Unit urges you not to be easily tempted by any offers, check and make sure before making the transaction. Apart from that, make sure you shop on a trusted site, check the social media account of the online goods seller and ensure the authenticity of the photos of the goods to be sold. "Don't just accept it if there is a cheap price, or anything else. "Make sure the offer is genuine so you don't get fooled," he said. Apart from that, Tio also reminded the public to be wiser in using social media. Mistakes in using social media can lead to problems with the law which can ultimately result in prison. "If you are proven to have committed online fraud in accordance with Article 28 paragraph (1) of the ITE Law, you can be imprisoned (maximum) 6 years," he concluded.

title: LP3M Unismuh Luwuk Survei Lokasi Rencana Penempatan Mahasiswa KKN di 2 Kecamatan
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk melalui LP3M telah melakukan survei lokasi rencana penempatan mahasiswa peserta KKN, Kamis 4 Januari 2024.Ada dua kecamatan yang disurvei dan bakal menjadi lokasi penempatan mahasiswa peserta KKN Mobilisasi Berkemajuan (MB) tahun ini.Dua kecamatan itu adalah, Kecamatan Batui Selatan dan Kecamatan Moilong. Penyebarannya, 10 desa di Batui Selatan dan 16 desa di Kecamatan Moilong.Hal itu diungkapkan langsung Ketua LP3M Unismuh Luwuk, Risno Mina SH., MH., kepada Banggai Raya, Jumat pagi 5 Desember 2024 via pesan WhatsApp,“Insya Allah lokasi KKN di 2 kecamatan, Kecamatan Batui Selatan 10 desa dan Kecamatan Moilong 16 desa,” ungkap Risno Mina.Ia berharap, pelaksanaan KKN MB yang akan dimulai pada 25 Januari 2024 ini bisa lebih baik lagi dari angkatan sebelumnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk through LP3M has conducted a survey of the planned placement locations for students participating in KKN, Thursday 4 January 2024. There are two sub-districts that were surveyed and will be the placement locations for students participating in KKN Progressive Mobilization (MB) this year. These two sub-districts namely, South Batui District and Moilong District. The distribution is in 10 villages in South Batui and 16 villages in Moilong District. This was stated directly by the Chair of LP3M Unismuh Luwuk, Risno Mina SH., MH., to Banggai Raya, Friday morning 5 December 2024 via WhatsApp message, "God willing, the KKN location will be in "2 sub-districts, South Batui District 10 villages and Moilong District 16 villages," said Risno Mina. He hopes that the implementation of the MB KKN which will start on January 25 2024 can be even better than the previous generation. (*)

title: Pelayanan SKCK Polres Banggai Menuai Pujian, Antrean Larut Malam, Tapi Masyarakat Puas
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Pelayanan SKCK Polres Banggaimenuai pujian, antrean larut malam, tapi masyarakat puas. Pelayanan pembuatanSurat Keterangan Catatan Kepolisian (SKCK)di Satuan Intelijen dan KeamananPolres Banggaiterus mencuri perhatian, khususnya bagi para calonPegawai Pemerintah dengan Perjanjian Kerja (PPPK)di wilayahKabupaten Banggai.Simpati dan kepuasan masyarakat terhadap pelayanan tersebut semakin menguat, dengan bukti antrean yang tetap dilayani hingga larut malam.Jum,at 5/1/2024.Salah satu pengunjung, Nilawati, menyatakan kepuasannya atas pelayanan yang diberikan oleh pihak kepolisian, terutama Polres Banggai.Meskipun banyak berkas yang diterima, petugas tetap semangat memberikan pelayanan terbaik.Nilawati menyampaikan, “Kami sangat senang dengan pelayanan yang diberikan kepada kami.Walaupun mereka menerima banyak berkas, semua petugas tetap semangat dalam memberikan pelayanan kepada masyarakat.Informasi yang saya peroleh menyebutkan bahwa pelayanan terus dibuka hingga larut malam, ini adalah suatu pelayanan yang sangat luar biasa.”Kepala Satuan Intel Kam Polres Banggai, AKP Usman SH, menjelaskan bahwa pelayanan ini diupayakan dapat diselesaikan sebelum tanggal 14 Januari 2024, sesuai dengan jangka waktu kelengkapan persyaratan bagi peserta PPPK yang dinyatakan lulus.Usman menegaskan bahwa semua anggota bekerja maksimal dan memberikan jam tambahan kerja untuk memastikan semua proses pembuatan SKCK dapat selesai tepat waktu.“Saya selalu mengontrol semua anggota dalam melayani pembuatan SKCK dan jangan sampai ada yang tertinggal.Kami mengucapkan terima kasih kepada semua warga yang sabar menunggu dalam proses pembuatan SKCK, yakin dan optimis bahwa semuanya akan terlaksana tepat waktu,” ujar Usman.Antusiasme masyarakat terhadap pelayanan yang efisien dan ekstra mile dari Polres Banggai menciptakan suasana positif, di mana kepercayaan dan harapan terhadap penyelesaian pembuatan SKCK tepat waktu semakin tinggi. (MAM) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Police SKCK services received praise, queues were late at night, but the community was satisfied. The service for making Police Record Certificates (SKCK) at the Banggai Police Intelligence and Security Unit continues to steal attention, especially for prospective Government Employees with Work Agreements (PPPK) in the Banggai Regency area. The community's sympathy and satisfaction with this service is increasingly getting stronger, with evidence of queues that continue to be served until late evening. Friday, 5/1/2024. One of the visitors, Nilawati, expressed her satisfaction with the services provided by the police, especially the Banggai Police. Even though many files were received, the officers remained enthusiastic about providing the best service. Nilawati said, "We really "We are happy with the service provided to us. Even though they received a lot of files, all the officers remained enthusiastic in providing services to the community. The information I obtained stated that the service continued to be open until late at night, this is a very extraordinary service." Head of Intel Unit Banggai Police Commissioner, AKP Usman SH, explained that efforts are being made to complete this service before January 14 2024, in accordance with the time period for completing the requirements for PPPK participants who are declared to have passed. Usman emphasized that all members work optimally and provide additional work hours to ensure all processes SKCK making can be completed on time. "I always control all members in serving SKCK making and don't let anyone be left behind. We would like to thank all the residents who patiently waited for the SKCK making process, confident and optimistic that everything will be done on time," said Usman. The public's enthusiasm for the efficient and extra-mile service from the Banggai Police creates a positive atmosphere, where trust and hope for the completion of the SKCK production on time is increasingly higher. (MAM) **

title: AMIK Luwuk Resmi Tarik 17 Peserta MBKM Membangun Desa di Moilong
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Setelah empat bulan di lokasi, 17 mahasiswa Akademi Manajemen Informatika dan Komputer (AMIK) Luwuk Banggai yang melaksanakan MBKM Membangun Desa di Kecamatan Moilong resmi ditarik, Jumat 5 Januari 2024.Belasan mahasiswa AMIK Luwuk ini melaksanakan MBKM Membangun Desa di empat desa yang ada di kecamatan tersebut.Empat desa itu adalah Desa Sidomakmur, Desa Karang Anyar, Desa Argomulyo dan Desa Karyajaya.Penarikan 17 mahasiswa peserta MBKM Membangun Desa tahun 2023/2024 itu berlangsung di Kantor Camat Moilong.Hadir pada acara penarikan itu, Camat Moilong, Ihwan Ahmad S.Pd., SH., dan Direktur AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom., MM., serta empat kepala desa penempatan.Selain itu, hadir juga Sekretaris Camat Moilong dan dosen pendamping lapangan MBKM.Dalam sambutannya, Camat Moilong Ihwan Ahmad mengatakan, mahasiswa AMIK Luwuk merupakan mahasiswa IT sehingga kehadirannya diharapkan dapat memberikan ilmu yang kaitannya dengan penggunaan teknologi informasi.“Harapannya semua aparat desa kader kader dapat belajar tentang IT,” katanya.Kemudian, Camat Moilong juga berharap, kedepannya AMIK Luwuk bisa kembali menurunkan mahasiswa terbaiknya dalam program yang sama.“Kami harap, tahun depan mahasiswa AMIK bisa kembali hadir dan penempatan di semua desa yang ada di Kecamatan Moilong, ada 16 desa semuanya,” harapnya.Sementara itu, Direktur AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu  berharap, apa yang telah diaplikasikan mahasiswa selama empat bulan kaitan dengan IT bisa diketahui dan ditetapkan masyarakat atau aparat desa setempat.Pada pelaksanaan MBKM membangun desa ini kata Direktur Heri, sapaan akrabnya, AMIK Luwuk lebih konsen untuk membangun SDM pada bidang IT contohnya dengan mengadakan pelatihan-pelatihan IT di desa.“Pelatihan-pelatihan IT di desa, pembuatan profil desa secara online serta pembuatan website desa. Ini yang dilakukan mahasiswa kami selama 4 bulan di lokasi,” ungkapnya.Dalam kesempatan itu, Ia juga memberikan apresiasi yang tinggi kepada kepala desa yang telah memfasilitasi mahasiswanya selama melaksanakan MBKM Membangun Desa.“Insya Allah tahun depan AMIK Luwuk tetap bisa kembali mengirimkan mahasiwa MBKM untuk Kecamatan Moilong,” tandasnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- After four months at the location, 17 students from the Luwuk Banggai Academy of Informatics and Computer Management (AMIK) who carried out MBKM Building Villages in Moilong District officially withdrew, Friday 5 January 2024. Dozens of AMIK Luwuk students carried out MBKM Building Villages in four villages in the area. in the sub-district. The four villages are Sidomakmur Village, Karang Anyar Village, Argomulyo Village and Karyajaya Village. The withdrawal of 17 students participating in the 2023/2024 MBKM Village Development took place at the Moilong Sub-District Office. Present at the withdrawal event was the Head of Moilong Sub-district, Ihwan Ahmad S.Pd., SH., and the Director of AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom., MM., as well as four placement village heads. Apart from that, the Secretary of the Moilong Subdistrict Head and the MBKM field assistant lecturer were also present. In his speech, Moilong Subdistrict Head Ihwan Ahmad said that AMIK Luwuk students are IT students so their presence is expected to provide knowledge related to the use of information technology. "The hope is that all village officials and cadres can learn about IT," he said. Then, the Moilong Subdistrict Head also hopes that in the future AMIK Luwuk can again field its best students in the same program. "We hope that next year AMIK students can return and be placed in all villages in Moilong District, there are 16 villages in all," he hoped. Meanwhile, the Director of AMIK Luwuk, Heriyanto Sahidu  hopes that what the students have applied during the four months related to IT can be known and determined by the community or local village officials. In the implementation of MBKM to build this village, said Director Heri, his nickname, AMIK Luwuk is more focused on building human resources in the IT sector, for example by holding IT training in villages. "IT training in villages, creating online village profiles and creating village websites. "This is what our students did for 4 months at the location," he said. On that occasion, he also gave high appreciation to the village head who had facilitated his students during the implementation of the Village Development MBKM. "God willing, next year AMIK Luwuk will still be able to send MBKM students again for Moilong District," he said. (*)

title: Satreskrim Polres Banggai Amankan Seorang Pemuda, Diduga Pelaku Pencurian Hp
text: Polresbanggai.com– Tim Resmob Satreskrimpolres banggaiberhasil mengamankan seorang pemuda inisial MA (28) warga Kelurahan Baru Kecamatanluwuk, Banggai, Kamis (4/1/2024) sore.MA diduga pelaku pencurian sebuah Handphone diamankan di Pelabuhan Rakyat, Luwuk.Menurut Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy, berawal dari laporan polisi dari Rifai H. Malang (38) warga Jalan Danau Toba kelurahan Kaleke, Luwuk yang kehilangan satu unit Handphone merk Realmi 7.Kronologis kejadiannya pada Minggu 12 November 2023 saat itu pelapor sedang menonton balap motor di depan Gedung Graha Pemda Luwuk. Dimana Handphone tersebut diletakan didashboard motornya.Tak lama kemudian setelah ia kembali ke sepeda motornya, pelapor terkejut karena HP miliknya sudah tidak ada lagi.Lalu pelapor melaporkan kejadian tersebut ke Mapolres Banggai guna proses lebih lanjut.Selanjutnya, Tim Resmob Tompotika melakukan penyelidikan terhadap pelaku. Berdasarkan keterangan terduga pelaku MA mengakui perbuatannya.“Selanjutnya MA beserta barang bukti diamankan dan dibawa ke Polres Banggai guna diproses lebih lanjut,” terang AKP Tio.Pasal yang disangkakan sementara tentang tindak pidana pencurian sebagaimana dimaksud dalam pasal 362 KUHP
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– The Satreskrimpolres Resmob Team is proud to have succeeded in securing a young man with the initials MA (28), a resident of Baru Village, Luwuk District, Banggai, Thursday (4/1/2024) afternoon. Banggai AKP Tio Tondy, started with a police report from Rifai H. Malang (38), a resident of Jalan Danau Toba, Kaleke subdistrict, Luwuk, who lost a Realmi 7 brand cellphone. Luwuk Regional Government Graha Building. Where the cellphone was placed on the dashboard of his motorbike. Not long after he returned to his motorbike, the reporter was surprised because his cellphone was no longer there. Then the reporter reported the incident to the Banggai Police Headquarters for further processing. Next, the Tompotika Resmob Team carried out an investigation into the perpetrator. Based on the alleged perpetrator's statement, MA admitted his actions. "Furthermore, MA and the evidence were secured and taken to the Banggai Police for further processing," explained AKP Tio.

title: Unismuh Luwuk Agendakan Mahasiswa KKN-MB Diturunkan Pada 25 Januari
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk melalui LP3M tengah bersiap untuk menurunkan mahasiswa peserta KKN Mobilisasi Berkemajuan (KKN-MB).Bahkan, LP3M Unismuh Luwuk di bawah pimpinan Ketua Risno Mina SH., MH., telah melakukan survei lokasi untuk penempatan.Untuk penempatan KKN-MB tahun ini, Unismuh Luwuk memusatkan kegiatan dindua kecamatan yang ada di Kabupaten Banggai.Dua kecamatan itu adalah Kecamatan Moilong dan Kecamatan Batui Selatan. Dengan sebaran 10 desa di Batui Selatan dan 16 desa di Moilong.Telah melakukan survei dan memastikan dua kecamatan sebagai tempat KKN-MB, kapan mahasiswa akan mulai diturunkan?Ketua LP3M Unismuh Luwuk, Risno Mina menjelaskan, rencana mahasiswa akan diturunkan ke lokasi pada 25 Januari 2024.Olehnya, Risno berpesan dan mengimbau kepada mahasiswa yang belum mendaftar KKN silakan mendaftarkan langsung ke LP3M.“Sehingga pelaksanaan  KKN dapat berjalan sesuau target waktu,” tandasnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk through LP3M is preparing to field students participating in the Progressive Mobilization KKN (KKN-MB). In fact, LP3M Unismuh Luwuk under the leadership of Chairman Risno Mina SH., MH., has conducted a location survey for placement. For this year's KKN-MB placement, Unismuh Luwuk focused activities in two sub-districts in Banggai Regency. The two sub-districts are Moilong District and South Batui District. With a distribution of 10 villages in South Batui and 16 villages in Moilong. We have carried out a survey and confirmed two sub-districts as places for KKN-MB, when will students start to be dropped off? Head of LP3M Unismuh Luwuk, Risno Mina explained, the plan is for students to be dropped off at the location on January 25 2024. Therefore, Risno advised and appealed to students who have not registered for KKN to please register directly with LP3M. "So that the implementation of KKN can run according to the target time," he said. (*)

title: Kadinkes Provinsi Gorontalo Kunker ke Banggai, Siang Ini Sambangi Puskesmas Kampung Baru
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Kepala Dinas Kesehatan (Dinkes) Provinsi Gorontalo, Dr. dr. Anang S Otoluwa melakukan kunjungan kerja (Kunker) ke Kabupaten Banggai, Sabtu 6 Januari 2023.Kunjungan Kadinkes Gorontalo bersama rombongan itu dibenarkan oleh Kadinkes Kabupaten Banggai, dr. I Wayan Suartika ME.“Iya (kunjungan kerja), ke Puskesmas Kampung Baru,” kata Kadinkes Banggai, I Wayan Suwartika kepada Banggai Raya, Sabtu pagi via pesan WhatsApp.Dalam kunjungan ke Puskesmas Kampung Baru ini, Dinkes Gorontalo kata Wayan, ingin melihat kegiatan atau program posyandu di Puskesmas Kampung Baru.“Ada juga kegiatan pertandingan persahabatan futsal, buku tangkis danntenis meja besok,” kata Wayan.Diketahui, sosok Kadinkes Gorontalo Dr. dr. Anang S Otoluwa tentunya tidak asing bagi masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai.Dokter Anang pernah menjabat Kepala Dinas P2KBP3A Banggai dan juga Kadinkes Kabupaten Banggai.  (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Head of the Gorontalo Province Health Service (Dinkes), Dr. Dr. Anang S Otoluwa made a working visit (Kunker) to Banggai Regency, Saturday 6 January 2023. The visit of the Head of the Gorontalo Health Office with his entourage was confirmed by the Head of the Banggai Regency Health Office, Dr. I Wayan Suartika ME. "Yes (work visit), to the Kampung Baru Health Center," said Kadinkes Banggai, I Wayan Suwartika to Banggai Raya, Saturday morning via WhatsApp message. During this visit to the Kampung Baru Health Center, the Gorontalo Health Office, Wayan said, wanted to see posyandu activities or programs at the Kampung Baru Community Health Center. "There are also friendly futsal competitions, badminton book and table tennis tomorrow," said Wayan. It is known that the figure of the Gorontalo Health Office, Dr. Dr. Anang S Otoluwa is certainly no stranger to the people of Banggai Regency. Doctor Anang once served as Head of the Banggai P2KBP3A Service and also Kadinkes of Banggai Regency. (*)

title: Golkar Banggai Bantah Setengah Hati Dukung Prabowo-Gibran
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Partai politik dinilai masih setengah hati menangkan Capres-Cawapres yang diusungnya. Salah satunya adalah Partai Golkar Kabupaten Banggai. Fenomena ini terlihat dengan caleg yang enggan kampayekan dan pasang baliho bergambar Capres-Cawapres Prabowo-Gibran.Menanggapi hal itu, Sekretaris Partai Golkar Banggai Irwanto Kulap mengatakan bahwa pemenangan Capres-Cawapres Prabowo-Gibran bukan dinilai dari Baliho.“Pemenangan itu bukan hanya memasang foto di baliho tapi eksekusi di lapangan itu yang lebih penting,” katanya.Ia menjelaskan partai Golkar Kabupaten Banggai tegak lurus menjalankan instruksi partai untuk memenangkan Prabowo-Gibran.“Golkar Banggai komitmen menjalankan perintah pimpinan partai DPD 1 Provinsi Sulteng maupun pimpinan partai Golkar pusat yang mana diperintahkan kepada seluruh pengurus partai Golkar sampai ke tingkat desa, kader hingga simpatisan selain wajib memenangkan partai Golkar maka wajib memenangkan Prabowo-Gibran,” ungkapnyaBahkan Ketua DPD Golkar Banggai Beniyanto Tamoreka dalam setiap rapat dengan caleg dan pengurus partai tingkat kecamatan menginstruksikan wajib memenangkan Prabowo-Gibran.“Siapa yang tidak mendukung akan ada tindakan tegas partai. Adapun isu yang berkembang Golkar Banggai tidak mendukung Prabowo-Gibran adalah informasi sesat. Karena semua caleg Golkar mensosialisasikan Prabowo-Gibran setiap kampanye,” tegas Wanto sapaan akrabnya.NAL
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Political parties are considered to still be half-hearted in winning the presidential and vice presidential candidates they support. One of them is the Golkar Party of Banggai Regency. This phenomenon can be seen in legislative candidates who are reluctant to campaign and put up billboards with pictures of the presidential and vice presidential candidates Prabowo-Gibran. Responding to this, the Secretary of the Golkar Banggai Party, Irwanto Kulap, said that the victory of the presidential and vice presidential candidates Prabowo-Gibran was not judged by the billboards. "Winning is not just about putting up photos. on billboards, but the execution in the field is more important," he said. He explained that the Banggai Regency Golkar party was upright in carrying out the party's instructions to win Prabowo-Gibran. "Golkar Banggai is committed to carrying out the orders of the Central Sulawesi Province DPD 1 party leadership and the central Golkar party leadership which is "It was ordered to all Golkar party administrators down to the village level, cadres to sympathizers. Apart from being obliged to win the Golkar party, it is mandatory to win Prabowo-Gibran," he said. Even the Chairman of the DPD Golkar Banggai Beniyanto Tamoreka in every meeting with legislative candidates and sub-district level party administrators instructed that it was mandatory to win Prabowo-Gibran. "Whoever does not support the party will take firm action. The growing issue that Golkar Banggai does not support Prabowo-Gibran is disinformation. "Because all Golkar legislative candidates socialize Prabowo-Gibran every campaign," emphasized Wanto, his nickname.NAL

title: Ciptakan Pemilu Damai, Subsatgas OMB Polsek Luwuk Sambangi Para Sopir
text: Polresbanggai.com –Dalam rangka menciptakan Pemilu Damai 2023 – 2024, Satgas OMBpolres banggaimelalui Subsatgaspolsek luwukmendatangi para sopir angkot yang sedang berkumpul di Jalur 2 Tanjung, Kelurahan Karaton dan Kelurahan Maahas, Jumat (5/1/2024).Kegiatan ini bertujuan untuk menampung aspirasi, mendengarkan curhatan dan berinteraksi langsung dengan warga guna menciptakan suasana Pemilu yang kondusif.Dari interaksi tersebut, masyarakat menginginkan Satgas OMB Tinombala Polres Banggai untuk meningkatkan patroli, memantau kegiatan malam hari sebelum hari H Pencoblosan dan khususnya saat hari H Pencoblosan.Hal ini disebabkan potensi gangguan kamtibmas yang mungkin muncul sebagai dampak dari berita kemenangan serta fenomena money politik yang dikenal sebagai serangan fajar.Menyikapi hal tersebut, Subsatgas OMB Polsekluwukmenyampaikan bahwa akan memperketat pelaksanaan patroli sesuai permintaan masyarakat.Patroli akan terus ditingkatkan. Kepolisian juga akan bekerja sama dengan Bawaslu dan Panwascamlu untuk menanggulangi potensi money politik atau serangan fajar.Masyarakat diminta untuk berkoordinasi dengan pihak pengawasan di tingkat desa atau menghubungi Bhabinkamtibmas atau Polsek terdekat untuk memberikan informasi terkait situasi kamtibmas di sekitar mereka.*HumasPolresBanggai
text_en: Polresbanggai.com – In order to create peaceful elections in 2023 – 2024, the OMBpolres Task Force, through the Luwuk Sector Police Subsatgas, visited public transportation drivers who were gathering on Route 2 Tanjung, Karaton Village and Maahas Village, Friday (5/1/2024). This activity aims to accommodate aspirations , listen to stories and interact directly with residents in order to create a conducive election atmosphere. From this interaction, the community wants the Banggai Police Tinombala OMB Task Force to increase patrols, monitor nighttime activities before the voting day and especially during the voting day. This is due to the potential for disruption security and social security which may have arisen as a result of the news of the victory as well as the money politics phenomenon known as the dawn attacks. In response to this, the OMB Polsekluwuk Sub-task Force said that it would tighten the implementation of patrols according to community requests. Patrols will continue to be increased. The police will also collaborate with Bawaslu and Panwascamlu to tackle potential political money or dawn attacks. The community is asked to coordinate with supervisory authorities at the village level or contact Bhabinkamtibmas or the nearest police station to provide information regarding the security and security situation around them.*Banggai Police Public Relations

title: Ketua Bawaslu Bangkep Ajak Masyarakat Banggai Kepulauan Tolak Politik Uang dalam Dialog Kepemiluan KONDA LIPU
text: KABAR LUWUK –Ketua Bawaslu BangkepAjak Masyarakat Banggai Kepulauan Tolak Politik Uang dalam Dialog Kepemiluan KONDA LIPU.Ketua Badan Pengawas Pemilihan Umum (Bawaslu) Bangkep, Dr. (H.C) [Nama], menjadi narasumber utama dalam dialog kepemiluan yang diinisiasi oleh Komunitas Pemuda Peduli Pemilu“KONDA LIPU”di Desa Lumbi-Lumbia,Buko Selatan.Acara tersebut, dihadiri oleh berbagai perwakilan masyarakat, tokoh agama, pemuda, perempuan, pendidik, dan penyelenggara pemilu, membahas tema“Kedaulatan Rakyat dalam Pemilu”sebagai langkah untuk mewujudkan kesejahteraan rakyat. Sabtu, 6 Januari 2024Dalam paparannya, Ketua Bawaslu Bangkep menekankan pentingnya penggunaan kedaulatan rakyat secara sadar dan rasional, mengajak masyarakat memanfaatkan momen pemilu sebagai wadah untuk memilih dan mengevaluasi pemimpin melalui visi, misi, program, dan rekam jejak calon. Khususnya, ia menyoroti bahaya politik uang dan mengajak masyarakat untuk menolaknya.“Politik uang merusak proses demokrasi dan mengancam kesejahteraan rakyat. Kita harus menolaknya dan memilih pemimpin berdasarkan kualifikasi dan integritas,” ungkap Ketua Bawaslu Bangkep.Selain itu, Ketua Bawaslu mengajak masyarakat untuk terlibat dalam pengawasan partisipatif, melaporkan pelanggaran pemilu kepada pengawas pemilu di kecamatan maupun desa.Dengan demikian, diharapkan pemilu dapat berjalan dengan jujur, adil, dan bermartabat.Dialog kepemiluan ini juga mengundang akademisi dari Universitas Tadulako, Ibu Leli Tibaka, SH, MH, yang secara akademik menggali fenomena politik uang di Sulawesi Tengah, khususnya Banggai Kepulauan. Ibu Leli menyoroti dampak negatif politik uang terhadap kesejahteraan rakyat.Dalam kesimpulan dialog, Dosen Hukum Untad ini mengajak seluruh peserta untuk berkomitmen menolak politik uang di Banggai Kepulauan.Komitmen ini disampaikan secara serentak oleh lebih dari 150 peserta yang hadir.Acara ini juga menampilkan narasumber dari Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU) Bangkep, yang memberikan penekanan pada Sub Program KPU Bangkep bernama “Mintikan Labano.”Kehadiran narasumber dari berbagai latar belakang ini memberikan gambaran komprehensif tentang upaya bersama untuk mewujudkan pemilu yang bersih dan bermartabat di Banggai Kepulauan.Dengan semangat ini, masyarakat diharapkan dapat mengoptimalkan hak konstitusional mereka dengan memilih pemimpin berdasarkan integritas dan kompetensi pada 14 Februari 2024 mendatang. (RSM)**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Chairman of Bawaslu Bangkep Invites the Banggai Islands Community to Reject Money Politics in the KONDA LIPU Election Dialogue. Chairman of the General Election Supervisory Board (Bawaslu) Bangkep, Dr. (H.C) [Name], was the main resource person in the electoral dialogue initiated by the Election Concerned Youth Community "KONDA LIPU" in Lumbi-Lumbia Village, Buko Selatan. The event was attended by various community representatives, religious leaders, youth, women, educators , and election organizers, discussed the theme "People's Sovereignty in Elections" as a step to realize people's welfare. Saturday, January 6 2024 In his presentation, the Chairman of Bawaslu Bangkep emphasized the importance of using people's sovereignty consciously and rationally, inviting the public to use the election moment as a forum for selecting and evaluating leaders through the vision, mission, programs and track records of candidates. In particular, he highlighted the dangers of money politics and invited the public to reject it. "Money politics undermines the democratic process and threatens people's welfare. "We must reject it and choose leaders based on qualifications and integrity," said the Chairperson of Bawaslu Bangkep. Apart from that, the Chairperson of Bawaslu invited the public to be involved in participatory supervision, reporting election violations to election supervisors in sub-districts and villages. In this way, it is hoped that the election can run honestly. , fair and dignified. This electoral dialogue also invited academics from Tadulako University, Mrs. Leli Tibaka, SH, MH, who academically explores the phenomenon of money politics in Central Sulawesi, especially the Banggai Islands. Mrs. Leli highlighted the negative impact of money politics on people's welfare. In the conclusion of the dialogue, the Untad Law Lecturer invited all participants to commit to rejecting money politics in the Banggai Islands. This commitment was conveyed simultaneously by more than 150 participants who attended. This event also featured speakers from Bangkep General Election Commission (KPU), which places emphasis on the Bangkep KPU Sub Program called "Mintikan Labano." The presence of resource persons from various backgrounds provides a comprehensive picture of joint efforts to realize clean and dignified elections in the Banggai Islands. With this spirit, The public is expected to be able to optimize their constitutional rights by electing leaders based on integrity and competence on February 14 2024. (RSM)**

title: Perayaan Natal 2023 di Lapas Luwuk, Sebanyak 49 Warga Binaan Dapatkan Remisi
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Sebanyak 49 warga binaan pemasyarakat (WBP) Lembaga Pemasyarakatan (Lapas) Kelas IIB Luwuk mendapatkan Remisi Khusus (RK) hari raya Natal 2023 dan pengurangan masa pidana.49 WBP yang menerima remisi tersebut, yakni sebanyak 6 orang mendapatkan 15 hari, 37 orang sebanyak 1 bulan, dan 6 orang sebanyak 1 bulan 15 hari.Sesuai keputusan Menteri Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia Republik Indonesia Nomor PAS-2134.PK.05.04 Tahun 2023 tentang pemberian remisi khusus (RK) tahun 2023 dan pengurangan masa pidana remisi khusus (RK) Natal Tahun 2023 Menteri Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia Republik Indonesia.Remisi tersebut diserahkan langsung oleh PLH Kepala Lapas Kelas IIB Luwuk, I Made Subagiartha, S.TH serta selaku Pendeta Perayaan Natal, di Gereja El-Roy Lapas Luwuk, sekira pukul 09.00-11.00 Wita, Senin (25/12/2023).Turut hadir WBP Nasrani dan 4 pegawai selaku pembina, serta majelis kolom 2.Remisi diberikan kepada Narapidana yang beragama Kristen Protestan dan Katholik yang telah memenuhi syarat administratif dan substantif sesuai perundang-undangan.Plh Kalapas Luwuk, I Made Subagiartha dalam sambutannya mengucapkan, selamat natal untuk umat Nasrani.Ia berharap, dengan pemberian remisi ini, diharapkan dapat menjadi motivasi dan semangat bagi WBP untuk dapat berkelakuan baik selama menjalani masa pidananya.Serta sambung dia, semakin dapat meningkatkan keimanannya, agar setelah bebas nanti dapat terhindar dari perbuatan melawan hukum kembali.“Dan diharapkan bisa menjadikan proses pembinaan narapidana di Lapas dapat berjalan dengan maksimal,” harapnya.Sementara itu, Pegawai Lapas Kelas IIB Luwuk, Andi Abd. Muis kepada Banggai Raya menjelaskan, remisi ini adalah suatu pengurangan hukuman yang diberikan kepada orang terpidana jika berkelakuan baik selama masa tahanan.“Artinya, jika seseorang yang sedang menjalani hukuman pidana menu jukkan perilaku yang baik selama masa hukumannya,” kata Andi Abd. Muis kepada Banggai Raya, Jumat (5/1/2024).Lebih lanjut, Ia mengatakan, hukuman tersebut dapat dikurangi sesuai dengan ketentuan perundang-undangan yang berlaku di Indonesia. Kegiatan pembinaan kepribadian dan kerohanian meliputi hal-hal yang berkaitan dengan ketakwaan kepada Tuhan Yang Maha Esa.“Kesadaran berbangsa dan bernegara, intelektual, sikap dan perilaku, kesehatan jasmani dan rohani,” tandasnya. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-A total of 49 inmates (WBP) of Class IIB Luwuk Penitentiary (Lapas) received Special Remission (RK) for Christmas 2023 and a reduction in their criminal term. 49 WBP who received this remission, namely 6 people, got 15 days, 37 people for 1 month, and 6 people for 1 month 15 days. In accordance with the decision of the Minister of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia Number PAS-2134.PK.05.04 of 2023 concerning the granting of special remissions (RK) in 2023 and reducing the criminal period for special remissions ( RK) Christmas 2023 Minister of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia. The remission was handed over directly by PLH Head of the Class IIB Luwuk Prison, I Made Subagiartha, S.TH and as Pastor of the Christmas Celebration, at the El-Roy Church Luwuk Prison, at around 09.00 -11.00 WITA, Monday (25/12/2023). Also present were WBP Nasrani and 4 employees as supervisors, as well as column 2 councilors. Remissions were given to prisoners who were Protestant Christians and Catholics who had fulfilled the administrative and substantive requirements according to the law. Acting Head of Luwuk Police, I Made Subagiartha, in his speech said, Merry Christmas to the Christian community. He hopes that by granting this remission, it will be a motivation and enthusiasm for inmates to be able to behave well while serving their criminal term. And he continued, it will further increase their faith. , so that after being released, we can avoid committing acts against the law again. "And it is hoped that this can make the process of training prisoners in prison run optimally," he hoped. Meanwhile, Class IIB Luwuk Prison Employee, Andi Abd. Muis explained to Banggai Raya that this remission is a reduction in sentence given to a convicted person if they behave well during their prison period. "This means that if someone who is serving a criminal sentence shows good behavior during their sentence," said Andi Abd. Muis to Banggai Raya, Friday (5/1/2024). Furthermore, he said that the sentence could be reduced in accordance with the statutory provisions in force in Indonesia. Personality and spiritual development activities include matters relating to devotion to God Almighty. "National and state awareness, intellectual, attitudes and behavior, physical and spiritual health," he stressed. RUM

title: Subsatgas OMB Polsek Luwuk Temui Para Sopir Upaya Ciptakan Pemilu Damai
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Dalam rangka menciptakan Pemilu Damai 2023 – 2024, Satgas OMB Polres Banggai melalui Subsatgas Polsek Luwuk mendatangi para sopir angkot yang sedang berkumpul di Jalur 2 Tanjung, Kelurahan Karaton dan Kelurahan Maahas, Jumat (5/1/2024).Kegiatan ini bertujuan untuk menampung aspirasi, mendengarkan curhatan dan berinteraksi langsung dengan warga guna menciptakan suasana Pemilu yang kondusif.Dari interaksi tersebut, masyarakat menginginkan Satgas OMB Tinombala Polres Banggai untuk meningkatkan patroli, memantau kegiatan malam hari sebelum hari H Pencoblosan dan khususnya saat hari H Pencoblosan.Hal ini disebabkan potensi gangguan kamtibmas yang mungkin muncul sebagai dampak dari berita kemenangan serta fenomena money politik yang dikenal sebagai serangan fajar.Menyikapi hal tersebut, Subsatgas OMB Polsek Luwuk menyampaikan bahwa akan memperketat pelaksanaan patroli sesuai permintaan masyarakat.Patroli akan terus ditingkatkan. title: Polres Banggai: Ale Ditangkap Murni Kasus Pengancaman Bukan Tambak Udang
text: Polresbanggai.com–polres banggaimenyatakan kasus yang menjerat Febrianto Hado alias Ale (32) warga Kelurahan Tolando, Kecamatan Batui,kabupaten banggai, Sulteng bukan merupakan kasus lahan tambak udang ataupun agraria“Kasus yang ditangani bukan terkait lahan tambak udang, tapi murni karena adanya laporan pengancaman dari pelapor ” ungkap Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S. Muda kepada wartawan di Kawasan Bukit Halimun,luwukSelatan, Minggu (7/1/2024) siang.Selain itu, usai diamankan dan dilakukan pemeriksaan oleh penyidiksat reskrimPolres Banggai, terlapor langsung diserahkan kepada penasehat hukumnya.“Terlapor tidak dilakukan penahanan dan pada Sabtu 6 Januari 2024 pukul 22.00 Wita sudah diserahkan kepada penasehat hukumnya. Untuk proses hukum tetap berlanjut,” beber Iptu Al Amin.Pelaku diamankan Polres Banggai atas laporan polisi nomor LP/B/04/I/2024/SPKT/POLRES BANGGAI/POLDA SULAWESI TENGAH Tgl 3 januari 2024.Kasus ini terjadi pada Rabu 3 Januari 2024 sekitar pukul 10.00 Wita saat pelapor berinisial AR (54) yang merupakan salah satu karyawan tambak udang ini dimana saat otu pelapor sedang duduk di pos 1 penjagaan Tambak Udang PT.MAB.“Tiba-tiba terlapor datang marah-marah dan langsung mengamuk dengan cara menunjuk-nunjuk pelapor,” jelasnya.Selanjutnya, terlapor mendekati pelapor dengan maksud ingin memukul akan tetapi dilerai oleh karyawan PT. MAP yang sedang berada di tempat tersebut.“Dan terlapor membuat keributan serta melakukan pengancaman kepada pelapor dengan mengatakan akan memukul pelapor apabila pelapor masih bekerja di Perusahaan Tambak Udang tersebut,” ujar Iptu Al Amin.“Saat itu pelapor hanya diam, sedangkan terlapor langsung pergi meninggalkan pelapor,” beber perwira pangkat dua balak ini.Pelaku ditangkap atas dasar surat perintah penangkapan nomor : SP.KAP/03/I/Res.1.24/2024/Reskrim tanggal 5 januari 2024 ataa kasus tindak pidana pengancaman sesuai pasal 335 KUHP.“Pengancaman yang dilakukan terlapor tersebut terhadap karyawan karyawanperusahaan tambak udang sudah dilakukan berulang kali, termasuk pengancaman yang dilakukan oleh karyawan di lokasi tambak udang,” imbuhnyaDikatakan, bahwa pengancaman yang terakhir dilakukan terlapor terhadap korban maupun karyawan perusahaan tambak udang pada tanggal 5 Januari 2024 di bertempat di Kantorbupati banggaisetelah selesai pertemuan.“Adapun tujuan pelaku melakukan pengancaman terhadap karyawan karyawan perusahaan tambak udang adalah agar karyawan tidak melakukan aktivitas sehingga kegiatan perusahaan terhenti,” beber Kasi Humas.“Berdasarkan keterangan pelapor maupun saksi-saksi yang bekerja sebagai karyawan perusahaan, mereka sangat takut dan khawatir atas ancaman dari pelaku,” tandasnya
text_en: Polresbanggai.com–Bangani District Police stated that the case that ensnared Febrianto Hado alias Ale (32), a resident of Tolando Village, Batui District, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, was not a case of shrimp pond land or agrarian land. "The case handled was not related to shrimp pond land, but purely because of a report "threats from the reporter," said the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S. Muda, to journalists in the Bukit Halimun area, South Luwuk, Sunday (7/1/2024) afternoon. Apart from that, after being detained and examined by the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit investigator, the reported party was immediately handed over to his legal advisor. "The respondent was not detained and on Saturday 6 January 2024 at 22.00 WITA he was handed over to his legal advisor. "The legal process will continue," explained Inspector Al Amin. The perpetrator was arrested by Banggai Police based on police report number LP/B/04/I/2024/SPKT/POLRES BANGGAI/CENTRAL SULAWESI POLDA on January 3 2024. This case occurred on Wednesday January 3. 2024 at around 10.00 WITA when the reporter with the initials AR (54), who is one of the employees of this shrimp farm, was sitting at post 1 guarding PT. pointing at the complainant," he explained. Furthermore, the reported party approached the complainant with the intention of hitting him but was stopped by PT employees. MAP who was at that place. "And the reported party made a fuss and threatened the reporter by saying he would hit the reporter if the reporter was still working at the Shrimp Farming Company," said Inspector Al Amin. "At that time the reporter was silent, while the reportee immediately left "I left the reporter behind," explained this second rank Balak officer. The perpetrator was arrested on the basis of arrest warrant number: SP.KAP/03/I/Res.1.24/2024/Reskrim dated January 5 2024 in a case of criminal threats in accordance with Article 335 of the Criminal Code." "The threats carried out by the reported party against employees of the shrimp farming company have been carried out repeatedly, including threats carried out by employees at the shrimp farming location," he added. It is said that the last threat carried out by the reported party was against the victims and employees of the shrimp farming company on January 5 2024 at the location in The regent's office was proud after the meeting was finished. "The aim of the perpetrator in threatening the shrimp farming company's employees was to prevent the employees from carrying out activities so that the company's activities would stop," explained the Head of Public Relations. "Based on the statements of the reporter and witnesses who work as company employees, they were very afraid and worried about threats from the perpetrators," he said

title: DSLNG Sumbang Devisa Hasil Ekspor Terbesar di Wilayah Bea Cukai Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA-PT Donggi-Senoro LNG kembali menjadi perusahaan penyumbang Devisa Hasil Ekspor (DHE) terbesar selama tahun 2023 di wilayah kerja Kantor Pengawasan dan Pelayanan Bea dan Cukai (KPPBC) Tipe Madya Pabean (TMP) C Luwuk.Atas pencapaian ini Bea Cukai Luwuk memberikan apresiasi kepada DSLNG sebagai perusahaan pengguna jasa. Penghargaan diserahkan langsung oleh Kepala Kantor Bea Cukai Luwuk, Mu’amar Khadafi, kepada External Relations Manager DSLNG, Ardya Yosy Rahardjo, di Aula KPPBC TMP C Luwuk, Kamis (7/12/2023). Penghargaan ini menjadi apresiasi atas kontribusi nyata DSLNG dari bea cukai terhadap negara. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-PT Donggi-Senoro LNG has again become the company that contributes the largest foreign exchange from export proceeds (DHE) during 2023 in the work area of ​​the Customs and Excise Supervision and Service Office (KPPBC) Type C Luwuk Intermediate Customs (TMP). Thanks to this achievement, Luwuk Customs and Excise give appreciation to DSLNG as a service user company. The award was handed over directly by the Head of the Luwuk Customs and Excise Office, Mu'amar Khadafi, to the DSLNG External Relations Manager, Ardya Yosy Rahardjo, in the KPPBC TMP C Luwuk Hall, Thursday (7/12/2023). This award is an appreciation for DSLNG's real contribution from customs to the country. (*)

title: Selama Tiga Hari, Rangkaian Kegiatan PMI Banggai Peringati Hari Relawan Berlangsung Sukses
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Salama tiga hari dimulai dari tanggal 18-20 Desember 2023, rangkaian kegiatan Peringati Hari Relawan yang dibuka Wakil Bupati Furqanuddin Masulili dan dilaksanakan PMI Kabupaten Banggai berlangsung lancar dan sukses.Plt Ketua PMI Kabupaten Banggai, Sahraen Sibay mengatakan, beragam kegiatan yang sukses dilaksanakan selama tiga hari di Sandakan adalah sebagai berikut.Pertama, PMI Banggai sukses menggelar Musyawarah Kerja diikuti oleh Pengurus PMI Sulawesi Tengah, Pengurus PMI Kabupaten Banggai, Pengurus PMI Kecamatan se- Kabupaten Banggai dan peninjau.Kedua, kegiatan Pendidikan Dasar (DIKSAR) dan Latihan Gabungan (LATGAB) yang diikuti oleh peserta dari PMR dan KSR se Kabupaten Banggai yang dilaksanakan tiga hari di tempat yang sama.Ketiga, PMI Banggai sukses menggelar kegiatan Donor Darah yang dilaksanakan mulai tanggal 18-20 Desember 2023 bertempat di Lokasi Wisata Sandakan Desa Biak Kecamatan Luwuk Utara.Berikutnya, penanaman bibit pohon/ penghijauan yang kegiatanya dilaksanakan pada Selasa tanggal 19 Desember 2023 bertempat di Lokasi Wisata Sandakan Desa Biak Kecamatan Luwuk Utara Kabupaten Banggai.“Ada juga Pentas seni bagi peserta PMR dan KSR yang dilaksanakan pada hari Senin-Rabu tanggal 18-20 Desember 2023 bertempat di Lokasi Wisata Sandakan Desa Biak Kecamatan Luwuk Utara Kabupaten Banggai,” ungkapnya.Kemudian, PMI Banggai juga melakukan Penggalangan Dana dari Relawan PMR dan KSR PMI Kabupaten Banggai dalam rangka bentuk kepedulian untuk kemanusiaan di Palestina.Dalam penggalangan dana itu berhasil terkumpul sebesar Rp. 15.000.000,00 (Lima Belas Juta Rupiah), dan dana tersebut telah dikirim ke Rekening PMI Pusat.Sebelumnya, dalam sambutan Plt Ketua PMI Banggai, Sahraen Sibay mengungkapkan, PMI yang lahir pada tanggal 17 September 1945 yang usianya sampai dengan saat ini berusia 78 Tahun, hanya selisih 1 bulan dengan lahirnya proklamasi kemerdekaan RI tanggal 17 Agustus 1945.“Hal ini mengisyaratkan kepada kita semua bahwa PMI harus bergadengan tangan bersama – sama Pemerintah Pusat, Provinsi dan Daerah dalam melaksanakan kegiatan – kegiatan yang bersifat kemanusiaan dan sosial kemasyarakatan. Artinya kehadiran PMI tanpa dukungan pemerintah tidak mempunyai arti dan makna,” kata Sahraen Sibay, yang juga Sekretaris BPH Unismuh Luwuk itu. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- For three days starting from 18-20 December 2023, a series of activities to commemorate Volunteer Day which were opened by Deputy Regent Furqanuddin Masulili and carried out by PMI Banggai Regency went smoothly and successfully. Acting Chairman of PMI Banggai Regency, Sahraen Sibay said, various activities were successful held for three days in Sandakan are as follows. First, PMI Banggai successfully held a Work Conference followed by Central Sulawesi PMI Management, Banggai Regency PMI Management, District PMI Management throughout Banggai Regency and observers. Second, Basic Education (DIKSAR) and Training activities Joint (LATGAB) which was attended by participants from PMR and KSR throughout Banggai Regency which was held for three days in the same place. Third, PMI Banggai successfully held a Blood Donation activity which was held from 18-20 December 2023 at the Sandakan Tourist Location, Biak Village, District North Luwuk. Next, planting tree seedlings/reforestation activities will be carried out on Tuesday 19 December 2023 at the Sandakan Tourist Location, Biak Village, North Luwuk District, Banggai Regency. "There is also an art performance for PMR and KSR participants which will be held on Monday-Wednesday "December 18-20 2023 at the Sandakan Tourist Location, Biak Village, North Luwuk District, Banggai Regency," he said. Then, PMI Banggai also raised funds from PMR and KSR Volunteers of PMI Banggai Regency in order to show concern for humanity in Palestine. In this fundraising managed to collect Rp. 15,000,000.00 (Fifteen Million Rupiah), and these funds have been sent to the Central PMI Account. Previously, in a speech by the Acting Chairman of PMI Banggai, Sahraen Sibay, revealed that PMI, who was born on September 17 1945, is currently aged 78 years, only 1 month difference from the birth of the Republic of Indonesia's proclamation of independence on August 17 1945. "This suggests to all of us that PMI must join hands with the Central, Provincial and Regional Governments in carrying out activities of a humanitarian and social nature. "This means that PMI's presence without government support has no meaning or significance," said Sahraen Sibay, who is also Secretary of BPH Unismuh Luwuk. (*)

title: Jelang Libur Nataru, Polres Banggai Gencar Razia Miras, Temukan Ratusan Liter Cap Tikus
text: Polresbanggai.com– Menjelang libur Natal dan Tahun Baru (Nataru), Resmob Tompotikapolres banggaimelakukan razia minuman keras (miras) di sejumlah rumah dan warung di Kotaluwuk, Rabu (20/12/2023) malam.Satu per satu lokasi yang menjual dan menyimpan miras disambangi dan diperiksa oleh petugas.Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy mengatakan dalam razia ditemukan ratusan miras jenis cap tikus disita dari 7 lokasi yang berbeda.“Hasil razia cipta kondisi jelang Nataru, kami menemukan sejumlah miras dari rumah FB, UJ dan Kios RU di Kelurahan Kaleke. Kemudian kediaman ST, BU, dan warung DA alamat Kelurahan Karaton. Selanjutnya dikos HA alamat Kelurahan Baru,,” ungkapnya.AKP Tio mengatakan razia tersebut dilakukan setelah mendapatkan informasi bahwa terdapat beberapa pedagang eceran yang diduga menjual minuman keras tradisional cap tikus.Petugas Satuan Reskrim Polres Banggai berhasil mengamankan cap tikus sebanyak 118 botol, 60 bungkus, 2 jerigen berisikan 20 liter dan 4 jergen ukuran 5 liter.“Dari tujuh lokasi, kami berhasil mengamankan sekitar 150 liter cap tikus siap edar,” imbuhnya.Razia penyakit masyarakat ini akan terus gencar dilakukan oleh aparat kepolisian untuk menjaga kamtibmas terutama menjelang perayaan Natal dan Tahun Baru serta tahapan Pemilu
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– Approaching the Christmas and New Year (Nataru) holidays, the Tompotikapolres Resmob is proud to carry out liquor (alcohol) raids at a number of houses and stalls in Kotaluwuk, Wednesday (20/12/2023) evening. One by one the locations that sell and store alcohol officers visited and inspected. Head of Criminal Investigation Unit for the Banggai Police, AKP Tio Tondy, said that during the raid, hundreds of rat brand alcohol were found confiscated from 7 different locations. Kaleke Village. Then the ST residence, BU, and DA stall address Karaton Village. "Next at the HA boarding house, the address is Baru Village," he said. AKP Tio said the raid was carried out after receiving information that there were several retail traders who were suspected of selling traditional rat stamp liquor. Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit officers succeeded in confiscating 118 bottles, 60 packs of rat stamp. 2 jerry cans containing 20 liters and 4 jerry cans measuring 5 liters. "From seven locations, we managed to secure around 150 liters of rat stamps ready for distribution," he added. Police officers will continue to carry out intensive raids on community diseases to maintain public order and order, especially ahead of Christmas and Christmas celebrations. New Year and election stages

title: Cek Bahan Pokok, TPID Banggai Sidak SPBU, Toko dan Pasar Simpong
