Penilaian itu berjalan,” kata Bupati Amirudin.Ia berharap, para pejabat yang baru dilantik dapat menjaga amanah jabatan dengan melaksanakan tugas pelayanan masyarakat dengan sebaik-baiknya.Prosesi pelantikan diawali dengan pembacaan Surat Keputusan Bupati Banggai, kemudian dilanjutkan dengan pengambilan sumpah jabatan.“Pada hari ini, Kamis, tanggal 21 Desember bulan November tahun 2023, Saya Amirudin, Bupati Banggai, dengan ini secara resmi melantik saudara saudari dalam jabatan yang baru di lingkungan Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai,” ujar Bupati Banggai saat menyampaikan kata-kata pelantikan.“Saya percaya bahwa saudara saudari akan melaksanakan tugas dengan sebaik-baiknya sesuai dengan tanggung jawab yang diberikan,” tandasnya.Prosesi pelantikan juga disaksikan oleh Wakil Bupati Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili, Sekretaris Daerah Kabupaten Banggai Abdullah Ali, Asisten Bidang Perekonomian dan Pembangunan Ferlin Monggesang, Kepala BKPSDM Sofian Datu Adam, serta sejumlah pimpinan perangkat daerah. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Again, Banggai Regent Amirudin inaugurated a number of administrators (Echelon III), supervisors (Echelon IV), and functional officials within the Banggai Regency Government, Thursday (21/12/2023), in the General Meeting Room of the Banggai Regent's Office, Luwuk South. Of the number of officials who were appointed, there were five ASN who filled the position of sub-district head. Based on information reported from DKISP Banggai coverage, the first sub-district head to be appointed, Juana Esli Mandey was appointed as Mantoh sub-district head. Second, M. Idham Khalid as Head of South Balantak District. Akram Budjang is trusted to fill the position of Head of Balantak District. Samran Tule was appointed as Head of North Balantak Subdistrict. Meanwhile, Head of Nuhon Subdistrict, previously held by Hariadi Bola, is now entrusted to Sumitro Balahanti. Meanwhile, Hariadi Bola fills a new position as Head of the Governance Section of the Banggai Regional Secretariat. Regent Amirudin said that the inauguration of officials which was carried out in stages over the last few months was an effort to refresh the bureaucracy. He admitted that at every moment of the inauguration there were always parties who were happy or not with it. decisions taken. However, he ensured that the rotations, transfers and promotions carried out were in accordance with the assessment of the performance of ASNs. “That's the existing system. "The assessment is ongoing," said Regent Amirudin. He hopes that the newly appointed officials can maintain the mandate of their position by carrying out their community service duties as well as possible. The inauguration process begins with the reading of the Banggai Regent's Decree, then continues with taking the oath of office. "At "Today, Thursday, December 21, November 2023, I Amirudin, Regent of Banggai, hereby officially inaugurate brothers and sisters in new positions within the Banggai Regency Government," said the Regent of Banggai when delivering the words of inauguration. "I believe "that brothers and sisters will carry out their duties as well as possible in accordance with the responsibilities given," he stressed. The inauguration procession was also witnessed by Deputy Regent of Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili, Regional Secretary of Banggai Regency Abdullah Ali, Assistant for Economy and Development Ferlin Monggesang, Head of BKPSDM Sofian Datu Adam, as well as a number of regional officials. (*)

title: Program Jumat Curhat, Wakapolres Banggai Dengarkan Aspirasi Masyarakat
text: luwuk–Wakapolres Banggai Kompol Pino Ary SH, SIK, MH, menyatakan akan menindak lanjuti setiap laporan ataupun pengaduan dari masyarakat guna memperbaiki pelayanan Polri.Hal itu disampaikan perwira pangkat satu melati ini saat melaksanakan Program Jumat Curhat bersama para wartawan, akademisi dan tokoh masyarakat di Markas LSM GAM Luwuk, kompleks Teluk Lalong, Jumat (22/12/2023) pagi.“Kami akan tindak lanjuti keluhan-keluhan masyarakat terutama masalah proses penyidikan di Satreskrim,” terangnya.Pino menjelaskan, setiap proses penyidikan suatu kasus di Satreskrim yang ditangani penyidik tersebut memiliki mekanisme.“Tapi nanti akan kami tiindak lanjuti dan disampaikan kepada Kasat Reskrim,” jelasnya.Terkait peredaran narkoba, ia menyatakan,polres banggaiterus melakukan sosialisasi kepada masyarakat dan penegakkan hukum kepada para pelaku.“Kita masif melakukan sosialisasi kepada pelajar hingga masyarakat tentang dampak penggunaan narkoba. Dan untuk penegakkan hukum terus dilakukan tanpa pandang bulu,” terang mantan Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai ini.Ia pun berharap seluruh lapisan masyarakat ikut berpartisipasi dalam memberantas peredaran Miras dan Narkoba yang menjadi factor utama pemicu tindak kriminalitas.“Terima kasih saran dan masukannya kepada kami, ini semua demi pelayanan Polri yang lebih baik lagi,” imbuhnya.“Karena Polri bukanlah siapa-siapa tanpa dukungan dari lapisan masyarakat,” tandas Pino.Dikatakan, Program Jumat Curhat merupakan program dari Kapolri yang bertujuan untuk mendengar langsung keluhan masyarakat untuk memperbaiki pelayanan PolriSelain itu, Program unggulan Polri di era kepemimpinan Kapolri Jenderal Listyo Sigit Prabowo ini bertujuan Polri untuk selalu mendengarkan aspirasi masyarakat demi terciptanya kamtibmas yang kondusif
text_en: Luwuk–Deputy Chief of Banggai Police, Police Commissioner Pino Ary SH, SIK, MH, stated that he would follow up on every report or complaint from the public in order to improve Polri services. This was conveyed by this first rank officer of Melati when carrying out the Confidential Friday Program with journalists, academics and community leaders in Luwuk GAM NGO headquarters, Teluk Lalong complex, Friday (22/12/2023) morning. "We will follow up on community complaints, especially regarding the investigation process at the Criminal Investigation Unit," he explained. Pino explained that every investigation process of a case at the Criminal Investigation Unit is handled The investigator has a mechanism. "But later we will follow up and convey it to the Head of Criminal Investigation Unit," he explained. Regarding drug trafficking, he stated that the police are proud to continue to carry out outreach to the community and enforce the law against the perpetrators. "We are doing massive outreach to students and the community. about the impact of drug use. And law enforcement will continue to be carried out indiscriminately," explained the former Head of Criminal Investigation Unit for the Banggai Police. He also hopes that all levels of society will participate in eradicating the distribution of alcohol and drugs which are the main factors triggering crime. "Thank you for your suggestions and input to us, "This is all for the sake of better Polri services," he added. "Because the Polri is nothing without support from levels of society," stressed Pino. He said that the Friday Confide Program is a program from the National Police Chief which aims to hear directly the community's complaints to improve Polri services. That, the flagship program of the National Police in the era of the leadership of the National Police Chief, General Listyo Sigit Prabowo, aims for the National Police to always listen to the aspirations of the community in order to create conducive security and social order.

title: LPMPP Unismuh Luwuk Gelar RTM, Prodi Biologi Raih Penghargaan Presentasi Ketercapaian Terbaik
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Lembaga Penjaminan Mutu dan Pengembangan Pendidikan (LPMPP) Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk yang diketuai Dr. Hasrat Aimang menggelar Rapat Tinjauan Manajemen (RTM), Jumat 22 Desember 2023.Kegiatan yang dilaksanakan di ruang Pascasarjana Unismuh Luwuk itu merupakan agenda rutin setiap tahun.Pelaksanaan RTM diawali dgn pelaksanaan Audit Mutu Internal (AMI), dan merupakan evaluasi formal yang dilakukan oleh LPMPP Unismuh Luwuk.“RTM ini dilaksanakan mengevaluasi sistem mutu secara berkala dan berkesinambungan dalam hubungan dengan kebijakan mutu dan sasaran mutu,” kata Ketua LPMPP Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Hasrat Aimang.Kegiatan Rapat Tinjauan Manajemen itu dihadiri langsung oleh Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr Sutrisno K Djawa, Ketua BPH Dr. Farid Haluti, Dekan-dekan, wakil dekan, ketua-ketua lembaga, Kaprodi, Gugur Penjaminan Mutu Internal Fakultas, Unit Penjaminan Mutu Internal Program Studi danAuditor-auditor internal.Dalam rapat itu, Prodi Pendidikan Biologi berhasil menerima penghargaan dalam presentasi ketercapaian terbaik. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Institute for Quality Assurance and Education Development (LPMPP) Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk chaired by Dr. Hasrat Aimang held a Management Review Meeting (RTM), Friday 22 December 2023. The activity carried out in the Unismuh Luwuk Postgraduate room is a routine agenda every year. The implementation of the RTM begins with the implementation of an Internal Quality Audit (AMI), and is a formal evaluation carried out by LPMPP Unismuh Luwuk. "RTM is carried out to evaluate the quality system periodically and continuously in connection with quality policy and quality targets," said the Head of LPMPP Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Hasrat Aimang. The Management Review Meeting activities were attended directly by the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr Sutrisno K Djawa, Chairman of BPH Dr. Farid Haluti, Deans, deputy deans, heads of institutions, Heads of Study Programs, Faculty Internal Quality Assurance Unit, Study Program Internal Quality Assurance Unit and internal auditors. In that meeting, the Biology Education Study Program succeeded in receiving an award for the best achievement presentation. (*)

title: DP2KBP3A Banggai Sukses Gelar Beragam Kegiatan Peringati Hari Ibu, Ini Harapan Bupati Amirudin
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Dinas Pengendalian Penduduk dan Keluarga Berencana, Pemberdayaan Perempuan dan Perlindungan Anak (DP2KBP3A) Kabupaten Banggai sukses melaksanakan beragam kegiatan memperingati Hari Ibu ke-95 tahun 2023.Kegiatan ini diselenggarakan pada Jumat (22/12/2023) di Gedung Graha Pemerintah Daerah (Pemda) Kabupaten Banggai.Dalam menyambut Hari Ibu ke-95, Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO mengucapkan selamat Hari Ibu untuk seluruh perempuan di Indonesia.“Selamat hari ibu, perempuan-perempuan indonesia, perempuan berdaya, anak terlindungi, indonesia maju,” ujar Amirudin, seperti dilansir dari liputan Dinas Kominfo Banggai.Dalam Sambutannya, orang nomor satu di Banggai itu berharap agar masyarakat dapat merayakan berbagai kemajuan yang telah dicapai oleh perempuan, sambil tetap menyadari bahwa perjuangan untuk kesetaraan masih panjang dan harus terus dilanjutkan.“Dengan jumlah perempuan yang mengisi hampir setengah dari populasi indonesia, kemajuan perempuan tentunya ακαν menjadi kemajuan bangsa sehingga perjuangan mencapainya menjadi kewajiban semua pihak pula, baik perempuan maupun laki- laki, harus mendorong peran perempuan dalam segala bentuk dan sektor pembangunan,” ujar Bupati Amirudin.Puncak peringatan Hari Ibu ke-95 tersebut diwarnai dengan Acara Bazar UMKM, Pasar Murah, Donor Darah, dan Lomba Fashion Show yang diikuti oleh berbagai organisasi Perempuan di Kabupaten Banggai.Di hari sebelumnya, DP2KBP3A juga telah melaksanakan serangkaian kegiatan yang difokuskan pada pencegahan dan penanganan kekerasan terhadap perempuan dan anak, serta penanganan masalah stunting pada anak.Kepala dinas P2KBP3A, Faisal Karim, S.Sos,.MS.i juga menyatakan bahwa di Tahun 2024 DP2KBP3A bakal meluncurkan program inovasi baru yaitu Sistem Informasi Pencegahan Kekerasan Terhadap Anak dan Perempuan (SICAKAP).Bupati Berharap, Melalui inovasi SICAKAP Kasus pelecehan dan tindak kekerasan terhadap perempuan dan anak di Kab. Banggai bisa diatasi dan ditangani dengan baik.  (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- The Department of Population Control and Family Planning, Women's Empowerment and Child Protection (DP2KBP3A) Banggai Regency successfully carried out various activities to commemorate the 95th Mother's Day 2023. This activity was held on Friday (22/12/2023) at the Graha Regional Government Building (Pemda) Banggai Regency. In welcoming the 95th Mother's Day, the Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO wishes all women in Indonesia a happy Mother's Day. "Happy Mother's Day, Indonesian women, empowered women, protected children, advanced Indonesia," said Amirudin, as reported by the Banggai Communication and Information Service coverage. In his speech , the number one person in Banggai hopes that society can celebrate the various advances that have been achieved by women, while still realizing that the struggle for equality is still long and must continue. "With women making up almost half of Indonesia's population, women's progress is certainly ακαν "to become the progress of the nation so that the struggle to achieve it is the obligation of all parties, both women and men, who must encourage the role of women in all forms and sectors of development," said Regent Amirudin. The highlight of the 95th Mother's Day commemoration was marked by the MSME Bazaar, Market Cheap, Blood Donation, and a Fashion Show Competition which was participated in by various women's organizations in Banggai Regency. On the previous day, DP2KBP3A had also carried out a series of activities focused on preventing and handling violence against women and children, as well as handling the problem of stunting in children. Head of department P2KBP3A, Faisal Karim, S.Sos,.MS.i also stated that in 2024 DP2KBP3A will launch a new innovation program, namely the Information System for the Prevention of Violence Against Children and Women (SICAKAP). women and children in Kab. Banggai can be overcome and handled well. (*)

title: Hasil Seleksi PPPK Guru di 116 Daerah Telah Diumumkan, Banggai Belum?
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Pengumuman hasil seleksi akhir PPPK Guru mulai diumumkan hari ini Jumat 22 Desember 2023.Informasi yang dihimpun media ini, hingga Jumat sore, dikabarkan baru 116 daerah yang telah menerima hasil seleksi PPPK.“Tadi dicek di sistem baru 116 daerah, Banggai belum masuk,” kata Kaban BKPSDM Banggai, Soffian Datu Adam kepada Banggai Raya, Jumat sore, via pesan WhatsApp.Diketahui, untuk mendapatkan informasi Pengumuman peserta seleksi bisa melihat situs SSCASN BKN di link https://sscasn.bkn.go.id/.Selain itu, peserta juga bisa melakukan pengecekan di laman instansi terkait tempat mendaftar PPPK Guru. Kemudian, anda bisa melakukan pengecekan daftar instansi melalui link https://s.id/HasilSeleksiPPPK2023. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- The announcement of the final PPPK Teacher selection results will be announced today, Friday 22 December 2023. Information gathered by this media, as of Friday afternoon, it was reported that only 116 regions had received the PPPK selection results. come in," said Kaban BKPSDM Banggai, Soffian Datu Adam to Banggai Raya, Friday afternoon, via WhatsApp message. It is known that to get information on the announcement of selection participants, you can see the SSCASN BKN website at the link https://sscasn.bkn.go.id/. Apart from that, participants can also check on the relevant agency's page where they can register for PPPK Guru. Then, you can check the list of agencies via the link https://s.id/HasilSeleksiPPPK2023. (*)

title: Sampaikan Pesan Pemilu Damai 2024, Bhabinkamtibmas Polres Banggai Aktif Sambangi Masyarakat
text: luwuk–Selama proses tahapan Pemilu 2024, personel Bhabinkamtibmaspolres banggaiterus berupaya menciptakan dan mewujudkan kondusifitas kamtibmas.Salah satu upaya yang dilakukan Bhabinkamtibmas yakni dengan konsisten melakukan sambang kepada masyarakat untuk berpartisipasi mewujudkan Pemilu Damai 2024.“Sambang ini dilakukan guna membangun komunikasi yang baik antara pihak kepolisian dan masyarakat sekaligus menyampaikan pesan Pemilu Damai 2024,” ungkap Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S. Muda, kepada wartawan, Sabtu (23/12/2023) pagi.Dalam pesan Pemilu Damai, Bhabinkamtibmas mengajak pentingnya menjaga kedamaian dan kerukunan selama masa pesta demokrasi.“Pemilu adalah momen penting dalam proses demokrasi negara dan setiap warga negara memiliki hak untuk memilih wakilnya, namun tetap menjaga silaturahmi,” sebutnya.Selain itu, Bhabinkamtibmas sebagai ujung tombak Polri di kewilayahan berharap masyarakat tidak mudah terprovokasi oleh isu-isu yang dapat memecah belah persatuan dan kesatuan.“Masyarakat selalu diajak untuk bijak dalam menyikapi informasi yang beredar, serta tidak mudah terpancing emosi,” beber Iptu Al Amin.Pesan damai yang disampaikan Bhabinkamtibmas Polres Banggai diharapkan dapat menjadi pemantik semangat bagi masyarakat untuk menjaga kedamaian dan menghindari konflik selama proses Pemilu berlangsung.“Harapannya proses pesta demokrasi dikabupaten banggaidapat berjalan aman, damai dan kondusif hingga selesai,” harapnya
text_en: Luwuk–During the 2024 Election stages, Bhabinkamtibmaspolres personnel are proud to continue to strive to create and realize conducive security and social security. One of the efforts made by Bhabinkamtibmas is to consistently contact the community to participate in realizing the 2024 Peaceful Election. "This meeting was carried out to build good communication between the police and the community at the same time conveying the message of the 2024 Peaceful Election," said the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S. Muda, to journalists, Saturday (23/12/2023) morning. In the message of the Peaceful Election, Bhabinkamtibmas emphasized the importance of maintaining peace and harmony during the festive period. democracy. "Elections are an important moment in the country's democratic process and every citizen has the right to elect their representative, but still maintain friendship," he said. Apart from that, Bhabinkamtibmas as the spearhead of the National Police in the region hopes that the public will not be easily provoked by issues that could "The community is always invited to be wise in responding to information circulating, and not to be easily provoked by emotions," explained Inspector Al Amin. It is hoped that the message of peace delivered by Bhabinkamtibmas Banggai Police will be an encouragement for the community to maintain peace and avoid conflict. during the election process. "We hope that the democratic party process in Banggai Regency can run safely, peacefully and conducively until it is finished," he hoped.

title: Momen Libur Nataru, Satgas Preventif Operasi Lilin 2023 Polres Banggai Tingkatkan Patroli
text: luwuk–Selama momen libur Natal dan Tahun Baru 2023-2024, Satgas Preventif Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023polres banggaimeningkatkan patroli di lokasi keramaian dan pusat perbelanjaan di Kota Luwuk.Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S. Muda mengungkapkan, selama libur Nataru lokasi keramaian dan pusat perbelanjaan di Kota Luwuk banyak dikunjungi masyarakat.“Sehingga kegiatan patroli kepolisian akan tingkatkan guna memberikan rasa aman dan nyaman,” ungkapnya. kepada wartawan di Kawasan Perkantoran Bukit Halimun, Sabtu (23/12/2023) pagi.Menurutnya, kegiatan patroli di lokasi keramaian dan pusat perbelanjaan dilakukan sebagai wujud menghadirkan Polri berdinas di tengah-tengah masyarakat.“Silahkan berkunjung dan berlibur di Kota Luwuk dengan tetap menjaga ketertiban. Kami akan hadir mengamankan,” terangnya.Ia pun mengimbau masyarakat untuk tetap mematuhi dan disiplin dalam berlalu lintas guna terciptanya Kamseltibcar Lantas di jalan.“Kami mengimbau masyarakat untuk tetap tertib berlalu lintas dan juga menjaga keselamatan saat berkendara selama libu Nataru,” imbaunya
text_en: Luwuk–During the 2023-2024 Christmas and New Year holidays, the 2023 Tinombala Candle Operation Preventive Task Force, the police are proud to increase patrols in busy locations and shopping centers in Luwuk City. Shopping in Luwuk City is visited by many people. "So police patrol activities will be increased to provide a sense of security and comfort," he said. told journalists in the Bukit Halimun Office Area, Saturday (23/12/2023) morning. According to him, patrol activities in crowded locations and shopping centers were carried out as a form of presenting the National Police on duty in the community. "Please visit and vacation in Luwuk City as always maintain order. "We will be there to provide security," he explained. He also appealed to the public to remain obedient and disciplined in traffic in order to create Traffic Security on the roads. "We urge the public to remain orderly in traffic and also maintain safety when driving during the Christmas holiday," he appealed.

title: Babuk 15 Perkara Dimusnahkan Kejari dan Unsur Forkopimda Banggai, Diantaranya Berikut Ini!
text: Foto: ISTIMEWABANGGAINEWS.COM-Jelang Natal dan Tahun Baru (Nataru) aparat penegak hukum (APH), dalam hal ini Kejaksaan Negeri (Kejari) memusnahkan barang bukti (Babuk) 15 perkara yang telah berkekuatan hukum di wilayah hukum Kabupaten Banggai periode September hingga Desember 2023.Hal itu berdasarkan SIARAN PERS Nomor: PR-30/P.2.11/Kph.3/12/2023 tentang Pemusnahan Barang Bukti Perkara Tindak Pidana Umum yang Telah Memperoleh Kekuatan Hukum (Inkracht) Periode September sampai dengan Desember 2023, yang disampaikan Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri (Kajari) Banggai Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono melalui Kepala Seksi Intelijen (Kastel) Sarman Santosa Tandisau, pada pukul 16.38 WITA.Dikatakan, pada hari Selasa tanggal 19 Desember 2023 sekitar pukul 15.30 WITA bertempat di Kantor Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai telah dilaksanakan pemusnahan Barang Bukti Tindak Pidana Umum yang telah berkekuatan hukum tetap (inkracht) yang amar putusannya dirampas untuk dimusnahkan.Kegiatan tersebut dipimpin Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai dan dihadiri Forkopimda Kabupaten Banggai, Ketua Pengadilan Negeri Luwuk, Komandan Pos TNI AL Luwuk, Badan Pengawas Obat dan Makanan (BPOM) Kabupaten Banggai, Kepala Lembaga Pemasyarakatan Luwuk, Perwakilan dari Imigrasi Banggai, Kepala Kantor Pengawasan dan Pelayanan Bea dan Cukai Kabupaten Banggai, Pejabat Eselon IV pada Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai dan jajaran.Adapun Barang bukti yang dimusnahkan berasal dari 15 (lima belas) perkara sebagaiberikut:9 (Sembilan) perkara Tindak Pidana Narkotika jenis sabu-sabu dengan total seberat 332,3566 (tiga ratus tiga puluh dua koma tiga lima enam-enam) gram dan bong/ alat hisap sabu-sabu.2 (dua) perkara Tindak Pidana Kesehatan terdiri dari 6.177 (enam ribu seratus tujuh puluh tujuh) butir Trihexyphenidy! (THD) dan 15 (lima belas) botol kosmetik tanpa izin edar.2 (dua) perkara Tindak Pidana Kekerasan Terhadap Orang dan harta benda berupa parang,pisau dsb.1 (satu) perkara Tindak Pidana Umum Lainnya berupa pakaian dan celana.Selanjutnya Barang Bukti tersebut dimusnahkan dengan cara : dibakar, diblender, dilarutkan dengan cairan pembersih lantai dan digerinda hingga tidak dapat digunakan/dimanfaatkan lagi.Kegiatan diakhiri dengan penandatangan berita acara pemusnahan barang bukti oleh pejabat yang hadir.Barang Bukti yang dimusnahkan tersebut juga merupakan tindaklanjut arahan pimpinan sebagai upaya mitigasi risiko penyalahgunaan barang bukti utamanya Narkotika dan obat-obatan berbahaya di internal Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai.Pada kesempatan itu saat sesi tanya jawab, Kajari Banggai Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono juga sempat menegaskan, bahwa pemusnahan barang bukti perkara tindak pidana umum yang telah berkekuatan hukum (Inkracht) kali ini. Diantaranya, barang bukti perkara Narkoba yang di wilayah hukum Kabupaten Banggai memang masih cukup tinggi.Bahkan nomor satu. Oleh sebab itu, yang jelas serius dan harus terus bersinergi.“Yang jelas serius mas. Dan ini bukan tanggung jawab APH saja. Tolong perlu dipahami juga. Ini tanggung jawab kita bersama. Karena ini prosesnya dari hulu ke hilir. Seperti itu,” tandasnya dihadapan para awak media yang hadir.(SOF/*) ,
text_en: Photo: ISTIMEWABANGGAINEWS.COM-Ahead of Christmas and New Year (Nataru), law enforcement officers (APH), in this case the District Prosecutor's Office (Kejari), destroyed evidence (Babuk) of 15 cases that had legal force in the jurisdiction of Banggai Regency for the period September to December 2023. This is based on PRESS RELEASE Number: PR-30/P.2.11/Kph.3/12/2023 concerning the Destruction of Evidence in General Criminal Cases that Have Obtained Legal Force (Inkracht) for the Period September to December 2023, which was conveyed by the Head Banggai District Prosecutor's Office (Kajari) Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono through the Head of the Intelligence Section (Kastel) Sarman Santosa Tandisau, at 16.38 WITA. It was said that on Tuesday 19 December 2023 at around 15.30 WITA at the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office the destruction of evidence had been carried out. General Crimes which have permanent legal force (inkracht) whose verdict is confiscated to be destroyed. This activity was led by the Head of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office and attended by the Banggai Regency Forkopimda, Chairman of the Luwuk District Court, Commander of the Luwuk Navy Post, the Food and Drug Monitoring Agency (BPOM) Banggai Regency, Head of the Luwuk Correctional Institution, Representative from Banggai Immigration, Head of the Banggai Regency Customs and Excise Supervision and Services Office, Echelon IV Officials at the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office and staff. The evidence destroyed came from 15 (fifteen) cases as follows: 9 (Nine) Narcotics Crime cases of the type methamphetamine with a total weight of 332.3566 (three hundred thirty-two point three five six-six) grams and bongs/shabu-shabu suction devices. 2 (two) Health Crime cases consisting of 6,177 (six thousand one hundred and seventy seven) Trihexyphenidy grains! (THD) and 15 (fifteen) bottles of cosmetics without a distribution permit. 2 (two) cases of Crime of Violence against Persons and property in the form of machetes, knives, etc. 1 (one) case of Other General Crimes in the form of clothes and pants. Next, Goods The evidence was destroyed by: burning, blending, dissolving it with floor cleaning fluid and grinding it until it could no longer be used/utilized. The activity ended with the signing of the minutes of destruction of evidence by the officials present. The evidence destroyed was also a follow-up to the leadership's direction as efforts to mitigate the risk of misuse of evidence, especially narcotics and dangerous drugs within the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office. On that occasion during the question and answer session, Kajari Banggai Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono also emphasized that the destruction of evidence in general criminal cases has legal force ( Inkracht) this time. Among them, the evidence for drug cases in the Banggai Regency jurisdiction is still quite high, even number one. Therefore, what is clear is that it is serious and must continue to work together. "What is clear is that it is serious, bro. And this is not only APH's responsibility. Please understand too. This is our shared responsibility. Because this is a process from upstream to downstream. "Like that," he stressed in front of the media crew present. (SOF/*) ,

title: Gerombolan Bermotor di Luwuk Banggai Kian Meresahkan Kerap Picu Tawuran
text: Foto: ISTIMEWABANGGAINEWS.COM-Dua orang remaja yang diduga tergabung dalam gerombolan bermotor yang kerap meresahkan warga, berhasil diamankan Babinsa Serma Agil Assagaf dan Bhabinkamtibmas Aiptu Roby Asfary bersama warga di kompleks Kelapa 2 Kelurahan Simpong, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, Kabupaten Banggai, Sulteng, Minggu (10/12/2023) dini hari.Bersama dua terduga pelaku, dari informasi yang berhasil diperoleh awak media dari salah satu peserta grup media sosial WhatsApp. Bahwa diamankan barang bukti, diantaranya busur dan kujang sejenis senjata tajam.“Gerombolan motor tadi malam menyerang didapat Busur dan kujang,” kata sumber singkat pada Minggu pukul 04.47 WITA.Selain itu, sumber meneruskan pesan, jika barang bukti sepeda motor juga telah diamankan. “Barang bukti motor sudah di amankan,” tambah sumber lagi pukul 07.00 WITA.Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy yang dikonfirmasi terkait kabar dari warga di beberapa kompleks seperti Kelapa 2 Simpong bahwa setiap malam Sabtu dan malam Minggu kerap terjadi tawuran. Ia tidak membantahnya.“Semalam pica tawuran lagi juga kelapa 2,” katanya singkat melalui balasan pesan WhatsApp.Disinggung, yang dipicu anak anak gerombolan motor yang membawa barang tajam. “Kurang lebih begtu. Masih dicoba dalami dulu,” kata AKP Tio.Saat ditanya bisa tau apa upaya konkret yang dilakukan pihaknya dan apakah para pelakunya sudah ada yang diamankan atau seperti apa. Meskipun ia sempat bertanya balik, dari pihak apa maksudnya? Polres umumnya atau Reskrim khususnya?“Kalo dari reskrim kita on call dan kring serse, tiap ada tkp tawuran pasti anggota opsnal ke lapangan untuk lokalisir,” katanya lagi melalui pesan WhatsApp.“Kalo untuk res banggai tanya pak kasie humas saja yang berhak menjelaskan etalase polres,” tambahnya lagi kepada awak media ini.Adapun terkait informasi, ada dua orang yang telah diamankan dengan barang bukti busur panah dan badik atau seperti apa? “Masih di cek dulu,” tutup Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio.Menyikapi kondisi tersebut sebagian besar warga Luwuk Banggai berharap, perlu ada pengawasan dan patroli malam hingga subuh hari secara rutin dan kontinu atau berkesinambungan.Pasalnya, sudah berkali kali terjadi tawuran tengah malam di tempat yang sama Kelapa 2 hingga depan salah satu agen bus sekitar PLTD Luwuk.Apalagi, saat ini tahun politik. Yaitu jelang Pemilu pada bulan Februari dan Pemilukada bulan November nanti. Selain yang paling dekat yaitu jelang Natal dan Tahun Baru (Nataru).“Masyarakat sudah tidak nyaman dengan kejadian…tawuran,” komentar penutup salah satu peserta lain dalam grup media sosial WhatsApp pukul 10.27 WITA.(RED) ,
text_en: Photo: ISTIMEWABANGGAINEWS.COM-Two teenagers who were suspected of being members of a motorbike gang that often disturbed residents, were successfully arrested by Babinsa Serma Agil Assagaf and Bhabinkamtibmas Aiptu Roby Asfary together with residents at the Kelapa 2 complex, Simpong Village, South Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, Sunday (10/12/2023) early morning. Together with the two alleged perpetrators, from information obtained by the media crew from one of the participants in the WhatsApp social media group. That evidence was secured, including a bow and a cleaver, a type of sharp weapon. "Last night, a group of motorbikes attacked a bow and a cleaver," said the source briefly on Sunday at 04.47 WITA. Apart from that, the source continued the message that evidence of the motorbike had also been secured. "Evidence of the motorbike has been secured," added another source at 07.00 WITA. Head of Criminal Investigation Unit for Banggai Police AKP Tio Tondy confirmed news from residents in several complexes such as Kelapa 2 Simpong that every Saturday night and Sunday night brawls often occur. He did not deny it. "Last night there was another brawl with two coconuts," he said briefly in a reply to a WhatsApp message. He said it was triggered by a group of children on motorbikes carrying sharp objects. “More or less. "We're still trying to investigate it first," said AKP Tio. When asked, he could find out what concrete efforts his party had made and whether the perpetrators had been arrested or what. Even though he had time to ask back, what side did he mean? Polres in general or Criminal Investigation in particular? "From Criminal Investigation, we are on call and ringing, every time there is a brawl scene, members of the National Police will definitely go to the field for localization," he said again via WhatsApp message. police," he added to this media crew. As for the information, there are two people who have been arrested with evidence of bows and arrows or something like that? "It's still being checked first," concluded Head of Criminal Investigation Unit for the Banggai Police, AKP Tio. In response to this condition, most of the residents of Luwuk Banggai hope that there needs to be surveillance and patrols from night to dawn on a regular and continuous basis. in the same place Kelapa 2 to the front of one of the bus agents around PLTD Luwuk. Moreover, this is the political year. Namely ahead of the General Election in February and the Regional Election in November. Apart from the closest ones, namely before Christmas and New Year (Nataru). "People are no longer comfortable with incidents of...brawls," concluded the closing comments of one of the other participants in the WhatsApp social media group at 10.27 WITA. (RED),

title: Bejat! Ayah di Nuhon Banggai Tega Setubuhi Anak Kandungnya
text: Foto: HUMAS POLRES BANGGAIBANGGAINEWS.COM-Polsek Nuhon Polres Banggai mengamankan ayah berinisial HA (48) pelaku persetubuhan terhadap anak kandungnya AA (21) terjadi di Kecamatan Nuhon, Banggai.Kapolres Banggai Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM melalui Kapolsek Nuhon IPDA Andi Wijanarko mengatakan bahwa pihaknya telah mengamankan pelaku usai menerima laporan Polisi pada Rabu (13/12/2023) pukul 13.00 Wita.“Kami mengamankan terduga pelaku HA (48). Dia dilaporkan oleh anak kandungnya sendiri“, ungkap IPDA Andi.Kapolsek menjelaskan peristiwa ini terjadi pada tahun 2020 lalu sekitar pukul 24.00 Wita. Pada saat itu korban yang masih berusia 18 tahun bersama terlapor dalam perjalanan pulang dari Kota Ampana Kabupaten Tojo Una-una. Saat tiba di Jalan Trans Dusun II Desa Polodalagan, pelaku memaksa korban untuk berhubungan intim.Korban sempat menolak, namun pelaku mengancam korban dengan pisau dan memukulnya dengan tangan dibagian kepala.“Kemudian pelaku mengancam jika tidak memberitahu orang lain”, kata Kapolsek.Menurut Korban, lanjut Kapolsek Nuhon, korban baru membuka suara karena merasa takut dan diancam serta khawatir hal yang sama akhirnya akan terjadi pada adik perempuannya.Menindaklnjuti laporan tersebut, selanjutnya petugas melakukan penangkapan dan membawa terduga pelaku ke Mapolres Banggai untuk dilakukan pemeriksaan.Dari hasil pemeriksaan awal, pelaku mengakui bahwa telah melakukan persetubuhan terhadap anak kandungnya.“Saat ini pelaku sudah kita amankan dan sementara menjalani pemeriksaan Oleh Unit PPA Sat Reskrim Polres Banggai untuk proses hukum lebih lanjut”, ungkapnya.Atas perbuatannya pelaku dijerat dengan pasal 81 ayat (1), ayat (2), ayat (3) jo pasal 76d subs pasal 82 ayat (1, ayat (2) jo 76E UU RI No. 35 Tahun 2014 tentang perubahan atas UU No.23 Tahun 2002 tentang perlindungan Anak yang telah diubah dan Tahun 2016 tentang Perubahan kedua atas UU RI No. 23 Tahun 2002 tentang Perlindungan Anak menjadi undang-undang.(*) ,
text_en: Photo: BANGGAI POLICE PR BANGGAINEWS.COM-Nuhon Police, Banggai Police, arrested the father with the initials HA (48), the perpetrator of sexual intercourse with his biological child, AA (21), which occurred in Nuhon District, Banggai. Banggai Police Chief Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM via Nuhon IPDA Police Chief Andi Wijanarko said that his party had arrested the perpetrator after receiving a police report on Wednesday (13/12/2023) at 13.00 WITA. "We arrested the alleged perpetrator HA (48). "He was reported by his own biological child," said IPDA Andi. The Sector Police Chief explained that this incident occurred in 2020 at around 24.00 WITA. At that time the victim, who was still 18 years old, was with the reported party on their way home from Ampana City, Tojo Una-una Regency. When they arrived at Jalan Trans Dusun II, Polodalagan Village, the perpetrator forced the victim to have sex. The victim refused, but the perpetrator threatened the victim with a knife and hit her with his hand on the head. "Then the perpetrator threatened her if she didn't tell other people," said the Police Chief. According to the victim , continued the Nuhon Police Chief, the victim only opened his voice because he felt afraid and threatened and was worried that the same thing would eventually happen to his younger sister. Following up on the report, officers then made an arrest and took the alleged perpetrator to the Banggai Police Headquarters for examination. From the results of the initial examination, The perpetrator admitted that he had had sexual intercourse with his biological child. "We have currently detained the perpetrator and are currently undergoing examination by the PPA Unit of the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit for further legal proceedings," he said. For his actions, the perpetrator was charged under Article 81 paragraph (1), paragraph (2), paragraph (3) in conjunction with article 76d subs article 82 paragraph (1, paragraph (2) in conjunction with 76E Republic of Indonesia Law no. 35 of 2014 concerning amendments to Law No. 23 of 2002 concerning Child Protection which has been amended and 2016 concerning the second amendment to Law No. RI. 23 of 2002 concerning Child Protection becomes law.(*) ,

title: Residivis Penggelapan Kendaraan Bermotor di Luwuk Banggai Ditangkap, Polisi Amankan 2 Unit Motor
text: Foto: HUMAS POLRES BANGGAIBANGGAINEWS.COM-Tim Jatanras Satreskrim Polres Banggai kembali menangkap TH alias Tatu (56) warga Kelurahan Simpong, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, Kabupaten Banggai, Selasa (19/12/2023) sekitar pukul 18.30 Wita.TH diringkus Tim Jatanras lantaran diduga melakukan tindak pidana penggelapan sepeda motor milik Ahmad Husen Uhuna.Kasat Reskrim AKP Tio Tondy, mengungkapkan, kasus ini terjadi pada Senin 18 Desember 2023 sekitar pukul 18.30 Wita, dimana saat itu pelaku meminjam motor milik Ahmad Husen Uhuna untuk pergi ke Kelurahan Kaleke (Luwuk 2) mengambil uang.“Namun motor yang dipinjam tidak kunjung dikembalikan,” ungkap AKP Tio.Usai menerima laporan korban, lanjut perwira pangkat tiga balak ini, Tim Jatanras melakukan penyelidikan dan mendapatkan informasi bahwa pelaku sedang berada di Desa Pandan Wangi Kecamatan Toili Barat.“Tanpa menunggu lama, kami bergerak cepat melakukan penangkapan,” sebutnya.Berdasarkan hasil interogasi, ia menuturkan, bahwa pelaku mengakui perbuatannya. Dan diamankan dua sepeda motor yakni Honda Beat warna hitam DN 5391 RC milik Moh. Faisal Patawe dan Yamaha Seon RC tipe 1 LB warna kuning DN 3860 RE milik Ahmad Husen Uhuna.Saat ini, kata dia, pelaku telah mendekam di sel tahanan Mapolres Banggai guna menjalani pemeriksaan dan pengembangan lebih lanjut.“Pelaku adalah salah satu residivis dan sudah sering melakukan perbuatan yang sama maupun pencurian di beberapa TKP dalam kota Luwuk,” pungkasnya.(*) ,
text_en: Photo: BANGGAI POLRES PUBLIC RELATIONS BANGGAIBANGGAINEWS.COM-The Jatanras Team of the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit again arrested TH alias Tatu (56), a resident of Simpong Village, South Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, Tuesday (19/12/2023) at around 18.30 WITA. TH was arrested by the Jatanras Team because suspected of committing the crime of embezzling a motorbike belonging to Ahmad Husen Uhuna. Head of Criminal Investigation Unit AKP Tio Tondy, revealed that this case occurred on Monday 18 December 2023 at around 18.30 WITA, at which time the perpetrator borrowed Ahmad Husen Uhuna's motorbike to go to Kaleke Village (Luwuk 2) taking money. "However, the motorbike that was borrowed was never returned," said AKP Tio. After receiving the victim's report, the third rank Balak officer continued, the Jatanras Team carried out an investigation and received information that the perpetrator was in Pandan Wangi Village, West Toili District. "Without waiting long, we moved quickly to make the arrest," he said. Based on the results of the interrogation, he said that the perpetrator admitted his actions. And two motorbikes were seized, namely a black Honda Beat DN 5391 RC belonging to Moh. Faisal Patawe and Yamaha Seon RC type 1 LB yellow DN 3860 RE belonging to Ahmad Husen Uhuna. Currently, he said, the perpetrator has been languishing in the Banggai Police Headquarters detention cell to undergo further examination and development. "The perpetrator is a recidivist and has often committed the same act or theft at several crime scenes in the city of Luwuk," he concluded. (*) ,

title: Wardani Murad Husain Akan Amanah Jika Terpilih Aleg DPRD Banggai 2024
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Wardani Murad Husain berjanji akan amanah apabila terpilih menjadi anggota legesilatif (Aleg) DPRD Kabupaten Banggai pada pemilihan umum (Pemilu) tanggal 14 Februari 2024 mendatang. Wardani Murad Husain merupakan Caleg DPRD Banggai daerah pemilihan (Dapil) 1 dari Partai Gerindra nomor urut 1.Anak ke-4 dari tujuh bersaudara anak Almarhum Murad Husain ini menyampaikan hal itu kepada masyarakat di Kecamatan Luwuk Utara dan Luwuk Timur, saat kampanye tatap muka, beberapa hari lalu.Menurut kakak kandung Hj. Sulianti Murad dan Hj. Amalya Murad ini bahwa bertugas sebagai Aleg DPRD Banggai itu adalah amanah. Amanah itu adalah seseorang harus mempertanggung jawabkan di dunia dan akhirat.“Karena itu amanah. Sebab kalau seseorang terpilih menjadi Aleg, maka akan bertanggung jawab, amanah itu harus dipertanggungjawabkan di depan Allah SWT, baik di dunia maupun akhirat. Saya tidak akan main-main dengan jabatan ini, sebab jabatan ini adalah amanah dari masyarakat,” kata Wardani Murad Husain.Wardani mengakui bahwa dia hanyalah manusia biasa yang sangat terbatas pengetahuannya, dia berharap, insya Allah diridhoi, dengan catatan seandainya dia maju dan terpilih, maka dia harus bisa berbuat seperti yang dilakukan oleh para Nabi dan Rasul, yaitu berbuat untuk kebaikan dan kemasyalatan umat.“Kebaikan untuk sesama, bukan untuk mencari kepentingan diri sendiri,” ujarnya.Kalau dia terpilih nanti sebagai Aleg DPRD Banggai, maka Gaji dan tunjangannya akan diberikan kepada masyarakat melalui 4 program, yakni pendidikan, kesehatan, lingkungan hidup dan pemberdayaan UMKM.Tujuannya menjadi Aleg DPRD Banggai, bukan mau mencari harta, bukan mau mencari jabatan, tapi, semata-mata hanya berharap, apa yang bisa diperbuat untuk berguna bagi masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai.Sebab itu yang akan dibawanya saat meninggal kelak. Dimana kematian ayahanda Wardani, almarhum Murad Husain, di tanggal 17 Agustus 2001, membuka lebar-lebar matanya, bahwa hidup ini benar-benar sangat singkat. Selanjutnya, saat meninggal ayahandanya tidak ada yang dibawa, selain kain kafan.“Karena apa yang ada dimuka bumi, walapun kita memiliki segunung emas, tetap akan tinggal di muka bumi ini, tidak akan dikuburkan bersama kita. Itulah kenapa saya mencalonkan diri sebagai Aleg DPRD Banggai pada pemilihan di tahun 2024, supaya bisa berguna bagi masyarakat banyak,” terangnya.Ia memberikan pandangannya tentang jabatan. Dimana jabatan itu diibaratkan seperti jaket, kalau seorang diberikan amanah oleh Allah SWT mendapatkan jabatan, misalnya bupati, maka dijaketnya akan tertulis bupati, atau gubernur, juga presiden atau Aleg, maka akan tertulis seperti itu. Manakala, orang tersebut menggunakan jaket itu, maka orang-orang akan menghormatinya, serta mendapatkan perlakukan khusus, tidak sama lagi dengan rakyat biasanya.Tapi, ingat jabatan itu hanya bertahan 5 tahun. Manakala sudah selesai masa jabatannya, maka jaket tersebut harus dilepas, sehingga kembali menjadi rakyat biasa lagi.“Pertanyaannya, apa masyarakat masih menghargai orang tersebut, setelah melepaskan jabatannya, apa masyarakat masih mencintainya, menghargai dan menolongnya. Semua itu, tergantung apa yang dibuat saat menjabat,” jelasnya.Wardani Murad Husain menceritakan, awalnya, adiknya yang mau maju mencalonkan anggota legislatif DPRD Kabupaten Banggai, Hj. Sulianti Murad, yang juga Ketua DPC Partai Gerindra Kabupaten Banggai.Tiga bulan lalu, Hj. Sulianti Murad mundur dari pencalonan sebagai Caleg DPRD Banggai. Kemudian, Wardani Murad Husain dimintakan untuk maju menggantikan Hj. Sulianti Murad. Kenapa Ketua DPC Partai Gerindra Banggai mundur, karena pertama ingin fokus mau menaikkan perolehan kursi di DPRD Banggai dari 4 kursi menjadi 7 kursi di Pileg tahun 2024 mendatang.Menambah 3 kursi, supaya Partai Gerindra di DPRD Banggai bisa masuk dalam unsur pimpinan. Kemudian, Hj. Sulianti Murad ingin membantu Hj. Amalya Murad bisa duduk di DPR RI.Kesulitan Hj. Sulianti Murad mencalonkan Caleg DPRD Banggai, kemudian harus berbagi waktu sebagai Ketua DPC Partai Gerindra Banggai yang ikut mendorong Caleg lainnya di masing-masing dapil.Sehingga tidak efektif kalau ikut bertarung menjadi Caleg DPRD Banggai. Makanya, dimintakan Wardani Murad Husain menggantikan Hj. Sulianti Murad.“Saya tidak langsung menyetujuinya, karena saya bukan seorang politikus, pastinya masyarakat Luwuk Banggai baru pertama kali melihat saya. Sebelum ingin maju sebagai Caleg DPRD Banggai, terlebih dahulu saya melakukan sholat, untuk meminta petunjuk kepada Tuhan Yang Maha Kuasa. Saya seorang Islam, saya melaksanakan sholat Hajad, minta petunjuk kepada Allah SWT,” cetusnya.Apakah dengan dia maju menjadi Caleg DPRD Banggai Dapil 1, apa itu baik untuk dirinya sendiri, keluarga, maupun untuk masyarakat yang Insya Allah akan memilihnya.Sebab kalau seseorang terpilih menjadi Aleg, maka akan bertanggungjawab, amanah itu harus dipertanggungjawabkan di depan Allah SWT, baik di dunia maupun akhirat.“Saya tidak akan main-main dengan jabatan ini, karena jabatan ini adalah amanah dari masyarakat,” tegasnya.“Sehingga saya membaca Alquran terjemahan, mengenai kisah-kisah para Nabi dan Rasul, diantaranya, Nabi Muhammad SAW, kisah tentang Nabi Ibrahim AS, kisah tentang Nabi Musa AS, dan kisah tentang Nabi Daud AS. Semua Nabi dan Rasul yang ditunjukkan kepada dia. Membaca tentang kisah para pemimpin. Usai itu, baru saya menyatakan menerima tawaran untuk menggantikan adik saya,” tambahnya. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Wardani Murad Husain promised to be trustworthy if elected as a legislative member (Aleg) of the Banggai Regency DPRD in the general election (Pemilu) on 14 February 2024. Wardani Murad Husain is a candidate for DPRD Banggai electoral district (Dapil) 1 from the Gerindra Party serial number 1. The fourth of seven children of the late Murad Husain, he conveyed this to the people in North Luwuk and East Luwuk Districts, during a face-to-face campaign, a few days ago. According to Hj's older brother. Sulianti Murad and Hj. Amalya Murad said that serving as Aleg of the Banggai DPRD was a mandate. Trust means that someone must be responsible in this world and the hereafter. "Because that is trust. Because if someone is elected as Aleg, they will be responsible, that trust must be accounted for before Allah SWT, both in this world and the hereafter. "I will not play around with this position, because this position is a mandate from the community," said Wardani Murad Husain. Wardani admits that he is just an ordinary person with very limited knowledge, he hopes, God willing, he will be blessed, provided that if he runs and is elected , then he must be able to do as the Prophets and Apostles did, namely to act for the good and welfare of the people. "Good for others, not to seek self-interest," he said. The allowance will be given to the community through 4 programs, namely education, health, environment and MSME empowerment. The aim of becoming a Legislator of the Banggai DPRD is not to seek wealth, not to seek position, but, simply to hope, what can be done to be useful for the people of Banggai Regency. Because that is what he will take with him when he dies. The death of Wardani's father, the late Murad Husain, on August 17 2001, opened his eyes wide, that life is really very short. Furthermore, when his father died, he took nothing with him, apart from the shroud. "Because whatever is on earth, even if we have mountains of gold, will still remain on this earth, it will not be buried with us. "That's why I am running as Aleg for the Banggai DPRD in the 2024 elections, so that I can be useful to many people," he explained. He gave his views on the position. Where the position is likened to a jacket, if someone is entrusted by Allah SWT to get a position, for example regent, then the jacket will say regent, or governor, also president or Aleg, then it will be written like that. When that person wears that jacket, people will respect him and get special treatment, not the same as ordinary people. But remember, this position only lasts 5 years. When his term of office is finished, the jacket must be removed, so that he can return to being an ordinary person again. "The question is, does society still respect that person, after leaving his position, does society still love him, appreciate and help him. "It all depends on what is done while in office," he explained. Wardani Murad Husain said that initially, it was his younger brother who wanted to run to nominate a member of the Banggai Regency DPRD legislature, Hj. Sulianti Murad, who is also Chair of the Gerindra Party DPC, Banggai Regency. Three months ago, Hj. Sulianti Murad withdrew from her candidacy as a legislative candidate for the Banggai DPRD. Then, Wardani Murad Husain was asked to step forward to replace Hj. Sulianti Murad. Why is the Chairman of the DPC Gerindra Banggai Party resigning, because first he wants to focus on increasing the number of seats in the Banggai DPRD from 4 seats to 7 seats in the upcoming 2024 legislative elections. Adding 3 seats, so that the Gerindra Party in the Banggai DPRD can be included in the leadership element. Then, Hj. Sulianti Murad wants to help Hj. Amalya Murad can sit in the DPR RI. Hj's difficulties. Sulianti Murad nominated Banggai DPRD candidate, then had to share waWhen he was Chairman of the Gerindra Banggai Party DPC, he also encouraged other legislative candidates in each electoral district. So it would not be effective if he participated in the fight to become a Banggai DPRD legislative candidate. Therefore, Wardani Murad Husain was asked to replace Hj. Sulianti Murad. "I didn't immediately agree, because I'm not a politician, of course the people of Luwuk Banggai are seeing me for the first time. Before I wanted to run as a legislative candidate for the Banggai DPRD, I first prayed, to ask God Almighty for guidance. "I am a Muslim, I perform the Hajad prayer, asking Allah SWT for guidance," he said. Whether he advances to become a DPRD candidate for Banggai Electoral District 1, is that good for himself, his family and for the community, God willing, they will choose him. Because if someone If you are elected as Aleg, you will be responsible, that trust must be accounted for in front of Allah SWT, both in this world and the hereafter. "I will not play around with this position, because this position is a trust from the community," he stressed. "So I read the Koran translation, regarding the stories of the Prophets and Apostles, including the Prophet Muhammad SAW, the story of the Prophet Ibrahim AS, the story of the Prophet Musa AS, and the story of the Prophet David AS. All the Prophets and Messengers were shown to him. Read about the stories of leaders. "After that, I said I accepted the offer to replace my younger brother," he added. RUM

title: Peringatan Hari Ibu Ke-95, Perempuan Berdaya Indonesia Maju,Ditekankan oleh Bupati Banggai
text: KABAR LUWUK–Peringatan Hari Ibu Ke-95, perempuan berdaya indonesia maju,ditekankan oleh Bupati Banggai. PadaPuncak Peringatan Hari Ibu Ke-95Tahun 2023 diGraha PemdaKabupaten Banggai,Bupati Banggai Ir. H. Amirudin, M.M.menekankan peran penting perempuan Indonesia sebagai srikandi-srikandi kuat yang mampu melampaui berbagai tantangan. Jum,at 22/12/2023.Dalam sambutannya,Bupati Amirudinmenyatakan bahwa perempuan Indonesia tetap tangguh, kuat, dan berani, menjadi pilar utama dalam menopang hidup kaumnya menjadi sebaik-baiknya Ibu Bangsa.Peringatan Hari Ibu Ke-95, Perempuan Berdaya Indonesia Maju,Ditekankan oleh Bupati Banggai.“Perjuangan perempuan bukanlah hal yang mudah, tetapi perempuan Indonesia dengan gagah berani menembus batas-batas sosial, bersuara untuk memperjuangkan hak-hak,” ungkapnya.Bupati berharap agar kemajuan yang telah diraih oleh perempuan dirayakan, sambil tetap mengingat bahwa perjuangan masih panjang dan harus terus dilanjutkan.Dengan hampir setengah populasi penduduk Indonesia adalah perempuan, kemajuan mereka dianggap sebagai kemajuan bangsa.“Mari kita dorong peran perempuan dalam segala bentuk di berbagai sektor pembangunan,” ajak Bupati Amirudin, menegaskan kewajiban semua pihak untuk mendukung perempuan Indonesia.Pada peringatan Hari Ibu Tahun 2023 ini, Bupati Banggai memberikan Sertifikat Penghargaan kepada sejumlah instansi dan individu yang berdedikasi.Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai, Kapolres Banggai, dan Dandim 13408/LB menerima penghargaan atas dedikasinya sebagai Ayah Asuh Stunting dalam penanganan keluarga beresiko stunting di Kabupaten Banggai.Penghargaan juga diberikan kepada Asosiasi Pengusaha Jasa Boga Indonesia (APJI) atas partisipasi dan dedikasinya dalam membangun UMKM di Kabupaten Banggai, serta kepada beberapa puskesmas dan sekolah yang menjadi pelopor dalam upaya Puskesmas Ramah Anak dan Sekolah Ramah Anak.Supiarti Hawang, S.ST., diberikan penghargaan atas prestasinya dalam memberikan pelayanan KB dan meningkatkan pencapaian Program Keluarga Berencana di Kabupaten Banggai.Ketua TP-PKK Kabupaten Banggai juga mendapatkan sertifikat atas dedikasinya sebagai Ibu Asuh Stunting dalam rangka penanganan keluarga beresiko stunting.Peringatan Hari Ibu Tahun 2023, dengan tema “Perempuan Berdaya Indonesia Maju,” dihadiri oleh berbagai pihak termasuk Wakil Bupati Banggai, Sekretaris Kabupaten Banggai, Unsur Forkopimda, para Pimpinan OPD, dan berbagai organisasi perempuan yang turut serta dalam membangun perempuan Indonesia yang berdaya.***
text_en: LUWUK NEWS–The commemoration of the 95th Mother's Day, empowered women in Indonesia to advance, was emphasized by the Regent of Banggai. At the peak of the 95th Mother's Day commemoration in 2023 at the Banggai Regency Regional Government House, the Regent of Banggai Ir. H. Amirudin, M.M. emphasized the important role of Indonesian women as strong heroines who are able to overcome various challenges. Friday 22/12/2023. In his speech, Regent Amirudin stated that Indonesian women remain tough, strong and brave, being the main pillars in supporting the lives of their people to become the best mothers of the nation. Commemoration of the 95th Mother's Day, Indonesian Empowered Women Move Forward , Emphasized by the Regent of Banggai. "Women's struggle is not an easy thing, but Indonesian women are bravely breaking through social boundaries, speaking out to fight for rights," he said. The Regent hopes that the progress achieved by women will be celebrated, while always remembering that the struggle is still long and must continue. With almost half of Indonesia's population being women, their progress is considered the progress of the nation. "Let's encourage the role of women in all forms in various development sectors," said Regent Amirudin, emphasizing the obligation of all parties to support Indonesian women. In commemoration of Mother's Day 2023, the Regent of Banggai gave Certificates of Appreciation to a number of dedicated agencies and individuals. The Head of the Banggai District Prosecutor's Office, the Banggai Police Chief, and Dandim 13408/LB received awards for their dedication as Stunting Foster Fathers in handling families at risk of stunting in Banggai Regency. Awards were also given to the Indonesian Catering Services Entrepreneurs Association (APJI) for its participation and dedication in building MSMEs in Banggai Regency, as well as to several community health centers and schools which are pioneers in efforts to create Child-Friendly Community Health Centers and Child-Friendly Schools. Supiarti Hawang, S .ST., was given an award for her achievements in providing family planning services and increasing the achievements of the Family Planning Program in Banggai Regency. The Chairperson of the Banggai Regency TP-PKK also received a certificate for her dedication as a Stunting Foster Mother in the context of handling families at risk of stunting. Commemoration of Mother's Day 2023, with the theme "Empowered Women in Advanced Indonesia," attended by various parties including the Deputy Regent of Banggai, the Secretary of Banggai Regency, Forkopimda elements, OPD Leaders, and various women's organizations who participate in building empowered Indonesian women.***

title: Polres Banggai Gelar Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023 untuk Jamin Keamanan Nataru
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Polres Banggai Gelar Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023untuk Jamin Keamanan Nataru. Polres Banggai dan jajaran melaksanakanOperasi Lilin Tinombala 2023, sebuah upaya serentak yang juga dilakukan di seluruh Indonesia.Operasi ini dimulai dengan pendirianPos-pos pengamanandan pelayanan, termasuk satu pos terpadu. Jum,at 22/12/2023.Dalam upaya menjaga keamanan dan kenyamanan masyarakat selama perayaan Natal dan Tahun Baru, sebanyak 10 Pos Pam tersebar di seluruh Polsek jajaran, 3 Pos Yan diPelabuhan Rakyat Luwuk,Bandara Bubung, sertaTerminal Boyou, Luwuk Utara, dan 1 Pos terpadu di Pos Lantas depan Mall Luwuk.Kasi Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S. Muda, menyampaikan informasi ini kepada wartawan pada Jumat pagi (22/12/2023).Operasi Lilin Tinombala 2023 dijadwalkan berlangsung selama 12 hari, dimulai sejak 22 Desember 2022 hingga 2 Januari 2024.Menurut Amin, operasi kepolisian ini bertujuan untuk memberikan rasa aman dan nyaman kepada masyarakat serta mencegah terjadinya insiden yang tidak diinginkan selama perayaan Natal dan Tahun Baru.Polres Banggai menjelaskan bahwa operasi ini merupakan langkah terpusat untuk mengamankan perayaan Nataru dengan lancar, tertib, dan kondusif.Dalam melaksanakan tugasnya, Polres Banggai diberikan dukungan oleh TNI, instansi terkait, stakeholder, dan mitra kamtibmas.Amin menyampaikan harapannya agar situasi kamtibmas di Kabupaten Banggai selama Nataru 2023-2024 tetap kondusif. Dengan adanya kerjasama antarinstansi dan dukungan dari masyarakat, diharapkan operasi ini dapat memberikan hasil positif dalam menjaga ketertiban dan keamanan di wilayah tersebut.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Police are proud to hold the 2023 Tinombala Candle Operation to ensure the safety of Nataru. Banggai Police and staff are carrying out Operation Lilin Tinombala 2023, a simultaneous effort that is also being carried out throughout Indonesia. This operation began with the establishment of security and service posts, including one integrated post. Friday 22/12/2023. In an effort to maintain the security and comfort of the community during the Christmas and New Year celebrations, 10 Pam Posts are spread across all police stations, 3 Yan Posts at Luwuk People's Harbor, Bubung Airport, and Boyou Terminal, North Luwuk, and 1 Integrated post at the Traffic Post in front of Luwuk Mall. Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Iptu Al Amin S. Muda, conveyed this information to journalists on Friday morning (22/12/2023). The 2023 Tinombala Candle Operation is scheduled to last for 12 days, starting from 22 December 2022 to 2 January 2024. According to Amin, this police operation aims to provide a sense of security and comfort to the community and prevent unwanted incidents from occurring during Christmas and New Year celebrations. Banggai Police explained that this operation was a centralized step to secure the Christmas celebrations. smoothly, orderly and conducively. In carrying out its duties, the Banggai Police are provided with support from the TNI, related agencies, stakeholders and social security partners. Amin expressed his hope that the social security and security situation in Banggai Regency during Christmas 2023-2024 will remain conducive. With cooperation between agencies and support from the community, it is hoped that this operation can provide positive results in maintaining order and security in the area.**

title: Hore! Hasil Seleksi PPPK Guru di Banggai Akhirnya Diumumkan Hari Ini
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Hore! Hasil akhir seleksi PPPK Guru di Banggai akhirnya akan diumumkan Sabtu hari ini 23 Desember 2023.Nama-nama peserta lulus PPPK Guru pun telah diterima BKPSDM Banggai, Sabtu pagi ini.Saat ini, instansi yang dipimpin Kaban Soffian Datu Adam itu tengah menyiapkan administrasinya untuk pengumuman.“Sudah masuk hari ini (hasil seleksi PPPK dari Panselnas). Sekarang masih mempersiapkan administrasi untuk pengumuman,” ungkap Soffian Datu Adam, Sabtu 23 Desember 2023.Untuk lebih jelasnya kata Kaban, ia meminta media ini untuk mengecek informasi tersebut ke stafnya, Ruli Nasution.Sementara, Ruli Nasution yang dikonfirmasi belum merespon pesan chat melalui aplikasi WhatsApp.Nama-nama peserta seleksi PPPK Guru ini akan diumumkan di situs resmi milik BKPSDM Banggai, sehingga peserta bisa mengecek langsung di link https://bkpsdm-banggai.com.Hingga Pukul 11.00 WITA, BKPSDM Banggai belum meng-upload hasil akhir PPPK Guru di website resminya.Selain itu, untuk mendapatkan informasi Pengumuman peserta seleksi bisa melihat situs SSCASN BKN di link https://sscasn.bkn.go.id/.Selain itu, peserta juga bisa melakukan pengecekan di laman instansi terkait tempat mendaftar PPPK Guru. Kemudian, anda bisa melakukan pengecekan daftar instansi melalui link https://s.id/HasilSeleksiPPPK2023. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Hooray! The final results of the Teacher PPPK selection in Banggai will finally be announced this Saturday, December 23 2023. The names of the participants who passed the Teacher PPPK have also been received by BKPSDM Banggai, this Saturday morning. Currently, the agency led by Kaban Soffian Datu Adam is currently preparing its administration for the announcement "It's in today (the results of the PPPK selection from Panselnas). "We are still preparing the administration for the announcement," said Soffian Datu Adam, Saturday 23 December 2023. For further clarity, said Kaban, he asked this media to check the information with his staff, Ruli Nasution. Meanwhile, Ruli Nasution has confirmed that he has not responded to chat messages via the application. WhatsApp. The names of the PPPK Teacher selection participants will be announced on the official website of BKPSDM Banggai, so that participants can check directly on the link https://bkpsdm-banggai.com. As of 11.00 WITA, BKPSDM Banggai has not uploaded the final PPPK results. Teachers on their official website. Apart from that, to get information on the announcement of selection participants, you can see the SSCASN BKN website at the link https://sscasn.bkn.go.id/. Apart from that, participants can also check on the page of the relevant agency where to register for PPPK Teachers . Then, you can check the list of agencies via the link https://s.id/HasilSeleksiPPPK2023. (*)

title: Karendalops OMB Polres Banggai Hadiri Rapat Fasilitasi Sentra Gakkumdu
text: luwuk–Jumat tanggal 22 Desember 2023, Bawaslu Banggai mengadakan rapat Fasilitasi Sentra Gakkumdu bertempat di Ruang Rapat Hotel Swiss Belinn Luwuk.Kegiatan ini bertujuan untuk menyamakan persepsi dan pemahaman dalam penangganan tindak pidana pemilu dikabupaten banggai.Dalam rapat ini, KA Operasi OMBpolres banggaidiwakili oleh Karendalops Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi, SH, SIK. Selain itu juga hadir sejumlah pejabat dan perwakilan dari berbagai lembaga terkait, seperti Kejari Banggai, Ketua dan Komisioner Bawaslu Banggai, serta perwakilan dari Satgas OMB Polres Banggai.Dalam rapat tersebut, penyampaian materi terkait proses penyidikan Pemilu 2024 oleh Kapusdalops AKP Maikun, SH, MH dan Jaksa Hendra Poltak, SH tentang mekanisme pra penuntutan berkas perkara Pemilu.Karendalops OMB Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi dalam sambutannya, memberikan apresiasi terhadap kerja Bawaslu Kabupaten Banggai dan menekankan pentingnya kerja sama antara berbagai instansi terkait.Ia juga menyampaikan, “Nantinya kegiatan akan semakin berat, dalam pelaksanaan penyelesaian kasus diharapkan pada Sentra Gakumdu dapat memfasilitasi tempat dengan baik.”“Agar selalu bekoordinasi, berkolaborasi untuk mempererat kekompakan dalam pelaksanaan tugas pengamanan Pemilu 2024,” ujar Kabag Ops Polres Banggai ini.Selama berlangsung, rapat ini berjalan dengan tertib, aman, dan lancar. Semua pihak terus berkomitmen untuk memastikan kelancaran dan integritas pemilihan umum yang akan datang.*Humas Polres Bangai
text_en: Luwuk–Friday 22 December 2023, Bawaslu Banggai held a Gakkumdu Center Facilitation meeting at the Swiss Belinn Hotel Meeting Room Luwuk. This activity aims to equalize perceptions and understanding in handling election crimes in Banggai Regency. Police Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi, SH, SIK. Apart from that, a number of officials and representatives from various related institutions were also present, such as the Banggai Prosecutor's Office, the Chair and Commissioner of the Banggai Bawaslu, as well as representatives from the Banggai Police OMB Task Force. and Prosecutor Hendra Poltak, SH regarding the pre-prosecution mechanism for election case files. Karendalops OMB Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi, in his speech, expressed his appreciation for the work of the Banggai Regency Bawaslu and emphasized the importance of cooperation between various related agencies. He also said, "Later the activities will become more difficult "In carrying out case resolution, it is hoped that the Gakumdu Center can facilitate the place well." , and smoothly. All parties continue to be committed to ensuring the smoothness and integrity of the upcoming general elections.* Bangai Police Public Relations

title: Dugaan Dana Penyertaan Modal BUMDes Uso Disalahgunakan, Kejari Banggai Periksa 20 Saksi & Geledah Beberapa Tempat
text: Foto: HUMAS KEJARI BANGGAIBANGGAINEWS.COM-Keuangan penyertaan modal Badan Usaha Milik Desa (BUMDes) Berkah Uso, Kecamatan Batui, Kabupaten Banggai, Provinsi Sulteng, diduga terjadi penyalahgunaan.Tim Penyidik Kejaksaan Negeri (Kejari) Banggai langsung turun lapangan menindaklanjuti laporan masyarakat tersebut, dengan melakukan penggeledahan di Kantor Desa setempat pada Kamis, 07 Desember 2023 sekira pukul 09.00 sampai dengan 13.00 WITA.Hal itu berdasarkan SIARAN PERS Nomor: PR- 29/P.2.11/Kph.3/12/2023 yang dibagikan Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri (Kajari) Banggai Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono melalui Kepala Seksi Intelijen (Kastel) Sarman Santosa Tandisu melalui pesan WhatsApp, Kamis (Hari Ini, red) pukul 18.07 WITA.Dikatakan, penggeledahan oleh Tim Penyidik Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai terkait dugaan Tindak Pidana Korupsi Penyalahgunaan Keuangan Penyertaan Modal Badan Usaha Milik Desa (BUMDes) Berkah Uso Desa Uso Kecamatan Batui Kabupaten Banggai Tahun 2017 – 2021.Informasi: Hari Kamis, 07 Desember 2023 sekira pukul 09.00 Wita S/d 13.00 wita tim Penyidik yang dipimpin Kasi Pidsus Ihwal Sainul, SH., MH melakukan penggeledahan di beberapa lokasi yang diduga terdapat benda-benda/dokumen yang berkaitan dengan Tindak pidana A quo yakni di Kantor Bumdes Uso, Kantor Pemerintah Desa Uso dan beberapa lokasi di Kecamatan Batui.Penggeledahan ini dilakukan di sejumlah tempat tersebut berdasarkan Surat perintah Penggeledahan Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai Nomor : Print- 891/P.2.11/Fd.1/12/2023 tanggal 07 Desember 2023, dalam proses penggeledahan tim Penyidik menemukan sejumlah dokumen dan selanjutnya dilakukan penyitaan.Selama kegiatan berlangsung Tim mendapatkan pengawalan dan Pengamanan dari Kepolisian Sektor Batui dan Intelijen Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai.Kasus Posisi Singkat : BUMDes Berkah Uso dibentuk pada tahun 2017 dan mendapatkan Dana Penyertaan Modal dari APBDesa Uso sebesar Rp. 500.000.000,- (lima ratus juta rupiah) yang digunakan untuk kegiatan kerjasama dengan pihak ke 3 yang mana keuntungannya dipergunakan untuk meningkatkan perekonomian Desa Uso.BUMDes Uso beberapa kali menerima bantuan yakni:A. Tahun 2019 penambahan modal dari APBDes Desa Uso sebesar Rp.100.000.000.- (seratus juta rupiah).B. tahun 2021 penambahan modal dari APBDes Desa Uso sebesar Rp.100.000.000.- (seratus juta rupiah).C. Tahun 2021 penambahan modal dari Pemerintah Daerah Kab. Banggai sebesar Rp.100.000.000.- (seratus juta rupiah).Bahwa faktanya penggunaan anggaran sejumlah tersebut di atas tidak dapat dipertanggungjawabkan.Saat ini tim penyidik telah memeriksa saksi sebanyak 20 orang.(SOF) ,
text_en: Photo: KEJARI Public Relations BANGGAIBANGGAINEWS.COM-The financial capital participation of Berkah Uso Village-Owned Enterprises (BUMDes), Batui District, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi Province, is suspected to have been misused. The Banggai District Prosecutor's Investigation Team (Kejari) immediately went to the field to follow up on the public report, by conducting a search at the local Village Office on Thursday, 07 December 2023 at approximately 09.00 to 13.00 WITA. This is based on PRESS RELEASE Number: PR- 29/P.2.11/Kph.3/12/2023 which was distributed by the Head of the District Prosecutor's Office (Kajari ) Banggai Raden Wisnu Bagus Wicaksono through the Head of the Intelligence Section (Kastel) Sarman Santosa Tandisu via WhatsApp message, Thursday (Today, ed) at 18.07 WITA. It was said that the search by the Banggai District Prosecutor's Investigation Team was related to alleged criminal acts of corruption, financial abuse of corporate capital participation Village-Owned Enterprises (BUMDes) Berkah Uso, Uso Village, Batui District, Banggai Regency, 2017 - 2021. Information: Thursday, 07 December 2023 at approximately 09.00 WIT to 13.00 WITA, the team of investigators led by the Head of Special Investigations Section, Ihwal Sainul, SH., MH carried out searches at several locations suspected of containing objects/documents related to the A quo crime, namely at the Uso Bumdes Office, Uso Village Government Office and several locations in Batui District. These searches were carried out in a number of these places based on a search warrant from the Head of the District Attorney Banggai Number: Print- 891/P.2.11/Fd.1/12/2023 dated 07 December 2023, during the search process the Investigating Team found a number of documents and subsequently confiscated them. During the activity the Team received escort and security from the Batui Sector Police and Intelligence Banggai District Prosecutor's Office. Case Brief Position: BUMDes Berkah Uso was formed in 2017 and received capital participation funds from the Uso Village APBDes amounting to IDR. 500,000,000 (five hundred million rupiah) which is used for collaborative activities with third parties, the profits of which are used to improve the economy of Uso Village. BUMDes Uso has received assistance several times, namely: A. In 2019 additional capital from the Uso Village APBDes amounted to Rp. 100,000,000.- (one hundred million rupiah). B. in 2021, additional capital from the Uso Village APBDes will amount to Rp. 100,000,000.- (one hundred million rupiah). C. In 2021 additional capital from the District Regional Government. Banggai amounting to Rp. 100,000,000.- (one hundred million rupiah). That in fact the use of the budget of the amount above cannot be accounted for. Currently the investigative team has examined 20 witnesses. (SOF),

title: Guru Honorer di Nuhon Banggai Cabuli Anak Tirinya yang Masih di Bawah Umur
text: Foto: HUMAS POLRES BANGGAIBANGGAINEWS.COM-Polisi menangkap seorang ayah di Kecamatan Nuhon, Kabupaten Banggai, atas kasus dugaan pencabulan terhadap seorang gadis yang tak lain adalah anak tirinya, Rabu (22/11/2023) sore.Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S. Muda kepada wartawan membenarkan adanya peristiwa dugaan pencabulan di Kecamatan Nuhon.“Iya benar, ada kasus dugaan pencabulan ayah tiri di Kecamatan Nuhon,” ungkap Al Amin di Mapolres Banggai, Kawasan Bukit Halimun, Kamis (23/11/2023) siang.Pelaku berinisial HD alias H (46) diamankan di kediamannya tanpa perlawanan setelah polisi menerima laporan dari keluarga korban.“Korbannya 15 tahun, sekarang duduk di bangku kelas 1 SMP,” terang Amin.Pelaku yang merupakan guru honorer di salah satu Sekolah Dasar (SD) ini diketahui melakukan aksi bejatnya dengan cara memaksa korban untuk melakukan hubungan intim layaknya suami istri dengan korban.“Korban menolak untuk melakukan hubungan intim, tapi diancam oleh pelaku menggunakan pisau,” terangnya.Aksi bejat pelaku pertama kali dilakukan kepada korban di rumahnya pada tahun 2020 dimana saat itu korban sedang duduk di bangku kelas 4 SD.“Korban sudah lupa berapa kali dipaksa berhubungan intim. Namun diperkirakan lebih dari 10 kali,” ujar Amin.Dari hasil pemeriksaan, korban mengakui, tekahir melakukan hubungan intim pada Sabtu 18 November 2023 di Kecamatan Nuhon.“Saat ini pelaku telah diamankan sel tahahan Mapolres Banggai. Untuk keluarga korban diarahkan membuat laporan di Polres Banggai,” imbuhnya.Terkait kasus dugaan pencabulan anak di bawah umur ini, situasi wilayah hukum Polsek Nuhon masih dalam keadaan aman kondusif.(*) ,
text_en: Photo: POLRES PR BANGGAI BANGGAINEWS.COM-Police arrested a father in Nuhon District, Banggai Regency, in a case of alleged molestation of a girl who was none other than his stepson, Wednesday (22/11/2023) afternoon. Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S. Muda confirmed to journalists that there had been incidents of alleged sexual abuse in Nuhon District. "Yes, that's right, there was a case of suspected sexual abuse of a stepfather in Nuhon District," said Al Amin at the Banggai Police Headquarters, Bukit Halimun Area, Thursday (23/11/2023) afternoon. The perpetrator with the initials HD alias H (46) was detained at his residence without resistance after the police received a report from the victim's family. "The victim is 15 years old, now in grade 1 of junior high school," explained Amin. The perpetrator is an honorary teacher at an elementary school (SD). ) is known to have committed this depraved act by forcing the victim to have intimate relations like husband and wife with the victim. "The victim refused to have intimate relations, but was threatened by the perpetrator with a knife," he explained. The perpetrator's first depraved act was carried out on the victim at his home in 2020, when the victim was in 4th grade at elementary school. "The victim has forgotten how many times he was forced to have sex. However, it is estimated that it was more than 10 times," said Amin. From the results of the examination, the victim admitted that the last time he had intimate relations was on Saturday 18 November 2023 in Nuhon District. "Currently the perpetrator has been detained by the Banggai Police Headquarters detention cell. "The victim's family is directed to make a report at the Banggai Police," he added. Regarding the case of alleged molestation of a minor, the situation in the jurisdiction of the Nuhon Police is still in a safe and conducive condition. (*) ,

title: Polres Banggai Serahkan Tersangka Kasus Narkoba Asal Donggala ke JPU
text: BANGGAINEWS.COM-Penyidik Satuan Narkoba (Satnarkoba) Polres Banggai, akhirnya menuntaskan kasus narkotika dengan tersangka AN alias Deki (35) warga Dusun I Desa Terang Kecamatan Dampelas Kabupaten Donggala.Tersangka AN, beserta berkas perkaranya diserahkan penyidik Satnarkoba ke Jaksa Penuntut Umum (JPU) Kejari Banggai untuk selanjutnya disidangkan.“Tersangka ini ditangkap pada tanggal 15 Juli 2023 sekitar jam 21.30 Wita di Desa Mulyoharjo Kecamatan Moilong, Banggai. Saat digeledah dari tangan tersangka diamankan barang bukti 1 sachset plastik klip berisi sabu,” ujar Kasat Narkoba Polres Banggai IPTU Muhammad Kasim, SH.Kasat mengungkapkan, setelah dilakukan serangkaian penyidikan atas kasus narkotika itu, maka penyidik akhirnya menuntaskan kasus tersebut.“Sejak penangkapan penyidik terus berupaya untuk menuntaskan. Dan Alhamdulillah, Rabu (22/11/2023) pukul 14.00 Wita, penyerahan Tahap II dilaksanakan oleh Bripka Yandri Rompis dan Aipda Rudi Adrian dan diterima oleh JPU Nugroho Satya Basuki, SH,” jelasnya.IPTU Kasim menjelaskan hasil penyidikan perkara untuk tersangka AN sudah dinyatakan lengkap berdasarkan surat pemberitahuan P21 No:B-2025/P.2.11/Enz. 1/11/11/2023 tanggal 10 November 2023.“Tersangka dan barang bukti diserahkan dalam keadaan sehat dan lengkap. Selanjutnya dititip oleh JPU di Rutan Polres Banggai,” pungkas Kasat.(*) ,
text_en: BANGGAINEWS.COM-Investigators from the Banggai Police Narcotics Unit (Satnarkoba), finally resolved the narcotics case with the suspect AN alias Deki (35), a resident of Hamlet I, Terang Village, Dampelas District, Donggala Regency. The suspect AN, along with his case files, was handed over by Satnarkoba investigators to the Public Prosecutor (JPU ) Banggai Prosecutor's Office for further trial. "This suspect was arrested on July 15 2023 at around 21.30 WITA in Mulyoharjo Village, Moilong District, Banggai. "When the suspect was searched, evidence was seized of 1 plastic sachet clip containing crystal methamphetamine," said Banggai IPTU Police Narcotics Unit Head Muhammad Kasim, SH. Kasat said that after carrying out a series of investigations into the narcotics case, investigators finally resolved the case. "Since the investigator's arrest keep trying to finish. "And Alhamdulillah, Wednesday (22/11/2023) at 14.00 WITA, the Phase II handover was carried out by Bripka Yandri Rompis and Aipda Rudi Adrian and received by Public Prosecutor Nugroho Satya Basuki, SH," he explained. IPTU Kasim explained that the results of the case investigation for suspect AN had been completed. declared complete based on notification letter P21 No:B-2025/P.2.11/Enz. 1/11/11/2023 dated 10 November 2023. "The suspect and evidence were handed over in good health and complete condition. "Furthermore, the prosecutor will entrust him to the Banggai Police Detention Center," concluded the Chief of Police. (*) ,

title: Libur Akhir Semester, Santri Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Ramai-ramai Pulang Kampung, Ini Pesan Ustadz Mu’adz
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Libur sekolah akhir semester, para santri Pondok Pesantren (Ponpes) Daarul Hikmah Luwuk ramai-ramai pulang ke kampung halaman.Libur sekolah akhir semester itu dimulai dari tanggal 23 Desember 2023 hingga 6 Januari 2024 mendatang. Kurang lebih dua pekan, santri akan menikmati liburan.Berdasarkan amatan media ini, terlihat para santri di ponpes tersebut, begitu antusias menyambut liburan akhir semester untuk pulang kampung.Sebelum meninggalkan pondok, santri diwajibkan untuk menyelesaikan administrasi kepulangan dan membeli kalender yang telah disiapkan Pesantren.“Libur semester dari tanggal 23 Desember sampai 6 Januari 2023. Kalau dari Taliabu, sudah duluan (pulang) karena kapalnya yang ke sana jarang,” ungkap Pimpinan Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk, KH. Muhammad Mu’adz Lc., M.Hi., kepada Banggai Raya, Sabtu pagi 23 Desember 2023 via WhatsApp.Libur selama dua pekan, ini pesan Pimpinan Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk, KH Muhammad Mu’adz Lc., M.Hi , kepada para santri.“Anak-anak diharapkan tetap melaksanakan kegiatan seperti di pondok. Hanya bedanya, di rumah,” ujar Ustad Mu’adz, sapaan akrabnya.Olehnya, Santri diharapkan tetap memperlihatkan ahlak-ahlak yang baik sebagai seorang santri, di mana pun berada.“Aktivitas mengaji, dan menghafal harus jalan seperti di pondok. Olehnya, peran orangtua atau wali santri sangat dibutuhkan. Jaga anak-anaknya di rumah seperti kami menjaga di pondok,” pesannya.Jika santri libur dimulai tanggal 23 Desember sampai tanggal 6 Januari, beda halnya dengan para dewan guru.“Kalau dewan guru, liburnya mulai besok 24 Desember sampai 4 Januari. Lebih awal masuk, untuk persiapan menyambut kedatangan santri,” tandasnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- At the end of the semester school holidays, the students of the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School (Ponpes) are busy returning to their hometowns. The end of semester school holidays start from 23 December 2023 to 6 January 2024. In approximately two weeks, the students will enjoy a holiday. Based on media observations, it can be seen that the students at the Islamic boarding school are very enthusiastic about welcoming the end of semester holiday to return home.
