Before leaving the boarding school, the students are required to complete the homecoming administration and buy a calendar that has been prepared by the Islamic boarding school. "Semester holidays are from December 23 to January 6 2023. If you come from Taliabu, you will have already gone home because there are rarely boats going there," said the Head of the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School, KH. Muhammad Mu'adz Lc., M.Hi., to Banggai Raya, Saturday morning 23 December 2023 via WhatsApp. Holiday for two weeks, this is the message from the Head of Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School, KH Muhammad Mu'adz Lc., M.Hi, to the students. "Children are expected to continue carrying out activities like at the cottage. "The only difference is, at home," said Ustad Mu'adz, his nickname. Therefore, Santri are expected to continue to show good morals as a santri, wherever they are. "The activities of reciting the Koran and memorizing must be carried out like in the hut. Therefore, the role of parents or guardians of students is very much needed. "Take care of the children at home like we take care of them at the boarding school," he said. If the students' holiday starts from December 23 to January 6, the situation is different for the teachers' council. "For the teachers' council, the holiday starts tomorrow, December 24 to January 4. Come in early, to prepare to welcome the arrival of the students," he said. (*)

title: Meriahnya Pembukaan Rangkaian Milad BEM dan Fakultas Teknik Unismuh Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Bertempat di pelataran kampus hijau, Jumat 22 Desember 2023, berlangsung meriah pembukaan rangkaian kegiatan Milad ke 14 BEM Fakultas Teknik (Fatek) dan ke 23 Fatek Unismuh Luwuk.Pembukaan rangkaian kegiatan milad inimengusung tema “Refleksi Fakultas Teknik” dengan tujua agar kegiatan ini menjadi wadah dalam memperkua silaturahmi antara mahasiswa mahasiswa dan dosen serta alumni di fakultas Teknik Unismuh Luwuk.Dalam milad kali ini, dimeriahkan juga dengan berbagai item kegiatan di dalamnya yaitu Teknik Cup, Talk show, Engineering expo, Kunjungan industri dan Temu alumni Fakultas Teknik Unismuh Luwuk.Wakil Rektor III Unismuh Luwuk, Agung K. Djibran menyampaikan bahwa Fakultas Teknik  merupakan fakultas yang memiliki tingkat mahasiswa terbanyak kedua di Universitas Muhammadiyah Luwuk.“Lewat kegiatan milad ini kiranya dapat merefleksikan agar dapat menjadi batu loncatan untuk terus maju bersaing baik di skala regional maupun nasional,” harapnyaSelaku ketua BEM Fakultas Teknik UML Safrin Halangi juga berharap adanya perhatian serius dari civitas akademika kampus terkait fasilitas penunjang dalam proses belajar mengajar seperti laboratorium agar makin ditambah dan mendekati lengkap.“Karena perkembangan mahasiswa/i baru fakultas teknik sangat meningkat dari tahun ke tahun. Sudah menjadi barang tentu prestasi ini atas kerjasama antara mahasiswa dalam hal ini BEM Teknik yang menangui dua prodi yakni prodi Teknik Sipil dan Prodi Teknik Industri bersama civitas fakultas dalam hal ini Dekan Fakultas Teknik dan Rektor,” katanya.Sebagai ketua BEM, ia juga sangat berterimakasih atas perhatian serta kerjasama yang baik semua pihak atas perkembangan  Fakultas Teknik Unismuh Luwuk sampai saat sekarang ini.Dalam kegiatan pembukaan milad sekaligus seminar keteknikan ini dihadiri oleh seluruh BEM yang ada di lingkup kampus Unismuh Luwuk, Dekan fakultas teknik, rektor beserta para  alumni Fakultas Teknik UML. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Taking place in the green campus courtyard, Friday 22 December 2023, there was a festive opening of the series of activities for the 14th Anniversary of BEM Faculty of Engineering (Fatek) and the 23rd Fatek Unismuh Luwuk. The opening of this series of anniversary activities carried the theme "Reflections on the Faculty of Engineering" with the aim of making the activities This is a forum for strengthening friendship between students, lecturers and alumni at the Unismuh Luwuk Faculty of Engineering. This anniversary was also enlivened by various activity items, namely the Engineering Cup, Talk Show, Engineering Expo, Industrial Visits and Alumni Meetings from the Faculty of Engineering, Unismuh Luwuk. Deputy Chancellor III Unismuh Luwuk, Agung K. Djibran said that the Faculty of Engineering is the faculty with the second highest number of students at Muhammadiyah University Luwuk. "Through this anniversary activity we hope to reflect that it can be a stepping stone to continue to compete well on a regional scale and nationally," he hoped. As chairman of the BEM of the Faculty of Engineering, UML, Safrin Halangi also hoped that there would be serious attention from the campus academic community regarding supporting facilities in the teaching and learning process such as laboratories so that they would be increasingly added and closer to complete. "Because the development of new students at the engineering faculty has increased greatly from year to year. to year. "It is certain that this achievement is due to collaboration between students, in this case BEM Engineering, which oversees two study programs, namely the Civil Engineering Study Program and the Industrial Engineering Study Program, together with the faculty community, in this case the Dean of the Faculty of Engineering and the Chancellor," he said. As head of BEM, he is also very grateful for the good attention and cooperation of all parties regarding the development of the Unismuh Luwuk Faculty of Engineering to date. The opening of the anniversary and engineering seminar was attended by all BEM on the Unismuh Luwuk campus, the Dean of the engineering faculty, the chancellor and the alumni of the UML Faculty of Engineering . (*)

title: Caleg PKB Kaharuddin, Lakukan Konsolisasi di Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Calon anggota legislatif (Caleg) DPR RI dari Partai PKB nomor urut 4, Kaharuddin melakukan konsolidasi di daerah pemiihan (Dapil) Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah, termasuk di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai.Itu terungkap, saat Kaharuddin minum kopi bersama wartawan lokal mulai media cetak dan online, di Cafe Dg Mangge, Tanjung, Kelurahan Keraton, Kecamatan Luwuk, sekira pukul 13.00 hingga selesai, Sabtu (23/12/2023).Caleg DPR RI, Kaharuddin didampingi oleh Wakil Ketua DPW PKB Provinsi Sulteng dan juga Koordinator Wilayah Banggai Bersaudara, Irwan Mudin, serta Wakil Ketua DPD PKB Kabupaten Banggai, Amlin Usman.Untuk diketahui, Kaharuddin yang lahir di Palopo, Sulawesi Selatan ini, yang saat ini berdomisili di Kabupaten Morowali, baru 9 bulan bergabung di PKB.Wakil Ketua DPD PKB Banggai, Amlin Usman saat membuka dialog tersebut mengatakan, berkenaan dengan agenda konsolidasi Kaharuddin, Caleg DPR RI dari PKB nomor 4 Dapil Sulteng di Kabupaten Banggai, berkeinginan untuk bisa mendekatkan diri, kemudian Publik bisa mengetahuinya, sehingga sangat membutuhkan peran-peran media cetak dan online di Banggai.“Beliau sudah beberapa kali melakukan pertemuan, khususnya di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai di beberapa titik. Saat ini sudah ada 96 titik. Terkait agenda konsolidasi ini, walaupun dibuat sederhana. Karena beliau hanya 2 hari, sudah akan kembali lagi. Insya Allah, beliau janji 2 pekan, diawal Januari 2024, sudah melakukan konsolidasi besar-besaran sesuai dengan prosedur dari Bawaslu dan KPU,” jelas Aco begitu panggilan akrabnya kepada sejumlah wartawan yang hadir.Awal ini sambung dia, sekedar mengenalkan pada publik, makanya ia mengusulkan supaya mengundang para wartawan untuk membantu terekspos Kaharuddin di media, sejauhmana gerakan di wilayah Banggai, bagaimana konsolidasinya, dan bagaimana pola-polanya.Apa yang memotivasi keinginannya kata Aco, sehingga berkeinginan menjadi sala satu aspirator DPR-RI. Padahal secara ekonomi, kalau hanya memperbaiki ekonomi, tidak perlu menjadi anggota DPR RI, sudah cukup mengembangkan usahanya.“Sudah bisa hidup. Mungkin ada kiat-kiat lainnya, ada motivasi lain, sehingga beliau memberanikan diri, bahkan nekat bersaing dengan 6 Caleg yang ada di PKB,” tutupnya. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Prospective legislative member (Caleg) DPR RI from the PKB Party number 4, Kaharuddin consolidated in the electoral area (Dapil) of Central Sulawesi Province, including in the Banggai Regency area. This was revealed when Kaharuddin drank coffee with local journalists from print media and online, at Cafe Dg Mangge, Tanjung, Keraton Subdistrict, Luwuk District, around 13.00 until finished, Saturday (23/12/2023). DPR RI Candidate, Kaharuddin was accompanied by the Deputy Chair of the Central Sulawesi Province DPW PKB and also the Regional Coordinator of the Banggai Bersaudara , Irwan Mudin, as well as the Deputy Chair of the Banggai Regency PKB DPD, Amlin Usman. For your information, Kaharuddin, who was born in Palopo, South Sulawesi, and who currently lives in Morowali Regency, has only joined PKB for 9 months. When opening the dialogue, Usman said that regarding Kaharuddin's consolidation agenda, the DPR RI legislative candidate from PKB number 4 of the Central Sulawesi electoral district in Banggai Regency, wants to be able to get closer, so that the public can find out, so the role of print and online media in Banggai is really needed. "He has held several meetings, especially in the Banggai Regency area at several points. Currently there are 96 points. Regarding this consolidation agenda, even though it is made simple. Because he's only been there for 2 days, he'll be back again. "God willing, he promises that in 2 weeks, at the beginning of January 2024, we will carry out a large-scale consolidation in accordance with the procedures of Bawaslu and the KPU," explained Aco, as he is nicknamed, to a number of journalists who were present. At the beginning, he continued, he was just introducing the public, that's why he suggested inviting journalists to help expose Kaharuddin in the media, the extent of the movement in the Banggai region, how it was consolidated, and what the patterns were. What motivated his desire, said Aco, was his desire to become one of the DPR-RI aspirants. In fact, economically, if you only improve the economy, you don't need to become a member of the DPR RI, you just need to develop your business. "You can live. "Maybe there are other tips, there are other motivations, so he has the courage, even the courage to compete with the 6 legislative candidates in PKB," he concluded. RUM

title: BKPSDM Banggai Resmi Umumkan Hasil Seleksi PPPK Guru, Cek Namamu di Sini!
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Badan Kepegawaian Sumber Daya Manusia (BKPSDM) Kabupaten Banggai di bawah pimpinan Kaban Soffian Datu Adam resmi mengumumkan hasil seleksi PPPK Guru tahun anggaran 2023.Hasil seleksi itu telah diumumkan Sabtu sore 23 Desember 2023, di website resmi milik BKPSDM Banggai.Informasi telah diumumkan hasil seleksi PPPK Guru juga disampaikan instansi itu melalui akun Facebook resminya.Bagi peserta yang ingin mengecek nama-nama yang lulus, bisa langsung mengakses link berikut https://www.bkpsdm-banggai.com.Disampaikan juga BKPSDM Banggai di,  bagi peserta yang dinyatakan lulus seleksi dapat bergabung di Grup Telegram untuk informasi pemberkasan penetapan nomor induk: https://t.me/+ZGs493hPI-03YTg1.Dikonfirmasi Banggai Raya, Ruli Nasution staf di BKPSDM Banggai mengatakan, jumlah formasi guru tahun anggaran 2023, sebanyak 1.134 posisi.Dari ribuan formasi itu, hanya 956 yang terisi dan 178 tidak terisi atau kosong. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- The Banggai Regency Human Resources Personnel Agency (BKPSDM) under the leadership of Kaban Soffian Datu Adam officially announced the results of the PPPK Teacher selection for the 2023 fiscal year. The results of the selection were announced Saturday afternoon, December 23 2023, on the official website of BKPSDM Banggai. Information has been provided The results of the PPPK Teacher selection were also announced by the agency via its official Facebook account. For participants who want to check the names of those who passed, you can directly access the following link https://www.bkpsdm-banggai.com. BKPSDM Banggai was also announced at, for participants Those who are declared to have passed the selection can join the Telegram Group for information on registration for determining their main number: https://t.me/+ZGs493hPI-03YTg1. Confirmed by Banggai Raya, Ruli Nasution, staff at BKPSDM Banggai, said that the number of teacher formations for the 2023 fiscal year is 1,134 position. Of the thousands of formations, only 956 were filled and 178 were unfilled or empty. (*)

title: Satgas OMB Polres Banggai Kawal Perakitan Kotak Suara di KPU
text: luwuk–Personelpolres banggaiyang tergabung dalam Satuan Tugas Operasi Mantap Brata (OMB) Tinombala mengawal proses perakitan kotak Pemilu 2023-2024, Sabtu (23/12/2023) pagi.Perakitan kota suara berlangsung di gudang logistik Pemilu KPUkabupaten banggai, di Kompleks Bukit Halimun, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan. Jalannya perakitan tersebut turut dipantau pihak KPU dan Bawaslu Banggai.Kasatgas Humas OMB Polres Banggai IPTU Al Amin S Muda mengatakan, pengawalan ini bertujuan untuk mencegah terjadinya gangguan keamanan yang merupakan bagian Polri kepada masyarakat dalam OMB Tinombala.“Proses perakitan kotak suara berjalan dengan aman dan lancar. Selanjutnya pihak kepolisian tetap melakukan penjagaan dan pengamanan kotak suara tersebut beserta logistik Pilkada lainnya di KPU hingga nanti didistribusikan,” sebut Amin.Giat pengamanan juga dengan melibatkan TNI dan pengamanan intern KPU Banggai serta 7 personil pengamanan pos objek penting Gudang Logistik
text_en: Luwuk–Bangangan police personnel who are members of the Tinombala Operation Mantap Brata (OMB) Task Force are overseeing the process of assembling the 2023-2024 Election boxes, Saturday (23/12/2023) morning. The assembly of the vote city took place at the KPU Election logistics warehouse, Banggai Regency, at the Bukit Halimun Complex, South Luwuk District. The process of the assembly was also monitored by the KPU and Bawaslu Banggai. Head of the Banggai Police OMB Public Relations Task Force IPTU Al Amin S Muda said that this escort was aimed at preventing security disturbances which were part of the Police for the community in the Tinombala OMB. "The process of assembling the ballot boxes ran safely and fluent. "Furthermore, the police will continue to guard and secure the ballot boxes along with other Pilkada logistics at the KPU until they are distributed," said Amin. The security activity also involves the TNI and Banggai KPU's internal security as well as 7 security personnel at important postal objects in the Logistics Warehouse.

title: Jelang Malam Natal, Polres Banggai Lakukan Patroli Ke Gereja-gereja di Kota Luwuk
text: luwuk–polres banggaimelaksanakan patroli gabungan dalam rangka menjaga situasi kamtibmas menjelang perayaan Natal tahun 2023, Minggu (24/12/2023). Patroli gabungan dilakukan personil Sat Samapta, TNI Kodim 1308 LB dan Sat Pol PP.kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani melalui Kasat Samapta AKP Jolly Lengkong, menjelaskan bahwa kegiatan patroli gabungan akan diintensifkan menjelang Kebaktian atau Misa malam Natal sampai dengan selesai libur tahun baru 2024.Patroli dilakukan untuk mencegah kejadian kriminalitas pada saat libur Natal dan Tahun Baru 2024. Dengan begitu, masyarakat dapat merayakan Natal dan mengadakan kegiatan dengan aman dan nyaman.“Saat ini sasaran utama kita adalah Gereja. Patroli dilakukan di jalur-jalur rawan kemudian singgah di Gereja-gereja yang dilalui,” ungkap AKP Jolly.Beberapa gereja yang disinggahi dalam patroli antara lain Gereja Kristus Raja, GPDI Calvary, Gereja Toraja Tongkonan Madatu, GKLB Bukit Moria, GKI, GKLB Imannuel, GKLB Family Gloria, GPPI Sion dan GKLB Bukit Zaitun.Petugas patroli kemudian mengingatkan pihak gereja untuk meningkatkan kewaspadaan dan membantu pihak kepolisian dalam menjaga keamanan ibadah Natal.“Puji Tuhan situasi aman kondusif dan Gereja yang kita pantau juga dalam situasi aman,”tutur Kasat Samapta
text_en: Luwuk–Polres are proud to carry out joint patrols in order to maintain the security and social security situation ahead of the 2023 Christmas celebrations, Sunday (24/12/2023). Joint patrols were carried out by personnel from Sat Samapta, TNI Kodim 1308 LB and Sat Pol PP. Kapolres Pride AKBP Ade Nuramdani through Head of Samapta AKP Jolly Lengkong, explained that joint patrol activities would be intensified ahead of Christmas Eve services or Masses until the end of the 2024 New Year holidays. Patrols were carried out to prevent crime incidents during the Christmas and New Year 2024 holidays. That way, people can celebrate Christmas and hold activities safely and comfortably. "Currently our main target is the Church. "Patrols are carried out on vulnerable routes and then stop at churches along the way," said AKP Jolly. Some of the churches stopped by during the patrol included Christ the King Church, GPDI Calvary, Toraja Tongkonan Madatu Church, GKLB Bukit Moria, GKI, GKLB Imannuel, GKLB Family Gloria, GPPI Sion and GKLB Bukit Zaitun. Patrol officers then reminded the church to increase vigilance and assist the police in maintaining the security of the Christmas service. "Praise God, the situation is safe and conducive and the church we are monitoring is also in a safe situation," said the Head of Samapta.

title: Polres Banggai Sasar THM Selama Libur Nataru
text: luwuk–Dalam pelaksanaan pencegahan peredaran narkotika jelang Nataru, Satuan Narkoba (Satnarkoba)polres banggaimenggelar razia di beberapa tempat hiburan malam, pada Minggu (24/12/2024) dini hari.Operasi di pimpin langsung olehkasat narkobaPolres Banggai IPTU Gede Wira Hendana Putra, S.Tr.K, MH, didampingi Kasi Propam IPTU Reden Hermawan, SE, yang menyasar 4 lokasi hiburan yakni NAV, Happy Puppy, D'Club Estrella dan 168 House.“Kegiatan razia dilakukan dengan memeriksa identitas, badan dan pakaian serta barang-barang yang dibawa oleh pengunjung, serta pemeriksaaan urin para pengunjung,” ujar IPTU Wira.Kasat Narkoba mengungkap bahwa berdasarkan perintahkapolres banggaibahwa meminta jajarannya agar memberantas peredaran gelap narkoba guna mencegah gangguan keamanan dan ketertiban menjelang perayaan Natal dan Tahun Baru.“Kami seluruh jajaran Polres Banggai serius memberantas peredaran gelap narkoba, oleh karena ketika ada informasi sekecil apapun itu kami akan segera dengan cepat bertindak menindak lanjuti informasi tersebut,” bebernya.Ia pun meminta kepada semua elemen masyarakat, agar menjauhi segala tindak kejahatan berkaitan dengan narkotika demi terciptanya lingkungan sehat dan Kamtibmas kondusif di Wilayah Hukum Polres Banggai.“Kegiatan rutin razia di tempat hiburan malam adalah sebagai upaya Polri dalam pencegahan peredaran gelap narkoba untuk memberantas narkoba,” pungkas Kasat.Adapun selama razia tidak ditemukan penyalahgunaan narkoba dan obat-obatan terlarang. Kegiatan berakhir pada pukul 03.30 Wita/dini hari dalam keadaaan aman kondusif  Next:Jelang Malam Natal, Polres Banggai Lakukan Patroli Ke Gereja-gereja di Kota Luwuk
text_en: Luwuk–In implementing the prevention of narcotics distribution ahead of Christmas, the Narcotics Unit (Satnarkoba) of the Banggai Police carried out raids at several nightclubs, on Sunday (24/12/2024) in the early hours of the morning. The operation was led directly by the narcotics unit of the Banggai Police, IPTU Gede Wira Hendana Putra, .Tr.K, MH, accompanied by Head of IPTU Propam Section Reden Hermawan, SE, who targeted 4 entertainment locations namely NAV, Happy Puppy, D'Club Estrella and 168 House. "Raid activities were carried out by checking identity, body and clothing as well as items brought by visitors, as well as checking the visitors' urine," said IPTU Wira. The Head of the Narcotics Unit revealed that based on orders from the Banggai Police Chief, he asked his staff to eradicate illicit drug trafficking in order to prevent security and order disturbances ahead of the Christmas and New Year celebrations. "We are all serious about Banggai Police. eradicate the illicit trafficking of drugs, because when there is information, no matter how small, we will immediately act quickly to follow up on the information," he explained. He also asked all elements of society to stay away from all crimes related to narcotics in order to create a healthy environment and conducive security and social order. in the Legal Area of ​​the Banggai Police. "Routine raid activities at nightclubs are an effort by the National Police to prevent illicit drug trafficking to eradicate narcotics," concluded Kasat. Meanwhile, during the raid no drug abuse or illegal drugs were found. The activity ended at 03.30 WITA/early morning in a safe and conducive condition. Next: Ahead of Christmas Eve, Banggai Police Conduct Patrols to Churches in Luwuk City

title: IMM Banggai Gelar Pelantikan dan Rakerpim 2023-2024
text: “Teguhkan Komitmen, Satukan Gagasan, Wujudkan Cita-cita”KABAR LUWUK  –IMM BanggaiGelar Pelantikan danRakerpim 2023-2024. Pimpinan CabangIkatan Mahasiswa Muhammadiyah (IMM)Kabupaten Banggai sukses melaksanakan Pelantikan dan Rapat Kerja Pimpinan (Rakerpim) periode 2023-2024 dengan tema “Teguhkan Komitmen, Satukan Gagasan, Wujudkan Cita-cita.” Acara berlangsung di AulaKONI Banggaipada Kamis, 23 Desember 2023.Prosesi pelantikan dihadiri oleh berbagai tokoh penting, termasuk Ketua Pimpinan Daerah Muhammadiyah (PDM) Kabupaten Banggai, Ayahanda Farid Haluti, dan perwakilan Ketua Dewan Pimpinan Daerah (DPD) Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah, Kabidor Wahyu Aji Purnama.Bupati Banggai atau perwakilannya, Kapolres Banggai, dan Cipayung Plus Kabupaten Banggai turut hadir, memberikan dukungan pada acara ini.Dalam sambutannya, Ketua PDM Kabupaten Banggai, Farid Haluti, menyampaikan selamat kepada pengurus PC IMM Banggai yang baru dilantik.Ia mengajak para pengurus untuk bekerja sama dalam meningkatkan peran Muhammadiyah di Kabupaten Banggai, dengan menghasilkan program-program kreatif dan inovatif yang berdampak positif pada masyarakat.Ketua PDM juga menekankan pentingnya kerjasama dengan pemerintah daerah untuk memajukan kabupaten ini.Kabidor DPD IMM Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah, Wahyu Aji Purnama, juga menyampaikan selamat kepada pengurus harian PC IMM Banggai.Ia berharap mereka dapat menjalankan organisasi sesuai tema pelantikan dan berterima kasih kepada semua pihak yang turut hadir.Ketua Umum PC IMM Banggai, Muh Rifaldi Sibay, menekankan pentingnya komitmen, persatuan gagasan, dan upaya bersama dalam mewujudkan cita-cita organisasi.Ia mengucapkan terima kasih kepada tamu undangan, termasuk perwakilan Cipayung Plus dan Polres Banggai yang turut menyemarakkan acara.Acara pelantikan dan Rakerpim ini tidak hanya dipenuhi dengan serangkaian kegiatan resmi, tetapi juga dihiasi oleh penampilan tarian putri balantak yang dibawakan oleh Immawati Banggai dan pembacaan puisi demonstrasi berjas merah oleh Immawati Citra dan Immawan Furqon.Dengan tema yang menginspirasi, acara ini memberikan dorongan semangat kepada pengurus PC IMM Banggai untuk bersatu, berkomitmen, dan bekerja keras dalam mengemban amanah baru periode 2023-2024, demi kemajuan Muhammadiyah dan Kabupaten Banggai secara keseluruhan.**
text_en: "Strengthen Commitment, Unite Ideas, Make Dreams Come True" KABAR LUWUK – IMM Banggai Holds Inauguration and Leadership Meeting 2023-2024. The Banggai Regency Muhammadiyah Student Association (IMM) Branch Leader successfully carried out the Inauguration and Leadership Work Meeting (Rakerpim) for the 2023-2024 period with the theme "Strengthen Commitment, Unite Ideas, Make Dreams a Reality." The event took place at the KONI Banggai Hall on Thursday, December 23 2023. The inauguration procession was attended by various important figures, including the Chair of the Muhammadiyah Regional Leadership (PDM) of Banggai Regency, Father Farid Haluti, and representatives of the Chair of the Regional Leadership Council (DPD) of Central Sulawesi Province, Kabidor Wahyu Aji Purnama.The Regent of Banggai or his representative, the Banggai Police Chief, and Cipayung Plus Banggai Regency were also present, providing support at this event.In his speech, the Chairman of the Banggai Regency PDM, Farid Haluti, congratulated the newly appointed IMM Banggai PC management.He invited the administrators to work together in increasing the role of Muhammadiyah in Banggai Regency, by producing creative and innovative programs that have a positive impact on society. The Chairman of the PDM also emphasized the importance of collaboration with the regional government to advance this district. Head of IMM DPD Central Sulawesi Province, Wahyu Aji Purnama, also congratulated the daily management of PC IMM Banggai. He hoped that they could run the organization according to the theme of the inauguration and thanked all parties who attended. The General Chair of PC IMM Banggai, Muh Rifaldi Sibay, emphasized the importance of commitment, unity of ideas and joint efforts in realizing the organization's ideals. He expressed his thanks to the invited guests, including representatives of Cipayung Plus and the Banggai Police who also enlivened the event. Immawati Banggai and poetry reading demonstration in red suits by Immawati Citra and Immawan Furqon. With an inspiring theme, this event provided encouragement to the PC IMM Banggai management to unite, commit and work hard in carrying out the new mandate for the 2023-2024 period, for the progress of Muhammadiyah and Banggai Regency as a whole.**

In fact, economically, if you only improve the economy, you don't need to become a member of the DPR RI, you just need to develop your business. "You can live. "Maybe there are other tips, there are other motivations, so he has the courage, even the courage to compete with the 6 legislative candidates in PKB," he concluded. RUM

title: Misa Natal, Kapolres Bersama Bupati Banggai Sambangi Sejumlah Gereja di Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Kapolres Banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, bersama Bupati Banggai Ir. H. Amirudin Tamoreka dan Unsur Forkopimda melakukan pengecekan dan kunjungan ke sejumlah gereja dalam pelaksanaan ibadah malam Natal tahun 2023 di wilayah Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, Minggu (24/12/2023).Selain Bupati dan Kapolres Banggai, dalam rombongan tersebut diikuti juga hadir Asisten dan Staf ahli Setda Banggai.Kunjungan dan pengecekan itu dilakukan guna bersilahturahmi dan memastikan situasi kamtibmas berjalan aman dan kondusif selama ibadah misa Natal tahun 2023.Adapun gereja yang dikunjungi yakni, GPDI Betlehem, Gereja Katolik Bintang Kejora ST-Yoseph, Gereja Bukit Moria dan Gereja Kristen Indonesia (GKI).Dalam sambutannya, Bupati mengatakan, seluruh unsur Forkopimda mengucapkan selamat hari raya Natal kepada umat kristiani yang saat ini sedang merayakan“Kami berharap perayaan Natal ini dapat membawa sukacita dan damai di Kabupaten Banggai,” ucapnya.Iapun mengajak seluruh lapisan masyarakat untuk peduli sesama serta tetap menjaga harmonisasi dalam kerukunan hidup antar etnis dan agama.“Sehingga pelaksanaan pembangunan daerah dapat berjalan dengan aman dan lancar,” jelas Bupati.Bupati Amirudin mengucapkan terima kasih atas partisipasi jemaat Gereja yang selama ini telah berperan aktif dalam kegiatan-kegiatan sosial.“Terima kasih atas sumbangsi jemaat Gereja yang selama ini telah berperan aktif dalam kegiatan-kegiatan sosial khususnya di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai,” tutupnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, together with Banggai Regent Ir. H. Amirudin Tamoreka and Forkopimda elements checked and visited a number of churches during the 2023 Christmas Eve service in the Luwuk City area, Banggai Regency, Sunday (24/12/2023). Apart from the Regent and Banggai Police Chief, the group was also present. Assistant and expert staff of the Banggai Regional Secretariat. The visit and checks were carried out in order to stay in touch and ensure that the security and social security situation was safe and conducive during the 2023 Christmas mass service. The churches visited were GPDI Bethlehem, ST-Yoseph Morning Star Catholic Church, Bukit Moria Church and Indonesian Christian Church (GKI). In his speech, the Regent said, all elements of Forkopimda wish a happy Christmas to the Christians who are currently celebrating. "We hope that this Christmas celebration can bring joy and peace to Banggai Regency," he said. He also invited all levels of society to care for each other and maintain harmony in inter-ethnic and religious harmony. "So that the implementation of regional development can run safely and smoothly," explained the Regent. Regent Amirudin expressed his gratitude for the participation of the Church congregation who have played an active role in the activities. -social activities. "Thank you for the contribution of the Church congregation who have played an active role in social activities, especially in the Banggai Regency area," he concluded. (*)

title: Umat Nasrani Luwuk Banggai Rayakan Natal 2023
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Senin (25/12/2023) ini, masyarakat Nasrani di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai merayakan Hari Natal Tahun 2023, tidak terkecuali di Luwuk.Sejak pagi, pukul 07.00 Wita, warga Nasrani di Luwuk-Banggai berbondong-bondong menuju Gereja untuk melaksanakan Ibadah Natal 2023.Seperti amatan Banggai Raya, Senin pagi, di Gereja Jemaat GKLB Immanuel Luwuk, sejumlah warga Nasrani Luwuk mulai memasuki halaman Gereja.Begitu juga, dengan jemaat di Gereja-Gereja sekitarnya.Direncanakan, Bupati Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka bersama Forkopimda dan pimpinan OPD Banggai akan melakukan kunjungan di Gereja Immanuel Luwuk sekira pukul 08.00 Wita, serta Gereja lainnya.Perayaan Natal 2023 ini mendapatkan pengamanan dari personel Polres Banggai, Koramil 1308-01 Luwuk Banggai, Satpol PP Banggai, dan anggota Dinas Perhubungan Kabupaten Banggai. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-This Monday (25/12/2023), the Christian community in the Banggai Regency area celebrated Christmas Day 2023, including in Luwuk. Since this morning, at 07.00 WITA, Christian residents in Luwuk-Banggai flocked to the Church to carry out the Christmas Service 2023. As Banggai Raya observed, Monday morning, at the GKLB Immanuel Luwuk Congregation Church, a number of Luwuk Christian residents began to enter the church grounds. Likewise, with congregations in surrounding churches. As planned, the Regent of Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka together with Forkopimda and the Banggai OPD leadership will visit the Immanuel Luwuk Church at around 08.00 WITA, as well as other churches. The 2023 Christmas celebration will receive security from personnel from the Banggai Police, Koramil 1308-01 Luwuk Banggai, Banggai Satpol PP, and members of the Banggai Regency Transportation Service. RUM

title: TNI-Polri di Banggai Sulteng Jaga Ketat Malam Natal 2023
text: luwuk–Untuk memastikan Ibadah malam Natal berjalan kondusif, personel gabungan TNI-Polri dibantu instansi terkait terjun melaksanakan pengamanan di wilayah hukumpolres banggai, Minggu (24/12/2023) malam.kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, melalui, Kasi Humas Iptu Al Amin, mengungkapkan, pengamanan dilakukan untuk memberikan rasa aman dan nyaman bagi umat kristiani dalam menjalankan ibadah malam Natal.“Ini adalah wujud sinergitas TNI-Polri dan instansi terkait dalam memberi rasa aman dan nyaman bagi para jemaat yang sedang menjalankan ibadah kebaktian malam Natal,” ungkapnya, kepada wartawan seusai apel gabungan di Mapolsek Luwuk, Minggu (24/12/2023) malam.Selain melakukan pengamanan, Al Amin menjelaskan, bahwa personel gabungan juga melakukan pateoli gabungan di rumah-rumah ibadah yang melaksanakan ibadah Natal.“Kita juga menerjunkan patroli gabungan TNI-Polri untuk patroli di gereja-gereja khususnya di Kota Luwuk,” jelasnya.Menurutnya, patroli gabungan ini dilakukan selain untuk memberikan rasa aman juga demi memastikan ibadah malam natal berjalan lancar.“Dan untuk mencegah terjadinya kemacetan anggota juga melakukan pengaturan dan pengalihan arus lalu lintas di sekitar gereja,” beber Al Amin.Ia pun mengimbau lapisan masyarakat untuk bersama-sama menjaga toleransi antar umat beragama demi teriptanya stabilitas kamtibmas selama perayaan Natal.“Kami mengimbau elemen masyarakat selalu menjaga toleransi antar umat beragama dikabupaten banggai,” imbaunya.*Humas Polres Bnaggai
text_en: Luwuk–To ensure that the Christmas Eve service runs conducively, joint TNI-Polri personnel assisted by related agencies are involved in carrying out security in the legal area of ​​the Banggai Police, Sunday (24/12/2023) evening. Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, through, Head of Public Relations Inspector Al Amin, said that security was carried out to provide a sense of security and comfort for Christians in carrying out Christmas Eve services. "This is a form of synergy between the TNI-Polri and related agencies in providing a sense of security and comfort for congregation members who are carrying out Christmas Eve services. ," he said to journalists after a joint roll call at the Luwuk Police Headquarters, Sunday (24/12/2023) evening. Apart from providing security, Al Amin explained that joint personnel also carried out joint patioli at houses of worship carrying out Christmas services. "We "We also deployed joint TNI-Polri patrols to patrol churches, especially in Luwuk City," he explained. According to him, these joint patrols were carried out not only to provide a sense of security, but also to ensure that Christmas Eve services ran smoothly. "And to prevent traffic jams, members also carried out "regulating and diverting traffic flow around the church," explained Al Amin. He also appealed to levels of society to work together to maintain tolerance between religious communities in order to create stability in social security and order during the Christmas celebration. "We urge elements of society to always maintain tolerance between religious communities in Banggai Regency. ," he appealed. *Bnaggai Police Public Relations

title: Polisi Olah TKP Penemuan Jenazah di Nambo Banggai
text: Polresbanggai.com– Unit Identivikasi Satreskrimpolres banggaimelakukan olah TKP penemuan jenazah di salah satu rumah warga, Desa Sayambongin, Kecamatan Nambo,kabupaten banggai, Minggu (24/12/2023) malam.Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S. Muda, mengungkapkan, jenazah bernisial Sri Sunartun (60) berjenis kelamin perempuan ini ditemukan pertama kali oleh seorang saksi sekitar pukul 19.30 Wita.“Sekitar pukul 18.30 Wita, saksi lelaki Rus dipanggil oleh salah seorang warga untuk mengecek rumah yang tinggali korban,” ungkapnya.Saat dilakukan pengecekan, kata Amin, lampu di rumah yang ditinggali korban belum menyala.“Saksi mencoba memanggil korban berulang kali namun tidak ada jawaban,” terang Kasi Humas.Selanjutnya saksi mengambil tindakan dengan membuka pintu rumah dan mengecek kamar yang tempat biasanya korban tidur.“Saksi menemukan korban dalam keadaan posisi terlentang serta kondisi meninggal dunia,” beber perwira pangkat dua balak ini.Dari hasil olah TKP, kata Al Amin, tidak ditemukan tanda-tanda tindak kriminal atau kekerasan.“Namun terdapat lebam mayat di sekujur tubuh. Korban memiliki riwayat penyakit asam urat serta gula,” imbunya.Bersadarkan keterangan Kepala Desa, korban pernah diusulkan untuk ditaruh di panti jompo karena tidak mempunyai keluarga tetapi korban menolak.“Korban berpindah pindah tempat tinggal dan hidup sebatang kara serta untuk memenuhi kebutuhan sehari hari mengharpkan belah kasihan tetangga,”Ia menambahkan, dugaan sementara korban meninggal dunia karena penyakit yang dideritanya sebab ditemukan satu kotak obat asam urat.“Aparat desa diwakili Kepala Desa juga menolak untuk dilakukan otopsi dan membuat surat penyataan penolakan,” tutupnya
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– The Identification Unit of the Criminal Investigation Unit of the Banggai Police carried out a crime scene investigation that found a body in one of the residents' houses, Sayambongin Village, Nambo District, Banggai Regency, Sunday (24/12/2023) evening. Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S. Muda, revealed, The body with the initials Sri Sunartun (60), female, was first discovered by a witness at around 19.30 WITA. "At around 18.30 WITA, the male witness Rus was called by one of the residents to check the house where the victim lived," he said. Amin said that the lights in the house where the victim lived were not yet on. "The witness tried to call the victim repeatedly but there was no answer," explained the Head of Public Relations. Next, the witness took action by opening the door of the house and checking the room where the victim usually slept. "The witness found the victim in a supine position and in a dead condition," explained this second rank Balak officer. From the crime scene results, said Al Amin, there were no signs of criminal activity or violence. "However, there were bruises all over the body. "The victim has a history of gout and diabetes," he added. Based on the Village Head's statement, it was proposed that the victim be placed in a nursing home because he had no family but the victim refused. "We feel sorry for the neighbors," he added, while it is suspected that the victim died from the disease he suffered because a box of gout medicine was found. "Village officials represented by the village head also refused to carry out an autopsy and wrote a statement of rejection," he concluded.

title: Misa Natal 2023, Kapolres Banggai dan Unsur Forkopimda Lakukan Kunjungan di Sejumlah Gereja Luwuk
text: Polresbanggai.com–kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, bersamabupati banggaiIr. H. Amirudin Tamoreka dan Unsur Forkopimda melaksanakan pengecekan dan kunjungan ke sejumlah gereja dalam pelaksanaan ibadah malam Natal tahun 2023 di wilayah Kotaluwuk,kabupaten banggai, Minggu (24/12/2023).Selain para Forkopimda, dalam rombongan tersebut diikuti para Forkopimda, Asisten dan Staf ahli Setda Banggai.Kunjungan dan pengecekan itu dilakukan guna bersilahturahmi dan memastikan situasi kamtibmas berjalan aman dan kondusif selama ibadah misa Natal tahun 2023.Adapun gereja yang dikunjungi yakni, GPDI Betlehem, Gereja Katolik Bintang Kejora ST-Yoseph, Gereja Bukit Moria dan Gereja Kristen Indonesia (GKI).Dalam sambutannya, Bupati mengatakan, seluruh unsur Forkopimda mengucapkan selamat hari raya Natal kepada umat kristiani yang saat ini sedang merayakan“Kami berharap perayaan Natal ini dapat membawa sukacita dan damai di Kabupaten Banggai,” ucapnya.Iapun mengajak seluruh lapisan masyarakat untuk peduli sesama serta tetap menjaga harmonisasi dalam kerukunan hidup antar etnis dan agama.“Sehingga pelaksanaan pembangunan daerah dapat berjalan dengan aman dan lancar,” jelas Bupati.Bupati Amirudin mengucapkan terima kasih atas partisipasi jemaat Gereja yang selama ini telah berperan aktif dalam kegiatan-kegiatan sosial.“Terima kasih atas sumbangsi jemaat Gereja yang selama ini telah berperan aktif dalam kegiatan-kegiatan sosial khususnya di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai,” tutupnya.Kegiatan kunjungan ke gereja oleh unsur Forkopimda berakhir pada pukul 21.30 Wita dan berjalan aman, dan lancar
text_en: Polresbanggai.com–Kapolres Banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, together with the Regent of Banggai Ir. H. Amirudin Tamoreka and Forkopimda elements carried out checks and visits to a number of churches during the 2023 Christmas Eve service in the Kotaluwuk area, Banggai Regency, Sunday (24/12/2023). Apart from Forkopimda, the group was attended by Forkopimda, Assistants and Expert staff of the Regional Secretariat of Banggai. The visit and checks were carried out in order to stay in touch and ensure that the security and social order situation was safe and conducive during the 2023 Christmas mass service. The churches visited were, GPDI Bethlehem, ST-Yoseph Morning Star Catholic Church, Bukit Moria Church and the Christian Church Indonesia (GKI). In his speech, the Regent said, all elements of Forkopimda wish a happy Christmas to the Christians who are currently celebrating. "We hope that this Christmas celebration can bring joy and peace to Banggai Regency," he said. He also invited all levels of society to care for others and maintain harmony in inter-ethnic and religious harmony. "So that the implementation of regional development can run safely and smoothly," explained the Regent. Regent Amirudin expressed his gratitude for the participation of the Church congregation who have played an active role in activities. social. "Thank you for the contribution of the Church congregation who have played an active role in social activities, especially in the Banggai Regency area," he concluded. The church visit activity by Forkopimda elements ended at 21.30 WITA and ran safely and smoothly

title: Kapolres Banggai dan Forkopimda Gelar Kunjungan Natal 2023 di Gereja Kota Luwuk
text: Polresbanggai.com–bupati banggaiIr. H Amirudin Tamoreka MM, AIFO, mengajak masyarakat untuk bersama-sama menjaga Pemilu Serentak 2024 agar berjalan aman, damai, tertib dan kondusif.Ajakan itu disampaikan orang pertama dikabupaten banggaiini saat melakukan kunjungan Natal bersama Kapolres AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM dan rombongan di sejumlah gereja di Kotaluwuk, Senin (25/12/2023) pagi.“Tahun ini merupakan tahun politik olehnya itu marilah kita menjaga pesta demokrasi ini sehingga dapat berjalan sebagaimana yang diharapkan,” ajaknya kepada para jemaat.“Jangan menimbulkan hal yang tidak diinginkan bersama, meskipun nanti akan ada perbedaan pilihan,” imbaunya.Bupati pun mengucapkan selama Natal 2023 semoga selalu diberikan kedamaian serta semoga tuhan memberkati kita semua.“Kami mengucapkan selamat merayakan hari natal tahun 2023 semoga selalu diberikan kedamaian serta semoga tuhan memberkati kita semua,” ucapnya.Bupati pun mengucapkan terima kasih kepada seluruh jemaat atas turut sertanya dalam pembangunan daerah Kabupaten Banggai.“Marilah kita selalu menjaga toleransi antar umat beragama agar kedamaian selalui menyertai kita semua,” imbuhnya.Bupati berharap dalam perayaan natal tahun ini dapat membawa sukacita dan keberkahan.“Selamat tahun baru semoga tahun depan akan lebih baik dari tahun ini,” tutupnya.Adapun gereja yang dikunjungi Forkopimda dan rombongan yakni, GKLB Imanuel, GKLB Bukit Zaitun, GKLB Famili Gloria Luwuk dan GBI Efrata
text_en: Polresbanggai.com–Bangani Regent Ir. H Amirudin Tamoreka MM, AIFO, invited the public to work together to safeguard the 2024 Simultaneous Elections so that they run safely, peacefully, orderly and conducive. This invitation was conveyed by the first person in Banggai Regency during a Christmas visit with Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM and his entourage at a number of churches in Kotaluwuk, Monday (25/12/2023) morning. "This year is a political year, so let us protect this democratic party so that it can run as expected," he asked the congregation. "Don't cause undesirable things. together, even though there will be differences in choices," he appealed. The Regent also said that during Christmas 2023, may we always be given peace and may God bless us all. "We wish you a happy Christmas 2023, may you always be given peace and may God bless us all," he said. The Regent also thanked the entire congregation for their participation in the development of the Banggai Regency area. "Let us always maintain tolerance between religious communities so that peace always accompanies us all," he added. The Regent hopes that this year's Christmas celebration can bring joy and blessings "Happy New Year, hopefully next year will be better than this year," he concluded. The churches visited by Forkopimda and their entourage were, GKLB Imanuel, GKLB Bukit Zaitun, GKLB Famili Gloria Luwuk and GBI Efrata

title: Kunjungan ke Gereja Rayakan Natal, Bupati Banggai : Mari Sukseskan Pesta Demokrasi 2024
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Bupati Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka berpesan kepada umat Nasrani untuk bisa menjaga toleransi antar umat beragama, serta menyukseskan pesta demokrasi tahun 2024.Demikian disampaikan Bupati Amirudin Tamoreka didepan Jemaat Gereja Immanuel Luwuk, saat melakukan kunjungan bersama Forkopimda Banggai dan rombongan ke Gereja di Luwuk Banggai yang melaksanakan ibadah Perayaan Natal 2023, Senin (25/12/2023).“Ini yang perlu kita pertahankan, kita tingkatkan terus. Sesungguhnya, kedamaian itu indah. Keindahan itu membawa kehidupan kita sejahtera, seperti hari ini,” harap orang nomor satu di daerah ini.Terpenting sambung bupati, yang sangat dirasakan bahwa toleransi umat beragama di Kabupaten Banggai ini sangat baik, perlu dipertahankan.“Ini terus kita jaga, kalau kita senangtiasa menjaga, saya percaya bahwa kedamaian selalu bersama kita,” tutur bupati.Selanjutnya, Ia sebagai Pemda Banggai berpesan, tahun ini adalah tahun politik, peserta pemilihan umum sekarang ini memasuki dalam masa kampanye.Ia mengajak, untuk manfaatkan tahun politik atau pesta demokrasi ini dengan sebaik-baiknya, janganlah warga saling membenci, memfitnah dan menghina antara partai satu dengan lainnya. Antara kelompok satu dengan kelompok lainnya.“Semua kita terima, kita simpan dihati masing-masing. Kalau kita memilih, nanti di kotak suara kita sampaikan, apa yang kita yakin. Ini yang kita jaga, saya yakin dan percaya, kita semuanya akan selalu damai,” tandasnya. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The Regent of Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka advised Christians to be able to maintain tolerance between religious communities, as well as make the 2024 democratic party a success. in Luwuk Banggai who held the 2023 Christmas Celebration service, Monday (25/12/2023). "This is what we need to maintain, we continue to improve. Indeed, peace is beautiful. "This beauty will bring prosperity to our lives, like today," hoped the number one person in this area. The most important thing, continued the regent, is that it is felt that religious tolerance in Banggai Regency is very good, it needs to be maintained. "We will continue to maintain this, if we are happy, always guard, I believe that peace will always be with us," said the regent. Furthermore, he as the local government of Banggai advised, this year is a political year, general election participants are now entering the campaign period. He invited them to take advantage of this political year or democratic festival by As best as possible, citizens should not hate each other, slander and insult each other's parties. Between one group and another. "We accept everything, we keep it in each other's hearts. If we vote, we will say at the ballot box what we believe. "This is what we maintain, I am sure and believe, we will all always be peaceful," he stressed. RUM

title: Malam Natal di Banggai Sulteng, Sinergitas TNI-Polri Gelar Apel Gabungan
text: luwuk–Kepolisian Resor (Polres) Banggai menggelar apel gabungan kesiapan pelaksanaan tugas pengamanan ibadah malam Natal yang dilaksanakan di halaman Mapolsek Luwuk, Minggu (24/12/2023) malam.Apel yang dipimpin Kabag Opspolres banggaiKompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi SH, SIK, dihadiri para perwira dan Bintara TNI-Polri.Dalam arahannya, Kompol Esti Prasetyo, mengatakan, seluruh personel gabungan TNI-Polri agar melaksanakan tugas dengan rasa ikhlas dan penuh tanggung jawab.“Sasaran patroli yakni gereja yang melaksanakan ibadah natal, Kantor KPU, Bawaslu dan lokasi keramaian,” ungkapnya.Ia meminta personel yang melaksanakan patroli agar berkomunikasi dengan panitia gereja serta para jemaat untuk bersama-sama menjaga kondusifitas kamtibmas.“Saya minta rekan-rekan semua dapat melaksanakan tugasnya dengan baik. Berikan rasa aman dan nyaman bagi saudara-saudara kita yang melaksanakan ibadah malam natal,” terangnya.Dikatakan, apel gabungan ini sebagai wujud sinergitas TNI-Polri untuk dalam menjaga dan menciptakan situasi kamtibmas selama Natal dan Pemilu serentak
text_en: Luwuk–The Banggai Resort Police (Polres) held a joint rally for readiness to carry out security duties for the Christmas Eve service which was held in the courtyard of the Luwuk Police Headquarters, Sunday (24/12/2023) evening. TNI-Polri officers and non-commissioned officers. In his direction, Police Commissioner Esti Prasetyo, said that all joint TNI-Polri personnel must carry out their duties with a sense of sincerity and full responsibility. "The patrol targets are churches holding Christmas services, KPU offices, Bawaslu and crowded locations. " he said. He asked the personnel carrying out patrols to communicate with the church committee and the congregation to work together to maintain the conduciveness of social security and order. "I ask all my colleagues to carry out their duties well. "Give a sense of security and comfort to our brothers and sisters who are carrying out Christmas Eve services," he explained. He said that this joint rally was a form of TNI-Polri synergy to maintain and create a social security and order situation during Christmas and the simultaneous elections.

title: Dua Warga Banggai Sulteng Dilaporkan Hilang di Hutan Ondolu Banggai Sejak 19 Desember 2023
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi ZikriTRIBUNNEWS.COM, BANGGAI- Hartim (49) dan Suar (50), dua petani pencari pohon Gaharu dilaporkan tersesat di hutan puncak Ondolu, Desa Ondo-ondolu, Kecamatan Batui, Kabupaten Banggai, Sulawesi Tengah sejak Selasa (19/12/2023).Hartim dan Suar berasal dari Desa Makapa, Kecamatan Toili Barat, Kabupaten Banggai.Kabar hilangnya kedua korban baru diterima Kantor Pencarian dan Pertolongan Palu, Minggu (24/12/2023) pukul 13.30 Wita.Tim rescue PosSAR Luwukyang berjumlah 4 orang kini sudah berada di lokasi dan langsung mendirikan posko.Tim SAR kemudian melaksanakan assesment dan pencarian awal di lokasi titik start korban hilang."Kemarin pencarian hingga sore pukul 17.00 Wita dengan hasil masih nihil. Pencarian akan dilanjutkan kembali hari ini," ungkap Kepala Basarnas Palu, Andrias Hendrik Johannes, Senin (25/12/2023).Seninpukul 07.00 Wita, pencarian dilanjutkan kembali yang dibantu tim SAR gabungan dari Polsek Batui, Mapala Unismuh, Mapala Untika, KPA dan masyarakat setempat.Pencarian menggunakan metode confinement (pengurungan) dan penyisiran dengan membagi 2 tim.Masing-masing tim melakukan pencarian sesuai titik yang sudah direncanakan sebelumnya dalam rencana operasi SAR.Artikel ini telah tayang diTribunPalu.comdengan judulCari Pohon Gaharu, 2 Petani Dilaporkan Hilang di Hutan Ondolu Banggai
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi ZikriTRIBUNNEWS.COM, BANGGAI- Hartim (49) and Suar (50), two farmers looking for Agarwood trees have reportedly lost their way in the peak forest of Ondolu, Ondo-ondolu Village, Batui District, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi since Tuesday (19/12/2023).Hartim and Suar come from Makapa Village, West Toili District, Banggai Regency. News of the disappearance of the two victims was only received by the Palu Search and Rescue Office, Sunday (24/12/2023) at 13.30 WITA. PosSAR rescue team Luwuk, numbering 4 people, are now at the location and immediately set up a post. The SAR team then carried out an initial assessment and search at the starting point for the missing victim. "Yesterday the search lasted until afternoon at 17.00 WITA with still no results. The search will continue again today," said the Head of Basarnas Palu, Andrias Hendrik Johannes, Monday (25/12/2023). Monday at 07.00 WITA, the search continued again with the assistance of a joint SAR team from the Batui Police, Mapala Unismuh, Mapala Untika, KPA and the local community. The search used the confinement method ( confinement) and combing by dividing 2 teams. Each team carried out a search according to the points previously planned in the SAR operation plan. This article was published on TribunPalu.com with the title Search for Agarwood Trees, 2 Farmers Reported Missing in Ondolu Banggai Forest

title: Misa Natal 2023, TNI-Polri Terjun Amankan Gereja di Banggai Sulteng
text: Polresbanggai.com– Untuk memastikan Ibadah malam Natal berjalan kondusif, personel gabungan TNI-Polri dibantu instansi terkait terjun melaksanakan pengamanan di wilayah hukumpolres banggai, Minggu (24/12/2023) malam.kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, melalui, Kasi Humas Iptu Al Amin, mengungkapkan, pengamanan dilakukan untuk memberikan rasa aman dan nyaman bagi umat kristiani dalam menjalankan ibadah malam Natal.“Ini adalah wujud sinergitas TNI-Polri dan instansi terkait dalam memberi rasa aman dan nyaman bagi para jemaat yang sedang menjalankan ibadah kebaktian malam Natal,” ungkapnya, kepada wartawan seusai apel gabungan di Mapolsekluwuk, Minggu (24/12/2023) malam.Selain melakukan pengamanan, Al Amin menjelaskan, bahwa personel gabungan juga melakukan pateoli gabungan di rumah-rumah ibadah yang melaksanakan ibadah Natal.“Kita juga menerjunkan patroli gabungan TNI-Polri untuk patroli di gereja-gereja khususnya di Kota Luwuk,” jelasnya.Menurutnya, patroli gabungan ini dilakukan selain untuk memberikan rasa aman juga demi memastikan ibadah malam natal berjalan lancar.“Dan untuk mencegah terjadinya kemacetan anggota juga melakukan pengaturan dan pengalihan arus lalu lintas di sekitar gereja,” beber Al Amin.Ia pun mengimbau lapisan masyarakat untuk bersama-sama menjaga toleransi antar umat beragama demi teriptanya stabilitas kamtibmas selama perayaan Natal.“Kami mengimbau elemen masyarakat selalu menjaga toleransi antar umat beragama dikabupaten banggai,” imbaunya
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– To ensure that the Christmas Eve service runs conducively, joint TNI-Polri personnel assisted by related agencies are involved in carrying out security in the legal area of ​​the Banggai Police, Sunday (24/12/2023) evening. Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, via, Head of Public Relations, Inspector Al Amin, said that security was carried out to provide a sense of security and comfort for Christians in carrying out Christmas Eve services. "Christmas Eve," he said to journalists after a joint roll call at the Luwuk Police Headquarters, Sunday (24/12/2023) evening. Apart from providing security, Al Amin explained that joint personnel also carried out joint patioli at houses of worship that were carrying out Christmas services." "We also deployed joint TNI-Polri patrols to patrol churches, especially in Luwuk City," he explained. According to him, this joint patrol was carried out not only to provide a sense of security, but also to ensure that Christmas Eve services ran smoothly. "And to prevent traffic jams for members as well. "regulating and diverting traffic flow around the church," explained Al Amin. He also appealed to levels of society to work together to maintain tolerance between religious communities in order to create stability in social security and order during the Christmas celebration. "We urge elements of society to always maintain tolerance between religious communities in the district. be proud," he said

title: Bupati Banggai Serukan Toleransi dalam Perayaan Natal
text: KABAR LUWUK–Bupati BanggaiSerukan Toleransi dalamPerayaan Natal. Bupati Banggai, Amirudin, menyampaikan pesan toleransi kepadaumat Kristianiyang tengah merayakan Natal di sejumlah gereja di Kota Luwuk pada Senin (25/12/2023).Dalam kunjungannya, Bupati menekankan pentingnya menjaga dan meningkatkan toleransi antarumat beragama diKabupaten Banggai.“Hal terpenting yang sangat kita rasakan adalah toleransi antarumat beragama di Kabupaten Banggai ini sangat baik. Ini yang perlu kita pertahankan, terus kita tingkatkan, karena tanpa toleransi, kita tidak akan bisa merayakan Natal dalam damai seperti hari ini,” ujar Bupati Amirudin saat mengunjungi Gereja Imanuel Luwuk pada pagi hari.Kunjungan Bupati Amirudin tidak hanya terbatas pada Gereja Imanuel, melainkan juga mencakup Gereja Bukit Zaitun, Gereja Toraja Jemaat Tongkongan Madatu, Gereja Famili Gloria, dan jemaat Gereja Bethel Indonesia Efrata yang melaksanakan ibadah natal di Graha Pemda. Dalam setiap kunjungannya, Bupati menyampaikan pesan natal dan mengucapkan selamat merayakan natal serta tahun baru 2024.Bupati Amirudin didampingi oleh sejumlah pejabat Forkopimda dan pimpinan perangkat daerah dalam kunjungan silaturahmi tersebut.Mereka bertujuan untuk memastikan toleransi dan kerukunan antarumat beragama terus tumbuh di Kabupaten Banggai.“Pesan toleransi ini sangat tepat, terutama di tengah situasi menjelang Pemilihan Umum 2024.Mari manfaatkan tahun politik ini dengan sebaik-baiknya, jangan saling membenci atau memfitnah antar partai atau kelompok,” imbau Bupati Amirudin.Bupati Amirudin juga menegaskan komitmen pemerintah daerah untuk terus memperhatikan aspirasi semua kalangan, terutama yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan keagamaan.Umat Kristen pun menyambut kunjungan tersebut dengan apresiasi, menganggapnya sebagai bukti bahwa pimpinan daerah dekat dengan umat.Sebelumnya, pada malam natal, Bupati Amirudin telah mengunjungi sejumlah gereja, seperti GPDI Bethlehem, Gereja Katolik Santa Maria Bintang Kejora, Gereja Bukit Muria, dan Gereja Kristen Indonesia.Kunjungan ini bertujuan untuk memastikan pelaksanaan ibadah malam natal berlangsung kondusif dan aman bagi seluruh umat. ( dkisp) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS–Regent of Banggai Calls for Tolerance in Christmas Celebrations. The Regent of Banggai, Amirudin, conveyed a message of tolerance to Christians who were celebrating Christmas at a number of churches in Luwuk City on Monday (25/12/2023). During his visit, the Regent emphasized the importance of maintaining and increasing tolerance between religious communities in Banggai Regency. I feel that tolerance between religious communities in Banggai Regency is very good. "This is what we need to maintain, continue to improve, because without tolerance, we will not be able to celebrate Christmas in peace like today," said Regent Amirudin when visiting Imanuel Luwuk Church in the morning. Regent Amirudin's visit was not only limited to Immanuel Church, but also includes the Bukit Olive Church, the Toraja Church, the Tongkongan Madatu Congregation, the Gloria Famili Church, and the Bethel Indonesia Efrata Church congregation which held Christmas services at Graha Pemda. "During each visit, the Regent conveys a Christmas message and wishes him a merry Christmas and New Year 2024. Regent Amirudin is accompanied by a number of Forkopimda officials and regional leaders on these friendly visits. They aim to ensure that tolerance and harmony between religious communities continues to grow in Banggai Regency." "This message of tolerance is very appropriate, especially in the midst of the situation leading up to the 2024 General Election. Let's make the best use of this political year, don't hate or slander each other between parties or groups," appealed Regent Amirudin. Regent Amirudin also emphasized the regional government's commitment to continue paying attention aspirations of all groups, especially those related to religious activities. Christians also welcomed the visit with appreciation, considering it as proof that regional leaders are close to the people. Previously, on Christmas Eve, Regent Amirudin had visited a number of churches, such as GPDI Bethlehem, Santa Catholic Church Maria Bintang Kejora, Bukit Muria Church, and the Indonesian Christian Church. This visit aims to ensure that the Christmas Eve service is conducive and safe for all people. ( dkisp) **

title: Perayaan Natal 2023, Bupati Banggai Kunjungi Gereja Ucapkan Selamat Natal
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Masyarakat Kristiani di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai merayakan Natal tahun 2023, Senin (25/12/2023).Jemaat Gereja di Luwuk yang melaksanakan ibadah Natal mendapatkan kunjungan dan ucapan selamat dari Bupati Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka.Seperti di Gereja Immanuel Luwuk, sekira pukul 08.00 Wita, pelaksanaan ibadah Natal 2023 mendapatkan kunjungan langsung Bupati Banggai.Bupati Amirudin didampingi oleh Forkopimda Banggai dan sejumlah pimpinan OPD Banggai diterima langsung oleh Majelis, Pendeta dan Pengurus Gereja Immanuel Luwuk.Dalam sambutannya, Bupati Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka menyampaikan, secara pribadi, keluarga dan Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai mengucapkan selamat merayakan Natal 2023 dan menyongsong Tahun Baru 2024.“Saya atasnama pribadi, keluarga dan pemerintah mengucapkan selamat merayakan Natal, semoga kedamaian dan kesejahteraan akan selalu bersama kita, dan selamat menyambut Tahun Baru 2024. Kita berdoa, semoga kita diberikan umur panjang, sehingga bisa ketemu dengan Natal di tahun yang akan datang,” kata Amirudin kepada Jemaat Gereja Immanuel Luwuk.Ia mengakui, sangat senang sekali dan bangga sekali berada di Gereja Immanuel, tanpa terasa sudah 3 tahun berturut-turut, bisa hadir di Gereja Immanuel untuk merayakan Natal bersama, serta tahun Baru.Oleh karena itu kata orang nomor satu di Kabupaten Banggai ini, mengucapkan terima kasih kepada seluruh jemaat Gereja Immanuel Luwuk yang telah turut serta membangun daerah Kabupaten Banggai.“Terpenting, yang sangat kita rasakan bahwa toleransi umat beragama di Kabupaten Banggai. Ini yang sangat penting,” harap Bupati Banggai, Amirudin. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The Christian community in the Banggai Regency area celebrated Christmas 2023, Monday (25/12/2023). The Church congregation in Luwuk who carried out Christmas services received a visit and congratulations from the Regent of Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka. Like at Immanuel Luwuk Church , at around 08.00 WITA, the 2023 Christmas service received a direct visit from the Regent of Banggai. Regent Amirudin accompanied by Forkopimda Banggai and a number of Banggai OPD leaders were received directly by the Assembly, Pastor and Immanuel Luwuk Church Management. In his speech, the Regent of Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka said , personally, the family and the Regional Government of Banggai Regency wish you a happy Christmas 2023 and welcome the New Year 2024. "On behalf of myself, my family and the government, I wish you a happy Christmas, I hope peace and prosperity will always be with us, and a happy New Year 2024. "We pray that we will be given a long life, so that we can meet Christmas in the coming year," said Amirudin to the Luwuk Immanuel Church congregation. He admitted that he was very happy and very proud to be at Immanuel Church, without realizing it had been 3 years in a row. If you participate, you can attend Immanuel Church to celebrate Christmas together, as well as New Year. Therefore, said the number one person in Banggai Regency, he would like to thank all the congregation of Immanuel Luwuk Church who have participated in developing the Banggai Regency area. "Most importantly, those who We really feel the tolerance of religious communities in Banggai Regency. "This is very important," hoped the Regent of Banggai, Amirudin. RUM

title: Panji Syahputra Ketuai Wadah Balap Motor Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Para tim balap motor (Road Race) se-Kabupaten Banggai melakukan silaturahmi di Hotel Kota pada Sabtu (23/12/2023) malam kemarin.Tampak hadir pada silaturahmi tersebut Panji Syahputra bersama perwakilan dari beberapa tim balap.Di antaranya hadir dalam silaturahmi manager tim, pembalap, mekanik, dan para senior balap motor yang sekaligus memilih Ketua.Terpilih sebagai ketua umum yaitu Panji Syahputra sementara Ketua Harian Ari Indrayana Nasar biasa disapa Arizdo, Wakil Ketua Gusprima, dan Sekretaris Andri Palawa.Pada silahturahmi tersebut sangat serius membahas mengenai sirkuit dan lahan untuk latihan agar menjadi perhatian pemerintah terhadap cabang olahraga balap motor Luwuk.“Sudah dari Tahun 2022 sudah kami ajak semua pembahasan terkait Sirkuit dan lahan untuk latihan, mengundang semua tim atau yang  mewakili masing-masing manager tim, pembalap maupun mekanik serta para senior agar bisa tukar pikiran dengan satu tujuan untuk adanya sirkuit balap motor,”ucap Andri Palawa kepada Banggai Raya,Senin (25/12/2023).Andri Palawa mengatakan, rencananya untuk lahan latihan yang akan diusulkan yaitu halaman parkir depan Kantor Bupati Halimun, sementara untuk target pembangunan Sirkuit ada dua tempat yaitu Pertama di Desa Bunga Kecamatan Luwuk Utara dan di Unit 2 Kecamatan Toili.Untuk struktur kepengurusan wadah balap motor ini sudah terbentuk dan insyaallah akan segera mendaftar secara resmi ke Ikatan Motor Indonesia (IMI) agar kedepannya bisa membuat event balapan motor secara resmi maupun Kegiatan otomotif lainnya di kabupaten Banggai.Panji Syahputra mengatakan musyawarah tersebut telah menentukan pengurus yang berkompeten sesuai di bidangnya bukan sekedar jadi Pengurus, jadi setiap pengurus terpilih harus mampu melaksanakan tugas dan kewajibannya.“Rapat selanjutnya insyaallah akan membahas denah sirkuit Road Race sesuai rencana kita bersama, serta juga mengajak teman-teman yang memang memiliki tim balap motor serta pencinta otomotif untuk sama sama  kita satukan tujuan untuk Otomotif yang Lebih Lagi,” pungkasnya.AGK
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- The motorbike racing (Road Race) teams throughout Banggai Regency held a gathering at the City Hotel on Saturday (23/12/2023) last evening. Panji Syahputra was present at the gathering along with representatives from several racing teams. Gathering of team managers, racers, mechanics, and motorbike racing seniors who also elect the Chairman. Elected as general chairman is Panji Syahputra while Daily Chairman Ari Indrayana Nasar is usually called Arizdo, Deputy Chairman of Gusprima, and Secretary Andri Palawa. At this gathering the discussion was very serious regarding circuits and land for training so that the government pays attention to the Luwuk motorbike racing sport. "From 2022 we have invited all discussions regarding circuits and land for training, inviting all teams or those representing each team manager, racer and mechanic as well as "seniors can exchange ideas with one goal of having a motorbike racing circuit," said Andri Palawa to Banggai Raya, Monday (25/12/2023). Andri Palawa said that the plan for the proposed training ground is the parking lot in front of the Halimun Regent's Office. Meanwhile, the target for building a circuit is two places, namely the first in Bunga Village, North Luwuk District and in Unit 2, Toili District. The management structure for this motorbike racing forum has been formed and God willing, it will soon be officially registered with the Indonesian Motorcycle Association (IMI) so that in the future it can creating official motorbike racing events and other automotive activities in Banggai district. Panji Syahputra said that the deliberation had determined administrators who were competent in their field, not just administrators, so each elected administrator must be able to carry out their duties and obligations. "The next meeting, God willing, will discuss the plan "Road Race circuit according to our plan together, and also inviting friends who have motorbike racing teams and are automotive lovers to work together, we will unite our goal for More Automotive," he concluded. AGK

title: Satgas OMB Tinombala Patroli Gabungan Jaga Pemilu Aman di Banggai
text: Polresbanggai.com –Untuk mendukung keamanan dan kelancaran seluruh tahapan Pemilu 2024, petugas gabungan menggelar patroli pengamanan berskala besarke kantor penyelenggara pemilu termasuk gudang penyimpanan logistik Pemilu 2024.Personel TNI Kodim 1308 LB dan Satgaspolres banggaiyang tergabung dalam Satgas Preventif Operasi Mantab Brata (OMB) Tinombala Polres Banggai secara masif dan berkelanjutan mendatangi objek penting pemilu, Senin (25/12/23).Karendalops OMB Polres Banggai, Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi mengatakan, pada tahap kampanye ini sasaran patroli adalah kantor KPU dan gudang logistik Pemilu serta Bawaslu Banggai.“Saat ini memasuki tahapan kampanye, dan di Gudang logistic sudah ada kelengkapan pemilu lainnya serta proses perakitan kotak suara. Kita patroli gabungan untuk menciptakan pemilu aman dan lancar,” jelasnya.Patroli gabungan ini melibatkan Satgas Preventif Polres Banggai 12 personil, Satgas TNI 2 anggota dan Satgas Kamseltibcarlantas Polres Banggai 3 orang.Kompol Esti yang juga menjabat Kabagops Polres Banggai ini menegaskan, selain patroli rutin, personel juga disiagakan untuk mengamankan Kantor KPU dan Bawaslu Banggai dan gudang logistic selama 24 jam.“Komitmen kami sebagai langkah preventif untuk mengantisipasi potensi gangguan apapun yang dimungkinkan terjadi,” jelasnya.“Dengan keterlibatan semua pihak ini, tahapan kampanye Pemilu di Banggai diharapkan bisa berjalan lancar, aman, dan kondusif,” tandasnya.*HumasPolresBanggai
text_en: Polresbanggai.com – To support the security and smooth running of all stages of the 2024 Election, joint officers carried out large-scale security patrols to the election organizer's office including the 2024 Election logistics storage warehouse. Personnel from the TNI Kodim 1308 LB and the Banggai Police Task Force who are members of the Tinombala Mantab Brata (OMB) Preventive Operation Task Force The Banggai Police massively and continuously visited important election objects, Monday (25/12/23). Banggai Police OMB Commander, Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi said, at this stage of the campaign the targets of the patrols were the KPU office and election logistics warehouse as well as the Banggai Bawaslu. This is entering the campaign stage, and in the logistics warehouse there is already other election equipment and the process of assembling ballot boxes. "We are doing a joint patrol to create a safe and smooth election," he explained. This joint patrol involves the Banggai Police Preventive Task Force with 12 members, the TNI Task Force with 2 members and the Banggai Police Traffic Security and Traffic Security Task Force with 3 people. , personnel were also alerted to secure the Banggai KPU and Bawaslu offices and logistics warehouses for 24 hours. "Our commitment is as a preventive measure to anticipate any potential disturbances that might occur," he explained. "With the involvement of all these parties, it is hoped that the stages of the election campaign in Banggai will be running smoothly, safely and conducively," he said. *Banggai Police Public Relations

title: Keluarga Napi Protes Pemindahan Sepihak Lapas Kelas II B Luwuk
text: KABAR  LUWUK – Keluarga dari tujuh orang narapidana (napi) yang baru-baru ini dipindahkan secara sepihak dari Lapas Kelas II B Luwuk, Sulawesi Tengah, mengungkapkan keberatannya atas tindakan tersebut.Protes tersebut muncul setelah para napi tersebut, antara lain Reza Garusu, Mahmud, Dandi, dan Heri Agung, diangkut pada Jumat, 8 Desember 2023, pukul 04.00 subuh, dalam sebuah operasi yang disebut tanpa adanya pertimbangan kemanusiaan.Seorang anggota keluarga korban, mengungkapkan bahwa tindakan ini bukan yang pertama kali terjadi, dan keluarga mendapatkan informasi mengenai adanya pemindahan lebih lanjut di masa mendatang. Sumber menggambarkan proses pemindahan ini mirip dengan penculikan masa lalu, seperti kejadian G30S PKI.“Sekali lagi, kami sebagai keluarga korban merasa sangat keberatan dengan pemindahan sepihak ini, yang sudah kedua kalinya terjadi. Kami juga menerima informasi bahwa pemindahan serupa akan terus dilakukan,” ujar sumber.Pada kunjungan keluarga ke Lapas pada hari Sabtu lalu, sumber menuturkan bahwa mereka mendapat laporan bahwa pelayanan terhadap para napi tidak merata dan terdapat indikasi pilih kasih. Petugas lapas disebut menindas para narapidana, mengancam pemindahan serta hukuman isolasi yang berkepanjangan jika melakukan pelanggaran kecil.“Para napi diancam akan dipindahkan ke lapas lain dan dimasukkan ke dalam menara berbulan-bulan jika melanggar aturan sekecil apapun. Bahkan, kondisi mandi dan makanan mereka juga disebutkan dikurangi,” ungkap sumber.Sumber informasi  juga menekankan bahwa keluarga korban bersedia memberikan informasi lebih lanjut, namun meminta agar identitas mereka dijaga kerahasiaannya. Mereka mengimbau agar pihak berwenang menyelidiki setiap tindakan pemindahan dan kriminalisasi petugas terhadap warga binaan, demi mencegah terulangnya kejadian tragis sepuluh tahun silam.Kondisi ini menimbulkan keprihatinan serius terhadap hak asasi manusia dan perlakuan yang tidak manusiawi terhadap narapidana. Pemerintah dan lembaga terkait diharapkan segera merespons dan mengambil tindakan untuk menjaga hak-hak para narapidana dan mencegah terjadinya penyalahgunaan wewenang oleh petugas lapas. (IkB)Tag:Keluarga Napi Protes Pemindahan Sepihak Lapas Kelas II B LuwukTopik:Keluarga Napi Protes Pemindahan Sepihak Lapas Kelas II B Luwuk
text_en: LUWUK KABAR – The families of seven inmates who were recently transferred unilaterally from the Luwuk Class II B Prison, Central Sulawesi, expressed their objection to this action. The protest arose after the prisoners, including Reza Garusu, Mahmud, Dandi and Heri Agung were transported on Friday, December 8 2023, at 04.00 in the morning, in an operation that was said to have no humanitarian considerations. A member of the victim's family revealed that this was not the first time this had happened, and the family received information regarding the transfer. more in the future. The source described this transfer process as similar to past kidnappings, such as the G30S PKI incident. "Once again, we as the victim's family strongly object to this unilateral transfer, which is the second time this has happened. "We also received information that similar transfers will continue to be carried out," said the source. During a family visit to the prison last Saturday, the source said that they received reports that service to prisoners was uneven and there were indications of favoritism. Prison officials are said to be oppressing prisoners, threatening transfers and prolonged solitary confinement if they commit minor violations. "Prisoners are threatened with being transferred to another prison and put in a tower for months if they violate even the slightest rules. "In fact, their bathing and food conditions are also said to be reduced," said the source. The information source also emphasized that the victim's family was willing to provide further information, but asked that their identities be kept confidential. They appealed to the authorities to investigate every act of transfer and criminalization of officers against inmates, in order to prevent a repeat of the tragic incident ten years ago. This condition raises serious concerns about human rights and inhumane treatment of prisoners. The government and related institutions are expected to immediately respond and take action to safeguard the rights of prisoners and prevent abuse of authority by prison officers. (IkB) Tag: Prisoner's Family Protests Unilateral Transfer of Class II B Luwuk Prison Topic: Prisoner's Family Protests Unilateral Transfer of Class II B Luwuk Prison

title: Amankan Nataru 2023-2024, Wakapolres Banggai Minta Semua Pihak Bersinergi
text: luwuk–Wakapolres Banggai Kompol Pino Ary SH, SIK, MH, meminta aparat TNI-Polri, Pemda dan stakeholder terkait untuk bersinergi mengamankan agenda nasional perayaan Natal 2023 dan tahun baru 2024 (Nataru).“Ini merupakan kegiatan rutin tahunan yang pengamanannya terpusat di rumah ibadah, tempat mudik dan lokasi keramaian,” ungkap Wakapolres saat membuka Rapat Koordinasi (Rakor) Lintas Sektoral di Aula Rupatama, Mapolres Banggai, Rabu (20/12/2023) pagi.Ia menjelaskan, pengamanan ini merupakan bagian dari Operasi Kepolisian terpusat dengan sandi Lilin-2023 yang dilaksanakan secara serentak di seluruh indonesia.“Untuk perayaan Natal 2023 dan penyambutan Tahun Baru 2024 kita fokus di rumah ibadah dan lokasi keramaian demi keselamatan masyarakat,” jelasnya.“Intinya kita fokus pengamanan kegiatan masyarakat,” terang orang kedua di Mapolres Banggai ini.Dirinya menambahkan, bahwa Rakor ini dilaksanakan guna menyamankan persepsi dalam memberikan rasa aman dan keselatamatan masyarakat.Sementara itu,bupati banggaidiwakili Staf Ahli, Rudi Bullah, mengatakan, Rakor ini sangat dibutuhkan guna sinergitas demi rasa aman serta nyaman selama natal dan tahun baru.“Pada intinya Pemkab Banggai siap memback up total demi kelancaran pengamanan natal dan tahun baru,” tandasnya
text_en: Luwuk–Deputy Chief of Banggai Police Commissioner Pino Ary SH, SIK, MH, asked the TNI-Polri, Regional Government and related stakeholders to work together to secure the national agenda for celebrating Christmas 2023 and New Year 2024 (Nataru). "This is an annual routine activity where security is centered at home worship, homecoming places and crowded locations," said the Deputy Chief of Police when opening the Cross-Sectoral Coordination Meeting (Rakor) in the Rupatama Hall, Banggai Police Headquarters, Wednesday (20/12/2023) morning. He explained that this security was part of a centralized Police Operation with code. Lilin-2023 which will be held simultaneously throughout Indonesia. "For the 2023 Christmas celebration and the 2024 New Year celebration, we will focus on places of worship and crowded locations for the sake of community safety," he explained. "Essentially, we will focus on securing community activities," explained the second person at the Police Headquarters. Proud of this. He added that this Coordination Meeting was carried out to comfort perceptions in providing a sense of security and safety for the community. Meanwhile, the Regent of Pride, represented by Expert Staff, Rudi Bullah, said, This Coordination Meeting is really needed for synergy for a sense of security and comfort during Christmas and New Year. "In essence, the Banggai Regency Government is ready to provide total backup for the smooth security of Christmas and New Year," he stressed.

title: Tim Jatanras Polres Banggai Tangkap Residivis Penggelapan Sepeda Motor
text: luwuk–Tim Jatanras Satreskrimpolres banggaikembali menangkap TH alias Tatu (56) warga Kelurahan Simpong, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan,kabupaten banggai, Selasa (19/12/2023) sekitar pukul 18.30 Wita.TH ini diringkus Tim Jatanras lantaran diiduga melakukan tindak pidana penggelapan sepeda motor milik korban.Kasat Reskrim AKP Tio Tondy, mengungkapkan, kasus ini terjadi pada Senin 18 Desember 2023 sekitar pukul 18.30 Wita, dimana saat itu pelaku meminjam motor milik Ahmad Husen Uhuna pergi ke Kelurahan Kaleke (Luwuk 2) untuk mengambil uang.“Namun motor yang dipinjam tidak kunjung dikembalikan,” ungkap AKP Tio.Usai menerima laporan korban, lanjut perwira pangkat tiga balak ini, Tim Jatanras melakukan penyelidikan dan mendapatkan informasi bahwa pelaku sedang berada di Desa Pandan Wangi Kecamatan Toili Barat.“Tanpa menunggu lama, kami bergerak cepat melakukan penangkapan,” sebutnya.Berdasarkan hasil interogasi, ia menuturkan, bahwa pelaku mengakui perbuatannya. Dan diamankan dua sepeda motor yakni Honda Beat warna hitam DN 5391 RC milik Moh. Faisal Patawe dan Yamaha Seon RC tipe 1 LB warna kuning DN 3860 RE milik Ahmad Husen Uhuna.Saat ini, kata dia, pelaku telah mendekam di sel tahanan Mapolres Banggai guna menjalani pemeriksaan dan pengembangan lebih lanjut.“Pelaku adalah salah satu residivis dan sudah sering melakukan perbuatan yang sama maupun pencurian di beberapa TKP dalam kota Luwuk,” pungkasnya
text_en: Luwuk–The Jatanras Satreskrimpolres team again arrested TH alias Tatu (56), a resident of Simpong Village, South Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, Tuesday (19/12/2023) at around 18.30 WITA. TH was arrested by the Jatanras Team because he was suspected of committing the crime of motorbike embezzlement belonging to the victim. Head of Criminal Investigation Unit, AKP Tio Tondy, revealed that this case occurred on Monday 18 December 2023 at around 18.30 WITA, at which time the perpetrator borrowed Ahmad Husen Uhuna's motorbike and went to Kaleke Village (Luwuk 2) to take money. "But the motorbike was borrowed and never returned," said AKP Tio.
