Amirudin, MM, AIFO menggelar Apel Bersama Awal Kerja Tahun 2024, Selasa (2/1/2024) di Tribun Mirqan Sport Center Luwuk.Dalam sambutannya, Bupati menegaskan bahwa tahun ini merupakan tahun terakhir masa kepemimpinannya, Ia berkomitmen untuk menunjukkan sistem disiplin kepada seluruh Aparatur Sipil Negara (ASN) di Kabupaten Banggai.Upaya menciptakan sistem disiplin, Bupati memberikan peringatan tegas terhadap pegawai Eselon II dan Eselon III yang tidak dapat memberikan alasan jelas atas kelambatannya pada apel pagi ini.Dengan tegas, ia menyatakan bahwa bagi yang terbukti lalai, akan dinonjobkan untuk beberapa bulan ke depan.“Sebagaimana komitmen saya pada minggu lalu, kalau hari ini ada yang libur tanpa alasan yang jelas, Kalau dia Eselon II dan Eselon III, Dengan sangat terpaksa saya harus nonjobkan untuk beberapa bulan kedepan,” tegas Amirudin.Bupati Amirudin juga menyoroti beberapa indikator kinerja yang menjadi fokus kepemimpinannya, diantaranya penurunan angka stunting, dan penghapusan angka kemiskinan ekstrim, Ia menegaskan bahwa semua target ini harus dicapai di tahun ini.“Stunting kita harus nol, angka kemiskinan ekstrim juga harus nol, ini semua harus kita laksanakan dengan baik,” ujar Bupati Banggai.Dalam menggarisbawahi urgensi pencapaian target-target tersebut, Bupati menetapkan agenda evaluasi setiap minggu terhadap beberapa OPD Kab. Banggai bersama Wakil Bupati dan didukung oleh Sekretaris Daerah Kabupaten Banggai.“Ada beberapa dinas yang telah saya tetapkan bahwa setiap minggu meeting bersama saya dan wakil bupati dibantu Sekab, Kita akan mengevaluasi setiap minggu jangan sampai nanti di akhir tahun baru kita kejar-kejaran untuk melaksanakan pekerjaan,” jelas Bupati Amirudin.Dengan peningkatan kinerja ASN dengan , Bupati berharap penyelesaian pekerjaan sebelum akhir Desember agar seluruh masyarakat dapat menikmati Anggaran Pendapatan dan Belanja Daerah (APBD) yang telah ditetapkan.“Kalau bisa sebelum akhir Desember semua pekerjaan kita sudah selesai, dan Insya Allah seluruh masyarakat dapat menikmati APBD yang telah kita tetapkan,” ujar Amirudin.Sebagai upaya lanjutan untuk menjaga profesionalisme ASN, apel bersama ini kemudian dilanjutkan dengan pemeriksaan urin untuk deteksi narkoba.Langkah ini diarahkan untuk menjaga integritas ASN serta melindungi kepentingan bersama dalam memberikan pelayanan terbaik kepada masyarakat.*Tim Liputan Dinas Komunikasi, Informatika, Statistik, dan Persandian (DKISP) Kabupaten Banggai.
text_en: In order to start 2024, the Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO held a Joint Call for the Beginning of Work in 2024, Tuesday (2/1/2024) at the Luwuk Mirqan Sport Center Tribune. In his speech, the Regent emphasized that this year was the last year of his leadership, he was committed to demonstrating a system of discipline to all State Civil Apparatus (ASN) in Banggai Regency. In an effort to create a disciplinary system, the Regent gave a firm warning to Echelon II and Echelon III employees who were unable to provide clear reasons for their slowness at this morning's rally. Firmly, he stated that for those who were proven If you are negligent, you will be unemployed for the next few months. "As was my commitment last week, if someone has a day off today without a clear reason, if they are Echelon II or Echelon III, I will be forced to leave them for the next few months," said firmly. Amirudin. Regent Amirudin also highlighted several performance indicators that were the focus of his leadership, including reducing stunting rates and eliminating extreme poverty rates. He emphasized that all of these targets must be achieved this year. "Our stunting must be zero, the extreme poverty rate must also be zero, "We must carry out all of this well," said the Regent of Banggai. In underlining the urgency of achieving these targets, the Regent set an agenda for weekly evaluation of several District OPDs. Banggai together with the Deputy Regent and supported by the Regional Secretary of Banggai Regency. "There are several agencies that I have determined that every week a meeting with me and the deputy regent will be assisted by the District Secretary. We will evaluate every week so that at the end of the new year we are racing to implement work," explained Regent Amirudin. By increasing the performance of ASN with , the Regent hopes that the work will be completed before the end of December so that the entire community can enjoy the Regional Revenue and Expenditure Budget (APBD) that has been determined. "If possible, before the end of December, all our work will be completed, and "God willing, the whole community can enjoy the APBD that we have determined," said Amirudin. As a further effort to maintain the professionalism of ASN, this joint rally was then followed by urine checks for drug detection. This step is directed at maintaining the integrity of ASN and protecting mutual interests in providing services. the best for the community.

title: Pembukaan P5P3RA, KakanKemenag Banggai: Membentuk Sikap Mandiri  Siswa MAN 1 Banggai
text: Luwuk (Kemenag Sulteng),Sebagai generasi hebat harus mampu mengembangkan diri dan kreativitas untuk menjawab tantangan zaman dengan membentuk dan menumbuhkan sikap mandiri sejak usia muda. Agar nantinya tak terjebak dengan pergaulan yang merusak diri, keluarga, dan bangsa.Demikian disampaikan Kepala Kantor Kementerian Agama Kabupaten Banggai Drs. H. Ma’sum, MM sebelum menggunting pita tanda membuka kegiatan project penguatan profil pelajar pancasila dan Rahmatan Lil Alamin  (P5P3RA) yang di selenggarakan Madrasah Aliyah Negeri 1 Banggai (MAN 1 Banggai). Rabu(20/12/2023).Ma'sum mengapresiasi dan  sangat berterima kasih kepada siswa siswi yang mampu membuat kegiatan di akhir tahun. Mampu memperlihatkan hal-hal positif pada kegiatan  P5P3RA. Harapannya, semoga terus dilaksanakan tiap tahunnya dan di publikasikan agar sekolah-sekolah lainnya bisa mengikuti. Bila perlu bersama sama berinovasi atau bisa jadi menjadi ekonomi kreatif para siswa, ungkapnya.Dalam sambutannya Kepala MAN 1 Banggai Muhammad Basri menyampaikan kegiatan P5P3RA sudah dua kali dilaksanakan sebagai pengembangan minat dan bakat dengan menghadirkan karya-karya sebagai wujud/implementasi kurikulum merdeka semester genap dan ganjil tahun pelajaran 2023/2024.Lanjutnya, dengan memperlihatkan kreatifitas dan inovasi mengharapkan para siswa madrasah ke depannya nanti menjadi pionir, berkontribusi memberikan hal hal bermanfaat untuk masyarakat serta menseriusi keahliannya hingga mampu menciptakan usaha-usah kreatif baik dalam bidang wirausaha atau bentuk seni menjaga nilai nilai warisan budaya.Basri juga mengucapkan terima kasih kepada guru guru yang selalu mendampingi hingga menghasilkan kegiatan yang bermanfaat dan sebagai pengembangan diri siswa, imbuhnya.Antusias siswa terlihat dalam mensukseskan acara salah satunya saat mementaskan pertunjukan kearifan lokal yaitu adat istiadat suku Saluan dalam proses perkawinan. Selain itu pagelaran fashion show para siswa kelas XII. Dari keterangan Kartini salah satu guru MAN 1 Banggai, bahwa pakaian yang dikenakan terbuat dari plastik dan koran bekas yang murni hasil karya siswa. selain itu mereka memperlihatkan poster dan lukisan di kain Canvas.Selain pentas seni dalam kewirausahaan mereka menampilkan produk keripik pisang, sambel cumi, stik pisang coklat, dan keripik ubi. Hingga menampilkan membuat lampu emergency dari baterai bekas.Hadir dalam kegiatan tersebut para perwakilan pemerintah daerah, komite madrasah, orang tua siswa, dan Kepala Seksi Pendidikan Islam Kemenag Kabupaten Banggai Hanisa Dg. Masiseng. Editor: -Fotografer: -
text_en: Luwuk (Ministry of Religion, Central Sulawesi), As a great generation we must be able to develop ourselves and be creative to answer the challenges of the times by forming and cultivating an independent attitude from a young age. So that later you don't get caught up in relationships that damage yourself, your family and your nation. This was conveyed by the Head of the Banggai Regency Ministry of Religion Office, Drs. H. Ma'sum, MM before cutting the ribbon marking the opening of the project activity to strengthen the profile of Pancasila and Rahmatan Lil Alamin students  (P5P3RA) which was organized by Madrasah Aliyah Negeri 1 Banggai (MAN 1 Banggai). Wednesday (20/12/2023). Ma'sum appreciates and is very grateful to the students who were able to create activities at the end of the year. Able to show positive things in the activities of  P5P3RA. The hope is that it will continue to be implemented every year and published so that other schools can follow suit. If necessary, we can innovate together or it could become a creative economy for students, he said. In his speech, the Head of MAN 1 Banggai Muhammad Basri said that P5P3RA activities had been carried out twice to develop interests and talents by presenting works as a manifestation/implementation of the independent curriculum for the even semester and odd academic year 2023/2024. Furthermore, by showing creativity and innovation, it is hoped that madrasah students in the future will become pioneers, contribute to providing useful things for society and take their skills seriously so that they are able to create creative businesses both in the field of entrepreneurship or art forms of preserving values. the value of cultural heritage. Basri also expressed his gratitude to the teachers who always accompanied them to produce useful activities and for students' self-development, he added. The students' enthusiasm was seen in making the event a success, one of which was when they staged a performance of local wisdom, namely the customs of the Saluan tribe in the marriage process. Apart from that, there was a fashion show for class XII students. According to Kartini, one of the MAN 1 Banggai teachers, the clothes worn were made from plastic and used newspapers which were purely the work of students. Apart from that, they showed posters and paintings on canvas. Apart from artistic performances in entrepreneurship, they displayed banana chips, squid chili sauce, chocolate banana sticks and sweet potato chips. To the point of showing how to make emergency lights from used batteries. Present at this activity were representatives of the regional government, madrasah committee, parents of students, and the Head of the Islamic Education Section of the Ministry of Religion, Banggai Regency, Hanisa Dg. Masiseng. Editor: -Photographer: -

title: Gempa 5,1 Magnitudo Guncang Banggai Kepulauan, Sulteng
text: Gempa bumi berkekuatan 5,1 magnitudo mengguncang Kabupaten Banggai Kepulauan, Sulawesi Tengah, Minggu (7/1) petang. Getaran dirasakan pukul 17.38 WIB atau 18.38 Wita. Pusat gempa berada di 86 km barat daya Banggai Kepulauan. "Kedalaman 10 km," tulis BMKG di akun X.
text_en: An earthquake measuring 5.1 magnitude rocked Banggai Islands Regency, Central Sulawesi, Sunday (7/1) evening. The vibration was felt at 17.38 WIB or 18.38 WIT. The epicenter of the earthquake was 86 km southwest of the Banggai Islands. "10 km depth," wrote BMKG on the X account.

title: Bupati Banggai Terima Bantuan CSR dari Kalla Toyota, 50 Tempat Sampah untuk Keberlanjutan Lingkungan
text: KABAR LUWUK –Bupati BanggaiTerima BantuanCSR dari Kalla Toyota,50 Tempat Sampah untuk Keberlanjutan Lingkungan.Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM., AIFO, menerima bantuanCorporate Social Responsibility (CSR)dari Kalla Toyota, yang diserahkan di Halaman Kantor Bupati Banggai pada Senin (8/1/2024).Bantuan berupa 50 tempat sampah ini diharapkan dapat memberikan kontribusi signifikan untuk menjaga kebersihan dan mendukung upaya keberlanjutan lingkungan di Kabupaten Banggai.Dalam acara serah terima, Bupati Amirudin menyampaikan apresiasinya kepada Kalla Toyota atas kontribusi yang dianggap bermakna bagi masyarakat.Ia menjelaskan bahwa tempat sampah ini akan didistribusikan khususnya di daerah perkotaan dan beberapa wilayah tertentu sebagai bagian dari program PINASA.Bupati Amirudin menekankan pentingnya kolaborasi antara sektor swasta dan pemerintah dalam mengatasi tantangan lingkungan.Ia menyambut baik kontribusi Kalla Toyota sebagai langkah positif untuk mendorong lingkungan hidup yang lebih bersih dan sehat di Kabupaten Banggai.Dengan adanya 50 tempat sampah ini, diharapkan akan terjadi peningkatan dalam praktik pengelolaan sampah yang bertanggung jawab di Kabupaten Banggai. Pemerintah daerah berkomitmen untuk terus mendorong kerja sama berkelanjutan dengan sektor swasta guna mengatasi berbagai tantangan sosial dan lingkungan demi kemajuan bersama.Bantuan CSR dari Kalla Toyota ini menjadi bukti konkret dari sinergi antara pemerintah daerah dan perusahaan swasta untuk menciptakan lingkungan yang bersih, sehat, dan berkelanjutan di Kabupaten Banggai.( dkisp)**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Regent Receives CSR Assistance from Kalla Toyota, 50 Trash Cans for Environmental Sustainability. Banggai Regent, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM., AIFO, received Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) assistance from Kalla Toyota, which was handed over at the Banggai Regent's Office Yard on Monday (8/1/2024). This assistance in the form of 50 trash cans is expected to make a significant contribution to maintaining cleanliness and supporting environmental sustainability efforts in Banggai Regency. During the handover ceremony, Regent Amirudin expressed his appreciation to Kalla Toyota for his contribution which was considered meaningful to the community. He explained that these trash bins would be distributed, especially in urban areas and certain areas as part of the program PINASA. Regent Amirudin emphasized the importance of collaboration between the private sector and government in overcoming environmental challenges. He welcomed Kalla Toyota's contribution as a positive step to encourage a cleaner and healthier living environment in Banggai Regency. With the existence of these 50 trash bins, it is hoped that there will be an increase in responsible waste management practices in Banggai Regency. The regional government is committed to continuing to encourage sustainable cooperation with the private sector to overcome various social and environmental challenges for mutual progress. This CSR assistance from Kalla Toyota is concrete proof of the synergy between regional governments and private companies to create a clean, healthy and sustainable environment in Banggai Regency.(dkisp)**

title: Tak Jaga Jarak Hingga Seruduk Truk, Pemotor Asal Batui Dilarikan ke RSUD Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Pengendara motor di Kintom terjatuh setelah menabrak bagian belakang truk, Minggu (7/1/2024) sore.Korban berinisial LF (20) merupakan seorang mahasiswa, asal Desa Honbola, Kecamatan Batui, Banggai ini terlempar dari atas motor dan jatuh membentur aspal.Beruntung, korban masih selamat, meski mengalami luka lecet di tangan kiri dan benturan pada kepala.Saat itu juga korban ditolong warga dan personil Polsek Kintom dan dilarikan ke rumah sakit umum daerah Luwuk.Kapolsek Kintom AKP Laata, SH menjelaskan, peristiwa kecelakaan terjadi di Jalan Trans Sulawesi Desa Dimpalon Baru tepatnya dijembatan Hako, bermula saat korban melaju dengan sepeda motor N Max DN 6511 RL dari arah Nambo menuju Batui.Tanpa diduga, sebuah truk Dina DN 8491 CS yang dikemudiakan RP (46) warga Kota Palu juga bergerak searah di depannya tiba-tiba mengurangi kecepatan karena kondisi jalan rusak (jembatan belum teraspal).Karena jaraknya sudah terlalu dekat, motor korban langsung menghantam bagian belakang truk. Akibatnya, korban langsung terlempar jatuh dan menderita luka-luka.“Kesimpulan sementara penyebab kecelakaan adalah pemotor tidak memperhitungkan jarak dengan kendaraan didepannya,” kata Laata.Sementara itu barang bukti kini diamankan di Mapolsek Kintom. Begitu pula dengan sopir truck guna dimintai keterangannya.(*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- A motorbike rider in Kintom fell after hitting the back of a truck, Sunday (7/1/2024) afternoon. The victim with the initials LF (20) was a student, from Honbola Village, Batui District, Banggai. He was thrown from the motorbike and fell on it. asphalt. Luckily, the victim still survived, although he suffered abrasions on his left hand and a blow to his head. At that time, the victim was helped by residents and Kintom Police personnel and rushed to the Luwuk regional general hospital. Kintom Police Chief AKP Laata, SH explained that the accident occurred on the Trans Sulawesi Road, Dimpalon Baru Village, precisely at the Hako bridge, it started when the victim was traveling on the N Max DN 6511 RL motorbike from Nambo towards Batui. Unexpectedly, a Dina DN 8491 CS truck driven by RP (46), a resident of Palu City, was also moving in the same direction. in front of him suddenly reduced his speed because the road was damaged (the bridge was not yet paved). Because the distance was too close, the victim's motorbike immediately hit the back of the truck. As a result, the victim was immediately thrown and suffered injuries. "The temporary conclusion that the cause of the accident was that the motorbike did not take into account the distance to the vehicle in front of him," said Laata. Meanwhile, the evidence is now being secured at the Kintom Police Headquarters. Likewise with truck drivers who need to be questioned. (*)

title: Operasi Mantap Brata Polres Banggai Kepulauan, Patroli Presisi Ciptakan Rasa Aman dan Kondusifitas Kamtibmas
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Operasi Mantap Brata Polres Banggai Kepulauan,Patroli Presisi Ciptakan Rasa Aman dan Kondusifitas Kamtibmas.Polres Banggai Kepulauankembali menghadirkan keamanan dan kenyamanan bagi masyarakat dengan melaksanakanOperasi Mantap Brata 2023-2024.Dalam rangka mendukungsituasi Kamtibmasyang kondusif menjelangPemilu 2023-2024, Personil Operasi Mantap Brata meluncurkan Patroli Presisi menggunakan kendaraan roda 4 ke lokasi yang dianggap rawan. Senin 8/1/2024.Kegiatan ini merespons perintah Kapolres Bangkep AKBP Jimmy Marthin Simanjuntak S.I.K, yang mengajak masyarakat untuk bersama-sama membangun sistem keamanan lingkungan.Kapolres mendorong partisipasi masyarakat dalam mendukung keamanan, termasuk menghidupkan kembali Poskamling yang kurang berfungsi.Satgas Preventif Operasi Mantap Brata Sat Sabhara turut ambil bagian dalam kegiatan ini dengan menggelar Patroli, dipimpin langsung oleh KBO SAT SABHARA IPTU Mukhlis SH.Dua unit kendaraan roda 4 dinas bersama personil gabungan lainnya dipergunakan untuk patroli ke Kantor KPU Bangkep, Kantor Bawaslu Bangkep, dan Gudang Logistik BPU di wilayah hukum Polres Bangkep.KBO SHABARA dan personil gabungan memberikan pesan-pesan kamtibmas secara humanis kepada masyarakat dan mendorong pembangunan sistem keamanan lingkungan.Mereka juga mengingatkan instansi dan pemerintah untuk meningkatkan kewaspadaan terhadap tindakan kriminal di sekitarnya.IPTU Mukhlis SH menjelaskan bahwa tujuan patroli ini adalah memberikan rasa aman bagi instansi dan masyarakat. Keberadaan polisi di lapangan diharapkan dapat menjaga kondusifitas situasi Kamtibmas. Patroli juga menjadi sarana komunikasi dengan masyarakat, menunjukkan kepedulian polisi terhadap keamanan masyarakat sehari-hari.Dengan adanya kegiatan Patroli Presisi ini, Polres Bangkep berharap dapat menekan tindakan kriminalitas dan menciptakan Kamtibmas yang aman dan kondusif.Melalui langkah-langkah ini, Polres Banggai Kepulauan menegaskan komitmennya untuk menjaga keamanan dan kenyamanan masyarakat di wilayah hukumnya. **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Islands Police's Operation Mantap Brata, Precision Patrols Create a Sense of Security and Community Security and Order Conduciveness. Banggai Islands Police is again bringing security and comfort to the community by carrying out Operation Mantap Brata 2023-2024. In order to support a conducive social and security and order situation ahead of the 2023-2024 Election, Operation Mantap Brata Personnel launching Precision Patrols using 4-wheeled vehicles to locations considered vulnerable. Monday 8/1/2024. This activity responds to orders from Bangkep Police Chief AKBP Jimmy Marthin Simanjuntak S.I.K, who invites the community to work together to build an environmental security system. Mantap Brata Sat Sabhara also took part in this activity by holding a patrol, led directly by KBO SAT SABHARA IPTU Mukhlis SH. Two units of official 4-wheeled vehicles together with other joint personnel were used to patrol the Bangkep KPU Office, Bangkep Bawaslu Office, and the BPU Logistics Warehouse in the jurisdiction of the Bangkep Police. KBO SHABARA and joint personnel provide humane security and social security messages to the community and encourage the development of an environmental security system. They also remind agencies and the government to increase awareness of criminal acts in their surroundings. IPTU Mukhlis SH explained that the purpose of this patrol is to provide a sense of security for the institution and the community. It is hoped that the presence of police in the field can maintain a conducive security and order situation. Patrols are also a means of communication with the community, showing the police's concern for everyday community security. With this Precision Patrol activity, the Bangkep Police hopes to suppress criminal acts and create a safe and conducive security and social order. Through these steps, the Banggai Islands Police emphasizes its commitment to maintaining the security and comfort of the people in its jurisdiction. **

title: Ketua DPD Partai Golkar Kabupaten Banggai, Menyongsong Pemilu dengan Soliditas dan Demokrasi
text: “Ir. Benny Tamoreka Siap Kuningkan Kabupaten Banggai”KABAR LUWUK –Ketua DPD Partai Golkar Kabupaten Banggai,Menyongsong Pemilu denganSoliditas dan Demokrasi. Ir. Benny Tamoreka,Ketua Dewan Pimpinan Daerah (DPD) Partai GolkarKabupaten Banggai, menegaskan kesiapan partainya menghadapiPemilihan Umummendatang.Dalam keterangan persnya, Benny menyampaikan bahwa soliditas dan strategi menjadi kunci utama dalam mengawal kinerja tim di tingkat Provinsi maupun di tingkat daerah, khususnya di Kabupaten Banggai.Hal ini disampaikan kepada awak media saat usai melakukan penyerahan Bendera Partai Golkar di disekretariat Komplek Halimun, Senin 8/1/2024.“Partai Golkar tetap solid dan selalu memantau semua kerja tim, baik itu di tingkat Provinsi maupun tingkat daerah, khususnya di Kabupaten Banggai,” ujar Benny Tamoreka.Mengenai keputusan Dewan Pimpinan Pusat (DPP) terkait majunya Syamsul Bahri Mang sebagai calon Bursa Bupati Banggai, Benny Tamoreka menyatakan dukungan penuh.“Apapun keputusan DPP, tetap kita dukung dan siap untuk mengkampanyekan. Solidaritas partai adalah kunci keberhasilan dalam perhelatan politik ini,” tegasnya.Dalam merancang strategi untuk memenangkan Partai Golkar di Kabupaten Banggai, Benny Tamoreka menyoroti proses perekrutan kader dan calon legislatif (Caleg).Kabupaten Banggai telah menetapkan beberapa syarat yang harus dipenuhi oleh Caleg Partai Golkar, termasuk menjadi kader partai, tokoh masyarakat di dapil masing-masing, dan memiliki pendidikan setara.“Proses perekrutan ini menjadi langkah awal untuk memastikan bahwa calon dari Partai Golkar memiliki kualifikasi yang memadai, baik sebagai kader partai maupun tokoh masyarakat,” paparnya.Benny Tamoreka menekankan pentingnya peran kader partai dan tokoh masyarakat dalam mempengaruhi opini publik dan membentuk konsep arah politik.“Kader dan tokoh masyarakat yang terlibat dapat menjadi ujung tombak dalam membangun citra positif Partai Golkar di masyarakat,” tambahnya.Dengan tagline “Golkar Menang Rakyat Sejahtera,” Partai Golkar berkomitmen membuktikan bahwa partai ini adalah cerminan demokrasi dan jaminan demokrasi Indonesia.Benny Tamoreka menekankan bahwa partai ini bukan milik segelintir orang, melainkan milik seluruh rakyat Indonesia.Ia juga menegaskan keterlibatan semua pihak, termasuk caleg, dalam menyampaikan solusi bagi berbagai masalah masyarakat.“Partai Golkar adalah partai yang mengedepankan prinsip demokrasi Indonesia, dengan pembatasan dua periode kecuali ada intervensi pusat untuk mengakomodasi prestasi kader yang luar biasa,” ungkap Benny Tamoreka, menjelaskan komitmen partainya terhadap prinsip demokrasi yang berlaku di Indonesia.Seiring dengan perkembangan politik di Kabupaten Banggai, Partai Golkar siap berkontribusi dalam mewujudkan pesta demokrasi yang berkualitas dan memberikan keadilan bagi seluruh rakyat Indonesia.  ( MAM ) **Penulis : Imam Muslik  ( Jurnalis Luwuk )
text_en: “Ir. Benny Tamoreka Ready to Make Banggai Regency Yellow” LUWUK NEWS – Chairman of the Golkar Party DPD Banggai Regency, Welcomes the Election with Solidity and Democracy. Ir. Benny Tamoreka, Chairman of the Regional Leadership Council (DPD) of the Golkar Party, Banggai Regency, emphasized his party's readiness to face the upcoming General Election. In his press statement, Benny said that solidity and strategy are the main keys in overseeing the team's performance at the provincial and regional levels, especially in Banggai Regency. This was conveyed to the media crew after handing over the Golkar Party flag at the Halimun Complex secretariat, Monday 8/1/2024. "The Golkar Party remains solid and always monitors all team work, both at the provincial and regional levels, especially in Banggai Regency ," said Benny Tamoreka. Regarding the decision of the Central Leadership Council (DPP) regarding the advancement of Syamsul Bahri Mang as a candidate for the Banggai Regent Exchange, Benny Tamoreka expressed his full support. "Whatever the DPP's decision is, we still support it and are ready to campaign. "Party solidarity is the key to success in this political event," he stressed. In designing a strategy to win the Golkar Party in Banggai Regency, Benny Tamoreka highlighted the process of recruiting cadres and legislative candidates (Caleg). Banggai Regency has set several conditions that must be fulfilled by Golkar Party legislative candidates. , including being party cadres, community figures in their respective electoral districts, and having equivalent education. "This recruitment process is the first step to ensure that candidates from the Golkar Party have adequate qualifications, both as party cadres and community figures," he explained. Benny Tamoreka emphasized the importance of the role of party cadres and community figures in influencing public opinion and shaping the concept of political direction. "The cadres and community figures involved can be the spearhead in building a positive image of the Golkar Party in society," he added. With the tagline "Golkar Wins Prosperous People, "The Golkar Party is committed to proving that this party is a reflection of democracy and a guarantee of Indonesian democracy. Benny Tamoreka emphasized that this party does not belong to a few people, but to all Indonesian people. He also emphasized the involvement of all parties, including legislative candidates, in presenting solutions to various societal problems. "The Golkar Party is a party that prioritizes the principles of Indonesian democracy, with a two-term limit unless there is central intervention to accommodate extraordinary cadre achievements," said Benny Tamoreka, explaining his party's commitment to the principles of democracy that apply in Indonesia. In line with political developments in the Regency Proudly, the Golkar Party is ready to contribute to creating a quality democratic party and providing justice for all Indonesian people. (MAM) **Author: Imam Muslik (Luwuk Journalist)

title: Kota Banggai, Ibu Kandung Tiga Kabupaten yang Mulai Bersolek
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Banyak warga yang baru berkunjung di tiga kabupaten paling timur Sulawesi Tengah, dibingungkan dengan nama hingga letak ibukotanya.Yah, sepintas memang lumayan membingungkan. Sebab ada Kabupaten Banggai (nama kabupaten induk wilayah Banggai setelah mekar dari Kabupaten Poso), kemudian ada Kabupaten Banggai Kepulauan atau disingkat Bangkep, dan berikutnya ada Kabupaten Banggai Laut atau disingkat Balut.Yang membuat bingung, adalah pada letak ibukotanya, terutama antara Kabupaten Banggai dan Kabupaten Balut. Kabupaten Banggai sendiri beribukota di Kota Luwuk, sementara Kabupaten Balut atau Banggai Laut beribukota di Banggai.Kota Banggai sendiri, berada di Banggai Laut. Dulunya merupakan kota induk bagi wilayah Kerajaan Banggai yang wilayahnya meliputi seluruh wilayah Kabupaten Banggai, Kabupaten Bangkep dan Kabupaten Balut. Sebagai induk, maka di kota tersebut berdiri Keraton atau pusat pemerintahan, tempat para Raja Banggai bersama perangkatnya bermukim dan memimpin tanah Banggai.Sementara Kota Luwuk sendiri yang kini menjadi ibukota Kabupaten Banggai, adalah daerah perniagaan, termasuk menjadi lokasi bermukim sejumlah pejabat Belanda. Karena kondisinya sebagai kota niaga, maka Luwuk akhirnya ramai dan banyak didatangi orang dari luar. Dan saat Banggai berdiri sebagai kabupaten, lepas dari Kabupaten Poso, Luwuk akhirnya ditetapkan menjadi ibukota. Sementara Kota Banggai, baru sekadar menjadi ibukota kecamatan.Saat pemekaran wilayah kepulauan menjadi Kabupaten Bangkep, Kota Banggai sempat menjadi ibukota selama beberapa tahun pertama. Namun undang-undang yang  menjadi dasar berdirinya Kabupaten Bangkep, ternyata mengatur masa waktu tertentu untuk pindahnya ibukota Bangkep dari Kota Banggai ke Kota Salakan. Pada situasi ini, sempat terjadi pergolakan hingga terjadinya peristiwa penembakan terhadap warga yang menolak pemindahan ibukota Bangkep. Karena kondisi itulah, akhirnya digagas pemekaran Banggai Laut atau Balut dengan ibukota di Banggai.Pada perkembangannya, Kota Banggai yang resmi menjadi ibukota Balut akhirnya terus mengalami kemajuan. Pusat Kerajaan Banggai itu berkembang pesat dan kini telah menunjukkan tanda-tanda sebagai kota modern. Kehidupan kota sudah berlangsung hingga tengah malam, apalagi lapangan di tengah kota Banggai sudah disulap oleh Pemda Kabupaten Balut menjadi Taman Kota Banggai, lengkap dengan sarana hiburan dan aneka kuliner. Ibukota Balut itu benar-benar telah bersolek, layaknya kota modern. Warga sudah memiliki ruang terbuka di pusat kota, menjadi sarana berbagai kegiatan dan tempat bertemunya warga, lengkap dengan aneka kuliner dan fasilitas bermain anak.Kota Banggai juga memiliki sarana umum seperti hotel dan restoran yang kian modern, layaknya fasilitas yang ada di kota-kota lain. Sementara Keraton Banggai sebagai tempat kegiatan budaya dan adat Istiadat, tetap dipertahankan.Ke depan, Kota Banggai akan terus berkembang ditandai dengan mulainya pembangunan bandar udara (Bandara),  sehingga kian menopang arus kunjungan, di samping Pelabuhan Banggai yang juga menjadi tempat persinggahan berbagai jenis kapal dari luar daerah. DAR/**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Many residents who have just visited the three easternmost districts of Central Sulawesi are confused by the name and location of the capital. Well, at first glance it is quite confusing. Because there is Banggai Regency (the name of the main district of the Banggai region after it evolved from Poso Regency), then there is Banggai Islands Regency or abbreviated as Bangkep, and next there is Banggai Laut Regency or abbreviated as Balut. What makes us confused is the location of the capital, especially between Banggai Regency and Balut Regency. Banggai Regency itself has its capital in Luwuk City, while Balut Regency or Banggai Laut has its capital in Banggai. Banggai City itself is in Banggai Laut. Previously, it was the main city for the Banggai Kingdom region whose territory covered the entire Banggai Regency, Bangkep Regency and Balut Regency. As the main city, the palace or center of government stands in this city, where the Banggai Kings and their officials lived and ruled over Banggai land. Meanwhile, Luwuk City itself, which is now the capital of Banggai Regency, is a commercial area, including being the location where a number of Dutch officials live. Because of its condition as a commercial city, Luwuk is finally busy and is visited by many people from outside. And when Banggai was established as a district, separated from Poso Regency, Luwuk was finally designated as the capital. Meanwhile, Banggai City has only become the sub-district capital. When the island region was expanded to become Bangkep Regency, Banggai City was the capital for the first few years. However, the law which became the basis for the establishment of Bangkep Regency apparently regulated a certain time period for the transfer of the capital of Bangkep from Banggai City to Salakan City. In this situation, there was an upheaval that resulted in shootings of residents who refused to move the capital to Bangkep. Because of these conditions, the expansion of Banggai Laut or Balut with the capital in Banggai was finally initiated. In its development, Banggai City, which officially became the capital of Balut, finally continued to progress. The center of the Banggai Kingdom is growing rapidly and is now showing signs of becoming a modern city. City life continues until midnight, especially since the field in the center of Banggai city has been transformed by the Balut Regency Government into Banggai City Park, complete with entertainment facilities and various culinary delights. The capital of Balut has really dressed up, like a modern city. Residents already have open space in the city center, which has become a means for various activities and a meeting place for residents, complete with various culinary delights and children's play facilities. Banggai City also has public facilities such as hotels and restaurants which are increasingly modern, like the facilities in other cities. . Meanwhile, the Banggai Palace, as a place for cultural activities and customs, will still be maintained. In the future, Banggai City will continue to develop, marked by the start of construction of an airport, so that it will increasingly support the flow of visitors, in addition to the Banggai Harbor which is also a stopover for various types of ships. from outside the area. DAR/**

title: Bupati Banggai Terima Bantuan CSR 50 Pcs Tempat Sampah Dari Kalla Toyota
text: DKISP BANGGAI – Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM., AIFO menerima Bantuan Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) dari Kalla Toyota, bertempat di Halaman Kantor Bupati Banggai, pada Senin (8/1/2024).Bantuan CSR yang diberikan oleh Kalla Toyota kepada Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai berupa 50 Pcs Tempat Sampah.Kontribusi CSR berupa 50 tempat sampah ini, menjadi dukungan berharga untuk upaya keberlanjutan lingkungan dan kebersihan di Kabupaten Banggai.Dalam acara serah terima, Bupati Amirudin menyampaikan apresiasinya kepada Kalla Toyota atas kontribusi yang bermakna bagi masyarakat.“Dengan adanya tempat sampah ini, akan kita bagikan khususnya di daerah perkotaan dan daerah-daerah tertentu dalam rangka menunjang program PINASA,” ujar Bupati Amirudin.Beliau menekankan pentingnya kolaborasi antara sektor swasta dan pemerintah dalam mengatasi tantangan lingkungan serta mendorong lingkungan hidup yang lebih bersih dan sehat di Kabupaten Banggai.Adanya 50 tempat sampah ini akan memberikan kontribusi yang signifikan dalam menjaga kebersihan dan mendorong praktik pengelolaan sampah yang bertanggung jawab di Kabupaten Banggai.Pemerintah daerah dengan senang hati menerima dan mendorong kerja sama berkelanjutan dengan sektor swasta untuk mengatasi berbagai tantangan sosial dan lingkungan guna kemajuan bersama.*Tim Liputan Dinas Komunikasi, Informatika, Ststistik dan Persandian (DKISP) Kabupaten Banggai.
text_en: DKISP BANGGAI – Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM., AIFO received Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Assistance from Kalla Toyota, located in the Banggai Regent's Office Yard, on Monday (8/1/2024). The CSR assistance provided by Kalla Toyota to the Banggai Regency Government was in the form of 50 Trash Cans. The CSR contribution in the form of 50 trash cans is valuable support for environmental sustainability and cleanliness efforts in Banggai Regency. During the handover ceremony, Regent Amirudin expressed his appreciation to Kalla Toyota for his meaningful contribution to the community. "We will distribute it especially in urban areas and certain areas in order to support the PINASA program," said Regent Amirudin. He emphasized the importance of collaboration between the private sector and government in overcoming environmental challenges and encouraging a cleaner and healthier living environment in Banggai Regency. The existence of these 50 trash bins will make a significant contribution to maintaining cleanliness and encouraging responsible waste management practices in Banggai Regency. The regional government is happy to accept and encourage sustainable collaboration with the private sector to overcome various social and environmental challenges for mutual progress. *Coverage Team of the Banggai Regency Communication, Informatics, Statistics and Encryption Service (DKISP).

title: Ustadz Ruslan Demanto Safari Dakwah Spesial Bersama KKIG Banggai di Mesjid Agung An Nur Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA—Kerukunan Keluarga Indonesia Gorontalo (KKIG) Kabupaten Banggai pada momentum awal tahun 2024 menggelar kegiatan Islami safari Dakwah spesial dengan mendatangkan ustadz kondang dari Provinsi Gorontalo Ruslan Demanto,S.Th.I.Kegiatan ini atas kerjasama dengan Dinas Kesehatan Provinsi Gorontalo yang dikepalai Dr Anang S Otoluwa mantan Pimpinan Daerah Muhammadiyah Kabupaten Banggai yang juga pembina KKIG Kabupaten Banggai.Kegiatan safari dakwah spesial ini berupa kajian islam yang dilaksanakan terbuka untuk umum dan dihadiri oleh pengurus dan anggota KKIG Kabupaten Banggai serta jemaah Mesjid Agung An Nur Luwuk setelah ba’da isya, Sabtu (6/1/2024).Hadir dalam acara tetsebut dewan penasihat dewan, pembina serta pengurus KKIG Kabupaten Banggai, Ketua DPD Muhamadiyah Banggai, Kepala Dinas Kesehatan Provinsi Gorontalo beserta rombongan, jemaah Mesjid Agung An Nur Luwuk,dan undangan lainnyaMantan Pimpinan Daerah Muhammadiyah Kabupaten Banggai, Dr Anang S Otoluwa yang juga Kadis Kesehatan Provinsi Gorontalo menjadi wasilah atas kehadiran Direktur Rumah Tahfiz Qur’an Daarul Khairat Provinsi Gorontalo, Ruslan Demanto, S.TH.I. yang juga dai kondang dari provinsi Gorontalo mengatakan kegiatan ini safari dakwah spesial ini dilaksanakan oleh KKIG Kabupaten Banggai.Ketua DPC KKIG Kabupaten Banggai Kasim B Moti mengatakan kegiatan safari dakwah spesial dengan menghadirkan da’i kondang dari Gorontalo yang lagi viral dimedsos maupun sosmed Ustadz Ruslan Demanto,S.Th.I, adalah agenda diawal tahun 2024 atas kerjasama dengan Dinas Kesehatan Provinsi Gorontalo.“Alhamdulillah kegiatan ini berjalan dengan sukses hal tersebut terlihat dengan hadirnya kurang lebih 600an para undangan diantaranya warga Gorontalo yang hadir untuk mendengarkan tabliq akbar dari ustadz Ruslan Demanto untuk mempererat tali silaturrahim,” ucapnya. AGK
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA—Gorontalo Indonesian Family Harmony (KKIG) Banggai Regency, at the start of 2024, is holding a special Islamic Da'wah safari activity by bringing in the famous ustadz from Gorontalo Province Ruslan Demanto, S.Th.I. This activity is in collaboration with the Gorontalo Provincial Health Service which is headed Dr. Anang S Otoluwa, former Muhammadiyah Regional Leader, Banggai Regency, who is also the supervisor of the Banggai Regency KKIG. This special da'wah safari activity takes the form of Islamic studies which are held open to the public and attended by administrators and members of the Banggai Regency KKIG as well as the congregation at the An Nur Luwuk Great Mosque after the ba'da Isha, Saturday (6/1/2024). Present at the event were the board of advisors, supervisors and administrators of the Banggai Regency KKIG, Chairman of the DPD Muhamadiyah Banggai, Head of the Gorontalo Provincial Health Service and his entourage, the congregation of the An Nur Luwuk Great Mosque, and other guests. Former Leaders Muhammadiyah Region, Banggai Regency, Dr Anang S Otoluwa, who is also the Head of the Gorontalo Province Health Office, was the representative for the presence of the Director of the Tahfiz Qur'an Daarul Khairat House, Gorontalo Province, Ruslan Demanto, S.TH.I. who is also a famous preacher from Gorontalo province, said that this special missionary safari activity was carried out by the KKIG of Banggai Regency. Chairman of the DPC KKIG of Banggai Regency, Kasim B Moti, said that the special missionary safari activity was by presenting a famous preacher from Gorontalo who was currently viral on social media and Ustadz Ruslan Demanto. , S.Th.I, is an agenda at the beginning of 2024 in collaboration with the Gorontalo Provincial Health Service. "Thank God, this activity was successful, this can be seen from the presence of approximately 600 guests, including Gorontalo residents, who attended to listen to the grand tabliq from Ustadz Ruslan Demanto to strengthen ties of friendship," he said. AGK

text: BANGGAI RAYA- Bupati Banggai, Ir. H.
