The five print media are Mercusuar, Banggai Raya, Obor Motindok, Metro Sulawesi and Luwuk Pos. Meanwhile, the disposition of the Regent Sofyan Kaepa dated 11/30/2023 for several agencies has been conveyed directly or only as a copy. Head of the Mercusuar print media bureau, Rahman Mustika, expressed the position that TAPD Balut is strongly suspected of deliberately ignoring the disposition of the Regent of Balut Sofyan Kaepa "It is very clear the disposition given by the Regent to the five print media for the 2024 fiscal year, but regional secretary (Sekda) Ruslan Tolani as Chair of TAPD Balut does not pay attention to it," said Rahman firmly and this was agreed by other bureaus Wednesday (10/1/2024 ). The same thing was also said by the head of the Obor Motindok print media bureau, Ikbal, that what was surprising was that when proposing a media contract with the regional government to the Regent and approval was also attended by Balut Regional Secretary Ruslan Tolani who is also the Chairman of TAPD Balut. "Is this TAPD's ranks deliberately "refusing to cooperate with the media or indeed the Regent's disposition is being deliberately ignored or TAPD also thinks that the media has nothing for this area," he stressed. ASW

title: Kader PDI Perjuangan dan Masyarakat Luwuk Banggai Rayakan HUT ke-51 Dengan Beragam Kegiatan
text: KABAR LUWUK –Kader PDI PerjuangandanMasyarakat Luwuk BanggaiRayakanHUT ke-51dengan Beragam Kegiatan. Hari ini, kaderPartai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan (PDI Perjuangan)di Luwuk Banggai merayakanHUT ke-51partai tersebut dengan penuh semangat dan kekompakan.Dalam rangkaian perayaan yang meriah, kader partai bersama masyarakat turut serta dalam berbagai kegiatan yang menunjukkan solidaritas mereka terhadap perjuangan partai berlambang Banteng moncong putih. Rabu 10/1/2024.Kompaknya perayaan ini terlihat sejak pagi hari di sejumlah lokasi di berbagai wilayah Luwuk Banggai. Tidak hanya di kantorDPC PDI Perjuangan Kabupaten Banggai,tetapi juga tersebar di beberapa titik lainnya, menciptakan suasana meriah yang dirasakan hingga sore hari.Kantor DPC PDI PerjuanganKabupaten Banggai menjadi pusat kegiatan dengan sejumlah pengurus DPC dan kader berkumpul sejak pukul 09.30 Wita.Mereka bersiap untuk mengikuti Perayaan HUT ke-51, yang diwarnai dengan agenda mendengarkan pidato dari Ketua Umum DPP, Prof DR (HC) Hj Megawati Soekarnoputri.Meskipun acara dilaksanakan secara daring, kehadiran kader-kader partai dari berbagai tingkatan tetap terasa kuat, mencerminkan ketaatan mereka terhadap instruksi Ketua Umum Megawati.Di Kota Luwuk Banggai, perayaan HUT PDI Perjuangan ke-51 juga sukses dilaksanakan di beberapa titik, sesuai instruksi DPP.Ketua DPC PDI Perjuangan H Herwin Yatim beserta pengurus, misalnya, menghadiri perayaan di wilayah Km 1 Kelurahan Bungin Kecamatan Luwuk. Meskipun cuaca panas, acara dihadiri oleh lebih dari 100 orang kader dan tokoh masyarakat setempat.Sejumlah pengurus PDI Perjuangan, termasuk Ketua DPRD Banggai Suprapto, Ketua Fraksi PDI Perjuangan Putu Gumi, dan sejumlah anggota legislatif lainnya, melaksanakan kegiatan perayaan di berbagai wilayah, termasuk Kecamatan Moilong, Toili Barat, Mantoh Lamala, Lobu, dan Nuhon.Kegiatan tersebut tidak hanya sekadar perayaan, melainkan juga melibatkan aksi nyata seperti pembagian sembako, ramah tamah dengan tokoh masyarakat, serta anjangsana ke panti-panti asuhan.Keseluruhan perayaan HUT PDI Perjuangan ke-51 di Luwuk Banggai mencerminkan semangat kebersamaan antara kader partai dan masyarakat, memperkuat ikatan solidaritas dalam merayakan perjalanan panjang partai yang telah berkontribusi besar dalam perjalanan demokrasi di Indonesia.(RS) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – PDI Perjuangan Cadres and the Luwuk Banggai Community Celebrate the 51st Anniversary with Various Activities. Today, cadres of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle (PDI Perjuangan) in Luwuk Banggai celebrated the party's 51st anniversary with great enthusiasm and unity. In a series of lively celebrations, party cadres together with the community took part in various activities that showed their solidarity with the struggle of the party bearing the Bull snout symbol. white. Wednesday 10/1/2024. The unity of this celebration was visible from the morning in a number of locations in various areas of Luwuk Banggai. Not only at the PDI Perjuangan DPC office, Banggai Regency, but also spread across several other points, creating a festive atmosphere that was felt until the afternoon. The PDI Perjuangan DPC office, Banggai Regency, became the center of activity with a number of DPC administrators and cadres gathering since 09.30 WITA. They prepared to take part. The 51st anniversary celebration was marked by the agenda of listening to a speech from the General Chair of the DPP, Prof. DR (HC) Hj Megawati Soekarnoputri. Even though the event was held online, the presence of party cadres from various levels remained strong, reflecting their obedience to the Chair's instructions. General Megawati.In Luwuk Banggai City, the celebration of the 51st anniversary of the PDI Perjuangan was also successfully carried out at several points, according to the DPP's instructions. Chairman of the DPC PDI Perjuangan H Herwin Yatim and the management, for example, attended the celebration in the Km 1 area of ​​Bungin Village, Luwuk District. Despite the hot weather, the event was attended by more than 100 local cadres and community leaders. A number of PDI Perjuangan administrators, including the Chairman of the DPRD Banggai Suprapto, Chairman of the PDI Perjuangan Fraction Putu Gumi, and a number of other legislative members, carried out celebration activities in various areas, including the District. Moilong, West Toili, Mantoh Lamala, Lobu, and Nuhon. This activity is not just a celebration, but also involves real actions such as distribution of basic necessities, hospitality with community leaders, and visits to orphanages. 51 in Luwuk Banggai reflects the spirit of togetherness between party cadres and the community, strengthening bonds of solidarity in celebrating the long journey of the party which has contributed greatly to the journey of democracy in Indonesia. (RS) **

title: Lewat Program Irjen ADA, Jajaran Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng Sampaikan Aspirasi Kepada Irjen Razilu di Lapas Luwuk
text: KABAR LUWUK-Lewat Program Irjen ADA, Jajaran KanwilKemenkumham SultengSampaikan Aspirasi Kepada Irjen Razilu di Lapas Luwuk. JajaranKantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia Sulawesi Tengah(Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng) sampaikan aspirasi guna meningkatkan kinerja kepadaInspektur Jenderal (Irjen) Kemenkumham RI, Ir. Razilu,Kamis, (18/1/2024) sore.Hal tersebut diketahui, saat jajaranKanwil Kemenkumham Sultengyang terdiri dari para Kepala Dvisi, pejabat Administrator dan Pengawas, serta seluruh Kepala Unit Pelaksana Teknis Pemasyarakatan dan Keimigrasian se-Sulteng mengikuti forum konsultasi atau program Inspektur Jenderal (Irjen) Aktif Dengarkan Aspirasi (ADA).Itjen ADA sendiri merupakan salah satu program unggulan Inspektur Jenderal yang diperuntukan bagi satker di lingkungan Kemenkumham untuk menjaring aspirasi dan informasi untuk peningkatan kinerja.Digelar di Aula Lembaga Pemasyarakatan (Lapas) Kelas IIB Luwuk, kegiatan tersebut dipimpin langsung oleh Irjen. Razilu yang saat itu didampingi oleh Inspektur Wilayah VI, Sri Yuliani, Kepala Kantor Wilayah (Kakanwil) Hermansyah Siregar dan Auditor Madya, Ari Wibowo.“Irjen ADA adalah salah satu program unggulan di tahun 2024 ini, yang tujuannya adalah untuk menjaring aspirasi dan informasi bagi satker Kemenkumham dalam upaya peningkatan kinerja,” ungkap Irjen. Razilu.Sementara itu, Kakanwil Hermansyah pun mengaku bersyukur atas kunjungan kerja tersebut, ia menilai program ADA menjadi salah satu langkah yang sangat baik dalam upaya membenahi maupun meningkatkan kinerja Kemenkumham khususnya diwilayah yang ia pimpin saat ini.“Kami sangat senang dengan kunjungan kerja diawal tahun oleh Bapak Irjen. Apalagi, menjadi suatu kebanggaan bahwa Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng menjadi salah satu wilayah permulaan dalam program Itjen ADA tahun 2024, ini sangatlah penting dalam upaya kita meningkatkan kinerja Kemenkumham yang lebih berdampak lagi,” sambut Kakanwil Hermansyah.Hermansyah pun memaparkan berbagai pencapaian Kemenkumham Sulteng di tahun 2024 baik dari Administrasi, Pemasyarakatan, Keimigrasian, hingga Pelayanan Hukum dan HAM.Tidak hanya itu, berbagai Kepala UPT pun turut memberikan pertanyaan dan aspirasi kepada Irjen. Razilu, persoalan kinerja pegawai, pembangunan zona integritas, hingga kiat-kiat dalam pengoptimalan tugas menjadi hal yang ditanyai.Irjen. Razilu pun meminta kepada seluruh jajaran Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng untuk memiliki integritas dan menerapkan pola hidup sederhana, ia juga berpesan agar seluruh Kepala UPT dapat menjadi role model bagi seluruh jajaran di unit kerjanya. ( humas ) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS-Through the Inspector General ADA Program, the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi conveyed their aspirations to Inspector General Razilu at Luwuk Prison. The Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi (Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng) conveyed aspirations to improve performance to the Inspector General (Irjen) of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Ir. Razilu, Thursday, (18/1/2024) afternoon. This became known when the ranks of the Central Sulawesi Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, consisting of Heads of Divisions, Administrator and Supervisory officials, as well as all Heads of Correctional and Immigration Technical Implementation Units throughout Central Sulawesi took part in the consultation forum or Inspector program The General (Inspector General) Actively Listens to Aspirations (ADA). is led directly by the Inspector General. Razilu was accompanied by Region VI Inspector, Sri Yuliani, Head of Regional Office (Kakanwil) Hermansyah Siregar and Middle Auditor, Ari Wibowo. "Irjen ADA is one of the flagship programs in 2024, the aim of which is to gather aspirations and information for "Kemenkumham work unit in an effort to improve performance," said the Inspector General. Razilu.Meanwhile, Kakanwil Hermansyah also admitted that he was grateful for the working visit, he considered the ADA program to be a very good step in efforts to improve and improve the performance of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, especially in the area he currently leads. "We are very happy with the working visit at the beginning of the year by Mr Inspector General. "Moreover, it is a source of pride that the Central Sulawesi Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights is one of the initial areas in the 2024 ADA Inspectorate General program. This is very important in our efforts to improve the performance of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights which will have an even more impact," said Regional Head Hermansyah. Hermansyah also explained the various achievements of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights in 2024. both from Administration, Corrections, Immigration, to Legal Services and Human Rights. Not only that, various Heads of UPT also provided questions and aspirations to the Inspector General. Razilu, issues regarding employee performance, building integrity zones, and tips for optimizing tasks were questions. Inspector General. Razilu also asked all levels of the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi to have integrity and adopt a simple lifestyle. He also advised all UPT Heads to become role models for all levels in their work units. (public relations) **

title: Kezia dan Felix Resmi Pimpin BEM AMIK Luwuk Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Kezia dan Felix  resmi memimpin Badan Eksekutif Mahasiswa (BEM) AMIK Luwuk Banggai untuk periode 2023-2024.Keduanya dilantik langsung oleh Plt Direktur AMIK Luwuk Banggai, Aditya Rizki dan yang didampingi Direktur sebelumnya Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom., MM., Kamis 18 Januari 2024 di kampus tersebut.Pelantikan itu, mengangkat moto “Berkerja sama dan Sama sama Bekerja”. Turut hadir yakni Ketua Prodi, Pembantu Direktur I dan Kemahasiswaan.Hadir dalam pelantikan, baik Plt Direktur maupun Direktur sebelumnya, Heriyanto Sahidu menyampaikan harapan kepada para pengurus BEM yang baru.Pertama, diharapkan BEM dapat menjadi salah satu ujung tombak dalam kegiatan kemahasiswaan terutama dalam standar indikator kinerja utama prestasi mahasiswa.“Jadi lewat BEM dan kemahasiswaan di tahun 2024 ini akan mendorong mahasiswa untuk bisa ikut dan juara pada semua Iven lomba baik skala lokal, wilayah, nasional bahkan internasional,” tandasnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Kezia and Felix officially lead the Student Executive Board (BEM) of AMIK Luwuk Banggai for the 2023-2024 period. Both of them were appointed directly by the Acting Director of AMIK Luwuk Banggai, Aditya Rizki and who was accompanied by the previous Director Heriyanto Sahidu S.Sos., S.Kom ., MM., Thursday 18 January 2024 at the campus. The inauguration carried the motto "Work together and work together". Also present were the Head of Study Program, Assistant Director I and Student Affairs. Present at the inauguration, both the Acting Director and the previous Director, Heriyanto Sahidu expressed their hopes for the new BEM administrators. Firstly, it is hoped that BEM can be one of the spearheads in student affairs activities, especially in standards main performance indicators for student achievement. "So, through BEM and student affairs in 2024, we will encourage students to be able to take part in and win all competition events on a local, regional, national and even international scale," he said. (*)

title: Tiga Lagi Puskesmas di Banggai Raih Akreditasi Paripurna, Total Sementara Jadi 7
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Setelah empat puskesmas, tiga lagi Puskesmas di Kabupaten Banggai yang sukses meraih akreditasi predikat Paripurna. Sehingga total sementara saat ini, sudah 7 Puskesmas yang meraih akreditasi paripurna.Kepala Dinas Kesehatan Kabupaten Banggai, dr. I Wayan Suartika ME., mengatakan, dari 27 puskesmas yang ada, baru 18 Puskesmas yang telah keluar hasil sertifikat akreditasinya.Ia pun membeberkan 18 Puskesmas yang telah keluar hasil sertifikat akreditasinya yakni 7 Puskesmas meraih akreditasi paripurna, 9 akreditasi utama dan dua lainnya madya.Tujuh puskesmas yang berhasil meraih akreditasi paripurna adalah Puskesmas Kampung Baru, Puskesmas Simpong, Puskesmas Toili 3, Puskesmas Sinorang, Puskesmas Balantak, Puskesmas Tikupon, dan Puskesmas Toili 2.Sementara, 9 puskesmas yang meraih akreditasi utama, pertama Puskesmas Biak, Puskesmas Bualemo, Puskesmas Hunduhon, Puskesmas Batui, Puskesmas Saiti, Puskesmas Simpang Raya, Puskesmas Bunta, Puskesmas Boneobakal dan Puskesmas Mantoh.Kemudian, dua puskesmas lainnya yang meraih akreditasi Madya adalah Puskesmas Kintom dan Puskesmas Teku.Setelah 18 Puskesmas, masih menyisakan 9 puskesmas lagi yang serifikatnya belum keluar. Diharapkan, sembilan puskesmas ini bisa meraih nilai terbaik.Adapun nama-nama puskesmas yang belum keluar hasil sertifikatnya yaitu Puskesmas Nuhon, Puskesmas Toima, Puskesmas Lobu, Puskesmas Pagimana, Puskesmas Poh, Puskesmas Balantak Selatan, Puskesmas Nambo, Puskesmas Toili 1 dan Puskesmas Tangeban.Kadinkes Banggai, dr. Wayan Suartika mengaku bersyukur dari 18 Puskesmas, tujuh di antaranya sukses meraih akreditasi paripurna.“Nilai akreditasi diharapkan implementasinya nanti terlihat pada mutu pelayanan yang diberikan kepada masyarakat,” harapnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-After four community health centers, three more community health centers in Banggai Regency have successfully achieved Plenary predicate accreditation. So the current total, 7 Community Health Centers have achieved plenary accreditation. Head of the Banggai District Health Service, dr. I Wayan Suartika ME., said, of the 27 existing community health centers, only 18 Community Health Centers had received their accreditation certificate results. He also revealed that of the 18 Community Health Centers whose accreditation certificate results had been released, namely 7 Community Health Centers achieved plenary accreditation, 9 had primary accreditation and the other two were intermediate. The seven health centers that have achieved complete accreditation are Kampung Baru Health Center, Simpong Health Center, Toili 3 Health Center, Sinorang Health Center, Balantak Health Center, Tikupon Health Center, and Toili 2 Health Center. Meanwhile, 9 health centers have achieved primary accreditation, the first being Biak Health Center, Bualemo Community Health Center, and Public Health Center. Hunduhon, Batui Community Health Center, Saiti Community Health Center, Simpang Raya Community Health Center, Bunta Community Health Center, Boneobakal Community Health Center and Mantoh Community Health Center. Then, two other community health centers that received Intermediate accreditation are Kintom Community Health Center and Teku Community Health Center. After 18 Community Health Centers, there are still 9 more community health centers whose certificates have not yet been issued. . It is hoped that these nine community health centers will achieve the best scores. The names of the community health centers whose certificate results have not yet been released are Nuhon Community Health Center, Toima Health Center, Lobu Health Center, Pagimana Health Center, Poh Health Center, South Balantak Health Center, Nambo Health Center, Toili 1 Health Center and Tangeban Community Health Center. Kadinkes Banggai, dr. Wayan Suartika said he was grateful that of the 18 Community Health Centers, seven of them had successfully achieved plenary accreditation. "We hope that the value of accreditation in its implementation will be seen in the quality of services provided to the community," he hoped. (*)

title: PT ASDP Ferry Cabang Luwuk Rehabilitasi Dermaga Pelabuhan Pagimana
text: LUWUK, LUWUK POST.id – Sebagai bentuk komitmen PT. ASDP Indonesia Ferry (Persero) terhadap peningkatan pelayanan dan keselamatan operasional, khususnya kondisi teknis pelabuhan dan fasilitas penunjangnya. Terhitung pada Jumat (19/1/2024) sampai dengan Kamis (1/2/2024) dilakukan pemeliharaan kondisi teknis dermaga Movable Bridge (MB) yaitu dilakukannya pekerjaan rehabilitasi Dermaga MB Pelabuhan Pagimana. General Manager PT. ASDP Indonesia Ferry (Persero) Cabang Luwuk, Cuk Prayitno, menerangkan dalam pelaksanaan pekerjaan tersebut, selama kurun waktu 14 hari untuk sementara waktu segala aktivitas pemuatan atau bongkar muat di Dermaga Pagimana akan dialihkan ke Dermaga Plengsengan yang masih di dalam Pelabuhan Pagimana. “Aktivitas tetap berjalan normal hanya saja membutuhkan penyesuaian pasang surut air laut di sekitar Dermaga Plengsengan,” tandas Cuk Prayitno melalui sambungan telepon pada Rabu (17/1/2024). Selain pekerjaan rehabilitasi dermaga, lanjut Cuk Prayitno, PT. ASDP Indonesia Ferry (Persero) juga akan melakukan pekerjaan peningkatan pelayanan melalui pembangunan jalan koridor bagi pejalan kaki. “Kedepannya, jalan koridor ini akan menjadi bagian penataan manajemen dari Pelabuhan Pagimana yang akan menerapkan sistem zonasi pelabuhan yang bertujuan bagi keamanan, kenyamanan dan keselamatan bagi pengguna jasa,” tandasnya. Menutup pembicaraan, Cuk Prayitno menghaturkan permohon maaf jika aktivitas pemeliharaan teknis yang dilakukan ini dapat menggangu kenyamanan para pengguna jasa yang menggunakan Pelabuhan Pagimana. (*/EM)
text_en: LUWUK, LUWUK POST.id – As a form of PT. ASDP Indonesia Ferry (Persero) towards improving operational services and safety, especially the technical conditions of the port and its supporting facilities. Starting from Friday (19/1/2024) to Thursday (1/2/2024), maintenance was carried out on the technical condition of the Movable Bridge (MB) pier, namely rehabilitation work was carried out on the MB Pier at Pagimana Port. General Manager PT. ASDP Indonesia Ferry (Persero) Luwuk Branch, Cuk Prayitno, explained that in carrying out this work, for a period of 14 days all loading or unloading activities at Pagimana Pier will be temporarily transferred to Plengsengan Pier which is still inside Pagimana Harbor. "Activities will continue to run normally, but require adjustments to the tides around Plengsengan Pier," said Cuk Prayitno by telephone on Wednesday (17/1/2024). Apart from the pier rehabilitation work, continued Cuk Prayitno, PT. ASDP Indonesia Ferry (Persero) will also carry out work to improve services through the construction of corridor roads for pedestrians. "In the future, this corridor road will become part of the management arrangement of Pagimana Port which will implement a port zoning system aimed at security, comfort and safety for service users," he said. Closing the conversation, Cuk Prayitno expressed his apologies if the technical maintenance activities carried out could disrupt the comfort of service users who use Pagimana Port. (*/EM)

title: Kasubbag Kepegawaian dan Tenaga PPNPN Pengadilan Agama Banggai Ikuti Zoom Bersama Sekretaris PTA Palu
text: Banggai, 19 Januari 2024. Zoom ini terkait dengan hasil konsultasi Sekretaris Pengadilan Tinggi Agama Palu dengan Kepala Biro Kepegawaian Mahkamah Agung RI. Maka, dengan itu PTA Palu menerbitkan 2/WKPTA.W19-A/UND.KP1.2.8/I/2024 untuk mengundang Kasubbag Kepegawaian dan Tenaga PPNPN. kegiatan ini dilaksanakan di Media Center Pengadilan Agama Banggai pada hari Jumat, tanggal 19 Januari 2024. Semoga zoom kali ini membawa hasil positif sebagaimana selalu diharapkan oleh kita semua.
text_en: Banggai, 19 January 2024. This Zoom is related to the results of consultations between the Secretary of the Palu Religious High Court and the Head of the Personnel Bureau of the Supreme Court of the Republic of Indonesia. So, with that, PTA Palu issued 2/WKPTA.W19-A/UND.KP1.2.8/I/2024 to invite the Head of the PPNPN Personnel and Personnel Subdivision. This activity was held at the Media Center of the Banggai Religious Court on Friday, January 19 2024. Hopefully this zoom will bring positive results as we all always hope for.

title: Wartawan Banggai dan Kasat Intel Polres Banggai Bersatu dalam Aksi Jumat Berkah,Bagikan Nasi Kotak di Luwuk Selatan
text: KABAR LUWUK –Wartawan BanggaidanKasat Intel Polres BanggaiBersatu dalam Aksi Jumat Berkah,Bagikan Nasi Kotak diLuwuk Selatan.SuasanaCafe Bakul Kopi,Eks Lapangan Tembak, KM 5, Luwuk Selatan, semakin meriah pada Jumat, 19 Januari 2024.Para wartawanKabupaten Banggaikembali memperlihatkan kepedulian mereka terhadap masyarakat dengan menggelar aksi Jumat Berbagi.Kali ini, kolaborasi bersama Kasat Intel Polres Banggai membuat momen berbagi semakin berarti.Salah satu jurnalis terkemuka, Emy, menjelaskan bahwa pembagian makanan berupa nasi kotak merupakan bentuk aksi positif dari wartawan Banggai bekerjasama dengan Kasat Intel Polres Banggai.Pada Jumat berkah ini, nasi kotak disalurkan kepada para pengendara yang melintas, khususnya ojek dan sopir-sopir angkot. Antusiasme para penerima terlihat begitu tinggi, mencerminkan kegembiraan mereka dalam menerima bantuan tersebut.Aksi berbagi ini bukan hanya sekadar wadah kepedulian, melainkan juga menyatukan anggota Persatuan Wartawan Indonesia (PWI) Banggai.Ketua PWI Banggai, Iskandar Djiada, beserta sejumlah anggota lainnya seperti Imam Muslik, Yuni, Kiki, Amrilah, Asnawi, Sofyan Tah, Sofyan Labolo Alisan, turut hadir dalam kegiatan tersebut.Kebersamaan mereka menunjukkan solidaritas dan semangat berbuat baik di kalangan wartawan.Iskandar Djiada, selaku Ketua PWI Banggai dan pimpinan umum Harian Banggai Raya, menyampaikan rasa syukurnya, “Di Jumat yang penuh berkah ini, Alhamdulillah kami dan rekan-rekan wartawan dari PWI Banggai bisa berbagi.” Ungkapan tersebut mencerminkan kebahagiaan dan kepuasan hati mereka dalam berkontribusi positif kepada masyarakat.Kasat Intel AKP Usman menegaskan bahwa aksi berbagi ini tidak hanya mencerminkan kepedulian terhadap sesama, tetapi juga memperkuat ikatan solidaritas di antara wartawan dan instansi keamanan.Semoga kegiatan ini dapat menjadi inspirasi bagi upaya-upaya kemanusiaan di berbagai lapisan masyarakat.Kolaborasi antara wartawan dan aparat keamanan ini diharapkan dapat memberikan dampak positif dan memperkuat hubungan kebersamaan di Kabupaten Banggai.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Journalists and Head of Intelligence at Banggai Police Unite in the Blessing Friday Action, Distributing Rice Boxes in South Luwuk. The atmosphere of Bakul Kopi Cafe, Former Shooting Range, KM 5, South Luwuk, became even more lively on Friday, January 19 2024. Journalists from Banggai Regency again showed their concern for the community by holding a Friday Sharing action. This time, collaboration with the Banggai Police Head of Intelligence made the sharing moment even more meaningful. One of the leading journalists, Emy, explained that the distribution of food in the form of rice boxes was a form of positive action from Banggai journalists in collaboration with the Banggai Police Head of Intel. This blessed Friday, rice boxes were distributed to passing motorists, especially motorbike taxis and public transportation drivers. The enthusiasm of the recipients looks very high, reflecting their joy in receiving this assistance. This sharing action is not only a forum for caring, but also unites members of the Banggai Indonesian Journalists Association (PWI). Chairman of the Banggai PWI, Iskandar Djiada, along with a number of other members such as Imam Muslik , Yuni, Kiki, Amrilah, Asnawi, Sofyan Tah, Sofyan Labolo Alisan, were also present at this activity. Their togetherness shows solidarity and the spirit of doing good among journalists. Iskandar Djiada, as Chair of PWI Banggai and general leader of Banggai Raya Daily, expressed his feelings thankfully, "On this blessed Friday, Alhamdulillah, we and our fellow journalists from PWI Banggai can share." These expressions reflect their happiness and satisfaction in contributing positively to society. Head of Intel AKP Usman emphasized that this sharing action not only reflects concern for others, but also strengthens bonds of solidarity between journalists and security agencies. Hopefully this activity can be an inspiration for efforts -Humanitarian efforts at various levels of society. It is hoped that this collaboration between journalists and security forces can have a positive impact and strengthen mutual relations in Banggai Regency.**

title: Banggai Run Challenge 2024 Digelar Tiga Season, Pemda Siapkan Total Hadiah Rp 70 Juta
text: Terasbanggai.com -Pemerintah daerah kabupaten Banggai menggelar Banggai Run Challenge 2024. Program Sport tourism yang diinisiasi dinas pariwisata ini sebagai pengganti Tour De Banggai ajang sepeda yang selama ini digelar Pemda Banggai. Banggai Run Challenge 2024 ini direncanakan akan digelar 3 season, yakni pada Maret, Mei dan Agustus 2024 mendatang dengan total hadiah mencapai Rp 70 juta. Wilayah kecamatan Toili menjadi lokasi pertama pelaksanaan Banggai Run Challenge dengan menempuh jarak tempuh sepanjang 10 kilometer mulai dari lapangan Tirta Sari melewati Desa Tirta Kencana, Desa Jaya Kencana, dan Desa Sentral Sari yang dihelat 3 Maret 2024. Sementara untuk season kedua akan digelar di wilayah kecamatan Bunta dan season ketiga di kecamatan Luwuk, Agustus 2024. Bupati Banggai Amirudin memberikan apresiasi atas pelaksanaan Banggai Run Challenge yang akan berdampak positif pada pertumbuhan ekonomi,khususnya bagi pelaku UMKM dan ekonomi kreatif. “Ini kegiatan bagus, murah dan menyehatkan, dan diharapkan dapat menumbuhkan perekonomian masyarakat setempat,” ujar Bupati Amirudin. Bupati Banggai bilang bila selama ini pemerintah daerah menggelar ajang lomba sepeda bertajuk Tour De Banggai, tahun 2024 pemda mencoba mengubahnya dengan mengikuti perkembangan di masyarakat. “Kita mengikuti tren yang ada sekarang ini trennya lari,” ujar Bupati Banggai Amirudin saat memimpin rapat persiapan pelaksanaan Banggai Run Challenge 2024, Kamis (18/1/2024), di Kantor Bupati Banggai, Luwuk Selatan. text_en: Terasbanggai.com - The regional government of Banggai district is holding the Banggai Run Challenge 2024. The sport tourism program initiated by the tourism office is a replacement for the Tour De Banggai cycling event which has been held by the Banggai regional government. The Banggai Run Challenge 2024 is planned to be held in 3 seasons, namely in March, May and August 2024 with a total prize of IDR 70 million. The Toili sub-district area is the first location for the Banggai Run Challenge with a distance of 10 kilometers starting from the Tirta Sari field passing through Tirta Kencana Village, Jaya Kencana Village and Sentral Sari Village which will be held on March 3 2024. Meanwhile, the second season will be held in the sub-district area. Bunta and the third season in Luwuk sub-district, August 2024. Banggai Regent Amirudin expressed his appreciation for the implementation of the Banggai Run Challenge which will have a positive impact on economic growth, especially for MSMEs and creative economy players. "This is a good activity, cheap and healthy, and is expected to grow the economy of the local community," said Regent Amirudin. The Regent of Banggai said that so far the regional government has held a bicycle competition entitled Tour De Banggai, in 2024 the regional government will try to change it by following developments in the community. "We are following the current trend, the trend is running," said Banggai Regent Amirudin when leading a preparatory meeting for the implementation of the 2024 Banggai Run Challenge, Thursday (18/1/2024), at the Banggai Regent's Office, South Luwuk. title: PEMKAB BANGGAI GAGAS EVENT SPORT TOURISM
text: LUWUK, LUWUK POST.id – Event tahunan Tour de Banggai yang merupakan ajang bagi pecinta balap sepeda di Kabupaten Banggai tidak akan digelar tahun ini. Sebagai gantinya, Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai melalui Dinas Pariwisata akan menghelat Banggai Run Challenge 2024. Hal ini memastikan bahwa kegiatan yang menggabungkan olahraga dan pariwisata atau sport tourism tetap tumbuh di Kabupaten Banggai. “Kegiatan ini merupakan pengganti dari Tour de Banggai. Jadi, kita mengikuti tren yang ada. Sekarang ini trennya lari,” ujar Bupati Banggai Amirudin saat memimpin rapat persiapan pelaksanaan Banggai Run Challenge 2024, Kamis (18/1/2024), di Kantor Bupati Banggai, Luwuk Selatan. Bupati Amirudin berharap ajang ini dapat menumbuhkan perekonomian, khususnya bagi pelaku UMKM dan ekonomi kreatif. “Ini kegiatan bagus, murah dan menyehatkan, dan diharapkan dapat menumbuhkan perekonomian masyarakat setempat,” ujar Bupati Amirudin. Kepala Dinas Pariwisata Kabupaten Banggai Ismed Wardhana mengatakan, Banggai Run Challenge 2024 akan digelar tiga kali atau season di tiga lokasi berbeda. Run de Toili menjadi pembuka Banggai Run Challenge 2024 season pertama. “Run de Toili season 1 akan dilaksanakan di Kecamatan Toili, hari Minggu, tanggal 3 Maret 2024. Titik start dan finish di Lapangan Tirta Sari dan akan melewati Desa Tirta Kencana, Desa Jaya Kencana, dan Desa Sentral Sari,” ujar Ismed. Selanjutnya, season 2 akan dihelat di Kecamatan Bunta pada bulan Mei. Banggai Run Challenge season 3 dilaksanakan di Kecamatan Luwuk pada Agustus mendatang. Adapun kelas yang diperlombakan yakni kelas fun 5 Km (men and women open) dan kelas run 10 Km (men and women open). Ada pula kelas master B lokal dan master A berdasarkan kategori usia. Para peserta Banggai Run Challenge akan memperebutkan total hadiah sebesar Rp 70 juta. Panitia memperkirakan, ajang ini akan diikuti sekitar 1.000 sampai 1.500 orang. (*/Mjd)
text_en: LUWUK, LUWUK POST.id – The annual Tour de Banggai event, which is an event for bicycle racing lovers in Banggai Regency, will not be held this year. Instead, the Banggai Regency Government through the Tourism Office will hold the Banggai Run Challenge 2024. This ensures that activities that combine sports and tourism or sport tourism continue to grow in Banggai Regency. “This activity is a replacement for the Tour de Banggai. So, we follow existing trends. "Right now the trend is running," said Banggai Regent Amirudin when leading a preparatory meeting for the 2024 Banggai Run Challenge, Thursday (18/1/2024), at the Banggai Regent's Office, South Luwuk. Regent Amirudin hopes that this event can grow the economy, especially for MSMEs and creative economy players. "This is a good activity, cheap and healthy, and is expected to grow the economy of the local community," said Regent Amirudin. Head of the Banggai Regency Tourism Office, Ismed Wardhana, said that the Banggai Run Challenge 2024 will be held three times or in seasons in three different locations. Run de Toili opened the first season of the Banggai Run Challenge 2024 season. "Run de Toili season 1 will be held in Toili District, Sunday, March 3 2024. The start and finish point will be at Tirta Sari Field and will pass through Tirta Kencana Village, Jaya Kencana Village and Sentral Sari Village," said Ismed. Furthermore, season 2 will be held in Bunta District in May. Banggai Run Challenge season 3 will be held in Luwuk District next August. The classes being contested are the 5 Km fun class (men and women open) and the 10 Km run class (men and women open). There are also local master B and master A classes based on age categories. Banggai Run Challenge participants will compete for a total prize of IDR 70 million. The committee estimates that this event will be attended by around 1,000 to 1,500 people. (*/Mjd)

title: Polres Banggai Lakukan Diversi Kasus Penganiayaan Melibatkan Anak di Bawah Umur
text: Polresbanggai.com –Unit IV PPAsat reskrimpolres banggaimelakukan diversi terhadap seorang anak di bawah umur yang diduga terlibat kasus penganiayaan.“Kasus yang melibatkan anak dibawah umur ini, Kamis (18/1/2024) kita diversi diruang rapat Satreskrim,” kata Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy.Proses diversi terhadap anak berhadapan dengan hukum diatur dalam Undang-undang Nomor 11 Tahun 2012 tentang Sistem Peradilan Anak.Yang memimpin kegiatan diversi adalah Kanit IV PPA Sat Reskrim Polres Banggai IPDA Herdi Son Tamaka, SH dan menghadirkan Bapasluwuk, Pekerja Sosial Dinas Sosial Banggai, P2TP2A Banggai, Kades Bumi Beringin, korban, tersangka serta orang tua.AKP Tio menjelaskan, anak di bawah umur (16 tahun) yang menjalani proses diversi tersebut diduga terlibat kasus penganiayaan di perempatan SMK Negeri 1 Luwuk, Kelurahan Karaton, Rabu (27/12/2024).Ia diamankan Tim Resmob Tompotika Polres Banggai pada Rabu (10/1/24) di Desa Bumi Beringin, Luwuk Utara.Kata Kasat, diduga melakukan penganiayaan terhadap korban AK (20) warga Kelurahan Luwuk, yang mengalami luka memar dan bengkak diwajah.Kasat menambahkan tersangka dan pelapor sepakat menyelesaikan perkara ini secara kekeluargaan dan berdamai. Pelapor sudah tidak keberatan dan memaafkan perbuatannya.Tersangka juga akan dilakukan pengawasan lebih dari orang tua bersama pihak Bapas Luwuk dan pemerintah desa, untuk merubah perilaku anak menjadi lebih baik.“Kepada tersangka juga disarankan untuk dapat meneruskan jenjang pendidikan,” tukasnya.*HumasPolresBanggai
text_en: Polresbanggai.com – Unit IV PPAsat Reskrimpolres is proud to carry out diversion against a minor who is suspected of being involved in a case of abuse. "We will divert this case involving a minor, Thursday (18/1/2024) in the Satreskrim meeting room," said the Head of Criminal Investigation Unit at the Police. Banggai AKP Tio Tondy. The diversion process for children in conflict with the law is regulated in Law Number 11 of 2012 concerning the Juvenile Justice System. The person who leads the diversion activities is Head of Unit IV PPA, Criminal Investigation Unit, Banggai IPDA Police, Herdi Son Tamaka, SH and presents Bapasluwuk, Social Worker. Banggai Social Service, P2TP2A Banggai, Bumi Beringin Village Head, victim, suspect and parents. AKP Tio explained that the minor (16 years) who underwent the diversion process was suspected of being involved in a case of abuse at the intersection of SMK Negeri 1 Luwuk, Karaton Village, Wednesday (27/12/2024). He was arrested by the Banggai Police Tompotika Resmob Team on Wednesday (10/1/24) in Bumi Beringin Village, North Luwuk. Kasat said, he is suspected of having assaulted victim AK (20), a resident of Luwuk Village, who suffered bruises and swelling on the face. Kasat added that the suspect and the complainant agreed to resolve this case amicably and amicably. The complainant has no objection and has forgiven his actions. The suspect will also receive more supervision from his parents together with the Luwuk Fathers and the village government, to change the child's behavior for the better. "The suspect is also advised to continue his education," he said. *Banggai Police Public Relations

title: Kapusdal OMB Polres Banggai Cek Kantor Bawaslu dan KPU
text: Polresbanggai.com –Kabag Renpolres banggaiselaku Kapusdal Operasi Mantap Brata Tinombala Kompol Maikun, SH, MH melakukan pengecekan piket di Kantor Bawaslu dan KPU Banggai, Jumat (19/1/2024).Pengecekan piket ini bagian dari upaya pengawasan dan pengendalian terhadap personel yang bertugas dalam pengamanan di Kantor penyelenggara Pemilu tersebut, dalam rangka memastikan kesiapan menghadapi Pemilihan Umum.Dalam giat tersebut, Ia memeriksa kehadiran seluruh personel pengamanan yang bertugas di lokasi. Dan juga memperhatikan kesiapannya dalam menjalankan tugas pengamanan yang krusial ini.Selain itu, buku mutasi piket juga diperiksa guna memastikan rotasi dan penugasan petugas keamanan berjalan dengan baik.Kompol Maikun mengungkapkan pentingnya upaya pengawasan dan pengendalian ini untuk memastikan kelancaran proses Pemilihan Umum di wilayah hukum Polres Banggai.Dengan pengecekan ini, diharapkan semua personel pengamanan bekerja dengan baik, tertib, dan memastikan keamanan di Kantor KPU dan Bawaslu dalam rangka mendukung pelaksanaan Pemilu yang adil dan demokratis.Pimpinan berharap, piket KPU dan Bawaslu dalam menjalankan tugasnya berjalan dengan baik serta memastikan bahwa segala aspek pengamanan terkait Pemilu dikabupaten banggaiakan berjalan dengan lancar.*HumasPolresBanggai
text_en: Polresbanggai.com – Head of the Banggai Regional Police Headquarters as the Head of the Brata Tinombala Mantap Operations Regional Headquarters Kompol Maikun, SH, MH checked the pickets at the Bawaslu and KPU Banggai Offices, Friday (19/1/2024). Checking the pickets was part of efforts to supervise and control the personnel on duty in providing security at the Election Organizing Office, in order to ensure readiness for the General Election. During this activity, he checked the presence of all security personnel on duty at the location. And also pay attention to their readiness in carrying out this crucial security task. Apart from that, the picket transfer book is also checked to ensure that the rotation and assignment of security officers goes well. Kompol Maikun expressed the importance of this monitoring and control effort to ensure the smooth running of the General Election process in the jurisdiction of the Police. Banggai.With this check, it is hoped that all security personnel will work well, in an orderly manner, and ensure security at the KPU and Bawaslu offices in order to support the implementation of fair and democratic elections. The leadership hopes that the KPU and Bawaslu pickets will carry out their duties well and ensure that All aspects of security related to elections in Banggai Regency will run smoothly.*Banggai Police Public Relations

title: Ini Ekstrakurikuler yang Ada di Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk, Calon Santri Baru Wajib Tahu!
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Saat ini, Pondok Pesantren (Ponpes) Daarul Hikmah Luwuk tengah membuka penerimaan santri baru tahun pelajaran 2024/2025.Dalam penerimaan santri baru, Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk membuka untuk dua tingkatan yakni tingkat MTs dan Madrasah Aliyah.Bagi orangtua yang ingin memondokkan anaknya, Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk yang merupakan ponpes favorit di Kota Luwuk ini bisa menjadi pilihan.Nah, sebelum masuk dan mendaftar di Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk, para calon santri baru harus tahu apa-apa saja ekstrakulikuler yang ada di Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk.Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk menerapkan sejumlah ekstrakulikuler yang terbagi dalam dua kategori yakni wajib dan tidak wajib.Untuk ekstrakulikuler wajib, ada tapak suci dan taekwondo.“Ini wajib, tapi santri bisa memilih di antara dua ini, apakah tapak suci atau taekwondo. Prinsipnya, santri harus bisa olahraga bela diri,” ungkap Ustadz Mu’adz sapaan akrab ustadz kondang di Kabupaten Banggai itu, Jumat 19 Januari 2024.Berikutnya, ada ekstrakulikuler kursus Bahasa Arab, Bahasa Inggris dan Tahfiz. “Untuk ekstrakulikuler ini, wajib sehingga tidak berbayar,” jelas Ustadz Mu’adz.Selain ekstrakulikuler wajib, Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk juga menyediakan ekstrakulikuler tidak wajib dan bisa dipilih oleh santri.Untuk ekstrakulikuler tidak wajib yang bisa dipilih santri ini, ada olahraga basket, panahan, tilawah, hadroh dan lainnya.“Ekstrakulikuler yang tidak wajib ini, berbayar per item itu Rp30 ribu. Tapi ekstrakulikuler ini tidak ikut tidak masalah (tidak wajib),” bebernya.Dengan banyaknya ekstrakulikuler disiapkan di Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk kata Ustadz Mu’adz, tak lain untuk mengasah dan meningkatkan kemampuan santri di bidangnya masing-masing.“Seperti bela diri, bahasa arab, bahas Inggris. Karena memang untuk ekstrakulikuler ini, tidak semua santri suka main basket, suka panahan, suka tilawah. Sehingga tidak diwajibkan,” terangnya.Karena tidak diwajibkan, santri Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk yang memilih ekstrakulikuler itu harus membayar.“Biayanya Rp30 ribu, ini pun untuk membeli peralatan yang harus diadakan dalam ekstrakulikuler yang diikuti,” katanya.Ia berharap, melalui ekstrakulikuler yang ada diikuti, santri bisa meraih prestasi di bidang dan kemampuannya masing-masing untuk mengharumkan nama Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk dan juga daerah tercinta. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Currently, the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School (Ponpes) is opening the acceptance of new students for the 2024/2025 school year. In accepting new students, the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School is opening for two levels, namely the MTs and Madrasah Aliyah levels. For parents who want to board his son, Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk, which is the favorite Islamic boarding school in Luwuk City, could be an option. So, before entering and registering at Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk, prospective new students must know what extracurricular activities are available at Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk. Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk implements a number of extracurriculars which are divided into two categories, namely mandatory and non-compulsory. For mandatory extracurriculars, there are Tapak Suci and Taekwondo. "This is mandatory, but students can choose between these two, whether Tapak Suci or Taekwondo. "In principle, students must be able to do self-defense sports," said Ustadz Mu'adz, the nickname of the famous ustadz in Banggai Regency, Friday 19 January 2024. Next, there are extracurricular courses in Arabic, English and Tahfiz. "For this extracurricular, it is mandatory so it is free of charge," explained Ustadz Mu'adz. Apart from mandatory extracurriculars, the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School also provides non-compulsory extracurriculars which students can choose from. For non-compulsory extracurriculars which students can choose, there are basketball sports, archery, recitations, hadroh and others. "These non-compulsory extracurriculars pay Rp. 30 thousand per item. "But this extracurricular is not a problem (it's not mandatory)," he explained. With the many extracurriculars prepared at the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School, said Ustadz Mu'adz, it is none other than to sharpen and improve the students' abilities in their respective fields. "Such as self-defense, language Arabic, speak English. Because for this extracurricular, not all students like playing basketball, like archery, like recitations. "So it's not mandatory," he explained. Because it's not mandatory, students of the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School who choose extracurricular activities have to pay. "The fee is Rp. 30 thousand, this is also to buy equipment that must be held in the extracurricular activities they are taking part in," he said. He hopes that through extracurricular activities that If it is followed, students can achieve achievements in their respective fields and abilities to make the name of the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School and also their beloved region proud. (*)

title: Pj. Bupati Ihsan Basir Salurkan Bantuan Hibah 16 Mesin Jahit Untuk Pemberdayaan Ketenagakerjaan di Banggai Kepulauan
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Pj. Bupati Ihsan BasirSalurkan Bantuan Hibah 16 Mesin Jahit untukPemberdayaan Ketenagakerjaan di Banggai Kepulauan.Pj. Bupati Ihsan Basirdari Kabupaten Banggai Kepulauan secara resmi menyerahkan bantuan hibah berupa16 unit mesin jahitkepada peserta pelatihan menjahit di Loka Latihan Kerja (LLK)Mondopulian Saiyong.Acara penyerahan bantuan berlangsung pada Kamis (18/1/2024), di LLK Mondopulian Saiyong yang diselenggarakan olehDinas Ketenagakerjaan dan Transmigrasi Kabupaten Banggai Kepulauan.Dalam sambutannya, Pj. Bupati Ihsan Basir menyampaikan komitmen Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai Kepulauan dalam mengatasi masalah ketenagakerjaan.Beliau menjelaskan, “Kita memang lagi fokus di ketenagakerjaan, saya sudah ketemu dengan Menteri Ketenagakerjaan terkait bagaimana kemudian sumbangsih Kementerian terhadap Banggai Kepulauan, kita meminta beberapa paket-paket pelatihan yang disesuaikan dengan kondisi kita.”Selain itu, Bupati berharap bahwa setelah menyelesaikan pelatihan keterampilan menjahit pakaian, para peserta dapat memiliki keterampilan khusus dalam bidang tersebut, yang nantinya dapat meningkatkan tingkat kemandirian mereka.Sementara itu, Kepala Dinas Ketenagakerjaan dan Transmigrasi Banggai Kepulauan, Suripto Nurdin, dalam sambutannya mengungkapkan harapannya bahwa masyarakat yang telah direkrut untuk pelatihan ini akan memperoleh ilmu yang cukup dalam menjahit, sehingga mereka dapat menjadi mandiri.“Dalam tahun 2023, kita mendapat bantuan dari pusat, kami mendapat tiga paket yaitu pelatihan menjahit, pelatihan komputer, pelatihan sekretariat.Untuk tahun 2024 ini, kita mendapat tambahan satu paket lagi yaitu otomotif yang berasal dari dana APBN,” kata Kepala Dinas.Acara penyerahan bantuan ini juga dihadiri oleh Kabid Ketenagakerjaan, Kepala LLK Lokal Latihan Kerja, Kepala Desa Saiyong, masyarakat, serta undangan lainnya.Semua pihak berharap bahwa bantuan ini akan memberikan dampak positif dalam peningkatan keterampilan dan kesempatan kerja bagi masyarakat Banggai Kepulauan. ( RSM ) **
text_en: NEWS LUWUK – Acting. Regent Ihsan Basir Distributes Grant Assistance for 16 Sewing Machines for Employment Empowerment in Banggai Islands.Pj. Regent Ihsan Basir from Banggai Islands Regency officially handed over grant assistance in the form of 16 sewing machine units to sewing training participants at the Mondopulian Saiyong Job Training Workshop (LLK). and Transmigration of the Banggai Islands Regency. In his speech, Acting. Regent Ihsan Basir conveyed the commitment of the Banggai Islands Regency Government in overcoming employment problems. He explained, "We are currently focusing on employment, I have met with the Minister of Manpower regarding the Ministry's contribution to the Banggai Islands, we are asking for several training packages that are tailored to our condition." Apart from that, the Regent hopes that after completing clothing sewing skills training, the participants will have special skills in this field, which will later be able to increase their level of independence. Meanwhile, the Head of the Banggai Islands Manpower and Transmigration Service, Suripto Nurdin, in His speech expressed his hope that the people who have been recruited for this training will gain sufficient knowledge in sewing, so that they can become independent. "In 2023, we will receive assistance from the center, we will receive three packages, namely sewing training, computer training, and secretariat training. "For 2024, we will receive one additional package, namely automotive, which will come from APBN funds," said the Head of the Service. The aid handover event was also attended by the Head of Employment, the Head of the Local LLK for Job Training, the Head of Saiyong Village, the community, as well as other guests. All parties hope that this assistance will have a positive impact in increasing skills and employment opportunities for the people of the Banggai Islands. ( RSM ) **

title: Zebra Cross Luwuk Pudar, Dishub Provinsi Abai
text: LUWUK, LUWUK POST.id – Zebra cross yang terletak di kawasan Jalan Ahmad Yani, Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, sudah tak terlihat lagi. Hal ini disebabkan para pengendara seenaknya berhenti tepat di depan garis batas zebra cross saat menunggu lampu merah menyala. Berdasarkan pantauan harian cetak Luwuk Post, nyaris selama tahun 2023 zebra cross di lokasi tersebut tidak lagi berfungsi sebagai penanda bagi pejalan kaki dan pengendara. Cat garis yang menjadi larangan bagi pengendara untuk melewati saat berada lewat lampu merah sudah pudar dan tidak terlihat. Kepala Bidang Arus Lalu Lintas Dinas Perhubungan Kabupaten Banggai, Arif Kusnanto yang diminta klarifikasi atas hal itu, mengatakan zebra cross tersebut merupakan kewenangan atau tanggungjawab pihak wilayah Provinsi. “Dalam hal ini Dinas Perhubungan Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah,”kata dia, saat ditemui awak media ini, Rabu (17/1/2024). Dikatakan Arif, sementara pihaknya disini hanya sebagai perpanjangan tangan untuk menyampaikan ke pihak Provinsi. Arif berkata, bahwa pihaknya sudah mencoba berkomunikasi dengan Dishub Sulteng terkait hal tersebut. “Namun, hingga saat ini belum ada tindak lanjut dari pihak Provinsi.” Arif berharap, adanya koordinasi ini, semoga persoalan tersebut dapat direalisasikan dengan cepat. “Semoga tahun ini bisa ada pengecatan zebra cross yang sudah tidak kelihatan sama sekali dan sudah tidak terlihat garisnya,” tutupnya. (*/asw)
text_en: LUWUK, LUWUK POST.id – The zebra crossing located in the Jalan Ahmad Yani area, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, is no longer visible. This is because drivers casually stop right in front of the zebra crossing line while waiting for the red light to turn on. Based on monitoring by the Luwuk Post daily print, almost until 2023 the zebra crossing at that location will no longer function as a marker for pedestrians and motorists. The paint line that prohibits motorists from passing through a red light has faded and is not visible. Head of the Traffic Flow Division of the Banggai Regency Transportation Service, Arif Kusnanto, who was asked for clarification on this matter, said that the zebra crossing was the authority or responsibility of the provincial authorities. "In this case, the Central Sulawesi Provincial Transportation Service," he said, when met by this media crew, Wednesday (17/1/2024). Arif said that while his party was only here as an extension to convey this to the Province. Arif said that his party had tried to communicate with the Central Sulawesi Transportation Department regarding this matter. "However, until now there has been no follow-up from the Province." Arif hopes that with this coordination, this problem can be realized quickly. "Hopefully this year there can be painting of zebra crossings that are completely invisible and the lines are no longer visible," he concluded. (*/asw)

title: Tour de Banggai Berganti Banggai Run Challenge 2024
text: BANGGAI RAYA – Tour de Banggai yang merupakan ajang bagi pecinta balap sepeda di Kabupaten Banggai tidak akan digelar tahun ini. Sebagai gantinya, Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai akan menghelat Banggai Run Challenge 2024.Hal ini memastikan bahwa kegiatan yang menggabungkan olahraga dan pariwisata atau sport tourism tetap tumbuh di Kabupaten Banggai.“Kegiatan ini merupakan pengganti dari Tour de Banggai. Jadi, kita mengikuti tren yang ada. Sekarang ini trennya lari,” ujar Bupati Banggai Amirudin saat memimpin rapat persiapan pelaksanaan Banggai Run Challenge 2024, Kamis (18/1/2024), di Kantor Bupati Banggai, Luwuk Selatan.Bupati Amirudin berharap ajang ini dapat menumbuhkan perekonomian, khususnya bagi pelaku UMKM dan ekonomi kreatif.“Ini kegiatan bagus, murah dan menyehatkan, dan diharapkan dapat menumbuhkan perekonomian masyarakat setempat,” ujar Bupati Amirudin.Banggai Run Challenge 2024 akan digelar tiga kali di tiga lokasi berbeda. Run de Toili menjadi pembuka Banggai Run Challenge 2024 season pertama.Run de Toili season 1 akan dilaksanakan di Kecamatan Toili, hari Minggu, tanggal 3 Maret 2024. Titik start dan finish di Lapangan Tirta Sari dan akan melewati Desa Tirta Kencana, Desa Jaya Kencana, dan Desa Sentral Sari.Selanjutnya, season 2 akan dihelat di Kecamatan Bunta pada bulan Mei. Banggai Run Challenge season 3 dilaksanakan di Kecamatan Luwuk pada Agustus mendatang.Adapun kelas yang diperlombakan yakni kelas fun 5 Km (men and women open) dan kelas run 10 Km (men and women open). Ada pula kelas master B lokal dan master A berdasarkan kategori usia.Para peserta Banggai Run Challenge akan memperebutkan total hadiah sebesar Rp 70 juta. Panitia memperkirakan, ajang ini akan diikuti sekitar 1.000 sampai 1.500 orang.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA – The Tour de Banggai, which is an event for bicycle racing lovers in Banggai Regency, will not be held this year. Instead, the Banggai Regency Government will hold the Banggai Run Challenge 2024. This ensures that activities that combine sports and tourism or sport tourism continue to grow in Banggai Regency. "This activity is a replacement for the Tour de Banggai. So, we follow existing trends. "Right now the trend is running," said Banggai Regent Amirudin when leading a preparatory meeting for the implementation of the 2024 Banggai Run Challenge, Thursday (18/1/2024), at the Banggai Regent's Office, South Luwuk. Regent Amirudin hopes that this event can grow the economy, especially for MSMEs. and the creative economy. "This is a good, cheap and healthy activity, and is expected to grow the economy of the local community," said Regent Amirudin. The 2024 Banggai Run Challenge will be held three times in three different locations. Run de Toili is the opening of the first season of the Banggai Run Challenge 2024. Run de Toili season 1 will be held in Toili District, Sunday, March 3 2024. The start and finish points are at Tirta Sari Field and will pass through Tirta Kencana Village, Jaya Kencana Village, and Sentral Sari Village. Next, season 2 will be held in Bunta District in May. Banggai Run Challenge season 3 will be held in Luwuk District next August. The classes being contested are the 5 Km fun class (men and women open) and the 10 Km run class (men and women open). There are also local master B and master A classes based on age categories. Banggai Run Challenge participants will compete for a total prize of IDR 70 million. The committee estimates that this event will be attended by around 1,000 to 1,500 people.**

title: Wartawan Kabupaten Banggai Salurkan 100 Bungkus Makanan Siap Saji dalam Aksi Jumat Berkah
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Wartawan Kabupaten BanggaiSalurkan 100 Bungkus Makanan Siap Saji dalam Aksi Jumat Berkah. WartawanKabupaten Banggaidi bawah kepemimpinan Iskandar Djiada menyelenggarakan aksipeduli sosialyang menghangatkan hati.Dengan semangat berbagi dan keinginan untuk meringankan beban sesama, para wartawan tersebut menyalurkan makanan siap saji sebanyak 100 bungkus di depan KantorSekretariat PWI Banggai.Jumat tanggal 19 Januari 2024.Aksi kebaikan ini merupakan bagian dari kegiatan rutin yang dilakukan oleh para wartawan setempat. Mereka tidak hanya menjalankan tugas jurnalistiknya, tetapi juga berkomitmen untuk turut berkontribusi dalam meningkatkan kesejahteraan masyarakat di sekitar mereka.Ketua PWI Kabupaten Banggai, Iskandar Djiada, mengekspresikan harapannya agar kegiatan positif seperti ini dapat menjadi inspirasi bagi semua tim yang bekerja tanpa pamrih. Dengan memberikan contoh nyata tentang kepedulian terhadap sesama, mereka berharap mampu mengajak lebih banyak orang untuk berbagi sesuai dengan kemampuan masing-masing.Aksi ini tidak mungkin terlaksana tanpa dukungan dari para donatur yang ingin menjaga anonimitasnya. Mereka adalah hamba Allah yang dermawan, turut berperan dalam mewujudkan kegiatan sosial yang memiliki dampak positif bagi masyarakat.Pantauan media yang mengikuti kegiatan ini menunjukkan antusiasme tinggi dari masyarakat setempat. Banyak yang menanti kehadiran tim wartawan dan berharap mendapatkan bagian dari makanan siap saji yang disalurkan. Kegiatan “Jumat Berkah” ini menjadi momen yang dinanti-nantikan dan memberikan bukti bahwa kebaikan selalu mendapatkan sambutan hangat dari masyarakat.Semoga aksi peduli sosial yang dilakukan oleh Wartawan Kabupaten Banggai ini dapat menginspirasi lebih banyak orang untuk terlibat dalam kegiatan amal dan membentuk lingkaran kebaikan yang terus berkembang di masyarakat.**
text_en: LUWUK KABAR – Banggai Regency Journalists Distributed 100 Packs of Ready-to-Eat Food in the Blessing Friday Action. Journalists from Banggaidi Regency under the leadership of Iskandar Djiada held a heart-warming social action. With the spirit of sharing and the desire to lighten the burden on others, the journalists distributed 100 packs of ready-to-eat food in front of the PWI Banggai Secretariat Office. Friday, January 19 2024. This act of kindness is part of routine activities carried out by local journalists. They not only carry out their journalistic duties, but are also committed to contributing to improving the welfare of the people around them. Chairman of the Banggai Regency PWI, Iskandar Djiada, expressed his hope that positive activities like this can be an inspiration for all teams who work selflessly. By providing real examples of caring for others, they hope to be able to invite more people to share according to their respective abilities. This action would not have been possible without the support of donors who wanted to maintain their anonymity. They are generous servants of God, playing a role in realizing social activities that have a positive impact on society. Media monitoring following this activity shows high enthusiasm from the local community. Many were waiting for the journalist team to arrive and hoped to get a share of the ready-to-eat food that was distributed. This "Blessed Friday" activity is a moment that has been eagerly awaited and provides proof that kindness always gets a warm welcome from the community. Hopefully this social care action carried out by Banggai Regency Journalists can inspire more people to get involved in charity activities and form a circle of goodness that continues to grow in society.**

title: Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng Mendampingi Irjen Razilu Kunker di Kota Luwuk
text: LUWUK, LUWUK POST.id – Jajaran Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia Sulawesi Tengah (Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng) menerima kunjungan kerja (Kunker) Inspektur Jenderal (Irjen) Kemenkumham Republik Indonesia, Ir. Razilu di Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai. Kamis (18/1/2024). Dipimpin Kepala Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng Hermansyah Siregar, berbagai unsur Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai hingga Forum Komunikasi Pimpinan Daerah (Forkopimda) Banggai turut serta mendampingi kegiatan tersebut. Kamis, (18/1/2024) siang. Adapun kunjungan tersebut, diagendakan akan melaksanakan berbagai kegiatan peninjauan hingga menggelorakan program terbaru Inspektorat Jenderal (Itjen) di tahun 2024 yakni Irjen ADA atau Irjen Aktif Dengarkan Aspirasi di sejumlah satuan kerja di jajaran Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng. “Sangat senang dan bersyukur di awal tahun ini, kami bisa mendapat kunjungan kerja Bapak Irjen Razilu disini. Tentu, ini menjadi salah satu motivasi kami dalam menghiasi tahun 2024 yang lebih gemilang lagi,” sambut Kepala Kantor Wilayah (Kakanwil) Kemenkumham Sulteng Hermansyah Siregar di Bandar Udara Syukuran Aminuddin Amir. Dalam kesempatan tersebut, Kakanwil turut ditemani oleh Asisten 1 Setda Banggai, Hj. Nurdjalal bersama berbagai unsur Forkopimda Kab. Banggai serta para Kepala Divisi, dan para Kepala Unit Pelaksana Teknis Pemasyarakatan dan Keimigrasian. Menyambut baik kunjungan tersebut, Nurdjalal yang mewakili Bupati Banggai juga berharap agar hal tersebut menjadi momentum baik dalam menguatkan kemitraan kerja sama bagi pihaknya bersama jajaran Kemenkumham. Apalagi kata dia, hubungan kerja sama tersebut telah terjalin dengan sangat baik, dan telah menghasilkan banyak pencapaian baik bagi pembangunan daerah di Kabupaten Banggai. “Sangat bahagia dengan kunjungan ini, Bapak Bupati pun memastikan bahwa kemitraan kerja sama antara Pemerintah Banggai bersama Kemenkumham berjalan lebih baik lagi,” ungkapnya. Sementara itu, Irjen. Razilu yang terakhir kali mengunjungi Kota Air Luwuk pada bulan Mei 2023 yang lalu juga kembali mengungkapkan kesyukurannya atas kunkernya di Kota Luwuk tersebut. Ia menjelaskan bahwa kunkernya tersebut merupakan salah satu bentuk pengoptimalannya dalam melakukan pengawasan kinerja di lingkungan Kemenkumham Republik Indonesia. Berbeda dari sebelumnya, dalam tahun 2024 ia mengusung salah satu program Irjen ADA atau Irjen Aktif Dengarkan Aspirasi. Hal ini pun, ia katakan akan dilakukan di sejumlah Satuan Kerja di Kota Luwuk yang dinaungi Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng. “Alhamdulillah, bisa kembali ke Kota Luwuk ini, pastinya kunker kali ini kami ingin melihat bagaimana kinerja jajaran kita disini. Selain itu, kami juga akan melakukan agenda mendengarkan aspirasi dari jajaran. Semoga saja berjalan lancar,” pungkasnya. Giat Tausiyah Irjen Kemenkumham RI Kepada WBP Lapas Luwuk // Masih dalam rangkaian Kunker, Kakanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng, Hermansyah Siregar mendampingi Irjen Kemenkumham RI, Ir. Razilu memberikan tausiyah kepada Warga Binaan Pemasyarakatan (WBP) Lembaga Pemasyarakatan (Lapas) Kelas IIB Luwuk, Kamis, (18/1/2024) sore. Dalam tausiyahnya, Irjen. Razilu mengajak kepada seluruh WBP untuk terus meningkatkan amal saleh guna menggapai beribu pahala dalam menjalani proses pembinaannya. Ia pun menguraikan bahwa dalam mencapai amal saleh yang baik, mesti diiringi dengan rutinnya membersihkan hati dengan beristigfar atau memohon ampun kepada Tuhan Yang Maha Esa. “Mari kita tingkatkan amal saleh dengan rutin membersihkan hati dengan beristigfar memohon ampun, keberadaan saudara sekalian disini mesti disyukuri bukan disesali. Apapun yang terjadi kepada kita mesti kita tanggapi dengan berpikir positif,” pesannya. Dalam kesempatan tersebut, Irjen. Razilu turut didampingi oleh Kakanwil Hermansyah, Kepala Divisi (Kadiv) Pemasyarakatan Ricky Dwi Biantoro, Kadiv Keimigrasian, Arief Hazairin Satoto serta para Kepala Satuan Kerja Pemasyarakatan dan Keimigrasian se-Sulteng. Dirinya pun menjelaskan berbagai kiat-kiat dalam meningkatkan amal saleh, apalagi kata dia, saat ini telah memasuki bulan Rajab, ia kembali mengajak agar seluruh WBP dapat mempertahankan ibadah wajib serta meningkatkan ibadah sunnah seperti berpuasa, hingga tadarus Al-Qur’an. “Pertahankan Shalat lima waktu serta perbanyak ibadah sunnah, apalagi saat ini telah memasuki bulan rajab, ini harus kita manfaatkan bersama,” tambahnya. Lebih lanjut, ia pun memberikan salah satu buku keagamaan kepada Kepala Lapas Luwuk, Efendi Wahyudi, ia berharap agar seluruh WBP dapat memanfaatkan waktu untuk mengkaji setiap isi dalam buku yang merupakan warisan dari suri tauladan Nabi Muhammad SAW. “Ini saya mau lihat realisasinya, manfaatkan dengan sebaik-baiknya untuk mengkaji setiap ilmu didalam buku ini,” pungkasnya. Sementara itu, Kakanwil Hermansyah pun mengaku bersyukur atas motivasi yang diberikan oleh Irjen Razilu. Ia menegaskan bahwa pembinaan keagamaan di dalam Lapas akan terus ditingkatkan. “Tentu ini menjadi hal yang kami syukuri, kedepan pembinaan keagamaan akan terus kita tingkatkan,” imbuh Kakanwil Hermansyah. (*/Mjd)
text_en: LUWUK, LUWUK POST.id – Central Sulawesi Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights (Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng) received a working visit (Kunker) from the Inspector General (Irjen) of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia, Ir. Razilu in Luwuk City, Banggai Regency. Thursday (18/1/2024). Led by the Head of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Regional Office, Hermansyah Siregar, various elements of the Banggai Regency Regional Government and the Banggai Regional Leadership Communication Forum (Forkopimda) participated in accompanying this activity. Thursday, (18/1/2024) afternoon. As for the visit, it is scheduled to carry out various review activities to promote the Inspectorate General's newest program in 2024, namely Inspector General ADA or Inspector General Actively Listening to Aspirations in a number of work units within the Central Sulawesi Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights. "We are very happy and grateful that at the beginning of this year, we were able to have a working visit from Inspector General Razilu here. "Of course, this is one of our motivations in making 2024 even more brilliant," said the Head of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Regional Office (Kakanwil), Hermansyah Siregar at Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Airport. On this occasion, the Head of Regional Office was also accompanied by Assistant 1 of the Banggai Regional Secretariat, Hj. Nurdjalal together with various elements of Forkopimda Kab. Banggai and the Heads of Divisions, and the Heads of the Correctional and Immigration Technical Implementation Unit. Welcoming the visit, Nurdjalal, who represented the Regent of Banggai, also hoped that this would be a good momentum in strengthening cooperative partnerships for his party and the ranks of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights. Moreover, he said, the cooperative relationship has been established very well, and has resulted in many good achievements for regional development in Banggai Regency. "Very happy with this visit, the Regent also ensured that the cooperative partnership between the Banggai Government and the Ministry of Law and Human Rights is running even better," he said. Meanwhile, Inspector General. Razilu, who last visited Air Luwuk City in May 2023, also expressed his gratitude for his visit to Luwuk City. He explained that the work visit was a form of optimization in monitoring performance within the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia. Different from before, in 2024 he will carry out one of the Inspector General ADA or Inspector General Active Listening to Aspiration programs. He also said that this would be carried out in a number of Work Units in Luwuk City which are overseen by the Central Sulawesi Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights. "Thank God, we can return to Luwuk City, of course this time we want to see how our staff perform here. Apart from that, we will also carry out an agenda to listen to the aspirations of the ranks. Hopefully it goes smoothly," he concluded. The Inspector General of the Republic of Indonesia's Ministry of Law and Human Rights' Active Tausiyah to Luwuk Prison Inmates // Still in the series of work visits, the Regional Head of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of Central Sulawesi, Hermansyah Siregar accompanied the Inspector General of the Republic of Indonesia's Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Ir. Razilu gave sermons to Class IIB Luwuk Prison Residents (WBP), Thursday (18/1/2024) afternoon. In his tausiyah, Inspector General. Razilu invited all WBPs to continue to increase their pious deeds in order to achieve thousands of rewards in undergoing the coaching process. He also explained that in order to achieve good pious deeds, it must be accompanied by regularly cleansing the heart by praying or asking for forgiveness from God Almighty. "Let's increase our pious deeds by regularly cleansing our hearts by praying for forgiveness. Your presence here must be grateful for, not regretful. "Whatever happens to us, we must respond with positive thinking," he said. On this occasion, Inspector General. Razilu was also accompanied by Head of Regional Office Hermansyah, Head of Corrections Division (Kadiv) Ricky Dwi Biantoro, Head of Immigration Division, Arief Hazairin Satoto and Heads of Corrections and Immigration Work Units throughout Central Sulawesi. He also explained various tips dnature increases pious deeds, especially as he said, now that the month of Rajab has entered, he again invites all WBP to maintain obligatory worship and increase sunnah worship such as fasting and reciting the Koran. "Maintain the five daily prayers and increase sunnah worship, especially now that we have entered the month of Rajab, we must take advantage of this together," he added. Furthermore, he also gave one of the religious books to the Head of Luwuk Prison, Efendi Wahyudi, he hopes that all inmates can take advantage of the time to study each content in the book which is the legacy of the role model of the Prophet Muhammad SAW. "I want to see the realization, make the best use of it to study every knowledge in this book," he concluded. Meanwhile, Kakanwil Hermansyah also admitted that he was grateful for the motivation given by Inspector General Razilu. He emphasized that religious formation in prisons would continue to be improved. "Of course this is something we are grateful for, in the future we will continue to improve religious development," added Head of Regional Office Hermansyah. (*/Mjd)

title: Kabagops Polres Banggai Gelar Jumat Berkah, Bagikan Ratusan Nasi Kotak
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Ratusan paket nasi kotak kembali disalurkan Kabagops Polres Banggai Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi SH, SIK, di kompleks Pelabuhan Rakyat Luwuk, Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, Jumat (19/1/2024).Program Jumat Berkah ini menyasar para buruh pelabuhan, pedagang asongan, tukang ojek dan sopir angkutan umum yang berada di kawasan Pelabuhan.Pembagian makanan siap saji ini tidak hanya dilakukan di area Pelabuhan saja, akan tetapi dibagikan pula di Panti Asuhan dalam Kota Luwuk.”Program ini merupakan wujud kehadiran dan kepedulian Polri di tengah-tengah masyarakat,” ungkapnya saat ditemui awak media diselah-selah kegiatan tersebut.Melalui kegiatan ini ia berharap dapat menjalin hubungan yang baik dengan masyarakat, sekaligus menyampaikan pesan-pesan kamtibmas.“Program ini akan terus dilaksanakan di sejumlah tempat untuk menjalin silahturahmi dengan masyarakat,” sebutnya.“Kalau murah kasih sayang mu kepada sesama, kasih sayang Allah SWT akan murah kepadamu,” pesan Kabagops.Selain itu, tanggapan masyarakat sekitar, mengucapkan terima kasih dan merasa senang karena mendapatkan berkah berupa makanan siap saji tersebut.(*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Hundreds of packages of boxed rice were again distributed by Banggai Police Chief Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi SH, SIK, at the Luwuk People's Harbor complex, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, Friday (19/1/2024). This Blessing Friday program targets port workers, hawkers, motorcycle taxi drivers and public transport drivers in the port area. The distribution of ready-to-eat food is not only carried out in the port area, but is also distributed at orphanages in Luwuk City. "in the midst of the community," he said when met by media crew on the sidelines of the activity. Through this activity he hopes to establish good relations with the community, as well as convey messages about security and social order. "This program will continue to be implemented in a number of places to build friendship with the community ," he said. "If your love for others is cheap, Allah SWT's love will be cheap for you," said Kabagops. Apart from that, the response from the local community was to express their gratitude and feel happy because they received the blessing in the form of ready-to-eat food. (*)

title: Pemkab Banggai dan Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng Jalin Kerja Sama Pelayanan HAKI
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia (Kemenkumham) Sulawesi Tengah menjalin kerja sama dengan Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai tentang Hak Kekayaan Intelektual (HAKI). Kerja sama dimulai dengan penandatanganan antara BupatiBanggai , Amirudin , dan Kepala Kantor Wilayah Kemenkumham Sulteng, Hermansyah Siregar, di Hotel Swissbellin Luwuk, Jumat (19/1/2024). Penandatanganan ini disaksikan langsung Inspektur Jenderal (Irjen) Kemenkumham RI, Ir. Razilu. Serta dihadiri Ketua DPRD Banggai, jajaran Kantor Wilayah Kemenkumham Sulteng, dan pimpinan OPD Kabupaten Banggai. Bupati Amirudin menjelaskan penandatanganan kerja sama ini untuk memudahkan pelayanan kepada masyarakat, sehingga pemerintah sebagai regulator, fasilitator, dan mediator dapat merasakan dampaknya oleh masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai. Apalagi, Kabupaten Banggai dengan jarak tempuh menuju Palu, ibu kota Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah berjarak 650 kilometer. "Dengan jarak tempuh yang cukup jauh itu akan berdampak pada lambatnya pelayanan kepada masyarakat," tutur Bupati Amirudin . Karena itu, Ia sangat mengapresiasi kegiatan yang dilaksanakan oleh Kantor Wilayah Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah yang telah membuka agenda layanan HAKI di Kabupaten Bangga untuk mempercepat pelayanan kepada masyarakat. Bupati Amirudin menambahkan telah memerintahkan Kantor Badan Riset dan Inovasi Daerah (BRIDA) Kabupaten Banggai untuk menganggarkan fasilitas HAKI yang diajukan oleh masyarakat. "Alhamdulillah tahun 2024 ini telah dialokasikan anggaran di dalam APBD, sehingga ke depannya urusan HAKI yang diajukan oleh masyarakat ini semuanya gratis," kata dia. Ia berharap dengan adanya anggaran fasilitas HAKI dapat meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat akan pentingnya perlindungan hak kekayaan intelektual agar tidak diklaim oleh orang lain. "Sekaligus Hak Kekayaan Intelektual tersebut mendapatkan perlindungan hukum," harap Bupati Amirudin . Sementara itu, Irjen Kemenkumham RI, Ir. Razilu, sangat mengapresiasi dan mendukung kepemimpinan Bupati Amirudin dan Wakil BupatiBanggai Furqanuddin Masulili, karena telah menyalurkan dana Rp 5 miliar untuk setiap kecamatan. Kata dia, kebijakan ini merupakan capaian satu-satunya daerah di Indonesia yang memberikan anggaran sebanyak ini untuk wilayah kecamatan. "Ini motivasi kepala daerah yang sangat begitu serius dan perhatian dalam membangun Kabupaten Banggai untuk lebih baik, lebih maju, dan lebih berkembang ke depannya," (*)
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - The Central Sulawesi Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights (Kemenkumham) is collaborating with the Banggai Regency Government regarding Intellectual Property Rights (HAKI). The collaboration began with a signing between the Regent of Banggai, Amirudin, and the Head of the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi, Hermansyah Siregar, at the Swissbellin Hotel Luwuk, Friday (19/1/2024). This signing was witnessed directly by the Inspector General (Irjen) of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Ir. Razilu. It was also attended by the Chairman of the Banggai DPRD, officials from the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi, and the leadership of the Banggai Regency OPD. Regent Amirudin explained that the signing of this collaboration was to facilitate services to the community, so that the government as a regulator, facilitator and mediator could feel the impact on the people of Banggai Regency. Moreover, Banggai Regency is 650 kilometers from Palu, the capital of Central Sulawesi Province. "The long distance will result in slow service to the community," said Regent Amirudin. For this reason, he really appreciates the activities carried out by the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Regional Office which has opened an IPR service agenda in Bangga Regency to speed up services to the community. Regent Amirudin added that he had ordered the Banggai Regency Regional Research and Innovation Agency (BRIDA) Office to budget for IPR facilities proposed by the community. "Thank God, in 2024 a budget has been allocated in the APBD, so that in the future all IPR matters submitted by the public will be free," he said. He hopes that the IPR facility budget can increase public awareness of the importance of protecting intellectual property rights so that they are not claimed by others. "At the same time, Intellectual Property Rights will receive legal protection," hoped Regent Amirudin. Meanwhile, the Inspector General of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Ir. Razilu really appreciates and supports the leadership of Regent Amirudin and Deputy Regent of Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili, because they have distributed funds of IDR 5 billion to each sub-district. He said, this policy is the achievement of the only region in Indonesia that provides this much budget for sub-district areas. "This is the motivation of the regional head who is very serious and concerned about developing Banggai Regency to be better, more advanced and more developed in the future," (*)

title: Polres Banggai, Tangkap 2 Pria Diduga Pelaku Pencurian
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Tim Resmob Tompotika Satuan Reserse Kriminal (Satreskrim) Polres Banggai berhasil menangkap dua pria SA alias Andi (31) dan RM (33), yang diduga pelaku spesialis pencurian pembobolan rumah, di Kompleks Tanjungsari Kelurahan Kraton Kecamatan Luwuk, Rabu (17/1/2024). Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai, AKP Tio Tondi di ruang kerjanya, Kamis (18/1/2024) mengatakan, kedua tersangka diduga melakukan pencurian dan masuk ke rumah korban Zaka Hidayah (31), pada Kamis (11/1/2024) sekitar pukul 04.00 WITA. “Karena pintu depan rumah yang tidak terkunci, pelaku berhasil masuk. Saat itu korban sedang tertidur pulas, maka mereka dengan leluasa mengambil barang-barang dari rumah tersebut, dan berhasil melarikan diri,” kata Kasat. Menurutnya, korban baru menyadari bahwa rumahnya kemalingan saat terbangun, serta kaget melihat barang-barang yang sudah berantakan, serta sejumlah barang lainnya hilang. “Saat korban mengecek barang-barang yang ada di dalam kamarnya, dua buah cicin emas, pemanas nasi (rice cooker) serta sebuah tas ransel sudah raib dibawa maling, dan total kerugian diperkirakan sebanyak Rp5 juta,” terang Tio. Korban langsung melaporkan kejadian tersebut ke Polres Banggai. Berdasarkan laporan itu, kepolisian langsung melakukan penyelidikan ke Tempat Kejadian Perkara (TKP). Setelah diselidiki, akhirnya kedua pelaku berhasil diamankan. “Kini kedua pelaku sudah diamankan di Mapolres Banggai, untuk menjalani pemeriksaan dan proses hukum lebih lanjut,” tandas Tio. */PAR Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai, AKP Tio Tondi di ruang kerjanya, Kamis (18/1/2024) mengatakan, kedua tersangka diduga melakukan pencurian dan masuk ke rumah korban Zaka Hidayah (31), pada Kamis (11/1/2024) sekitar pukul 04.00 WITA. “Karena pintu depan rumah yang tidak terkunci, pelaku berhasil masuk.
