title: Bupati Amirudin Dorong Perlindungan HAKI Pelaku Usaha Kerajinan di Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO Dorong upaya perlindungan Hak Kekayaan Intelektual bagi Pelaku Usaha Kerajinan, Sabtu (27/1/2024) di Ballroom Hotel Santika Luwuk Banggai.“Pihak BRIDA sudah memasukan dalam APBD, bahwa teman-teman yang akan memasukan hasil temuannya ke Hak Kekayaan Intelektual itu gratis,” ujar Bupati Amirudin.Hal itu disampaikan dalam kegiatan yang diselenggarakan oleh Dewan Kerajinan Nasional Daerah (Dekranasda) Kabupaten Banggai Dalam rangka meningkatkan pemahaman, kreativitas, dan keterampilan dalam mengembangkan usaha kriya/kerajinan.Ketua Dekranasda, Hj Hj. Syamsuarni Amirudin, SE., MM., menyatakan bahwa kegiatan ini merupakan langkah awal dalam rangka mengembangkan potensi kriya dan kerajinan di Kabupaten Banggai.BACA JUGA:Polisi Limpahkan Kasus Wanita Cantik Terlibat Narkoba ke Kejari“Ada beberapa pemateri, mudah – mudahan ini sebagai bagian kita semua untuk menjadi pelajaran kedepan, Sebagai bahan masukan untuk para pelaku usaha yang ada di Kab. Banggai bisa jauh lebih berkembang,” Ujar Ketua Dekranasda.Pemateri yang akan turut serta dalam pembinaan dan penguatan kapasitas pelaku usaha dan Pengrajin tersebut yaitu Ketua Dekranasda, Hj Hj. Syamsuarni Amirudin, SE., MM, Kepala Badan Perencanaan Pembangunan Daerah (Bappeda) Banggai, Ramli Tongko, S.Sos., ST., M.Si., dan Sekretaris BRIDA Banggai Iksan Budiono, SE, M.Si.BACA JUGA:Dihadiri Ratusan Warga, Kabagops Polres Banggai Pimpin Apel Pengamanan Kampanye di NamboDalam mendukung promosi produk kriya dan kerajinan, Bupati banggai akan menyediakan tempat kepada pihak Dekranasda di Bandar Udara Syukuran Aminuddin Amir untuk kegiatan pajangan, hal ini memungkinkan hasil dari produk para pelaku usaha dapat dipamerkan secara lebih luas.Selain itu, Bupati Amirudin melakukan dialog terhadap beberapa peserta mengenai dukungan serta bantuan yang akan diberikan dalam mendukung sektor kriya/kerajinan.“Ada bantuan Rp5 miliar per kecamatan, itu boleh digunakan untuk kerajinan, karena tujuan kita kasih yaitu supaya menghidupkan semua pelaku usaha yang ada di daerah,” jelas Bupati Banggai.BACA JUGA:Gisel, Dosen FISIP Unismuh Luwuk Lolos dan Dibiayai Ikuti Festival Pemuda Dunia di RusiaLanjutnya, Ia menjelaskan terdapat Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) yang terbuka bagi proposal dari pelaku usaha untuk memberikan kesempatan lebih luas dalam menciptakan sinergi antara sektor swasta dan pelaku usaha lokal.Acara ini melibatkan peserta sebanyak 60 orang yang berasal dari 17 kecamatan yang tersebar di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai.Adapun jenis pelaku usaha yang terlibat dalam kegiatan ini yaitu Usaha batik Saluan, anyaman rotan, anyaman lidi, pandai besi, daur, kerajinan kayu, dan kerajinan bambu. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Banggai Regent, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO Encourages efforts to protect Intellectual Property Rights for Craft Business Actors, Saturday (27/1/2024) at the Ballroom of the Santika Luwuk Banggai Hotel. "BRIDA has included it in the APBD, friends who will include the results of their findings "Intellectual Property Rights are free," said Regent Amirudin. This was conveyed in an activity organized by the Regional National Crafts Council (Dekranasda) of Banggai Regency in order to increase understanding, creativity and skills in developing craft/handicraft businesses. Chairman of Dekranasda, Hj Hj . Syamsuarni Amirudin, SE., MM., stated that this activity was the first step in developing the potential of crafts and crafts in Banggai Regency. ALSO READ: Police Handover Case of Beautiful Woman Involved in Drugs to Prosecutor "There are several presenters, hopefully this will be part of for all of us to be a lesson for the future, as input for business actors in the district. "Proud to be able to develop much more," said the Chair of Dekranasda. The speaker who will take part in coaching and strengthening the capacity of business actors and craftsmen is the Chair of Dekranasda, Hj Hj. Syamsuarni Amirudin, SE., MM, Head of the Banggai Regional Development Planning Agency (Bappeda), Ramli Tongko, S.Sos., ST., M.Sc., and Secretary of BRIDA Banggai Iksan Budiono, SE, M.Si. READ ALSO: Attended by hundreds of residents, the Head of Banggai Police Headquarters Leads the Campaign Security Call in Nambo. In supporting the promotion of craft and handicraft products, the Regent of Banggai will provide Dekranasda with a place at Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Airport for display activities, this allows the results of business actors' products to be exhibited publicly. In addition, Regent Amirudin held a dialogue with several participants regarding the support and assistance that would be provided to support the craft/handicraft sector. "There is assistance of IDR 5 billion per sub-district, which can be used for crafts, because our aim is to provide life to all actors businesses in the region," explained the Regent of Banggai. READ ALSO: Gisel, Lecturer at FISIP Unismuh Luwuk Passes and is Funded to Participate in the World Youth Festival in Russia. He continued, he explained that there is Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) which is open to proposals from business actors to provide more opportunities wide scope in creating synergy between the private sector and local business actors. This event involved 60 participants from 17 sub-districts spread across the Banggai Regency area. The types of business actors involved in this activity were Saluan batik business, rattan woven, stick woven , blacksmithing, recycling, wood crafts, and bamboo crafts. (*)

title: Bawaslu Banggai Identifikasi Dugaan Mobilisasi ASN, Keberpihakan Kades dan Politik Uang di Pemilu
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Badan Pengawas Pemilihan Umum (Bawaslu) Banggai mengidentifikasi sejumlah model dugaan pelanggaran pemilu di daerah beribukota Luwuk itu.Ketua Bawaslu Banggai Ridwan saat membuka rakor fasilitasi dan pembinaan penanganan pelanggaran, yang diikuti seluruh anggota dan sekretariat Panwascam dari 23 kecamatan, Sabtu (27/1/2024) di Swissbelinn Hotel Luwuk mengatakan, sampai saat ini Bawaslu baru menangani 1 pelanggaran pemilu dan 3 pelanggaran administrasi pemilu.BACA JUGA:Gisel, Dosen FISIP Unismuh Luwuk Lolos dan Dibiayai Ikuti Festival Pemuda Dunia di RusiaPada pemilu sebelumnya kata Ridwan, Bawaslu pernah memproses puluhan kasus pidana pemilu.Ia juga menjelaskan, berdasarkan pemetaan dan identifikasi, ada sejumlah model dugaan pelanggaran pemilu, antara lain mobilisasi ASN dan pengumpulan KTP,keberpihakan kepala desa,politik uang dan isu tertentu.BACA JUGA:Dihadiri Ratusan Warga, Kabagops Polres Banggai Pimpin Apel Pengamanan Kampanye di NamboKarenanya kata dia, Bawaslu Banggai akan menyampaikan sejumlah strategi pada panwascam, terkait langkah yang dilakukan guna menekan pelanggaran pemilu dan mempersempit ruang gerak pelaku pelanggaran.Ia memberi contoh seperti kasus pelanggaran di pemilu sebelumnya, seperti mobilisasi beras untuk dibagikan kepada pemilih, ujaran kebencian dan sebagainya. Bahkan di tahun 2020 kata dia, ada contoh pelanggaran pemilu yakni KPPS memberi tanda di surat suara.BACA JUGA:Polisi Limpahkan Kasus Wanita Cantik Terlibat Narkoba ke KejariRidwan menegaskan, patroli pengawasan harus berjalan efektif agar kita mampu menciptakan pemilu yang demokratis.“Pengawas akan mengawal hak konsitusi warga negara. Karenanya, saya minta seluruh elemen Panwascam menjaga marwah lembaga,” tandasnya. DAR
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The General Election Supervisory Agency (Bawaslu) Banggai identified a number of models of alleged election violations in the area with the capital Luwuk. Chairman of Bawaslu Banggai Ridwan when opening a coordination meeting on facilitation and guidance on handling violations, which was attended by all Panwascam members and secretariat from 23 sub-districts, Saturday (27 /1/2024) at the Swissbelinn Hotel Luwuk said, to date Bawaslu has only handled 1 election violation and 3 election administration violations. READ ALSO: Gisel, Lecturer at FISIP Unismuh Luwuk Passes and is Funded to Participate in the World Youth Festival in Russia. In the previous election, Ridwan said, Bawaslu has processed dozens of criminal election cases. He also explained, based on mapping and identification, there were a number of models of alleged election violations, including ASN mobilization and KTP collection, village head partisanship, money politics and certain issues. ALSO READ: Hundreds of Residents Attended, Head of District Police Banggai Leads Campaign Security Call in Nambo. Therefore, he said, Bawaslu Banggai will convey a number of strategies to the supervisory committee, regarding the steps taken to suppress election violations and narrow the space for perpetrators of violations. He gave examples such as cases of violations in previous elections, such as mobilizing rice to be distributed to voters, hate speech and so on. Even in 2020, he said, there were examples of election violations, namely KPPS marking on ballot papers. ALSO READ: Police Handover Case of Beautiful Woman Involved in Drugs to Prosecutor. Ridwan emphasized that surveillance patrols must be effective so that we are able to create democratic elections. "Supervisors will supervise constitutional rights of citizens. "Therefore, I ask all elements of Panwascam to maintain the dignity of the institution," he said. DAR

title: Gisel, Dosen FISIP Unismuh Luwuk Lolos dan Dibiayai Ikuti Festival Pemuda Dunia di Rusia
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Selamat, prestasi membanggakan ditorehkan dosen tetap Prodi Ilmu Komunikasi, Fakultas Ilmu Sosial dan Ilmu Politik (FISIP) Unismuh Luwuk.Ia adalah Gisela Luigi Septiana, dosen tetap yang berhasil lolos dalam program World youth festival atau festival pemuda sedunia yang akan dilaksanakan Russia.Gisel, sapaan akrabnya akan mewakili Unismuh Luwuk, karena mendaftar sebagai representatif Dosen di Unishmuh Luwuk dengan mendapatkan poin tertinggi.“Allhamdulillah mendapat fully funded (dibiayai penuh) oleh pemerintah Russia. Acaranya selama 2 minggu tanggal Maret sampai 17 Maret. Insya Allah, berangkat pada 28 Februari nanti,” ungkap Gisela Luigi Septiana, Jumat 26 Januari 2024.Dosen muda dan cantik di kampus hijau itu menjelaskan, bahwa pada 1 Desember 2023 lalu, Ia mendaftar sebagai peserta The world youth festival yang akan dilaksanakan pada tanggal 1-7 Maret 2024 di Sirius Federal Territory, Sochi, Russia, dan dilanjutkan dengan Program Regional pada tanggal 10 sampai dengan 17 maret 2024.BACA JUGA:Kapolres Banggai Ikuti Anev Quick Wins Presisi dan Sosialisasi Beyond TrustProgram utama yaitu dimulai pada tanggal 1-7 Maret di Federal Territory. “Sochi merupakan Kota yang pernah menjadi Tuan Rumah Piala Dunia FIFA 2018. Pada tanggal 10-17 Maret 2024 untuk mengikuti program regional, saya akan ditempatkan di salah satu kota dari 30 kota Rusia yang menjadi tuan rumah program regional,” kata Gisela,Adapun proses seleksi yang dilalui adalah registrasi, menulis esai dan juga mengupload video berdurasi 1 menit.World Youth Festival atau yang disebut Festival Pemuda Dunia ini kata Gisela, merupakan acara pemuda terbesar di dunia yang diselenggarakan berdasarkan keputusan Presiden Rusia Vladimir Putin.Festival ini akan dihadiri oleh 20.000 pemimpin muda Rusia dan asing di berbagai bidang seperti bidang Pendidikan, sains, budaya, bisnis, media, kerja sama internasional, sukarelawan dan amal, olahraga serta berbagai bidang kehidupan publik.BACA JUGA:Pengamanan Pemilu, Polres Banggai Kerahkan 421 Personil dan 61 BKO PoldaSebanyak 20.000 peserta festival ini berasal dari 180 negara. “Dari 1000 pendaftar dari Indonesia yang diterima hanya 100 delegasi yang akan mewakili Indonesia pada festival ini,” jelasnya.Nah, 100 delegasi yang telah diseleksi dengan ketat dan dinyatakan diterima sambung Gisela, dipilih Kembali yang memiliki nilai atau poin tertinggi dalam essay dan video yang telah dibuat akan menerima dibiayai penuh (fully funded) dari pemerintah Russia selama program.“Salah satunya saya sebagai salah satu peserta Indonesia yang mendapatkan poin atau nilai tertinggi sehingga dibiayai penuh yaitu transportasi, makan-minum, akomodasi hotel, akses ke seluruh acara Pendidikan, budaya dan juga olahraga,” tuturnya.Adapun topik esai yang dibuat hingga mengantarkan lolos dan berhak mendapat pembiayaan penuh, terkait “the world of opportunities for everyone”.BACA JUGA:Nasib Tukang Tagih, Karyawan Koperasi Sangkakala Ini Dianiaya Nasabah di Luwuk Timur“Untuk video berdurasi 1 menit terkait prospek kerja sama antara Indonesia dan Russia, yang saat itu saya fokus membahas peluang Kerja sama di sektor Pendidikan dan bisnis yang ada di Kabupaten Banggai,” katanya.Ia berharap, sepulang dari program ini bisa memberikan Ilmu, perspektif baru tentang besarnya peran para pemuda di seluruh dunia untuk masa depan dan kehidupan dunia yang lebih baik lagi.“Harapan saya juga bisa berbagi pengalaman pada anak-anak muda di Kabupaten Banggai untuk tidak pernah merasa cukup akan ilmu dan terus mencari tau serta pantang menyerah untuk bersaing di kancah global/dunia, dan juga kontribusi yang lebih baik lagi kepada Universitas Muhammadiyah Luwuk dan juga Masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai,” tandasnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Congratulations, a proud achievement was made by a permanent lecturer in the Communication Science Study Program, Faculty of Social and Political Sciences (FISIP) Unismuh Luwuk. She is Gisela Luigi Septiana, a permanent lecturer who successfully passed the World Youth Festival program which will be held in Russia .Gisel, as she is known, will represent Unismuh Luwuk, because she registered as a representative lecturer at Unishmuh Luwuk by getting the highest points. "Alhamdulillah, I got fully funded by the Russian government. The event is for 2 weeks from March to March 17. "God willing, we will leave on February 28," said Gisela Luigi Septiana, Friday 26 January 2024. The young and beautiful lecturer at the green campus explained that on December 1 2023, she registered as a participant in The World Youth Festival which will be held on March 1-7 2024 at Sirius Federal Territory, Sochi, Russia, and continued with the Regional Program from March 10 to 17 2024. ALSO READ: Banggai Police Chief Participates in Anev Quick Wins Precision and Beyond Trust Socialization The main program starts on 1-7 March in the Federal Territory. "Sochi is the city that once hosted the 2018 FIFA World Cup. On March 10-17 2024 to take part in the regional program, I will be placed in one of the 30 Russian cities that will host the regional program," said Gisela, regarding the process The selection process involved is registration, writing an essay and also uploading a 1 minute video. The World Youth Festival or what is called the World Youth Festival, said Gisela, is the biggest youth event in the world which is being held based on the decision of Russian President Vladimir Putin. This festival will be attended by 20,000 young Russian and foreign leaders in various fields such as education, science, culture, business, media, international cooperation, volunteering and charity, sports and various fields of public life. ALSO READ: Election Security, Banggai Police Deploy 421 Personnel and 61 Regional Police BKOs The festival's 20,000 participants come from 180 countries. "Of the 1000 applicants from Indonesia who were accepted, only 100 delegates will represent Indonesia at this festival," he explained. Well, the 100 delegates who had been strictly selected and declared accepted, continued Gisela, were re-selected by those with the highest scores or points in the essays and videos presented. has been made and will receive fully funded funds from the Russian government during the program. "One of them is that I, as one of the Indonesian participants, got the highest points or scores so that it was fully funded, namely transportation, food and drink, hotel accommodation, access to all educational events, culture and also sports," he said. The topic of the essay that was written to ensure it passed and was entitled to full financing was related to "the world of opportunities for everyone". "1 minute video regarding the prospects for cooperation between Indonesia and Russia, at that time I focused on discussing opportunities for cooperation in the education and business sectors in Banggai Regency," he said. He hopes that after returning from this program he can provide knowledge and a new perspective on "I hope that I can also share my experiences with young people in Banggai Regency to never feel that they have enough knowledge and continue to find out and never give up to compete in the world." on the global/world stage, and also a better contribution to Luwuk Muhammadiyah University and also the Banggai Regency community," he stressed. (*)

title: Curi HP di Lumpoknyo Luwuk, Pemuda Ini Akhirnya Ditangkap Polisi
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Jajaran Polres Banggai melalui Tim Resmob Tompotika kembali mengamankan terduga pelaku pencurian handphone berinisial DI (19), di Desa Lumpoknyo Kecamatan Luwuk, Banggai, Jumat (26/1/2024) sore.Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy, STK, SIK, MH, MSi mengatakan penangkapan tersebut berdasarkan laporan korban DS (29) pada Jumat (19/1/2024).BACA JUGA:Dihadiri Ratusan Warga, Kabagops Polres Banggai Pimpin Apel Pengamanan Kampanye di NamboSaat itu sekitar pukul 13.00 Wita, anak dari korban pergi berbelanja ke warung/kios dengan membawa Hp. Saat kembali kerumahnya ternyata Hp itu tertinggal.“Lalu pelapor kembali mendatangi kios yang dimaksud, akan tetapi Hp miliknya sudah tidak ada/hilang,” sebut Kasat.BACA JUGA:Polisi Limpahkan Kasus Wanita Cantik Terlibat Narkoba ke KejariPolisi mengetahui identitas dan keberadaan terduga pelaku beserta barang bukti. Hp tersebut diketahui aktif disekitaran Desa Lumpoknyo.Tim Resmob langsung mengamankan terduga pelaku DI di rumahnya beserta 1 buah Hp merk Oppo A31. Setelah pengecekan Imei tersebut ternyata cocok dengan laporan korban.BACA JUGA:Putri Amalia, Mahasiswi Cantik AMIK Luwuk Finalis Puteri Indonesia 2024 Wakili Sulteng“Dari pengakuan pelaku telah mengakui perbuatannya. Ia dengan sadar mengambil Hp korban dan berniat ingin memilikinya,” jelas AKP Tio.Terduga pelaku diamankan di Mapolres Banggai untuk menjalani proses hukum lebih lanjut. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- The Banggai Police Department through the Tompotika Resmob Team again arrested the suspected perpetrator of cellphone theft with the initials DI (19), in Lumpoknyo Village, Luwuk District, Banggai, Friday (26/1/2024) afternoon. Head of Criminal Investigation Unit for the Banggai Police, AKP Tio Tondy, STK, SIK, MH, MSi said the arrest was based on a report from victim DS (29) on Friday (19/1/2024). READ ALSO: Attended by hundreds of residents, Banggai Police Head of Police Leads Campaign Security Call in Nambo. It was around 13.00 WITA, the child of the victim go shopping at a stall/kiosk with a cellphone. When he returned home, he found that he had left his cellphone behind. "Then the reporter returned to the kiosk in question, but his cellphone was no longer there/lost," said Kasat. evidence. The cellphone was known to be active around Lumpoknyo Village. The Resmob Team immediately arrested the suspected DI perpetrator at his house along with an Oppo A31 cellphone. After checking the IMEI, it turned out to match the victim's report. READ ALSO: Putri Amalia, Beautiful Student at AMIK Luwuk Finalist for Puteri Indonesia 2024 Representing Central Sulawesi "From the confession, the perpetrator has admitted his actions. "He consciously took the victim's cellphone and intended to have it," explained AKP Tio. The alleged perpetrator was detained at the Banggai Police Headquarters to undergo further legal proceedings. (*)

title: Polres Banggai, Amankan Pelaku Pencuri HP Milik Karyawan Alfamidi
text: Polresbanggai.com– Satreskrimpolres banggaiPolda Sulteng kembali mengamankan seorang warga BTN Pepabri Kelurahan Kilongan KecamatanluwukUtara, terduga pencuri telepon genggam.Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy, menerangkan bahwa inisial pria yang diamankan adalah TL (55).Terduga pelaku melakukan pencurian HP milik AR (24) warga Jalan Trans Sulawesi, Kilongan, Luwuk Utara.“Aksi pencurian diawali saat korban bersama rekan kerjanya sedang mengambil gambar di depan toko Alfamidi. Akan tetapi setelah mereka masuk, lupa membawa kembali HP tersebut,” ujarnya.Kejadian terjadi pada Minggu (14/1/2024) sekitar pukul 15.30 Wita, dimana setelah korban cek diketahui HPnya merk Samsung A03 warna hitam telah hilang.Petugas kepolisian yang menerima laporan, segera melakukan proses penyelidikan, hingga akhirnya berhasil mengidentifikasi sekaligus mengamankan pelaku pada Jumat (19/1/2024) sekitar pukul 15.00 Wita dirumahnya.“Pelaku dan barang bukti 1 unit telepon genggam di amankan di Mapolres Banggai sebagai barang bukti serta menjalani pemeriksaan lebih lanjut,” tutup AKP Tio
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– The Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit, Central Sulawesi Police have again arrested a resident of BTN Pepabri, Kilongan Village, North Luwuk District, a suspected cell phone thief. 24) resident of Jalan Trans Sulawesi, Kilongan, North Luwuk. "The theft began when the victim and his co-workers were taking pictures in front of the Alfamidi shop. "However, after they entered, they forgot to bring the cellphone back," he said. The incident occurred on Sunday (14/1/2024) at around 15.30 WITA, where after the victim checked it was discovered that his black Samsung A03 cellphone had disappeared. The police officer who received the report , immediately carried out the investigation process, until finally succeeded in identifying and securing the perpetrator on Friday (19/1/2024) at around 15.00 WITA at his home. "The perpetrator and evidence of 1 cell phone unit were secured at the Banggai Police Headquarters as evidence and underwent further examination ," concluded AKP Tio

title: Bupati Banggai Resmi Buka Fun Aerobics Competition dan Man Body Contest untuk Promosikan Gaya Hidup Sehat
text: Luangkan Waktu Bersama, Bupati Amirudin Ajak Masyarakat Banggai Aktif dan SehatKABAR LUWUK –Bupati BanggaiResmi BukaFun Aerobics CompetitiondanMan Body Contestuntuk PromosikanGaya Hidup Sehat. Sabtu pagi ini,Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM., AIFO,secara resmi membukaFun Aerobics Competition,Man Body Contest, dan Zumba Party di Gedung Padepokan Pencak Silat, Kecamatan Luwuk,Kabupaten Banggai.Kegiatan ini merupakan bagian dari upaya pemerintah daerah untuk mempromosikan gaya hidup sehat dan aktif di kalangan masyarakat.Sabtu, 20 Januari 2024.Dalam sambutannya, Bupati Amirudin menyampaikan kegembiraannya atas antusiasme masyarakat yang telah mengikuti senam bersama pada pagi hari.“Tadi pagi kami sudah melaksanakan senam bersama, muda-mudahan apa yang sudah dilakukan memberikan rasa bugar kepada kita semua dalam menjalankan aktivitas sehari-hari,” ucapnya.Bupati Amirudin juga memberikan apresiasi kepada ASIAFI Kabupaten Banggai atas kecepatan dalam melaksanakan program ini setelah dilantik semalam. “Setelah semalam dilantik, ASIAFI Kabupaten Banggai langsung tancap gas,” tambahnya.Hari ini, masyarakat Banggai dapat menikmati serangkaian kegiatan termasuk Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest, dan Zumba Party.Bupati Amirudin menekankan pentingnya kegiatan aerobik sebagai senam yang dapat meningkatkan kolesterol baik dalam tubuh.Lebih lanjut, Bupati Banggai menjelaskan tentang Man Body Contest sebagai kegiatan positif untuk membentuk otot-otot dalam tubuh. “Kegiatan yang sangat positif ini diharapkan dapat semakin banyak pesertanya, sehingga masyarakat di Kabupaten Banggai tetap sehat dan segar, karena di dalam tubuh yang sehat terdapat pikiran yang waras,” ungkap Bupati Amirudin.Pagi yang penuh semangat ini merupakan hasil kerjasama antara Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai, Dinas Pemuda dan Olahraga Kabupaten Banggai, ASIAFI Kabupaten Banggai, serta Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia (KONI) Kabupaten Banggai.Kegiatan ini diharapkan tidak hanya menjadi ajang kompetisi, melainkan juga membangun kesadaran akan pentingnya hidup sehat dan aktif dalam kehidupan sehari-hari bagi masyarakat Banggai. ( dkisp) **
text_en: Spending Time Together, Regent Amirudin Invites Banggai Community to Be Active and Healthy LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Regent Officially Opens Fun Aerobics Competition and Man Body Contest to Promote Healthy Lifestyle. This Saturday morning, the Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM., AIFO, officially opened the Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest, and Zumba Party at the Padepokan Pencak Silat Building, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency. This activity is part of the regional government's efforts to promote a healthy and active lifestyle in among the community.Saturday, January 20 2024. In his speech, Regent Amirudin expressed his joy at the enthusiasm of the community who had taken part in joint exercise in the morning. "This morning we carried out joint exercise, hopefully what we have done will give us all a feeling of fitness. in carrying out daily activities," he said. Regent Amirudin also expressed his appreciation to ASIAFI Banggai Regency for the speed in implementing this program after being inaugurated last night. "After being inaugurated last night, ASIAFI Banggai Regency immediately stepped on the gas," he added. Today, the people of Banggai can enjoy a series of activities including the Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest, and Zumba Party. Regent Amirudin emphasized the importance of aerobic activities as exercise that can increase good cholesterol in the body. Furthermore, the Regent of Banggai explained the Man Body Contest as a positive activity to build the muscles in the body. "It is hoped that this very positive activity will attract more and more participants, so that the people in Banggai Regency will remain healthy and fresh, because in a healthy body there is a sane mind," said Regent Amirudin. This enthusiastic morning was the result of collaboration between the Regency Regional Government Banggai, Banggai Regency Youth and Sports Service, Banggai Regency ASIAFI, and Banggai Regency Indonesian National Sports Committee (KONI). This activity is expected to not only be a competition event, but also to build awareness of the importance of healthy and active living in everyday life for the community Banggai. ( dkisp) **

title: Jumat Berkah Pwi Banggai Bersama Sat Intelkam Polres Banggai
text: Terasbanggai.com -Kegiatan bertemakan Jumat Berkah digelar jurnalis di daerah ini bekerjasama dengan Sat Intelkam Polres Banggai. Kegiatan tersebut dengan membagikan nasi kotak bertempat di jalan Tran Sulawesi, Kilometer 5, kelurahan Maahas, Luwuk Selatan, Jumat (19/1/2024). Pada kesempatan tersebut nasi kotak disalurkan kepada para pengendara yang melintas khususnya ojek dan sopir-sopir angkot. Antusiasme dari para penerima tampak begitu tinggi, mencerminkan kegembiraan mereka dalam menerima bantuan tersebut. Ketua PWI Banggai, Bangkep, Balut Iskandar Djiada menyampaikan apresiasi pada seluruh jurnalis di daerah ini yang berkesempatan berbagi bersama masyarakat di hari Jumat bersama Sat Intelkan Polres Banggai. “Alhamdulillah rekan-rekan wartawan dari PWI Banggai bisa berbagi,ini mencerminkan kebahagiaan dan kepuasan hati dalam berkontribusi positif kepada masyarakat,” ujar Iskandar. Kasat Intelkan Polres Banggai AKP Usman mengatakan, kegiatan Jumat Berkah ini tak hanya sebagai dimaknai sebagai kegiatan ibadah, tetapi juga semakin memperat tali silaturahmi jajaran Polres Banggai dan jurnalis di daerah ini. “Aksi berbagi ini tidak hanya menjadi bentuk kepedulian terhadap sesama, tetapi juga memperkuat ikatan solidaritas diantara wartawan,” tutur Usman. Turut hadir jajaran pengurus PWI Banggai, Bangkep, Balut wartawan Banggai diantaranya, Imam Muslik, Yuni, Kiki, Amrilah, Asnawi, Sofyan Taha, Sofyan Labolo Alisan. text_en: Terasbanggai.com - Activities with the theme Friday Blessings were held by journalists in this area in collaboration with the Banggai Police Intelligence and Security Unit. This activity involved distributing rice boxes on Jalan Tran Sulawesi, Kilometer 5, Maahas sub-district, South Luwuk, Friday (19/1/2024). On this occasion, rice boxes were distributed to passing motorists, especially motorbike taxis and public transportation drivers. The enthusiasm of the recipients seemed very high, reflecting their joy in receiving this assistance. Chairman of PWI Banggai, Bangkep, Balut Iskandar Djiada expressed his appreciation to all journalists in this area who had the opportunity to share with the community on Friday with the Banggai Police Intelligence Unit. "Thank God, fellow journalists from PWI Banggai can share, this reflects happiness and satisfaction in contributing positively to society," said Iskandar. Head of Intelligence for the Banggai Police, AKP Usman, said that this Blessing Friday activity was not only interpreted as a worship activity, but also strengthened the ties between the ranks of the Banggai Police and journalists in this area. "This sharing action is not only a form of concern for others, but also strengthens the bonds of solidarity between journalists," said Usman. Also present were the management of PWI Banggai, Bangkep, Balut Banggai journalists including, Imam Muslik, Yuni, Kiki, Amrilah, Asnawi, Sofyan Taha, Sofyan Labolo Alisan. title: Dibuka Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Enam DPL KKN Ikuti Training of Trainer
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Unismuh Luwuk melalui LP3M menggelar Training of Trainer (ToT) bagi enam dosen pembimbing lapangan (DPL) Kuliah Kerja Nyata (KKN), Sabtu 20 Januari 2024.Kegiatan ToT yang berlangsung di aula Pascasarjana Unismuh Luwuk itu dibuka secara resmi Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM.Hadir dalam pembukaan, Ketua LP3M Unismuh Luwuk, Risno Mina SH., MH., dan jajarannya, serta Wakil Rektor I Mustafa Abd Rahim.Ketua LP3M Unismuh Luwuk, Risno Mina SH., MH., mengatakan, kegiatan ToT berlangsung sehari dan diisi empat narasumber.Adapun materi yang disajikan adalah Problem Solving dibawakan oleh narasumber Wakil Rektor I Mustafa Abd Rahim, dan materi Matriks Kegiatan Kerja dan Administrasi KKN dibawakan oleh Erwin Nursin.Berikutnya, materi program kerja dan penulisan laporan kelompok dibawakan oleh ketua LP3M Risno Mina, dan Artikel Ilmiah Mahasiswa dan Publikasi dibawakan oleh Dr. Hasrat Aimang.“Kegiatan ToT ini bertujuan untuk menyamakan persepsi dengan DPL sehingga pelaksanaan KKN dapat berjalan sesuai dengan pedoman,” kata Risno Mina.Kemudian, diharapkan dengan ToT ini mahasiswa KKN selama di lapangan akan mendapatkan bimbingan yang sama dalam melaksanakan program kerja.Sementara itu, Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa berharap melalui ToT ini DPL dapat membimbing mahasiswa dengan baik, sehingga apa yang menjadi luaran dari KKN dapat tercapai.Selain itu Rektor juga berharap DPL dapat mengumpulkan data dan informasi di lokasi KKN sehingga bisa dijadikan topik riset atau pengabdian kedepan. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Unismuh Luwuk through LP3M held Training of Trainers (ToT) for six field supervisor lecturers (DPL) Real Work Lectures (KKN), Saturday 20 January 2024. The ToT activity which took place in the Unismuh Luwuk Postgraduate hall was officially opened by the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk , Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM. Present at the opening were the Chair of LP3M Unismuh Luwuk, Risno Mina SH., MH., and his staff, as well as Deputy Chancellor I Mustafa Abd Rahim. The Chair of LP3M Unismuh Luwuk, Risno Mina SH., MH., said , the ToT activity lasted a day and was attended by four resource persons. The material presented was Problem Solving presented by the resource person, Deputy Chancellor I Mustafa Abd Rahim, and material on the KKN Work Activity and Administration Matrix presented by Erwin Nursin. Next, work program material and group report writing were presented. by the chairman of LP3M Risno Mina, and Student Scientific Articles and Publications presented by Dr. Hasrat Aimang. "This ToT activity aims to equalize perceptions with DPL so that the implementation of KKN can run according to the guidelines," said Risno Mina. Then, it is hoped that with this ToT KKN students while in the field will receive the same guidance in carrying out work programs. Meanwhile , Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa hopes that through this ToT DPL can guide students well, so that the outcomes of KKN can be achieved. Apart from that, the Chancellor also hopes that DPL can collect data and information at KKN locations so that it can be used as a research or service topic in the future. (*)

title: Satgas OMB Polres Banggai Kawal Perakitan 500 Kotak Suara di KPU
text: Polresbanggai.com– Personelpolres banggaiyang tergabung dalam Satuan Tugas Operasi Mantap Brata (OMB) Tinombala Pemilu 2023-2024 mengawal dan mengamankan proses perakitan kotak suara Pemilu 2023-2024, Sabtu (20/1/2024) pagi.Perakitan kota suara berlangsung di gudang logistik Pemilu KPUkabupaten banggai, di Kompleks Bukit Halimun, Kelurahan Maahas KecamatanluwukSelatan. Jalannya perakitan tersebut turut dipantau pihak KPU dan Bawaslu Banggai.Kasatgas Humas OMB Polres Banggai IPTU Al Amin S Muda mengatakan, pengamanan ini bertujuan untuk mencegah terjadinya gangguan keamanan yang merupakan bagian Polri kepada masyarakat dalam OMB Tinombala.“Proses perakitan 500 kotak suara berjalan dengan aman dan lancar. Selanjutnya pihak kepolisian tetap melakukan penjagaan dan pengamanan kotak suara tersebut beserta logistik Pemilu lainnya di KPU hingga nanti didistribusikan,” pungkas Amin.Giat pengamanan juga dengan melibatkan TNI dan pengamanan intern KPU Banggai serta 7 personil pengamanan pos objek penting Gudang Logistik
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– Banggai Police personnel who are members of the Tinombala Operation Mantap Brata (OMB) Task Force for the 2023-2024 Election supervise and secure the process of assembling ballot boxes for the 2023-2024 Election, Saturday (20/1/2024) morning. The assembly of the ballot box takes place in the logistics warehouse The District Election Commission is proud of, at the Bukit Halimun Complex, Maahas Village, LuwukSelatan District. The process of the assembly was also monitored by the KPU and Bawaslu Banggai. Head of the Banggai Police OMB Public Relations Task Force IPTU Al Amin S Muda said that this security was aimed at preventing security disturbances which were part of the Police for the community in the Tinombala OMB. "The process of assembling the 500 ballot boxes ran safely and smooth. "Furthermore, the police will continue to guard and secure the ballot boxes along with other election logistics at the KPU until they are distributed," concluded Amin. The security activity also involved the TNI and Banggai KPU's internal security as well as 7 security personnel at important postal objects in the Logistics Warehouse.

title: Staf Ahli Bupati Banggai Menguatkan Sinergi Pemerintah dan Organisasi Keagamaan Wahdah Islamiyah
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Staf Ahli Bupati BanggaimenguatkanSinergi PemerintahdanOrganisasi KeagamaanWahdah Islamiyah. Staf Ahli BupatiBanggai Bidang Ekonomi, Keuangan, dan Pengembangan Wilayah, Rudi P.K Bullah, menegaskan komitmen pemerintah daerah dalam mendukung kerja-kerja organisasi keagamaan diKabupaten Banggai.Pernyataan ini disampaikannya pada pembukaanMusyawarah Daerah (Musda) IV Dewan Pengurus Daerah Wahdah IslamiyahKabupaten Banggai, Sabtu (20/1/2024), di Hotel Santika,Luwuk Selatan.Rudi Bullah berharap agar program dan kegiatan yang dilaksanakan olehDPD Wahdah IslamiyahKabupaten Banggai dapat berjalan sejalan dengan program serta visi misi Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai. Hal ini diungkapkan Rudi saat membacakan sambutan tertulis Bupati Banggai.Musda IV, yang berlangsung selama 2 hari, bertujuan menetapkan ketua beserta jajaran DPD Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai periode 2024-2029. Sukarno Abby, yang saat ini memimpin, akan melanjutkan kepemimpinan ataukah ada perubahan kepemimpinan baru, akan ditentukan dalam acara tersebut.Staf Ahli Bupati menyampaikan harapannya agar pengurus yang terpilih dapat menjalankan kepemimpinan dengan penuh tanggung jawab, sesuai dengan nilai-nilai Pancasila, UUD 1945, peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku, dan berdasarkan Alquran dan Alhadis.“Saya yakin organisasi ini akan sangat membantu pemerintah dalam membangun sumber daya manusia dan menyejahterakan masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai pada umumnya, wabilkhusus dalam kegiatan-kegiatan keagamaan,” ujar Rudi Bullah.Ketua Dewan Pimpinan Wilayah Wahdah Islamiyah Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah, KH. Muhamad Yani Abd. Karim, menekankan bahwa Musda ini menjadi momentum untuk merumuskan program-program strategis yang berasal dari program pusat dalam Muktamar IV Wahdah Islamiyah pada 2021 lalu.Muhamad Yani menjelaskan bahwa Wahdah Islamiyah, sebagai organisasi Islam yang bergerak di bidang dakwah, pendidikan, dan sosial, terus membangun kolaborasi dan sinergisitas dengan seluruh elemen umat dan bangsa.Wahdah Islamiyah konsisten menjalankan dakwah islahiyah atau dakwah untuk perbaikan dalam seluruh dimensi kehidupan masyarakat.Pada Mukernas XVI di Makassar, Wahdah Islamiyah meluncurkan Gerakan Sejuta Dai untuk Indonesia Berkah pada tahun 2030.Muhamad Yani berharap kolaborasi dengan pemerintah akan semakin memperkuat upaya dakwah yang mereka terapkan, termasuk Gerakan Sejuta Dai tersebut.(dkisp) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Expert Staff of the Regent of Banggai strengthens the Synergy between the Government and the Wahdah Islamiyah Religious Organization. Expert Staff for the Regent of Banggai for Economics, Finance and Regional Development, Rudi P.K Bullah, emphasized the regional government's commitment to supporting the work of religious organizations in Banggai Regency. He made this statement at the opening of the Regional Conference (Musda) IV of the Wahdah Islamiyah Regional Management Council, Banggai Regency, Saturday (20 /1/2024), at the Santika Hotel, South Luwuk. Rudi Bullah hopes that the programs and activities implemented by the Wahdah Islamiyah DPD, Banggai Regency can run in line with the programs and vision and mission of the Banggai Regency Government. Rudi expressed this when reading the Banggai Regent's written remarks. Musda IV, which lasted for 2 days, aimed to appoint the chairman and staff of the Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai DPD for the 2024-2029 period. Sukarno Abby, who is currently leading, will continue leadership or whether there will be a change in new leadership, will be determined at the event. The Regent's Expert Staff expressed their hope that the elected management can carry out leadership with full responsibility, in accordance with the values ​​of Pancasila, the 1945 Constitution, applicable laws and regulations, and based on the Koran and Alhadith. "I am sure that this organization will really help the government in building human resources and improving the welfare of the people of Banggai Regency in general, especially in religious activities," said Rudi Bullah. Chairman of the Leadership Council Wahdah Islamiyah Region, Central Sulawesi Province, KH. Muhammad Yani Abd. Karim, emphasized that this Musda was a momentum to formulate strategic programs originating from the central program in the IV Wahdah Islamiyah Congress in 2021. Muhamad Yani explained that Wahdah Islamiyah, as an Islamic organization that operates in the fields of da'wah, education and social affairs, continues to building collaboration and synergy with all elements of the people and nation. Wahdah Islamiyah consistently carries out islahiyah da'wah or da'wah for improvement in all dimensions of people's lives. with the government will further strengthen the da'wah efforts they implement, including the One Million Dai Movement. (dkisp) **

title: Kakanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng dan Irjen Dengarkan Aspirasi Kanim Banggai dalam Kunker Hari Kedua
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Kakanwil Kemenkumham SultengdanIrjenDengarkan AspirasiKanim Banggaidalam Kunker Hari Kedua. Hari kedua kunjungan kerja (Kunker) di Luwuk,Kabupaten Banggai, menjadi momentum penting bagiKepala Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia Sulawesi Tengah(Kakanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng), Hermansyah Siregar, yang mendampingi Inspektur Jenderal (Irjen) Kemenkumham, Ir. Razilu.Acara tersebut, yang dilaksanakan diAula Yasonna Laoly,bertujuan untuk menjaring aspirasi dari jajaran Kantor Imigrasi (Kanim) Kelas II Non TPI Banggai pada Jum’at, (19/1/2024).Ir. Razilu, dalam kunjungannya kali ini, menyampaikan bahwa agenda tersebut adalah bagian dari program unggulannya di tahun 2024, yaitu Irjen Aktif Dengarkan Aspirasi (ADA).Tujuannya adalah meningkatkan performa kinerja Kemenkumham RI dengan mendengarkan dan menampung berbagai aspirasi, serta memberikan solusi yang solutif untuk kebaikan bersama.“Kita upayakan agar terus memberikan solusi yang solutif buat kemajuan dan kebaikan kita bersama,” kata Irjen. Razilu, yang menjelaskan perbedaan kunjungannya kali ini dengan sebelumnya.Hermansyah Siregar, Kakanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng, menyoroti pentingnya pemanfaatan program Irjen ADA oleh jajaran Kanim Banggai.Dengan cakupan wilayah kerja yang luas, termasuk Morowali, Morowali Utara, Banggai, Banggai Laut, dan Kepulauan, program ini diharapkan dapat menjadi wadah untuk mengutarakan berbagai persoalan yang dihadapi oleh jajaran Kanim Banggai.“Sangat senang bisa mendapat kunjungan program Irjen ADA di awal tahun ini, pastinya kita berharap agar berbagai permasalahan keimigrasian yang terjadi selama pelaksanaan tugas dapat disampaikan sehingga menemukan jalan keluar yang baik, yang makin menguatkan pelaksanaan tugas kita,” ungkap Hermansyah.Pertemuan ini menjadi forum atraktif di mana Irjen. Razilu memaparkan permasalahan terkini imigrasi di Indonesia.Para kepala Kanim Banggai dan Palu secara bergantian menyampaikan berbagai kendala dan aspirasi, menciptakan dialog yang konstruktif untuk peningkatan kinerja keimigrasian di wilayah tersebut.“Sangat bersyukur bisa mendapat kunjungan Bapak Irjen, ini menjadi motivasi bagi kami untuk lebih meningkatkan kinerja lebih baik lagi,” tambah Kepala Kanim Banggai, Oktaveri. ( humas ) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Head of Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Central Sulawesi and the Inspector General Listen to the Aspirations of Kanim Banggai on the Second Day of Kunker. The second day of the working visit (Kunker) in Luwuk, Banggai Regency, became an important momentum for the Head of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Regional Office (Kakanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng), Hermansyah Siregar, who accompanied the Inspector General (Irjen) of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Ir. Razilu.The event, which was held in the Yasonna Laoly Hall, aimed to gather aspirations from the ranks of the Class II Non TPI Banggai Immigration Office (Kanim) on Friday, (19/1/2024).Ir. Razilu, during his visit this time, said that this agenda was part of his flagship program in 2024, namely the Inspector General Active Listening to Aspirations (ADA). The aim is to improve the performance of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights by listening to and accommodating various aspirations, as well as providing solutions for the good. together. "We strive to continue to provide solutions that are for our progress and common good," said the Inspector General. Razilu, who explained the difference between his visit this time and the previous one. Hermansyah Siregar, Head of Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi, highlighted the importance of utilizing the Inspector General ADA program by the ranks of Kanim Banggai. With a wide working area coverage, including Morowali, North Morowali, Banggai, Banggai Laut, and the Islands, It is hoped that this program can become a forum for expressing various problems faced by the Banggai Kanim ranks. "We are very happy to have had a visit from the Inspector General ADA program at the beginning of this year, of course we hope that various immigration problems that occur during the implementation of their duties can be conveyed so that they can find a solution that works. "Good, which will further strengthen the implementation of our duties," said Hermansyah. This meeting became an attractive forum where Inspector General. Razilu explained the current problems of immigration in Indonesia. The heads of Kanim Banggai and Palu took turns conveying various obstacles and aspirations, creating a constructive dialogue to improve immigration performance in the region. improve performance even better," added Head of Kanim Banggai, Oktaveri. (public relations) **

title: Satreskrim Polres Banggai Berhasil Amankan Tersangka Pencurian HP di Luwuk Utara
text: KABAR LUWUK –Satreskrim Polres Banggaiberhasil amankan tersangka pencurian HP diLuwuk Utara. Satuan Reserse Kriminal(Satreskrim)Polres BanggaiPolda Sulawesi Tengah berhasil mengamankan seorang wargaBTN PepabriKelurahan KilonganKecamatan Luwuk Utarayang diduga kuat sebagai pelaku pencurian telepon genggam.Tersangka berinisial TL (55) berhasil diamankan setelah aksi pencurian HP milik AR (24) warga Jalan Trans Sulawesi, Kilongan, Luwuk Utara.Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai, AKP Tio Tondy, menjelaskan bahwa kejadian bermula saat korban bersama rekan kerjanya sedang mengambil gambar di depan toko Alfamidi.Namun, setelah keduanya masuk ke toko, mereka lupa membawa kembali HP tersebut. Pencurian terjadi pada Minggu (14/1/2024) sekitar pukul 15.30 Wita, ketika korban menyadari bahwa HP Samsung A03 warna hitam miliknya telah hilang.Petugas kepolisian segera merespons laporan tersebut dengan melakukan proses penyelidikan intensif.Hasilnya, pada Jumat (19/1/2024) sekitar pukul 15.00 Wita, polisi berhasil mengidentifikasi dan mengamankan pelaku di rumahnya.“Pelaku beserta barang bukti berupa 1 unit telepon genggam telah diamankan di Mapolres Banggai untuk proses lebih lanjut,” ujar AKP Tio.Tersangka TL akan menjalani pemeriksaan lebih lanjut guna memastikan keterlibatannya dalam aksi pencurian tersebut.Pihak kepolisian juga mengimbau masyarakat untuk lebih berhati-hati terhadap keamanan barang berharga, terutama saat berada di tempat umum. Kehati-hatian dalam menjaga barang bawaan dapat mencegah tindakan pencurian yang merugikan.Polres Banggai berkomitmen untuk menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban di wilayahnya serta melakukan penindakan tegas terhadap pelaku kejahatan.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit has succeeded in apprehending a suspect in cellphone theft in North Luwuk. The Criminal Investigation Unit (Satreskrim) of the Banggai Police, Central Sulawesi Police succeeded in arresting a resident of BTN Pepabri, Kilongan Village, North Luwuk District, who was strongly suspected of being the perpetrator of the theft of a cell phone. North Luwuk. Head of the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit, AKP Tio Tondy, explained that the incident started when the victim and his co-worker were taking pictures in front of the Alfamidi shop. However, after the two of them entered the shop, they forgot to bring the cellphone back. The theft occurred on Sunday (14/1/2024) at around 15.30 WITA, when the victim realized that his black Samsung A03 cellphone was missing. Police officers immediately responded to the report by carrying out an intensive investigation process. The results were on Friday (19/1/ 2024) at around 15.00 WITA, the police managed to identify and secure the perpetrator at his home. "The perpetrator and evidence in the form of 1 cell phone unit have been secured at the Banggai Police Headquarters for further processing," said AKP Tio. The suspect TL will undergo further examination to confirm his involvement in the theft. The police also appealed to the public to be more careful about the security of valuables, especially when in public places. Being careful in guarding your belongings can prevent detrimental acts of theft. Banggai Police is committed to maintaining security and order in its area and taking firm action against criminals.**

title: Anggota Brimob yang Gugur Ditembak KKB Dipulangkan ke Luwuk Banggai
text: JAYAPURA, KOMPAS.com- Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy, personelOperasi Damai Cartenz-2024 yang gugur akibat terkena tembakanKelompok Kriminal Bersenjata(KKB) di Intan Jaya, dievakuasi ke Mimika, Papua Tengah, Sabtu (20/1/2024).Jenazah kemudian diterbangkan ke kampung halamannya setelah upacara pelepasan yang dipimpin langsung Kepala Operasi Damai Cartenz Kombes Faizal Ramadhani."Jenazah kemudian diterbangkan menuju Luwuk Banggai, Sulawesi Tengah, setelah dilaksanakan upacara pelepasan yang dipimpin langsung oleh Kaops Damai Cartenz," ujar Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz, AKBP Bayu Suseno, melalui keterangan tertulis.Baca juga:KKB Berulah di Intan Jaya, Satu Anggota Brimob Gugur TertembakDiberitakan sebelumnya, Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) kembali berulah dengan melakukan aksi penembakan di Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya, Papua Tengah, Jumat (19/1/2024).Akibat kejadian tersebut, satu anggota Brimob Gugur karena mengalami luka tembak."Anggota Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan dan mengakibatkan korban gugur," ujar Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz AKBP Bayu Suseno, melalui keterangan tertulis.Ia menjelaskan, serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel dan mengenai satu Personel Operasi Damai Cartenz.Baca juga:11 Bulan Penyanderaan Pilot Susi Air, KKB Posting Foto PhilipMenurut dia, anggota Ops Damai Cartenz yang berada di wilayah tersebut mengalami serangan dari KKB selama 30 menit.
text_en: JAYAPURA, KOMPAS.com- The body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy, a member of the Cartenz-2024 Peace Operation who died as a result of being hit by gunfire from the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) in Intan Jaya, was evacuated to Mimika, Central Papua, Saturday (20/1/2024). The body was then "The body was then flown to Luwuk Banggai, Central Sulawesi, after a send-off ceremony led directly by the Head of Damai Cartenz Operations," said Head of the Cartenz Damai Ops Public Relations Task Force, AKBP Bayu Suseno, through a written statement. Also read: KKB acts up in Intan Jaya, one Brimob member is shot dead. As previously reported, the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) is acting up again by carrying out shootings in Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency, Central Papua, Friday (19/1/2024). As a result of this incident, one member of Brimob died due to a gunshot wound. "Member Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy was hit by a shot in the left jaw through the right jaw and resulted in the victim falling," said Head of the Cartenz Peace Ops Public Relations Task Force AKBP Bayu Suseno, through a written statement. He explained that the attack from KKB allegedly came from behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower and hit one Cartenz Peace Operations Personnel. The area experienced attacks from the KKB for 30 minutes.

title: Punya Hak Kekayaan Intelektual? Hubungi Brida Banggai, Daftar Biayanya Gratis
text: Terasbanggai.com -Meski baru empat bulan efektif melaksanakan tugas dan fungsinya sebagai perangkat daerah, BRIDA kabupaten Banggai menorehkan sejaran baru dengan menciptakan inovasi yang ditujukan bagi masyarakat daerah ini. “Atas petunjuk Pak Bupati inovasi pelayanan hak kekayaan intelektual (HAKI) lahir sebagai komitmen pemda melindungi kekayaan intektual masyarakat daerah ini,” ungkap Kepala BRIDA kabupaten Banggai Andi Nusyamsy, Jumat (19/1/2024). Diketahui, dalam upayanya melindungi kekayaan intektual masyarakat daerah ini Pemda Banggai melalui BRIDA kabupaten Banggai telah mengalokasikan anggaran pada APBD tahun 2024 dengan tujuan hak intelektual masyarakat terlindungi secara hukum. “Silahkan bagi masyarakat yang berkeinginan hak intektualnya terlindungi secara hukum dapat menghubungi kami, kami siap melakukan pelayanan,” jelas mantan Kabag Tapem, Setda Banggai ini. Lalu siapa saja yang bisa mendaftarkan Hak Kekayaan Intektual, berikut ini rinciannya, HAKI hasil dari kreativitas intelektual dan kemampuan intektual manusia dan hak ekslusif yang diberikan perlindungan hukum kepada seseorang atau sekelompok orang terhadap ciptaanya yang terbagi dua kategori Hak Cipta dan Hak Kekayaan Industri. Setelah diverifikasi atas hak cipta dari masyarakat, BRIDA Banggai akan mengeluarkan rekomendasi untuk penerbitan HAKI dari Kementrian Hukum dan HAM. Masyarakat kabupaten Banggai yang mendaftarkan hak intelektualnya melalui BRIDA Banggai tidak perlu mengeluarkan biaya apapun, karena sepenuhnya difasilitasi Pemda Banggai. “Atas petunjuk Pak Bupati inovasi pelayanan hak kekayaan intelektual (HAKI) lahir sebagai komitmen pemda melindungi kekayaan intektual masyarakat daerah ini,” ungkap Kepala BRIDA kabupaten Banggai Andi Nusyamsy, Jumat (19/1/2024). text_en: Terasbanggai.com - Even though it has only been effective for four months in carrying out its duties and functions as a regional apparatus, BRIDA Banggai district has made a new history by creating innovations aimed at the people of this region. "Under the instructions of the Regent, the innovation in intellectual property rights (IPR) services was born as a commitment by the regional government to protect the intellectual property of the people of this region," said Head of BRIDA Banggai district Andi Nusyamsy, Friday (19/1/2024). It is known, in its efforts to protect the intellectual property of the local community, the Banggai Regional Government through BRIDA Banggai district has allocated a budget in the 2024 APBD with the aim of legally protecting the community's intellectual rights. "Please people who wish to have their intellectual rights legally protected can contact us, we are ready to provide services," explained the former Head of Tapem, Banggai Regional Secretary. Then anyone can register Intellectual Property Rights, here are the details, IPRs resulting from intellectual creativity and human intellectual abilities and exclusive rights given legal protection to a person or group of people for their creations which are divided into two categories: Copyright and Industrial Property Rights. After verification of copyright from the public, BRIDA Banggai will issue recommendations for the issuance of IPR from the Ministry of Law and Human Rights. Banggai district residents who register their intellectual rights through BRIDA Banggai do not need to incur any costs, because it is fully facilitated by the Banggai Regional Government. IPR is the result of intellectual creativity and human intellectual abilities and exclusive rights given legal protection to a person or group of people for their creations which are divided into two categories: Copyright and Industrial Property Rights. After verification of copyright from the public, BRIDA Banggai will issue recommendations for the issuance of IPR from the Ministry of Law and Human Rights. Banggai district residents who register their intellectual rights through BRIDA Banggai do not need to incur any costs, because it is fully facilitated by the Banggai Regional Government. After verification of copyright from the public, BRIDA Banggai will issue recommendations for the issuance of IPR from the Ministry of Law and Human Rights. Banggai district residents who register their intellectual rights through BRIDA Banggai do not need to incur any costs, because it is fully facilitated by the Banggai Regional Government.
