title: Siap-siap PLN UP3 Luwuk Lakukan Pemeliharaan Besok, Cek Lokasi Terdampak!
text: BANGGAI RAYA- PLN UP3 Luwuk akan melakukan pemeliharaan jaringan distribusi yang memerlukan penghentian sementara pasokan  tenaga listrik pasa Sabtu 20 Januari 2024.Pemeliharaan yang dilakukan dari pagi sampai sore hari itu dalam rangka meningkatkan pelayanan, kendalan pasokan tenaga listrik demi keamanan bersama.Adapun pemeliharaan jaringan distribusi listrik ini dilakukan dari Pukul 8.30 sampai 15.00 WITA dengan lokasi terdampak sebagai berikut.Pertama, Penyulang section Bubung, dengan lokasi terdampak meliputi Kelurahan Jole, Desa Tontouan, sebagian Kelurahan Simpong,  Kelurahan Kompo, sebagian Kelurahan Hanga-Hanga, Kelurahan Maahas, Kelurahan Bukit Mambual, Sebagian Kelurahan Tombang Permai, Kelurahan Tanjung Tuwis, Desa Bubung, sebagian Desa Koyoan dan sebagian BTN Kilo 5.Kemudian, Penyulang Kintom lokasi terdampak tiga wilayah yakni  Kecamatan Nambo, Kecamatan Kintom dan Kecamatan Batui. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- PLN UP3 Luwuk will carry out maintenance on the distribution network which requires a temporary cessation of electricity supply on Saturday 20 January 2024. The maintenance will be carried out from morning to evening in order to improve service, problems with electricity supply for the sake of mutual security. As for maintenance of the distribution network This electricity is carried out from 8.30 to 15.00 WITA with the affected locations as follows. First, the Bubung section feeder, with affected locations including Jole Village, Tontouan Village, part of Simpong Village, Kompo Village, part of Hanga-Hanga Village, Maahas Village, Bukit Mambual Village , Part of Tombang Permai Subdistrict, Tanjung Tuwis Subdistrict, Bubung Village, part of Koyoan Village and part of BTN Kilo 5. Then, the Kintom Feeder location was affected in three areas, namely Nambo District, Kintom District and Batui District. (*)

title: Sah Pengurus ASIAFI Kabupaten Banggai Masa Bakti 2024-2028, Dorong Gaya Hidup Sehat di Masyarakat
text: KABAR LUWUK– Sah PengurusASIAFI Kabupaten BanggaiMasa Bakti 2024-2028, Dorong Gaya Hidup Sehat di Masyarakat.Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, M.M., AIFO, turut hadir dalam acara pelantikanPengurus Asosiasi Instruktur Aerobik dan Fitnes Indonesia (ASIAFI)Kabupaten Banggaimasa bakti 2024-2028.Acara prestisius ini berlangsung di Hotel Santika, Kelurahan Tombang Permai, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, dan dihadiri oleh sejumlah pejabat tinggi, termasuk Wakil Gubernur Sulteng Drs. H. Ma’mun Amir, dan unsur Forkopimda Kabupaten Banggai.Jum,at 19/1/2024.ASIAFI Kabupaten Banggai, sebagai wadah resmi bagi instruktur aerobik dan fitnes, telah berhasil membentuk pengurusnya untuk periode 2024-2028.Hj. Dede Rosidah Amirudin, mengepalai pengurus tersebut setelah resmi dilantik oleh Ketua ASIAFI Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah, Diah Puspita, S.AP. Proses pelantikan diawali dengan pembacaan Surat Keputusan Pembentukan Pengurus ASIAFI Banggai dan penyerahan bendera pataka dari Ketua ASIAFI Provinsi Sulteng kepada Ketua ASIAFI Kabupaten Banggai.Dalam sambutannya, Ketua ASIAFI Sulteng, Diah Puspita, mengapresiasi dukungan Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai dalam pembentukan organisasi tersebut.ASIAFI Banggai menjadi asosiasi kelima yang terbentuk di Sulawesi Tengah, dan ia berharap bahwa seluruh kabupaten di provinsi ini dapat memiliki asosiasi serupa. Diah Puspita juga meminta pengurus ASIAFI Banggai untuk aktif mensosialisasikan olahraga aerobik dan fitnes ke masyarakat.Bupati Banggai, H. Amirudin, menyambut baik keberadaan ASIAFI di daerahnya, memberikan apresiasi kepada ASIAFI Sulteng yang telah berupaya mengembangkan olahraga aerobik dan fitnes di Banggai melalui satu wadah bersama.Dengan adanya asosiasi ini, diharapkan masyarakat semakin rajin berolahraga, khususnya senam dan fitnes. “Selamat kepada pengurus yang baru dilantik, selamat menjalankan program kerjanya, semoga senam aerobik dan fitnes makin dicintai oleh masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai,” tutup Bupati Amirudin.Wakil Gubernur Sulawesi Tengah, H. Ma’mun Amir, membacakan sambutan tertulis Gubernur Sulteng, mengajak ASIAFI dan seluruh organisasi olahraga untuk melakukan seleksi ketat dalam mencari atlet-atlet terbaik.Gubernur Sulteng menargetkan 10 medali emas pada Pekan Olahraga Nasional (PON) mendatang, dan Wagub menilai peran strategis ASIAFI dalam meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat akan pentingnya gaya hidup sehat melalui kegiatan aerobik dan fitnes.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS– Official Management of ASAFI Banggai Regency Service Period 2024-2028, Encouraging Healthy Lifestyles in the Community.Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, M.M., AIFO, was also present at the inauguration ceremony for the Management of the Association of Indonesian Aerobics and Fitness Instructors (ASIAFI) Banggai Regency for the 2024-2028 service period. This prestigious event took place at the Santika Hotel, Tombang Permai Village, South Luwuk District, and was attended by a number of officials high level, including the Deputy Governor of Central Sulawesi Drs. H. Ma'mun Amir, and elements of Forkopimda Banggai Regency. Friday, 19/1/2024. ASIAFI Banggai Regency, as an official forum for aerobics and fitness instructors, has succeeded in forming its management for the period 2024-2028. Hj. Dede Rosidah Amirudin, heads the management after being officially appointed by the Chair of ASIAFI Central Sulawesi Province, Diah Puspita, S.AP. The inauguration process began with the reading of the Decree on the Formation of ASIAFI Banggai Management and the handing over of the banner flag from the Chair of ASIAFI of Central Sulawesi Province to the Chair of ASIAFI of Banggai Regency. In her speech, the Chair of ASIAFI of Central Sulawesi, Diah Puspita, appreciated the support of the Banggai Regency Government in the formation of the organization. the fifth was formed in Central Sulawesi, and he hopes that all districts in this province can have similar associations. Diah Puspita also asked ASIAFI Banggai administrators to actively socialize aerobics and fitness sports to the community. The Regent of Banggai, H. Amirudin, welcomed the presence of ASIAFI in his area, giving appreciation to ASIAFI Central Sulawesi for making efforts to develop aerobics and fitness sports in Banggai through one joint platform. .With this association, it is hoped that people will be more diligent in exercising, especially gymnastics and fitness. "Congratulations to the newly appointed administrators, congratulations on carrying out their work program, hopefully aerobics and fitness will be increasingly loved by the people of Banggai Regency," concluded Regent Amirudin. Deputy Governor of Central Sulawesi, H. Ma'mun Amir, read the written remarks of the Governor of Central Sulawesi, inviting ASIAFI and all sports organizations to carry out strict selections to find the best athletes. The Governor of Central Sulawesi is targeting 10 gold medals at the upcoming National Sports Week (PON), and the Deputy Governor assesses ASIAFI's strategic role in increasing public awareness of the importance of a healthy lifestyle through aerobic and fitness activities .**

title: Gaungkan Program Irjen ADA, Irjen Razilu dan Kakanwil Hermansyah Siregar Serap Aspirasi Jajarannya di Bapas Luwuk
text: KABAR LUWUK  – GaungkanProgram Irjen ADA,Irjen Razilu danKakanwil Hermansyah SiregarSerap Aspirasi Jajarannya di Bapas Luwuk.  Menggaungkan program unggulanInspektur Jenderal (Irjen) AktifDengarkan Aspirasi (ADA),Irjen Kemenkumham RI Ir. Razilubersama Kepala Kantor Wilayah (Kakanwil) KemenkumhamSulawesi TengahHermansyah Siregar serap aspirasi jajarannya diBalai Pemasyarakatan(Bapas) Kelas II Luwuk, Jum’at, (19/1/2024) sore.Dalam pertemuan tersebut, turut hadir jugaInspektur Wilayah VI, Sri Yuliani, Auditor Madya, Ari Wibowo serta paraKepala Divisidan seluruh Kepala Satuan Kerja baik pemasyarakatan dan keimigrasian se-Sulteng, rombongan disambut langsung oleh seluruh jajaran Mansur selaku Kepala Bapas Luwuk beserta jajarannya.“Sangat senang dapat menerima kunjungan oleh Bapak Irjen dan Bapak Kakanwil,” sambut Mansur.Setelah sebelumnya di Lapas Luwuk dan Kanim Banggai, Irjen Razilu menyebut bahwa program ADA yang ia gaungkaun di tahun 2024 merupakan program unggulan yang tujuannya adalah menyerap aspirasi dari jajarannya guna membenahi dan meningkatkan kinerja pelayanan.Kali kedua ke Bapas Luwuk, ia juga berterima kasih atas sambutan hangat oleh seluruh jajaran, ia berharap agar melalui momentum Irjen ADA dapat memberi solusi yang solutif dalam membenahi permasalahan penunaian tugas di lapangan.“Jangan malu dan takut bertanya, forum ini adalah untuk meningkatkan kinerja kita bersama, untuk kemajuan Kementerian ini,” jelas Razilu.Dalam kesempatan tersebut, Razilu pun mendengarkan berbagai aspirasi dari para pembimbing kemasyarakatan (PK) salah satunya adalah harapan agar tersedianya alokasi dana untuk pos bapas.Razilu menuturkan bahwa hal tersebut seharusnya menjadi kebijakan nasional karena tidak hanya persoalan disatu tempat saja. Namun, dirinya memberikan asumsi yang dapat diambil dengan melakukan koordinasi bersama Bupati setempat.“Seluruh klien adalah warga setempat, maka lakukanlah koordinasi dengan bupati setempat untuk disediakan rumah singgah”, ucap Razilu.Selain itu, Razilu juga akan menyampaikan aspirasi tersebut kepada Bapak Junaedi, Ketua Umum Ikatan Pembimbing Kemasyarakatan Indonesia (IPKEMINDO) untuk mendiskusikan lebih lanjut bersama Inspektur Wilayah.Sebagaimana diketahi bahwa saat ini para PK harus mengeluarkan pembiayaan pribadi saat melaksanakan tugas pada Pos Bapas untuk rumah singgah diwilayah kerja yang tercakup jauh.“Hal ini tentu perlu menjadi perhatian kita bersama, karena PK sama pentingnya seperti petugas P2U”, pungkas Razilu.Berjalan dengan atraktif, Kakanwil Hermansyah pun menuturkan bawah semua permasalahan yang terjadi dilapangan dan dihadapi oleh satuan kerja dapat diselesaikan dengan melakukan diskusi serta komunikasi yang baik.“Pastinya semua masalah ada solusinya, dan setiap Solusi akan hadir dengan komunikasi yang baik, kita harus terus berkolaborasi, berkoordinasi bersama, untuk kemajuan, kelancaran program pemasyarakatan di Sulawesi Tengah ini,” tutupnya. ( Humas Kanwil) **
text_en: KABAR LUWUK – Echoing the Inspector General ADA Program, Inspector General Razilu and Regional Head Hermansyah Siregar Absorb the Aspirations of Their Staff at Bapas Luwuk. Echoing the flagship program Inspector General (Irjen) Active Listen to Aspirations (ADA), Inspector General of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights Ir. Razil, together with the Head of the Regional Office (Kakanwil) of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Central Sulawesi, Hermansyah Siregar, absorbed the aspirations of his staff at the Class II Luwuk Correctional Center (Bapas), Friday, (19/1/2024) afternoon. At the meeting, also present were the Inspector of Region VI, Sri Yuliani, the Middle Auditor , Ari Wibowo as well as the Division Heads and all Heads of Work Units for both correctional and immigration throughout Central Sulawesi, the group was welcomed directly by all of Mansur's staff as the Head of the Luwuk Bapas and his staff. "Very pleased to be able to receive a visit from the Inspector General and the Head of the Regional Office," welcomed Mansur. After Previously at the Luwuk Prison and Kanim Banggai, Inspector General Razilu said that the ADA program which he launched in 2024 was a superior program whose aim was to absorb the aspirations of his staff in order to improve and improve service performance. The second time he went to the Luwuk Prison, he was also grateful for the warm welcome. by all levels, he hopes that through the momentum of Inspector General ADA he can provide a solution in fixing the problems of fulfilling his duties in the field. "Don't be shy and afraid to ask questions, this forum is to improve our performance together, for the progress of this Ministry," explained Razilu. Dalam On this occasion, Razilu also listened to various aspirations from community counselors (PK), one of which was the hope that there would be an allocation of funds for the post of father. Razilu said that this should become a national policy because it is not just a problem in one place. However, he gave assumptions that could be taken by coordinating with the local Regent. "All clients are local residents, so coordinate with the local regent to provide a shelter," said Razilu. Apart from that, Razilu will also convey these aspirations to Mr. Junaedi, Chairman of the Indonesian Community Guidance Association (IPKEMINDO) to discuss further with the Regional Inspector. As is known, currently PKs have to spend personal financing when carrying out duties at the Bapas Post for shelter homes in work areas that cover far distances. "This certainly needs to be paid attention to. We are together, because PK is as important as P2U officers," concluded Razilu. Walking attractively, Kakanwil Hermansyah also said that all problems that occur in the field and faced by work units can be resolved by holding discussions and good communication. "Certainly all problems have solutions. ", and every solution will come with good communication, we must continue to collaborate, coordinate together, for the progress and smoothness of the correctional program in Central Sulawesi," he concluded. (Public Relations Regional Office) **

title: Satlantas Polres Banggai Gencar Sosialisasikan Kamseltibcarlantas di Kota Luwuk untuk Tingkatkan Kesadaran Berlalu Lintas
text: KABAR LUWUK –Satlantas Polres Banggaigencar sosialisasikanKamseltibcarlantasdiKota Luwukuntuk Tingkatkan Kesadaran Berlalu Lintas. Satuan Lalu Lintas (Satlantas) Polres Banggai terus berupaya meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap pentingnya mematuhi peraturan berlalu lintas.Dengan melibatkanPenerangan Keliling (Penling), mereka melakukan sosialisasiKamseltibcarlantasdi beberapa titik strategis di Kota Luwuk pada Jumat (19/1/2024).AKP I Made Bagus Aditya, Kasat Lantas Polres Banggai,mengungkapkan bahwa kegiatan sosialisasi dan edukasi dilakukan secara masif di pinggiran jalan raya, tempat berkumpulnya masyarakat, pangkalan ojek, dan bahkan kepada sopir angkot.Tujuan utamanya adalah mengingatkan masyarakat akan pentingnya patuh terhadap peraturan lalu lintas demi keamanan bersama.“Sosialisasi dan edukasi tersebut dilakukan di beberapa titik. Seperti di pinggiran jalan raya, tempat berkumpulnya masyarakat, pangkalan ojek serta sopir angkot,” ujar AKP I Made Bagus Aditya.Menurut Aditya, dengan melibatkan berbagai tempat yang sering dikunjungi oleh masyarakat, diharapkan pesan keselamatan berlalu lintas dapat lebih mudah disampaikan dan diterima oleh semua pihak.Sosialisasi ini diharapkan tidak hanya menjadi kegiatan rutin, tetapi juga dapat menciptakan kesadaran hukum yang lebih baik di kalangan masyarakat.“Diharapkan dengan masif dilakukan kegiatan seperti ini bisa menumbuhkan kesadaran hukum masyarakat dalam berlalu lintas,” tambahnya.Upaya Satlantas Polres Banggai ini sejalan dengan visi pemerintah dalam menciptakan ketertiban berlalu lintas dan keselamatan bagi semua pengguna jalan.Kegiatan sosialisasi yang merata di berbagai lapisan masyarakat diharapkan dapat menjadi langkah positif dalam mengurangi pelanggaran lalu lintas dan kecelakaan jalan raya.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – The Bangga Police Traffic Unit is intensively socializing the Traffic Traffic Security Unit in Luwuk City to increase traffic awareness. The Banggai Police Traffic Unit (Satlantas) continues to strive to increase public awareness of the importance of obeying traffic regulations. By involving Mobile Information (Penling), they carried out socialization on Traffic Traffic Security at several strategic points in Luwuk City on Friday (19/1/2024). AKP I Made Bagus Aditya, Traffic Head of the Banggai Police, revealed that socialization and education activities were carried out on a massive scale on the side of the highway, community gathering places, motorbike taxi bases, and even with public transportation drivers. The main aim was to remind the public of the importance of obeying traffic regulations for mutual security. “The outreach and education is carried out at several points. "Such as on the side of the highway, community gathering places, motorcycle taxi bases and public transportation drivers," said AKP I Made Bagus Aditya. According to Aditya, by involving various places frequently visited by the community, it is hoped that traffic safety messages can be more easily conveyed and accepted by all parties. It is hoped that this socialization will not only become a routine activity, but can also create better legal awareness among the community. "It is hoped that massively carrying out activities like this can increase public legal awareness in traffic," he added. The efforts of the Banggai Police Traffic Unit are in line with with the government's vision of creating traffic order and safety for all road users. It is hoped that evenly distributed outreach activities at various levels of society can be a positive step in reducing traffic violations and road accidents.**

title: Haru, Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfando yang Gugur Ditembak KKB Dilepas Menuju Luwuk
text: TIMIKA, iNews.id- Kepala Operasi (Kaops) Damai Cartenz Kombes Pol dr Faizal Ramadhani memimpinupacara pelepasan jenazahBriptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy. AnggotaOperasi Damai Cartenz2024 dari Peleton III Kompi IV Yon C Resimen I Paspelopor Korbrimob Polri tersebutgugurdalamkontak tembakKelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) diIntan Jaya, Papua TengahPantauan iNews, suasana haru tampak menyelimuti upacara yang digelar di Bandara Mozes Kilangin Timika, Kabupaten Mimika, Sabtu (20/1/2024) pagi. Sejumlah pejabat hadir dalam penjemputan jenazah seperti Wakaops Damai Cartenz Kombes Pol Ronny Suseno, Danmen I Pelopor Pasbrimob III Kombes Pol Danu Windarto serta sejumlah perwira lainnya.Baca JugaKapolri Berduka Bripda Alfandi Steve Gugur Ditembak KKB: Semoga Mendapat Tempat TerbaikKasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz AKBP dr Bayu Suseno mengatakan, jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy diterbangkan menggunakan pesawat Smart Air PK-SNP dari Bandara Bilorai Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya menuju Timika."Jenazah selanjutnya diterbangkan menujuLuwuk, Banggai, Sulawesi Tengah setelah dilaksanakan upacara pelepasan," ujar Bayu, Sabtu (20/1/2024).Baca JugaGugur Diserang KKB, Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy Tertembak di Rahang Kiri Tembus KananSementara Kaops Damai Cartenz menyampaikan rasa duka cita yang mendalam atas kehilangan salah satu putra terbaik bangsa dalam menjalankan tugasnya."Kami merasakan kehilangan yang besar atas gugurnya saudara kita Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy. Semoga keluarga yang ditinggalkan diberi ketabahan," katanya.Baca JugaTerungkap Penyerang Brimob hingga Gugur di Intan Jaya, KKB Pimpinan Apen KobogauEditor : Donald Karouw
text_en: TIMIKA, iNews.id- Head of Peace Operations (Kaops) Cartenz Kombes Pol Dr. Faizal Ramadhani led the ceremony to release the body of posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy. Members of the Cartenz2024 Peace Operation from Platoon III Company IV Yon C Regiment I Paspelor Korbrimob Polri died in gunfire. /2024) morning. A number of officials were present at the pick-up of the body, such as Deputy Head of Ops Damai Cartenz Police Commissioner Ronny Suseno, Danmen I Pioneer of Pasbrimob III Kombes Pol Danu Windarto and a number of other officers. Suseno said that the body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy was flown using a Smart Air PK-SNP aircraft from Bilorai Sugapa Airport, Intan Jaya Regency to Timika. "The body was then flown to Luwuk, Banggai, Central Sulawesi after the release ceremony was held," said Bayu, Saturday (20 /1/2024).Also Read: Fallen when attacked by KKB, Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy was shot in the left jaw through the right. Meanwhile Kaops Peace Cartenz expressed his deep condolences for the loss of one of the nation's best sons in carrying out his duties. "We feel a great loss for the death of your brother "We are Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy. Hopefully the families left behind will be given fortitude," he said. Also Read: Brimob Attacker Revealed to Death in Intan Jaya, KKB Leader Apen Kobogau Editor: Donald Karouw

title: Dimakamkan di Kampung Halaman, Jenazah Briptu Afandi Diterbangkan ke Luwuk Sultra
text: jpnn.com , INTAN JAYA - Jenazah Briptu (anumerta) Alfandi Steve Karamoy anggota Peleton III Kompi IV Yon C resimen I Pasplopor Korbrimob Polri yang tewas ditembak KKB diterbangkan ke kampung halamannya, Sabtu (20/1) siang. Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz, AKBP Bayu Suseno mengatakan jenazah almarhum sudah dievakuasi dari Intan Jaya. "Jenazah diterbangkan menggunakan pesawat Smar-Air PK-SNP dari Bandara Bilorai Sugapa dan telah tiba di Timika pagi tadi," ujar Bayu. Setelah tiba di Timika, kata Bayu, jenazah korban kemudian diterbangkan ke kampung halamannya di Luwuk Banggai, Sulawesi Tenggara. "Jenazah almarhum sudah diterbangkan setelah melalui proses ucapan pelepasan," ujarnya. Sementara itu Kaops Damai Cartenz Kombes Faizal Ramadhani menyampaikan rasa duka cita yang mendalam atas kehilangan salah satu putra terbaik bangsa dalam menjalankan tugasnya. "Kami merasakan kehilangan yang besar atas gugurnya saudara kita, Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy. Semoga keluarga yang ditinggalkan diberi ketabahan," ucapnya. Kombes Faizal mengatakan saat inib pihaknya masih melakukan penyisiran terhadap pergerakan KKB di Wilayah Intan Jaya. "Upaya pencarian terhadap Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata tersebut akan dijalankan secara maksimal, dan mereka akan dihadapkan pada proses hukum sesuai peraturan yang berlaku. "Saat ini, pasukan kami masih melakukan pengejaran dan penyisiran di sekitar Tempat Kejadian Perkara (TKP)," bebernya. (mcr30/jpnn)
text_en: jpnn.com , INTAN JAYA - The body of Briptu (posthumous) Alfandi Steve Karamoy, member of Platoon III Company IV Yon C Regiment I Pasplopor Korbrimob Polri who was shot dead by KKB was flown to his hometown, Saturday (20/1) afternoon. Head of the Public Relations Task Force for Ops Damai Cartenz, AKBP Bayu Suseno, said that the deceased's body had been evacuated from Intan Jaya. "The body was flown using a Smar-Air PK-SNP plane from Bilorai Sugapa Airport and arrived in Timika this morning," said Bayu. After arriving in Timika, said Bayu, the victim's body was then flown to his hometown in Luwuk Banggai, Southeast Sulawesi. "The body of the deceased has been flown after going through the funeral process," he said. Meanwhile, Kaops Peace Cartenz Kombes Faizal Ramadhani expressed his deep condolences for the loss of one of the nation's best sons in carrying out his duties. "We feel a great loss over the death of our brother, Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy. We hope that the family left behind will be given fortitude," he said. Kombes Faizal said that currently his party was still conducting investigations into the KKB movement in the Intan Jaya area. "Efforts to search for the Armed Criminal Group will be carried out optimally, and they will be faced with legal processes in accordance with applicable regulations. "Currently, our troops are still pursuing and searching around the crime scene (TKP)," he explained. (mcr30 /jpnn)

title: Buka Fun Aerobics Competition, Bupati Amirudin Apresiasi ASIAFI Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM., AIFO membuka secara resmi Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest dan Zumba Party, Sabtu (20/1/2024), bertempat di Gedung Padepokan Pencak Silat, Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai.Kegiatan Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest dan Zumba Party ini dilaksanakan sebagai upaya untuk mempromosikan gaya hidup sehat dan aktif dalam masyarakat.Bupati Banggai dalam sambutannya menyampaikan bahwa tadi pagi sudah melaksanakan senam bersama, muda-mudahan apa yang sudah dilakukan memberikan rasa bugar dalam menjalankan aktivitas sehari-hari.“Saya atas nama pemerintah daerah memberikan apresiasi dan mengucapkan terima kasih yang sebesar-besarnya setelah semalam dilantik, ASIAFI Kabupaten Banggai langsung tancap gas,” ujar Bupati Amirudin.Lanjut Bupati Amirudin, hari ini akan dilaksanakan Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest dan malam hari ada Zumba Party.“Sebagaimana yang saya sampaikan semalam bahwa kegiatan aerobik ini merupakan salah satu senam yang bisa meningkatkan kolestrol baik dalam tubuh,” tutur Bupati Amirudin.Lebih lanjut, orang nomor satu di Banggai itu menjelaskan jika bicara tentang Man Body Contest ini adalah salah satu kegiatan yang bagaimana bisa membentuk otot-otot yang ada dalam tubuh.“Oleh sebab itu kegiatan yang sangat positif ini, mudah-mudahan pesertanya semakin banyak, sehingga masyarakat yang ada di Kabupaten Banggai sehat dan segar, karna sesungguhnya di dalam tubuh yang sehat terdapat pikiran yang waras,” tandas Bupati Amirudin.Pagi yang penuh semangat ini merupakan hasil kerjasama antara Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai melalui Dinas Pemuda dan Olahraga Kabupaten Banggai dengan Asosiasi Infrastruktur dan Fitnes Indonesia (ASIAFI) Kabupaten Banggai serta Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia (KONI) Kabupaten Banggai.Diharapkan kegiatan ini tidak hanya menjadi ajang kompetisi, tetapi juga membangun kesadaran akan pentingnya hidup sehat dan aktif dalam kehidupan sehari-hari. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM., AIFO officially opened the Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest and Zumba Party, Saturday (20/1/2024), at the Padepokan Pencak Silat Building, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency. Fun Aerobics Competition Activities, Man "The Body Contest and Zumba Party were carried out as an effort to promote a healthy and active lifestyle in society. The Regent of Banggai in his speech said that this morning he had carried out group exercise, hopefully what has been done will provide a feeling of fitness in carrying out daily activities." "I, on behalf of the regional government, would like to express my appreciation and express my deepest gratitude. After being inaugurated last night, ASIAFI Banggai Regency immediately stepped on the gas," said Regent Amirudin. Regent Amirudin continued, today there will be a Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest and in the evening there will be Zumba Party. "As I said last night, this aerobic activity is one of the exercises that can increase good cholesterol in the body," said Regent Amirudin. Furthermore, the number one person in Banggai explained that when talking about the Man Body Contest, this is one activities that can form the muscles in the body. "Therefore, this very positive activity, hopefully there will be more and more participants, so that the people in Banggai Regency are healthy and fresh, because actually in a healthy body there is a mind. sane people," stressed Regent Amirudin. This enthusiastic morning was the result of collaboration between the Banggai Regency Regional Government through the Banggai Regency Youth and Sports Service with the Indonesian Infrastructure and Fitness Association (ASIAFI) Banggai Regency and the Indonesian National Sports Committee (KONI) Banggai Regency. It is hoped that this activity will not only be a competition event, but also raise awareness of the importance of healthy and active living in everyday life. (*)

title: Melalui Penling, Satlantas Polres Banggai Masifkan Sosialisasi Kamseltibcar
text: Polresbanggai.com– Satlantaspolres banggaimasif mensosialisasikan Kamseltibcarlantas kepada masyarakat maupun pengguna jalan di Kotaluwukmelalui Penerangan Keliling (Penling), Jumat (19/1/2024).Hal itu dilakukan untuk mengingatkan masyarakat tentang pentingnya mematuhi peraturan berlalu lintas di jalan demi keselamatan bersama.“Sosialisasi dan edukasi tersebut dilakukan di beberapa titik. Seperti di pinggiran jalan raya, tempat berkumpulnya masyarakat, pangkalan ojek serta sopir angkot,” ungkap Kasat Lantas AKP I Made Bagus Aditya.Ia menjelaskan, dengan adanya sosialisasi yang masif dilakukan ke depan warga masyarakat, diharapkan masyarakat lebih tertib dalam berkendara.“Diharapkan dengan masif dilakukan kegiatan seperti ini bisa menumbuhkan kesadaran hukum masyarakat dalam berlalu lintas,” harapnya
text_en: Polresbanggai.com– Satlantaspolres proudly socializes Kamseltibcarlantas to the public and road users in Kotaluwuk through Mobile Information (Penling), Friday (19/1/2024). This was done to remind the public about the importance of obeying traffic regulations on the road for mutual safety." and this education is carried out at several points. "Such as on the edge of the main road, a place where people gather, motorbike taxi stands and public transportation drivers," said Head of Traffic Unit AKP I Made Bagus Aditya. He explained that with massive outreach carried out to community members, it is hoped that people will be more orderly when driving. "massively carrying out activities like this can increase public legal awareness in traffic," he hoped

title: Kapolres Banggai Pimpin Nobar Pameran Lukisan dan Pentas Musik Jogja Asik
text: Polresbanggai.com–kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani didampingi Kabagops dan seluruh PJU serta Personelpolres banggaigelar Nonton Bareng pameran lukisan dan pentas musik dalam tajuk Peace and Harmony, Jogja Asyik, Jogja Bermusik untuk Indonesia Apik, Jumat (19/1/2024) malam.Kegiatan nonton bareng di gelar serentak diseluruh jajaran Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia, sebagai upaya mendukung kelestarian seni yang ada di indonesia.Dalam gelaran terdapat berbagai rangkaian acara seperti Pameran Seni Rupa di Museum Benteng Vredeburg dan pergelaran musik yang diisi oleh artis-artis seperti Ndarboy Genk, Orkes Sinten Remen, Landung Simatupang, dan Trie Utami.Dalam acara ini juga, dilakukan launching lagu berjudul “Polisi Jagoanku” karya Ndarboy, yang liriknya ditulis oleh Butet Kartaredjasa. Lagu tersebut dinyanyikan untuk mengiringi polisi dan masyarakat yang berjoget bersama.“Selain melestarikan, kegiatan ini juga bertujuan untuk semakin mendekatkan Polri dengan seluruh masyarakat dengan menyajikan hiburan rakyat secara gratis,” ujar Kapolres Banggai.“Bertempat di Jogjakarta, kegiatan tersebut disaksikan secara virtual termasuk oleh seluruh jajaran Polres Banggai. Moment tersebut juga menjadi sarana menguatkakan soliditas Personel,” tutup AKBP Ade
text_en: Polresbanggai.com–Kapolres Banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani accompanied by Kabagops and all PJU as well as Pride Police personnel held a Watch Together exhibition of paintings and music performances under the title Peace and Harmony, Jogja Fun, Jogja Makes Music for Indonesia Apik, Friday (19/1/2024) evening. Watch activities held simultaneously by all ranks of the Indonesian National Police, as an effort to support the preservation of art in Indonesia. During the event there were various series of events such as the Fine Arts Exhibition at the Fort Vredeburg Museum and musical performances by artists such as Ndarboy Genk, Sinten Orchestra Remen, Landung Simatupang, and Trie Utami. Also in this event, a song entitled "Polisi Jagoanku" by Ndarboy was launched, the lyrics of which were written by Butet Kartaredjasa. The song was sung to accompany the police and the community dancing together. "Apart from preserving, this activity also aims to bring the National Police closer to the whole community by providing free public entertainment," said the Banggai Police Chief. "Taking place in Jogjakarta, this activity was witnessed virtually, including by all ranks of the Banggai Police. "This moment is also a means of strengthening personnel solidity," concluded AKBP Ade

title: LP2M UIN-Pemkab Banggai sepakat kembangkan pendidikan daerah
text: Banggai, Sulteng (ANTARA) - Lembaga Penelitian Pengabdian Masyarakat (LP2M) Universitas Islam Negeri (UIN) Datokarama dengan Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai, Sulawesi Tengah, sepakat mengembangkan pendidikan di daerah tersebut. Ketua LP2M UIN Datokarama Doktor Kiai Haji Sahran Raden, dihubungi dari Palu, Sabtu, mengemukakan pengembangan pendidikan di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai merupakan wujud perhatian dan kontribusi UIN Datokarama. "UIN Datokarama melalui kepemimpinan Rektor Profesor Lukman S Thahir terus berupaya mengoptimalkan kontribusi perguruan tinggi terhadap percepatan pengembangan daerah termasuk dari aspek pendidikan," kata Doktor Sahran. Untuk mengoptimalkan kontribusi UIN Datokarama, maka, kata Sahran, LP2M UIN Datokarama bersama Pemkab Banggai sepakat untuk melakukan pengembangan pendidikan daerah. Saat ini LP2M UIN Datokarama dengan Pemkab Banggai bersama - sama membahas naskah kesepakatan bersama tentang kerja sama pelaksanaan pendidikan dan pengajaran, penelitian dan pengabdian masyarakat. Naskah kesepakatan bersama itu nantinya akan ditandatangani oleh Rektor UIN Datokarama Profesor Lukman S Thahir, dengan Bupati Banggai Amiruddin Tamureka, berlangsung di Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai. Sahran menerangkan kesepakatan bersama itu menjadi dasar oleh UIN Datokarama dan Pemkab Banggai untuk menyelenggarakan pendidikan, penelitian, pengabdian masyarakat, riset, dan inovasi ilmu pengetahuan. Dengan tujuan meningkatkan kerjasama dalam pengembangan riset dan pengkajian serta inovasi penelitian untuk pengembangan ilmu pengetahuan dan pembangunan di Kabupaten Banggai. Mewujudkan pemerataan yang berkeadilan dalam memperoleh pendidikan tinggi yang bermutu dan relevan dengan kepentingan masyarakat dengan memperhatikan aspek demografi dan geografis di Kabupaten Banggai. Serta meningkatkan daya saing  daerah dan mengembangkan ilmu pengetahuan dan teknologi serta menghasilkan intelektual, ilmuwan, dan/atau profesional yang berbudaya, kreatif, toleran, demokratis dan  berkarakter tangguh untuk kepentingan daerah di Banggai. Sahran Raden menguraikan ruang lingkup kesepakatan bersama ini meliputi pengembangan pendidikan tinggi dan pendidikan dasar di Kabupaten Banggai, pengabdian masyarakat dalam pelaksanaan Kuliah Kerja Nyata (KKN) Tematik dan Pengembangan Desa Digital serta Desa Moderasi di Kabupaten Banggai. Kemudian, meningkatkan  penelitian, riset dan inovasi pengembangan ilmu pengetahuan. Melakukan pengkajian dalam pembentukan produk hukum daerah sesuai kebutuhan. Serta meningkatkan program pengembangan Teknologi Informasi dan Komunikasi (TIK) dan pengembangan Pendidikan Profesi Guru (PPG) di Kabupaten Banggai.
text_en: Banggai, Central Sulawesi (ANTARA) - The Community Service Research Institute (LP2M) of Datokarama State Islamic University (UIN) and the Banggai Regency Government, Central Sulawesi, have agreed to develop education in the area. Chairman of LP2M UIN Datokarama, Doctor Kiai Haji Sahran Raden, contacted from Palu, Saturday, said that the development of education in the Banggai Regency area was a manifestation of UIN Datokarama's attention and contribution. "UIN Datokarama, through the leadership of Chancellor Professor Lukman S Thahir, continues to strive to optimize the university's contribution to accelerating regional development, including from the educational aspect," said Doctor Sahran. To optimize UIN Datokarama's contribution, said Sahran, LP2M UIN Datokarama together with the Banggai Regency Government agreed to develop regional education. Currently, LP2M UIN Datokarama and the Banggai Regency Government are jointly discussing the text of a joint agreement regarding cooperation in implementing education and teaching, research and community service. The text of the joint agreement will later be signed by the Chancellor of UIN Datokarama, Professor Lukman S Thahir, with the Regent of Banggai Amiruddin Tamureka, taking place in Luwuk City, Banggai Regency. Sahran explained that the joint agreement was the basis for UIN Datokarama and the Banggai Regency Government to carry out education, research, community service, research and scientific innovation. With the aim of increasing cooperation in the development of research and studies as well as research innovation for the development of science and development in Banggai Regency. Realizing fair equality in obtaining quality higher education that is relevant to the interests of society by paying attention to demographic and geographical aspects in Banggai Regency. As well as increasing regional competitiveness and developing science and technology as well as producing intellectuals, scientists and/or professionals who are cultured, creative, tolerant, democratic and have a tough character for the benefit of the Banggai region. Sahran Raden explained that the scope of this joint agreement includes the development of higher education and basic education in Banggai Regency, community service in implementing Thematic Real Work Lectures (KKN) and the Development of Digital Villages and Moderation Villages in Banggai Regency. Then, increase  research, research and innovation in scientific development. Conduct studies in the formation of regional legal products according to needs. As well as increasing the Information and Communication Technology (ICT) development program and the development of Teacher Professional Education (PPG) in Banggai Regency.

title: Irjen Kemenkum Ham Ri Sebut Banggai Jadi Standar Dan Tolak Ukur Pelayanan Haki Bagi Daerah Lain
text: Terasbanggai.com -Irjen Kemenkum HAM RI Razilu memberikan apresiasi pada Pemda Banggai yang begitu antusias memberikan bagi masyarakatnya, khususnya dalam hal kekayaan intelektual. Penegasan itu disampaikan Razilu saat penandatangan perjanjian kerjasama (PKS) antara Kakanwil Kemenkum HAM Sulteng Hermansyah Siregar bersama Pemda Banggai melalui Badan Riset, Inovasi Daerah (BRIDA) kabupaten Banggai yang diteken Kepala BRIDA Andi Nusyamsy di hotel Swissbellinn Luwuk, Jumat (19/1/2024). Dikatakan Razilu, komitmen pemerintah daerah memberikan pelayanan HAKI sekaligus menjadi fasilitator bagi pemilik kekayaan intelektual melalui APBD patut mendapatkan apresiasi. Bahkan, sebut Irjen Razilu, Pemda Banggai dapat menjadi standar dan tolak ukur bagi daerah lainnya terkait pelayanan kekayaan intelektual bagi masyarakat. “Ini dapat menjadi alat untuk memprovokasi provinsi, kabupaten dan kota lainnya untuk datang menjadikan Banggai sebagai benchmarking dalam hal kekayaan intelektual yaitu Banggai telah mengalokasikan APBD untuk pendaftaran kekayaan intelektual,” ungkap Irjen Razilu. Sementara itu, Bupati Banggai Amirudin mengatakan, melindungi dan menjaga hak kekayaan intelektual masyarakat daerah ini sebagai pemilik hak intektualnya menjadi salah satu perhatian khusus pemda, tujuannya adalah agar masyarakat terlindungi secara hukum atas hak kekayaan intelektual yang dimilikinya. “Alhamdulillah pada tahun 2024 ini telah dialokasikan anggaran melalui APBD kita, sehingga kedepannya urusan hak kekayaan intelektual yang diajukan masyarakat semuanya gratis,” jelas Bupati Banggai. Di tempat yang sama Kepala Kakanwil Kemenkum HAM Sulteng Hermansyah Siregarmenyatakan bahwa agen layanan KI akan memainkan peran vital dalam meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat tentang pentingnya melindungi hak kekayaan intelektual. “Agen Layanan KI akan berperan penting, mereka akan memberikan informasi dan edukasi tentang berbagai aspek KI, mulai dari hak cipta, paten, merek, hingga desain industri,” jelas Kakanwil Sulteng. Dengan adanya MoU dan perjanjian kerjasama ini diharapkan sinergi antara Kemenkumham dan Pemda Banggai semakin memperkuat upaya bersama dalam meningkatkan pelayanan Hukum dan HAM serta meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap pentingnya melindungi kekayaan intelektual. Dengan adanya MoU dan perjanjian kerjasama ini diharapkan sinergi antara Kemenkumham dan Pemda Banggai semakin memperkuat upaya bersama dalam meningkatkan pelayanan Hukum dan HAM serta meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap pentingnya melindungi kekayaan intelektual. ( bd ) Dengan adanya MoU dan perjanjian kerjasama ini diharapkan sinergi antara Kemenkumham dan Pemda Banggai semakin memperkuat upaya bersama dalam meningkatkan pelayanan Hukum dan HAM serta meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap pentingnya melindungi kekayaan intelektual. ( bd )
text_en: Terasbanggai.com - Inspector General of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Razilu, expressed his appreciation to the Banggai Regional Government for being so enthusiastic about providing for its community, especially in terms of intellectual property. This confirmation was conveyed by Razilu when signing a cooperation agreement (PKS) between the Regional Head of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi Hermansyah Siregar and the Banggai Regional Government through the Regional Research, Innovation Agency (BRIDA) of Banggai district which was signed by the Head of BRIDA Andi Nusyamsy at the Swissbellinn Luwuk hotel, Friday (19/1/2024 ). Razilu said that the regional government's commitment to providing IPR services as well as being a facilitator for intellectual property owners through the APBD deserves appreciation. In fact, said Inspector General Razilu, the Banggai Regional Government could become a standard and benchmark for other regions regarding intellectual property services for the community. "This can be a tool to provoke other provinces, districts and cities to come to make Banggai a benchmark in terms of intellectual property, namely that Banggai has allocated APBD for intellectual property registration," said Inspector General Razilu. Meanwhile, the Regent of Banggai Amirudin said that protecting and safeguarding the intellectual property rights of the people of this region as owners of their intellectual rights is one of the regional government's special concerns, the aim is for the community to be legally protected for the intellectual property rights they have. "Thank God, in 2024 a budget has been allocated through our APBD, so that in the future all intellectual property rights matters submitted by the public will be free," explained the Regent of Banggai. In the same place, the Head of Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi Hermansyah Siregar stated that IP service agents would play a vital role in increasing public awareness about the importance of protecting intellectual property rights. "KI Service Agents will play an important role, they will provide information and education about various aspects of IP, starting from copyrights, patents, brands, to industrial designs," explained the Head of the Central Sulawesi Regional Office. With this MoU and cooperation agreement, it is hoped that the synergy between the Ministry of Law and Human Rights and the Banggai Regional Government will further strengthen joint efforts in improving legal and human rights services as well as increasing public awareness of the importance of protecting intellectual property. ( bd ) This assertion was conveyed by Razilu when signing a cooperation agreement (PKS) between the Regional Head of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi Hermansyah Siregar and the Banggai Regional Government through the Regional Research and Innovation Agency (BRIDA) of Banggai district which was signed by the Head of BRIDA Andi Nusyamsy at the Swissbellinn Luwuk hotel, Friday (19/ 1/2024). title: Personil Ops Damai Cartenz yang Gugur diterbangkan ke Luwuk
text: Kota Palu (ANTARA) - Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy, Personil Operasi Damai Cartenz-2024 yang gugur akibat terkena tembakan Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) di Intan Jaya diterbangkan ke Kampung Halaman di Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, Sulawesi Tengah, Sabtu 20/01. Upacara Pelepasan Jenazah dipimpin langsung oleh Kepala Operasi Damai Cartenz (Kaops Damai Cartenz), Kombes Pol Dr Faizal Ramadhani. Suasana haru tampak menyelimuti upacara yang digelar di Bandara Mozes Kilangin Timika. Dalam penjemputan jenazah, hadir sejumlah pejabat seperti, Wakaops Ops Damai Cartenz Kombes Pol Ronny Suseno, Danmen I Pelopor Pasbrimob III Kombes Pol Danu Windarto, serta sejumlah perwira lainnya. Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz, AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno SH MH MM, menjelaskan bahwa jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy diterbangkan menggunakan pesawat Smar-Air PK-SNP dari Bandara Bilorai Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya, menuju Timika. "Jenazah kemudian diterbangkan menuju Luwuk Banggai Sulawesi Tengah, setelah dilaksanakan upacara pelepasan yang dipimpin langsung oleh Kaops Damai Cartenz," ungkapnya. Dalam sambutannya, Kaops Damai Cartenz Kombes Pol Dr Faizal Ramadhani menyampaikan rasa duka cita yang mendalam atas kehilangan salah satu putra terbaik bangsa dalam menjalankan tugasnya. "Kami merasakan kehilangan yang besar atas gugurnya saudara kita, Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy. Semoga keluarga yang ditinggalkan diberi ketabahan," ucapnya. Untuk diketahui, aksi tersebut dilakukan di Kabupaten Intan Jaya pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII). Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan satu personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan. Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno SH MH MM menerangkan bahwa personel Ops Damai Cartenz yang berada di wilayah tersebut mengalami serangan dari KKB selama 30 menit dari arah belakang pos. "Saat ini, kami masih melakukan penyisiran terhadap pergerakan KKB di Wilayah Intan Jaya," ujar Bayu Suseno. Dalam pernyataannya, Kaops Damai Cartenz, Kombes Pol Dr Faizal Ramadhani, menekankan bahwa upaya pencarian terhadap Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata tersebut akan dijalankan secara maksimal, dan mereka akan dihadapkan pada proses hukum sesuai peraturan yang berlaku. "Saat ini, pasukan kami masih melakukan pengejaran dan penyisiran di sekitar Tempat Kejadian Perkara (TKP)," pungkas Faizal.
text_en: Palu City (ANTARA) - The body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy, Cartenz-2024 Peace Operation Personnel who died as a result of being shot by the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) in Intan Jaya was flown to his hometown in Luwuk, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, Saturday 20/01 . The Body Release Ceremony was led directly by the Head of Cartenz Peace Operations (Kaops Damai Cartenz), Police Commissioner Dr Faizal Ramadhani. An atmosphere of emotion seemed to surround the ceremony which was held at Mozes Kilangin Timika Airport. During the pick-up of the body, a number of officials were present, such as Deputy Head of Peace Ops Cartenz, Commissioner of Police Ronny Suseno, Danmen I Pelopor Pasbrimob III, Commissioner of Police Danu Windarto, as well as a number of other officers. Head of the Cartenz Peace Ops Public Relations Task Force, AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno SH MH MM, explained that the body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy was flown using a Smar-Air PK-SNP aircraft from Bilorai Sugapa Airport, Intan Jaya Regency, to Timika. "The body was then flown to Luwuk Banggai, Central Sulawesi, after a release ceremony was held which was led directly by Kaops Damai Cartenz," he said. In his speech, Kaops Peace Cartenz Police Commissioner Dr Faizal Ramadhani expressed his deep condolences for the loss of one of the nation's best sons in carrying out his duties. "We feel a great loss over the death of our brother, Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy. We hope that the family left behind will be given fortitude," he said. For your information, this action was carried out in Intan Jaya Regency led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from KKB is thought to have come from behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency, resulting in one Cartenz Peace Operation personnel being shot. Head of Public Relations Task Force for Peace Ops Cartenz AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno SH MH MM explained that Cartenz Peace Ops personnel who were in the area experienced attacks from the KKB for 30 minutes from behind the post. "Currently, we are still conducting investigations into the KKB movement in the Intan Jaya area," said Bayu Suseno. In his statement, Kaops Damai Cartenz, Police Commissioner Dr Faizal Ramadhani, emphasized that search efforts for the Armed Criminal Group would be carried out optimally, and they would be faced with legal processes in accordance with applicable regulations. "Currently, our troops are still pursuing and searching around the crime scene (TKP)," concluded Faizal.

title: Polisi Limpahkan Kasus Penusukan Pakai Sendok Makan di Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Unit III Satreskrim Polres Banggai pada Kamis (25/1/2024) pukul 11.30 Wita, menyerahkan tersangka dan Barang Bukti (Tahap II) tindak pidana penganiayaan ke Kajari Banggai.Sebelumnya tersangka di tahan atas tindak pidana Penganiayaan sebagaimana diatur dalam Pasal 351 ayat (1) KUHP terhadap saudara Laudry Nawali, sebagaimana laporan Polisi, Nomor: LP/B/663/XI/2023/SPKT/Res-Bgi/Polda Sulteng, tanggal 21 November 2023.BACA JUGA:Selamat! Aksabul dan Rahayu Terpilih Ketua ADIB’s Ponpes Daarul Hikmah LuwukPenyerahan tersangka dan barang bukti ini diterima Jaksa Hendra Poltak, MH, setelah berkas perkaranya dinyatakan lengkap (P21).Terkait kronologi kejadian, Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy mengatakan pada Kamis (16/11/2023) sekitar pukul 02.30 Wita/dini hari, telah terjadi tindak pidana penganiayaan yang dilakukan oleh tersangka inisial WW (28) warga Jalan P. Kalimantan Kelurahan Kompo, Luwuk Selatan.BACA JUGA:TKP di Karaton Luwuk, Tipu Korban Puluhan Juta, Petani di Taliabo Diringkus PolisiBertempat di depan SDN 08 Luwuk kepada korban, dengan menggunakan satu buah sendok makan.BACA JUGA:Maju Caleg DPRD Banggai, Ini Komitmen Silvia Lakoro Pengusaha Percetakan Kay Art“Tersangka menusuk sebanyak 1 kali ke arah pinggang atas sebelah kiri pada tubuh korban,” ujarnya.Saat ini, tersangka WW beserta barang bukti kasus tindak penganiayaan telah diserahkan ke Kejari Banggai untuk selanjutnya menjalani proses persidangan. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Unit III of the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit on Thursday (25/1/2024) at 11.30 WITA, handed over the suspect and evidence (Phase II) of the crime of abuse to Kajari Banggai. Previously the suspect was detained for the crime of abuse as regulated in Article 351 paragraph (1) of the Criminal Code against Laudry Nawali, as per Police report, Number: LP/B/663/XI/2023/SPKT/Res-Bgi/Polda Sulteng, dated 21 November 2023. READ ALSO: Congratulations! Aksabul and Rahayu Elected Chair of ADIB's Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School. The handover of the suspect and evidence was received by Prosecutor Hendra Poltak, MH, after the case file was declared complete (P21). Regarding the chronology of the incident, Head of Criminal Investigation Unit for the Banggai Police AKP Tio Tondy said on Thursday (16/11/ 2023) at around 02.30 WITA/early morning, a criminal act of abuse was committed by the suspect with the initials WW (28), a resident of Jalan P. Kalimantan, Kompo Village, South Luwuk. READ ALSO: Crime scene at Luwuk Palace, defrauding tens of millions of victims, farmers in Taliabo was arrested by the police. Located in front of SDN 08 Luwuk on the victim, using a tablespoon. ALSO READ: Progressing for Banggai DPRD Candidates, This is Silvia Lakoro's Commitment, Kay Art Printing Entrepreneur "The suspect stabbed once towards the left upper waist of the victim's body. " he said. Currently, the suspect WW along with evidence in the case of abuse has been handed over to the Banggai District Attorney's Office to further undergo the trial process. (*)

title: Selamat! Aksabul dan Rahayu Terpilih Ketua ADIB’s Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Selama empat hari sejak tanggal 24-27 Januari, Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk sukses melangsungkan Musyawarah Besar ADIB’s ke VII tahun 2024. Musyawarah Besar ini, dalam rangka pemilihan pengurus baru, baik  ADIB’s putera maupun putera.Dalam Mubes ini, Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk mengemas seperti pemilihan umum. Para Santri begitu antusias, menggunakan hak suaranya, untuk memenangkan jagoannya.Pemilihan ADIB’s putera maupun puteri ini diikuti masing-masing tiga calon atau kandidat.Untuk calon dari ikhwan diikuti oleh Afdal Ahmad, Aksabul Kahfi dan Afdal Risal Achmad. Sementara calon dari akhwat atau puteri diikuti oleh Rahayu R. Usman, Yusma Andini dan Ikrimah Aprilia.Pemilihan Ketua ADIB’s Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk periode 2024-2025 ini berhasil dimenangkan Aksabul Kahfi untuk putera dan Rahayu R. Usman untuk puteri.BACA JUGA:Selamat! 4 Mahasiswa FKM Untika Luwuk Lolos 3 Program MBKMKepala Madrasah Aliyah Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk, Febriancu Nasulili S.Pd., menjelaskan bagaimana proses berlangsungnya Mubes ini.Prosesnya melalui sidang-sidang Pleno, mulai dari siang pleno 1 pembacaan Tatib Musyawarah, Pleno 2 LPJ dan sidang komisi-komisi, dan sidang pleno 3 yang langsung diambil alih oleh Panitia Pemilihan sebagai bagian dari tahapan dan proses pemilihan.Musyawarah Besar ADIBS ke-VII tahun 2024 ini dimulai dari tanggal 24 – 27 Januari 2024 bertempat di Pondok Pesantren Daarul Hikmah LuwukQimas Ratuwipa Salam, Ketua Umum Adibs Putri 2023/2024 atau demisioner menyampaikan rasa syukur karena semua rangkaian Permusyawaratan telah selesai. “Selamat kepada  Rahayu. R Usman yang baru terpilih,” ucap Qimas.BACA JUGA:Putri Amalia, Mahasiswi Cantik AMIK Luwuk Finalis Puteri Indonesia 2024 Wakili SultengKemudian, Muh. Yazid Ath-thawali Ketua Adibs Ikhwan 2023/2024) mengatakan, kepengurusan dalam ADIB’s ini sebuah pengabdian yang terbilang singkat untuk pesantren. “Semoga selesai ini (menjadi pengurus adibs demisioner-red) bisa terus memberikan kontribusi yang banyak untuk Daarul Hikmah,” katanya.Ustadz Febriancu Nasulili, S.Pd., menambahkan, tahapan pencalonan Ketua ADIBS dimulai dengan tahapan pemberkasan dan tes.“Untuk menjadi Calon Ketua Umum ADIB’s ada beberapa persyaratan khusus yang harus terpenuhi antara lain,” ucapnya.Nah, para calon Ketua ADIBS Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk ini harus memiliki hafalan Al-Qur’an paling kurang 8 Juz dan Hadits minimal 25 Hadits lengkap matan dan sanadnya.BACA JUGA:Curi HP di Lumpoknyo Luwuk, Pemuda Ini Akhirnya Ditangkap PolisiTidak hanya itu saja, para calon atau kandidat juga wajib memiliki kemampuan bahasa asing yaitu Arab dan Inggris.Sementara itu, Pimpinan Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk, KH. Muhammad Muadz, Lc., M.H.I., menyampaikan terima kasih kepada seluruh pihak yang telak ikut membantu dan menyukseskan acara Musyawarah ini.“Tentu saja ucapan terima kasih secara terkhusus kepada Adibs periode 2023/2024 yang telah dimisioner, semoga Allah SWT membalas dengan balasan yang lebih baik atas seluruh kerja-kerja antum dan antunna selama ini,” tandasnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-For four days from 24-27 January, Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk successfully held the VIIth ADIB's Grand Conference in 2024. This Grand Conference, in the context of electing new administrators, both male and female ADIB's. In this Mubes, Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk looks like a general election. The students were very enthusiastic, using their voting rights to win their champion. Three candidates or candidates participated in the election for ADIB's sons and daughters. For the ikhwan candidates, they were Afdal Ahmad, Aksabul Kahfi and Afdal Risal Achmad. Meanwhile, the female or female candidates were Rahayu R. Usman, Yusma Andini and Ikrimah Aprilia. The election for Chair of ADIB's Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School for the 2024-2025 period was successfully won by Aksabul Kahfi for male and Rahayu R. Usman for female. ALSO READ: Congratulations! 4 FKM Untika Luwuk Students Passed 3 MBKM Programs Head of Madrasah Aliyah Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk, Febriancu Nasulili S.Pd., explained how the process of this Mubes took place. commission meetings, and the 3rd plenary session which was immediately taken over by the Election Committee as part of the election stages and process. The VII ADIBS Grand Conference in 2024 starts from 24 - 27 January 2024 at the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School Qimas Ratuwipa Salam , General Chairperson of Adibs Putri 2023/2024 or demisioner expressed his gratitude because all series of Deliberations had been completed. “Congratulations to  Rahayu. "R Usman has just been elected," said Qimas. READ ALSO: Putri Amalia, Beautiful Student at AMIK Luwuk Finalist for Puteri Indonesia 2024 Representing Central Sulawesi Then, Muh. Yazid Ath-thawali, Chair of the Adibs Ikhwan 2023/2024) said that the management of ADIB's is a fairly short service for the Islamic boarding school. "Hopefully after this (becoming an outgoing ADIBS administrator-ed) we can continue to contribute a lot to Daarul Hikmah," he said. Candidates for General Chair of ADIB's have several special requirements that must be met, among others," he said. So, candidates for Chair of ADIBS Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk must have memorized at least 8 Juz of the Al-Qur'an and a minimum of 25 Hadiths complete with matan and sanad. ALSO READ: Stealing cell phone in Lumpoknyo Luwuk, this young man is finally arrested by the police. Not only that, candidates or candidates are also required to have foreign language skills, namely Arabic and English. Meanwhile, the Head of the Daarul Hikmah Luwuk Islamic Boarding School, KH. Muhammad Muadz, Lc., M.H.I., expressed his gratitude to all parties who have helped and made this Deliberation event a success. "Of course, special thanks to Adibs for the 2023/2024 period who have been on a mission, may Allah SWT reward you with more "Good for all your and Antunna's work so far," he said. (*)

title: Maju Caleg DPRD Banggai, Ini Komitmen Silvia Lakoro Pengusaha Percetakan Kay Art
text: BANGGAI RAYA –Maju menjadi Caleg dari Partai Golkar nomor urut sembilan adalah murni panggilan hati Silvia Lakoro biasa disapa Sil, yang kemudian dirinya mendapatkan support oleh pengurus Dewan Partai Golkar. Dari sinilah Sil bertekad mendaftarkan diri ke KPUD untuk ikut bertarung di Pileg 2024 mendatang.Sil yang belum mengerti berpolitik tiba-tiba tergerak untuk maju dalam Pencaleg-an tak lain karena dorongan hati yang sangat kuat untuk bisa menjembatani aspirasi perempuan.BACA JUGA:TKP di Karaton Luwuk, Tipu Korban Puluhan Juta, Petani di Taliabo Diringkus Polisi“Semoga tetap menjalankan amanah, menjaga kesetiaan apabila saya dipercaya masyarakat dan menghantar saya duduk di kursi Parlemen nantinya,” harapnyaIa mengatakan masih banyak hak kaum hawa yang harus diperjuangkan hingga saat ini.Untuk membela hak perempuan, seseorang itu perlu pendidikan yang baik, berwawasan.Sekaligus akan memberikan pendidikan kepada masyarakat.BACA JUGA:Selamat! Aksabul dan Rahayu Terpilih Ketua ADIB’s Ponpes Daarul Hikmah Luwuk“Maka dari itu saya yang berangkat dari seorang ibu rumah tangga yang hanya mengelola usaha percetakan Kay Art masih sangatlah butuh belajar dari ibu ibu politisi yang sudah menduduki kursi Parlemen yg begitu sangat luar biasa,” katanya.Sil berharap ke depan makin banyak lagi Perempuan Indonesia khususnya di Kabupaten Banggai bisa maju di parlemen untuk memperjuangkan hak-hak kaum perempuan yang saat ini masih banyak yang termajinalkan.BACA JUGA:Bawaslu Banggai Ingatkan Aparat Desa Netral, Laporkan Jika Dugaan Pelanggaran“Para perempuan politisi kita bisa cerdas berpolitik jika tidak hanya dijadikan obyek untuk mendapatkan suara, tapi justru harus bisa menjadi pelaku dalam pesta demokrasi. Saya siap berjuang bersama perempuan di Pemilu 2024 di dapil1 dan DPRD Kabupaten Banggai,” pungkasnya.AGK
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA – Advancing to become Golkar Party legislative candidate number nine was a pure calling for Silvia Lakoro, usually called Sil, who later received support from the Golkar Party Council management. From here, Sil was determined to register with the KPUD to take part in the upcoming 2024 legislative elections. Sil, who did not yet understand politics, was suddenly moved to advance in the legislative election due to a very strong impulse to be able to bridge women's aspirations. ALSO READ: TKP in Luwuk Palace, Scam Victims of Tens of Millions, Farmers in Taliabo Arrested by Police "Hopefully I will continue to carry out my mandate, maintain my loyalty if I am trusted by the community and lead me to sit in Parliament in the future," he hoped. He said that there are still many rights for women that must be fought for now. For Defending women's rights, a person needs good, insightful education. At the same time he will provide education to society. READ ALSO: Congratulations! Aksabul and Rahayu Elected Chair of ADIB's Islamic Boarding School Daarul Hikmah Luwuk "Therefore, I, who started from a housewife who only managed the Kay Art printing business, still really need to learn from politicians who have occupied very extraordinary seats in Parliament," he said. Sil hopes that in the future more Indonesian women, especially in Banggai Regency, can run for parliament to fight for the rights of women, who are currently still marginalized. ALSO READ: Banggai Bawaslu Reminds Village Officials to Be Neutral, Report Alleged Violations "Women Our politicians can be politically intelligent if they are not only used as objects to get votes, but instead they must be able to become actors in the democratic party. "I am ready to fight together with women in the 2024 elections in electoral district 1 and the DPRD of Banggai Regency," he concluded. AGK

title: Distribusi Logistik Pemilu di Banggai Mulai 5 Februari, Pagimana Sasaran Pertama
text: BANGGAI RAYA-KPU Banggai tengah melakukan proses pengesetan dan pengepakan logistik pemilu 2024 untuk selanjutnya didistribusikan ke kecamatan.Divisi Sosialisasi KPU Banggai Mahmud kepada media ini Minggu malam (28/1/2024) mengatakan, setelah proses pengesetan dan pengepakan selesai, langkah selanjutnya adalah mendistribusikan ke kecamatan.Berdasarkan rencana kata dia, proses distribusi akan dimulai pada 5 Februari 2024 ditandai pelepasan kendaraan pengangkut logistik secara simbolis. Pelepasan perdana itu direncanakan dihadiri langsung Forkopimda Banggai dan Bawaslu. “Sasaran perdana pendistribusian logistik adalah Kecamatan Pagimana. Setelah sampai di Pagimana, nantinya akan diatur jadwal pengantaran logistik ke TPS terjauh yakni di Desa Baloa Doda, yang memang harus diantar dengan berjalan kaki sekira 2 hari,” ujarnya.BACA JUGA:Polisi Limpahkan Kasus Penusukan Pakai Sendok Makan di LuwukBACA JUGA:Warga Berhasil Gagalkan Aksi Curanmor di Puge Bukit Mambual, Pelaku Lari ke Hutan Saat DikejarMenurut dia, seluruh logistik sudah harus ada di TPS pada H-1 Pemilu yakni tanggal 13 Februari, sehingga saat hari pemungutan suara pada 14 Februari, semuanya sudah siap.Sebelumnya, Kabag Ops Polres Banggai Iptu Esti Prastiyo mengatakan bahwa kepolisian akan melakukan pengawalan proses distribusi logistik pemilu hingga ke TPS. Proses pendistribusian mulai 5 Februari itu kata dia, juga jadi perhatian kepolisian, guna memastikan kelancaran dan keamanan seluruh logistik pemilu sampai tiba di TPS. “Kami terus berkoordinasi dengan KPU Banggai terkait pemilu, terutama menyangkut logistik,” kata Kabag Ops. DARBACA JUGA:Maju Caleg DPRD Banggai, Ini Komitmen Silvia Lakoro Pengusaha Percetakan Kay Art
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-KPU Banggai is currently carrying out the process of setting up and packing logistics for the 2024 election for further distribution to sub-districts. Banggai KPU Socialization Division Mahmud told this media Sunday evening (28/1/2024) that after the setting up and packing process was complete, the next step was to distribute to the sub-district. Based on the plan he said, the distribution process will begin on February 5 2024 marked by the symbolic release of logistics transport vehicles. The inaugural release is planned to be attended directly by Forkopimda Banggai and Bawaslu. "The initial target for logistics distribution is Pagimana District. "After arriving in Pagimana, a logistics delivery schedule will be arranged to the farthest polling station, namely in Baloa Doda Village, which must be delivered on foot for approximately 2 days," he said. Failed the robbery action in Puge Bukit Mambual, the perpetrator ran into the forest when chased. According to him, all logistics had to be at the polling station on the first day of the election, namely February 13, so that on voting day on February 14, everything was ready. Previously, the Head of Ops Banggai Police Inspector Esti Prastiyo said that the police would supervise the election logistics distribution process up to the polling stations. He said the distribution process starting February 5 was also the concern of the police, to ensure the smoothness and security of all election logistics until they arrived at the polling stations. "We continue to coordinate with the Banggai KPU regarding the election, especially regarding logistics," said the Head of Ops. READ ALSO: Proud DPRD Candidates Go Forward, This is Silvia Lakoro's Commitment, Kay Art Printing Entrepreneur

title: TKP di Karaton Luwuk, Tipu Korban Puluhan Juta, Petani di Taliabo Diringkus Polisi
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Sempat melarikan diri, seorang petani inisial BR alias Dragon (28) warga Desa Bangahu Kecamatan Taliabo Barat Kabupaten Pulau Taliabo, Maluku Utara, ditangkap polisi karena diduga kasus penipuan.Kasatreskrim Polres Banggai, AKP Tio Tondy menyampaikan, kronologis pelaku ditangkap atas laporan polisi korban Yusna Soamole (34) warga Desa Bobong, Taliabu.“Kejadiannya di kios adik korban di Kelurahan Karaton, Luwuk,” ungkapnya.BACA JUGA:Bawaslu Banggai Identifikasi Dugaan Mobilisasi ASN, Keberpihakan Kades dan Politik Uang di PemiluBermula pada Kamis (28/12/2023) sekitar jam 14.30 Wita, saat itu korban bersama dengan suaminya Joko Teguh ditawarkan oleh pelaku, dua unit sepeda motor masing-masing Yamaha Fino Rp4 Juta dan Honda CRF Rp15 Juta.Akhirnya korban menyerahkan uang sebesar Rp22 Juta.Setelah itu pelaku langsung pergi dengan alasan ingin mengurus surat-surat kendaraan sembari berjanji bahwa pihak dealer akan mengantarkan kedua unit motor tersebut.BACA JUGA:Dihadiri Ratusan Warga, Kabagops Polres Banggai Pimpin Apel Pengamanan Kampanye di Nambo“Namun motor yang dijanjikan tidak ada dan pelaku juga sudah tidak bisa dihubungi,” ungkapnya.Berdasarkan hasil penyelidikan, dari laporan polisi korban. Selanjutnya, Tim Resmob Tompotika Sat Reskrim Polres Banggai langsung melakukan penyelidikan sehingga pelaku terpantau berada di wilayah Provinsi Sulawesi Tenggara.Hasil penyelidikan di lapangan didapat informasi dapat dipercaya tentang keberadaan pelaku dan langsung melakukan penangkapan tanpa perlawanan.BACA JUGA:Bawaslu Banggai Ingatkan Aparat Desa Netral, Laporkan Jika Dugaan Pelanggaran“Dengan kerjasama dan koordinasi dengan Resmob Polda Sultra, berhasil mengamankan pelaku di kosnya,” ujarnya.Lanjut Kasat, bahwa pada Rabu (24/1) tim Resmob Polres Banggai langsung bertolak menjemput pelaku di Posko Resmob Polda Sultra.“Kamis (25/1) sekitar pukul 23.00 Wita, pelaku tiba di Mapolres Banggai, untuk dilakukan pemeriksaan lebih lanjut,” pungkas AKP Tio. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Having run away, a farmer with the initials BR alias Dragon (28), a resident of Bangahu Village, West Taliabo District, Taliabo Island Regency, North Maluku, was arrested by the police because he was suspected of being a fraud case. Head of Criminal Investigation Unit of the Banggai Police, AKP Tio Tondy said that the chronology of the perpetrator was arrested based on a report police victim Yusna Soamole (34), a resident of Bobong Village, Taliabu. "It happened at the victim's sister's kiosk in Karaton Village, Luwuk," he said. 12/2023) around 14.30 WITA, at that time the victim and her husband Joko Teguh were offered by the perpetrator two motorbikes, each Yamaha Fino Rp. 4 million and Honda CRF Rp. 15 million. Finally the victim handed over Rp. 22 million. After that the perpetrator immediately left with the excuse of wanting to take care of the vehicle documents while promising that the dealer would deliver the two motorbikes. READ ALSO: Attended by Hundreds of Residents, Banggai Police Head of Police Leads Campaign Security Call in Nambo "However, the promised motorbike was not there and the perpetrator was no longer able to contacted," he said. Based on the results of the investigation, from the victim's police report. Furthermore, the Tompotika Resmob Team of the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit immediately carried out an investigation so that the perpetrator was observed to be in the Southeast Sulawesi Province area. The results of the investigation in the field obtained reliable information about the whereabouts of the perpetrator and immediately carried out an arrest without resistance. ALSO READ: Banggai Bawaslu Reminds Neutral Village Officials, Report Alleged Violations "With cooperation and coordination with the Southeast Sulawesi Police Resmob, we succeeded in securing the perpetrator at his boarding house," he said. The Chief of Staff continued, that on Wednesday (24/1) the Banggai Police Resmob team immediately went to pick up the perpetrator at the Southeast Sulawesi Police Resmob Command Post. "Thursday "(25/1) at around 23.00 WITA, the perpetrator arrived at the Banggai Police Headquarters, for further examination," concluded AKP Tio. (*)

title: Bawaslu Banggai Ingatkan Aparat Desa Netral, Laporkan Jika Dugaan Pelanggaran
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Badan Pengawas Pemilihan Umum (Bawaslu) Kabupaten Banggai mengingatkan kepada Personil TNI, Polri dan Kepala Desa, Aparat Desa serta anggota Badan Permusyawaratan Desa (BPD) harus Netral pada tahapan-tahapan Pemilu 2024.Sesuai Undang-Undang Nomor 7 Tahun 2017 Pasal 494, Pasal 280 ayat (2), dan ayat (3).Apabila masyarakat mendapatkan hal tersebut, segera laporkan ke Bawaslu Banggai jika terjadi dugaan pelanggaran ke alamat Jalan DR. Sutomo (Dahlia) nomor 18, Kelurahan Luwuk, Kecamatan Luwuk.BACA JUGA:Moh Hadiwiyono, Alumni Magang Jepang Nyaleg DPRD BanggaiHal itu sesuai dengan baliho ukuran besar milik Bawaslu Banggai yang terpajang di Jalan Ahmad Yani, Luwuk atau depan Kantor Telkom Luwuk.Untuk diketahui, Pasal 494 dijelaskan bahwa setiap aparatur sipil negara, anggota TNI dan Polri, kepala desa, perangkat desa, dan atau anggota Badan Permusyawaratan Desa (BPD) yang melanggar larangan, sebagaimana dimaksud Pasal 280 ayat (3), dipidanakan dengan pidana kurungan paling lama 1 tahun, dan denda paling banyak Rp12 juta.BACA JUGA:Curi HP di Lumpoknyo Luwuk, Pemuda Ini Akhirnya Ditangkap PolisiAdapun Pasal 280 ayat (2), disebutkan bahwa perangkat desa termasuk ke dalam pihak yang dilarang diikutsertakan oleh pelaksana dan atau tim kampanye dalam kegiatan kampanye Pemilu.BACA JUGA:Putri Amalia, Mahasiswi Cantik AMIK Luwuk Finalis Puteri Indonesia 2024 Wakili SultengSelain tidak diikutsertakan dalam kampanye perangkat desa. Sebagaimana dijelaskan dalamn ayat (3) juga dilarang menjadi pelaksana dan tim kampanye Pemilu. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The General Election Supervisory Agency (Bawaslu) of Banggai Regency reminds TNI, Polri and Village Heads, Village Officials and members of the Village Consultative Body (BPD) personnel must be Neutral at the stages of the 2024 Election. In accordance with Law Number 7 of 2017 Article 494, Article 280 paragraph (2), and paragraph (3). If the public finds out about this, immediately report it to Bawaslu Banggai if there is a suspected violation at the address Jalan DR. Sutomo (Dahlia) number 18, Luwuk Village, Luwuk District. READ ALSO: Moh Hadiwiyono, Japanese Internship Alumni Legs Banggai DPRD This is in accordance with the large billboard belonging to Bawaslu Banggai which is displayed on Jalan Ahmad Yani, Luwuk or in front of the Luwuk Telkom Office. For information , Article 494 explains that every state civil servant, member of the TNI and Polri, village head, village apparatus, and/or member of the Village Consultative Body (BPD) who violates the prohibition, as intended in Article 280 paragraph (3), shall be punished with imprisonment for a maximum of 1 year, and a maximum fine of IDR 12 million. ALSO READ: Stealing cellphone in Lumpoknyo Luwuk, this young man was finally arrested by the police. As for Article 280 paragraph (2), it is stated that village officials are among the parties who are prohibited from being involved by campaign organizers and/or teams in campaign activities Election. READ ALSO: Putri Amalia, Beautiful Student at AMIK Luwuk Finalist for Puteri Indonesia 2024 Represents Central Sulawesi Apart from not being included in the campaign for village officials. As explained in paragraph (3), he is also prohibited from being an organizer or election campaign team. RUM

title: Kapolres Banggai cek gudang logistik KPU
text: Banggai (ANTARA) - Kepala Kepolisian Resor (Kapolres) Banggai, Polda Sulawesi Tengah, AKBP Ade Nuramdani, mengecek secara langsung gudang logistik KPU Kabupaten Banggai untuk memastikan soal keamanan dan kesiapan menjelang Pemilu 2024. "Kegiatan ini dilakukan guna memastikan kelengkapan dan kesiapan logistik menjelang pelaksanaan pemilihan umum," kata Ade Nuramdani di Kabupaten Banggai, Sulteng, Senin. Dalam kesempatan itu, Kapolres Ade mengecek dan memonitoring langsung terhadap proses pengepakan kotak suara dan logistik pemilu, serta keamanan gudang logistik KPU di Kompleks Bukit Halimun Kelurahan Maahas, Luwuk Selatan. Ia mengatakan bahwa menjelang H-14 menuju tahap pemungutan suara (voting day), penjagaan gudang logistik secara ketat merupakan bagian dari pengamanan yang harus dilakukan oleh Polri dalam tahapan Pemilu 2024. Karena itu, pengecekan dilakukan untuk memantau sejauh mana kesiapan penyelenggara pemilu serta tahapan yang sudah berjalan dalam penyelenggaraan Pemilu 2024 agar pelaksanaan pemilu di wilayah Kabupaten Banggai dapat berjalan dengan baik, aman dan lancar. "Pengecekan ini merupakan salah satu upaya keamanan yang dilakukan polres untuk memastikan tidak adanya gangguan pada pelaksanaan tahapan pemilu. Polres Banggai siap memberi jaminan keamanan melalui kegiatan pengamanan objek vital," katanya. Pihaknya akan terus melakukan patroli dan mengoptimalkan pengawasan untuk memastikan keamanan barang logistik pemilu yang ada di gudang logistik KPU Banggai. Dalam kesempatan itu juga, Kapolres Ade mengingatkan personel pengamanan gudang logistik KPU Banggai untuk tetap meningkatkan kewaspadaan di gudang dan sekitarnya. "Laksanakan tugas dengan baik, cermat dan profesional. Jangan lengah, lakukan dengan penuh tanggung jawab,” katanya. Ia juga menyampaikan kepada pihak KPU Banggai agar menghubungi petugas kepolisian yang bertugas apabila ada yang perlu untuk dikoordinasikan sehingga sinergi terus terjalin baik selama berjalannya tahapan hingga pelaksanaan Pemilu 2024. Kapolres berharap agar semua pihak terlibat dapat bekerja sama untuk memastikan proses demokrasi berlangsung dengan aman, adil, dan teratur, mengingat pelaksanaan pemilu serentak kurang dari sebulan lagi. Pewarta: Nur Amalia Amir Editor: Tasrief Tarmizi Copyright © ANTARA 2024
text_en: Banggai (ANTARA) - Head of the Banggai Resort Police (Kapolres), Central Sulawesi Regional Police, AKBP Ade Nuramdani, directly checked the Banggai Regency KPU logistics warehouse to ensure security and readiness ahead of the 2024 Election. "This activity was carried out to ensure the completeness and readiness of logistics ahead of implementation of general elections," said Ade Nuramdani in Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, Monday. On that occasion, Police Chief Ade directly checked and monitored the process of packing ballot boxes and election logistics, as well as the security of the KPU logistics warehouse in the Bukit Halimun Complex, Maahas Village, South Luwuk. He said that as D-14 approached the voting day, strict guarding of logistics warehouses was part of the security that had to be carried out by the National Police in the 2024 Election stages. Therefore, checks were carried out to monitor the extent of readiness of the election organizers and the stages in which is already underway in holding the 2024 elections so that elections in the Banggai Regency area can run well, safely and smoothly. "This check is one of the security efforts carried out by the police to ensure that there is no disruption to the implementation of the election stages. Banggai Police is ready to provide security guarantees through activities to secure vital objects," he said. His party will continue to carry out patrols and optimize supervision to ensure the safety of election logistics goods in the Banggai KPU logistics warehouse. On that occasion, Police Chief Ade reminded Banggai KPU logistics warehouse security personnel to continue to increase vigilance in the warehouse and its surroundings. "Carry out your duties well, carefully and professionally. Don't be careless, do it with full responsibility," he said. He also told the Banggai KPU to contact the police officers on duty if there was anything that needed to be coordinated so that synergy continued to be maintained well throughout the stages until implementation of the 2024 General Election. The Police Chief hopes that all parties involved can work together to ensure that the democratic process takes place safely, fairly and orderly, considering that the simultaneous elections are less than a month away. Journalist: Nur Amalia Amir Editor: Tasrief Tarmizi Copyright © ANTARA 2024

title: Polres Banggai Pantau Pengepakan Kotak Suara
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Polres Banggai rutin melaksanakan pengamanan dan pemantauan proses pengepakan kotak suara dan logistik Pemilu 2024, di gudang logisitik Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU) Kabupaten Banggai. “Monitoring dan pengamanan dilakukan untuk memastikan keamanan seluruh logistik Pemilu,” kata Kabag Ops Polres Banggai, Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi, Minggu (28/1/2024). Menurutnya, monitoring dan pengamanan dilakukan sebagai bentuk komitmen Polri, khususnya Polres Banggai, dalam menjamin keberhasilan pelaksanaan Pemilu 2024 aman dan terkendali. “Semua ini dilakukan agar pelaksanaan Pesta Demokrasi tahun 2024 berjalan aman, damai, lancar dan tentunya kondusif,” ujarnya. Selaku Karendal Operasi Mantap Brata (OMB) Polres Banggai, kata Esti, pihaknya juga aktif berkoodinasi dengan KPU sebagai penyelenggara Pemilu, guna memastikan proses pengepakan hingga pendistribusian tidak terjadi kendala. “Kami selalu berkoodinasi dengan pihak KPU, guna memastikan bahwa semua tahapan pemilu, mulai dari pengepakan hingga distribusi logistik ke tingkat PPK dan TPS nanti, berjalan sesuai dengan rencana,” terang Esti. Ia berharap, kehadiran Polri diwujudkan sebagai komitmen dalam mengawal dan mengamankan seluruh tahapan Pemilu, dengan fokus menjaga keamanan dan kelancaran proses pengepakan surat suara. “Polri akan terus mengawal setiap proses Pemilu 2024 hingga selesai dengan penuh integritas,” tandas Esti. */PAR “Monitoring dan pengamanan dilakukan untuk memastikan keamanan seluruh logistik Pemilu,” kata Kabag Ops Polres Banggai, Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi, Minggu (28/1/2024).
