text_en: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Banggai Police routinely carry out security and monitoring of the process of packing ballot boxes and logistics for the 2024 Election, at the logistics warehouse of the Banggai Regency General Election Commission (KPU). "Monitoring and security are carried out to ensure the security of all election logistics," said Banggai Police Head of Operations, Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi, Sunday (28/1/2024). According to him, monitoring and security is carried out as a form of commitment from the National Police, especially the Banggai Police, in ensuring the successful implementation of the 2024 elections in a safe and controlled manner. "All of this is done so that the implementation of the 2024 Democratic Party will be safe, peaceful, smooth and of course conducive," he said. As the Head of the Banggai Police's Mantap Brata (OMB) Operation, said Esti, his party is also actively coordinating with the KPU as the election organizer, to ensure that the packing and distribution process does not encounter problems. "We always coordinate with the KPU, to ensure that all stages of the election, from packaging to logistics distribution to the PPK and TPS levels later, go according to plan," explained Esti. He hopes that the presence of the National Police will be realized as a commitment to overseeing and securing all stages of the election, with a focus on maintaining security and the smoothness of the ballot paper packing process. "The National Police will continue to monitor every 2024 election process until it is completed with full integrity," stressed Esti. */PAR "Monitoring and security are carried out to ensure the security of all election logistics," said Head of Banggai Police Operations Division, Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi, Sunday (28/1/2024). title: Polres Banggai Tangkap Tersangka Penipuan
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Satuan Reserse Kriminal (Satreskrim) Polres Banggai menangkap seorang pria berinisial BR alias Dragon (28), warga Kabupaten Pulau Taliabo, Provinsi Maluku Utara, karena diduga merupakan pelaku kasus penipuan. Kasatreskrim Polres Banggai, AKP Tio Tondy, di ruang kerjanya, Sabtu (27/1/2024) mengatakan, pelaku ditangkap atas laporan korban Yusna Soamole (34), yang juga warga Taliabu, ke pihak Polres Banggai “Kejadian itu di kios adik korban di Kelurahan Karaton, Kecamatan Luwuk,” kata Tio. Tio menuturkan, pada 28 Desember 2023 lalu sekira pukul 14.30 WITA, korban bersama dengan suaminya ditawarkan oleh pelaku dua unit sepeda motor masing-masing seharga Rp4 juta dan Rp15 juta. Korban lalu menyerahkan uang Rp22 juta, namun pelaku langsung pergi dengan alasan mengurus surat-surat kendaraan. “Pelaku berjanji bahwa pihak dealer akan mengantarkan kedua unit motor tersebut,” terang Tio. Berselang beberapa hari motor yang dijanjikan tidak diantarkan, dan pelaku juga sudah tidak dapat dihubungi melalui telepon seluler miliknya. “Berdasarkan laporan polisi korban, Tim Resmob Tompotika Satreskrim Polres Banggai langsung melakukan penyelidikan, sehingga pelaku terpantau berada di wilayah Provinsi Sulawesi Tenggara (Sultra),” ujar Tio. text_en: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – The Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit (Satreskrim) arrested a man with the initials BR alias Dragon (28), a resident of Taliabo Island Regency, North Maluku Province, because he was suspected of being the perpetrator of a fraud case. Kasatreskrim Banggai Police, AKP Tio Tondy, in his office, Saturday (27/1/2024) said that the perpetrator was arrested based on a report from the victim Yusna Soamole (34), who is also a resident of Taliabu, to the Banggai Police "The incident happened at the victim's sister's kiosk in "Karaton Village, Luwuk District," said Tio. Tio said, on December 28 2023 at around 14.30 WITA, the victim and her husband were offered two motorbikes by the perpetrator for IDR 4 million and IDR 15 million respectively. The victim then handed over IDR 22 million, but the perpetrator immediately left on the pretext of taking care of the vehicle documents. "The perpetrator promised that the dealer would deliver the two motorbikes," explained Tio. Several days later the promised motorbike was not delivered, and the perpetrator could no longer be contacted via his cell phone. "Based on the victim's police report, the Tompotika Resmob Team of the Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit immediately carried out an investigation, so that the perpetrator was observed to be in the Southeast Sulawesi (Sultra) Province area," said Tio. title: Polres Banggai Rutin Gelar Program Minggu Kasih
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Polres Banggai bersama Polsek jajaran rutin melaksanakan kegiatan Minggu Kasih, yang merupakan program prioritas Kapolri di kota Luwuk. Kasi Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S. Muda, Minggu (28/1/2024) mengungkapkan, program Minggu Kasih merupakan upaya untuk mempererat tali silaturrahmi dengan masyarakat, dengan melaksanakan sosialisasi ataupun diskusi guna mengetahui situasi masyatakat. “Kegiatan ini juga untuk menanggapi persoalan-persoalan yang ada di tengah masyarakat,” kata Al Amin. Selain program Minggu Kasih, Polres Banggai juga mempunyai program lainnya seperti Jumat Curhat, yang rutin dilakukan demi menjalin hubungan baik dengan masyarakat. “Kedua program ini mempunyai tujuan yang sama, yaitu untuk mendekatkan diri dan mendengarkan langsung keluhan-keluhan masyarakat,” ujar Al Amin. Ia berharap, dengan adanya program Polri tersebut dapat terus membangun sinergitas dan silaturahmi antara Polri dan masyarakat, demi terciptanya kondusifitas kamtibmas yang aman dan kondusif. “Alhamdulillah, kedua program Polri ini mendapat tanggapan positif dari masyarakat,” tandasnya. */PAR Kasi Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S. text_en: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – The Banggai Police together with the Sector Police regularly carry out Love Week activities, which is the National Police Chief's priority program in the city of Luwuk. Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S. Muda, Sunday (28/1/2024) revealed that the Love Week program is an effort to strengthen ties with the community, by carrying out outreach or discussions to find out the community situation. "This activity is also to respond to problems that exist in society," said Al Amin. Apart from the Love Week program, Banggai Police also has other programs such as Confide Friday, which is routinely carried out to build good relations with the community. "Both programs have the same goal, namely to get closer and listen directly to people's complaints," said Al Amin. He hopes that with this Polri program, we can continue to build synergy and friendship between the Polri and the community, in order to create safe and conducive security and social security. "Thank God, these two National Police programs received positive responses from the public," he said. */PAR Head of Banggai Police Public Relations, Inspector Al Amin S. title: 27.364 KPM di Banggai Mulai Terima Bantuan Beras
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Upaya mengurangi pengeluaran Penerima Bantuan Pangan, Wakil Bupati Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili resmi meluncurkan Penyaluran cadangan beras pemerintah, bertempat di Kantor Bupati Banggai, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, pada Senin (29/1/2024).Pemerintah Kabupaten (Pemkab) Banggai dalam hal ini Dinas Ketahanan Pangan Kabupaten Banggai bersama Perusahaan Umum Bulog Kantor Cabang Luwuk Banggai merupakan penyelenggara dari kegiatan yang dilaksanakan tersebut.Kepala Dinas Ketapang Alfian Djibran saat menyampaikan laporan mengatakan bahwa bantuan cadangan beras ini berasal dari cadangan pangan pemerintah.BACA JUGA:Distribusi Logistik Pemilu di Banggai Mulai 5 Februari, Pagimana Sasaran Pertama“Dan Alhamdulillah Kabupaten Banggai termasuk salah satu kabupaten yang paling cepat menyalurkan bantuan ini,” tutur Kepala Dinas Ketapang, Alfian Djibran.Kepala Dinas Ketapang menjelaskan bahwa Bulog bersama pemerintah daerah akan menyalurkan kepada 27.364 KPM (Keluarga Penerima Manfaat) di 24 Kecamatan Kabupaten Banggai selama 6 bulan per KPM.BACA JUGA:Kapolres Tinjau Langsung Logistik Pemilu di Gudang KPU BanggaiDalam sambutannya, Wakil Bupati Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili menyampaikan bahwa masalah pangan ini tentu merupakan masalah yang sangat mendasar dalam kehidupan masyarakat.“Oleh karenanya yang paling utama di sini adalah bagaimana penyaluran ini betul-betul sesuai dengan data yang sudah kita tetapkan, agar penyaluran ini betul-betul menyasar kepada Keluarga Penerima Manfaat,” tegas Wabup Furqanuddin.Inisiatif ini bertujuan untuk mengurangi pengeluaran bagi penerima bantuan pangan, serta memastikan keberlangsungan akses pangan bagi masyarakat yang membutuhkan.BACA JUGA:Polisi Limpahkan Kasus Penusukan Pakai Sendok Makan di Luwuk“Hal ini dilaksanakan tentu dengan tujuan mengatasi inflasi, ini sangat luar biasa, enam bulan kedepan muda-mudahan lonjakan harga pangan kita akan teratasi,” harap Wabup Furqanuddin.Program ini bukan hanya merupakan bentuk tanggung jawab pemerintah terhadap kesejahteraan masyarakat, tetapi juga sebagai langkah strategis dalam membangun ketahanan pangan yang berkelanjutan di Kabupaten Banggai. **
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- In an effort to reduce the expenditure of Food Aid Recipients, Banggai Deputy Regent Furqanuddin Masulili officially launched the distribution of government rice reserves, taking place at the Banggai Regent's Office, South Luwuk District, on Monday (29/1/2024). Banggai Regency Government (Pemkab) in terms of The Banggai Regency Food Security Service together with the Bulog Public Company, Luwuk Banggai Branch Office, are the organizers of this activity. Head of the Ketapang Service, Alfian Djibran, when submitting a report, said that this rice reserve assistance came from government food reserves. ALSO READ: Election Logistics Distribution in Banggai Starting February 5, Morning is the First Target "And Thank God, Banggai Regency is one of the districts that is quickest to distribute this aid," said the Head of the Ketapang Service, Alfian Djibran. The Head of the Ketapang Service explained that Bulog together with the regional government would distribute it to 27,364 KPM (Beneficiary Families ) in 24 Districts of Banggai Regency for 6 months per KPM. READ ALSO: Police Chief Directly Observes Election Logistics at Banggai KPU Warehouse. In his speech, Banggai Deputy Regent Furqanuddin Masulili said that the food problem is certainly a very basic problem in people's lives. "Therefore "The most important thing here is how this distribution is truly in accordance with the data that we have determined, so that this distribution is truly targeted at the Beneficiary Families," emphasized Deputy Regent Furqanuddin. This initiative aims to reduce expenses for food aid recipients, as well as ensure sustainability. access to food for people in need. ALSO READ: Police Handle Case of Stabbing Using a Spoon in Luwuk "This is of course carried out with the aim of overcoming inflation, this is very extraordinary, in the next six months hopefully our spike in food prices will be resolved," hoped the Deputy Regent Furqanuddin.This program is not only a form of government responsibility for community welfare, but also a strategic step in building sustainable food security in Banggai Regency. **

title: Waket DPRD Banggai Hadiri Forum Konsultasi Publik
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Wakil Ketua DPRD Banggai Batia Sisilia Hadjar hadir dan menyampaikan pokok pikiran pads Forum Konsultasi Publik yang digelar Bappeda, pekan lalu di Luwuk.BACA JUGA:Kesehatan Balita dan Lansia di Boyou, Puskesmas Biak Gelar Posyandu GabunganPolitisi Partai NasDem itu menyampaikan sejumlah pokok pikiran terkait penyusunan awal Rencana Kerja Pemerintah Daerah (RKPD) Kabupaten Banggai tahun 2025.BACA JUGA:27.364 KPM di Banggai Mulai Terima Bantuan BerasSejumlah poin penting terkait program pembangunan yang lebih menyentuh kepentingan rakyat, disampaikan wakil ketua DPRD Banggai tersebut. Ia juga berharap, dalam menyusun rencana kerja tahun 2025 mendatang, pemerintah daerah lebih memperhatikan kebutuhan rakyat, utamanya pada sektor pertanian, perkebunan, kelautan dan perikanan serta UMKM.**BACA JUGA:Kapolres Tinjau Langsung Logistik Pemilu di Gudang KPU Banggai
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Deputy Chairperson of the Banggai Batia DPRD Sisilia Hadjar was present and conveyed the main ideas at the Public Consultation Forum held by Bappeda, last week in Luwuk. regarding the initial preparation of the Regional Government Work Plan (RKPD) for Banggai Regency for 2025. READ ALSO: 27,364 KPM in Banggai Begin to Receive Rice Assistance. A number of important points related to development programs that touch more on the interests of the people, were conveyed by the deputy chairman of the Banggai DPRD. He also hopes that, in preparing the work plan for 2025, the regional government will pay more attention to the needs of the people, especially in the agricultural, plantation, marine and fisheries sectors as well as MSMEs.** ALSO READ: Police Chief Directly Observes Election Logistics at Banggai KPU Warehouse

title: Caleg Perindo Banggai Janjikan Program Andalan Bila Terpilih
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Calon anggota DPRD Banggai Dapil 4 dari Partai Perindo, Marjuki, menjanjikan sejumlah program andalan bila terpilih kelak.Kepada media ini, Senin (29/1/2024), Marjuki yang mencalonkan diri di Dapil Banggai 4 yang terdiri dari Kecamatan Kintom, Batui, Batui Selatan, Moilong, Toili, Toli Barat dan Toili Jaya mengatakan, sebagai orang yang selama ini membangun usaha toko kacamata, maka program yang ia tawarkan adalah penyedia kacamata gratis bagi warga.BACA JUGA:Kapolres Tinjau Langsung Logistik Pemilu di Gudang KPU BanggaiSelain itu, Marjuki yang biasa disapa Bayu, juga akan memprogramkan rumah singgah bagi keluarga pasien di RSUD Luwuk, lengkap dengan penyediaan makan dan minumnya.BACA JUGA:Polisi Limpahkan Kasus Penusukan Pakai Sendok Makan di LuwukProgram lainnya adalah santunan sakit sebesar Rp500 ribu dan santunan duka sebesar Rp1 juta.Semua program yang ia rencanakan itu kata pemilik Toko Bayu Optik Paris ini, bisa dinikmati oleh warga yang memegang kartu program Marjuki peduli umat. Karenanya, ia mengajak warga agar bersama berjuang untuk perbaikan sektor kesehatan di Kabupaten Banggai. DARBACA JUGA:27.364 KPM di Banggai Mulai Terima Bantuan Beras
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Prospective member of the Banggai DPRD for Dapil 4 from the Perindo Party, Marjuki, has promised a number of mainstay programs if elected in the future. To this media, Monday (29/1/2024), Marjuki is running for Dapil Banggai 4 which consists of Kintom District, Batui, Batui Selatan, Moilong, Toili, Toli Barat and Toili Jaya said, as someone who has been building a glasses shop business, the program he offers is providing free glasses for residents. ALSO READ: Police Chief Directly Inspects Election Logistics at the Banggai KPU Warehouse. Meanwhile, Marjuki, who is usually called Bayu, will also program a shelter for the families of patients at the Luwuk District Hospital, complete with provision of food and drink. ALSO READ: Police Distribute Stabbing Cases Using Spoons in Luwuk. Other programs are sickness compensation of IDR 500 thousand and bereavement compensation of IDR 500 thousand. IDR 1 million. According to the owner of the Bayu Optik Paris Shop, all the programs he plans can be enjoyed by residents who hold the Marjuki care for people program card. Therefore, he invited residents to work together to improve the health sector in Banggai Regency. READ ALSO: 27,364 KPM in Banggai Start Receiving Rice Assistance

title: Selain Pppk, Bkpsdm Banggai Usulkan Kebutuhan Cpns 2024
text: Terasbanggai.com – BKPSDM kabupaten Banggai mengusulkan kebutuhan PPPK dan seleksi CPNS tahun 2024. Usulan tersebut sesuai instruksi Kemen PANRB pada seluruh pemerintah daerah. Kemen PANRB meminta pemda segera menyelesaikan tahapan pengusulan pegawai non ASN dan CPNS paling lambat 31 Januari 2024 mendatang. “Kita sedang usulkan Insha Allah data usulan sesuai waktu yang ditentukan,” ungkap Kepala BKPSDM kabupaten Banggai Soffian Datu Adam, Senin (29/1/2024). Soffian menerangkan, dalam pengusulan formasi tersebut fokus Pemda Banggai lebih pada tenaga guru, tenaga kesehatan dan tenaga teknis. “Saat ini tenaga teknis ini banyak kebutuhannya, ini juga yang kami akan usulkan,” jelasnya. Soffian menandaskan, usulan CPNS dan PPPK ini menjadi sebuah keharusan seiring dengan banyaknya ASN yang memasuki usia pensiun. “Kita tetap usulkan karena setiap tahunnya ada sekira 200 sampai 250 ASN yang pensiun sehingga usulan kebutuhan itu menjadi keharusan,” tuturnya. Terkait dengan usulan PPPK, Soffian mengungkapkan masih akan menunggu keputusan Kemen PANRB tentang penetapan kebutuhan PPPK di daerah ini. “Ada sekira 1000 lebih yang kita usulkan namun keputusan ada di Kemen PANRB,” tuturnya. text_en: Terasbanggai.com – BKPSDM Banggai district proposes the need for PPPK and CPNS selection in 2024. This proposal is in accordance with the instructions of the Ministry of PANRB to all regional governments. The Ministry of PANRB asked regional governments to immediately complete the stages of nominating non-ASN and CPNS employees no later than January 31 2024. "We are proposing Insha Allah the proposed data according to the specified time," said Head of BKPSDM Banggai district Soffian Datu Adam, Monday (29/1/2024). Soffian explained that in proposing this formation the Banggai Regional Government's focus was more on teachers, health workers and technical personnel. "Currently there is a great need for technical personnel, this is also what we will propose," he explained. Soffian emphasized that the CPNS and PPPK proposals are a necessity as many ASNs are entering retirement age. "We are still proposing it because every year there are approximately 200 to 250 ASN who retire, so this proposal is a necessity," he said. Regarding the PPPK proposal, Soffian said he would still wait for the PANRB Ministry's decision regarding determining the need for PPPK in this area. "There are approximately 1,000 more that we are proposing, but the decision rests with the PANRB Ministry," he said. title: Polres Banggai Bagikan Nasi Kotak Di Pelabuhan
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Polres Banggai menggelar program Jumat Berkah dengan membagikan nasi kotak kepada tukang ojek dan buruh di Pelabuhan Pelni Luwuk, Jumat (26/1/2024). Di sela kegiatan itu, Kabag Ops Polres Banggai, Kompol Esti Presetyo mengatakan kegiatan berbagi makanan tersebut merupakan bentuk kepedulian Polri kepada masyarakat, khususnya para tukang ojek dan buruh pelabuhan. “Kegiatan aksi berbagi ini sering juga disebut Jumat Berkah, berkah bagi orang yang membutuhkan, untuk meringankan beban masyarakat yang sangat membutuhkan,” kata Esti. Pada kesempatan itu, ia juga menyampaikan imbauan, mengajak masyarakat untuk menciptakan situasi kamtibmas yang aman dan damai jelang Pemilu 2024. “Alhamdulilah, kegiatan ini berjalan lancar, semoga berkah dan bisa dilaksanakan secara terus menerus, serta Insyaallah setiap hari Jumat kita bagikan ke masyarakat yang membutuhkan,” tandasnya. */PAR Di sela kegiatan itu, Kabag Ops Polres Banggai, Kompol Esti Presetyo mengatakan kegiatan berbagi makanan tersebut merupakan bentuk kepedulian Polri kepada masyarakat, khususnya para tukang ojek dan buruh pelabuhan. “Kegiatan aksi berbagi ini sering juga disebut Jumat Berkah, berkah bagi orang yang membutuhkan, untuk meringankan beban masyarakat yang sangat membutuhkan,” kata Esti. text_en: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Banggai Police held a Blessing Friday program by distributing boxes of rice to motorcycle taxi drivers and workers at Pelni Luwuk Harbor, Friday (26/1/2024). On the sidelines of this activity, the Head of Operations for the Banggai Police, Commissioner Esti Presetyo, said that the food sharing activity was a form of Polri's concern for the community, especially motorbike taxi drivers and port workers. "This sharing activity is often called Friday Blessing, a blessing for people in need, to lighten the burden on people who really need it," said Esti. On that occasion, he also made an appeal, inviting the community to create a safe and peaceful social security and security situation ahead of the 2024 elections. "Thank God, this activity went smoothly, hopefully it will be a blessing and can be carried out continuously, and God willing, every Friday we will share it with the people who need," he said. */PAR On the sidelines of the activity, the Head of Ops for the Banggai Police, Commissioner Esti Presetyo, said that the food sharing activity was a form of Polri's concern for the community, especially motorbike taxi drivers and port workers. title: Polres Banggai Gelar Jumat Curhat Bersama Wartawan
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Polres Banggai mengelar kegiatan Jumat Curhat bersama sejumlah wartawan, di Warung Kopi (Warkop) Bakoel Lapangan Menembak Kilometer 5 Kelurahan Tanjung Tuwis, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, Jumat (26/1/2024). Tampak hadir dalam kegiatan itu, Kabag Ops Polres Banggai, Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi, didampingi Kasat Lantas, AKP I Made bagus Aditya, Kasat Intelkam, AKP Usman, Kasat Narkoba, Iptu I Gede Wira Hendana, bersama Kasi Humas, Iptu Al Amin, serta Ketua dan Anggota Persatuan Wartawan Indonesia (PWI) Kabupaten Banggai. Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi menjelaskan, kegiatan itu bertujuan untuk menciptakan ruang dialog terbuka, berbagi informasi dan pendapat mengenai isu-isu terkini yang berkaitan dengan keamanan, antara pihak kepolisian dan wartawan yang ada di Kabupaten Banggai. Pada kesempatan itu, sejumlah isu menjadi topik pembahasan bersama, di antaranya terkait pengamanan Pemilu. Kompol Esti mengungkapkan, secara umum Polri menyiapkan strategi 3 pola, yakni kurang rawan, rawan dan sangat rawan. Untuk pengamanan Tempat Pemungutan Suara (TPS) dengan kategori sangat rawan, Polres Banggai menyiapkan 2 personel dan 2 Linmas untuk setiap TPS. “Kami menyiapakan sebanyak 421 personel Polres Banggai, dan 82 BKO Polda Sulteng, untuk menyukseskan Pemilu 2024 agar aman dan kondusif,” ujar Esti. Sedangkan terkait persoalan narkoba, Kasat Narkoba Polres Banggai, Iptu I Gede Wira Hendana mengatakan pihaknya berkomitmen dalam memberantas peredaran narkotika di Kabupaten Banggai, harus betul-betul tuntas. Tampak hadir dalam kegiatan itu, Kabag Ops Polres Banggai, Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi, didampingi Kasat Lantas, AKP I Made bagus Aditya, Kasat Intelkam, AKP Usman, Kasat Narkoba, Iptu I Gede Wira Hendana, bersama Kasi Humas, Iptu Al Amin, serta Ketua dan Anggota Persatuan Wartawan Indonesia (PWI) Kabupaten Banggai. Kompol Esti Prasetyo Hadi menjelaskan, kegiatan itu bertujuan untuk menciptakan ruang dialog terbuka, berbagi informasi dan pendapat mengenai isu-isu terkini yang berkaitan dengan keamanan, antara pihak kepolisian dan wartawan yang ada di Kabupaten Banggai. Pada kesempatan itu, sejumlah isu menjadi topik pembahasan bersama, di antaranya terkait pengamanan Pemilu. Kompol Esti mengungkapkan, secara umum Polri menyiapkan strategi 3 pola, yakni kurang rawan, rawan dan sangat rawan. text_en: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Banggai Police held a Friday Confide activity with a number of journalists, at the Bakoel Coffee Shop (Warkop) Kilometer 5 Shooting Field, Tanjung Tuwis Village, South Luwuk District, Friday (26/1/2024). Also present at the activity were the Head of Ops for the Banggai Police, Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi, accompanied by Head of Traffic, AKP I Made Bagus Aditya, Head of Intelligence and Security, AKP Usman, Head of Narcotics, Inspector I Gede Wira Hendana, together with Head of Public Relations, Inspector Al Amin, and Chairman and Member of the Indonesian Journalists Association (PWI) Banggai Regency. Police Commissioner Esti Prasetyo Hadi explained that this activity aims to create a space for open dialogue, sharing information and opinions regarding current issues related to security, between the police and journalists in Banggai Regency. On that occasion, a number of issues became topics of joint discussion, including those related to election security. Police Commissioner Esti revealed that in general the National Police prepared a strategy of 3 patterns, namely less vulnerable, vulnerable and very vulnerable. To secure Voting Places (TPS) in the very vulnerable category, the Banggai Police has prepared 2 personnel and 2 Linmas for each TPS. "We are preparing 421 Banggai Police personnel, and 82 Central Sulawesi Regional Police BKOs, to make the 2024 Election a success so that it is safe and conducive," said Esti. Meanwhile, regarding the drug issue, Banggai Police Narcotics Head, Iptu I Gede Wira Hendana, said that his party is committed to eradicating narcotics trafficking in Banggai Regency, it must be truly complete. title: Detik-detik Penyelamatan Nelayan Banggai Sulteng di Perairan Maluku
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - Nelayan asal DesaLongkogaTimur , Kecamatan Bualemo, KabupatenBanggai , Usman Supu (62), yang sempat dilaporkan hilang saat melaut ditemukan selamat. Kapolsek Bualemo Iptu Rudi Dg Sumbung menyebutkan, Usman Supu pada Rabu, 24 Januari 2024, sekira pukul 07.30 Wita, pergi melaut di sekitar perairan desa setempat. “Namun hingga Jumat 26 Januari 2024, korban belum juga kembali ke rumah,” ungkapnya, Minggu (28/1/2024). Usai menerima laporan, aparat Polsek Bualemo bersama Basarnas dan warga berupaya melakukan pencarian tetapi tidak membuahkan hasil. “Saat itu pihak keluarga memohon bantuan pemerintah kecamatan dalam hal ini Basarnas serta TNI/Polri untuk bersama-sama Kembali mencari korban,” tuturnya. Lebih lanjut, perwira pangkat dua balak ini menyebutkan, pada Sabtu (27/1) sekitar pukul 13.00 Wita, korban berhasil ditemukan kapal ikan asal Bitung, Sulawesi Utara, di perairan Maluku dalam keadaan selamat. “Korban ditemukan dalam kondisi lemas. Korban langsung dievakuasi ke atas kapal, lalu diantar ke DesaLongkogaTimur , Bualemo,” sebut Rudi. Setibanya di darat pada Minggu (28/1) sekitar pukul 07.30 Wita, tambah Kapolsek, warga langsung membawa korban ke rumahnya.(*)
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - Fishermen from LongkogaTimur Village, Bualemo District, Banggai Regency, Usman Supu (62), who was reported missing while at sea was found safe. Bualemo Police Chief Iptu Rudi Dg Sumbung said that on Wednesday, January 24 2024, Usman Supu, at around 07.30 WITA, went fishing in the local village waters. "However, until Friday 26 January 2024, the victim had not yet returned home," he said, Sunday (28/1/2024). After receiving the report, Bualemo Police officers together with Basarnas and residents attempted a search but to no avail. "At that time, the family asked for help from the sub-district government, in this case Basarnas and the TNI/Polri, to work together to look for the victim again," he said. Furthermore, this Balak second rank officer said that on Saturday (27/1) at around 13.00 WITA, the victim was found by a fishing boat from Bitung, North Sulawesi, in Maluku waters in a safe condition. “The victim was found in a limp condition. "The victims were immediately evacuated onto the ship, then taken to East Longkoga Village, Bualemo," said Rudi. Upon arrival on land on Sunday (28/1) at around 07.30 WITA, added the Police Chief, residents immediately took the victim to his house.(*)

title: Pemkab Banggai Salurkan Bantuan Beras, Sasar 27.364 Penerima Manfaat
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI -Wakil Bupati Wabup Banggai, Furqanuddin Masulili, secara simbolis melepas penyaluran cadangan beras pemerintah, di Kantor Bupati Banggai, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, Senin (29/1/2024). Kepala Dinas Ketahanan Pangan Banggai, Alfian Djibran, mengatakan bantuan cadangan beras ini berasal dari Cadangan Pangan Pemerintah. "Alhamdulillah Kabupaten Banggai termasuk salah satu kabupaten yang paling cepat menyalurkan bantuan ini," kata Alfian. Dijelaskan, Bulog bersama pemerintah daerah akan menyalurkan kepada 27.364 Keluarga Penerima Manfaat atau KPM di 24 kecamatan di Kabupaten Banggai. Jumlah beras yang disalurkan sebanyak 60 kilogram selama 6 bulan per KPM. Sementara itu, WakilBupatiBanggai , Furqanuddin Masulili, menyampaikan bahwa masalah pangan merupakan masalah yang sangat mendasar dalam kehidupan masyarakat. "Yang paling utama di sini adalah bagaimana penyaluran ini betul-betul sesuai dengan data yang sudah kita tetapkan agar menyasar kepada KPM," tegasnya. Inisiatif ini bertujuan untuk mengurangi pengeluaran bagi penerima bantuan pangan, serta memastikan keberlangsungan akses pangan bagi masyarakat yang membutuhkan. "Hal ini dilaksanakan tentu dengan tujuan mengatasi inflasi. Ini sangat luar biasa, 6 bulan ke depan mudah-mudahan lonjakan harga pangan kita teratasi," harap Furqanuddin. Program ini bukan hanya merupakan bentuk tanggung jawab pemerintah terhadap kesejahteraan masyarakat, tetapi juga sebagai langkah strategis dalam membangun ketahanan pangan yang berkelanjutan di Kabupaten Banggai. (*)
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI -Deputy Regent of Banggai Deputy Regent, Furqanuddin Masulili, symbolically released the distribution of government rice reserves, at the Banggai Regent's Office, South Luwuk District, Monday (29/1/2024). Head of the Banggai Food Security Service, Alfian Djibran, said that the rice reserve assistance came from the Government Food Reserve. "Thank God, Banggai Regency is one of the districts that distributed this aid the fastest," said Alfian. It was explained that Bulog together with the regional government would distribute it to 27,364 Beneficiary Families or KPM in 24 sub-districts in Banggai Regency. The amount of rice distributed is 60 kilograms for 6 months per KPM. Meanwhile, Deputy Regent of Banggai, Furqanuddin Masulili, said that the food problem is a very basic problem in people's lives. "The most important thing here is how this distribution is truly in accordance with the data that we have determined to target KPM," he stressed. This initiative aims to reduce expenses for food aid recipients, as well as ensure continued access to food for people in need. "This is of course carried out with the aim of overcoming inflation. This is extraordinary, in the next 6 months hopefully our food price spike will be resolved," hoped Furqanuddin. This program is not only a form of government responsibility for community welfare, but also a strategic step in building sustainable food security in Banggai Regency. (*)

title: Tim SAR Gabungan Evakuasi Korban Longboat Patah As di Perairan Banggai Laut
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI -Sebuah kapal jenis longboat mengalami patah as baling-baling di perairan Pulau Bandang, KabupatenBanggai Laut, Sulawesi Tengah pada Minggu (28/1/2024). Kapal tersebut berangkat dari Desa Toropot, Kecamatan Bokan Kepulauan menuju Kota Banggai, KabupatenBanggai Laut dengan penumpang 2 orang. Kedua korban bernama La Sari (40) dan Aldi (29) asal Desa Tinakin Laut, Kecamatan Banggai, KabupatenBanggai Laut. Usai informasinya diterima, personil Unit Siaga SAR Banggai Laut langsung bergerak cepat ke lokasi kejadian dengan menggunakan Rigid Bouyance Boat (RBB) l. Setelah menempuh perjalanan laut beberapa jam, tim SAR gabungan berhasil menemukan longboat tersebut pada jarak 2 NM dari lokasi kejadian. Kedua korban selanjutnya dievakuasi ke atas RBB dan diantar ke pelabuhan Banggai Laut. "Kedua korban dievakuasi dalam keadaan selamat, dan saat ini korban sudah kembali ke rumah masing-masing," ungkap Andrias Hendrik Johannes, Kepala Kantor Pencarian dan Pertolongan Palu, Senin (29/1/2024). Adapun unsur gabungan terdiri dari personil Unit Siaga SAR Basarnas, BPBD, Polair Banggai Laut, dan masyarakat setempat. (*)
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - A longboat type ship experienced a broken propeller axle in the waters of Bandang Island, Banggai Laut Regency, Central Sulawesi on Sunday (28/1/2024). The ship departed from Toropot Village, Bokan Islands District to Banggai City, Banggai Laut Regency with 2 passengers on board. The two victims were named La Sari (40) and Aldi (29) from Tinakin Laut Village, Banggai District, Banggai Laut Regency. After the information was received, Banggai Laut SAR Alert Unit personnel immediately moved quickly to the location of the incident using a Rigid Bouyance Boat (RBB) l. After traveling several hours by sea, the joint SAR team managed to find the longboat at a distance of 2 NM from the location of the incident. The two victims were then evacuated aboard the RBB and taken to Banggai Laut port. "The two victims were evacuated safely, and currently the victims have returned to their homes," said Andrias Hendrik Johannes, Head of the Palu Search and Rescue Office, Monday (29/1/2024). The joint element consists of personnel from the Basarnas SAR Alert Unit, BPBD, Banggai Laut Water Police, and the local community. (*)

title: Kapolres Tinjau Langsung Logistik Pemilu di Gudang KPU Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Kapolres Banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM mengatakan penjagaan gudang logistik merupakan bagian dari pengamanan yang harus dilakukan oleh Polri dalam tahapan Pemilu 2024.Hal itu disampaikan oleh Kapolres Banggai ketika melakukan pengecekan logistik Pemilu 2024 di gudang KPUD Banggai di Kompleks Bukit Halimun Kelurahan Maahas, Luwuk Selatan, Senin (29/1/2024) pagi.BACA JUGA:Polisi Limpahkan Kasus Penusukan Pakai Sendok Makan di LuwukPengecekan menjelang H-14 voting day dan proses pengesetan kotak suara ini dilakukan Kapolres Banggai didampingi Kasat Binmas AKP Deky Wahyudi, SH, MH.“Polres Banggai siap memberi jaminan keamanan melalui kegiatan pengamanan objek vital. Salah satunya adalah pengamanan gudang logistik dan kantor KPU berikut seluruh inventaris logistik Pemilu, agar pendistribusian logistik tidak mengalami keterlambatan seperti sebelumnya,” kata Kapolres Banggai.BACA JUGA:Maju Caleg DPRD Banggai, Ini Komitmen Silvia Lakoro Pengusaha Percetakan Kay ArtDalam kesempatan tersebut Kapolres bertemu dengan Sekertaris KPUD Banggai Ibu Nirwana.Kapolres berpesan kepada Sekertaris KPUD Banggai jika ada suatu hal yang perlu dikoordinasikan dipersilahkan hubungi petugas kepolisian yang ada, agar selalu terjalin sinergi selama berjalannya tahapan hingga pelaksanaan Pemilu 2024.BACA JUGA:Kesehatan Balita dan Lansia di Boyou, Puskesmas Biak Gelar Posyandu GabunganKepada petugas baik dari Kepolisian, TNI maupun petugas pengamanan internal KPUD, diminta selalu siap siaga dan jangan lengah dalam pengamanan.“Laksanakan tugas dengan baik, cermat dan profesional. Jangan lengah, lakukan dengan penuh tanggung jawab,” pesan AKBP Ade. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM said that guarding the logistics warehouse is part of the security that must be carried out by the National Police during the 2024 Election stages. This was conveyed by the Banggai Police Chief when checking the 2024 Election logistics at the Banggai KPUD warehouse in the Complex Bukit Halimun, Maahas Village, South Luwuk, Monday (29/1/2024) morning. ALSO READ: Police Handle Case of Stabbing Using a Spoon in Luwuk Checks ahead of D-14 voting day and the process of setting up ballot boxes was carried out by the Banggai Police Chief accompanied by the Head of Binmas Unit AKP Deky Wahyudi, SH, MH. "The Banggai Police are ready to provide security guarantees through activities to secure vital objects. "One of them is securing the logistics warehouse and KPU office along with all election logistics inventory, so that logistics distribution does not experience delays like before," said the Banggai Police Chief. Banggai KPUD Secretary Mrs. Nirwana. The Police Chief advised the Banggai KPUD Secretary, if there is something that needs to be coordinated, please contact the existing police officers, so that there will always be synergy during the stages leading up to the implementation of the 2024 Election. READ ALSO: Health of Toddlers and the Elderly at Boyou, Biak Community Health Center Holding Joint Posyandu: Officers from the Police, TNI and KPUD internal security officers are asked to always be ready and not be careless in security. "Carry out your duties well, carefully and professionally. "Don't be careless, do it responsibly," advised AKBP Ade. (*)

title: Pemda Banggai Dan Bulog Salurkan Cadangan Beras Pada 27.364 Kpm
text: Terasbanggai.com -Pemda Banggai bersama Bulog Divre Luwuk menyalurkan cadangan beras kepada 27.364 KPM (keluarga penerima manfaat). Wakil Bupati Banggai Furqanuddin melepas secara simbolis melepas keberangkatan penyaluran cadangan beras bertempat di kantor Bupati Banggai, Senin (29/1/2024). Setiap KPM nantinya akan menerima 60 Kg selama enam bulan kedepan dan tersebar di 24 kecamatan. Wakil Bupati Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili mengatakan, ketersediaan pangan menjadi hal mendasar bagi masyarakat. “Oleh karenanya yang paling utama disini adalah bagaimana penyaluran ini betul-betul sesuai dengan data yang sudah kita tetapkan, agar penyaluran ini betul-betul menyasar kepada keluarga penerima manfaat,” tegas Wabup Furqanuddin. Inisiatif ini bertujuan untuk mengurangi pengeluaran bagi penerima bantuan pangan, serta memastikan keberlangsungan akses pangan bagi masyarakat yang membutuhkan. “Hal ini dilaksanakan tentu dengan tujuan mengatasi inflasi, ini sangat luar biasa, enam bulan kedepan muda-mudahan lonjakan harga pangan kita akan teratasi,” harap Wabup Furqanuddin. Program ini bukan hanya merupakan bentuk tanggung jawab pemerintah terhadap kesejahteraan masyarakat, tetapi juga sebagai langkah strategis dalam membangun ketahanan pangan yang berkelanjutan di Kabupaten Banggai. Kepala Dinas Ketapang, Drs. Alfian Djibran, MM., MH saat menyampaikan laporan mengatakan bahwa bantuan cadangan beras ini berasal dari Cadangan Pangan Pemerintah. “Dan alhamdulillah Kabupaten Banggai termasuk salah satu kabupaten yang paling cepat menyalurkan bantuan ini,” tutur Kepala Dinas Ketapang, Alfian Djibran. Wakil Bupati Banggai Furqanuddin melepas secara simbolis melepas keberangkatan penyaluran cadangan beras bertempat di kantor Bupati Banggai, Senin (29/1/2024). Setiap KPM nantinya akan menerima 60 Kg selama enam bulan kedepan dan tersebar di 24 kecamatan. Wakil Bupati Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili mengatakan, ketersediaan pangan menjadi hal mendasar bagi masyarakat. “Oleh karenanya yang paling utama disini adalah bagaimana penyaluran ini betul-betul sesuai dengan data yang sudah kita tetapkan, agar penyaluran ini betul-betul menyasar kepada keluarga penerima manfaat,” tegas Wabup Furqanuddin. Inisiatif ini bertujuan untuk mengurangi pengeluaran bagi penerima bantuan pangan, serta memastikan keberlangsungan akses pangan bagi masyarakat yang membutuhkan. “Hal ini dilaksanakan tentu dengan tujuan mengatasi inflasi, ini sangat luar biasa, enam bulan kedepan muda-mudahan lonjakan harga pangan kita akan teratasi,” harap Wabup Furqanuddin. Program ini bukan hanya merupakan bentuk tanggung jawab pemerintah terhadap kesejahteraan masyarakat, tetapi juga sebagai langkah strategis dalam membangun ketahanan pangan yang berkelanjutan di Kabupaten Banggai. Kepala Dinas Ketapang, Drs. Alfian Djibran, MM., MH saat menyampaikan laporan mengatakan bahwa bantuan cadangan beras ini berasal dari Cadangan Pangan Pemerintah. “Dan alhamdulillah Kabupaten Banggai termasuk salah satu kabupaten yang paling cepat menyalurkan bantuan ini,” tutur Kepala Dinas Ketapang, Alfian Djibran. Wakil Bupati Banggai Furqanuddin Masulili mengatakan, ketersediaan pangan menjadi hal mendasar bagi masyarakat. “Oleh karenanya yang paling utama disini adalah bagaimana penyaluran ini betul-betul sesuai dengan data yang sudah kita tetapkan, agar penyaluran ini betul-betul menyasar kepada keluarga penerima manfaat,” tegas Wabup Furqanuddin. text_en: Terasbanggai.com - Banggai Regional Government together with Bulog Divre Luwuk distributed rice reserves to 27,364 KPM (beneficiary families). Deputy Regent of Banggai Furqanuddin symbolically released the departure of the distribution of rice reserves at the Banggai Regent's office, Monday (29/1/2024). Each KPM will receive 60 kg over the next six months and spread across 24 sub-districts. Banggai Deputy Regent Furqanuddin Masulili said that food availability is fundamental for society. "Therefore, the most important thing here is how this distribution is truly in accordance with the data that we have determined, so that this distribution is truly targeted at the beneficiary families," stressed Deputy Regent Furqanuddin. This initiative aims to reduce expenses for food aid recipients, as well as ensure continued access to food for people in need. "This is of course carried out with the aim of overcoming inflation, this is extraordinary, in the next six months hopefully the spike in our food prices will be resolved," hoped Deputy Regent Furqanuddin. This program is not only a form of government responsibility for community welfare, but also a strategic step in building sustainable food security in Banggai Regency. Head of the Ketapang Service, Drs. Alfian Djibran, MM., MH, when submitting the report, said that the rice reserve assistance came from the Government's Food Reserves. "And thank God, Banggai Regency is one of the districts that distributed this aid the fastest," said the Head of the Ketapang Service, Alfian Djibran. title: Pemkab Banggai, Haki Usaha Kerajinan Dianggarkan Di Apbd
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Bupati Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka menyampaikan Pemerintah Kabupaten (Pemkab) banggai melalui Badan Riset dan Inovas Daerah (BRIDA) telah memasukkan anggaran untuk perlindungan Hak Kekayaan Intelektual (HAKI) bagi pelaku usaha kerajinan, ke dalam APBD. Hal itu disampaikan Amirudin, saat menghadiri pembinaan dan penguatan kapasitas pelaku usaha dan pengurus Dewan Kerajinan Nasional (Dekranasda) Kabupaten Banggai, di salah satu hotel di Luwuk, Sabtu (27/1/2024). “Jadi bagi teman-teman yang akan memasukan hasil temuannya ke HAKI itu gratis,” kata Amirudin. Pada kegiatan tersebut, Amirudin turut melakukan dialog bersama beberapa peserta, mengenai dukungan serta bantuan yang akan diberikan dalam mendukung sektor kriya atau kerajinan. “Ada bantuan Rp5 milyar per kecamatan, itu boleh digunakan untuk kerajinan, karena tujuan kita supaya menghidupkan semua pelaku usaha yang ada di daerah,” terangnya. Ia juga menjelaskan, terdapat Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) dari perusahaan yang terbuka bagi proposal dari pelaku usaha, untuk memberikan kesempatan lebih luas dalam menciptakan sinergi antara sektor swasta dan pelaku usaha lokal. Sementara Ketua Dekranasda Banggai, Hj. Syamsuarni Amirudin mengatakan kegiatan pembinaan dan penguatan kapasitas pelaku usaha merupakan langkah awal, dalam rangka mengembangkan potensi kriya dan kerajinan di Kabupaten Banggai. “Ada beberapa pemateri, mudah-mudahan ini sebagai bagian kita semua untuk menjadi pelajaran ke depan, sebagai bahan masukan untuk para pelaku usaha yang ada di daerah ini bisa jauh lebih berkembang,” kata Syamsuarni. Kegiatan itu melibatkan peserta sebanyak 60 orang dari 17 kecamatan. Adapun jenis pelaku usaha yang terlibat dalam kegiatan itu yakni Usaha batik Saluan, Anyaman Rotan, Anyaman Lidi, Pandai Besi, Daur, Kerajinan Kayu, dan Kerajinan Bambu. */PAR Hal itu disampaikan Amirudin, saat menghadiri pembinaan dan penguatan kapasitas pelaku usaha dan pengurus Dewan Kerajinan Nasional (Dekranasda) Kabupaten Banggai, di salah satu hotel di Luwuk, Sabtu (27/1/2024). “Jadi bagi teman-teman yang akan memasukan hasil temuannya ke HAKI itu gratis,” kata Amirudin. text_en: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – The Regent of Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka, said that the Regency Government (Pemkab) is proud, through the Regional Research and Innovation Agency (BRIDA), to have included a budget for the protection of Intellectual Property Rights (HAKI) for craft business actors, into the APBD. This was conveyed by Amirudin, while attending coaching and strengthening the capacity of business actors and administrators of the Banggai Regency National Crafts Council (Dekranasda), at a hotel in Luwuk, Saturday (27/1/2024). "So for friends who want to enter their findings into IPR, it's free," said Amirudin. During this activity, Amirudin also held a dialogue with several participants regarding the support and assistance that would be provided to support the craft sector. "There is assistance of Rp. 5 billion per sub-district, which can be used for crafts, because our goal is to revive all business actors in the area," he explained. He also explained that there is Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) from companies which is open to proposals from business actors, to provide wider opportunities to create synergies between the private sector and local business actors. Meanwhile, the Chairman of Dekranasda Banggai, Hj. Syamsuarni Amirudin said that coaching activities and strengthening the capacity of business actors was the first step in developing the potential of crafts and crafts in Banggai Regency. "There are several presenters, hopefully this will serve as a lesson for all of us in the future, as input for business actors in this area to develop further," said Syamsuarni. This activity involved 60 participants from 17 sub-districts. The types of business actors involved in this activity are Saluan batik, rattan weaving, stick weaving, blacksmithing, recycling, wood crafts and bamboo crafts. */PAR This was conveyed by Amirudin, while attending coaching and strengthening the capacity of business actors and administrators of the Banggai Regency National Crafts Council (Dekranasda), at a hotel in Luwuk, Saturday (27/1/2024). "So for friends who want to enter their findings into IPR, it's free," said Amirudin. During this activity, Amirudin also held a dialogue with several participants regarding the support and assistance that would be provided to support the craft sector. "There is assistance of Rp. 5 billion per sub-district, which can be used for crafts, because our goal is to revive all business actors in the area," he explained. He also explained that there is Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) from companies which is open to proposals from business actors, to provide wider opportunities to create synergies between the private sector and local business actors. Meanwhile, the Chairman of Dekranasda Banggai, Hj. Syamsuarni Amirudin said that coaching activities and strengthening the capacity of business actors was the first step in developing the potential of crafts and crafts in Banggai Regency. "There are several presenters, hopefully this will serve as a lesson for all of us in the future, as input for business actors in this area to develop further," said Syamsuarni. title: Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai Laut Terima Tahap II Pelimpahan Perkara Korupsi Dana Desa
text: “Kejaksaan Negeri Balut Segera Dakwakan Mantan Bendahara Desa Lumbi-LumbiyaKABAR LUWUK –Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai LautTerimaTahap II Pelimpahan Perkara Korupsi Dana Desa. Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai Laut,Sulawesi Tengah,telah menerima tahap II pelimpahan perkara tindak pidana korupsi terkait dana desa Lumbi-LumbiyaKecamatan Buko Selatan.Penyerahan ini dilakukan olehpenyidik Tipikor Polres Bangkep, dan melibatkan tersangka WK, mantan Bendahara desa Lumbi-Lumbiya tahun 2022.Sabtu , 20 Januari 2024.Menurut Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai Laut, Reinhard Tololiu, SH, MH, “Kami telah menerima pelimpahan tahap II pada hari Rabu, 3 Januari 2024, dan saat ini sedang mempersiapkan dakwaannya. Perkara ini segera akan kami limpahkan ke Pengadilan Negeri Tipikor di Palu.”Tersangka WK diduga kuat telah menyalahgunakan dana desa sebesar Rp.256.418.540 juta. Ancaman hukuman yang dihadapi tersangka sesuai dengan pasal-pasal dalam Undang-Undang Republik Indonesia No. 20 tahun 2021 tentang Pemberantasan Tindak Pidana Korupsi, yaitu pasal 2 Ayat 1 dan pasal 3, pasal 8 UU RI No. 31 tahun 1999 yang telah diubah menjadi UU RI No. 20 tahun 2021 tentang tindak pidana korupsi.Kasat Reskrim Polres Bangkep, Iptu Ida Bagus Harta Grahing Wahyu SH.M.Si, juga mengonfirmasi bahwa perkara ini telah memasuki tahap kedua.“Kami telah menyerahkan semua dokumen dan barang bukti pada Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai Laut pada Rabu, 3 Januari 2024,” ujarnya.Ancaman hukuman bagi tersangka WK, sesuai dengan pasal 2 Ayat 1 UU Pemberantasan Tindak Pidana Korupsi, adalah minimal 4 tahun penjara dan maksimal seumur hidup.Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai Laut dan Polres Bangkep bersama-sama berkomitmen untuk mengungkap dan menindak tegas korupsi demi terwujudnya pemerintahan yang bersih dan transparan di wilayah tersebut.Dana desa yang seharusnya menjadi sumber pembangunan dan kesejahteraan masyarakat, disinyalir telah dimanfaatkan oleh tersangka untuk kepentingan pribadi. Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai Laut, Reinhard Tololiu, juga menekankan pentingnya menindaklanjuti perkara ini dengan cepat dan adil.“Kami akan bekerja keras untuk segera melimpahkan perkara ini ke pengadilan dan memastikan bahwa proses hukum berjalan dengan transparan serta adil. Korupsi adalah musuh bersama yang harus dihadapi bersama-sama,” ucap Reinhard Tololiu.Perkembangan ini menciptakan harapan bagi masyarakat setempat yang telah lama menantikan keadilan terkait dana desa yang seharusnya digunakan untuk pembangunan infrastruktur, pendidikan, dan kesejahteraan masyarakat. Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai Laut berharap bahwa kasus ini akan menjadi contoh bagi para pejabat desa dan aparatur yang memiliki tanggung jawab terhadap dana publik.Sementara itu, pihak Kepolisian Resort Bangkep dan Kejaksaan Negeri Balut terus bekerja sama dalam mengungkap kasus-kasus korupsi lainnya. Kepolisian mengapresiasi peran masyarakat yang aktif melaporkan dugaan tindak pidana korupsi, sebagai bentuk partisipasi dalam menciptakan lingkungan yang bersih dari praktik-praktik merugikan keuangan negara.Dalam upaya pemberantasan korupsi, kolaborasi antara lembaga penegak hukum, pemerintah, dan masyarakat sangat diperlukan. Kejaksaan Negeri Banggai Laut dan Polres Bangkep berharap, dengan penanganan serius terhadap kasus ini, akan memberikan efek jera dan mencegah kemungkinan terjadinya korupsi di masa mendatang. Proses hukum selanjutnya akan memberikan kepastian hukum dan menjunjung tinggi nilai keadilan bagi seluruh pihak yang terlibat dalam perkara ini.( RSM) **
text_en: "The Balut District Prosecutor's Office will immediately indict the former Lumbi-Lumbiya Village Treasurer LUWUK NEWS - Banggai Laut District Prosecutor's Office Accepts Phase II Delegation of Village Fund Corruption Case. The Banggai Laut District Prosecutor's Office, Central Sulawesi, has received the second phase of the transfer of a corruption case related to Lumbi-Lumbiya village funds, Buko Selatan District. This handover was carried out by the Bangkep Police Corruption Corruption investigator, and involved the suspect WK, the former Lumbi-Lumbiya village treasurer in 2022. Saturday, January 20 2024. According to the Head of the Banggai Laut District Prosecutor's Office, Reinhard Tololiu, SH, MH, "We received the second phase of the delegation on Wednesday, January 3 2024, and are currently preparing the indictment. We will immediately transfer this case to the Corruption Court in Palu." The suspect WK is strongly suspected of misusing village funds amounting to IDR 256,418,540 million. The threat of punishment faced by the suspect is in accordance with the articles in the Law of the Republic of Indonesia no. 20 of 2021 concerning the Eradication of Corruption Crimes, namely article 2 Paragraph 1 and article 3, article 8 of Republic of Indonesia Law no. 31 of 1999 which has been amended into Republic of Indonesia Law no. 20 of 2021 concerning criminal acts of corruption. Head of the Criminal Investigation Unit of the Bangkep Police, Iptu Ida Bagus Harta Grahing Wahyu SH.M.Si, also confirmed that this case has entered the second stage. "We have submitted all documents and evidence to the Banggai Laut District Prosecutor's Office on Wednesday, January 3 2024," he said. The threat of punishment for suspect WK, in accordance with Article 2 Paragraph 1 of the Corruption Eradication Law, is a minimum of 4 years in prison and a maximum of life. The Banggai Laut District Prosecutor's Office and the Bangkep Police are jointly committed to uncovering and take firm action against corruption in order to create a clean and transparent government in the region. Village funds, which should be a source of development and community welfare, have allegedly been used by the suspect for personal interests. The Head of the Banggai Laut District Prosecutor's Office, Reinhard Tololiu, also emphasized the importance of following up this case quickly and fairly. "We will work hard to immediately transfer this case to court and ensure that the legal process runs transparently and fairly. "Corruption is a common enemy that must be faced together," said Reinhard Tololiu. This development creates hope for the local community who have long been waiting for justice regarding village funds which should be used for infrastructure development, education and community welfare. The Banggai Laut District Prosecutor's Office hopes that this case will be an example for village officials and apparatus who have responsibility for public funds. Meanwhile, the Bangkep Resort Police and the Balut District Prosecutor's Office continue to work together in uncovering other corruption cases. The police appreciate the role of the public in actively reporting suspected criminal acts of corruption, as a form of participation in creating an environment that is free from practices detrimental to state finances. In efforts to eradicate corruption, collaboration between law enforcement agencies, the government and the community is very necessary. The Banggai Laut District Prosecutor's Office and Bangkep Police hope that serious handling of this case will have a deterrent effect and prevent the possibility of corruption in the future. The subsequent legal process will provide legal certainty and uphold the value of justice for all parties involved in this case. (RSM) **

title: Hari Ini, Jenazah Korban Penembakan KKB Papua Briptu Anumerta Diterbangkan ke Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Minggu hari ini 21 Januari 2024, jenazah korban penembakan kelompok kriminal bersenjata (KKB) Papua akan diterbangkan ke Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai.Jenazah akan diterbangkan dari Makassar ke Luwuk pada Pukul 11.00 WITA. Nantinya jenazah akan dibawa ke rumah duka Jalan Gunung Colo Nomor 10, RT 1, RW 2, Kelurahan Mangkio Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk.Hal itu diungkapkan Kasi Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S Muda kepada para wartawan melalui grup WhatsApp, Minggu pagi 21 Januari 2024.“INFO UTK REKAN REKAN, RENCANA KEDATANGAN JENAZAH ALMARHUM BRIPTU ANUMERTA ALFANDO STEVE KARAMOY, ANGGOTA PELETON III KOMPI IV YON C RESIMEN PAS PELOPOR KORPS BRIMOB POLRI, HARI INI MINGGU 21 JANUARI 2024 SEKITAR JAM 11.00 DARI MAKASSAR – LWK, FLIGHT PERTAMA,” tulis Kasi Humas Iptu Al Amin S Muda.Sebelumnya, diberitakan Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) kembali berulah di awal Tahun 2024. Aksi tersebut dilakukan di Kabupaten Intan Jaya pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII).Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan 1 Personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan dan gugur.Menanggapi hal tersebut Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, S.H., M.H., M.M menerangkan bahwa Personel yang terkena luka tembak telah dievakuasi dan dilakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter Piter bahwa personel tersebut dinyatakan gugur.“Anggota Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan dan mengakibatkan anggota gugur,” ujar Bayu SusenoLebih lanjut, Bayu menyampaikan bahwa anggota Ops Damai Cartenz yang berada di wilayah tersebut mengalami serangan dari KKB selama 30 menit dari arah belakang pos.“Kami saat ini masih melakukan penyisiran terhadap pergerakan KKB di Wilayah Intan Jaya,” ujar Bayu SusenoKaops Damai Cartenz KBP Dr Faizal Ramadhani menegaskan bahwa Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata tersebut akan dicari keberadaannya dan akan diproses sesuai dengan Hukum yang berlaku.“Saat ini pasukan kami masih melakukan pengejaran dan penyisiran di sekitar TKP” pungkas Faizal. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Today Sunday, January 21 2024, the bodies of victims of the shooting by the Papuan armed criminal group (KKB) will be flown to Luwuk City, Banggai Regency. The bodies will be flown from Makassar to Luwuk at 11.00 WITA. Later the body will be taken to the funeral home at Jalan Gunung Colo Number 10, RT 1, RW 2, Mangkio Baru Village, Luwuk District. This was revealed by the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S Muda to journalists via the WhatsApp group, Sunday morning 21 January 2024. "INFO FOR COLLECTORS, PLANS FOR THE ARRIVAL OF THE BODY OF THE LATE BRIPTU ANUMERTA ALFANDO STEVE KARAMOY, MEMBER OF PLATEON III COMPANY IV YON C REGIMENT PAS PIONEER OF BRIMOB POLRI CORPS, TODAY, SUNDAY 21 JANUARY 2024 AROUND 11.00 FROM MAKASSAR – LWK, FLIGHT PER TAMA," wrote the Head of Public Relations Inspector Al Amin S Muda. Previously, it was reported that the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) was acting up again in early 2024. This action was carried out in Intan Jaya Regency led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from the KKB is thought to have come from behind the BTS Tower Telkomsel, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency which resulted in 1 Cartenz Peace Operations Personnel being shot and killed. Responding to this, the Head of the Cartenz Peace Ops Public Relations Task Force AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, S.H., M.H., M.M explained that the personnel who suffered gunshot wounds had been evacuated and given first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center, but Doctor Piter said that the personnel had been declared dead. "Member Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy was shot in the left jaw through the right jaw. and resulted in the member's death," said Bayu Suseno. Furthermore, Bayu said that members of Ops Damai Cartenz who were in the area experienced attacks from the KKB for 30 minutes from behind the post. "We are currently still conducting searches on the KKB's movements in the Intan Jaya area, " said Bayu Suseno, Kaops Damai Cartenz KBP Dr Faizal Ramadhani emphasized that the whereabouts of the Armed Criminal Group will be sought and will be processed in accordance with applicable law. "Currently our troops are still pursuing and sweeping around the crime scene," concluded Faizal. (*)

title: Jenazah Anggota Brimob Korban KKB Papua akan Dimakamkan di TMP Luwuk Banggai
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy, anggota Operasi Damai Cartenz-2024 yang gugur ditembak KKB Papua akan dimakamkan di Taman Makam Pahlawan (TMP) Tanjung Tuwis, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, KabupatenBanggai , Sulawesi Tengah. Menurut Kasi Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S Muda, Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy, akan dimakamkan pada Senin (22/1/2024). Saat ini, kata dia, jenazah telah berada di Makassar setelah diterbangkan dati Bandara Mozes Kilangin Timika, Sabtu (20/1/2024). Besok siang, jenazah diterbangkan dari Makassar ke Kabupaten Banggai, dan akan disemayamkan di rumah duka Jl. Gunung Colo, Kelurahan Mangkio Baru Kecamatan Luwuk. Sebelumnys, Kepala Operasi Damai Cartenz (Kaops Damai Cartenz), Kombes Pol Faizal Ramadhani, memimpin langsung upacara pelepasan jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy. Suasana haru tampak menyelimuti upacara yang digelar di Bandara Mozes Kilangin Timika pada Sabtu (20/1/2024). Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz AKBP Bayu Suseno menjelaskan, jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy diterbangkan menggunakan pesawat Smar-Air PK-SNP dari Bandara Bilorai Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya, menuju Timika. Jenazah kemudian diterbangkan menuju Luwuk Banggai, Sulawesi Tengah, setelah dilaksanakan upacara pelepasan yang dipimpin langsung oleh Kaops Damai Cartenz. Kaops Damai Cartenz Kombes Pol Faizal Ramadhani menyampaikan rasa duka cita yang mendalam atas kehilangan salah satu putra terbaik bangsa dalam menjalankan tugasnya. "Kami merasakan kehilangan yang besar atas gugurnya saudara kita, Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy. Semoga keluarga yang ditinggalkan diberi ketabahan," ucapnya. Diketahui, anggota Brimob Sulawesi Tengah itu gugur dalam tugas usai baku tembak dengan Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII). Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan 1 personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan, Jumat (19/1/2024) sore. Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, menerangkan, personel yang terkena luka tembak telah dievakuasi dan dilakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter bahwa personel tersebut dinyatakan meninggal dunia. "Anggota BripdaAlfandiSteveKaramoy terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan dan mengakibatkan anggota gugur," ungkap Bayu Suseno. Bayu menyampaikan bahwa anggota Ops Damai Cartenz yang berada di wilayah tersebut mengalami serangan dari KKB selama 30 menit dari arah belakang pos. "Kami saat ini masih melakukan penyisiran terhadap pergerakan KKB di Wilayah Intan Jaya," ujar Bayu Suseno Kaops Damai Cartenz, Kombes Pol Faizal Ramadhani, menegaskan bahwa KKB tersebut akan dicari keberadaannya dan akan diproses sesuai dengan hukum yang berlaku. "Saat ini pasukan kami masih melakukan pengejaran dan penyisiran di sekitar TKP," kata Faizal. (*)
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - The body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy, a member of the Cartenz-2024 Peace Operation who was shot dead by KKB Papua will be buried at the Tanjung Tuwis Heroes' Cemetery (TMP), South Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi. According to the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Iptu Al Amin S Muda, Brigadier Posthumous Alfando Steve Karamoy, will be buried on Monday (22/1/2024). Currently, he said, the body is in Makassar after being flown from Mozes Kilangin Timika Airport, Saturday (20/1/2024). Tomorrow afternoon, the body will be flown from Makassar to Banggai Regency, and will be buried at the funeral home on Jl. Mount Colo, Mangkio Baru Village, Luwuk District. Previously, the Head of Cartenz Peace Operations (Kaops Peace Cartenz), Kombes Pol Faizal Ramadhani, directly led the ceremony to release the body of posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy. An atmosphere of emotion seemed to surround the ceremony which was held at Mozes Kilangin Timika Airport on Saturday (20/1/2024). Head of the Cartenz Peace Ops Public Relations Task Force, AKBP Bayu Suseno, explained that the body of Brigadier Posthumous Alfando Steve Karamoy was flown using a Smar-Air PK-SNP aircraft from Bilorai Sugapa Airport, Intan Jaya Regency, to Timika. The body was then flown to Luwuk Banggai, Central Sulawesi, after a release ceremony was held which was led directly by Kaops Damai Cartenz. Kaops Peace Cartenz Police Commissioner Faizal Ramadhani expressed his deep condolences for the loss of one of the nation's best sons in carrying out his duties. "We feel a great loss over the death of our brother, Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy. We hope that the family left behind will be given fortitude," he said. It is known that the Central Sulawesi Brimob member died in the line of duty after a shootout with the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from KKB is thought to have come from behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency which resulted in 1 Cartenz Peace Operation personnel being shot, Friday (19/1/2024) afternoon. Head of Public Relations Task Force for Peace Ops Cartenz AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, explained that the personnel who suffered gunshot wounds had been evacuated and given first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center, but the doctor stated that the personnel had died. "Member Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy was shot in the left jaw through the right jaw and resulted in the member falling," said Bayu Suseno. Bayu said that members of Ops Damai Cartenz who were in the area experienced attacks from the KKB for 30 minutes from behind the post. "We are currently still conducting searches on the KKB's movements in the Intan Jaya area," said Bayu Suseno, Head of Peace Cartenz, Police Commissioner Faizal Ramadhani, emphasizing that the KKB's whereabouts will be searched for and will be processed in accordance with applicable law. "Currently our troops are still pursuing and searching around the crime scene," said Faizal. (*)

title: Fun Aerobics Competition di Banggai Dapat Tingkatkan Kesadaran Hidup Sehat
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - Bupati Banggai, Amirudin, membuka acara FunAerobicsCompetition , Man Body Contest dan Zumba Party, di Gedung Padepokan Pencak Silat, Kecamatan Luwuk, KabupatenBanggai , Sulawesi Tengah, Sabtu (20/1/2024). Kegiatan ini dilaksanakan sebagai bagian dari upaya untuk mempromosikan gaya hidup sehat dan aktif dalam masyarakat. "Sebagaimana yang saya sampaikan semalam bahwa kegiatan aerobik ini merupakan salah satu senam yang bisa membuat kolestrol baik dalam tubuh," tutur Bupati Amirudin. Kata dia, Man Body Contest ini adalah salah satu kegiatan bisa membentuk otot di dalam tubuh. Karena itu, kegiatan yang sangat positif, dan mudah-mudahan pesertanya semakin banyak, sehingga masyarakat KabupatenBanggai sehat dan segar. "Karena sesungguhnya di dalam tubuh yang sehat terdapat pikiran yang waras," tandas Bupati Amirudin. Kegiatan ini merupakan hasil kerjasama antara Pemerintah Daerah KabupatenBanggai melalui Dinas Pemuda dan Olahraga KabupatenBanggai dengan Asosiasi Infrastruktur dan Fitnes Indonesia (ASIAFI) KabupatenBanggai serta Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia (KONI) KabupatenBanggai . Diharapkan kegiatan ini tidak hanya menjadi ajang kompetisi, tetapi juga membangun kesadaran akan pentingnya hidup sehat dan aktif dalam kehidupan sehari-hari. (*)
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - The Regent of Banggai, Amirudin, opened the FunAerobicsCompetition, Man Body Contest and Zumba Party, at the Padepokan Pencak Silat Building, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, Saturday (20/1/ 2024). This activity is carried out as part of efforts to promote healthy and active lifestyles in society. "As I said last night, this aerobic activity is one of the exercises that can make good cholesterol in the body," said Regent Amirudin. He said, the Man Body Contest is an activity that can build muscle in the body. Therefore, it is a very positive activity, and hopefully there will be more participants, so that the people of Banggai Regency will be healthy and fresh. "Because actually in a healthy body there is a sane mind," said Regent Amirudin. This activity is the result of collaboration between the Regional Government of Banggai Regency through the Youth and Sports Service of Banggai Regency with the Indonesian Infrastructure and Fitness Association (ASIAFI) of Banggai Regency and the Indonesian National Sports Committee (KONI) of Banggai Regency. It is hoped that this activity will not only be a competition event, but also raise awareness of the importance of healthy and active living in everyday life. (*)

title: Kapolres Banggai Sambut Kedatangan Jenazah Anggota Brimob Korban Tembak KKB
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Jenazah personel Resimen Pelopor Korp Brimob Polri Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy yang meninggal dunia saat melaksanakan tugas Operasi Damai Cartenz tiba di Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, Sulteng, Minggu (21/1/2023) siang.“Kedatangan jenazah di Bandara Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk ini didampingi langsung Danmen 3 Paspor Korps Brimob Polri Kombes Pol Wahyu SIK, SH dan Kasatgas Tindak Operasi Damai Cartenz AKBP Irwan Jaya dan satu personel Bripda Khozin,” kata Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S. Muda.Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy disambut langsung Kapolres Banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, sejumlah Pejabat Utama Polres Banggai dan Kasubden II Den B Pelopor Luwuk Polda Sulteng dan anggota Brimob sekaligus memberikan penghormatan.Usai penghormatan, Jenazah almarhum langsung dibawa ke rumah duka Jalan Gunung Colo, Kelurahan Mangkio Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai untuk diserahkan kepada keluarga.“Rencana upacara pemakaman dilaksanakan Senin 22 Januari 2023 pagi di TMP Tanjung Tuis, Luwuk Selatan,” jelasnya.Sebelumnya diberitakan, Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) kembali berulah di awal Tahun 2024. Aksi tersebut dilakukan di Kabupaten Intan Jaya pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII).Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan 1 Personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan.Personel yang terkena luka tembak telah di evakuasi dan di lakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter bahwa personel tersebut dinyatakan gugur usai terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The body of the Indonesian Police Mobile Brigade Corps Pioneer Regiment personnel Brigadier Posthumous Alfandi Steve Karamoy who died while carrying out Cartenz Peace Operation duties arrived in Luwuk City, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, Sunday (21/1/2023) afternoon. "Arrival of the body at Syukuran Airport "Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk was accompanied directly by Danmen 3 Passports of the Brimob Police Corps, Kombes Pol Wahyu SIK, SH and Head of the Cartenz Peace Operations Task Force AKBP Irwan Jaya and one Bripda Khozin personnel," said the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Iptu Al Amin S. Muda. The body of Brigadier Anumerta Anumerta. Alfandi Steve Karamoy was greeted directly by Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, a number of Banggai Police Chief Officials and Head of Sub-Department II Den B Pioneer Luwuk Regional Police, Central Sulawesi and members of Brimob at the same time paid their respects. After the tribute, the body of the deceased was immediately taken to the funeral home on Jalan Gunung Colo , Mangkio Baru Village, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency to be handed over to the family. "The funeral ceremony will be held on Monday 22 January 2023 morning at TMP Tanjung Tuis, South Luwuk," he explained. Previously it was reported that the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) was acting up again at the beginning of the year 2024. The action was carried out in Intan Jaya Regency led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from KKB allegedly came from behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency which resulted in 1 Cartenz Peace Operations Personnel being hit by gunfire. who suffered a gunshot wound had been evacuated and given first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center, but the doctor said that the personnel was declared dead after being shot in the left jaw through the right jaw. (*)

title: Diikuti Bupati Banggai, Fun Walk Hari Bhakti Imigrasi Diharap Sebarkan Informasi Inovasi Keimigrasian
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Bupati Banggai Amirudin membuka sekaligus mengikuti jalan santai (fun walk) yang diselenggarakan Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Banggai, Minggu (21/1/2024) pagi. Kegiatan ini merupakan rangkaian perayaan Hari Bhakti Imigrasi Ke-74.Dari titik start dan finish di halaman Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI, Bupati Amirudin dan Inspektur Jenderal Kementerian Hukum dan HAM Razilu melepas ratusan peserta fun walk dengan rute mengitari kawasan perkantoran Bukit Halimun, Luwuk Selatan.Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Banggai Octaveri mengatakan, kegiatan tersebut menjadi wadah dalam menyosialisasikan pentingnya transformasi digital dalam pelayanan keimigrasian.“Tujuan utama kegiatan ini adalah mempererat silaturahmi, meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap peran keimigrasian di Indonesia, serta menyosialisasikan pentingnya transformasi digital dalam pelayanan keimigrasian,” ujar Octaveri.Dia berharap, fun walk tidak hanya menjadi kegiatan olahraga, tetapi juga sebagai medium untuk menyebarkan informasi tentang inovasi dan kemajuan di bidang keimigrasian.Pada kesempatan itu, Inspektur Jenderal Kementerian Hukum dan HAM Razilu berharap kegiatan tersebut menjadi bentuk penyegaran bagi seluruh jajaran, serta meningkatkan jalinan kebersamaan dan memperkuat persaudaraan di antara keluarga besar Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah.“Fun walk bukan hanya sebagai kegiatan rekreasi semata, tetapi juga sebagai langkah positif dalam memperkuat sinergi antarinstansi dan melibatkan masyarakat secara langsung,” ujar Razilu.Melalui transformasi digital yang diusung Kantor Imigrasi, diharapkan dapat memberikan manfaat yang signifikan dalam mempermudah prosedur dan memperkuat sistem pengawasan di bidang keimigrasian.“Imigrasi akan terus berinovasi, mewujudkan pelayanan berbasis digital di lingkungan Imigrasi,” ujarnya.Hari Bhakti Imigrasi yang diperingati setiap 26 Januari menjadi momen untuk mengenang sejarah panjang perjalanan pembentukan lembaga keimigrasian di Indonesia.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Banggai Regent Amirudin opened and took part in a fun walk organized by the Class II Non TPI Banggai Immigration Office, Sunday (21/1/2024) morning. This activity is a series of celebrations for the 74th Immigration Service Day. From the start and finish points in the Class II Non-TPI Immigration Office yard, Regent Amirudin and Inspector General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights Razilu sent off hundreds of fun walk participants with a route around the Bukit Halimun office area, Luwuk South. Head of the Class II Non TPI Immigration Office, Banggai Octaveri, said that this activity was a forum for socializing the importance of digital transformation in immigration services. "The main aim of this activity is to strengthen friendship, increase public awareness of the role of immigration in Indonesia, and socialize the importance of digital transformation in immigration services," said Octaveri. He hopes that the fun walk will not only become a sporting activity, but also as a medium for disseminating information about innovation and progress in the immigration sector. On that occasion, the Inspector General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Razilu, hopes that this activity will be a form of refreshment. for all levels, as well as increasing ties of togetherness and strengthening brotherhood among the extended family of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Central Sulawesi. "Fun walks are not only a recreational activity, but also a positive step in strengthening synergy between agencies and involving the community directly," said Razilu. Through transformation It is hoped that the digital system promoted by the Immigration Office will provide significant benefits in simplifying procedures and strengthening the supervision system in the immigration sector. "Immigration will continue to innovate, realizing digital-based services in the Immigration environment," he said. Immigration Bhakti Day, which is celebrated every January 26, is a moment to commemorate the long history of the journey of establishing immigration institutions in Indonesia.**

title: Organisasi Instruktur Aeorobik Di Banggai Terbentuk, Dede Rosidah Amirudin Pimpinannya
text: Terasbanggai.com -Dede Rosidah Amirudin resmi memimpin Asosiasi Instruktur Aeorobik dan Fitnes Indonesia (ASIAFI) Kabupaten Banggai periode (2024-2028). Dede Rosidah Amirudin bersama jajaran pengurus lengkap dilantik langsung Ketua ASIAFI Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah Diah Puspita di Hotel Santika, Luwuk, Jumat (19/1/2024). Bupati Banggai Amirudin memberikan apresiasi atas keberadaan pengurus ASIAFI yang telah berupaya mengembangkan olahraga aerobik dan fitnes di Banggai. “Dengan adanya asosiasi ini, kita harapkan bahwa semua masyarakat semakin rajin berolahraga khususnya senam dan fitnes,” kata Bupati Amirudin. Sementara itu, Wakil Gubernur Sulawesi Tengah Ma’mun Amir berharap ASIAFI dan seluruh organisasi olahraga melakukan seleksi ketat dalam mencari atlet-atlet terbaik yang akan berkompetisi di tingkat nasional. “Insya Allah, di PON nanti target bapak gubernur itu 10 medali emas,” ujar Wagub Sulteng. Ma’mun menilai, ASIAFI memiliki peran strategis dalam membantu meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat akan pentingnya gaya hidup sehat melalui kegiatan aerobik dan fitnes. Ketua ASIAFI Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah Diah Puspita mengungkapkan terbentuknya kepengurusan ASIAFI di kabupaten Banggai, merupakan daerah kelima yang kepengurusannya dilantik dan dikukuhkan. “Saya berharap seluruh kabupaten di Sulawesi Tengah bisa terbentuk asosiasinya dan berharap pengurus ASIAFI Banggai aktif menyosialisasikan olahraga aerobik dan fitnes ke masyarakat,” tutur Diah. text_en: Terasbanggai.com -Dede Rosidah Amirudin officially leads the Indonesian Aerobics and Fitness Instructors Association (ASIAFI) Banggai Regency for the period (2024-2028). Dede Rosidah Amirudin along with the complete board were appointed directly by the Chair of ASIAFI for Central Sulawesi Province, Diah Puspita, at the Santika Hotel, Luwuk, Friday (19/1/2024). Banggai Regent Amirudin expressed his appreciation for the existence of the ASIAFI management who have made efforts to develop aerobics and fitness sports in Banggai. "With this association, we hope that all people will be more diligent in exercising, especially gymnastics and fitness," said Regent Amirudin. Meanwhile, Deputy Governor of Central Sulawesi Ma'mun Amir hopes that ASIAFI and all sports organizations will carry out strict selection to find the best athletes who will compete at the national level. "God willing, in PON the governor's target will be 10 gold medals," said the Deputy Governor of Central Sulawesi. Ma'mun believes that ASIAFI has a strategic role in helping to increase public awareness of the importance of a healthy lifestyle through aerobic and fitness activities. Chair of ASIAFI for Central Sulawesi Province, Diah Puspita, revealed that the ASIAFI management was formed in Banggai district, which was the fifth area whose management was appointed and confirmed. "I hope that all districts in Central Sulawesi can form associations and hope that ASIAFI Banggai administrators will actively promote aerobics and fitness sports to the community," said Diah.
