title: Hari Ini, Jenazah Korban Penembakan KKB Papua Briptu Alfando Diterbangkan ke Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Minggu hari ini 21 Januari 2024, jenazah korban penembakan kelompok kriminal bersenjata (KKB) Papua akan diterbangkan ke Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai.Jenazah akan diterbangkan dari Makassar ke Luwuk pada Pukul 11.00 WITA. Nantinya jenazah akan dibawa ke rumah duka Jalan Gunung Colo Nomor 10, RT 1, RW 2, Kelurahan Mangkio Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk.Hal itu diungkapkan Kasi Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S Muda kepada para wartawan melalui grup WhatsApp, Minggu pagi 21 Januari 2024.“INFO UTK REKAN REKAN, RENCANA KEDATANGAN JENAZAH ALMARHUM BRIPTU ANUMERTA ALFANDO STEVE KARAMOY, ANGGOTA PELETON III KOMPI IV YON C RESIMEN PAS PELOPOR KORPS BRIMOB POLRI, HARI INI MINGGU 21 JANUARI 2024 SEKITAR JAM 11.00 DARI MAKASSAR – LWK, FLIGHT PERTAMA,” tulis Kasi Humas Iptu Al Amin S Muda.Sebelumnya, diberitakan Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) kembali berulah di awal Tahun 2024. Aksi tersebut dilakukan di Kabupaten Intan Jaya pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII).Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan 1 Personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan dan gugur.Menanggapi hal tersebut Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, S.H., M.H., M.M menerangkan bahwa Personel yang terkena luka tembak telah dievakuasi dan dilakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter Piter bahwa personel tersebut dinyatakan gugur.“Anggota Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan dan mengakibatkan anggota gugur,” ujar Bayu SusenoLebih lanjut, Bayu menyampaikan bahwa anggota Ops Damai Cartenz yang berada di wilayah tersebut mengalami serangan dari KKB selama 30 menit dari arah belakang pos.“Kami saat ini masih melakukan penyisiran terhadap pergerakan KKB di Wilayah Intan Jaya,” ujar Bayu SusenoKaops Damai Cartenz KBP Dr Faizal Ramadhani menegaskan bahwa Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata tersebut akan dicari keberadaannya dan akan diproses sesuai dengan Hukum yang berlaku.“Saat ini pasukan kami masih melakukan pengejaran dan penyisiran di sekitar TKP” pungkas Faizal. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Today Sunday, January 21 2024, the bodies of victims of the shooting by the Papuan armed criminal group (KKB) will be flown to Luwuk City, Banggai Regency. The bodies will be flown from Makassar to Luwuk at 11.00 WITA. Later the body will be taken to the funeral home at Jalan Gunung Colo Number 10, RT 1, RW 2, Mangkio Baru Village, Luwuk District. This was revealed by the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S Muda to journalists via the WhatsApp group, Sunday morning 21 January 2024. "INFO FOR COLLECTORS, PLANS FOR THE ARRIVAL OF THE BODY OF THE LATE BRIPTU ANUMERTA ALFANDO STEVE KARAMOY, MEMBER OF PLATEON III COMPANY IV YON C REGIMENT PAS PIONEER OF BRIMOB POLRI CORPS, TODAY, SUNDAY 21 JANUARY 2024 AROUND 11.00 FROM MAKASSAR – LWK, FLIGHT PER TAMA," wrote the Head of Public Relations Inspector Al Amin S Muda. Previously, it was reported that the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) was acting up again in early 2024. This action was carried out in Intan Jaya Regency led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from the KKB is thought to have come from behind the BTS Tower Telkomsel, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency which resulted in 1 Cartenz Peace Operations Personnel being shot and killed. Responding to this, the Head of the Cartenz Peace Ops Public Relations Task Force AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, S.H., M.H., M.M explained that the personnel who suffered gunshot wounds had been evacuated and given first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center, but Doctor Piter said that the personnel had been declared dead. "Member Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy was shot in the left jaw through the right jaw. and resulted in the member's death," said Bayu Suseno. Furthermore, Bayu said that members of Ops Damai Cartenz who were in the area experienced attacks from the KKB for 30 minutes from behind the post. "We are currently still conducting searches on the KKB's movements in the Intan Jaya area, " said Bayu Suseno, Kaops Damai Cartenz KBP Dr Faizal Ramadhani emphasized that the whereabouts of the Armed Criminal Group will be sought and will be processed in accordance with applicable law. "Currently our troops are still pursuing and sweeping around the crime scene," concluded Faizal. (*)

title: Tragedi Gugurnya Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy dalam Serangan KKB, Jenazah Tiba di Luwuk  Disambut Kapolres Banggai
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Tragedi Gugurnya Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve KaramoydalamSerangan KKB, Jenazah Tiba di Luwuk  DisambutKapolres Banggai.Luasnya duka menyelimuti Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, Sulteng, saat jenazahBriptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy, personel Resimen Pelopor Korp Brimob Polri, tiba di Bandara Syukuran Aminuddin AmirBubung Luwuk. Jenazah diterima oleh petinggi Brimob dan pejabat terkait pada Minggu (21/1/2023) siang.Dalam pernyataannya, Kasi Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S. Muda, menyebutkan bahwa kedatangan jenazah didampingi langsung oleh Danmen 3 Paspor Korps Brimob Polri, Kombes Pol Wahyu SIK, SH, dan Kasatgas Tindak Operasi Damai Cartenz, AKBP Irwan Jaya, beserta satu personel Bripda Khozin.Kapolres Banggai, AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, bersama sejumlah pejabat utama Polres Banggai, dan Kasubden II Den B Pelopor Luwuk Polda Sulteng serta anggota Brimob, menyambut jenazah dengan penghormatan.Setelah upacara penghormatan, jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy langsung dibawa ke rumah duka di Jalan Gunung Colo, Kelurahan Mangkio Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, untuk diserahkan kepada keluarga.Rencananya, upacara pemakaman akan dilaksanakan pada Senin, 22 Januari 2023, pagi di TMP Tanjung Tuis, Luwuk Selatan.Kepergian Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy merupakan hasil dari serangan Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) yang kembali berulah di awal Tahun 2024.Aksi tersebut terjadi di Kabupaten Intan Jaya dan dipimpin oleh Apen Kobogau, Wakil Pangkodap VIII. Serangan yang terjadi di belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya, mengakibatkan satu personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan.Personel yang terluka telah dievakuasi dan mendapatkan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa. Namun, sayangnya, dokter menyatakan bahwa personel tersebut gugur setelah terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri yang menembus rahang kanan.Kejadian ini menambah daftar panjang tragedi dioperasionalnya aparat keamanan dalam menjaga kedaulatan dan keamanan di wilayah Papua.**
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Tragedy of the Death of Posthumous Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy in the KKB Attack, Body Arrived in Luwuk, Greeted by Banggai Police Chief. Extensive sorrow enveloped Luwuk City, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, when the body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy, a member of the Indonesian Police Mobile Brigade Pioneer Corps Pioneer Regiment, arrived at Syukuran Aminuddin AmirBubung Airport Luwuk. The body was received by high-ranking Brimob officials and related officials on Sunday (21/1/2023) afternoon. In his statement, the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S. Muda, stated that the arrival of the body was accompanied directly by Danmen 3 Passports of the Brimob Polri Corps, Pol Kombes Wahyu SIK, SH, and Head of the Cartenz Peace Operations Task Force, AKBP Irwan Jaya, along with one member of Bripda Khozin. Kapolres Banggai, AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, along with a number of main officials from Banggai Police, and Kasubden II Den B Pioneer Luwuk Polda Sulteng as well as members of Brimob, greeted the body with respect. After the honoring ceremony, the body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy was immediately taken to the funeral home on Jalan Gunung Colo, Mangkio Baru Village, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, to be handed over to the family. The plan is that a funeral ceremony will be held on Monday, January 22 2023, morning at TMP Tanjung Tuis, South Luwuk. The posthumous departure of Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy was the result of an attack by the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) which acted again in early 2024. This action took place in Intan Jaya Regency and was led by Apen Kobogau, Deputy Pangkodap VIII. The attack that occurred behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency, resulted in one Cartenz Peace Operation personnel being hit by gunfire. The injured personnel were evacuated and received first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center. However, unfortunately, the doctor stated that the personnel died after being shot in the left jaw which penetrated the right jaw. This incident adds to the long list of tragedies in the operation of security forces in maintaining sovereignty and security in the Papua region.**

title: Kapolres Banggai Dan Pju Sambut Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy
text: Terasbanggai.com -Jenazah personel Brimob Polda Sulteng Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy yang meninggal dunia saat melaksanakan tugas Operasi Damai Cartenz tiba di Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, Sulteng, Minggu (21/1/2023) siang. “Kedatangan jenazah di Bandara Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk ini didampingi Kasatgas Tindak Operasi Damai Cartenz AKBP Irwan Jaya dan satu personel Bripda Khozin,” kata Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S. Muda. Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy disambut langsung Kapolres Banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, sejumlah Pejabat Utama Polres Banggai dan Kasubden II Den B Pelopor Luwuk Polda Sulteng dan anggota Brimob sekaligus memberikan penghormatan. Usai penghormatan, Jenazah almarhum langsung dibawa ke rumah duka Jalan Gunung Colo, Kelurahan Mangkio Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai untuk diserahkan kepada keluarga.l untuk disemayamkan. “Rencana upacara pemakaman dilaksanakan Senin 22 Januari 2023 pagi di TMP Tanjung Tuis, Luwuk Selstan,” jelasnya. Sebelumnya, Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) kembali berulah di awal Tahun 2024. Aksi tersebut dilakukan di Kabupaten Intan Jaya pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII). Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan 1 Personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan. Personel yang terkena luka tembak telah di evakuasi dan di lakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter bahwa personel tersebut dinyatakan gugur usai terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan.* “Kedatangan jenazah di Bandara Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk ini didampingi Kasatgas Tindak Operasi Damai Cartenz AKBP Irwan Jaya dan satu personel Bripda Khozin,” kata Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S. text_en: Terasbanggai.com - The body of the Central Sulawesi Police Brimob personnel Brigadier Posthumous Alfandi Steve Karamoy who died while carrying out his Cartenz Peace Operation duties arrived in Luwuk City, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, Sunday (21/1/2023) afternoon. "The arrival of the body at Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk Airport was accompanied by the Head of the Cartenz Peace Operations Task Force AKBP Irwan Jaya and one Bripda Khozin personnel," said Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Iptu Al Amin S. Muda. The body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy was greeted directly by Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, a number of Banggai Police Chief Officials and Head of Sub-Department II Den B Luwuk Pioneers of Central Sulawesi Regional Police and members of Brimob at the same time paid their respects. After the tribute, the body of the deceased was immediately taken to the funeral home on Jalan Gunung Colo, Mangkio Baru Village, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency to be handed over to the family for burial. "The funeral ceremony is planned to be held Monday 22 January 2023 morning at TMP Tanjung Tuis, Luwuk Selstan," he explained. Previously, the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) acted again in early 2024. This action was carried out in Intan Jaya Regency led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from KKB is thought to have come from behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency, resulting in 1 Cartenz Peace Operations Personnel being hit by gunfire. The personnel who suffered gunshot wounds had been evacuated and given first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center, but the doctor stated that the personnel had died after being shot in the left jaw through the right jaw.* "The arrival of the body at Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk Airport was accompanied by the Head of the Task Force "Cartenz Peace Operation, AKBP Irwan Jaya and one Bripda Khozin personnel," said Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S. title: Kapolres Banggai Sambut Kedatangan Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy di Bandara Luwuk

"Arrival of the body at Syukuran Airport "Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk was accompanied directly by Danmen 3 Passports of the Brimob Police Corps, Kombes Pol Wahyu SIK, SH and the Head of the Cartenz Peace Operations Task Force AKBP Irwan Jaya and one Bripda Khozin personnel," said the Head of Public Relations of the Police, proud of Inspector Al Amin S. Muda. The posthumous body of Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy was greeted directly by the Head of Banggai Police, AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, a number of Main Officials of Banggai Police and Head of Sub-Department II Den B Pioneer Luwuk Regional Police of Central Sulawesi and members of Brimob at the same time paid their respects. After the tribute, the body of the deceased was immediately taken to the funeral home on Jalan Gunung Colo, Mangkio Baru Village. , Luwuk District, Banggai Regency to be handed over to the family. "The funeral ceremony is planned to be held Monday 22 January 2023 morning at TMP Tanjung Tuis, Luwuk Selstan," he explained. Previously, the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) acted again in early 2024. This action was carried out in Intan Jaya Regency led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from KKB allegedly came from behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency which resulted in 1 Cartenz Peace Operations Personnel being hit by gunfire. The personnel who received gunshot wounds have been treated. evacuation and first aid was carried out at the Sugapa Community Health Center, but the doctor stated that the personnel was declared dead after being shot in the left jaw through the right jaw

title: Briptu Alfandi Karamoy Korban Penembakan KKB Dimakamkan di Luwuk
text: Luwuk: Jenazah personel Resimen Pelopor Korps Brimob Polri, Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy yang meninggal saat melaksanakan tugasOperasi Damai Cartenzdi Kabupaten Intan Jaya, Papua Tengah, tiba di Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai, Sulawesi Tengah pada Minggu siang, 21 Januari 2024. Jenazah tiba di Bandara Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk, didampingi Danmen 3 Paspor Korps Brimob Polri, Kombes Pol Wahyu dan Kasatgas Tindak Operasi Damai Cartenz AKBP Irwan Jaya serta satu personel Polri Bripda Khozin, setelah semalam sempat tertahan di Makassar."Rencana upacara pemakaman dilaksanakan Senin 22 Januari 2023 pagi di TMP Tanjung Tuis, Luwuk Selatan," ujar Kasi Humas Polres Banggai Iptu Al Amin S Muda.Kedatangan jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy disambut Kapolres Banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani dan sejumlah Pejabat Utama Polres Banggai serta Kasubden II Den B Pelopor Luwuk Polda Sulteng termasuk anggotaBrimobyang sekaligus memberikan penghormatan.Baca:Polisi Anggota Operasi Damai Cartenz Tewas Tertembak KKB di PapuaUsai penghormatan dilakukan, jenazah almarhum langsung dibawa ke rumah duka Jalan Gunung Colo, Kelurahan Mangkio Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai untuk diserahkan kepada keluarga. Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy, diketahui menjadi korban Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) yang kembali berulah di awal Tahun 2024.Aksi tersebut dilakukan kelompok pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII). Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya, Papua Tengah, yang mengakibatkan 1 Personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan.Personel yang menjadi korban terkena luka tembak telah di evakuasi dan di lakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter bahwa personel tersebut dinyatakan gugur usai terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan.
text_en: Luwuk: The body of the Indonesian Police Mobile Brigade Corps Pioneer Regiment personnel, Brigadier Posthumous Alfandi Steve Karamoy, who died while carrying out the duties of the Cartenz Peace Operation in Intan Jaya Regency, Central Papua, arrived in Luwuk City, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi on Sunday afternoon, January 21 2024. The body arrived at Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk Airport, accompanied by Danmen 3 Passports of the Indonesian Police Mobile Brigade Corps, Police Commissioner Wahyu and Head of the Cartenz Peace Operations Task Force AKBP Irwan Jaya as well as one National Police personnel Bripda Khozin, after being detained overnight in Makassar."Plans for the funeral ceremony will be held Monday 22 January 2023 morning at TMP Tanjung Tuis, South Luwuk," said the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Iptu Al Amin S Muda. The arrival of the posthumous body of Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy was welcomed by the Banggai Police Chief AKBP Ade Nuramdani and a number of Main Officials of the Banggai Police as well as the Head of Sub-Department II of Den B, Luwuk Pioneer, Central Sulawesi Police, including members of the Brimob who also paid their respects. Posthumous Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy, is known to be a victim of the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) which acted again in early 2024. This action was carried out by a group led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from KKB is thought to have come from behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency, Central Papua, which resulted in 1 Cartenz Peace Operations Personnel being hit by gunfire. The personnel who were victims of gunshot wounds have been evacuated and given first aid in the area. Sugapa Community Health Center, but the doctor stated that the personnel was declared dead after being shot in the left jaw through the right jaw.

title: Desa Saiyong, Banggai Kepulauan, Gelar Musyawarah Desa untuk Penetapan Penerima BLT-DD Tahun 2024
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Desa Saiyong, Banggai Kepulauan, gelarmusyawarah Desauntuk Penetapan Penerima BLT-DD Tahun 2024.Pemerintah Desa (Pemdes) Saiyong, bersamaBadan Permusyarawatan Desa (BPD)dan warga masyarakat setempat, telah sukses menyelenggarakanMusyawarah Desa (Musdes)guna menetapkan calon penerimaBantuan Langsung Tunai Dana Desa (BLT-DD)susulan tahun 2024.Acara berlangsung diBalai Pertemuan Umum (BPU) Desa Saiyongpada Rabu, 17 Januari 2024.Musyawarah Desa dihadiri oleh Pj Kepala Desa Saiyong, Abd. Jalil Tangkudung SH, ketua BPD beserta anggotanya, dan lembaga masyarakat desa lainnya.Agenda utama pertemuan ini adalah validasi dan finalisasi data calon penerima BLT-DD susulan tahun 2024.Dalam Musdes tersebut, telah disepakati bahwa jumlah Penerima Bantuan Langsung Tunai Dana Desa (BLT-DD) tahun 2024 sebanyak 24 Keluarga Penerima Manfaat (KPM). Pj Kepala Desa Saiyong, Abd. Jalil Tangkudung SH, menjelaskan bahwa Musdes ini dilaksanakan untuk menjalankan program BLT yang bersumber dari Anggaran Dana Desa tahun 2024.Besaran BLT yang akan diberikan kepada setiap penerima adalah sebesar Rp 300 ribu per bulan selama 12 bulan. Dana tersebut akan diambil dari Anggaran Dana Desa sebesar 40 persen, dengan total penerima mencapai 24 orang.Abd. Jalil Tangkudung SH juga menyoroti kriteria pemilihan penerima manfaat BLT-DD, yang melibatkan keluarga miskin dan individu yang kehilangan mata pencaharian akibat dampak Covid-19. Selain itu, kriteria lainnya mencakup keluarga yang rentan terkena penyakit kronis.Keputusan yang diambil dalam Musyawarah Desa ini mencerminkan komitmen Pemerintah Desa Saiyong untuk memastikan bantuan tepat sasaran dan memberikan dukungan kepada warga yang membutuhkan, terutama di tengah-tengah tantangan ekonomi akibat pandemi Covid-19. ( RSM ) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Saiyong Village, Banggai Islands, held a Village Deliberation to Determine BLT-DD Recipients in 2024. The Saiyong Village Government (Pemdes), together with the Village Consultative Body (BPD) and local community members, have successfully held a Village Deliberation (Musdes) to determine potential recipients of Direct Cash Assistance Village Fund (BLT-DD) follow-up in 2024. The event took place at the Saiyong Village General Meeting Hall (BPU) on Wednesday, January 17 2024. The Village Deliberation was attended by the Acting Head of Saiyong Village, Abd. Jalil Tangkudung SH, chairman of the BPD and its members, and other village community institutions. The main agenda of this meeting is the validation and finalization of data on potential recipients of the follow-up BLT-DD in 2024. In the Musdes, it was agreed that the number of recipients of Village Fund Direct Cash Assistance (BLT- DD) in 2024 as many as 24 Beneficiary Families (KPM). Acting Head of Saiyong Village, Abd. Jalil Tangkudung SH, explained that this Musdes was held to carry out the BLT program which was sourced from the 2024 Village Fund Budget. The amount of BLT that will be given to each recipient is IDR 300 thousand per month for 12 months. The funds will be taken from the Village Fund Budget by 40 percent, with a total of 24 recipients. Abd. Jalil Tangkudung SH also highlighted the criteria for selecting BLT-DD beneficiaries, which involved poor families and individuals who had lost their livelihoods due to the impact of Covid-19. Apart from that, other criteria include families who are vulnerable to chronic diseases. The decisions taken at this Village Conference reflect the commitment of the Saiyong Village Government to ensure that assistance is right on target and provide support to residents in need, especially in the midst of economic challenges due to the Covid-19 pandemic . ( RSM ) **

title: Polisi Kawal Ketat Perakitan 500 Kotak Suara di KPU Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Personel Polres Banggai yang tergabung dalam Satuan Tugas Operasi Mantap Brata (OMB) Tinombala Pemilu 2023-2024 mengawal dan mengamankan proses perakitan kotak suara Pemilu 2023-2024, Sabtu (20/1/2024) pagi.Perakitan kota suara berlangsung di gudang logistik Pemilu KPU Kabupaten Banggai, di Kompleks Bukit Halimun, Kelurahan Maahas Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan. Jalannya perakitan tersebut turut dipantau pihak KPU dan Bawaslu Banggai.Kasatgas Humas OMB Polres Banggai IPTU Al Amin S Muda mengatakan, pengamanan ini bertujuan untuk mencegah terjadinya gangguan keamanan yang merupakan bagian Polri kepada masyarakat dalam OMB Tinombala.“Proses perakitan 500 kotak suara berjalan dengan aman dan lancar. Selanjutnya pihak kepolisian tetap melakukan penjagaan dan pengamanan kotak suara tersebut beserta logistik Pemilu lainnya di KPU hingga nanti didistribusikan,” pungkas Amin.Giat pengamanan juga melibatkan TNI dan pengamanan intern KPU Banggai serta 7 personil pengamanan pos objek penting Gudang Logistik. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Banggai Police personnel who are members of the Tinombala Operation Mantap Brata (OMB) Task Force for the 2023-2024 Election supervised and secured the process of assembling ballot boxes for the 2023-2024 Election, Saturday (20/1/2024) morning. The assembly of the ballot boxes took place in the warehouse logistics for the Banggai Regency KPU Election, at the Bukit Halimun Complex, Maahas Village, South Luwuk District. The process of the assembly was also monitored by the KPU and Bawaslu Banggai. Head of the Banggai Police OMB Public Relations Task Force IPTU Al Amin S Muda said that this security was aimed at preventing security disturbances which were part of the Police for the community in the Tinombala OMB. "The process of assembling the 500 ballot boxes ran safely and smooth. "Furthermore, the police will continue to guard and secure the ballot boxes along with other election logistics at the KPU until they are distributed," concluded Amin. Security activities also involved the TNI and Banggai KPU internal security as well as 7 security personnel at the important Logistics Warehouse object post. (*)

title: Dede Rosidah Pimpin ASIAFI Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Asosiasi Instruktur Aeorobik dan Fitnes Indonesia (ASIAFI) Kabupaten Banggai yang merupakan wadah dalam membina dan mengembangkan kemampuan para instruktur aerobik dan fitnes resmi terbentuk.Pengurus ASIAFI Kabupaten Banggai Periode 2024-2028 yang diketuai oleh Hj. Dede Rosidah Amirudin, resmi dilantik oleh Ketua ASIAFI Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah Diah Puspita, Jumat (19/1/2024) di Luwuk.Sebelum prosesi pelantikan di awali dengan pembacaan Surat Keputusan Pembentukan Pengurus ASIAFI Banggai masa bakti 2024-2028, dan dilanjutkan dengan penyerahan bendera pataka dari Ketua ASIAFI Provinsi Sulteng kepada Ketua ASIAFI Kabupaten Banggai.Ketua ASIAFI Sulteng Diah Puspita dalam sambutannya menyampaikan apresiasinya kepada Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai yang aktif mendorong terbentuknya organisasi tersebut di tingkat kabupaten. ASIAFI Banggai menurutnya, menjadi asosiasi kelima yang terbentuk di Sulawesi Tengah. Ia berharap di seluruh kabupaten di Sulawesi Tengah bisa terbentuk asosiasinya, sekaligua meminta Pengurus ASIAFI Banggai aktif mensosialisasikan olahraga aerobik dan fitnes ke masyarakat.Bupati Banggai Amirudin dalam sambutannya, memberikan apresiasi kepada ASIAFI Sulteng yang telah berupaya mengembangkan olahraga aerobik dan fitnes di Banggai melalui satu wadah bersama.“Dengan adanya asosiasi ini, kita harapkan bahwa semua masyarakat semakin rajin berolahraga khususnya senam dan fitnes. Selamat kepada pengurus yang baru dilantik, selamat menjalankan program kerjanya, semoga senam aerobik dan fitnes makin dicintai oleh masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai,” tutup Bupati Amirudin.Sementara itu, Wakil Gubernur Sulawesi Tengah H. Ma’mun Amir yang membacakan sambutan tertulis Gubernur Sulteng, meminta ASIAFI dan seluruh organisasi olahraga melakukan seleksi ketat dalam mencari atlet-atlet terbaik yang akan berkompetisi di tingkat nasional. “InsyaAllah, di PON (Pekan Olahraha Nasional) nanti, target bapak gubernur itu 10 medali emas,” kata wagub.Ma’mun menilai, ASIAFI memiliki peran strategis dalam membantu meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat akan pentingnya gaya hidup sehat melalui kegiatan aerobik dan fitnes.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The Association of Indonesian Aerobics and Fitness Instructors (ASIAFI) Banggai Regency, which is a forum for developing and developing the abilities of aerobics and fitness instructors, was officially formed. The ASIAFI Management of Banggai Regency for the 2024-2028 period, chaired by Hj. Dede Rosidah Amirudin, was officially inaugurated by the Chair of ASIAFI for Central Sulawesi Province, Diah Puspita, Friday (19/1/2024) in Luwuk. Before the inauguration procession began with the reading of the Decree on the Formation of ASIAFI Banggai Management for the 2024-2028 term of office, and continued with the presentation of the flag Pataka from the Chair of ASIAFI for Central Sulawesi Province to the Chair of ASIAFI for Banggai Regency. Chair of ASIAFI for Central Sulawesi Diah Puspita in her speech expressed her appreciation to the Banggai Regency Government for actively encouraging the formation of this organization at the district level. According to him, ASIAFI Banggai is the fifth association formed in Central Sulawesi. He hopes that associations can be formed in all districts in Central Sulawesi, and at the same time asks the ASIAFI Banggai Management to actively promote aerobics and fitness sports to the community. Banggai Regent Amirudin, in his speech, expressed his appreciation to ASIAFI Central Sulawesi for making efforts to develop aerobics and fitness sports in Banggai through one platform. together. "With this association, we hope that all people will be more diligent in exercising, especially gymnastics and fitness. "Congratulations to the newly appointed administrators, congratulations on carrying out their work program, hopefully aerobics and fitness will be increasingly loved by the people of Banggai Regency," concluded Regent Amirudin. Meanwhile, Deputy Governor of Central Sulawesi H. Ma'mun Amir, who read the written remarks of the Governor of Central Sulawesi, asked ASIAFI and all sports organizations carry out strict selections to find the best athletes who will compete at the national level. "God willing, at PON (National Sports Week), the governor's target is 10 gold medals," said the deputy governor. Ma'mun assessed that ASIAFI has a strategic role in helping to increase public awareness of the importance of a healthy lifestyle through aerobic and fitness activities.* *

title: Hari Ini, Jenazah Korban Penembakan KKB Papua Briptu Alfandi Diterbangkan ke Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Minggu hari ini 21 Januari 2024, jenazah korban penembakan kelompok kriminal bersenjata (KKB) Papua akan diterbangkan ke Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai.Jenazah akan diterbangkan dari Makassar ke Luwuk pada Pukul 11.00 WITA. Nantinya jenazah akan dibawa ke rumah duka Jalan Gunung Colo Nomor 10, RT 1, RW 2, Kelurahan Mangkio Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk.Hal itu diungkapkan Kasi Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S Muda kepada para wartawan melalui grup WhatsApp, Minggu pagi 21 Januari 2024.“INFO UTK REKAN REKAN, RENCANA KEDATANGAN JENAZAH ALMARHUM BRIPTU ANUMERTA ALFANDO STEVE KARAMOY, ANGGOTA PELETON III KOMPI IV YON C RESIMEN PAS PELOPOR KORPS BRIMOB POLRI, HARI INI MINGGU 21 JANUARI 2024 SEKITAR JAM 11.00 DARI MAKASSAR – LWK, FLIGHT PERTAMA,” tulis Kasi Humas Iptu Al Amin S Muda.Sebelumnya, diberitakan Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) kembali berulah di awal Tahun 2024. Aksi tersebut dilakukan di Kabupaten Intan Jaya pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII).Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan 1 Personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan dan gugur.Menanggapi hal tersebut Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, S.H., M.H., M.M menerangkan bahwa Personel yang terkena luka tembak telah dievakuasi dan dilakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter Piter bahwa personel tersebut dinyatakan gugur.“Anggota Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan dan mengakibatkan anggota gugur,” ujar Bayu SusenoLebih lanjut, Bayu menyampaikan bahwa anggota Ops Damai Cartenz yang berada di wilayah tersebut mengalami serangan dari KKB selama 30 menit dari arah belakang pos.“Kami saat ini masih melakukan penyisiran terhadap pergerakan KKB di Wilayah Intan Jaya,” ujar Bayu SusenoKaops Damai Cartenz KBP Dr Faizal Ramadhani menegaskan bahwa Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata tersebut akan dicari keberadaannya dan akan diproses sesuai dengan Hukum yang berlaku.“Saat ini pasukan kami masih melakukan pengejaran dan penyisiran di sekitar TKP” pungkas Faizal. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Today Sunday, January 21 2024, the bodies of victims of the shooting by the Papuan armed criminal group (KKB) will be flown to Luwuk City, Banggai Regency. The bodies will be flown from Makassar to Luwuk at 11.00 WITA. Later the body will be taken to the funeral home at Jalan Gunung Colo Number 10, RT 1, RW 2, Mangkio Baru Village, Luwuk District. This was revealed by the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S Muda to journalists via the WhatsApp group, Sunday morning 21 January 2024. "INFO FOR COLLECTORS, PLANS FOR THE ARRIVAL OF THE BODY OF THE LATE BRIPTU ANUMERTA ALFANDO STEVE KARAMOY, MEMBER OF PLATEON III COMPANY IV YON C REGIMENT PAS PIONEER OF BRIMOB POLRI CORPS, TODAY, SUNDAY 21 JANUARY 2024 AROUND 11.00 FROM MAKASSAR – LWK, FLIGHT PER TAMA," wrote the Head of Public Relations Inspector Al Amin S Muda. Previously, it was reported that the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) was acting up again in early 2024. This action was carried out in Intan Jaya Regency led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from the KKB is thought to have come from behind the BTS Tower Telkomsel, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency which resulted in 1 Cartenz Peace Operations Personnel being shot and killed. Responding to this, the Head of the Cartenz Peace Ops Public Relations Task Force AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, S.H., M.H., M.M explained that the personnel who suffered gunshot wounds had been evacuated and given first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center, but Doctor Piter said that the personnel had been declared dead. "Member Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy was shot in the left jaw through the right jaw. and resulted in the member's death," said Bayu Suseno. Furthermore, Bayu said that members of Ops Damai Cartenz who were in the area experienced attacks from the KKB for 30 minutes from behind the post. "We are currently still conducting searches on the KKB's movements in the Intan Jaya area, " said Bayu Suseno, Kaops Damai Cartenz KBP Dr Faizal Ramadhani emphasized that the whereabouts of the Armed Criminal Group will be sought and will be processed in accordance with applicable law. "Currently our troops are still pursuing and sweeping around the crime scene," concluded Faizal. (*)

title: Kampanye Terbuka Perdana di Banggai, Golkar Gelar Roadshow dan Pertemuan di Kilongan
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Kampanye terbuka hari pertama pada Minggu (21/1/2024) di Kabupaten Banggai, khususnya di Dapil 1, langsung dimanfaatkan Partai Golkar dengan menggelar roadshow dan pertemuan terbuka di Lapangan Kilongan Kecamatan Luwuk Utara.Pada kampanye yang dihadiri ratusan warga Luwuk Utara itu, Ketua DPD Partai Golkar Banggai Beniyanto Tamoreka memperkenalkan seluruh caleg Dapil Banggai 1.Ia juga menjanjikan bahwa bila Golkar menang, rakyat akan sejahtera. Beniyanto yang mengaku sebagai anak daerah berharap dukungan warga Kabupaten Banggai agar memilihnya ke DPR RI.“Tanggal 14 Februari nanti, pilih Partai Golkar, agar menang dan rakyat sejahtera,” kata Beniyanto.Pada kesempatan itu, sejumlah caleg seperti Agus Damalante dan Roswati Masi serta Lely Tiara juga berkampanye dan mengajak rakyat memilih mereka. DAR
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The first day of the open campaign on Sunday (21/1/2024) in Banggai Regency, especially in Dapil 1, was immediately utilized by the Golkar Party by holding a roadshow and open meeting at Kilongan Square, North Luwuk District. The campaign was attended by hundreds of North Luwuk residents Meanwhile, Chairman of the Banggai Golkar Party DPD, Beniyanto Tamoreka, introduced all the candidates for the Banggai 1 electoral district. He also promised that if Golkar wins, the people will be prosperous. Beniyanto, who claims to be a regional child, hopes for the support of the residents of Banggai Regency to elect him to the DPR RI. "On February 14, vote for the Golkar Party, so that they win and the people prosper," said Beniyanto. On that occasion, a number of legislative candidates such as Agus Damalante and Roswati Masi and Lely Tiara also campaigned and invited people to vote for them. DAR

title: Fun Walk Meriahkan Hari Bhakti Imigrasi Ke-74 di Kabupaten Banggai, Transformasi Digital dan Kesehatan Jadi Sorotan
text: KABAR LUWUK –Fun WalkMeriahkan Hari Bhakti Imigrasi Ke-74 diKabupaten Banggai, Transformasi Digital dan Kesehatan Jadi Sorotan,Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Banggaisukses menyelenggarakan kegiatanFun Walkyang menghiasi halaman kantor diKomplek Halimun,Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, pada Minggu pagi, 21 Januari 2024. Acara ini menjadi bagian dari rangkaian perayaanHari Bhakti Imigrasi (HBI) Ke-74 tahun 2024.Fun Walk diikuti oleh berbagai pejabat tinggi, antara lain Irjen Kemenkumham, Kakanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng, Bupati Banggai, Forkopimda Kabupaten Banggai, Kepala Itwil Kemenkumham, Para UPT Kemenkumham Sulteng, Kepala Divisi, dan seluruh staf Kantor Imigrasi Banggai. Rute sepanjang 5 kilometer melibatkan komplek Halimun, melewati depan kantor Bupati Banggai, hingga kembali ke kantor Imigrasi.Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Banggai, Octaveri, menjelaskan bahwa Fun Walk ini menjadi bentuk semangat kolektif dalam membangun dan mengembangkan keimigrasian.Tujuan utama kegiatan ini adalah mempererat silaturahmi, meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap peran keimigrasian di Indonesia, serta mensosialisasikan pentingnya transformasi digital dalam pelayanan keimigrasian.Octaveri menambahkan, “Kegiatan ini juga untuk mensosialisasikan pentingnya transformasi digital dalam pelayanan keimigrasian dituntut sebagai respon tuntutan jaman dan teknologi.” Dia berharap Fun Walk tidak hanya menjadi kegiatan olahraga, tetapi juga sebagai medium untuk menyebarkan informasi tentang inovasi dan kemajuan di bidang keimigrasian.Ir. Razilu, M.Sc, Inspektur Jenderal Kementrian Hukum dan Ham, memberikan sambutan antusias, menyatakan bahwa acara tersebut merupakan bagian dari inovasi bersama. Acara meriah ini mencerminkan semangat baru di era globalisasi saat ini. “Imigrasi akan terus berinovasi, mewujudkan pelayanan berbasis digital di lingkungan Imigrasi,” ungkapnya.Fun Walk diharapkan dapat menjadi penyegaran bagi seluruh jajaran, meningkatkan jalinan kebersamaan, dan memperkuat persaudaraan di antara keluarga besar Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah. Dengan demikian, di tengah transformasi digital, kesehatan dan kebersamaan tetap menjadi fokus utama.Ir. Razilu, M.Sc menyatakan kegembiraannya atas kesuksesan acara tersebut. Ia menekankan bahwa Fun Walk bukan hanya sebagai kegiatan rekreasi semata, tetapi juga sebagai langkah positif dalam memperkuat sinergi antarinstansi dan melibatkan masyarakat secara langsung.Selain itu, kegiatan Fun Walk ini juga menjadi wujud kepedulian terhadap kesehatan masyarakat di era digital. Melalui acara ini, para peserta diingatkan akan pentingnya menjaga kesehatan dalam kehidupan sehari-hari, terutama di tengah perkembangan teknologi yang begitu pesat.Sebagai bagian dari perayaan Hari Bhakti Imigrasi, kegiatan ini memberikan dampak positif yang lebih luas. Dengan melibatkan masyarakat secara langsung, diharapkan kesadaran dan pemahaman mengenai peran keimigrasian akan semakin meningkat.Transformasi digital yang diusung juga diharapkan dapat memberikan manfaat yang signifikan dalam mempermudah prosedur dan memperkuat sistem pengawasan di bidang keimigrasian.Fun Walk di Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Banggai tidak hanya menjadi momen bersejarah dalam perayaan HBI Ke-74, tetapi juga menciptakan momentum positif bagi semua pihak yang terlibat.Semangat kebersamaan, kesehatan, dan inovasi dalam pelayanan publik menjadi nilai yang diusung, menjadikan acara ini sebagai contoh positif untuk kegiatan serupa di masa depan.( MAM) **
text_en: LUWUK KABAR – Fun Walk Celebrating the 74th Immigration Service Day in Banggai Regency, Digital Transformation and Health are in the Spotlight, the Class II Non TPI Banggais Immigration Office successfully held a Fun Walk activity which decorated the office yard in the Halimun Complex, South Luwuk District, on Sunday morning, January 21 2024. Event This is part of a series of celebrations for the 74th Immigration Service Day (HBI) in 2024. The Fun Walk was attended by various high-ranking officials, including the Inspector General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, the Regional Head of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of Central Sulawesi, the Regent of Banggai, the Forkopimda of Banggai Regency, the Head of the Itwil of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, the UPT of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of Central Sulawesi, Head of Division, and all Banggai Immigration Office staff. The 5 kilometer route involves the Halimun complex, passes in front of the Banggai Regent's office, and returns to the Immigration office. Head of the Class II Non TPI Banggai Immigration Office, Octaveri, explained that this Fun Walk is a form of collective spirit in building and developing immigration. The main aim of this activity is to strengthen relationships, increase public awareness of the role of immigration in Indonesia, and socialize the importance of digital transformation in immigration services. Octaveri added, "This activity is also to socialize the importance of digital transformation in immigration services which is required as a response to the demands of the times and technology." He hopes that the Fun Walk will not only become a sports activity, but also as a medium for disseminating information about innovation and progress in the immigration sector. Ir. Razilu, M.Sc, Inspector General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, gave an enthusiastic welcome, stating that the event was part of joint innovation. This festive event reflects the new spirit in the current era of globalization. "Immigration will continue to innovate, realizing digital-based services in the Immigration environment," he said. It is hoped that the Fun Walk can be refreshing for all levels, increase ties of togetherness, and strengthen brotherhood among the extended family of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Central Sulawesi. Thus, in the midst of digital transformation, health and togetherness remain the main focus. Ir. Razilu, M.Sc expressed his joy at the success of the event. He emphasized that Fun Walk is not only a recreational activity, but also a positive step in strengthening synergy between agencies and involving the community directly. Apart from that, this Fun Walk activity is also a form of concern for public health in the digital era. Through this event, participants were reminded of the importance of maintaining health in everyday life, especially in the midst of rapid technological developments. As part of the Immigration Service Day celebration, this activity had a wider positive impact. By involving the community directly, it is hoped that awareness and understanding of the role of immigration will increase. The digital transformation being promoted is also expected to provide significant benefits in simplifying procedures and strengthening the supervision system in the immigration sector. Fun Walk at the Class II Non TPI Banggai Immigration Office no only being a historic moment in the celebration of the 74th HBI, but also creating positive momentum for all parties involved. The spirit of togetherness, health and innovation in public services are the values ​​promoted, making this event a positive example for similar activities in the future. (MAM) **

title: Bripka Arfandi, Personil Polres Banggai Jadi Wasit Piala Soeratin U-17 di Surabaya
text: Polresbanggai.com–kapolres banggaiAKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM menerima surat dari Pengurus Persatuan Sepak Bola Seluruh Indonesia (PSSI) terkait izin salah satu anggotanya untuk jadi wasit pada kompetisi Piala Soeratin U-17 di Jawa Timur.Izin tersebut diberikan kepada Bripka Arfandi Abdullah, selaku personel yang bertugas di Bagian SDMpolres banggai.“Bripka Arfandi ditunjuk jadi wasit Piala Soeratin U-17, yang di gelar di Kota Surabaya, 20 Januari hingga 3 Februari 2024,” kata Kasi Humas Polres Banggai IPTU Al Amin S. Muda dalam keterangannya, Minggu (21/1/2024).Pada pertandingan perdana kemarin Sabtu (20/1/2024) bertempat di lapangan TOR Surabaya, Ia sukses memimpin jalannya pertandingan yang mempertemukan Provinsi Jambi melawan Provinsi Sulawesi Utara.Olahraga sepakbola bukan hal baru bagi Bripka Arfandi. Ia sudah mengenal sepakbola semenjak kecil. Bagaimana tidak, dari lingkungan keluarga sampai orang-orang disekitarnya bergelut dengan olahraga ini.Diketahui Bripka Arfandi memulai karir sebagai wasit nasional PSSI berlisensi C1 pada tahun 2018 dan beberapa event penting sudah dipercayakan kepadanya.Pada tahun 2019 lalu, ia dipilih secara langsung oleh PSSI Pusat untuk bertugas sebagai wasit di Liga satu antara PSM Makassar versus Persebaya Surabaya di Biak Papua*Humas Polres Banggai
text_en: Polresbanggai.com–Kapolres Panggang AKBP Ade Nuramdani, SH, SIK, MM received a letter from the Management of the All Indonesian Football Association (PSSI) regarding permission for one of its members to be a referee in the U-17 Soeratin Cup competition in East Java. This permission was given to Bripka Arfandi Abdullah, as personnel on duty in the HR Department of the Police, was proud. "Bripka Arfandi was appointed as the referee for the U-17 Soeratin Cup, which was held in the city of Surabaya, January 20 to February 3 2024," said the Head of Public Relations of the Banggai IPTU Police, Al Amin S. Muda. in his statement, Sunday (21/1/2024). In the inaugural match last Saturday (20/1/2024) at the TOR Surabaya field, he successfully led the match between Jambi Province and North Sulawesi Province. The sport of football is nothing new for Bripka Arfandi. He has known football since childhood. How could it not be, from the family environment to the people around him are involved in this sport. It is known that Bripka Arfandi started his career as a PSSI national referee with a C1 license in 2018 and several important events have been entrusted to him. In 2019, he was directly selected by the Central PSSI to serve as a referee in League One between PSM Makassar versus Persebaya Surabaya in Biak Papua* Banggai Police Public Relations

title: Irjen Kemenkum Ham, Bupati Banggai Ikut Fun Walk Hari Bhakti Imigrasi Ke 74
text: Terasbanggai.com -Irjen Kemenkum HAM RI Razilu bersama Bupati Banggai Amirudin serta jajaran Kanwil Kemenkum HAM Sulteng dan pejabat perangkat daerah di lingkungan Pemkab Banggai mengikuti jalan santai (Fun Walk), Minggu (21/1/2024). Kegiatan yang digelar Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Banggai, mengambil start dan finish di halaman Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TP itu juga diikuti ratusan peserta dari berbagai kalangan. Irjen Kemenkum HAM RI Razilu berharap kegiatan tersebut menjadi bentuk penyegaran bagi seluruh jajaran, serta meningkatkan jalinan kebersamaan dan memperkuat persaudaraan di antara keluarga besar Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah. “Fun Walk bukan hanya sebagai kegiatan rekreasi semata, tetapi juga sebagai langkah positif dalam memperkuat sinergi antarinstansi dan melibatkan masyarakat secara langsung,” ujar Razilu. Melalui transformasi digital yang diusung Kantor Imigrasi, diharapkan dapat memberikan manfaat yang signifikan dalam mempermudah prosedur dan memperkuat sistem pengawasan di bidang keimigrasian. “Imigrasi akan terus berinovasi, mewujudkan pelayanan berbasis digital di lingkungan Imigrasi,” ujarnya. Hari Bhakti Imigrasi yang diperingati setiap 26 Januari menjadi momen untuk mengenang sejarah panjang perjalanan pembentukan lembaga keimigrasian di Indonesia. text_en: Terasbanggai.com - Inspector General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia Razilu together with the Regent of Banggai Amirudin as well as the ranks of the Central Sulawesi Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights and regional officials within the Banggai Regency Government took part in a fun walk, Sunday (21/1/2024). The activity, which was held by the Class II Non-TPI Banggai Immigration Office, started and finished in the courtyard of the Class II Non-TP Immigration Office, and was also attended by hundreds of participants from various circles. Inspector General of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Razilu, hopes that this activity will be a form of refreshment for all levels, as well as increasing ties of togetherness and strengthening brotherhood among the extended family of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Central Sulawesi. "Fun Walk is not only a recreational activity, but also a positive step in strengthening synergy between agencies and involving the community directly," said Razilu. Through the digital transformation carried out by the Immigration Office, it is hoped that it can provide significant benefits in simplifying procedures and strengthening the supervision system in the immigration sector. "Immigration will continue to innovate, realizing digital-based services in the Immigration environment," he said. Immigration Service Day, which is celebrated every January 26, is a moment to remember the long history of the establishment of immigration institutions in Indonesia.
