title: Banggai Kepulauan kembangkan jagung varietas khas daerah
text: Palu (ANTARA) - Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai Kepulauan (Bangkep), Sulawesi Tengah, mengembangkan budi daya tanaman jagung menggunakan varietas khas daerah yaitu Bangkep G01 untuk pemenuhan kebutuhan pangan masyarakat. "Penggunaan varietas unggul khas daerah sebagai pendekatan dalam pemenuhan kebutuhan masyarakat akan bibit jagung," kata Penjabat (Pj) Bupati Banggai Kepulauan Ihsan Basir, dihubungi dari Palu, Minggu. Ia mengemukakan, penggunaan varietas unggul khas daerah dalam pengembangan jagung, juga menjadi upaya untuk memutus  ketergantungan petani pada benih impor. Varietas unggul Bangkep G01, kata dia, telah dilakukan uji coba penanaman dan pengembangan melibatkan PT Delta Anugrah Subur Sejahtera, perusahaan ini melakukan pengembangan jagung varietas unggul daerah di Desa Ponding-Ponding, Kecamatan Tinangkung Utara. "Telah dilakukan panen melibatkan Forkompimda dan masyarakat petani. Melalui panen tersebut petani melihat langsung keunggulan varietas ini, " ujarnya. Jagung varietas unggul Bangkep G01 dapat bertahan terhadap cuaca panas dan musim kemarau panjang, sehingga petani dapat lebih muda melakukan pengembangan jagung. "Kami mengapresiasi kontribusi perusahaan ikut mengembangkan sektor pertanian Banggai Kepulauan, khususnya komoditas jagung," kata Ihsan. Ia menjelaskan,  jagung adalah salah satu komoditas andalan nasional yang potensial untuk mempertahankan ketahanan pangan untuk mewujudkan kemandirian pangan maupun meningkatkan pendapatan petani. Oleh karena itu, ia mengajak  semua pihak bersama-sama menyukseskan pembangunan  sektor pertanian, dan pemberdayaan masyarakat melalui advokasi pengembangan jagung varietas Bangkep G01 yang berorientasi agribisnis. "Kepada para petani saya berharap lebih giat lagi dan serius membudidayakan jagung, supaya produktivitas dapat meningkat," kata dia.
text_en: Palu (ANTARA) - The Banggai Islands (Bangkep) Regency Government, Central Sulawesi, is developing corn cultivation using a regional specialty variety, namely Bangkep G01, to meet the community's food needs. "The use of superior regional varieties is an approach to meeting the community's need for corn seeds," said Acting Regent of the Banggai Islands Ihsan Basir, contacted from Palu, Sunday. He stated that the use of superior regional varieties in corn development is also an effort to break farmers' dependence on imported seeds. He said that for the superior variety Bangkep G01, planting and development trials had been carried out involving PT Delta Anugrah Subur Sejahtera, this company is developing regional superior varieties of corn in Ponding-Ponding Village, North Tinangkung District. "Harvesting has been carried out involving Forkompimda and the farming community. Through this harvest, farmers can see firsthand the superiority of this variety," he said. The superior Bangkep G01 corn variety can withstand hot weather and long dry seasons, so farmers can develop corn more easily. "We appreciate the company's contribution to developing the Banggai Islands agricultural sector, especially corn commodities," said Ihsan. He explained,  corn is one of the national mainstay commodities with the potential to maintain food security to realize food independence and increase farmers' income. Therefore, he invited all parties to work together to make the development of the agricultural sector a success and empower the community through advocacy for the development of the agribusiness-oriented Bangkep G01 corn variety. "I hope that the farmers will be more active and serious about cultivating corn, so that productivity can increase," he said.

title: Dilepas Irjen Razilu, Kemenkumham Sulteng Semarakkan HBI Ke-74 Dengan Fun Walk Di Kota Luwuk
text: KABAR LUWUK  –Dilepas Irjen Razilu, Kemenkumham Sulteng SemarakkanHBI Ke-74DenganFun WalkDi Kota Luwuk.Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia Sulawesi Tengah(Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng) semarakkan Hari Bhakti Imigrasi (HBI) Ke-74 tahun 2024 dengan menggelar Fun Walk yang dipusatkan di Kota Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai. Minggu, (21/1/2024).Dipusatkan diKantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Banggai, kegiatan tersebut dilepas secara resmi olehInspektur Jenderal (Irjen) Kemenkumham, Razilubersama Kepala Kantor Wilayah (Kakanwil) Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah, Hermansyah Siregar.Tidak hanya dihadiri oleh internal jajaran Kemenkumham Sulteng seperti para Kepala Divisi, Pejabat Administrator serta seluruh Kepala Satuan Kerja Pemasyarakatan dan Keimigrasian se-Sulteng, kegiatan tersebut bertambah istimewa dengan kehadiran Bupati Kabupaten Banggai, Amiruddin Tamoreka serta berbagai unsur Forum Komunikasi Pimpinan Daerah (Forkopimda) dan berbagai kelompok masyarakat setempat.Kepala Kanim Banggai, Octaveri selaku Ketua Panitia Fun Walk menyebut, bahwa Fun Walk tersebut diinisiasi guna memeriahkan peringatan HBI Ke-74 yang puncaknya pada tanggal 26 Januari mendatang.“Kita mau peringatan HBI ini memberi makna yang baik, dari sisi peningkatan pelayanan, sosial kemasyarakatan hingga sinergitas kita dengan pemerintah daerah,” katanya.Berbagai kegiatan lain, seperti pelayanan paspor simpatik, senam bersama, bakti sosial, hingga donor darah akan dilaksanakan selama bulan Januari 2024.Berbeda dari sebelumnya, kegiatan Fun Walk  tersebut bertambah istimewa dengan kehadiran Irjen Razilu bersama Bupati Amiruddin Tamoreka, Kakanwil Hermansyah mengaku hal tersebut menjadi suatu kesyukurannya.Dan menjadi momentum untuk menguatkan kolaborasi bersama untuk menghadirkan pelayanan publik khususnya keimigrasian yang lebih baik lagi.“Sangat bahagia yaa, kita bisa bersama-sama jalan sehat dengan penuh keceriaan ini. Semoga saja makin mempererat sinergitas antar kita sesama,” harapnya.Dengan jarak tempuh 1.1 kilometer, rute fun walk tersebut menyuguhkan pemandangan kota Luwuk yang dikenal sebagai Kota Berair, suasana udara yang asri menambah kehangatan seluruh peserta.“Kita harus mensyukuri setiap nikmat yang diberikan oleh Tuhan yang maha esa, dan salah satu caranya adalah menjaga kesehatan kita dengan baik. Tentu, sangat bersyukur bisa menyemarakkan HBI dengan jalan sehat bersama-sama,” pesan Irjen. Razilu.Ia pun mengajak kepada seluruh jajaran keimigrasian di Sulawesi Tengah untuk menjadikan momentum HBI untuk meningkatkan kinerja, memberikan pelayanan yang lebih baik, mengoptimalkan peran pengawasan, serta menguatkan sinergitas bersama.“Kita harus lebih baik lagi, memberikan pelayanan keimigrasian yang lebih berdampak lagi,” imbuhnya.Dari kegiatan fun walk tersebut, maka berakhir pula kunjungan kerja Irjen Razil di Kota Luwuk yang telah dilaksanakan selama 4 hari.Razilu mengucapkan terima kasih kepada seluruh jajarannya serta Bupati dan Forkopimda lainnya.Ia berpesan bahwa dalam penunaian tugas mesti dilaksanakan dengan penuh tanggung jawab yang berintegritas tinggi. “Integritas dalam menjalankan amanah tugas harus terus ditingkatkan. Kita harus memastikan pelayanan kepada masyarakat benar-benar bermanfaat, tepat sasaran dan berdampak baik untuk kemajuan bangsa kita,” tutupnya. ( humas Kanwil) **
text_en: LUWUK NEWS – Released by Inspector General Razilu, the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Celebrates the 74th HBI with a Fun Walk in Luwuk City. The Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Central Sulawesi (Kanwil Kemenkumham, Central Sulawesi) enlivens the 74th Immigration Service Day (HBI) in 2024 by holding a focused Fun Walk in Luwuk City, Banggai Regency. Sunday, (21/1/2024). Centered at the Class II Non TPI Banggai Immigration Office, this activity was officially launched by the Inspector General (Irjen) of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Raziluber together with the Head of the Regional Office (Kakanwil) of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi, Hermansyah Siregar. It was not only attended by internal The ranks of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights, such as Division Heads, Administrator Officers and all Heads of Correctional and Immigration Work Units throughout Central Sulawesi, this activity was made even more special by the presence of the Regent of Banggai Regency, Amiruddin Tamoreka as well as various elements of the Regional Leadership Communication Forum (Forkopimda) and various local community groups. Head of Kanim Banggai, Octaveri, as Chair of the Fun Walk Committee, said that the Fun Walk was initiated to enliven the 74th HBI commemoration which will culminate on January 26. "We want this HBI commemoration to give a good meaning, in terms of improving services, social to our synergy with the regional government," he said. Various other activities, such as sympathetic passport services, joint exercise, social service, and blood donation will be held during January 2024. Different from before, the Fun Walk activity is made even more special by the presence of Inspector General Razilu together with Regent Amiruddin Tamoreka, Kakanwil Hermansyah, admitted that this was something he was grateful for. And it was a momentum to strengthen joint collaboration to provide better public services, especially immigration. "We are very happy, we can walk together on this healthy and cheerful path. "Hopefully we will strengthen the synergy between us," he hoped. With a distance of 1.1 kilometers, the fun walk route offers views of the city of Luwuk, which is known as the Water City, the beautiful air atmosphere adds to the warmth of all participants. "We must be grateful for every blessing given by God is Almighty, and one way is to take good care of our health. "Of course, we are very grateful to be able to enliven HBI by taking a healthy walk together," said the Inspector General. Razilu.He also invited all levels of immigration in Central Sulawesi to use HBI's momentum to improve performance, provide better services, optimize the role of supervision, and strengthen joint synergy. "We have to be even better, provide immigration services that are even more impactful, " he added. From this fun walk activity, the working visit of Inspector General Razil in Luwuk City which was carried out for 4 days ended. Razilu expressed his thanks to all his staff as well as the Regent and other Forkopimda. He advised that in carrying out his duties they must be carried out with full responsibility answer with high integrity. “Integrity in carrying out our mandate must continue to be improved. "We must ensure that services to the community are truly useful, right on target and have a good impact on the progress of our nation," he concluded. (Regional Office public relations) **

title: Iman Pampawa Ajak Warga Banggai Menangkan Golkar Kabupaten sampai Pusat
text: .BANGGAI RAYA-Iman Pampawa, caleg DPRD Banggai dari Partai Golkar nomor urut 8 di Dapil Banggai 1 mengajak agar semua warga memenangkan Partai Golkar dengan memilih caleg partai beringin dari kabupaten sampai pusat. Hal itu ia sampaikan dalam kampanye terbuka di lapangan Kayutanyo, Kecamatan Luwuk Timur, Minggu (21/1/2024).Sebagai caleg DPRD Banggai, ia mengatakan bahwa mereka telah berbuat untuk rakyat jauh sebelum pemilu. Karenanya, kader yang ditawarkan Golar adalah kader-kader terbaik. “Selama ini kami telah memberi perhatian pada warga, termasuk di Luwuk Timur, jauh sebelum proses pemilu dan akhirnya menjadi caleg,” kata Iman Pampawa di hadapan warga Luwuk Timur.Ketika diberi kepercayaan kelak kata dia, maka aspirasi dan harapan rakyat akan menjadi amanah yang harus dilaksanakan. “Apa yang kami akan lakukan setelah nanti terpilih, tentu akan jauh lebih banyak lagi, dengan harapan bisa mendorong kesejahteraan rakyat, khususnya di Luwuk Timur. Infrastruktur di sejumlah desa yang masih minim, tentu menjadi sesuatu yang wajib kami perjuangkan,” tandasnya.Sementara Beniyanto Tamoreka, ketua DPD Partai Golkar juga menyebutkan bahwa Iman Pampawa adalah kader Luwuk Timur yang telah banyak berbuat. “Apalagi dia adakah pengusaha batu pecah, sehingga dia bisa diharap membantu masyarakat,” kata Beniyanto.Kepada warga di Luwuk Timur kata Beniyanto, silakan jatuhkan pilihan pada kader Golkar, karena yang ditawarkan partai ini adalah orang-orang terbaik.Kampanye di Luwuk Timur itu dihadiri ratusan warga dan berlangsung dalam suasana tertib. DAR
text_en: .BANGGAI RAYA-Iman Pampawa, Banggai DPRD candidate from the Golkar Party number 8 in the Banggai 1 electoral district, invites all residents to win the Golkar Party by voting for Banyan party legislative candidates from the district to the center. He conveyed this in an open campaign at Kayutanyo field, East Luwuk District, Sunday (21/1/2024). As a candidate for the Banggai DPRD, he said that they had done something for the people long before the election. Therefore, the cadres offered by Golar are the best cadres. "So far we have paid attention to the residents, including in East Luwuk, long before the election process and finally became legislative candidates," said Iman Pampawa in front of the residents of East Luwuk. When he is given trust, he said, the people's aspirations and hopes will become a trustworthy must be implemented. "What we will do after being elected will of course be much more, with the hope of encouraging people's welfare, especially in East Luwuk. "Infrastructure in a number of villages is still minimal, which is certainly something we have to fight for," he stressed. Meanwhile, Beniyanto Tamoreka, chairman of the Golkar Party DPD, also mentioned that Iman Pampawa is an East Luwuk cadre who has done a lot. "Moreover, he is a crushed stone entrepreneur, so he can be expected to help the community," said Beniyanto. To the residents of East Luwuk, Beniyanto said, please make your choice on Golkar cadres, because what this party has to offer are the best people. The campaign in East Luwuk It was attended by hundreds of residents and took place in an orderly atmosphere. DAR

title: Kampanye di Luwuk Timur, Ketua DPD Partai Golkar Banggai Perkenalkan Seluruh Caleg
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Setelah menggelar kampanye di Kelurahan Kilongan Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, Partai Golkar Banggai melanjutkan kampanye terbuka di Desa Kayutanyo Kecamatan Luwuk Timur, Minggu (21/1/2024).Di hadapan ratusan warga, Ketua DPD Partai Golkar Banggai Beniyanto Tamoreka memperkenalkan caleg partai beringin di Pemilu 2024. Di Dapil Banggai 1 yang merupakan titik pelaksanaan kampanye terbuka itu, Beniyanto menyebut antara lain ada nama Saripudin Tjatjo, kemudian Panji Tamoreka, Roswati Masi, Agus Damalante, Lely Tiara dan Iman Pampawa.Untuk caleg DPRD Sulteng, antara lain ada Samsul Bahri Mang dan Merry Tamoreka. Sementara untuk caleg di DPR RI, ada Beniyanto Tamoreka yang juga ketua DPD Partai Golkar Banggai.“Kader yang ditawarkan Golkar adalah orang-orang terbaik dengan reputasi baik dan siap bekerja untuk rakyat. Kalau mereka dipilih, maka akan semakin banyak program pokir untuk masyarakat yang bisa mereka bawa ke wilayahnya,” kata Beniyanto.Karenanya kata dia, di pemilu 14 Februari nanti, datang ke TPS dan coblos caleg Partai Golkar. “Golkar menang, rakyat senang. Golkar menang, rakyat sejahtera,” tandasnya.Kampanye di lapangan Kayutanyo itu dihadiri sekira 200 massa dari sejumlah wilayah, termasuk pendukung masing-masing caleg.Kegiatan yang dimulai sekira pukul 15.00-16.30 itu berjalan tertib di bawah pengawasan petugas dari Bawaslu, kepolisian dan TNI. DAR
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-After holding a campaign in Kilongan Village, North Luwuk District, the Golkar Banggai Party continued its open campaign in Kayutanyo Village, East Luwuk District, Sunday (21/1/2024). In front of hundreds of residents, the Chairman of the Banggai Golkar Party DPD Beniyanto Tamoreka introduced the party's legislative candidates. wants to be in the 2024 elections. In the Banggai 1 electoral district, which is the point where the open campaign will be held, Beniyanto said, among others, there are the names Saripudin Tjatjo, then Panji Tamoreka, Roswati Masi, Agus Damalante, Lely Tiara and Iman Pampawa. For the Central Sulawesi DPRD candidates, among others there are Samsul Bahri Mang and Merry Tamoreka. Meanwhile, for legislative candidates in the DPR RI, there is Beniyanto Tamoreka who is also chairman of the Golkar Banggai Party DPD. "The cadres offered by Golkar are the best people with a good reputation and ready to work for the people. "If they are elected, there will be more and more community support programs that they can bring to their region," said Beniyanto. Therefore, he said, in the election on February 14, come to the polling station and vote for the Golkar Party candidate. “Golkar won, the people are happy. "Golkar wins, the people are prosperous," he stressed. The campaign at Kayutanyo field was attended by around 200 people from a number of regions, including supporters of each legislative candidate. . DAR

title: Komunitas Berbagi Sedekah Bagikan Ratusan Nasi Kotak di RSUD Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Komunitas berbagi sedekah melaksanakan Gerakan jumat Berkah yang bertempat di RSUD Luwuk, Jumat (19/01/2024).Dedy Harnez Said biasa disapa om Dedi selaku Koordinator komunitas berbagi sedekah menjelaskan, kegiatan Jumat Berkah yang melibatkan para anggota komunitas berbagi sedekah, kali ini berbagi nasi kotak untuk keluarga penjaga/penunggu pasien di RSUD Luwuk.“Kegiatan start dari jam 06.30 WITA untuk mulai proses pembagian nasi kotak. Sebelum kegiatan berbagi nasi kotak di RSUD Luwuk terlebih dahulu berbagi sedekah di taman sehati samping kantor Telkom yang terletak dijalan Ahmad Yani,” jelas Dedi.Lebih lanjut Koordinator komunitas berbagi sedekah menyampaikan, pembagian nasi kotak dibagikan kepada penunggu pasien di masing-masing ruangan dan para pasien yang berada di RSUD Luwuk.Yang menarik adalah member-member baik baru dan yang lama saling support dalam kegiatan. Dan kegiatan ini berkolaborasi dengan para anggota komunitas berbagi sedekah.“Semangat berbagi ini salah satu tujuan sesuai visi misi maupun nilai dari dari komunitas berbagi sedekah yang harus terus terjaga sebagai wujud kebermanfaatan kita bagi sesama yang rutinitas diadakan seminggu sekali dengan tempat yang berbeda-beda,” pungkasnya. AGK
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The alms sharing community carried out the Blessing Friday Movement which took place at the Luwuk District Hospital, Friday (19/01/2024). This time, we distributed rice boxes to families of patient caretakers/guardians at Luwuk Regional Hospital. "The activity started at 06.30 WITA to begin the process of distributing rice boxes. "Before the activity of sharing rice boxes at the Luwuk Regional Hospital, first share alms in the Sehati Park next to the Telkom office which is located on Jalan Ahmad Yani," explained Dedi. Furthermore, the Alms Sharing Community Coordinator said that the distribution of rice boxes was distributed to patient attendants in each room and the staff. patients at Luwuk Regional Hospital. What is interesting is that members, both new and old, support each other in activities. And this activity collaborates with members of the alms sharing community. "This spirit of sharing is one of the goals in accordance with the vision, mission and values ​​of the alms sharing community which must be maintained as a form of our benefit to others which is routinely held once a week in different places, ” he concluded. AGK

title: Irjen Kemenkumham RI: Kabupaten Banggai Jadi Benchmarking Kekayaan Intelektual
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - Dalam meningkatkan kualitas layanan publik di bidang Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia (HAM), Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia (Kemenkumham) Sulawesi Tengah bersama Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai resmi menandatangani Memorandum of Understanding (MoU). Penandatanganan tersebut dihadiri langsung oleh Inspektur Jenderal Kementerian Hukum han Hak Asasi Manusia Republik Indonesia, Ir. Razilu , Jumat (19/1/2024), di Hotel Swiss Bell Ballroom. “Terima kasih kepada Bupati Banggai secara khusus atas bantuan serta kontribusi dari Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai yang tiada hentinya mendukung Kemenkumham sebagai mitra kerja,” ujar Irjen Razilu. Ucapan apresiasi juga diberikan oleh Bupati Banggai, Amirudin, terhadap terobosan dari Kantor Wilayah Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah yang membuka Agen Layanan Kekayaan Intelektual (KI) di Kabupaten Banggai. Agen Layanan KI sebagai mitra strategis Kemenkumham bersama Pemda Banggai melalui Badan Riset dan Inovasi Daerah (BRIDA) Kabupaten Banggai dalam memberikan informasi dan edukasi kepada masyarakat tentang Kekayaan Intelektual. “Alhamdulillah pada tahun anggaran 2024 ini, telah dialokasikan anggarannya di dalam APBD, Sehingga ke depannya kepengurusan hak kekayaan intelektual yang diajukan oleh masyarakat bersifat gratis, Karena PNPB nya dibayarkan oleh pemerintah daerah Kabupaten Banggai,” ujar Bupati Amirudin. Irjen Kemenkumham RI mengapresiasi inisiatif Banggai yang telah mengalokasikan Anggaran Pendapatan dan Belanja Daerah (APBD) Kabupaten Banggai untuk pendaftaran kekayaan intelektual. “Ini adalah menjadi alat untuk memprovokasi provinsi, kabupaten dan kota lainnya untuk datang menjadikan Banggai sebagai benchmarking dalam hal kekayaan intelektual yaitu Banggai telah mengalokasikan APBD Kabupaten Banggai untuk pendaftaran kekayaan intelektual,” ungkap Irjen Razilu . Kepala Kantor Wilayah (Kakanwil) Kemenkumham Sulteng Hermansyah Siregar, menyatakan bahwa Agen Layanan KI akan memainkan peran vital dalam meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat tentang pentingnya melindungi hak kekayaan intelektual. “Agen Layanan KI akan berperan penting, Mereka akan memberikan informasi dan edukasi tentang berbagai aspek KI, mulai dari hak cipta, paten, merek, hingga desain industri,” jelas Kakanwil Sulteng. Dengan adanya MoU dan Perjanjian Kerjasama ini, diharapkan sinergi antara Kemenkumham dan Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai semakin memperkuat upaya bersama dalam meningkatkan pelayanan Hukum dan HAM serta meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap pentingnya melindungi kekayaan intelektual. (*)
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - In improving the quality of public services in the field of Law and Human Rights (HAM), the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights (Kemenkumham) Central Sulawesi together with the Regional Government of Banggai Regency officially signed Memorandum of Understanding (MoU). The signing was attended directly by the Inspector General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia, Ir. Razilu, Friday (19/1/2024), at the Swiss Bell Ballroom Hotel. "Thank you in particular to the Regent of Banggai for the assistance and contribution from the Regional Government of Banggai Regency which continuously supports the Ministry of Law and Human Rights as a working partner," said Inspector General Razilu. The Regent of Banggai, Amirudin, also expressed his appreciation for the breakthrough of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Regional Office which opened an Intellectual Property (KI) Service Agent in Banggai Regency. KI Service Agent as a strategic partner of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights together with the Banggai Regional Government through the Regional Research and Innovation Agency (BRIDA) of Banggai Regency in providing information and education to the public about Intellectual Property. "Thank God, in the 2024 fiscal year, the budget has been allocated in the APBD, so that in the future the management of intellectual property rights submitted by the public will be free, because the PNPB is paid by the regional government of Banggai Regency," said Regent Amirudin. The Inspector General of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights appreciates Banggai's initiative which has allocated the Banggai Regency Regional Revenue and Expenditure Budget (APBD) for intellectual property registration. "This is a tool to provoke other provinces, districts and cities to come to make Banggai a benchmark in terms of intellectual property, namely Banggai has allocated the Banggai Regency APBD for intellectual property registration," said Inspector General Razilu. Head of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Regional Office (Kakanwil), Hermansyah Siregar, stated that IP Service Agents will play a vital role in increasing public awareness about the importance of protecting intellectual property rights. "KI Service Agents will play an important role. They will provide information and education about various aspects of IP, starting from copyrights, patents, brands, to industrial designs," explained the Head of the Central Sulawesi Regional Office. With this MoU and Cooperation Agreement, it is hoped that the synergy between the Ministry of Law and Human Rights and the Regional Government of Banggai Regency will further strengthen joint efforts in improving legal and human rights services as well as increasing public awareness of the importance of protecting intellectual property. (*)

title: Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy Gugur di Papua, Besok Jenazah Tiba di Luwuk Banggai
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - Jenazah BripdaAlfandiSteveKaramoy akan tiba di Luwuk, KabupatenBanggai , Sulawesi Tengah, Minggu (21/1/2024). "Besok jenazah tiba di Luwuk. Pesawat dari Timika tidak konek dengan penerbangan Nakassar ke Luwuk siang tadi, sehingga jenazah sekarang di Makassar menunggu flight besok," ungkap Kasi Humas Polres Banggai, Iptu Al Amin S Muda, Sabtu (20/1/2024). Jenazah Almarhum BripdaAlfandiSteveKaramoy akam disemayamkan di rumah duka kompleks Pelita, Kelurahan Mangkio, Kecamatan Luwuk. Diketahui, anggota Brimob Sulawesi Tengah itu gugur dalam tugas usai baku tembak dengan Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII). Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan 1 personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan, Jumat (19/1/2024) sore. Kasatgas Humas Ops Damai Cartenz AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, menerangkan, personel yang terkena luka tembak telah dievakuasi dan dilakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter bahwa personel tersebut dinyatakan meninggal dunia. "Anggota BripdaAlfandiSteveKaramoy terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan dan mengakibatkan anggota gugur," ungkap Bayu Suseno. Bayu menyampaikan bahwa anggota Ops Damai Cartenz yang berada di wilayah tersebut mengalami serangan dari KKB selama 30 menit dari arah belakang pos. "Kami saat ini masih melakukan penyisiran terhadap pergerakan KKB di Wilayah Intan Jaya," ujar Bayu Suseno Kaops Damai Cartenz, KBP Dr Faizal Ramadhani, menegaskan bahwa KKB tersebut akan dicari keberadaannya dan akan diproses sesuai dengan hukum yang berlaku. "Saat ini pasukan kami masih melakukan pengejaran dan penyisiran di sekitar TKP," kata Faizal. (*)
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - The body of Bripda AlfandiSteveKaramoy will arrive in Luwuk, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, Sunday (21/1/2024). "Tomorrow the body will arrive in Luwuk. The plane from Timika did not connect with the Nakassar flight to Luwuk this afternoon, so the body is now in Makassar waiting for tomorrow's flight," said Head of Public Relations of the Banggai Police, Inspector Al Amin S Muda, Saturday (20/1/2024) . The body of the late Bripda AlfandiSteveKaramoy will be laid to rest at the Pelita complex funeral home, Mangkio Village, Luwuk District. It is known that the Central Sulawesi Brimob member died in the line of duty after a shootout with the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from KKB is thought to have come from behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency which resulted in 1 Cartenz Peace Operation personnel being shot, Friday (19/1/2024) afternoon. Head of Public Relations Task Force for Peace Ops Cartenz AKBP Dr. Bayu Suseno, explained that the personnel who suffered gunshot wounds had been evacuated and given first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center, but the doctor stated that the personnel had died. "Member Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy was shot in the left jaw through the right jaw and resulted in the member falling," said Bayu Suseno. Bayu said that members of Ops Damai Cartenz who were in the area experienced attacks from the KKB for 30 minutes from behind the post. "We are currently still conducting searches on the KKB's movements in the Intan Jaya area," said Bayu Suseno, Head of Damai Cartenz Ops, KBP Dr Faizal Ramadhani, emphasizing that the whereabouts of the KKB will be searched for and will be processed in accordance with applicable law. "Currently our troops are still pursuing and searching around the crime scene," said Faizal. (*)

title: Kampanye Terbuka, Caleg Golkar Agus Damalante Siap Menjalankan Amanah Masyarakat Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Sebagai partai yang didirikan oleh orang-orang tua, Ketua DPD Partai Golkar Banggai Beniyanto Tamoreka mengajak warga di Kabupaten Banggai, khususnya para generasi muda agar memilih Partai Golkar.Hal itu disampaikan Beniyanto Tamoreka dalam kampanye terbuka di Desa Kayutanyo Kecamatan Luwuk Timur, Minggu (21/1/2024).Apalagi kata dia, Partai Golkar menampilkan sejumlah kader muda sebagai caleg di DPRD Banggai, salah satunya adalah Agus Damalante.Sementara caleg Partai Golkar Agus Damalante dalam orasinya di dua lokasi, yakni di Kilongan Kecamatan Luwuk Utara dan Kayutanyo Kecamatan Luwuk Timur, mengajak agar warga memenangkan Partai Golkar dan memilih dirinya. Ia berjanji akan bekerja untuk rakyat Kabupaten Banggai. “Saya akan menjaga amanah rakyat dan bekerja untuk rakyat,” kata Agus Damalante.Menurut dia, langkah untuk maju di pemilu legislatif, dilandasi oleh keinginan untuk bekerja memenuhi harapan masyarakat. “Aspirasi masyarakat itu tentu akan menjadi amanah ketika saya terpilih nanti,” ujarnya.Ketua DPD Partai Golkar Banggai Beniyanto Tamoreka juga menyebut bahwa Agus Damalante adalah kader muda dan terbaik, serta seorang pengusaha muda. Karenanya kata Beniyanto, Agus Damalante layak dipilih mewakili suara warga di DPRD Banggai. DAR
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-As a party founded by old people, Chairman of the Banggai Golkar Party DPD Beniyanto Tamoreka invited residents in Banggai Regency, especially the younger generation, to vote for the Golkar Party. This was conveyed by Beniyanto Tamoreka in an open campaign in Kayutanyo Village, East Luwuk District, Sunday (21/1/2024). Moreover, he said, the Golkar Party presented a number of young cadres as legislative candidates in the Banggai DPRD, one of which was Agus Damalante. Meanwhile, the Golkar Party legislative candidate Agus Damalante gave his speeches in two locations, namely in Kilongan, North Luwuk District and Kayutanyo, East Luwuk District, invited residents to win the Golkar Party and vote for him. He promised to work for the people of Banggai Regency. "I will maintain the people's trust and work for the people," said Agus Damalante. According to him, the steps to advance in the legislative elections were based on the desire to work to meet people's expectations. "The people's aspirations will certainly become a mandate when I am elected," he said. Chairman of the Banggai Golkar Party DPD Beniyanto Tamoreka also said that Agus Damalante was the best and young cadre, as well as a young entrepreneur. Therefore, said Beniyanto, Agus Damalante deserves to be elected to represent the voice of the residents in the Banggai DPRD. DAR

title: 224 Mahasiswa Unismuh Luwuk Ikuti Pembekalan KKN-MB Angkatan 35
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk menggelar pembukaan Pembekalan KKN-MB Angkatan 35, Senin 21 Januari 2024.Pembukaan Pembekalan KKN-MB Angkatan 35 ini dibuka secara resmi Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., bertempat di pelataran  kampus hijau.Kegiatan Pembekalan KKN-MB yang diikuti 224 mahasiswa ini dihadiri oleh Wakil Rektor I Mustafa Abd Rahim, Wakil Rektor II Nirwan Moh Nur, Ketua LP3M Risno Mina, para Dekan, dan Dosen Pembimbing Lapangan (DPL) serta panitia.BACA JUGA:Menuju Sukses Muktamar ke-48, Rektor UMLB Hadiri Tanwir Secara VirtualKetua Panitia KKN-MB Unismuh Luwuk, Ramadhani Chaniago dalam laporannya menjelaskan, KKN angkatan 35 ini dilaksanakan di dua kecamatan yang ada di Kabupaten Banggai.Dua kecamatan itu adalah Batui Selatan 10 desa, dan Kecamatan Moilong 16 desa, sehingga total 26 desa sebaran.“Besok hari terakhir pembekalan akan disampaikan lokasi penempatan. Jadi mohon kepada teman-teman untuk mengikuti pembekalan ini sampai selesai,” pesan Ramadhani Chaniago yang juga Wakil Dekan III Fakultas Pertanian Unismuh Luwuk itu.BACA JUGA:Satlantas Polres Bangkep Lakukan Pengamanan Depan Masjid Saat TarawihIa pun menguraikan jumlah peserta KKN tahun ini yang berjumlah 224 mahasiswa. Itu terdiri dari 201 mahasiswa peserta KKN reguler dan 23 mahasiswa melalui jalur rekognisi.“Praktisnya mahasiswa yang ikut pembekalan hari ini 201 mahasiswa. Namun yang masuk dalam pendaftar semua 224 (termasuk 23 yang rekognisi),” katanya.BACA JUGA:Pengelolaan Anggaran Desa jadi 'PR' Inspektorat BangkepPembekalan KKN-MB ini akan berlangsung selama dua hari. Olehnya, mahasiswa diharapkan dapat mengikuti kegiatan dengan sebaik-baiknya.“Jadi semua calon peserta KKN wajib mengikuti pembekalan. Olehnya, mohon kerjasamanya dan ikuti semua rangkaian pembekalan,” tegasnya.Ramadhani Chaniago menegaskan, jika ada mahasiswa yang tidak bersyarat karena tidak mengikuti pembekalan dengan baik, maka bisa dianggap tidak lulus. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk held the opening of the 35th KKN-MB Training Class, Monday 21 January 2024. The opening of the 35th KKN-MB Training Class was officially opened by the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., at green campus grounds. The KKN-MB training activity which was attended by 224 students was attended by Deputy Chancellor I Mustafa Abd Rahim, Deputy Chancellor II Nirwan Moh Nur, Chair of LP3M Risno Mina, Deans, and Field Supervisor Lecturers (DPL) as well as the committee. READ ALSO :Towards the Success of the 48th Congress, UMLB Chancellor Attends Tanwir Virtually. Chair of the Unismuh Luwuk KKN-MB Committee, Ramadhani Chaniago, in his report explained that the 35th batch of KKN was carried out in two sub-districts in Banggai Regency. The two sub-districts are Batui Selatan 10 villages, and Moilong District 16 villages, for a total of 26 distribution villages. "Tomorrow, on the last day of briefing, placement locations will be delivered. "So please ask friends to follow this briefing until it's finished," said Ramadhani Chaniago, who is also Deputy Dean III, Faculty of Agriculture, Unismuh Luwuk. student. It consists of 201 students participating in regular KKN and 23 students through the recognition route. "Practically, there are 201 students taking part in today's briefing. "However, all 224 applicants were included (including 23 who were recognized)," he said. ALSO READ: Village Budget Management becomes 'homework' for the Bangkep Inspectorate. This KKN-MB briefing will last for two days. Therefore, students are expected to be able to participate in activities as well as possible. "So all prospective KKN participants are required to take part in the briefing. "Therefore, please cooperate and follow all the series of briefings," he stressed. Ramadhani Chaniago emphasized that if there are students who are not conditional because they did not follow the briefing properly, then they can be considered as having failed. (*)

title: Lagi, DP2KBP3A Banggai Sosialisasi Peningkatan Partisipasi Perempuan dalam Pembangunan
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Lagi, Dinas Pengendalian Penduduk Keluarga Berencana Pemberdayaan Perempuan dan Perlindungan Anak (DP2KBP3A) Banggai kembali menggelar sosialisasi peningkatan partisipasi perempuan dalam pembangunan, baik di bidang sosial, ekonomi, hukum dan politik.Kali ini, sosialisasi dilakukan di Kota Luwuk bertempat di aula instansi tersebut, Senin 22 Januari 2024.BACA JUGA:Warga Kagumi Sosok Herwin Yatim, Selalu Bekerja untuk RakyatKegiatan sosialisasi dibuka secara resmi oleh Kepada Dinas P2KBP3A Banggai, Faisal Karim dan menghadirkan pemateri dari Bappeda dan Ketua PKK Banggai, Hj. Ir. Syamsuarni Amirudin.“Kegiatan sosialisasi berakhir hari ini di wilayah Luwuk, kita laksanakan di kantor kami (Dinas P2KBP3A Banggai),” kata Faisal Karim, via pesan WhatsApp.BACA JUGA:Bantuan Rp100 Juta untuk Pembangunan Pusat Dakwah MuhammadiyahBeberapa paparan materi disampaikan kepada peserta sosialisasi, mulai dari kesetaraan gender. Di mana semua perempuan memiliki akses dan hak yang samaKemudian, dijelaskan tentang peran perempuan dalam pembangunan dan memperoleh manfaat yang dirasakan.“Peserta sangat antusias mengikuti sosialisasi, karena memang sosialisasi ini sangat penting,” kata Kadis Faisal Karim.BACA JUGA:Kader Milenial Hafiz Alquran Pimpin PKS BanggaiKadis berharap melalui sosialisasi ini kaum perempuan tidak lagi tergantung pada siapapun.“Karena sebagai perempuan dapat bersikap melalui kemampuan sumber daya yang dimiliki serta mengasah dan terus ditingkatkan,” harapnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Again, the Banggai Family Planning, Family Planning, Women's Empowerment and Child Protection (DP2KBP3A) Population Control Service is again holding a socialization on increasing women's participation in development, both in the social, economic, legal and political fields. This time, the socialization was held in Luwuk City at the hall this agency, Monday 22 January 2024. ALSO READ: Residents Admire the Figure of Herwin Yatim, Always Working for the People. The socialization activity was officially opened by the Head of the Banggai P2KBP3A Service, Faisal Karim and presented speakers from Bappeda and the Chair of the Banggai PKK, Hj. Ir. Syamsuarni Amirudin. "The socialization activity ended today in the Luwuk area, we carried it out at our office (Dinas P2KBP3A Banggai)," said Faisal Karim, via WhatsApp message. , starting from gender equality. Where all women have the same access and rights. Then, it was explained about the role of women in development and obtaining the benefits they felt. "Participants were very enthusiastic about taking part in the socialization, because this socialization is very important," said Kadis Faisal Karim. READ ALSO: Millennial Cadres Hafiz Al-Quran The PKS BanggaiKadis leader hopes that through this socialization women will no longer depend on anyone. "Because as women we can act through the resources we have and hone and continue to improve," he hoped. (*)

title: Bupati Banggai Teken MoU bersama Kakanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng, Irjen Kemenkumham RI : Banggai Sebagai Benchmarking Kekayaan Intelektual.
text: DKISP BANGGAI – Dalam meningkatkan kualitas layanan publik di bidang Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia (HAM), Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia (Kemenkumham) Sulawesi Tengah bersama Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai resmi menandatangani Memorandum of Understanding (MoU).Penandatanganan tersebut dihadiri langsung oleh Inspektur Jenderal Kementerian Hukum Dan Hak Asasi Manusia Republik Indonesia, Ir. Razilu., M.Si., CGCAE, Jumat (19/1/2024) di Hotel Swiss Bell Ballroom.“Terima kasih kepada Bupati Banggai secara khusus atas bantuan serta kontribusi dari Pemerintah Daerah Kab. Banggai yang tiada hentinya mendukung Kemenkumham sebagai mitra kerja,” ujar Irjen Kemenkumham RI.Ucapan apresiasi juga diberikan oleh Bupati Banggai, Ir. H. Banggai untuk pendaftaran kekayaan intelektual,” ungkap Irjen Razilu.Kepala Kantor Wilayah (Kakanwil) Kemenkumham Sulteng Hermansyah Siregar, S.H., M.H menyatakan bahwa Agen Layanan KI akan memainkan peran vital dalam meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat tentang pentingnya melindungi hak kekayaan intelektual.“Agen Layanan KI akan berperan penting, Mereka akan memberikan informasi dan edukasi tentang berbagai aspek KI, mulai dari hak cipta, paten, merek, hingga desain industri,” jelas Kakanwil Sulteng.Dengan adanya MoU dan Perjanjian Kerjasama ini, diharapkan sinergi antara Kemenkumham dan Pemerintah Daerah Kabupaten Banggai semakin memperkuat upaya bersama dalam meningkatkan pelayanan hukum dan HAM serta meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap pentingnya melindungi kekayaan intelektual.*Tim Liputan Dinas Komunikasi, Informatika, Statistik, dan Persandian (DKISP) Kabupaten Banggai.
text_en: DKISP BANGGAI – In improving the quality of public services in the field of Law and Human Rights (HAM), the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights (Kemenkumham) Central Sulawesi together with the Regional Government of Banggai Regency officially signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU). The signing was attended in person by the Inspector General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia, Ir. Razilu., M.Sc., CGCAE, Friday (19/1/2024) at the Swiss Bell Ballroom Hotel. "Special thanks to the Regent of Banggai for the assistance and contribution from the Regional Government of the District. Banggai continuously supports the Ministry of Law and Human Rights as a working partner," said the Inspector General of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights. Expressions of appreciation were also given by the Regent of Banggai, Ir. H. Amirudin, MM, AIFO regarding the breakthrough from the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Regional Office which opened an Intellectual Property Service Agent in Banggai Regency. KI Service Agent as a strategic partner of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights together with the Banggai Regional Government through the Banggai Regency Regional Research and Innovation Agency (BRIDA) in providing information and educating the public about Intellectual Property (KI). "Thank God, in the 2024 fiscal year, the budget has been allocated in the APBD, so that in the future the management of intellectual property rights submitted by the public will be free, because the PNPB is paid by the regional government of Banggai Regency," said Regent Amirudin. Inspector General of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights appreciates Banggai's initiative which has allocated the Banggai Regency Regional Revenue and Expenditure Budget (APBD) for intellectual property registration. "This is a tool to provoke other provinces, districts and cities to come to make Banggai a benchmark in terms of intellectual property namely Banggai has allocated the District APBD. Proud of registering intellectual property," said Inspector General Razilu. Head of the Regional Office (Kakanwil) of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi Hermansyah Siregar, S.H., M.H stated that IP Service Agents will play a vital role in increasing public awareness about the importance of protecting intellectual property rights. "KI Service Agents will play an important role. They will provide information and education about various aspects of IP, starting from copyright, patents, brands, to industrial design," explained the Head of Regional Office of Central Sulawesi. With this MoU and Cooperation Agreement, it is hoped that the synergy between the Ministry of Law and Human Rights and the Regional Government of Banggai Regency will increase. strengthen joint efforts to improve legal and human rights services and increase public awareness of the importance of protecting intellectual property.

title: PENGURUS ASIAFI BANGGAI RESMI DILANTIK
text: DKISP BANGGAI – Asosiasi Instruktur Aeorobik dan Fitnes Indonesia (ASIAFI) Kabupaten Banggai yang merupakan wadah dalam membina dan mengembangkan kemampuan para instruktur aerobik dan fitnes resmi terbentuk.Pengurus ASIAFI Banggai periode 2024-2028 yang diketuai oleh Dede Rosidah Amirudin, resmi dilantik pada Jumat (19/1/2024), di Hotel Santika, Luwuk Selatan, oleh Ketua ASIAFI Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah Diah Puspita.Prosesi pelantikan diawali dengan pembacaan Surat Keputusan Pembentukan Pengurus ASIAFI Banggai masa bakti 2024-2028 dan dilanjutkan dengan penyerahan bendera pataka dari Ketua ASIAFI Sulteng kepada Ketua ASIAFI Banggai.ASIAFI Banggai menjadi asosiasi kelima yang terbentuk di Sulawesi Tengah. Ketua ASIAFI Sulteng Diah Puspita menyampaikan apresiasinya kepada Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai yang aktif mendorong terbentuknya organisasi tersebut di tingkat kabupaten.“Saya berharap seluruh kabupaten di Sulawesi Tengah bisa terbentuk asosiasinya,” ujar Diah.Ia juga meminta pengurus ASIAFI Banggai aktif menyosialisasikan olahraga aerobik dan fitnes ke masyarakat.Pada kesempatan itu, Bupati Banggai Amirudin memberikan apresiasi kepada ASIAFI Sulteng yang telah berupaya mengembangkan olahraga aerobik dan fitnes di Banggai melalui satu wadah bersama.“Dengan adanya asosiasi ini, kita harapkan bahwa semua masyarakat semakin rajin berolahraga khususnya senam dan fitnes,” kata Bupati Amirudin.“Selamat kepada pengurus yang baru dilantik, selamat menjalankan program kerjanya, semoga senam aerobik dan fitnes makin dicintai oleh masyarakat Kabupaten Banggai,” lanjut Bupati Amirudin.Sementara itu, Wakil Gubernur Sulawesi Tengah Ma’mun Amir meminta ASIAFI dan seluruh organisasi olahraga melakukan seleksi ketat dalam mencari atlet-atlet terbaik yang akan berkompetisi di tingkat nasional.“Insyaallah, di PON (Pekan Olahraha Nasional) nanti, target bapak gubernur itu 10 medali emas,” ujar Wagub Sulteng.Ma’mun menilai, ASIAFI memiliki peran strategis dalam membantu meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat akan pentingnya gaya hidup sehat melalui kegiatan aerobik dan fitnes.Pelantikan pengurus ASIAFI Banggai dihadiri oleh Wakik Ketua I DPRD Banggai Batia Sisilia Hadjar, Ketua KORMI Sulteng, dan sejumlah pimpinan perangkat daerah Kabupaten Banggai.*Tim Liputan Dinas Komunikasi Informatika Statistik dan Persandian (DKISP) Kabupaten Banggai.
text_en: DKISP BANGGAI – The Indonesian Association of Aerobics and Fitness Instructors (ASIAFI) Banggai Regency, which is a forum for developing and developing the abilities of aerobics and fitness instructors, was officially formed. The ASIAFI Banggai Management for the 2024-2028 period, chaired by Dede Rosidah Amirudin, was officially inaugurated on Friday (19 /1/2024), at the Santika Hotel, South Luwuk, by the Chair of ASIAFI Central Sulawesi Province Diah Puspita. The inauguration procession began with the reading of the Decree on the Establishment of the ASIAFI Banggai Management for the 2024-2028 term of office and continued with the handing over of the banner flag from the Chair of ASIAFI Central Sulawesi to the Chair ASIAFI Banggai.ASIAFI Banggai is the fifth association formed in Central Sulawesi. Chair of ASIAFI Central Sulawesi Diah Puspita expressed her appreciation to the Banggai Regency Government for actively encouraging the formation of this organization at the district level. "I hope that all districts in Central Sulawesi can form an association," said Diah. She also asked ASIAFI Banggai administrators to actively promote aerobics and fitness sports to community. On that occasion, the Regent of Banggai Amirudin expressed his appreciation to ASIAFI Central Sulawesi for making efforts to develop aerobic sports and fitness in Banggai through one joint platform. "With the existence of this association, we hope that all people will be more diligent in exercising, especially gymnastics and fitness," said Regent Amirudin. "Congratulations to the newly appointed administrators, happy carrying out their work program, hopefully aerobics and fitness will be increasingly loved by the people of Banggai Regency," continued Regent Amirudin. Meanwhile, Deputy Governor of Central Sulawesi Ma'mun Amir asked ASIAFI and all sports organizations carry out strict selections to find the best athletes who will compete at the national level. "God willing, at PON (National Sports Week), the governor's target is 10 gold medals," said the Deputy Governor of Central Sulawesi. Ma'mun assesses that ASIAFI has a strategic role in helping to increase public awareness of the importance of a healthy lifestyle through aerobics and fitness activities. The inauguration of the Banggai ASIAFI management was attended by the Deputy Chairperson I of the Banggai DPRD Batia Sisilia Hadjar, Chair of the Central Sulawesi KORMI, and a number of Banggai Regency regional officials. and Encryption (DKISP) Banggai Regency.

title: Dinas P2KBP3A Kabupaten Banggai Dorong Partisipasi Perempuan Melalui Sosialisasi Multisektor
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Dalam upaya menggalang peran aktif perempuan dalam berbagai sektor, Dinas Pengendalian Penduduk, Keluarga Berencana, Pemberdayaan Perempuan, dan Perlindungan Anak (P2KBP3A) Kabupaten Banggai menyelenggarakan Sosialisasi Peningkatan Partisipasi Perempuan di Bidang Sosial, Politik, Hukum, dan Ekonomi.Kegiatan ini dilaksanakan dengan penuh semangat pada Senin (22/1/2024) di Aula Kantor Dinas P2KBP3A Kabupaten Banggai.BACA JUGA:Proyeksi Badai Resesi Ekonomi Indonesia 2023: How It Works?Sosialisasi ini menjadi wadah penting untuk membahas strategi dan langkah-langkah konkrit dalam meningkatkan peran perempuan di berbagai aspek kehidupan.Kepala Dinas P2KBP3A Kabupaten Banggai Faisal Karim menyampaikan tujuan dari sosialisasi ini, yakni ingin mendorong partisipasi perempuan di bidang sosial, politik, hukum, dan ekonomi. Perempuan memiliki peran strategis dalam membangun masyarakat yang berkeadilan dan berkelanjutan.BACA JUGA:Pemda Bantu Korban Banjir di Lontio dan ToimaDalam rangka mencapai tujuan tersebut, materi sosialisasi mencakup berbagai aspek, mulai dari peningkatan literasi politik dan hukum perempuan, hingga pemberdayaan ekonomi melalui beragam program dan pelatihan.Diskusi interaktif juga diadakan untuk mendorong pertukaran gagasan dan pengalaman antarpartisipan.Dalam kegiatan ini terdapat beberapa narasumber diantaranya, Ketua TP-PKK Kabupaten Banggai, Syamsuarni Amirudin dan juga perwakilan Badan Perencanaan Pembangunan Daerah (Bappeda) Kabupaten Banggai.BACA JUGA:Pembelajaran Tatap Muka Kembali DitundaSosialisasi Peningkatan Partisipasi Perempuan ini diharapkan dapat menjadi langkah awal yang berarti menuju masyarakat yang inklusif dan merata dalam kesempatan serta hak-haknya, sehingga perempuan dapat berkontribusi secara maksimal dalam pembangunan Kabupaten Banggai.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- In an effort to promote the active role of women in various sectors, the Department of Population Control, Family Planning, Women's Empowerment and Child Protection (P2KBP3A) of Banggai Regency held a Socialization on Increasing Women's Participation in the Social, Political, Legal and Economic Sectors. This activity was carried out with enthusiasm on Monday (22/1/2024) in the P2KBP3A Service Office Hall, Banggai Regency. READ ALSO: Projections of the 2023 Indonesian Economic Recession Storm: How It Works? This socialization is an important forum for discussing strategies and concrete steps in increasing the role women in various aspects of life. Head of the Banggai Regency P2KBP3A Service, Faisal Karim, conveyed the aim of this socialization, namely to encourage women's participation in the social, political, legal and economic fields. Women have a strategic role in building a just and sustainable society. READ ALSO: Regional Government Helps Flood Victims in Lontio and Toima. In order to achieve this goal, outreach materials cover various aspects, starting from increasing women's political and legal literacy, to economic empowerment through various programs and training. Interactive discussions were also held to encourage the exchange of ideas and experiences between participants. In this activity there were several resource persons including, the Chair of the Banggai Regency TP-PKK, Syamsuarni Amirudin and also representatives of the Banggai Regency Regional Development Planning Agency (Bappeda). ALSO READ: Face-to-Face Learning Postponed again. It is hoped that this socialization to increase women's participation can be a meaningful first step towards a society that is inclusive and equal in opportunities and rights, so that women can contribute optimally to the development of Banggai Regency.**

title: Selamat! Sukarno Abby Kembali Pimpin Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai Periode Ketiga
text: BANGGAI RAYA–Musyawarah Daerah (MUSDA) ke- IV Dewan Pimpinan Daerah (DPD) Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai sukses berlangsung di Hotel Santika Luwuk, Sabtu (20/1/ 2024) kemarin.Pada Musda ke IV Dewan Pimpinan Daerah (DPD) Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai, untuk ketiga kalinya Ustad Sukarno Abby, S.ST., M.PD., kembali memperoleh kepercayaan memimpin DPD Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai periode 2024-2029.BACA JUGA:Membanggakan! UMLB Peringkat 299 Kampus Terbaik se Asia Tenggara Versi WebometricsKeberhasilan Ustad Sukarno Abby kembali memimpin DPD Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai untuk ketiga kalinya menunjukkan kepercayaan yang tinggi dari anggota dan pihak terkait.Semua pihak berharap kepemimpinan baru ini dapat membawa organisasi menuju prestasi lebih gemilang dan kontribusi yang lebih besar bagi masyarakat dan ummat Islam.BACA JUGA:Liga Top Skor U-16 Nasional Dimulai 20 Juni, SSB SJS Luwuk Masuk di Grup ADari hasil Musda ke IV DPD Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai dan terpilihnya Ustad Sukarno Abby lewat pemilihan yang dilakukan dalam suasana penuh kebersamaan ini mendapat apresiasi tinggi serta ucapan dari berbagai pihak diantaranya Ketua DPD Wahdah Islamiyah Rokan Hulu Ilham Wahyudi N, Sekretaris DPD Wahdah Banggai periode 2019-2024 Yulianto Labarani, dan Forum Ukhuwah Mahasiswa Islam Banggai Morowali (FUMIBA). AGKBACA JUGA:Hanya 2 Kecamatan di Banggai Zona Hijau
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA–The Fourth Regional Conference (MUSDA) of the Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai Regional Leadership Council (DPD) successfully took place at the Santika Luwuk Hotel, Saturday (20/1/2024). At the IV Musda of the Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai Regional Leadership Council (DPD) , for the third time Ustad Sukarno Abby, S.ST., M.PD., has again gained the trust to lead the Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai DPD for the 2024-2029 period. READ ALSO: Proud! UMLB Ranked 299th Best Campus in Southeast Asia According to Webometrics. The success of Ustad Sukarno Abby in returning to lead the Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai DPD for the third time shows the high trust of members and related parties. All parties hope that this new leadership can lead the organization to greater achievements and greater contributions for society and the Islamic ummah. ALSO READ: National U-16 Top Score League Starting June 20, SSB SJS Luwuk Enters Group A. From the results of the IV Musda DPD Wahdah Islamiyah Banggai and the election of Ustad Sukarno Abby through the election which was carried out in an atmosphere full of togetherness, this got High appreciation and greetings from various parties including the Chairman of the DPD Wahdah Islamiyah Rokan Hulu Ilham Wahyudi N, Secretary of the DPD Wahdah Banggai for the 2019-2024 period Yulianto Labarani, and the Banggai Morowali Islamic Student Brotherhood Forum (FUMIBA). AGKB ALSO READ: Only 2 Districts in Banggai Green Zone

title: Bupati Banggai Buka Fun Aerobics Competition
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Bupati Banggai, H. Amirudin Tamoreka membuka secara resmi Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest dan Zumba Party, di Gedung Padepokan Pencak Silat Kecamatan Luwuk, Sabtu (20/1/2024). Kegiatan Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest dan Zumba Party dilaksanakan sebagai bagian dari upaya untuk mempromosikan gaya hidup sehat dan aktif dalam masyarakat. “Tadi kami sudah melaksanakan senam bersama, mudah-mudahan apa yang sudah dilakukan memberikan rasa bugar kepada kita semua, dalam menjalankan aktifitas sehari-hari,” kata Amirudin. Terkait Man Body Contest, lanjutnya, adalah salah satu kegiatan sebagai upaya membentuk otot-otot yang ada dalam tubuh. “Olehnya itu, kegiatan yang sangat positif ini, mudah-mudahan pesertanya semakin banyak, sehingga masyarakat yang ada di Kabupaten Banggai sehat dan segar, karena sesungguhnya di dalam tubuh yang sehat terdapat pikiran yang waras,” ujar Amirudin. Kegiatan tersebut, merupakan hasil kerja sama antara Pemerintah Kabupaten (Pemkab) Banggai melalui Dinas Pemuda dan Olahraga dengan Asosiasi Infrastruktur dan Fitnes Indonesia (ASIAFI), serta Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia (KONI) Kabupaten Banggai. “Saya berharap, kegiatan ini tidak hanya menjadi ajang kompetisi, tetapi juga membangun kesadaran akan pentingnya hidup sehat dan aktif dalam kehidupan sehari-hari,” tandas Amirudin. */PAR Kegiatan Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest dan Zumba Party dilaksanakan sebagai bagian dari upaya untuk mempromosikan gaya hidup sehat dan aktif dalam masyarakat. “Tadi kami sudah melaksanakan senam bersama, mudah-mudahan apa yang sudah dilakukan memberikan rasa bugar kepada kita semua, dalam menjalankan aktifitas sehari-hari,” kata Amirudin. text_en: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Banggai Regent, H. Amirudin Tamoreka officially opened the Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest and Zumba Party, at the Padepokan Pencak Silat Building, Luwuk District, Saturday (20/1/2024). Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest and Zumba Party activities are carried out as part of efforts to promote a healthy and active lifestyle in society. "Earlier we did gymnastics together, hopefully what we have done will give us all a feeling of fitness in carrying out our daily activities," said Amirudin. Regarding the Man Body Contest, he continued, it is an activity as an effort to build the muscles in the body. "Therefore, this very positive activity, hopefully there will be more and more participants, so that the people in Banggai Regency are healthy and fresh, because actually in a healthy body there is a sane mind," said Amirudin. This activity is the result of collaboration between the Banggai Regency Government (Pemkab) through the Youth and Sports Service with the Indonesian Infrastructure and Fitness Association (ASIAFI), as well as the Indonesian National Sports Committee (KONI) Banggai Regency. "I hope that this activity will not only be a competition event, but also raise awareness of the importance of living healthy and active in everyday life," stressed Amirudin. */PAR Fun Aerobics Competition, Man Body Contest and Zumba Party activities are carried out as part of efforts to promote healthy and active lifestyles in society.
