title: Lawan Politik Dinasti, Politik Uang dan Nepotisme Politik, Banggai Bergerak Sasar Dapil 2
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Mimbar bebas lawan politik dinasti menyasar Dapil Banggai 2 (Pagimana, Bualemo, Lobu, Bunta, Nuhon dan Simpang Raya).Dalam aksi yang dilakukan dua hari berturut-turut pada Minggu dan Senin (21-22/1/2024), 1.000 selebaran turut dibagikan di pelosok desa dan pasar-pasar. “Kemarin hingga hari ini kita membagikan selebaran dan mimbar bebas lawan politik dinasti,” ujar Rifat Hakim, salah satu koordinator aksi. Senin, 22 Januari 2024.Dalam siaran persnya, Rifat menjelaskan bahwa sejak tahapan pencalonan pemilihan umum (pemilu) dimulai, Kabupaten Banggai telah dipertontonkan secara telanjang bagaimana daerah diambang berkuasanya politik dinasti.“Telah kita ketahui bersama bahwa penguasa hari ini telah mendorong kakak, adik, ipar dan anak – anaknya untuk maju mencalonkan diri menjadi pejabat publik,” tutur Rifat.Kata Rifat, pencalonan mereka adalah biasa dalam demokrasi, namun yang menjadi persoalan adalah jika sumberdaya milik negara, milik rakyat digunakan untuk mendapatkan kekuasaan.BACA JUGA:PTM Terbatas Madrasah Harus Dapat Rekomendasi Satgas Covid“Dan apabila kita mencermati bahwa situasi akhir – akhir ini maka gejalanya telah menunjukan ke arah itu, yang apabila situasi itu benar terjadi dan terwujud maka jelas tindakan tersebut adalah pengkhianatan yang nyata terhadap rakyat,” ungkapnya.Menurut dia, telah menjadi desas – desus di tengah rakyat bahwa Aparatur Sipil Negara (ASN) patut diduga telah dimanfaatkan untuk tidak netral, walaupun jelas itu adalah perbuatan melanggar hukum.Struktur negara yang seharusnya melayani rakyat kini berubah fungsi menjadi alat kekuasaan untuk melayani kepentingan politik keluarga.“Dan yang paling mencederai rasa keadilan kita adalah politik uang yang merupakan salah satu bentuk kejahatan luar biasa dan merupakan tindak pidana pemilu justru dijadikan senjata utama untuk meraih kekuasaan,” ungkap aktivis yang juga Ketua DPC GMNI Luwuk Banggai.BACA JUGA:Dinilai Mengganggu, Aktivitas Bongkar Ikan di Pelabuhan Rakyat Balut Tuai SorotanDalam mimbar bebas itu, Banggai Bergerak menjelaskan bahwa pertautan antara nepotisme politik (politik kekeluargaan), ketidaknetralan birokrasi dan politik uang adalah dasar lahirnya politik dinasti.“Kini sudah saatnya kita menjadi sadar dan paham untuk tidak lagi ditipu dan dibodohi oleh janji palsu dan bujukan sesat politik uang,” sambung pria yang akrab disapa Akram ini.Ia mengatakan, jangan lagi rakyat tertipu dengan uang seratus ribu, dua ratus ribu, namun secara jangka panjang harga kebutuhan pokok selalu naik dan membuat rakyat susah mendapatkan asupan gizi yang baik, merasakan layanan air bersih yang buruk, layanan listrik yang buruk , serta tidak tersedianya lapangan pekerjaan untuk anak – anak muda, hanya karena rakyat salah memilih wakil dan pemimpin.BACA JUGA:Undang Ustadz Mu'adz, Polres Banggai Peringati Maulid Nabi Muhammad SAW“Sudah saatnya kita bangun demokrasi sejati di daerah kita, sudah saatnya kita wujudkan kualitas pemilu yang berdaulat, sehingga anak petani, anak nelayan, anak tukang ojek dan anak buruh bangunan jika punya kompetensi, integritas serta rekam jejak yang baik, dapat juga menjadi wakil dan/atau pemimpin daerah ini dan kesejahteraan dapat kita wujudkan bersama di daerah yang kaya ini,” tutupnya.Banggai Bergerak juga menuntut dan mengajak seluruh elemen masyarakat untuk melawan nepotisme politik, mengawal dan menjaga netralitas ASN dan kepala desa, serta melawan segala bentuk politik uang.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-The free platform of political opponents of the dynasty targeted the Banggai 2 electoral district (Pagimana, Bualemo, Lobu, Bunta, Nuhon and Simpang Raya). In an action carried out for two consecutive days on Sunday and Monday (21-22/1/2024), 1,000 leaflets were also distributed in remote villages and markets. "Yesterday until today we are distributing leaflets and free pulpits for opponents of dynastic politics," said Rifat Hakim, one of the action coordinators. Monday, January 22 2024. In his press release, Rifat explained that since the nomination stage for the general election (election) began, Banggai Regency has been shown nakedly how the area is on the verge of coming to power in dynastic politics. "We all know that today's rulers have encouraged brothers and sisters , his brother-in-law and his children to run for public office," said Rifat. Rifat said that their candidacy is normal in a democracy, but the problem is if resources belonging to the state and the people are used to gain power. READ ALSO: Limited PTM Madrasas Must Get Recommendations from the Covid Task Force "And if we look closely at the recent situation, the symptoms have shown in that direction, that if this situation really occurs and is realized then it is clear that this action is a real betrayal of the people," he said. According to him, "It has become a rumor among the people that the State Civil Apparatus (ASN) is suspected to have been used to be neutral, even though it is clearly an act that violates the law. The state structure which is supposed to serve the people has now changed its function to become a tool of power to serve the family's political interests." "And what really hurts our sense of justice is money politics, which is a form of extraordinary crime and is an election criminal act, which is actually used as the main weapon to gain power," said the activist who is also the Chair of the DPC GMNI Luwuk Banggai. READ ALSO: Considered Disturbing, Dismantling Activities Fish at Balut People's Harbor Reap Highlights. In the free platform, Banggai Bermobil explained that the relationship between political nepotism (family politics), bureaucratic neutrality and money politics is the basis for the birth of dynastic politics. "Now is the time for us to become aware and understand so that we will no longer be deceived and fooled "by false promises and the misguided persuasion of money politics," continued the man who is familiarly called Akram. He said, people should no longer be fooled by one hundred thousand, two hundred thousand, but in the long term the price of basic necessities will always rise and make it difficult for people to get nutritional intake. who are good, experience poor clean water services, poor electricity services, and the absence of job opportunities for young people, just because the people choose the wrong representatives and leaders. READ ALSO: Invite Ustadz Mu'adz, Banggai Police to Commemorate the Birthday of the Prophet Muhammad SAW "It's time for us to build true democracy in our region, it's time for us to realize the quality of sovereign elections, so that the children of farmers, children of fishermen, children of motorbike taxi drivers and children of construction workers, if they have competence, integrity and a good track record, can also become representatives and/or regional leaders and we can realize prosperity together in this rich region," he concluded. Banggai Bermobil also demands and invites all elements of society to fight political nepotism, guard and maintain the neutrality of ASN and village heads, and fight all forms of money politics. .**

title: Jelang Pemilu 2024, 52 PTPS Luwuk Utara Dilantik
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Sebanyak 52 Pengawas Tempat Pemunggutan Suara (PTPS) se-Kecamatan Luwuk Utara dilantik dan diambil sumpah janji oleh Ketua Panitia Pengawas Pemilihan Umum (Panwaslu) Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, Makatul Alkap di Aula Kantor Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, sekira pukul 16.00 Wita, Minggu (21/1/2024).Pengawas TPS desa dan kelurahan Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, terdiri dari Kelurahan Kilongan sebanyak 10 orang, Kelurahan Kilongan Permai sebanyak 11 orang, Desa Bumi Beringin 2 orang, Desa Awu 2 orang, Desa Boyou 4 orang, Desa Biak 8 orang, Desa Bunga 5 orang, Desa Kamumu 2 orang, Desa Salodik 3 orang, Desa Lenyek 2 orang, dan Desa Buon Mandiri sebanyak 3 orang.BACA JUGA:SMAN 3 Luwuk Belum Kembalikan SPP Iuran DesemberSesuai Keputusan Ketua Panitia Pengawas Pemilihan Umum Kecamatan Luwuk Utara Nomor : 001/HK.01.01/K.ST-01.21/01/2024, tentang Pengangkatan Pengawas Tempat Pemunggutan Suara se-Kecamatan Luwuk Utara Pada Pemilihan Umum Serentak Tahun 2024.Pelantikan dan pengambilan sumpah janji Pengawas TPS ini, dihadiri oleh mewakili Ketua Bawaslu Banggai dan jajarannya, Ketua dan Anggota Panwaslu Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, Pengawas Desa dan Kelurahan se Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, Kepala Sekretariat Panwaslu Luwuk Utara, Kapolsek Luwuk, Rohaniawan, dan seluruh peserta, serta tamu undangan.Ketua Panwaslu Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, Makatul Alkap dalam pelantikan dan pengambilan sumpah tersebut mengatakan bahwa PTPS memiliki tanggungjawab untuk menyelamatkan Pancasila dan Undang-Undang Dasar Republik Indonesia 1945. Sumpah atau janji ini adalah janji terhadap Tuhan Yang Maha Esa dan manusia yang harus ditepati dengan segala keihlasan dan kejujuran.BACA JUGA:Unismuh Luwuk Agendakan Mahasiswa KKN-MB Diturunkan Pada 25 JanuariDengan memanjatkan puji kepada Tuhan Yang Maha Esa sebut dia, pada Minggu, tanggal 21 Januari 2024, Ia sebagai Ketua Panwaslu Kecamatan Luwuk Utara, berdasarkan Keputusan Ketua Pengawas Pemilihan Umum Kecamatan Luwuk Utara Nomor: 001/HK.01.01/K.ST-01.21/01/2024, tanggal 21 Januari 2024 melantik seluruh pengawas TPS pemilihan umum tahun 2024.BACA JUGA:Berikut Pemenang Pilkades Serentak di 95 Desa dan Perolehan Suaranya!“Saya percaya bahwa saudara akan melaksanakan tugas dengan sebaik-baiknya, sesuai dengan ketentuan perundang-undangan yang berlaku dengan penuh rasa tanggaung jawab. Semoga Tuhan Yang Maha Esa selalu memberikan rahmat kepada kita semua, amin,” harap Makatul Alkap.Pelantikan dan pengambilan sumpah janji PTPS Kecamatan Luwuk Utara dilanjutkan dengan pembacaan dan penandatanganan pakta integritas, serta penyematan atribut oleh mewakili Ketua Bawaslu Banggai.Sekira pukul 19.30 Wita, dilanjutkan dengan pembekalan pengawas tempat pemunggutan suara, di Aula Kantor Kecamatan Luwuk Utara. RUM
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-A total of 52 Polling Place Supervisors (PTPS) throughout North Luwuk District were appointed and took an oath of office by the Chair of the North Luwuk District General Election Supervisory Committee (Panwaslu), Makatul Alkap in the North Luwuk District Office Hall, at approximately 16.00 WITA, Sunday (21/1/2024). Village and sub-district TPS supervisors in North Luwuk District, consisting of 10 people from Kilongan Village, 11 people from Kilongan Permai Village, 2 people from Bumi Beringin Village, 2 people from Awu Village, 4 people from Boyou Village, 4 people from Biak Village. 8 people, Bunga Village 5 people, Kamumu Village 2 people, Salodik Village 3 people, Lenyek Village 2 people, and Buon Mandiri Village 3 people. READ ALSO: SMAN 3 Luwuk Hasn't Refunded SPP Dues for December According to the Decree of the Chairman of the Luwuk District General Election Supervisory Committee North Number: 001/HK.01.01/K.ST-01.21/01/2024, concerning the Appointment of Polling Place Supervisors throughout North Luwuk District in the 2024 Simultaneous General Election. Bawaslu Banggai and his staff, Chairman and Members of the North Luwuk District Panwaslu, Village and Subdistrict Supervisors throughout North Luwuk District, Head of the North Luwuk Panwaslu Secretariat, Luwuk Police Chief, Rohaniawan, and all participants, as well as invited guests. Chair of the North Luwuk District Panwaslu, Makatul Alkap in The inauguration and oath-taking stated that PTPS has the responsibility to save Pancasila and the 1945 Constitution of the Republic of Indonesia. This oath or promise is a promise to God Almighty and humans which must be kept with all sincerity and honesty. READ ALSO: Unismuh Luwuk Agenda KKN-MB Students Delegated on January 25 By offering praise to Almighty God, he said, on Sunday, January 21 2024, he will be the Chair of the North Luwuk District Panwaslu, based on the Decree of the Head of the North Luwuk District General Election Supervisor Number: 001/HK.01.01 /K.ST-01.21/01/2024, January 21 2024 inaugurated all TPS supervisors for the 2024 general election. READ ALSO: Following are the Simultaneous Village Election Winners in 95 Villages and Their Votes! "I believe that you will carry out your duties as well as possible , in accordance with applicable statutory provisions with full sense of responsibility. "May God Almighty always give mercy to all of us, amen," hoped Makatul Alkap. The inauguration and taking of the oath of promise of PTPS North Luwuk District was continued with the reading and signing of the integrity pact, as well as the pinning of attributes by representing the Chairperson of Bawaslu Banggai. At approximately 19.30 WITA, followed by debriefing of voting place supervisors, in the North Luwuk District Office Hall. RUM

title: TUMBUHKAN SPORT TOURISM, DINAS PARIWISATA GELAR BANGGAI RUN CHALLENGE 2024
text: DKISP BANGGAI – Tour de Banggai yang merupakan ajang bagi pecinta balap sepeda di Kabupaten Banggai tidak akan digelar tahun ini. Sebagai gantinya, Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai melalui Dinas Pariwisata akan menghelat Banggai Run Challenge 2024.Hal ini memastikan bahwa kegiatan yang menggabungkan olahraga dan pariwisata atau sport tourism tetap tumbuh di Kabupaten Banggai.“Kegiatan ini merupakan pengganti dari Tour de Banggai. Jadi, kita mengikuti tren yang ada. Sekarang ini trennya lari,” ujar Bupati Banggai Amirudin saat memimpin rapat persiapan pelaksanaan Banggai Run Challenge 2024, Kamis (18/1/2024), di Kantor Bupati Banggai, Luwuk Selatan.Bupati Amirudin berharap ajang ini dapat menumbuhkan perekonomian, khususnya bagi pelaku UMKM dan ekonomi kreatif.“Ini kegiatan bagus, murah dan  menyehatkan, dan diharapkan dapat menumbuhkan perekonomian masyarakat setempat,” ujar Bupati Amirudin.Kepala Dinas Pariwisata Kabupaten Banggai Ismed Wardhana mengatakan, Banggai Run Challenge 2024 akan digelar tiga kali atau season di tiga lokasi berbeda. Run de Toili menjadi pembuka Banggai Run Challenge 2024 season pertama.“Run de Toili season 1 akan dilaksanakan di Kecamatan Toili, hari Minggu, tanggal 3 Maret 2024. Titik start dan finish di Lapangan Tirta Sari dan akan melewati Desa Tirta Kencana, Desa Jaya Kencana, dan Desa Sentral Sari,” ujar Ismed.Selanjutnya, season 2 akan dihelat di Kecamatan Bunta pada bulan Mei. Banggai Run Challenge season 3 dilaksanakan di Kecamatan Luwuk pada Agustus mendatang.Adapun kelas yang diperlombakan yakni kelas fun 5 Km (men and women open) dan kelas run 10 Km (men and women open). Ada pula kelas master B lokal dan master A berdasarkan kategori usia.Para peserta Banggai Run Challenge akan memperebutkan total hadiah sebesar Rp 70 juta. Panitia memperkirakan, ajang ini akan diikuti sekitar 1.000 sampai 1.500 orang.*Tim Liputan Dinas Komunikasi Informatika Statistik dan Persandian (DKISP) Kabupaten Banggai
text_en: DKISP BANGGAI – Tour de Banggai, which is an event for bicycle racing lovers in Banggai Regency, will not be held this year. Instead, the Banggai Regency Government through the Tourism Office will hold the Banggai Run Challenge 2024. This ensures that activities that combine sports and tourism or sport tourism continue to grow in Banggai Regency. "This activity is a replacement for the Tour de Banggai. So, we follow existing trends. "Right now the trend is running," said Banggai Regent Amirudin when leading a preparatory meeting for the implementation of the 2024 Banggai Run Challenge, Thursday (18/1/2024), at the Banggai Regent's Office, South Luwuk. Regent Amirudin hopes that this event can grow the economy, especially for MSMEs. and the creative economy. "This is a good, cheap and healthy activity, and is expected to grow the economy of the local community," said Regent Amirudin. Head of the Banggai Regency Tourism Office, Ismed Wardhana, said that the Banggai Run Challenge 2024 will be held three times or in seasons in three different locations. Run de Toili is the opening of the first season of the Banggai Run Challenge 2024. "Run de Toili season 1 will be held in Toili District, Sunday, March 3 2024. The start and finish point will be at Tirta Sari Field and will pass through Tirta Kencana Village, Jaya Kencana Village , and Sentral Sari Village," said Ismed. Next, season 2 will be held in Bunta District in May. Banggai Run Challenge season 3 will be held in Luwuk District next August. The classes being contested are the 5 Km fun class (men and women open) and the 10 Km run class (men and women open). There are also local master B and master A classes based on age categories. Banggai Run Challenge participants will compete for a total prize of IDR 70 million. The committee estimates that this event will be attended by around 1,000 to 1,500 people.

title: Jenazah Briptu Anumerta yang Gugur dalam Operasi Damai Cartenz Tiba di Luwuk, Kapolres Banggai Beri Penghormatan
text: FOTO: HUMAS POLRES BANGGAIBANGGAINEWS.COM-Jenazah personel Resimen Pelopor Korp Brimob Polri Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy yang meninggal dunia saat melaksanakan tugas Operasi Damai Cartenz tiba di Kota luwuk, kabupaten banggai, Sulteng, Minggu (21/1/2023) siang.“Kedatangan jenazah di Bandara Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk ini didampingi langsung Danmen 3 Paspor Korps Brimob Polri Kombes Pol Wahyu SIK, SH dan Kasatgas Tindak Operasi Damai Cartenz AKBP Irwan Jaya dan satu personel Bripda Khozin,” kata Kasi Humas polres banggai Iptu Al Amin S. Muda.Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy disambut langsung kapolres banggai AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, sejumlah Pejabat Utama Polres Banggai dan Kasubden II Den B Pelopor Luwuk Polda Sulteng dan anggota Brimob sekaligus memberikan penghormatan.Usai penghormatan, Jenazah almarhum langsung dibawa ke rumah duka Jalan Gunung Colo, Kelurahan Mangkio Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai untuk diserahkan kepada keluarga.“Rencana upacara pemakaman dilaksanakan Senin 22 Januari 2023 pagi di TMP Tanjung Tuis, Luwuk Selstan,” jelasnya.Sebelumnya, Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) kembali berulah di awal Tahun 2024. Aksi tersebut dilakukan di Kabupaten Intan Jaya pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII).Serangan dari KKB diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan 1 Personel Operasi Damai Cartenz terkena tembakan.Personel yang terkena luka tembak telah di evakuasi dan di lakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter bahwa personel tersebut dinyatakan gugur usai terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan.(HPB) ,
text_en: PHOTO: POLRES PUBLIC RELATIONS BANGGAIBANGGAINEWS.COM-The bodies of the personnel from the Pioneer Regiment of the Brimob Police Corps Brigadier Posthumous Alfandi Steve Karamoy, who died while carrying out his duties in the Cartenz Peace Operation, arrived in Luwuk City, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, Sunday (21/1/2023) afternoon." "The arrival of the body at Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Bubung Luwuk Airport was accompanied directly by Danmen 3 Passports of the Brimob Police Corps, Kombes Pol Wahyu SIK, SH and the Head of the Cartenz Peace Operations Task Force, AKBP Irwan Jaya and one Bripda Khozin personnel," said Head of Public Relations of the police, proud Inspector Al Amin S. Muda.The body of Brigadier Posthumous Alfandi Steve Karamoy was greeted directly by the Head of the Police, AKBP Ade Nuramdani SH, SIK, MM, a number of Main Officials of the Banggai Police and Head of Sub-Department II of Den B, Luwuk Pioneer, Central Sulawesi Police and members of Brimob who also paid their respects. After the tribute, the body of the deceased was immediately taken to funeral home on Jalan Gunung Colo, Mangkio Baru Village, Luwuk District, Banggai Regency to be handed over to the family. "The funeral ceremony is planned to be held on Monday 22 January 2023 morning at TMP Tanjung Tuis, Luwuk Selstan," he explained. Previously, the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) returned acted at the beginning of 2024. This action was carried out in Intan Jaya Regency led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII). The attack from KKB allegedly came from behind the Telkomsel BTS Tower, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency which resulted in 1 Cartenz Peace Operation Personnel being hit. shot. The personnel who suffered gunshot wounds have been evacuated and given first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center, but the doctor said that the personnel was declared dead after being hit by a shot in the left jaw through the right jaw. (HPB),

title: HBI ke-74, Imigrasi Banggai sukses selenggarakan Fun Walk
text: Banggai (ANTARA) - Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Banggai sukses menyelenggarakan Fun Walk sebagai rangkaian perayaan Hari Bhakti Imigrasi (HBI) Ke-74 tahun 2024, Minggu 21/01. Fun Walk ini melibatkan rute sepanjang 5 kilometer, melewati komplek Halimun, depan kantor Bupati Banggai, hingga kembali ke kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non-TPI Banggai. "Kegiatan ini mencerminkan semangat kolektif dalam membangun dan mengembangkan keimigrasian," ucap Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Banggai Octaveri, Senin 22/01. Menurutnya, tujuan utama Fun Walk adalah mempererat silaturahmi, meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat terhadap peran keimigrasian di Indonesia, serta mensosialisasikan pentingnya transformasi digital dalam pelayanan keimigrasian. "Pentingnya transformasi digital sebagai respons terhadap tuntutan zaman dan teknologi, berharap acara ini tidak hanya menjadi kegiatan olahraga tetapi juga sebagai sarana untuk menyebarkan informasi tentang inovasi di bidang keimigrasian," paparnya. Sementara itu, Ir. Razilu Inspektur Jenderal Kementerian Hukum dan Ham, menyambut antusias acara ini sebagai bagian dari inovasi bersama. Dia menyatakan bahwa Fun Walk mencerminkan semangat baru di era globalisasi, dan bahwa imigrasi akan terus berinovasi dengan mewujudkan pelayanan berbasis digital. "Ini bukan hanya kegiatan rekreasi semata, melainkan juga langkah positif untuk memperkuat sinergi antar instansi dan melibatkan masyarakat secara langsung," terangnya. Selain mempromosikan kebersamaan, Fun Walk ini juga dianggap sebagai wujud kepedulian terhadap kesehatan masyarakat di era digital. Peserta diingatkan tentang pentingnya menjaga kesehatan, terutama di tengah pesatnya perkembangan teknologi. "Sebagai bagian dari perayaan Hari Bhakti Imigrasi, kegiatan ini diharapkan dapat meningkatkan pemahaman masyarakat mengenai peran keimigrasian dan memberikan dampak positif yang lebih luas. Transformasi digital yang diusung diharapkan dapat mempermudah prosedur dan memperkuat sistem pengawasan di bidang keimigrasian," tuturnya. Fun Walk di Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Banggai bukan hanya menjadi momen bersejarah dalam perayaan HBI Ke-74, tetapi juga menciptakan momentum positif bagi semua pihak yang terlibat. Semangat kebersamaan, kesehatan, dan inovasi dalam pelayanan publik menjadi nilai yang diusung, menjadikan acara ini sebagai contoh positif untuk kegiatan serupa di masa depan. Kegiatan ini diikuti oleh berbagai pejabat tinggi pratama, termasuk Inspektur Jenderal Kementerian Hukum dan HAM Republik Indonesia, Kakanwil Kemenkumham Sulteng, Bupati Banggai, Forkopimda Kabupaten Banggai, Kepala Itwil Kemenkumham, serta Para Kepala UPT Kemenkumham Sulteng beserta seluruh staf Kantor Imigrasi Banggai.
text_en: Banggai (ANTARA) - Banggai Class II Non TPI Immigration Office successfully held a Fun Walk as a series of celebrations for the 74th Immigration Service Day (HBI) in 2024, Sunday 21/01. This Fun Walk involves a 5 kilometer route, passing through the Halimun complex, in front of the Banggai Regent's office, and returning to the Banggai Class II Non-TPI Immigration office. "This activity reflects the collective spirit in building and developing immigration," said Head of the Banggai Immigration Office, Octaveri, Monday 22/01. According to him, the main aim of Fun Walk is to strengthen friendship, increase public awareness of the role of immigration in Indonesia, and socialize the importance of digital transformation in immigration services. "The importance of digital transformation as a response to the demands of the times and technology, we hope that this event will not only be a sporting activity but also a means to disseminate information about innovation in the immigration sector," he explained. Meanwhile, Ir. Razilu, Inspector General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, enthusiastically welcomed this event as part of joint innovation. He stated that the Fun Walk reflects a new spirit in the era of globalization, and that immigration will continue to innovate by creating digital-based services. "This is not just a recreational activity, but also a positive step to strengthen synergy between agencies and involve the community directly," he explained. Apart from promoting togetherness, this Fun Walk is also considered a form of concern for public health in the digital era. Participants were reminded of the importance of maintaining health, especially in the midst of rapid technological developments. "As part of the celebration of Immigration Service Day, this activity is expected to increase public understanding of the role of immigration and have a wider positive impact. The digital transformation being promoted is expected to simplify procedures and strengthen the monitoring system in the immigration sector," he said. The Fun Walk at the Class II Non TPI Banggai Immigration Office was not only a historic moment in the 74th HBI celebration, but also created positive momentum for all parties involved. The spirit of togetherness, health and innovation in public services are the values ​​promoted, making this event a positive example for similar activities in the future. This activity was attended by various high-ranking officials, including the Inspector General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia, the Regional Head of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights for Central Sulawesi, the Regent of Banggai, the Forkopimda of Banggai Regency, the Head of the Itwil of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, as well as the Heads of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights UPT along with all the staff of the Banggai Immigration Office.

title: Korban Tewas Penembakan KKB Dimakamkan Secara Militer di TMP Tanjung Tuwis Banggai Sulteng
text: TRIBUNNEWS.COM, BANGGAI -Korban tewas penembakan Kelompok Kriminal Bersenjata (KKB) Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy dimakamkan di Taman Makam Pahlawan (TMP) Tanjung Tuwis, Kecamatan Luwuk Selatan,Kabupaten Banggai,Sulawesi Tengah, Senin (22/1/2024).Komandan Resimen 3 Pasukan Pelopor Korps Brimob Polri Kombes Pol Wahyu bertindak menjadi Inspektur Upacarapemakaman.Kombes Pol Wahyu adalah komandan Almarhum Alfandi Steve Karamoy di Mako Brimob Polri Jakarta, sekaligus akan mewakili Polri dalam upacara pemakaman."Saya jadi inspektur upacara, danpemakamandilakukan secara militer di TMP Tanjung Tuwis," kata Kombes Pol Wahyu kepada TribunPalu.com, di rumah duka Jl Gunung Colo Kelurahan Mangkio Baru, Kecamatan Luwuk, Senin (22/1/2024).Komandan Satgas (Dansatgas) Tindak Operasi Damai Cartenz-2024 AKBP Irwan Jaya secara khusus mengantar jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy dari Papua ke Luwuk,Kabupaten Banggai.Jenazah Briptu Anumerta Alfando Steve Karamoy diterbangkan menggunakan pesawat Smar-Air PK-SNP dari Bandara Bilorai Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya, menuju Timika.Lalu dari Bandara Mozes Kilangin Timika, jenazah diterbangkan lagi menuju Bandara Sultan Hasanuddin Makassar, Sulawesi Selatan, Sabtu (20/1/2024).Karena tak sesuai dengan jadwal penerbangan ke Luwuk, jenazah akhirnya bermalam dan disemayamkan di Mako Brimob Polda Sulawesi Selatan, dan besoknya Minggu (21/1/2024) atau siang tadi akhirnya tiba di Luwuk, Kabupaten Banggai sekira pukul 11.00 Wita."Kami dari Satgas Damai Cartenz telah mengantar dan menyerahkan jenazah kepada keluarga, dan selanjutnya akan dimakamkan secara militer di Luwuk," kata Dansatgas Tindak Operasi Damai Cartenz-2024, AKBP Irwan Jaya, di rumah duka.Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy gugur ditembak KKB Papua pimpinan Apen Kobogau (Wakil Pangkodap VIII), di Intan Jaya Papua, pada Jumat (19/1/2024).Serangan dari KKB Papua diduga berasal dari belakang Tower BTS Telkomsel, Kampung Bilogai, Distrik Sugapa, Kabupaten Intan Jaya yang mengakibatkan Briptu Anumerta Alfandi Steve Karamoy terkena tembakan.Kasatgas Humas Operasi Damai Cartenz, AKBP Bayu Suseno, menerangkan, usai terkena tembakkan, korban langsung dievakuasi dan dilakukan pertolongan pertama di Puskesmas Sugapa, namun oleh dokter dinyatakan meninggal dunia."Anggota Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy terkena tembakan di bagian rahang kiri tembus rahang kanan dan mengakibatkan anggota gugur," ungkap Bayu Suseno.Bayu menyampaikan bahwa anggota Ops Damai Cartenz yang berada di wilayah tersebut mengalami serangan dari KKB selama 30 menit dari arah belakang pos.
text_en: TRIBUNNEWS.COM, BANGGAI - The victim who died in the shooting of the Armed Criminal Group (KKB) Brigadier Posthumous Alfandi Steve Karamoy was buried at the Tanjung Tuwis Heroes' Cemetery (TMP), South Luwuk District, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, Monday (22/1/2024). Commander of the Regiment 3 Pioneer Troop of the National Police Mobile Brigade Corps, Kombes Pol Wahyu, acts as Inspector of Funeral Ceremonies. Kombes Pol Wahyu is the commander of the late Alfandi Steve Karamoy at Headquarters of the Indonesian Police Mobile Brigade, Jakarta, and will also represent the National Police at the funeral ceremony. "I am the ceremonial inspector, and the funeral is carried out militarily at the TMP Tanjung Tuwis," said Police Commissioner Wahyu to TribunPalu.com, at the funeral home on Jl Gunung Colo, Mangkio Baru Village, Luwuk District, Monday (22/1/2024). Commander of the Cartenz-2024 Peace Operation Task Force (Dansatgas) AKBP Irwan Jaya in person specifically to accompany the body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy from Papua to Luwuk, Banggai Regency. The body of Posthumous Brigadier Alfando Steve Karamoy was flown using a Smar-Air PK-SNP aircraft from Bilorai Sugapa Airport, Intan Jaya Regency, to Timika. Then from Timika's Mozes Kilangin Airport, The body was flown again to Sultan Hasanuddin Airport, Makassar, South Sulawesi, Saturday (20/1/2024). Because it did not match the flight schedule to Luwuk, the body ended up spending the night and was buried at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters of the South Sulawesi Regional Police, and the next day, Sunday (21/1/ 2024) or this afternoon finally arrived in Luwuk, Banggai Regency at around 11.00 WITA. "We from the Cartenz Peace Task Force have accompanied and handed over the body to the family, and then it will be buried militarily in Luwuk," said the Cartenz-2024 Peace Operations Task Force Dansatgas, AKBP Irwan Jaya, at the funeral home. Posthumous Brigadier Alfandi Steve Karamoy was shot dead by KKB Papua led by Apen Kobogau (Deputy Pangkodap VIII), in Intan Jaya Papua, on Friday (19/1/2024). The attack from KKB Papua is thought to have come from behind the Tower Telkomsel BTS, Bilogai Village, Sugapa District, Intan Jaya Regency which resulted in Brigadier Posthumous Alfandi Steve Karamoy being hit by gunfire. Head of the Cartenz Peace Operations Public Relations Task Force, AKBP Bayu Suseno, explained that after being hit by gunfire, the victim was immediately evacuated and given first aid at the Sugapa Community Health Center, however was declared dead by the doctor. "Member Bripda Alfandi Steve Karamoy was shot in the left jaw through the right jaw and resulted in the member falling," said Bayu Suseno. Bayu said that members of Ops Damai Cartenz who were in the area experienced attacks from the KKB for 30 minutes. from behind the post.

title: Buka Pembekalan KKN-MB, Rektor Unismuh Luwuk: Ini Tiket Mahasiswa Menuju Skripsi
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Sebelum diturunkan ke lokasi, sebanyak 201 mahasiswa Universitas Muhammadiyah (Unismuh) Luwuk mengikuti pembekalan KKN MB.KKN MB angkatan ke 35 itu resmi dibuka oleh Rektor Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., Senin 24 Januari 2024 di pelataran kampus hijau tersebut.Dalam kesempatan itu, Rektor menyampaikan selamat kepada mahasiswa yang akan mengikuti KKN MB Angkatan 35.BACA JUGA:Peringati 1 Muharram, PHBI Ajak Umat Islam Berlomba Dalam Kebaikan“Ini adalah salah satu tiket untuk bisa menuju skripsi, dan lulus hingga diwisuda,,” Rektor Dr Sutrisno K Djawa kepada ratusan peserta Pembekalan KKN-MB.Olehnya, Ia mengingatkan kepada mahasiswa untuk mengikuti pembekalan dengan sebaik-baiknya. Apalagi ini menjadi salah satu indikator penilaian lulus atau tidaknya dalam program ini.“Selama tujuh semester rekan-rekan mahasiswa menerima teori dan ditambah lagi mendapat penguatan di pembekalan. Sehingga di lapangan nanti, mahasiswa bisa mentransfer ilmu kepada masyarakat,” kata Rektor.BACA JUGA:Babhinkamtibmas Pantau Penyaluran BLT-DD di Malanggong BangkepSaat di lokasi KKN nanti, Rektor Dr Sutrisno K Djawa berharap mahasiswa KKN dapat memberikan nilai di semua aspek terhadap masyarakat, baik nilai ekonomi, sosial, ideologi dan lainnya.Sebagaimana dalam perguruan tinggi Muhammadiyah kata Rektor, ada Catur Dharma yang harus dijalankan, civitas akademika. Di antaranya adalah pengabdian masyarakat.BACA JUGA:Demo Menolak UU Cipta Kerja Nyaris BentrokPembukaan Pembekalan KKN-MB itu dihadiri Wakil Rektor I Mustafa Abd Rahim, Wakil Rektor II Nirwan Moh Nur, Ketua LP3M Risno Mina, para Dekan, dan Dosen Pembimbing Lapangan (DPL) serta panitia. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Before being sent to the location, 201 students of Muhammadiyah University (Unismuh) Luwuk took part in the KKN MB training. The 35th batch of MB KKN was officially opened by the Chancellor of Unismuh Luwuk, Dr. Sutrisno K Djawa SE., MM., Monday 24 January 2024 in the green campus courtyard. On that occasion, the Chancellor congratulated the students who would take part in KKN MB Batch 35. READ ALSO: Commemorating the 1st of Muharram, PHBI Invites Muslims to Compete in Kindness "This is one of the tickets to be able to complete your thesis and graduate," Chancellor Dr Sutrisno K Djawa told hundreds of participants in the KKN-MB briefing. Therefore, he reminded students to take part in the briefing as well as possible. Moreover, this is one of the indicators for assessing whether or not you have passed this program. "For seven semesters, fellow students received theory and additionally received reinforcement in debriefing. "So that in the field later, students can transfer knowledge to the community," said the Chancellor. both economic, social, ideological and other values. As in Muhammadiyah universities, said the Chancellor, there is a Catur Dharma that must be carried out by the academic community. Among these is community service. ALSO READ: Demonstration against the Job Creation Law Almost Clashes The opening of the KKN-MB briefing was attended by Deputy Chancellor I Mustafa Abd Rahim, Deputy Chancellor II Nirwan Moh Nur, Chair of LP3M Risno Mina, Deans, and Field Supervisors (DPL ) as well as the committee. (*)

title: Dor! Polisi Lumpuhkan Pencuri Sepeda Motor di Bualemo Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA– Tim Reserse Mobile (Resmob) Tompotika Satreskrim Polres Banggai berhasil melumpuhkan dan mengkap SA (46) terduga pelaku pencurian kendaraan bermotor di Kecamatan Bualemo, Banggai, yang terjadi pada 28 November 2023.“Terduga pelaku ini ditangkap di rumahnya di Desa Bima Karya, Bualemo pada Minggu (21/1/2024) pukul 15.17 Wita,” ujar Kasat Reskrim Polres Banggai AKP Tio Tondy.BACA JUGA:Kafilah Banggai Siap Unjuk Gigi di MTQ BalutSaat dilakukan penangkapan, SA berusaha melakukan perlawanan dengan mencoba kabur turun dari mobil polisi, sehingga dilakukan tindakan tegas terukur di bagian betis sebelah kanan.Adapun penangkapan SA itu berdasarkan laporan polisi nomor LP/685/XII/2023/SPKT/Res-Bgi/Polda Sulteng tertanggal 1 Desember 2023, terkait curanmor.“Berdasarkan hasil interogasi, SA mengaku telah melakukan pencurian sepeda motor milik tetangganya Depin Eko Prasetyo pada pukul 05.00 Wita/subuh dengan cara mendorong sepeda motor Suzuki FL 125 RCD yang terparkir dihalaman rumah,” ungkap Kasat.BACA JUGA:Palu dan Banggai Tertinggi Kasus Covid Belum SembuhTio mengungkapkan bahwa barang bukti tersebut kemudian dibawah oleh pelaku menuju Desa Biak Kecamatan Luwuk Utara kepada temannya untuk bantu dijualkan.Lanjutnya, setelah motor tersebut terjual sebesar Rp 1,5 Juta, pelaku langsung kembali ke rumahnya di Desa Bima Karya.BACA JUGA:7 Fakultas Unismuh Luwuk Mulai Tahapan Pildek“Uang hasil penjualan, telah habis pelaku gunakan untuk memenuhi kebutuhannya sehari-hari,” terang Tio.Selanjutnya kami membawa SA ke IGD RSUD Luwuk untuk mendapatkan perawatan medis.“Saat ini SA tersebut sudah diamankan di Mapolres Banggai guna dilakukan pemeriksaan lebih lanjut,” pungkasnya. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA– The Tompotika Satreskrim Banggai Police Mobile Investigation Team (Resmob) succeeded in immobilizing and arresting SA (46), the alleged perpetrator of motor vehicle theft in Bualemo District, Banggai, which occurred on November 28 2023. "This suspected perpetrator was arrested at his home in Bima Karya Village , Bualemo on Sunday (21/1/2024) at 15.17 WITA," said Head of Criminal Investigation Unit for the Banggai Police, AKP Tio Tondy. READ ALSO: Banggai Caravan Ready to Show Off at MTQ Balut. When the arrest was made, SA tried to resist by trying to escape from the police car. , so that measured firm action was taken on the right calf. Meanwhile, SA's arrest was based on police report number LP/685/XII/2023/SPKT/Res-Bgi/Polda Sulteng dated 1 December 2023, related to theft. "Based on the results of the interrogation, SA "admitted to stealing a motorbike belonging to his neighbor Depin Eko Prasetyo at 05.00 WITA/dawn by pushing a Suzuki FL 125 RCD motorbike which was parked in the yard," said Kasat. The perpetrator then took the motorbike to Biak Village, North Luwuk District, to his friend to help him sell it. Furthermore, after the motorbike was sold for IDR 1.5 million, the perpetrator immediately returned to his house in Bima Karya Village. READ ALSO: 7 Faculties of Unismuh Luwuk Begin Stages of Pildek "The perpetrator used the money from the sale to meet his daily needs," explained Tio. Next, we took SA to the emergency room at Luwuk Regional Hospital to receive medical treatment. "Currently, SA has been secured at the Banggai Police Headquarters for further examination," he concluded. (*)

title: Personel Polres Banggai Jalani Pemeriksaan Kesehatan Berkala
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Personel Polres Banggai menjalani pemeriksaan kesehatan berkala semester I tahun 2024, di aula Maleo Mapolres Banggai, Senin (29/1/2024). Di sela kegiatan itu, Ps. Kasi Dokkes, Aipda Yulius Tomiling mengatakan pemeriksaan kesehatan merupakan serangkaian kegiatan pemeriksaan medis, yang dilaksanakan Polri secara periodik. “Kegiatan dilaksanakan oleh Biddokkes Polda Sulteng, bekerja sama dengan Maxima Laboratorium Klinik Kota Palu,” kata Yulius. Medical chek up tersebut, lanjutnya,dipimpin IPDA Fadli Tumiwa dari Biddokkes Polda Sulteng dan Linda Lamuanta dari Maxima Palu. “Rencana kuotanya sebanyak 100 orang yang akan diperiksa kesehatannya,” ujarnya. Selain personel Polres Banggai, sambungnya, pihak Polsek jajaran dan Brimob Luwuk juga ikut serta dalam pelaksanaan pemeriksaan kesehatan berkala tersebut. “Pemeriksaan kesehatan ini nantinya digunakan personel yang akan mengikuti tes Pendidikan Sekolah Inspektur Polisi (SIP), persiapan Pendidikan dan Pengembangan (Dikbang), dan yang akan diusulkan Kenaikan Pangkat (KNP),” terangnya. Menurutnya, kesehatan anggota menjadi perhatian yang serius, mengingat tugas pelayanan anggota Polri membutuhkan kondisi fisik yang sehat dan prima di tengah mobilitas yang tinggi. “Pemeriksaan kesehatan dilakukan secara menyeluruh, baik pemeriksaan fisik, darah, urine, thorax PA, ECG, MMPI, Ondotogram dan Treadmill usia 41 ke atas,” tandasnya. */PAR Di sela kegiatan itu, Ps. text_en: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Banggai Police personnel underwent periodic health checks in the first semester of 2024, in the Maleo hall of the Banggai Police Headquarters, Monday (29/1/2024). In between these activities, Ps. Kasi Dokkes, Aipda Yulius Tomiling said that health checks are a series of medical examination activities, which are carried out by the National Police periodically. "The activity was carried out by the Central Sulawesi Police Biddokkes, in collaboration with Maxima Clinical Laboratory of Palu City," said Yulius. The medical check-up, he continued, was led by IPDA Fadli Tumiwa from the Central Sulawesi Regional Police's Biddokkes and Linda Lamuanta from Maxima Palu. "The planned quota is 100 people whose health will be checked," he said. Apart from Banggai Police personnel, he continued, the Luwuk Sector Police and Brimob also took part in carrying out the periodic health checks. "This health examination will be used by personnel who will take the Police Inspector School Education (SIP) test, Education and Development preparation (Dikbang), and those who will be proposed for Promotion (KNP)," he explained. According to him, the health of members is a serious concern, considering that the service duties of Polri members require healthy and excellent physical condition amidst high mobility. "Health examinations are carried out thoroughly, including physical examination, blood, urine, thorax PA, ECG, MMPI, Ondotogram and Treadmill for ages 41 and over," he said. */PAR In between the activities, Ps. "This health examination will be used by personnel who will take the Police Inspector School Education (SIP) test, Education and Development preparation (Dikbang), and those who will be proposed for Promotion (KNP)," he explained. According to him, the health of members is a serious concern, considering that the service duties of Polri members require healthy and excellent physical condition amidst high mobility. "Health examinations are carried out thoroughly, including physical examination, blood, urine, thorax PA, ECG, MMPI, Ondotogram and Treadmill for ages 41 and over," he said. */PAR "This health examination will be used by personnel who will take the Police Inspector School Education (SIP) test, Education and Development preparation (Dikbang), and those who will be proposed for Promotion (KNP)," he explained. According to him, the health of members is a serious concern, considering that the service duties of Polri members require healthy and excellent physical condition amidst high mobility. title: Wabup Banggai Luncurkan Bantuan Pangan Beras
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Wakil Bupati (Wabup) Banggai, H. Furqanuddin Masulili meluncurkan penyaluran bantuan pangan beras, yang diselenggarakan oleh Dinas Ketahanan Pangan (Ketapang) bersama (Perum) Bulog Cabang Luwuk, di Kantor Bupati Banggai, Senin (29/1/2024). Dalam laporannya, Kepala Dinas (Kadis) Ketapang Banggai, Alfian Djibran mengatakan, bantuan pangan beras tersebut berasal dari stok cadangan pangan pemerintah. “Alhamdulillah, Kabupaten Banggai termasuk salah satu kabupaten yang paling cepat menyalurkan bantuan ini,” kata Alfian. Pemkab Banggai bersama Bulog akan menyalurkan bantuan tersebut kepada 27.364 Keluarga Penerima Manfaat (KPM) di 24 Kecamatan Kabupaten Banggai. Bantuan diberikan sebanyak 10 kilogram per KPM selama 6 bulan, atau total 60 kilogram per KPM. Wabup Banggai, Furqanuddin Masulili mengatakan masalah pangan merupakan hal yang sangat mendasar dalam kehidupan masyarakat. “Olehnya itu, yang paling utama di sini adalah bagaimana penyaluran ini betul-betul sesuai dengan data yang sudah kita tetapkan, sehingga betul-betul menyasar kepada Keluarga Penerima Manfaat,” kata Wabup. Menurutnya, program tersebut bertujuan untuk mengurangi pengeluaran bagi penerima bantuan pangan, serta memastikan keberlangsungan akses pangan bagi masyarakat yang membutuhkan. “Hal ini dilaksanakan tentu dengan tujuan mengatasi inflasi di daerah. Tentu ini sangat luar biasa, enam bulan ke depan mudah-mudahan lonjakan harga pangan kita akan teratasi,” harap Wabup. */PAR Dalam laporannya, Kepala Dinas (Kadis) Ketapang Banggai, Alfian Djibran mengatakan, bantuan pangan beras tersebut berasal dari stok cadangan pangan pemerintah. “Alhamdulillah, Kabupaten Banggai termasuk salah satu kabupaten yang paling cepat menyalurkan bantuan ini,” kata Alfian. text_en: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Deputy Regent (Wabup) Banggai, H. Furqanuddin Masulili launched the distribution of rice food aid, organized by the Food Security Service (Ketapang) together with (Perum) Bulog Luwuk Branch, at the Banggai Regent's Office, Monday (29/1/2024 ). In his report, the Head of the Ketapang Banggai Service (Kadis), Alfian Djibran, said that the rice food aid came from the government's food reserves. "Thank God, Banggai Regency is one of the districts that distributed this aid the fastest," said Alfian. The Banggai Regency Government together with Bulog will distribute this assistance to 27,364 Beneficiary Families (KPM) in 24 Districts of Banggai Regency. Assistance is provided in the amount of 10 kilograms per KPM for 6 months, or a total of 60 kilograms per KPM. Deputy Regent of Banggai, Furqanuddin Masulili, said that the food problem is a very basic thing in people's lives. "Therefore, the most important thing here is how this distribution is truly in accordance with the data that we have determined, so that it is truly targeted at the Beneficiary Families," said the Deputy Regent. According to him, the program aims to reduce expenses for food aid recipients, as well as ensure continued access to food for people in need. "This is of course carried out with the aim of overcoming inflation in the region. "Of course this is extraordinary, in the next six months hopefully our food price spike will be resolved," hoped the Deputy Regent. */PAR In his report, the Head of the Ketapang Banggai Service (Kadis), Alfian Djibran, said that the rice food aid came from the government's food reserves. title: Wabup Banggai Sebut Gereja Berfungsi Mewadahi Kasih, Pengharapan dan Pelayanan
text: BANGGAI RAYA-Wakil Bupati Banggai H Furqanuddin Masulili mengatakan peresmian dan pentahbisan gereja adalah bukti nyata dari kesatuan dan kekuatan iman para jemaat. “Gereja bukan hanya tempat ibadah, tetapi juga tempat yang mewadahi kasih, pengharapan, dan pelayanan kepada sesama,” kata Wabup saat memberikan sambutan pada peresmian Gereja Jemaat GKLB Siloam Hion, bertempat di Desa Hion Kecamatan Pagimana, Senin (29/1/2024)..Ia mengatakan , gereja merupakan pondasi moral dan rohani bagi masyarakat kita umat kristiani, dan perayaan hari ini tidak hanya terkait pembangunan fisik gedung gereja, tetapi juga komitmen kita untuk memperkuat iman, persaudaraan, dan pelayanan kepada sesama.BACA JUGA:Mahasiswa S1, S2, dan S3 Full Senyum, Pemda Morut Siapkan Rp9 M untuk Beasiswa Tahun IniIa mengucapkan terima kasih kepada seluruh jemaat GKLB Siloam Hion atas kerja keras, dedikasi, dan pengorbanan yang telah dilakukan untuk mencapai tahap ini. Ini adalah hasil dari kerja sama yang kuat dan doa-doa yang tulus.BACA JUGA:27.364 KPM di Banggai Mulai Terima Bantuan Beras“Saya juga ingin mengapresiasi semua pihak yang telah memberikan dukungan finansial, tenaga kerja, dan bantuan moral selama proses pembangunan gereja ini, serta berkomitmen untuk mendukung kebebasan beragama dan menjaga kerukunan antarumat beragama,” tegasnya.Gereja-gereja seperti jemaat GKLB Siloam Hion adalah salah satu pilar yang mendukung kedamaian dan harmoni di Kabupaten Banggai pada umumnya dan Desa Hion Kecamatan Pagimana khususnya. “Mari menjaga kebersamaan, dan terus memperkuat nilai-nilai kebaikan, kasih, dan persatuan antar gereja,” tutup Wabup Furqanuddin.BACA JUGA:Caleg Perindo Banggai Janjikan Program Andalan Bila TerpilihKegiatan Pentahbisan/Pengresmian Gereja Jemaat GKLB Siloam Hion, bertempat di Desa Hion Kecamatan Pagimana, dihadiri berbagai pihak, termasuk perwakilan Sinode, Ketua Klasis Gereja Jemaat GKLB Siloam Hion dan undangan lainnya.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA-Deputy Regent of Banggai H Furqanuddin Masulili said the inauguration and consecration of the church was clear evidence of the unity and strength of the congregation's faith. "The church is not only a place of worship, but also a place that accommodates love, hope and service to others," said the Deputy Regent when giving a speech at the inauguration of the GKLB Siloam Hion Congregational Church, located in Hion Village, Pagimana District, Monday (29/1/2024) ..He said, the church is the moral and spiritual foundation for our society as Christians, and today's celebration is not only related to the physical construction of the church building, but also our commitment to strengthening faith, brotherhood and service to others. READ ALSO: Undergraduate Students, S2, and S3 Full of Smiles, Morut Regional Government Prepares IDR 9 Billion for Scholarships This Year. He expressed his gratitude to the entire GKLB Siloam Hion congregation for the hard work, dedication and sacrifices that have been made to reach this stage. This is the result of strong cooperation and sincere prayers. READ ALSO: 27,364 KPM in Banggai Begin to Receive Rice Assistance "I also want to appreciate all parties who have provided financial support, labor and moral assistance during the process of building this church , and is committed to supporting religious freedom and maintaining harmony between religious communities," he stressed. Churches such as the GKLB Siloam Hion congregation are one of the pillars that support peace and harmony in Banggai Regency in general and Hion Village, Pagimana District in particular. "Let's maintain togetherness, and continue to strengthen the values ​​of kindness, love and unity between churches," concluded Deputy Regent Furqanuddin. ALSO READ: Perindo Banggai Legislative Candidate Promises Mainstay Program If Elected Consecration/Inauguration Activities of GKLB Siloam Hion Congregational Church, located in Hion Village, District This morning, attended by various parties, including representatives of the Synod, Chairman of the Classis of the GKLB Siloam Hion Congregational Church and other invitees.**

title: Bupati Minta Percepatan Penetapan HKI jenis Merk Usulan Pelaku Usaha di Kabupaten Banggai
text: BANGGAI RAYA – Bupati Banggai Amirudin  menghadiri undangan Kanwil Kementerian Hukum dan HAM Sulawesi Tengah di Jakarta, pada Senin (29/1/2024).Kegiatan Rapat Koordinasi dan Fasilitasi HKI pada Direktorat Jenderal Kekayaan Intelektual Kementerian Hukum dan HAM Republik Indonesia merupakan tindaklanjut dari Perjanjian Kerja Sama (PKS) antara Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah dengan Pemerintah Kabupaten Banggai tentang Sosialisasi dan Fasilitasi Hak Kekayaan Intelektual di Kabupaten Banggai.Bupati Amirudin diterima langsung oleh Direktur Hak Cipta dan Desain Industri Ditjen Kekayaan Intelektual Kemenkumham RI, Anggoro Dasananto yang didampingi Kepala Bidang Pelayanan Hukum Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah, Herlina dan jajarannya di ruang rapat Direktorat Hak Cipta dan Desain Industri.Anggoro Dasanto menyampaikan selamat datang dan ucapan terima kasih Kepada Bupati Banggai yang telah berkontribusi dan membantu kerja-kerja Kementerian Hukum dan HAM RI, khususnya terhadap upaya perlindungan Hak Kekayaan Intelektual di Kabupaten Banggai.BACA JUGA:Wabup Banggai Sebut Gereja Berfungsi Mewadahi Kasih, Pengharapan dan Pelayanan“ke depannya kami juga berharap bahwa pendaftaran HKI di Kabupaten Banggai bukan hanya sebatas merek dan hak cipta saja, tetapi bagaimana pemerintah daerah juga dapat mendaftarkan indikasi geografis dan kekayaan intelektual komunal,” ucap, Anggoro.Kabid Pelayanan Hukum Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah, melaporkan kepada Direktur Hak Cipta dan Desain Industri bahwa Kabupaten Banggai sangat responsive terhadap HKI, dan merupakan satu-satunya kabupaten di Sulawesi Tengah yang menganggarkan biaya Fasilitasi HKI di dalam APBD nya.“Untuk meningkatkan kapasitas agen kekayaan intelektual, kami juga melaporkan bahwa beberapa hari ke depan, kami akan melakukan pembinaan dan peningkatan kapasitas agen layanan kekayaan intelektual Kabupaten Banggai yang terdiri dari ASN Badan Riset dan Inovasi Daerah Kabupaten Banggai,”  tutur Herlina.Pada kesempatan yang sama, Bupati Banggai Amirudin juga menyampaikan terima ksih dan apresiasi Kepada Direktur Hak Cipta dan Desain Industri serta Jajaran Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah, atas perhatian dan kerja sama yang baik selama ini. Lebih lanjut bupati juga menyampaikan permohonan percepatan penerbitan sertifikat Hak Merk Dagang yang telah diusulkan sejak tahun 2023 kemarin.BACA JUGA:Kasus Diare Meningkat, Belasan Anak Tengah Dirawat di RSUD Luwuk“Mohon Bantuannya lak direktur untuk mempercepat proses penerbitan merk dagang yang telah diusulkan pada tahun kemarin, ada 29 usulan merek dagang yang belum diterbitkan sertifikat mereknya dari Kementerian Hukum dan HAM RI. Ini menjadi bagian penting khususnya untuk UMKM di Kabupaten Banggai agar dapat mengembangkan usahanya dan adanya kepastian hukum merek yang digunakan sehingga kedepannya tidak terjadi gugatan terhadap merek yang mereka gunakan seperti banyak kasus yang terjadi akhir-akhir ini,” jelas Amirudin.Lebih lanjut Bupati Amirudin menyampaikan terkait dengan Kekayaan Komunal dan Indikasi Geografis yang akan segera didaftarkan. “Saya sudah perintahkan Kepala BRIDA untuk melakukan identifikasi potensi yang terkait dengan Kekayaan Komunal dan Indikasi Geografis, Alhamdulillah Kepala BRIDA sudah melaporkan beberapa yang akan kita daftarkan seperti, Kelapa Babasal, Durian Nambo, Durian Asaan, Aksara Andio, beberapa Ritual Adat dan Beberapa Kuliner Khas Kabupaten Banggai,” ujarnya.BACA JUGA:Ribut Bikin Terganggu Tetangga, Seorang Mahasiswa Dianiaya di Mangkio, Pelaku Diamankan PolisiDalam Kegiatan tersebut, Bupati Banggai didampingi Kepala Badan Riset dan Inovasi Daerah Kabupaten Banggai, Andi Nur Syamsy Amir, Agen Layanan HKI Kabupaten Banggai, Boby A. Palem dan jajaran BRIDA.Pertemuan berlangsung dengan penuh suasana keakraban antara Bupati Banggai dan Direktur Cipta dan Desain Industri. Pada akhir pertemuan Direktur Cipta dan Desain Industri menyampaikan bahwa Direktur Jenderal Kekayaan Intelektual Kementerian Hukum dan HAM RI, Min Usihen, SH., MH akan mejadwalkan pertemuan khusus dengan Bupati Banggai pada hari Selasa, 30 Januari 2024.Mengakhiri pertemuan tersebut, Bupati Amirudin memberikan cendera mata berupa Kain Tenun Nambo kepada Direktur Cipta dan Desain Industri.**
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA – Banggai Regent Amirudin attended the invitation of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Regional Office in Jakarta, on Monday (29/1/2024). The activities of the IPR Coordination and Facilitation Meeting at the Directorate General of Intellectual Property of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia are a follow-up to the Work Agreement Cooperation (PKS) between the Central Sulawesi Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights and the Banggai Regency Government regarding the Socialization and Facilitation of Intellectual Property Rights in Banggai Regency. Regent Amirudin was received directly by the Director of Copyright and Industrial Design of the Directorate General of Intellectual Property of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Anggoro Dasananto who was accompanied by the Head of the Legal Services Division of the Regional Office Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Herlina and her staff in the meeting room of the Directorate of Copyright and Industrial Design. Anggoro Dasanto expressed his welcome and thanks to the Regent of Banggai who has contributed and helped the work of the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights, especially efforts to protect Intellectual Property Rights in Banggai Regency. READ ALSO: Deputy Regent of Banggai Says Church Functions as a Container of Love, Hope and Service "In the future we also hope that IPR registration in Banggai Regency will not only be limited to brands and copyrights, but how local governments can also register geographical indications and property communal intellectuals," said Anggoro. The Head of Legal Services of the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Central Sulawesi, reported to the Director of Copyright and Industrial Design that Banggai Regency is very responsive to IPR, and is the only district in Central Sulawesi that budgets for IPR Facilitation costs in its APBD. "To increase the capacity of intellectual property agents, we also report that in the next few days, we will provide guidance and increase the capacity of Banggai Regency intellectual property service agents consisting of ASNs from the Banggai Regency Regional Research and Innovation Agency," said Herlina. On this occasion Likewise, the Regent of Banggai Amirudin also expressed his thanks and appreciation to the Director of Copyright and Industrial Design and the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Central Sulawesi, for their attention and good cooperation so far. Furthermore, the regent also submitted a request to accelerate the issuance of Trademark Rights certificates which had been proposed since 2023. ALSO READ: Diarrhea Cases Increase, Dozens of Middle Children Being Treated at Luwuk Regional Hospital "We ask for your help, Director to speed up the trademark issuance process which was proposed in yesterday, there were 29 trademark proposals for which brand certificates had not been issued by the Indonesian Ministry of Law and Human Rights. "This is an important part, especially for MSMEs in Banggai Regency, so that they can develop their business and there is legal certainty about the brands they use so that in the future there will be no lawsuits against the brands they use, as in many cases that have happened recently," explained Amirudin. Regent Amirudin further said that related to Communal Property and Geographical Indications which will soon be registered. "I have ordered the Head of BRIDA to identify potentials related to Communal Wealth and Geographical Indications. Thank God, the Head of BRIDA has reported several that we will register, such as Babasal Coconut, Nambo Durian, Asaan Durian, Andio Aksara, several Traditional Rituals and Several Typical Culinary Banggai Regency," he said. READ ALSO: Noisy Disturbs Neighbors, A Student is Molested in Mangkio, Perpetrator Arrested by Police. In this activity, the Regent of Banggai was accompanied by the Head of the Banggai Regency Regional Research and Innovation Agency, Andi Nur Syamsy Amir, IPR Service Agent for Banggai Regency, Boby A. Palem and BRIDA staff. The meeting took place in a friendly atmosphere between the Regent of Banggai and the Director of Creation and Industrial Design. At the end of the meeting, the Director of Copyright and Industrial Design said that the Director General of Intellectual Property, Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia, Min Usihen, SH., MH will schedule a special meeting with the Regent of Banggai on Tuesday, January 30 2024. Ending the meeting, Regent Amirudin gave a souvenir in the form of Nambo Woven Cloth to the Director of Creation and Industrial Design.**

title: Tipu Warga Pulau Taliabu Puluhan Juta, Resmob Polres Banggai Ciduk Pelaku di Sultra
text: Laporan Wartawan TribunPalu.com, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - Seorang petani berinisial BR alias Dragon (28) warga Desa Bangahu, Kecamatan Taliabu Barat, KabupatenPulauTaliabu , Maluku Utara, ditangkap polisi atas dugaan Penipuan . Dragon ditangkap di Luwuk, KabupatenBanggai , Sulawesi Tengah, atas dugaan kasus Penipuan berdasarkan laporan polisi korban Yusna Soamole (34) warga Desa Bobong, Taliabu. Kasat Reskrim PolresBanggai AKP Tio Tondy melaporkan peristiwa itu terjadi pada Kamis (28/12/2023) sekitar jam 14.30 Wita. Saat itu, korban bersama suaminya Joko Teguh, ditawarkan pelaku dua unit sepeda motor masing-masing Yamaha Fino Rp 4 juta dan Honda CRF Rp 15 juta. "Akhirnya korban menyerahkan uang sebesar Rp 22 Juta," kata Tio, Senin (29/1/2024). Setelah itu, pelaku langsung pergi dengan alasan ingin mengurus surat-surat kendaraan sembari berjanji bahwa pihak dealer akan mengantarkan kedua unit motor tersebut. “Namun motor yang dijanjikan tidak ada dan pelaku juga sudah tidak bisa dihubungi,” ujar AKP Tio. Berdasarkan hasil penyelidikan, Tim Resmob Tompotika Satuan Reskrim PolresBanggai langsung melakukan penyelidikan. Sehingga pelaku terpantau berada di wilayah Provinsi Sulawesi Tenggara (Sultra). Hasil penyelidikan di lapangan diterima informasi tentang keberadaan pelaku dan langsung melakukan penangkapan tanpa perlawanan. "Dengan kerja sama dan koordinasi dengan Resmob Polda Sultra, pelaku berhasil mengamankan di kosnya," ujar AKP Tio. Rabu (24/1/2024), tim Resmob PolresBanggai langsung bertolak menjemput pelaku di Posko Resmob Polda Sultra.(*)
text_en: Report from TribunPalu.com Journalist, Asnawi Zikri TRIBUNPALU.COM, BANGGAI - A farmer with the initials BR alias Dragon (28), a resident of Bangahu Village, West Taliabu District, PulauTaliabu Regency, North Maluku, was arrested by the police on suspicion of fraud. Dragon was arrested in Luwuk, Banggai Regency, Central Sulawesi, on suspicion of fraud based on a police report from victim Yusna Soamole (34), a resident of Bobong Village, Taliabu. Head of Criminal Investigation Unit for the Banggai Police, AKP Tio Tondy, reported that the incident occurred on Thursday (28/12/2023) at around 14.30 WITA. At that time, the victim and her husband Joko Teguh were offered by the perpetrator two motorbikes, each a Yamaha Fino for IDR 4 million and a Honda CRF for IDR 15 million. "Finally the victim handed over IDR 22 million," said Tio, Monday (29/1/2024). After that, the perpetrator immediately left with the excuse of wanting to take care of the vehicle documents while promising that the dealer would deliver the two motorbikes. "However, the promised motorbike was not there and the perpetrator could no longer be contacted," said AKP Tio. Based on the results of the investigation, the Tompotika Resmob Team, Banggai Police Criminal Investigation Unit, immediately carried out an investigation. So the perpetrator was observed to be in the Southeast Sulawesi Province (Sultra). As a result of investigations in the field, information was received about the perpetrator's whereabouts and he immediately made an arrest without resistance. "With cooperation and coordination with the Southeast Sulawesi Regional Police Resmob, the perpetrator succeeded in securing his boarding house," said AKP Tio. Wednesday (24/1/2024), the Banggai Police Resmob team immediately went to pick up the perpetrator at the Southeast Sulawesi Police Resmob Command Post. (*)

title: Ditjen Kekayaan Intelektual Kemenkumham Ri Dorong Pemda Banggai Daftarkan Hak Kekayaan Komunal
text: Terasbanggai.com -Direktur Hak Cipta dan Desain Industri Ditjen Kekayaan Intelektual Kemenkumham RI, Anggoro Dasananto memberikan apresiasi pada Pemda Banggai yang telah menciptakan inovasi layanan HAKI (hak kekayaan intelektual) bagi masyarakat. Anggoro bahkan secara khusus mendorong Bupati Banggai Amirudin agar pemda Banggai agar pendaftaran hak kekayaan intlektual tidak hanya sebatas merek dan hak cipta, tetapi juga pemda Banggai dapat mendaftarkan indikasi geografis dan kekayaan intelektual komunal. Dorongan tersebut disampaikan Direktur Hak Cipta dan Desain Industri Ditjen Kekayaan Intelektual Kemenkumham RI saat pertemuan bersama Bupati Banggai di kantor Kementrian Hukum dan HAM RI, Jakarta, Senin (29/1/2024). Bupati Banggai didampingi Kepala Bidang Pelayanan Hukum Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah, Herlina, Kepala Badan Riset dan Inovasi Daerah Kabupaten Banggai, Andi Nur Syamsy Amir, Agen Layanan HKI Kabupaten Banggai, Boby A. Palem. Bupati Banggai Amirudin menyambut baik dorongan Direktur Hak Cipta dan Desain Industri Ditjen Kekayaan Intelektual Kemenkumham RI, Anggoro Dasananto tersebut. Bupati Banggai sebut komoditas kelapa Babasal, durian Nambo, durian Asaan, aksara Andio, beberapa ritual adat dan beberapa kuliner khas daerah ini akan segera didaftarkan hak kekayaan komunal dan indikasi geografis. “Saya sudah perintahkan Kepala BRIDA untuk melakukan identifikasi potensi yang terkait dengan kekayaan komunal dan indikasi geografis,” ujar Bupati Banggai. Dalam kesempatan pertemuan tersebut Bupati Amirudin mengungkapkan tahun 2023 Pemda Banggai telah mengajukan 29 usulan penerbitan merek dagang. Bagi Pemda Banggai usulan 29 penerbitan merek dagang sangat penting bagi UMKM mendapatkan hak merek dagang agar pelaku usaha mendapatkan perlidungan hukum. “Mohon Bantuannya Pak Direktur untuk mempercepat proses penerbitan merk dagang yang telah diusulkan tahun 2023 lalu,” tutur Bupati Banggai. Kegiatan rapat koordinasi dan fasilitasi HKI pada direktorat jenderal kekayaan intelektual Kementerian Hukum dan HAM RI tersebt merupakan tindaklanjut dari Perjanjian Kerja Sama (PKS) antara Kanwil Kemenkumham Sulawesi Tengah dengan Pemda Banggai tentang sosialisasi dan fasilitasi hak kekayaan intelektual di Kabupaten Banggai. text_en: Terasbanggai.com - Director of Copyright and Industrial Design, Directorate General of Intellectual Property, Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia, Anggoro Dasananto expressed his appreciation to the Banggai Regional Government for creating innovative IPR (intellectual property rights) services for the community. Anggoro even specifically encouraged Banggai Regent Amirudin to encourage the Banggai regional government to register intellectual property rights not only to brands and copyrights, but also for the Banggai regional government to register geographical indications and communal intellectual property. This encouragement was conveyed by the Director of Copyright and Industrial Design, Directorate General of Intellectual Property, Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia during a meeting with the Regent of Banggai at the office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia, Jakarta, Monday (29/1/2024). The Regent of Banggai was accompanied by the Head of the Legal Services Division of the Central Sulawesi Ministry of Law and Human Rights Regional Office, Herlina, the Head of the Banggai Regency Regional Research and Innovation Agency, Andi Nur Syamsy Amir, the Banggai Regency IPR Services Agent, Boby A. Palem. Banggai Regent Amirudin welcomed the encouragement of the Director of Copyright and Industrial Design, Directorate General of Intellectual Property, Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia, Anggoro Dasananto. The Regent of Banggai said that the commodities Babasal coconut, Nambo durian, Asaan durian, Andio script, several traditional rituals and several regional culinary specialties would soon be registered for communal property rights and geographical indications. "I have ordered the Head of BRIDA to identify potential related to communal wealth and geographical indications," said the Regent of Banggai. On the occasion of the meeting, Regent Amirudin revealed that in 2023 the Banggai Regional Government had submitted 29 proposals for the issuance of trademarks. For the Banggai Regional Government, the proposed 29 trademark issuances are very important for MSMEs to obtain trademark rights so that business actors receive legal protection. "We ask for your help, Mr. Director, to speed up the process of issuing the trademark that was proposed in 2023," said the Regent of Banggai. The IPR coordination and facilitation meeting at the directorate general of intellectual property of the Republic of Indonesia's Ministry of Law and Human Rights is a follow-up to the Cooperation Agreement (PKS) between the Central Sulawesi Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights and the Banggai Regional Government regarding the socialization and facilitation of intellectual property rights in Banggai Regency. Anggoro even specifically encouraged Banggai Regent Amirudin to encourage the Banggai regional government to register intellectual property rights not only to brands and copyrights, but also for the Banggai regional government to register geographical indications and communal intellectual property. "I have ordered the Head of BRIDA to identify potential related to communal wealth and geographical indications," said the Regent of Banggai. title: Kasus Diare Meningkat, Belasan Anak Tengah Dirawat di RSUD Luwuk
text: BANGGAI RAYA- Kasus penyakit diare di Kabupaten Banggai mendadak meningkat. Belasan anak dari sejumlah wilayah dikabarkan tengah menjalani perawatan di RSUD Luwuk.Kepala Dinas Kesehatan (Dinkes) Kabupaten Banggai, dr. I Wayan Suartika mengatakan, saat ini ada 21 pasien akibat diare tengah dirawat di RSUD Luwuk.“Saat ini yang dirawat 21 orang, ada tambahan 9 orang darj kemarin,” ungkap Kadinkes Banggai, dr. I Wayan Suartika kepada Banggai Raya, Selasa 30 Januari 2024.BACA JUGA:27.364 KPM di Banggai Mulai Terima Bantuan BerasDari puluhan pasien yang dirawat intensif di RSUD Luwuk kata Kadis, sebagian besar adalah anak-anak.“Hanya tiga orang saja yang dewasa. Ini pemicunya salah satu faktor adalah makanan,” jelas Wayan yang pernah menjabat Kepala Dinas P2KBP3A Banggai itu.Ditanya soal asal pasien, Wayan menerangkan, 21 pasien itu tersebar dari beberapa wilayah.“Ada dari Luwuk, Huhak, Pagimana, Kilongan, Lumpoknya, Maahas, dan lainnya,” tuturnya.BACA JUGA:MTS Al-Ikhlas Tontouan Dibobol Maling, Laptop Rp6,5 Juta RaibOlehnya, Kadinkes Banggai mengimbau kepada warga, untuk mencegah terjadinya diare, menjaga kebersihan, khususnya makanan yang dikonsumsi, menjaga higyene dan sanitasi lingkungan.Tingginya kasus diare sempat mengejutkan di media sosial adanya pesan berantai.Disebutkan saat ini banyak anak-anak yang berobat karena kasus muntaber di Puskesmas Simpong.Bahkan disebutkan fasilitas kesehatan yakni RSUD Luwuk sampai kewalahan menangani pasien kasus diare atau muntaber itu.BACA JUGA:Waket DPRD Banggai Hadiri Forum Konsultasi PublikKepala Puskesmas Simpong, Cycy Sumiarty membenarkan adanya peningkatan kasus diare.“Informasi sementara iya saat ini ada peningkatan kasus diare. Utk info RS kwalahan atau tambah bed mgkin bisa ditanyakan lgsg ke RS,” kata Cycy Sumiarty menjawab pertanyaan wartawan via pesan WhatsApp.Sementara itu, Direktur RSUD Luwuk, dr. Yusran Kasim yang dikonfirmasi via pesan WhatsApp belum merespon, hingga berita ini ditayangkan. (*)
text_en: BANGGAI RAYA- Cases of diarrhea in Banggai Regency have suddenly increased. Dozens of children from a number of areas are reportedly undergoing treatment at Luwuk District Hospital. Head of the Banggai Regency Health Service (Dinkes), dr. I Wayan Suartika said that currently there are 21 patients with diarrhea being treated at Luwuk District Hospital. "Currently 21 people are being treated, there are an additional 9 people from yesterday," said Kadinkes Banggai, Dr. I Wayan Suartika to Banggai Raya, Tuesday 30 January 2024. READ ALSO: 27,364 KPM in Banggai Start Receiving Rice Assistance. Of the dozens of patients being treated intensively at Luwuk Regional Hospital, said the Head of the District Head, the majority are children. "Only three people are adults. One of the triggers for this is food," explained Wayan, who once served as Head of the Banggai P2KBP3A Service. Asked about the origin of the patients, Wayan explained that the 21 patients were spread from several areas. "There are from Luwuk, Huhak, Pagimana, Kilongan, Lumpoknya, Maahas , and others," he said. ALSO READ: MTS Al-Ikhlas Tontouan Burglared, Rp. 6.5 Million Laptop Lost. Therefore, the Head of the Banggai Health Office appealed to residents to prevent diarrhea, maintain cleanliness, especially the food consumed, maintain environmental hygiene and sanitation. The high number of diarrhea cases was surprising on social media with chain messages. It was stated that currently many children were seeking treatment for cases of vomiting at the Simpong Community Health Center. It was even said that the health facility, namely the Luwuk Regional Hospital, was overwhelmed with handling patients with cases of diarrhea or vomiting. ALSO READ: DPRD's Waket Banggai Attends Public Consultation ForumHead of Simpong Community Health Center, Cycy Sumiarty, confirmed that there was an increase in diarrhea cases. "Temporary information is that currently there is an increase in diarrhea cases. "For information about hospitals being overwhelmed or adding beds, maybe you can ask the hospital directly," said Cycy Sumiarty, answering journalists' questions via WhatsApp message. Meanwhile, the Director of Luwuk Regional Hospital, Dr. Yusran Kasim, who was confirmed via WhatsApp message, had not responded until this news was broadcast. (*)

title: Bappeda Banggai Gelar Musrenbang Rkpd Tahap I Dan Rembuk Stunting Di Luwuk Selatan
text: Terasbanggai.com – Bappeda Banggai menggelar musrenbang tahap 1 dan rembuk stunting di wilayah kecamatan Luwuk Selatan, Selasa (30/1/2024). Kepala Bappeda Banggai dalam penyampaian yang disampaikan Kepala Bidang Ekonomi Hartini Djafar mengungkapkan, musrenbang tahap 1 yang dilaksanakan tersebut untuk memenuhi undang undang nomor 25 tahun 2024 tentang perencanaan pembangunan nasional. Selain itu, musrenbang tahap I RKPD tahun 2025 merupakan realisasi pelaksanaan RPJMD pemerintah daerah tahun 2021-2025. “Musrenbang RKPD ini juga bertujuan menyelaraskan RKPD provinsi dan kabupaten,” ujar Hartini. Dikatakan, Musrenbang RKPD tahap 1 dan rembuk stunting juga bertujuan untuk menyelaraskan program prioritas kecamatan berdasarkan usulan yang telah diinput di aplikasi SIPD (sistim informasi perencanaan daerah). Selain itu juga melakukan penajaman, klarifikasi dan penyelarasan kegiatan pembangunan desa dan kelurahan sebagai bahan masukan bagi perangkat daerah terkait. Sementara itu, DPRD Banggai saat penyampaian pokok pokok pikiran yang disampaikan Hasman Balubi menandaskan, musrenbang RKPD tahap I tersebut merupakan kegiatan yang memiliki tujuan untuk mematangkan RKPD tahun 2025. Dikatakan, RKPD sebagai dokumen perencanaan tahunan yang disusun melalui pendekatan proses secara teknokratis, partisipatif, politis serta berorientasi pada subtansi melalui pendekatan holistik tematik, integrarif dan spasial. Camat Luwuk Selatan Rivody Penak memberikan apresiasi atas terlaksannya kegiatan musrenbang RKPD tahap 1 sebagai bagian dari implementasi visi misi Pemda Banggai. “Saya ucapkan terima kasih pada semua pihak yang telah memberikan kontribusi pikiran untuk pembangunan di wilayah kecamatan Luwuk Selatan,” tutur Rivody. Turut hadir anggota DPRD dapil satu, Hasman Balubi, Djody Prakoso, Toto Rahardjo, perangkat daerah di lingkungan pemda Banggai, PKK kecamatan Luwuk Selatan serta tokoh masyarakat. text_en: Terasbanggai.com – Bappeda Banggai held stage 1 of the musrenbang and stunting discussion in the South Luwuk sub-district area, Tuesday (30/1/2024). The Head of Bappeda Banggai, in a statement delivered by the Head of the Economic Division, Hartini Djafar, revealed that the phase 1 Musrenbang was carried out to fulfill Law Number 25 of 2024 concerning national development planning. Apart from that, the 2025 RKPD phase I musrenbang is the realization of the implementation of the regional government's RPJMD for 2021-2025. "This RKPD Musrenbang also aims to harmonize provincial and district RKPD," said Hartini. It was said that Musrenbang RKPD phase 1 and the stunting discussion also aimed to align sub-district priority programs based on proposals that had been input into the SIPD (regional planning information system) application. Apart from that, it also sharpens, clarifies and aligns village and sub-district development activities as input for related regional officials. Meanwhile, the Banggai DPRD, when conveying the main ideas conveyed by Hasman Balubi, emphasized that the phase I RKPD musrenbang was an activity that had the aim of finalizing the RKPD for 2025. He said that the RKPD was an annual planning document prepared using a technocratic, participatory and political process approach. and substance-oriented through a thematic, integrative and spatial holistic approach. South Luwuk Subdistrict Head Rivody Penak expressed his appreciation for the implementation of phase 1 of the RKPD musrenbang activities as part of the implementation of the Banggai Regional Government's vision and mission. "I would like to thank all parties who have contributed ideas for development in the South Luwuk sub-district area," said Rivody. Also present were DPRD members for electoral district one, Hasman Balubi, Djody Prakoso, Toto Rahardjo, regional officials within the Banggai regional government, PKK South Luwuk sub-district and community leaders. ( bd ) Meanwhile, the Banggai DPRD, when conveying the main ideas conveyed by Hasman Balubi, emphasized that the phase I RKPD musrenbang was an activity that had the aim of finalizing the RKPD for 2025. He said that the RKPD was an annual planning document prepared using a technocratic process approach, participatory, political and substance-oriented through a thematic, integrative and spatial holistic approach. Head of Luwuk Selat SubdistrictAn Rivody Penak expressed his appreciation for the implementation of phase 1 of the RKPD musrenbang activities as part of the implementation of the Banggai Regional Government's vision and mission. "I would like to thank all parties who have contributed ideas for development in the South Luwuk sub-district area," said Rivody. title: Kapolres Banggai Cek Logistik Pemilu
text: BANGGAI, MERCUSUAR – Kapolres Banggai, AKBP Ade Nuramdani didampingi Kasat Binmas, AKP Deky Wahyudi melakukan pengecekan logistik Pemilu 2024, pada H-14 voting day, di gudang Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU) Banggai, di Kompleks Bukit Halimun, Senin (29/1/2024). Di sela kegiatan itu, Kapolres mengatakan penjagaan gudang logistik Pemilu merupakan bagian dari pengamanan yang harus dilakukan Polri, dalam tahapan Pemilu 2024. “Polres Banggai siap memberi jaminan keamanan melalui kegiatan pengamanan objek vital, salah satunya adalah pengamanan gudang logistik dan kantor KPU berikut seluruh inventaris logistik Pemilu, agar pendistribusian logistik tidak mengalami keterlambatan,” kata Kapolres. Palam kesempatan itu, Kapolres juga bertemu dengan Sekertaris KPU Banggai, Nirwana dan berpesan jika ada suatu hal yang perlu dikoordinasikan dipersilakan hubungi petugas kepolisian yang ada, agar selalu terjalin sinergi selama berjalannya tahapan hingga pelaksanaan Pemilu 2024. “Kepada TNI-Polri dan petugas pengamanan internal KPU, siap siaga dan jangan lengah dalam pengamanan. Laksanakan tugas dengan baik, cermat dan profesional. Jangan lengah, lakukan dengan penuh tanggung jawab,” pesan Kapolres. */PAR Di sela kegiatan itu, Kapolres mengatakan penjagaan gudang logistik Pemilu merupakan bagian dari pengamanan yang harus dilakukan Polri, dalam tahapan Pemilu 2024. “Polres Banggai siap memberi jaminan keamanan melalui kegiatan pengamanan objek vital, salah satunya adalah pengamanan gudang logistik dan kantor KPU berikut seluruh inventaris logistik Pemilu, agar pendistribusian logistik tidak mengalami keterlambatan,” kata Kapolres.
